engSearchText:
These settings are for checking mob placement
during day/evening/night. Remove these once they
are no longer needed.

jpnSearchText:
昼と夜のモブ配置確認用です。
※不要になりましたら削除をお願いいたします。

For NPC confirmation purposes. Note that the event
may not proceed normally if this is used.
(Station Street port) Remove these once they are no

一般・モブ確認用です。こちらを使用した場合、イベントが
正常に進行しなくなる場合がありますのでご注意ください。

jpnSearchText:
★DEBUG：市内を巡回するメンバーを一人選んで下さい。
（※移動メニュー等でいつでも変更できます）

engSearchText: ★DEBUG: Agnès, Feri, and Aaron have entered the party. Select two additional members.

jpnSearchText:
★DEBUG：アニエス、フェリ、アーロンがパーティに入りました。

engSearchText: ◆(Temp) Select an accompanying character (first).

jpnSearchText: ◆（仮）同行メンバーを選んでください。（１人目）

engSearchText: ◆(Temp) Select an accompanying character (second).

jpnSearchText: ◆（仮）同行メンバーを選んでください。（２人目）

engChrName: ★DEBUG: (Temp) Select an accompanying character (first).
engSearchText: ★DEBUG: (Temp) Select an accompanying character (first).
jpnChrName: ★DEBUG：（仮）同行メンバーを選んでください。（１人目）
jpnSearchText: ★DEBUG：（仮）同行メンバーを選んでください。（１人目）

engChrName: ★DEBUG: (Temp) Select an accompanying character (second).
engSearchText: ★DEBUG: (Temp) Select an accompanying character (second).
jpnChrName: ★DEBUG：（仮）同行メンバーを選んでください。（２人目）
jpnSearchText: ★DEBUG：（仮）同行メンバーを選んでください。（２人目）

engSearchText: ★DEBUG: Select a character to accompany you in addition to Van/Agnès/Risette.

jpnSearchText:
★DEBUG：ヴァン・アニエス・リゼットに加えて

engSearchText: ★DEBUG: Select 1 accompanying character. (This can be changed later.)

jpnSearchText:
★DEBUG：同行メンバーを一人選んでください。
（後で変更も可能です。）

engChrName: ★DEBUG: Set the location liberation status. The order of locations liberated changes the party lineup.
engSearchText: ★DEBUG: Set the location liberation status. The order of locations liberated changes the party lineup.
jpnChrName: ★DEBUG：解放している順番によってパーティー構成が変化します。 解放状況を選択してください。
jpnSearchText:
★DEBUG：解放している順番によってパーティー構成が変化します。
解放状況を選択してください。

engChrName: *sigh* Where did my sister get off to?
engSearchText: *sigh* Where did my sister get off to?
jpnChrName: ふぅ……妹は一体どこに…………
jpnSearchText: ふぅ……妹は一体どこに…………

engChrName: I hope I'll be hearing from that spriggan soon...
engSearchText: I hope I'll be hearing from that spriggan soon...
jpnChrName: 早く裏解決屋から 連絡が来ると良いんだが……
jpnSearchText:
早く裏解決屋から
連絡が来ると良いんだが……

engChrName: (He talkin' about me?)
engSearchText: (He talkin' about me?)
jpnChrName: （コイツ、裏解決屋つったか……？）
jpnSearchText: （コイツ、裏解決屋つったか……？）

engChrName: (I might've missed a post on the bulletin board or somethin'. I'll double check, just to be sure.)
engSearchText:
(I might've missed a post on the bulletin board
or somethin'. I'll double check, just to be sure.)
jpnChrName: （そういや、まだ確認してねえ掲示板があったか。   調べておいた方が良いかもしれねえな。）
jpnSearchText:
（そういや、まだ確認してねえ掲示板があったか。
調べておいた方が良いかもしれねえな。）

engChrName: (What's eatin' at this old timer? Looks like he's really goin' through it.)
engSearchText:
(What's eatin' at this old timer? Looks like he's really
goin' through it.)
jpnChrName: （何だこの爺さん。 　随分と辛気臭いツラをしてやがるが……）
jpnSearchText:
（何だこの爺さん。
　随分と辛気臭いツラをしてやがるが……）

engChrName: Why did this have to happen? I was really looking forward to enjoying the festival with Lodi...
engSearchText:
Why did this have to happen? I was really looking
forward to enjoying the festival with Lodi...
jpnChrName: せ、せっかくローディさんと記念祭を 楽しめるはずだったのに、こんな事に……
jpnSearchText:
せ、せっかくローディさんと記念祭を
楽しめるはずだったのに、こんな事に……

engChrName: Just my luck. No matter how much I need it, I just can't catch a break.
engSearchText:
Just my luck. No matter how much I need it, I just
can't catch a break.
jpnChrName: 本当にあたしって……肝心なところで ツイていないというかなんというか……
jpnSearchText:
本当にあたしって……肝心なところで
ツイていないというかなんというか……

engChrName: Maybe there's still hope for us two! We're together now, yeah? It has to mean something!
engSearchText:
Maybe there's still hope for us two! We're together
now, yeah? It has to mean something!
jpnChrName: ……でも、二人で一緒に助かったと思えば…… 少しは希望もある、のかな……？
jpnSearchText:
……でも、二人で一緒に助かったと思えば……
少しは希望もある、のかな……？

engChrName: I suppose we can still enjoy the festival together! ...As friends.
engSearchText:
I suppose we can still enjoy the festival together!
...As friends.
jpnChrName: ……ローディさんと二人で記念祭…… うーん、でもやっぱり友達、か……
jpnSearchText:
……ローディさんと二人で記念祭……
うーん、でもやっぱり友達、か……

engChrName: I should probably be grateful we're even friends to begin with...
engSearchText:
I should probably be grateful we're even friends to
begin with...
jpnChrName: まあ、そうよね……仲良くなったとはいえ、 これと言って何かがあった訳でも……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、そうよね……仲良くなったとはいえ、
これと言って何かがあった訳でも……

engChrName: Right... There's always next year!
engSearchText: Right... There's always next year!
jpnChrName: でも……来年にもしかしたら……！
jpnSearchText: でも……来年にもしかしたら……！

engChrName: (N-No way... Was Lodi planning on inviting me this whole time?)
engSearchText:
(N-No way... Was Lodi planning on inviting me this
whole time?)
jpnChrName: （ま、まさかローディさんからお誘いが……   もしかして、最初からずっと……？）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、まさかローディさんからお誘いが……
もしかして、最初からずっと……？）

engChrName: (He's such a dreamboat. So chill—so relaxed. Doesn't throw a hissy fit at the drop of a hat! Oooh, my ex would be eating. His. Heart. OUT!)
engSearchText:
(He's such a dreamboat. So chill—so relaxed.
Doesn't throw a hissy fit at the drop of a hat!
Oooh, my ex would be eating. His. Heart. OUT!)
jpnChrName: （ま、前の彼氏よりは圧倒的にかっこよくて   器も大きいし……彼なら私も……！）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、前の彼氏よりは圧倒的にかっこよくて
器も大きいし……彼なら私も……！）

engChrName: *huff* *huff* It's nice to be able to run again. Feels like things are finally back to normal.
engSearchText:
*huff* *huff* It's nice to be able to run again.
Feels like things are finally back to normal.
jpnChrName: ほっほっほっ……いやあ、普通に走れるように なって、日常が戻ってきたって感じね。
jpnSearchText:
ほっほっほっ……いやあ、普通に走れるように
なって、日常が戻ってきたって感じね。

engChrName: I couldn't go jogging at all during lockdown. I barely started and my legs already feel like jelly. How easy you can fall out of shape...
engSearchText:
I couldn't go jogging at all during lockdown. I barely
started and my legs already feel like jelly. How easy
you can fall out of shape...
jpnChrName: 警戒中は流石に自粛してたから……ちょっと 身体がなまっちゃったかも？
jpnSearchText:
警戒中は流石に自粛してたから……ちょっと
身体がなまっちゃったかも？

engChrName: I'm not letting that happen again! I'll just have to pick up the pace to make up for lost time!
engSearchText:
I'm not letting that happen again! I'll just have to pick
up the pace to make up for lost time!
jpnChrName: 何にせよ、リバウンドする訳にもいかないわ！ ペースを戻して頑張って行かなくっちゃ！
jpnSearchText:
何にせよ、リバウンドする訳にもいかないわ！
ペースを戻して頑張って行かなくっちゃ！

engChrName: Lodi was already such a good listener and overall just so much fun to hang out with.
engSearchText:
Lodi was already such a good listener and overall just
so much fun to hang out with.
jpnChrName: ローディさん、話聞いてくれたり 色々教えてくれて面白い人とは思ってたけど……
jpnSearchText:
ローディさん、話聞いてくれたり
色々教えてくれて面白い人とは思ってたけど……

engChrName: To think he'd be so dependable, too! Hah, take that, worthless ex of mine! He's so much better than you!
engSearchText:
To think he'd be so dependable, too! Hah, take that,
worthless ex of mine! He's so much better than you!
jpnChrName: まさか、こんな時には頼もしい一面まで…… 本当に甲斐性なしの元カレと対極っていうか……
jpnSearchText:
まさか、こんな時には頼もしい一面まで……
本当に甲斐性なしの元カレと対極っていうか……

engChrName: This is that singer-songwriter everyone's on a buzz about? Whoa. His performance is so emotional...
engSearchText:
This is that singer-songwriter everyone's on a
buzz about? Whoa. His performance is
so emotional...
jpnChrName: 凄い、これがウワサのシンガーソングライター…… 心に染みるというか何というか……
jpnSearchText:
凄い、これがウワサのシンガーソングライター……
心に染みるというか何というか……

engChrName: It's so wonderful, getting to hear music like this somewhere I take for granted on my everyday jogs.
engSearchText:
It's so wonderful, getting to hear music like this
somewhere I take for granted on my everyday jogs.
jpnChrName: いつも走ってる場所の近くで、こんな 素晴らしい歌が聞けたなんて……！
jpnSearchText:
いつも走ってる場所の近くで、こんな
素晴らしい歌が聞けたなんて……！

engChrName: Goes to show what I've been missing out on this whole time, never slowing down to smell the roses.
engSearchText:
Goes to show what I've been missing out on this
whole time, never slowing down to smell the roses.
jpnChrName: 走りと言い……ほんとあたしって、 見逃してた楽しみ多かったのね……
jpnSearchText:
走りと言い……ほんとあたしって、
見逃してた楽しみ多かったのね……

engChrName: Lodi's finally opened up my eyes. There are so many things I'm seeing clearly for the first time... Wait—why are my cheeks wet?
engSearchText:
Lodi's finally opened up my eyes. There are so many
things I'm seeing clearly for the first time...
Wait—why are my cheeks wet?
jpnChrName: それに気づかせてくれるローディさん…… 何というか、とても……
jpnSearchText:
それに気づかせてくれるローディさん……
何というか、とても……

engChrName: *huff* *huff* Just a bit more and then I can call it a day.
engSearchText:
*huff* *huff* Just a bit more and then I can call it
a day.
jpnChrName: ほっほっほっ……さて、もう少し走ったら 今日は早めにランニングを切り上げないとね。
jpnSearchText:
ほっほっほっ……さて、もう少し走ったら
今日は早めにランニングを切り上げないとね。

engChrName: I don't wanna risk missing the concert tonight! Lodi invited me to see this up-and-coming artist named Jess.
engSearchText:
I don't wanna risk missing the concert tonight!
Lodi invited me to see this up-and-coming artist
named Jess.
jpnChrName: 何たって、噂のジェスって人の ライブにローディさんが誘ってくれたわけだし……
jpnSearchText:
何たって、噂のジェスって人の
ライブにローディさんが誘ってくれたわけだし……

engChrName: But first, a shower! Last thing I want to do is show up there all sweaty!
engSearchText:
But first, a shower! Last thing I want to do is show up
there all sweaty!
jpnChrName: 汗を流してさっぱりしてから行かないと 流石に失礼ってものよね！
jpnSearchText:
汗を流してさっぱりしてから行かないと
流石に失礼ってものよね！

engChrName: Lodi's such a good listener. He's the best, most considerate drinking buddy I've ever had.
engSearchText:
Lodi's such a good listener. He's the best, most
considerate drinking buddy I've ever had.
jpnChrName: いやあ、ローディさんは愚痴聞いてくれるし 気も利かしてくれるし、飲んでて楽しいわ。
jpnSearchText:
いやあ、ローディさんは愚痴聞いてくれるし
気も利かしてくれるし、飲んでて楽しいわ。

engChrName: Guys should be taking notes from him! HE should be taking notes!
engSearchText:
Guys should be taking notes from him! HE should be
taking notes!
jpnChrName: まったく、どっかの男とは大違い！
jpnSearchText: まったく、どっかの男とは大違い！

engChrName: Ahh. Nothing beats the refreshing chill of an autumn breeze after a good jog.
engSearchText:
Ahh. Nothing beats the refreshing chill of an autumn
breeze after a good jog.
jpnChrName: 最近は涼しくなってきたわね、 これはこれで秋風が気持ち良いかも。
jpnSearchText:
最近は涼しくなってきたわね、
これはこれで秋風が気持ち良いかも。

engChrName: When winter comes, a nice jog will do enough to warm me right up. Every season's a new experience. I love running year round.
engSearchText:
When winter comes, a nice jog will do enough to
warm me right up. Every season's a new experience.
I love running year round.
jpnChrName: 冬は冬でランニングで温かくなれるし、 オールシーズンでやる価値ありそうね。
jpnSearchText:
冬は冬でランニングで温かくなれるし、
オールシーズンでやる価値ありそうね。

engChrName: Now that I think about it, I think I've heard about this public bathhouse over in Old Town.
engSearchText:
Now that I think about it, I think I've heard about
this public bathhouse over in Old Town.
jpnChrName: そういえば、旧市街には公衆浴場ってのも あるみたいだし……
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、旧市街には公衆浴場ってのも
あるみたいだし……

engChrName: It might not be a bad idea to relax and warm myself up after a nice jog. Not to mention wash off all this sweat.
engSearchText:
It might not be a bad idea to relax and warm myself
up after a nice jog. Not to mention wash off all
this sweat.
jpnChrName: 冬場は走った後に汗を流して、 身体を温め直すのも良いかも。
jpnSearchText:
冬場は走った後に汗を流して、
身体を温め直すのも良いかも。

engChrName: I've been seeing flyers all over the concert hall for this pop singer-songwriter.
engSearchText:
I've been seeing flyers all over the concert hall for this
pop singer-songwriter.
jpnChrName: そういえば、ライブハウスにたまにポスターが 出ているシンガーソングライターだけど……
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、ライブハウスにたまにポスターが
出ているシンガーソングライターだけど……

engChrName: Lodi's a big fan, so I've been thinking about watching one of his performances sometime soon.
engSearchText:
Lodi's a big fan, so I've been thinking about watching
one of his performances sometime soon.
jpnChrName: ローディさんも好きみたいね、 だったら私も一回聞きに行ってみようかなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
ローディさんも好きみたいね、
だったら私も一回聞きに行ってみようかなぁ。

engChrName: It's fun to broaden your horizons. Plus! It gives me something to bond with Lodi over!
engSearchText:
It's fun to broaden your horizons. Plus! It gives me
something to bond with Lodi over!
jpnChrName: 知り合いをきっかけにそういうのにハマるのも、 色々視野が広がって面白そうだし。
jpnSearchText:
知り合いをきっかけにそういうのにハマるのも、
色々視野が広がって面白そうだし。

engChrName: Everyone's been talking about the Tharbad Film Festival.
engSearchText:
Everyone's been talking about the Tharbad
Film Festival.
jpnChrName: そういえば、サルバッドの映画祭ってのが 最近は随分と話題になってるわね……
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、サルバッドの映画祭ってのが
最近は随分と話題になってるわね……

engChrName: Hmph. Just the kind of thing my jerk of an ex would be into. Always called movies 'films,' the pretentious asshole! I'm almost glad he dumped me.
engSearchText:
Hmph. Just the kind of thing my jerk of an ex would
be into. Always called movies 'films,' the
pretentious asshole! I'm almost glad he dumped me.
jpnChrName: 映画祭……私を捨てたあの男、 如何にもそういうの好きそう……
jpnSearchText:
映画祭……私を捨てたあの男、
如何にもそういうの好きそう……

engChrName: Grr... Just thinking about him makes me SO angry! Ugh. I'm gonna go take a nice jog to clear my head.
engSearchText:
Grr... Just thinking about him makes me SO angry!
Ugh. I'm gonna go take a nice jog to clear my head.
jpnChrName: ……ダメだ、思い出したらイライラしてきた。 ひとっ走りして発散しないと……！
jpnSearchText:
……ダメだ、思い出したらイライラしてきた。
ひとっ走りして発散しないと……！

engChrName: I don't care if it's the middle of the night. Once this rain lets up, I'm runnin' till my vision goes white!
engSearchText:
I don't care if it's the middle of the night. Once this
rain lets up, I'm runnin' till my vision goes white!
jpnChrName: この際夜中でも良いわ、 雨が止んだらスカッとするまで……！
jpnSearchText:
この際夜中でも良いわ、
雨が止んだらスカッとするまで……！

engChrName: I started dieting and jogging after getting dumped, but I stuck with running 'cause it was fun.
engSearchText:
I started dieting and jogging after getting dumped,
but I stuck with running 'cause it was fun.
jpnChrName: フラれてヤケになって始めたダイエットの ランニング……慣れると楽しいものね。
jpnSearchText:
フラれてヤケになって始めたダイエットの
ランニング……慣れると楽しいものね。

engChrName: It's great visiting places I usually wouldn't go to, and I get to talk to cool people. Like Lodi!
engSearchText:
It's great visiting places I usually wouldn't go to, and I
get to talk to cool people. Like Lodi!
jpnChrName: ローディさんみたいな話し相手もできたし、 今まで行かなかったようなところも走るし……
jpnSearchText:
ローディさんみたいな話し相手もできたし、
今まで行かなかったようなところも走るし……

engChrName: Maybe getting dumped was the best thing to ever happen to me!
engSearchText:
Maybe getting dumped was the best thing to ever
happen to me!
jpnChrName: 新しい楽しみが見つかったって意味じゃ、 案外フラれたのが良い方向に繋がったのかしら。
jpnSearchText:
新しい楽しみが見つかったって意味じゃ、
案外フラれたのが良い方向に繋がったのかしら。

engChrName: Ugh, why is Shino's food so darn GOOD?! I want to hold off since I just lost a lot of weight, but I can't!
engSearchText:
Ugh, why is Shino's food so darn GOOD?! I want to
hold off since I just lost a lot of weight, but I can't!
jpnChrName: ふう、シノさんの屋台はご飯も美味しいわね。 せっかく痩せてきたのに、ついつい……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、シノさんの屋台はご飯も美味しいわね。
せっかく痩せてきたのに、ついつい……

engChrName: I first came across Shino's food truck on Station Street, but I like it more when she's in Riverside. The scenery just adds to it all.
engSearchText:
I first came across Shino's food truck on Station
Street, but I like it more when she's in Riverside.
The scenery just adds to it all.
jpnChrName: シノさんのお店、最初は駅前で出会ったけど。 リバーサイドで食べると一層風流なものねー。
jpnSearchText:
シノさんのお店、最初は駅前で出会ったけど。
リバーサイドで食べると一層風流なものねー。

engChrName: I used to just drink at her place, venting all my troubles away. I can't believe it took me this long to find out her food bangs so hard.
engSearchText:
I used to just drink at her place, venting all my
troubles away. I can't believe it took me this long to
find out her food bangs so hard.
jpnChrName: 前はお酒飲んで愚痴ってたけど……こんなに 美味しいものを見逃してたなんて勿体ないかも。
jpnSearchText:
前はお酒飲んで愚痴ってたけど……こんなに
美味しいものを見逃してたなんて勿体ないかも。

engChrName: Speaking of bangers, I heard the taco stand's got some great offerings, too. I kinda wanna give them a try.
engSearchText:
Speaking of bangers, I heard the taco stand's got
some great offerings, too. I kinda wanna give them
a try.
jpnChrName: そういえば、向こうにあるタコスの屋台も 美味しいって聞いてたけど、どうなのかしら。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、向こうにあるタコスの屋台も
美味しいって聞いてたけど、どうなのかしら。

engChrName: ...If I can get past just how much the guy running it gives me the heebie jeebies. Oh, but I want to try out everything else in Riverside!
engSearchText:
...If I can get past just how much the guy running it
gives me the heebie jeebies. Oh, but I want to try out
everything else in Riverside!
jpnChrName: ちょっとおじさん怖そうだし敬遠してたけど…… リバーサイド楽しむためにも、挑戦しようかしら。
jpnSearchText:
ちょっとおじさん怖そうだし敬遠してたけど……
リバーサイド楽しむためにも、挑戦しようかしら。

engChrName: *huff* *wheeze* A-All right. Good time as any to take a breather.
engSearchText:
*huff* *wheeze* A-All right. Good time as any to take
a breather.
jpnChrName: ふっ、ふっ、ふっ…… ふう、ここらで一休みしようかしら。
jpnSearchText:
ふっ、ふっ、ふっ……
ふう、ここらで一休みしようかしら。

engChrName: But I've definitely been getting the hang of this whole exercising thing. Maybe I can multitask and sightsee around Riverside while I'm out?
engSearchText:
But I've definitely been getting the hang of this whole
exercising thing. Maybe I can multitask and sightsee
around Riverside while I'm out?
jpnChrName: だいぶ慣れてきたし、ランニングのついでに この辺で何か遊んでみたりしても良いかも。
jpnSearchText:
だいぶ慣れてきたし、ランニングのついでに
この辺で何か遊んでみたりしても良いかも。

engChrName: I overheard people in front of the Blue Score talking about some popular performer who plays there...
engSearchText:
I overheard people in front of the Blue Score talking
about some popular performer who plays there...
jpnChrName: ライブハウス前を通りかかった時にも、何か有名な シンガーソングライターがいるって聞いたし……
jpnSearchText:
ライブハウス前を通りかかった時にも、何か有名な
シンガーソングライターがいるって聞いたし……

engChrName: Riverside might just be a lot more fun than I gave it credit for!
engSearchText:
Riverside might just be a lot more fun than I gave it
credit for!
jpnChrName: 結構リバーサイド、楽しめるものも 思った以上に多いのかもね♪
jpnSearchText:
結構リバーサイド、楽しめるものも
思った以上に多いのかもね♪

engChrName: I never imagined I'd make a friend while I was stumbling my way through this whole diet and exercising thing. How lucky am I?!
engSearchText:
I never imagined I'd make a friend while I was
stumbling my way through this whole diet and
exercising thing. How lucky am I?!
jpnChrName: ま、まさかダイエットで無理して走ってるだけで 何か共感してくる人が出てくるなんて……
jpnSearchText:
ま、まさかダイエットで無理して走ってるだけで
何か共感してくる人が出てくるなんて……

engChrName: He's a cyclist. I'm sure he knows the area real well, so I'll try to ask him about good running paths. Ahh, it's almost like we were fated to meet!
engSearchText:
He's a cyclist. I'm sure he knows the area real well, so
I'll try to ask him about good running paths. Ahh, it's
almost like we were fated to meet!
jpnChrName: まあ、この辺で自転車転がしてる人なら、 良いコースとか知ってそうだし、これも縁かしら。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、この辺で自転車転がしてる人なら、
良いコースとか知ってそうだし、これも縁かしら。

engChrName: *huff* *wheeze* I can't even remember the last time I ran. Oh, geez. I'm cramping up already.
engSearchText:
*huff* *wheeze* I can't even remember the last time
I ran. Oh, geez. I'm cramping up already.
jpnChrName: ほっほっほっ……走るのいつぶりだろ、 こんなに早く……脇腹痛くなったっけ……？
jpnSearchText:
ほっほっほっ……走るのいつぶりだろ、
こんなに早く……脇腹痛くなったっけ……？

engChrName: No! Nope! I am NOT letting that jerk win! He's SO gonna regret dumping me just 'cause I didn't fit into those stupid pants he got me!
engSearchText:
No! Nope! I am NOT letting that jerk win! He's SO
gonna regret dumping me just 'cause I didn't fit into
those stupid pants he got me!
jpnChrName: ……で、でもプレゼントのズボンが合わないだけで フるような男には……負けられない！
jpnSearchText:
……で、でもプレゼントのズボンが合わないだけで
フるような男には……負けられない！

engChrName: I can't wait till he comes back, beggin' on his knees once I fit into a size four!
engSearchText:
I can't wait till he comes back, beggin' on his knees
once I fit into a size four!
jpnChrName: ……絶対、４リジュ……ウエストを４リジュ以上 絞って見返して……！
jpnSearchText:
……絶対、４リジュ……ウエストを４リジュ以上
絞って見返して……！

engChrName: *huff* *huff* Running's a lot harder than I thought it'd be, though... But I am NOT going to quit!
engSearchText:
*huff* *huff* Running's a lot harder than I thought
it'd be, though... But I am NOT going to quit!
jpnChrName: はぁ、はぁ……で、でも流石にキツいかも…… み、三日坊主にだけはなりたくないけど……
jpnSearchText:
はぁ、はぁ……で、でも流石にキツいかも……
み、三日坊主にだけはなりたくないけど……

engChrName: Screw it! I'm too far to turn back now. Size four or BUST!
engSearchText:
Screw it! I'm too far to turn back now. Size four
or BUST!
jpnChrName: もう一週間やったし、このまま何とか、 あと４リジュ絞るまでは……！
jpnSearchText:
もう一週間やったし、このまま何とか、
あと４リジュ絞るまでは……！

engChrName: Huh? Shino's food truck's not here today. Aww, I was really hoping to grab a drink and get my mind off of everything.
engSearchText:
Huh? Shino's food truck's not here today. Aww, I was
really hoping to grab a drink and get my mind off
of everything.
jpnChrName: ええ～……今日ってシノさんの屋台は 来ていないの……気晴らしにと思ったのに……
jpnSearchText:
ええ～……今日ってシノさんの屋台は
来ていないの……気晴らしにと思ったのに……

engChrName: *sigh* I just can't catch a break.
engSearchText: *sigh* I just can't catch a break.
jpnChrName: ……はあ、あたしって本当に ついてないな……
jpnSearchText:
……はあ、あたしって本当に
ついてないな……

engChrName: And I don't even have anyone to vent to now! Ugh, whatever! It's less calories for me!
engSearchText:
And I don't even have anyone to vent to now!
Ugh, whatever! It's less calories for me!
jpnChrName: 愚痴聞いてくれる人もいないし…… ええい、こうなりゃヤケよ！
jpnSearchText:
愚痴聞いてくれる人もいないし……
ええい、こうなりゃヤケよ！

engChrName: I know! I'll go for a run instead! Maybe he'll notice me if I shave off this weight. Who needs dinner and drinks anyway?!
engSearchText:
I know! I'll go for a run instead! Maybe he'll notice
me if I shave off this weight. Who needs dinner and
drinks anyway?!
jpnChrName: あの男を見返すためにも……久しぶりに走って 痩せてみるわ！　この際ヤケよヤケ！
jpnSearchText:
あの男を見返すためにも……久しぶりに走って
痩せてみるわ！　この際ヤケよヤケ！

engChrName: We've gone everywhere, but we somehow ended up back in Riverside. Haha, guess there's no better place than here.
engSearchText:
We've gone everywhere, but we somehow ended up
back in Riverside. Haha, guess there's no better place
than here.
jpnChrName: いやぁ、何やかんやで回ってきたけど、 結局はリバーサイドが落ち着くよなセルマ。
jpnSearchText:
いやぁ、何やかんやで回ってきたけど、
結局はリバーサイドが落ち着くよなセルマ。

engChrName: Uh-huh. You said it. It's been hard getting around with everyone here, but I'm glad we got to have the time to sightsee.
engSearchText:
Uh-huh. You said it. It's been hard getting around
with everyone here, but I'm glad we got to have the
time to sightsee.
jpnChrName: うん……でも、記念祭の時だからというのも あるけど、面白いところ一杯見れて良かったわ！
jpnSearchText:
うん……でも、記念祭の時だからというのも
あるけど、面白いところ一杯見れて良かったわ！

engChrName: My ex was SO lame. We'd never go to cool places like this.
engSearchText:
My ex was SO lame. We'd never go to cool places
like this.
jpnChrName: 前の彼氏、つまらない人であたしに 楽しみを教えてくれたりしなかったから……
jpnSearchText:
前の彼氏、つまらない人であたしに
楽しみを教えてくれたりしなかったから……

engChrName: Then we'll have to go to as many as we can, to make up for time lost. Wanna do this again after the festival?
engSearchText:
Then we'll have to go to as many as we can, to make
up for time lost. Wanna do this again after
the festival?
jpnChrName: ま、その分俺が色々今後も連れて行ってやるさ、 記念祭の後も付き合っていくわけだしな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、その分俺が色々今後も連れて行ってやるさ、
記念祭の後も付き合っていくわけだしな。

engChrName: All the cool spots in town get even cooler with a friend around!
engSearchText:
All the cool spots in town get even cooler with a
friend around!
jpnChrName: 友達だろ？　遠慮すんなって！
jpnSearchText: 友達だろ？　遠慮すんなって！

engChrName: O-Oh, okay—I mean. Yeah, totally! Friends, haha. I'd love that.
engSearchText:
O-Oh, okay—I mean. Yeah, totally! Friends, haha.
I'd love that.
jpnChrName: ああ、そう……うん、友達だもんね！
jpnSearchText: ああ、そう……うん、友達だもんね！

engChrName: How about a toast? I know the festival isn't until tomorrow, but it feels appropriate.
engSearchText:
How about a toast? I know the festival isn't until
tomorrow, but it feels appropriate.
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、少し早いけど 記念祭の前夜祭って事で乾杯。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ、少し早いけど
記念祭の前夜祭って事で乾杯。

engChrName: Cheers! I'm grateful for the turn my life has taken, broadening my horizons. It's been so much fun.
engSearchText:
Cheers! I'm grateful for the turn my life has taken,
broadening my horizons. It's been so much fun.
jpnChrName: 乾杯、今年は新しい楽しみも 見つけたし、それに対してもね。
jpnSearchText:
乾杯、今年は新しい楽しみも
見つけたし、それに対してもね。

engChrName: But most of all...I'm grateful I met you, Lodi.
engSearchText: But most of all...I'm grateful I met you, Lodi.
jpnChrName: ローディさんとも知り合えた事だし。
jpnSearchText: ローディさんとも知り合えた事だし。

engChrName: Ahaha, couldn't have said it better myself. Cheers to new friends!
engSearchText:
Ahaha, couldn't have said it better myself. Cheers to
new friends!
jpnChrName: はは、違いないな。 新しい友達にお互い乾杯だ。
jpnSearchText:
はは、違いないな。
新しい友達にお互い乾杯だ。

engChrName: Speaking of which, do you have any plans for the Revolution Festival, Selma?
engSearchText:
Speaking of which, do you have any plans for the
Revolution Festival, Selma?
jpnChrName: それはそうと、セルマ…… 記念祭当日って空いてるか？
jpnSearchText:
それはそうと、セルマ……
記念祭当日って空いてるか？

engChrName: Oh, umm—y-yeah! W-Wait, no! I d-don't have anything going on. Why do you ask?
engSearchText:
Oh, umm—y-yeah! W-Wait, no! I d-don't have
anything going on. Why do you ask?
jpnChrName: え、うん……空いてるけど、もしかして？
jpnSearchText: え、うん……空いてるけど、もしかして？

engChrName: That's a relief to hear. What do you say we go out together? I guarantee you it's gonna be a whole lot more fun than going alone.
engSearchText:
That's a relief to hear. What do you say we go
out together? I guarantee you it's gonna be a whole
lot more fun than going alone.
jpnChrName: なら良かった、せっかくだし一緒に回らないか。 一人より、一緒に行った方が楽しいだろ？
jpnSearchText:
なら良かった、せっかくだし一緒に回らないか。
一人より、一緒に行った方が楽しいだろ？

engChrName: Wha—a-are you serious?! I-I mean—of course! I'd love to go with you!
engSearchText:
Wha—a-are you serious?! I-I mean—of course!
I'd love to go with you!
jpnChrName: え……ま、マジ！？　も、勿論オッケーよ！
jpnSearchText: え……ま、マジ！？　も、勿論オッケーよ！

engChrName: You, me, festival, we go, have good time, kettle corn, yes! Mhm!
engSearchText:
You, me, festival, we go, have good time, kettle
corn, yes! Mhm!
jpnChrName: 記念祭、一緒に最高の一日にしましょう！
jpnSearchText: 記念祭、一緒に最高の一日にしましょう！

engChrName: I'm glad you said yes! But, uhh... You okay? You look a little red there.
engSearchText:
I'm glad you said yes! But, uhh... You okay? You look
a little red there.
jpnChrName: お、おう……そんなに気張らなくても…… まあ、一緒に回れるって事で良いんだな？
jpnSearchText:
お、おう……そんなに気張らなくても……
まあ、一緒に回れるって事で良いんだな？

engChrName: Oh. Sorry, gotta go. Be seeing you, Selma. I'll hit you up later so we can plan it all out.
engSearchText:
Oh. Sorry, gotta go. Be seeing you, Selma. I'll hit
you up later so we can plan it all out.
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、待ち合わせの事とかは 後で追って連絡するからな。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ、待ち合わせの事とかは
後で追って連絡するからな。

engChrName: Y-Yeah, definitely! Just let me know, haha! Everything's peachy here!
engSearchText:
Y-Yeah, definitely! Just let me know, haha!
Everything's peachy here!
jpnChrName: え、ええ……！ 是非、是非とも！
jpnSearchText:
え、ええ……！
是非、是非とも！

engChrName: Did you hear about it? I just can't believe the whole village would be wiped out like that...
engSearchText:
Did you hear about it? I just can't believe the whole
village would be wiped out like that...
jpnChrName: あ、あの事件本当なの……？ 村が一つ消えるなんて、信じられない……
jpnSearchText:
あ、あの事件本当なの……？
村が一つ消えるなんて、信じられない……

engChrName: Not to mention the lockdown... What are we supposed to do at a time like this?! Like, what do you do?!
engSearchText:
Not to mention the lockdown... What are we
supposed to do at a time like this?! Like, what do
you do?!
jpnChrName: それに、非常事態宣言なんて…… こういう時って、ど、どう動けば……！？
jpnSearchText:
それに、非常事態宣言なんて……
こういう時って、ど、どう動けば……！？

engChrName: Take it easy, Selma! Let's just relax and take this all one step at a time.
engSearchText:
Take it easy, Selma! Let's just relax and take this all
one step at a time.
jpnChrName: と、とりあえず落ち着きな……！ 情報は、焦らずに少しずつ集めよう……
jpnSearchText:
と、とりあえず落ち着きな……！
情報は、焦らずに少しずつ集めよう……

engChrName: State of emergency or not, we need to be steady. Just try to keep living your day-to-day as always.
engSearchText:
State of emergency or not, we need to be steady.
Just try to keep living your day-to-day as always.
jpnChrName: 非常事態宣言にしても……羽目を外したり 不審な行動さえしなきゃ何とかなる。
jpnSearchText:
非常事態宣言にしても……羽目を外したり
不審な行動さえしなきゃ何とかなる。

engChrName: We just have to keep on going strong, and I guarantee everything will be just fine. So, take a deep breath. Let's try to calm down, okay?
engSearchText:
We just have to keep on going strong, and I
guarantee everything will be just fine. So, take a
deep breath. Let's try to calm down, okay?
jpnChrName: 普通に生活する分には、多分問題無い…… そう怖がり過ぎるな、一旦深呼吸しような。
jpnSearchText:
普通に生活する分には、多分問題無い……
そう怖がり過ぎるな、一旦深呼吸しような。

engChrName: Th-Thanks, Lodi...
engSearchText: Th-Thanks, Lodi...
jpnChrName: ろ、ローディさんありがとう……
jpnSearchText: ろ、ローディさんありがとう……

engChrName: It's like nothing fazes you... How do you do it?
engSearchText: It's like nothing fazes you... How do you do it?
jpnChrName: そういうローディさんは随分と 落ち着いているみたいね……
jpnSearchText:
そういうローディさんは随分と
落ち着いているみたいね……

engChrName: Haha, I think you give me too much credit. If the Battle of Jormungandr taught me anything, I guess it was how to keep my cool.
engSearchText:
Haha, I think you give me too much credit. If the
Battle of Jormungandr taught me anything, I guess it
was how to keep my cool.
jpnChrName: なに、ヨルムンガンド戦役の時の教訓さ。
jpnSearchText: なに、ヨルムンガンド戦役の時の教訓さ。

engChrName: The thought of the war dragging on, of getting drafted if things got worse, the fighting in general... The anxiety got to me. I was a wreck.
engSearchText:
The thought of the war dragging on, of getting
drafted if things got worse, the fighting in general...
The anxiety got to me. I was a wreck.
jpnChrName: 長引けば共和国でも徴兵が始まるかもって 噂も飛び交って、色々と取り乱しちゃってさ。
jpnSearchText:
長引けば共和国でも徴兵が始まるかもって
噂も飛び交って、色々と取り乱しちゃってさ。

engChrName: It wasn't healthy, but it taught me that there's no use in worrying yourself up a storm over what you can't fix.
engSearchText:
It wasn't healthy, but it taught me that there's no use
in worrying yourself up a storm over what you
can't fix.
jpnChrName: まあ、それ以来こういう時には、冷静に 諸々を動こうって決めてな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、それ以来こういう時には、冷静に
諸々を動こうって決めてな。

engChrName: Huh... You're steady, Lodi. If I could just...lean on you a bit more...
engSearchText:
Huh... You're steady, Lodi. If I could just...lean on
you a bit more...
jpnChrName: そうだったんだ……そういう心持ちの人が いてくれると、頼もしいかも……？
jpnSearchText:
そうだったんだ……そういう心持ちの人が
いてくれると、頼もしいかも……？

engChrName: Oh, and get this. He got all pissy at me 'cause I didn't fit into these stupid jeans he bought me!
engSearchText:
Oh, and get this. He got all pissy at me 'cause I didn't
fit into these stupid jeans he bought me!
jpnChrName: それでさ、そいつったら……プレゼントのズボンが 入らないって事だけで機嫌悪くしちゃって！
jpnSearchText:
それでさ、そいつったら……プレゼントのズボンが
入らないって事だけで機嫌悪くしちゃって！

engChrName: Can you BELIEVE that?! That was such a jerk move! At this point, I'm just glad we didn't last. I wouldn't wanna be stuck with someone so shallow.
engSearchText:
Can you BELIEVE that?! That was such a
jerk move! At this point, I'm just glad we didn't last.
I wouldn't wanna be stuck with someone so shallow.
jpnChrName: そんなんだから長続きしなかったのよもう、 ほんっと心の狭い男でさぁ……！
jpnSearchText:
そんなんだから長続きしなかったのよもう、
ほんっと心の狭い男でさぁ……！

engChrName: Oh, geez. That's just awful.
engSearchText: Oh, geez. That's just awful.
jpnChrName: はは、それは災難だったな。
jpnSearchText: はは、それは災難だったな。

engChrName: Dude sounds like he has some real issues he needs to work through. There's nothing you could've done.
engSearchText:
Dude sounds like he has some real issues he needs to
work through. There's nothing you could've done.
jpnChrName: それは完全に向こうが悪いし、 君が気にする事は無いと思うぞ。
jpnSearchText:
それは完全に向こうが悪いし、
君が気にする事は無いと思うぞ。

engChrName: Right?! You get it! And you're a guy, too! You hear that, Johnny?! It's all your fault, you jerk!
engSearchText:
Right?! You get it! And you're a guy, too! You hear
that, Johnny?! It's all your fault, you jerk!
jpnChrName: でしょ～？　ほら、男から見てもそうなのよ、 ジョニーのバカヤロー！
jpnSearchText:
でしょ～？　ほら、男から見てもそうなのよ、
ジョニーのバカヤロー！

engChrName: There we go. Let it all out, Selma. I don't mind. You're really inspiring, you know?!
engSearchText:
There we go. Let it all out, Selma. I don't mind.
You're really inspiring, you know?!
jpnChrName: まあ、今日は思い切り発散しちゃえばいいさ。 俺にはセルマがむしろ凄いと思えるけどな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、今日は思い切り発散しちゃえばいいさ。
俺にはセルマがむしろ凄いと思えるけどな。

engChrName: I-Inspiring?! ME?! Y-You have the wrong idea!
engSearchText: I-Inspiring?! ME?! Y-You have the wrong idea!
jpnChrName: え、私が？
jpnSearchText: え、私が？

engChrName: I don't think I do. Even though it sucked, you took it in stride and turned everything around for the better. You're fit, and so much happier.
engSearchText:
I don't think I do. Even though it sucked, you took it
in stride and turned everything around for the better.
You're fit, and so much happier.
jpnChrName: ああ、その悔しさでダイエットを始めて、 でも今じゃ新しい楽しみにしている。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、その悔しさでダイエットを始めて、
でも今じゃ新しい楽しみにしている。

engChrName: Not everyone can go ahead and make the most out of a bad situation. It really just goes to show how strong you really are.
engSearchText:
Not everyone can go ahead and make the most out of
a bad situation. It really just goes to show how strong
you really are.
jpnChrName: けっこう、そういう切り替えもなかなか できない人っているし、凄い方だよ。
jpnSearchText:
けっこう、そういう切り替えもなかなか
できない人っているし、凄い方だよ。

engChrName: A-Aww, no! I'm not that cool. You're making me blush!
engSearchText:
A-Aww, no! I'm not that cool. You're making
me blush!
jpnChrName: そんなぁ……あはは、 照れるってばローディさん～。
jpnSearchText:
そんなぁ……あはは、
照れるってばローディさん～。

engChrName: It looks like your cardio's been going greater than ever, Selma. Keep it up!
engSearchText:
It looks like your cardio's been going greater than
ever, Selma. Keep it up!
jpnChrName: お疲れ、最近は以前にも増して 楽しそうに走っているよな。
jpnSearchText:
お疲れ、最近は以前にも増して
楽しそうに走っているよな。

engChrName: Just don't forget to stay hydrated. Here—take this.
engSearchText: Just don't forget to stay hydrated. Here—take this.
jpnChrName: まあ、水分補給は忘れないように。 ほら、あげるよ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、水分補給は忘れないように。
ほら、あげるよ。

engChrName: Thanks, Lodi. Honestly, I've been enjoying my runs more and more as of late.
engSearchText:
Thanks, Lodi. Honestly, I've been enjoying my runs
more and more as of late.
jpnChrName: あはは、ありがとう…… まあ、最近楽しくなったのは本当かな。
jpnSearchText:
あはは、ありがとう……
まあ、最近楽しくなったのは本当かな。

engChrName: The change of scenery, the feel of the breeze after a good run... I'll probably keep on running, even after I hit my target weight!
engSearchText:
The change of scenery, the feel of the breeze after a
good run... I'll probably keep on running, even after I
hit my target weight!
jpnChrName: 見える景色が違うし、風も気持ち良いし。 ダイエットの目標を達成してからも走ろっかな。
jpnSearchText:
見える景色が違うし、風も気持ち良いし。
ダイエットの目標を達成してからも走ろっかな。

engChrName: Haha, good! Nice to see you're sticking with it. How about I show you a new route, then?
engSearchText:
Haha, good! Nice to see you're sticking with it.
How about I show you a new route, then?
jpnChrName: はは、そういうのも良いんじゃないか？ だったら、新しいコースでも教えようか？
jpnSearchText:
はは、そういうのも良いんじゃないか？
だったら、新しいコースでも教えようか？

engChrName: I ride my bike all over town and pass through places I think would make for decent running from time to time.
engSearchText:
I ride my bike all over town and pass through places I
think would make for decent running from time
to time.
jpnChrName: ほら、俺って自転車であちこち出かけてるから、 ランニングに良さげなところもたまに通るし。
jpnSearchText:
ほら、俺って自転車であちこち出かけてるから、
ランニングに良さげなところもたまに通るし。

engChrName: I'd love to hear about that! I wanna get out and see as many new places as I can!
engSearchText:
I'd love to hear about that! I wanna get out and see as
many new places as I can!
jpnChrName: なるほど……たまに違う所に行くのも 楽しみ増えそうで良いわね！
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……たまに違う所に行くのも
楽しみ増えそうで良いわね！

engChrName: Let me in on the juicy running info, and I'll be sure to keep an eye out for fun cycling paths for you in return!
engSearchText:
Let me in on the juicy running info, and I'll be sure to
keep an eye out for fun cycling paths for you
in return!
jpnChrName: じゃあ教えてもらえる？　私もサイクリング向きの コースとか見つけたら教えたげるから！
jpnSearchText:
じゃあ教えてもらえる？　私もサイクリング向きの
コースとか見つけたら教えたげるから！

engChrName: *huff* *huff* I hit my thirty selge goal way faster than I did last time.
engSearchText:
*huff* *huff* I hit my thirty selge goal way faster than
I did last time.
jpnChrName: ふぅ、ふぅ……一応目標の３０セルジュ分は 走れた、かな……前よりは何とか……
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ、ふぅ……一応目標の３０セルジュ分は
走れた、かな……前よりは何とか……

engChrName: Thirty selge's a lot more than I went for yesterday. It feels nice, but I'm gonna be so sore tomorrow...
engSearchText:
Thirty selge's a lot more than I went for yesterday.
It feels nice, but I'm gonna be so sore tomorrow...
jpnChrName: でも、だいぶ昨日より目標長く設定しちゃって…… しょ、正直筋肉痛怖いかも……？
jpnSearchText:
でも、だいぶ昨日より目標長く設定しちゃって……
しょ、正直筋肉痛怖いかも……？

engChrName: Sounds to me like you've done a great job of pushing yourself lately. But make sure you're keeping well hydrated! Here.
engSearchText:
Sounds to me like you've done a great job of pushing
yourself lately. But make sure you're keeping well
hydrated! Here.
jpnChrName: やあ、最近よく頑張ってるじゃないか。 ほら、ドリンクでも飲まないか？
jpnSearchText:
やあ、最近よく頑張ってるじゃないか。
ほら、ドリンクでも飲まないか？

engChrName: Oh, umm, thank you? No, I'm sorry! I barely just met you! You don't have to be so nice to me!
engSearchText:
Oh, umm, thank you? No, I'm sorry! I barely just
met you! You don't have to be so nice to me!
jpnChrName: えっ、あ、ありがとう……？ いやいや、初対面でいきなり悪いよ！
jpnSearchText:
えっ、あ、ありがとう……？
いやいや、初対面でいきなり悪いよ！

engChrName: Don't worry! I got extra water bottles, just in case. And it sounds like you earned it, anyway.
engSearchText:
Don't worry! I got extra water bottles, just in case.
And it sounds like you earned it, anyway.
jpnChrName: 余計に買っちまった分のボトルさ、気にするな。 随分と熱心に走り込んでるから、気になって。
jpnSearchText:
余計に買っちまった分のボトルさ、気にするな。
随分と熱心に走り込んでるから、気になって。

engChrName: I'm Lodi, by the way. I bike around here a lot, so it's nice to meet someone else who enjoys feeling the wind on their face.
engSearchText:
I'm Lodi, by the way. I bike around here a lot, so it's
nice to meet someone else who enjoys feeling the
wind on their face.
jpnChrName: 俺はローディ、この辺で自転車で走り回っててな。 風を浴びる気持ちを共有できないかなって。
jpnSearchText:
俺はローディ、この辺で自転車で走り回っててな。
風を浴びる気持ちを共有できないかなって。

engChrName: Ahaha, no, it's nothing like that. I took on running so I could lose some weight. It's pretty good, though!
engSearchText:
Ahaha, no, it's nothing like that. I took on running so
I could lose some weight. It's pretty good, though!
jpnChrName: あはは……単にダイエットで走ってるだけで…… あ……でも、風は確かに気持ち良いのかな……？
jpnSearchText:
あはは……単にダイエットで走ってるだけで……
あ……でも、風は確かに気持ち良いのかな……？

engChrName: The breeze feels really nice tonight in particular, actually. I'm sweating after that run, but I don't feel hot at all!
engSearchText:
The breeze feels really nice tonight in
particular, actually. I'm sweating after that run, but I
don't feel hot at all!
jpnChrName: 汗かいちゃったけど、夕方の風…… こんなに涼しかったっけ？
jpnSearchText:
汗かいちゃったけど、夕方の風……
こんなに涼しかったっけ？

engChrName: It's just the kinda thing you don't notice until you take on running. I'd probably run more if the bike wasn't so convenient for me.
engSearchText:
It's just the kinda thing you don't notice until you
take on running. I'd probably run more if the bike
wasn't so convenient for me.
jpnChrName: はは、それが走って初めてわかる楽しみだ。 まあ、俺も便利だから自転車使ってるだけだけど。
jpnSearchText:
はは、それが走って初めてわかる楽しみだ。
まあ、俺も便利だから自転車使ってるだけだけど。

engChrName: If you learn to enjoy the little things when it comes to running, you'll be well on your way to enjoying the little things in life, too.
engSearchText:
If you learn to enjoy the little things when it comes to
running, you'll be well on your way to enjoying the
little things in life, too.
jpnChrName: それでも走るのが楽しくなってくると、 日常も面白くなってくる、そういうもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
それでも走るのが楽しくなってくると、
日常も面白くなってくる、そういうもんだ。

engChrName: Yeah. I like the sound of that.
engSearchText: Yeah. I like the sound of that.
jpnChrName: な、なるほど……そういう見方も……
jpnSearchText: な、なるほど……そういう見方も……

engChrName: I was really hoping to go around the festival with Selma. It was supposed to be a good way of seeing a totally new side of Edith.
engSearchText:
I was really hoping to go around the festival
with Selma. It was supposed to be a good way of
seeing a totally new side of Edith.
jpnChrName: せっかくセルマと一緒に、普段と違う 首都を周れると思ってたのに……
jpnSearchText:
せっかくセルマと一緒に、普段と違う
首都を周れると思ってたのに……

engChrName: But talk about new sides. I think we might've overshot things a little! Man, what a mess.
engSearchText:
But talk about new sides. I think we might've
overshot things a little! Man, what a mess.
jpnChrName: 普段と違うったって、こんな禍々しいのは違う、 記念祭を楽しみたかっただけなのにな……
jpnSearchText:
普段と違うったって、こんな禍々しいのは違う、
記念祭を楽しみたかっただけなのにな……

engChrName: I hope everyone else in the other districts is okay. And my bike, too...
engSearchText:
I hope everyone else in the other districts is okay.
And my bike, too...
jpnChrName: 何にせよ……置いてきた自転車や 他の街区の友人も心配ではあるが……
jpnSearchText:
何にせよ……置いてきた自転車や
他の街区の友人も心配ではあるが……

engChrName: I'm glad we were able to escape together. As her friend, I have to support her however I can.
engSearchText:
I'm glad we were able to escape together. As her
friend, I have to support her however I can.
jpnChrName: 二人で逃げ延びれた以上、友達として セルマの事はここでしっかり支えてあげないとな。
jpnSearchText:
二人で逃げ延びれた以上、友達として
セルマの事はここでしっかり支えてあげないとな。

engChrName: Hope this is the start of a long friendship between me and Selma. Her enthusiasm when going to new places is contagious. I love showing her around.
engSearchText:
Hope this is the start of a long friendship between me
and Selma. Her enthusiasm when going to new
places is contagious. I love showing her around.
jpnChrName: セルマとは来年以降も仲良くしていきたいな、 色々教えると素直に喜んでくれるのが良い。
jpnSearchText:
セルマとは来年以降も仲良くしていきたいな、
色々教えると素直に喜んでくれるのが良い。

engChrName: It's nice thinking she enjoys hanging out with me as much as I do with her.
engSearchText:
It's nice thinking she enjoys hanging out with me as
much as I do with her.
jpnChrName: まあ、一緒にいて楽しいという事だな。
jpnSearchText: まあ、一緒にいて楽しいという事だな。

engChrName: She got really excited when I invited her to the Revolution Festival... I guess she's really looking forward to it.
engSearchText:
She got really excited when I invited her to the
Revolution Festival... I guess she's really looking
forward to it.
jpnChrName: セルマは妙に舞い上がっちゃってるけど…… そんなに楽しみなのか？
jpnSearchText:
セルマは妙に舞い上がっちゃってるけど……
そんなに楽しみなのか？

engChrName: All my friends said they'd be working during the festival.
engSearchText:
All my friends said they'd be working during
the festival.
jpnChrName: いやあ他の友達が皆、記念祭中はかえって 忙しくなる仕事ばっかりでなー。
jpnSearchText:
いやあ他の友達が皆、記念祭中はかえって
忙しくなる仕事ばっかりでなー。

engChrName: I'm so glad Selma and I are friends. After all, the Revolution Festival's all about spending time with your buddies!
engSearchText:
I'm so glad Selma and I are friends. After all, the
Revolution Festival's all about spending time with
your buddies!
jpnChrName: セルマと友達になれてて良かったよ、 やっぱり記念祭は友達と過ごしてこそだ！
jpnSearchText:
セルマと友達になれてて良かったよ、
やっぱり記念祭は友達と過ごしてこそだ！

engChrName: I'm hoping we can join up with some of my friends later on. What's a festival without friends? I'm sure Selma would agree with me!
engSearchText:
I'm hoping we can join up with some of my friends
later on. What's a festival without friends? I'm sure
Selma would agree with me!
jpnChrName: 夜は何人か他の連中も合流できるかな。 それならセルマ込みで祝宴を楽しむとするか！
jpnSearchText:
夜は何人か他の連中も合流できるかな。
それならセルマ込みで祝宴を楽しむとするか！

engChrName: Now that things are back to normal, it's off to work I go with ol' faithful here.
engSearchText:
Now that things are back to normal, it's off to work I
go with ol' faithful here.
jpnChrName: さて、日常も戻って来た事だ、 俺もこの相棒と一緒に仕事に行くとしようか。
jpnSearchText:
さて、日常も戻って来た事だ、
俺もこの相棒と一緒に仕事に行くとしようか。

engChrName: If I don't start now, I'm never gonna make up for lost time during lockdown.
engSearchText:
If I don't start now, I'm never gonna make up for lost
time during lockdown.
jpnChrName: 警戒中はバイト先も時短営業だったしな、 その分を埋め合わせるくらいは稼がないと。
jpnSearchText:
警戒中はバイト先も時短営業だったしな、
その分を埋め合わせるくらいは稼がないと。

engChrName: Selma's in higher spirits now, which is good. Maybe I'll ask her to hang out later.
engSearchText:
Selma's in higher spirits now, which is good.
Maybe I'll ask her to hang out later.
jpnChrName: セルマの方も元気そうだし、 今夜もあいつを誘ってみるか。
jpnSearchText:
セルマの方も元気そうだし、
今夜もあいつを誘ってみるか。

engChrName: I'm honestly still a little on edge because of everything.
engSearchText:
I'm honestly still a little on edge because
of everything.
jpnChrName: まあ、俺も不安な事に変わりはないけどな。
jpnSearchText: まあ、俺も不安な事に変わりはないけどな。

engChrName: But there's people that got it way harder than I do. I need to be able to pull myself together for them.
engSearchText:
But there's people that got it way harder than I do.
I need to be able to pull myself together for them.
jpnChrName: でも、だからこそもっと怖がっている 人は支えてやんないとさ。
jpnSearchText:
でも、だからこそもっと怖がっている
人は支えてやんないとさ。

engChrName: Rather than fearmongering, we should help those that need us most. That's the first step.
engSearchText:
Rather than fearmongering, we should help those
that need us most. That's the first step.
jpnChrName: 皆で怖がるより、少しでも落ち着けた奴から 動いて行く、まずはそこからさ。
jpnSearchText:
皆で怖がるより、少しでも落ち着けた奴から
動いて行く、まずはそこからさ。

engChrName: I'm so happy Selma likes Jess' music.
engSearchText: I'm so happy Selma likes Jess' music.
jpnChrName: セルマが気に入ってくれて 何よりだな。
jpnSearchText:
セルマが気に入ってくれて
何よりだな。

engChrName: There's something about his songs that just cuts straight to the heart and sticks with you.
engSearchText:
There's something about his songs that just cuts
straight to the heart and sticks with you.
jpnChrName: ジェスの歌は、心に染みる、 時として刺さるようなのが多い……
jpnSearchText:
ジェスの歌は、心に染みる、
時として刺さるようなのが多い……

engChrName: I thought that might appeal to Selma, given what she's been through lately, so I recommended she give him a listen.
engSearchText:
I thought that might appeal to Selma, given what
she's been through lately, so I recommended she give
him a listen.
jpnChrName: 今のセルマには結構良いんじゃないかと 思って、試しに誘ってみたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
今のセルマには結構良いんじゃないかと
思って、試しに誘ってみたんだ。

engChrName: That Selma girl I met recently has been enjoying running a lot.
engSearchText:
That Selma girl I met recently has been enjoying
running a lot.
jpnChrName: しかしまあ、あのセルマって子は 本当に楽しそうに走るよね、最近は。
jpnSearchText:
しかしまあ、あのセルマって子は
本当に楽しそうに走るよね、最近は。

engChrName: She looks like the kinda gal that won't stop once she gets the ball rolling.
engSearchText:
She looks like the kinda gal that won't stop once she
gets the ball rolling.
jpnChrName: 彼女は多分、新しい趣味も合いさえすれば 全力で楽しめるタイプなんじゃないかな。
jpnSearchText:
彼女は多分、新しい趣味も合いさえすれば
全力で楽しめるタイプなんじゃないかな。

engChrName: That's why I invited her to Jess' concert. I just hope it can be something else she'll enjoy just as much.
engSearchText:
That's why I invited her to Jess' concert. I just hope it
can be something else she'll enjoy just as much.
jpnChrName: 誘ったジェスのコンサートも、これを機に 気に入ってくれると嬉しいな。
jpnSearchText:
誘ったジェスのコンサートも、これを機に
気に入ってくれると嬉しいな。

engChrName: I love talking with Selma. We can go on and on, and before I notice, it's been hours. That's a sign of a great friendship in the making!
engSearchText:
I love talking with Selma. We can go on and on,
and before I notice, it's been hours. That's a sign of a
great friendship in the making!
jpnChrName: セルマは良く喋ってくれて飽きないな、 やはり友達ってのは語り合ってナンボだよ。
jpnSearchText:
セルマは良く喋ってくれて飽きないな、
やはり友達ってのは語り合ってナンボだよ。

engChrName: Today's my day off and I don't have any errands to run. Might be nice to ride my bike again for a change.
engSearchText:
Today's my day off and I don't have any errands
to run. Might be nice to ride my bike again for
a change.
jpnChrName: 今日はバイトも買い出しも無いが…… 久しぶりにサイクリングも良いな。
jpnSearchText:
今日はバイトも買い出しも無いが……
久しぶりにサイクリングも良いな。

engChrName: Talking to Selma about running paths and slowing down to take in the scenery has helped rekindle my love of cycling.
engSearchText:
Talking to Selma about running paths and slowing
down to take in the scenery has helped rekindle my
love of cycling.
jpnChrName: セルマとコースやら景色やらの話をしてて、 改めて自転車に乗る面白さを思い出してさ。
jpnSearchText:
セルマとコースやら景色やらの話をしてて、
改めて自転車に乗る面白さを思い出してさ。

engChrName: Sometimes I just need to go out on my bike and let Aidios take the wheel.
engSearchText:
Sometimes I just need to go out on my bike and let
Aidios take the wheel.
jpnChrName: たまには目的無しに、自転車であちこちを ふらふらしても面白い発見がありそうだよ。
jpnSearchText:
たまには目的無しに、自転車であちこちを
ふらふらしても面白い発見がありそうだよ。

engChrName: This rain came out of nowhere. I'm glad I was prepared for it, but still.
engSearchText:
This rain came out of nowhere. I'm glad I was
prepared for it, but still.
jpnChrName: いやあ、急な雨だったな。 早めに気づけて良かったよ。
jpnSearchText:
いやあ、急な雨だったな。
早めに気づけて良かったよ。

engChrName: Leaving your bike out in the rain all night is a good way to rust up its chain.
engSearchText:
Leaving your bike out in the rain all night is a good
way to rust up its chain.
jpnChrName: 自転車を夜通し雨に晒したりしたら、 すぐにチェーンなんかがダメになっちまう。
jpnSearchText:
自転車を夜通し雨に晒したりしたら、
すぐにチェーンなんかがダメになっちまう。

engChrName: Of course, it's not an orbal bike, but mine takes just as much love and care and maintenance.
engSearchText:
Of course, it's not an orbal bike, but mine takes just
as much love and care and maintenance.
jpnChrName: 導力器とは違うけど、これはこれで 繊細な代物なんだよな、自転車って。
jpnSearchText:
導力器とは違うけど、これはこれで
繊細な代物なんだよな、自転車って。

engChrName: Selma didn't really give me the best first impression when we met. She just looked like a downer. Who knew she'd turn out to be so fun and chill?
engSearchText:
Selma didn't really give me the best first impression
when we met. She just looked like a downer.
Who knew she'd turn out to be so fun and chill?
jpnChrName: セルマ、最初はちょっと落ち込んでいるように 見えたけど、話してみると案外ノリが良くてさ。
jpnSearchText:
セルマ、最初はちょっと落ち込んでいるように
見えたけど、話してみると案外ノリが良くてさ。

engChrName: Wonder what else I could talk to her about? She's fairly easygoing. Hmm. Maybe her favorite food spots, or what music she likes?
engSearchText:
Wonder what else I could talk to her about?
She's fairly easygoing. Hmm. Maybe her favorite food
spots, or what music she likes?
jpnChrName: お勧めの店とか、何ならライブの話なんかも していってみたいもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
お勧めの店とか、何ならライブの話なんかも
していってみたいもんだ。

engChrName: I don't know why, but Jess' music always gets me choked up.
engSearchText:
I don't know why, but Jess' music always gets me
choked up.
jpnChrName: やっぱりジェスの歌は何というか、 心に染みるよな、何でだろうな……
jpnSearchText:
やっぱりジェスの歌は何というか、
心に染みるよな、何でだろうな……

engChrName: All the emotions come through clear as day in his voice. Maybe there's a secret to it...
engSearchText:
All the emotions come through clear as day in
his voice. Maybe there's a secret to it...
jpnChrName: ここまで歌い手の気持ちが籠ったのって なかなか聞かないけど、秘訣があるのかな。
jpnSearchText:
ここまで歌い手の気持ちが籠ったのって
なかなか聞かないけど、秘訣があるのかな。

engChrName: Hmm. I wonder if Selma would enjoy his music. I think she might at least connect with the themes behind it.
engSearchText:
Hmm. I wonder if Selma would enjoy his music.
I think she might at least connect with the themes
behind it.
jpnChrName: うーん、今度セルマにも勧めてあげたいな、 あの子も色々あったようだし。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、今度セルマにも勧めてあげたいな、
あの子も色々あったようだし。

engChrName: I'm just about done with everything today. Once I wrap up here, I'll be heading to see Jess' performance.
engSearchText:
I'm just about done with everything today. Once I
wrap up here, I'll be heading to see Jess' performance.
jpnChrName: さて、今日はさっさとバイトを片付けて ジェスのライブを楽しまないと。
jpnSearchText:
さて、今日はさっさとバイトを片付けて
ジェスのライブを楽しまないと。

engChrName: I got floor tickets, so I gotta hurry and find a good spot. After that, it's a drink and some vibin' for the rest of the night!
engSearchText:
I got floor tickets, so I gotta hurry and find a
good spot. After that, it's a drink and some vibin' for
the rest of the night!
jpnChrName: せっかく前半の部のチケットが取れたんだ、 楽しい気分のまま一杯やりたいものだしな。
jpnSearchText:
せっかく前半の部のチケットが取れたんだ、
楽しい気分のまま一杯やりたいものだしな。

engChrName: I know Selma mentioned she was running to lose weight, but she looks like she's starting to genuinely enjoy it.
engSearchText:
I know Selma mentioned she was running to lose
weight, but she looks like she's starting to genuinely
enjoy it.
jpnChrName: ダイエットだって言うが、俺には何やかんやで 走るのが好きそうに見えるけどね、この子。
jpnSearchText:
ダイエットだって言うが、俺には何やかんやで
走るのが好きそうに見えるけどね、この子。

engChrName: Honestly, I could stand to go cycling more often again. Maybe we could even share routes! It would give us something else to talk about.
engSearchText:
Honestly, I could stand to go cycling more
often again. Maybe we could even share routes!
It would give us something else to talk about.
jpnChrName: まあ、俺もサイクリングとかもいいかなって 思ってたし、ルートとか教え合えても良いかもな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、俺もサイクリングとかもいいかなって
思ってたし、ルートとか教え合えても良いかもな。

engChrName: I've seen that girl jogging around here quite often the past week or so.
engSearchText:
I've seen that girl jogging around here quite often the
past week or so.
jpnChrName: 先週あたりからあの女の子、 走っているのをよく見るな。
jpnSearchText:
先週あたりからあの女の子、
走っているのをよく見るな。

engChrName: I don't think I'd ever seen her before that, though. Hmm. I guess people just discover good jogging paths every day.
engSearchText:
I don't think I'd ever seen her before that, though.
Hmm. I guess people just discover good jogging paths
every day.
jpnChrName: この辺りの子じゃないようだけど…… まあ、ここはジョギングにも向いてるしね。
jpnSearchText:
この辺りの子じゃないようだけど……
まあ、ここはジョギングにも向いてるしね。

engChrName: But she looks like she's struggling a lot. I wonder what's really driving her.
engSearchText:
But she looks like she's struggling a lot. I wonder
what's really driving her.
jpnChrName: それにしても……随分と頑張っているみたいだ、 何か理由でもあるのかな？
jpnSearchText:
それにしても……随分と頑張っているみたいだ、
何か理由でもあるのかな？

engChrName: All right! Work's done for the day now. Honestly, my commute has been a lot better since I started biking to and from.
engSearchText:
All right! Work's done for the day now.
Honestly, my commute has been a lot better since
I started biking to and from.
jpnChrName: さて、バイトも終わったし帰るか…… 自転車があると、通勤も融通が利くもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
さて、バイトも終わったし帰るか……
自転車があると、通勤も融通が利くもんだ。

engChrName: Speaking of, I heard the Grand Circuit had a huge turnout yesterday.
engSearchText:
Speaking of, I heard the Grand Circuit had a huge
turnout yesterday.
jpnChrName: そういや昨日グランサーキットであったレース、 凄い盛り上がりだったらしいね。
jpnSearchText:
そういや昨日グランサーキットであったレース、
凄い盛り上がりだったらしいね。

engChrName: Heard the crowd was so dense you couldn't get anywhere on that side of town.
engSearchText:
Heard the crowd was so dense you couldn't get
anywhere on that side of town.
jpnChrName: おかげであの付近は人が多くて 通り抜けるのも一苦労だったよ。
jpnSearchText:
おかげであの付近は人が多くて
通り抜けるのも一苦労だったよ。

engChrName: I hope there are cycling races just as exciting as that someday!
engSearchText:
I hope there are cycling races just as exciting as
that someday!
jpnChrName: 自転車のレースもいつかあのくらい 盛り上がってくれたらいいよな。
jpnSearchText:
自転車のレースもいつかあのくらい
盛り上がってくれたらいいよな。

engChrName: Cycling is so convenient once you get used to the physical strain of it. Shopping's a breeze, and you don't have to spend on transportation.
engSearchText:
Cycling is so convenient once you get used to the
physical strain of it. Shopping's a breeze, and you
don't have to spend on transportation.
jpnChrName: うーん、慣れると自転車もやっぱり便利だ。 買い出しも楽になったし、交通費も浮いて……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、慣れると自転車もやっぱり便利だ。
買い出しも楽になったし、交通費も浮いて……

engChrName: I can't believe it's already been a year since I started biking regularly. Where has the time gone?
engSearchText:
I can't believe it's already been a year since I started
biking regularly. Where has the time gone?
jpnChrName: ……しかし、この自転車との付き合いも もうじき一年になるのか、早いもんだなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
……しかし、この自転車との付き合いも
もうじき一年になるのか、早いもんだなぁ。

engChrName: My bike's made errands and commuting a breeze.
engSearchText: My bike's made errands and commuting a breeze.
jpnChrName: 買い出しにバイトに…… 本当に楽になったものだ。
jpnSearchText:
買い出しにバイトに……
本当に楽になったものだ。

engChrName: Ugh... No, I-I...
engSearchText: Ugh... No, I-I...
jpnChrName: くっ……もう、何もかも……
jpnSearchText: くっ……もう、何もかも……

engChrName: Damn it! Damn it all!
engSearchText: Damn it! Damn it all!
jpnChrName: 畜生、畜生……！
jpnSearchText: 畜生、畜生……！

engChrName: (We should probably leave him alone.)
engSearchText: (We should probably leave him alone.)
jpnChrName: （……今はそっとしておいてやろう。）
jpnSearchText: （……今はそっとしておいてやろう。）

engChrName: So this is the capital, huh? I can see why Hans and Kaina come by every month.
engSearchText:
So this is the capital, huh? I can see why Hans and
Kaina come by every month.
jpnChrName: それにしてもこれが首都か……カイナ姉ちゃんや ハンスの兄ちゃんは月一くらいで来るんだよな。
jpnSearchText:
それにしてもこれが首都か……カイナ姉ちゃんや
ハンスの兄ちゃんは月一くらいで来るんだよな。

engChrName: I'm glad Annie and I finally got to visit!
engSearchText: I'm glad Annie and I finally got to visit!
jpnChrName: いやぁ、初めての首都デビュー、 アニーと一緒に来れて良かったぜ！
jpnSearchText:
いやぁ、初めての首都デビュー、
アニーと一緒に来れて良かったぜ！

engChrName: All right. Let's get settled, and then we can head to the Bracer Guild together.
engSearchText:
All right. Let's get settled, and then we can head to
the Bracer Guild together.
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、このあとはギルド総支部に 一緒に行ってみようぜ！
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ、このあとはギルド総支部に
一緒に行ってみようぜ！

engChrName: We can take a tour of the branch office and maybe ask how we can join.
engSearchText:
We can take a tour of the branch office and maybe
ask how we can join.
jpnChrName: そこで見学したり、試験制度の 話を聞くのもそうだけど……
jpnSearchText:
そこで見学したり、試験制度の
話を聞くのもそうだけど……

engChrName: I heard there's a lot of cool shops close to the guild, too! We should go and check those out afterwards, yeah?
engSearchText:
I heard there's a lot of cool shops close to the
guild, too! We should go and check those out
afterwards, yeah?
jpnChrName: ギルドの近場には色々と面白い店も あるって聞くし、良かったらどうだ！？
jpnSearchText:
ギルドの近場には色々と面白い店も
あるって聞くし、良かったらどうだ！？

engChrName: Y-You wanna go shopping with me, Lashkar? Th-Thanks! I'd love to go to the department store.
engSearchText:
Y-You wanna go shopping with me, Lashkar?
Th-Thanks! I'd love to go to the department store.
jpnChrName: え、連れて行ってくれるのラシュカル君？ それならわたし、百貨店とかも……
jpnSearchText:
え、連れて行ってくれるのラシュカル君？
それならわたし、百貨店とかも……

engChrName: But are you sure we should be wandering around like this? The capital's very big... I don't wanna get lost on our first time here.
engSearchText:
But are you sure we should be wandering around
like this? The capital's very big... I don't wanna get
lost on our first time here.
jpnChrName: でも、ラシュカル君も首都は初めてなのに あちこち行って大丈夫なの？
jpnSearchText:
でも、ラシュカル君も首都は初めてなのに
あちこち行って大丈夫なの？

engChrName: Y-Yeah! It's fine! We've never gotten lost playing hide and seek in the woods near the village! I'm sure we'll be fine!
engSearchText:
Y-Yeah! It's fine! We've never gotten lost playing
hide and seek in the woods near the village! I'm sure
we'll be fine!
jpnChrName: お、おう！　ほら、オレって村の近くの 林とかでもかくれんぼとかしてたし……
jpnSearchText:
お、おう！　ほら、オレって村の近くの
林とかでもかくれんぼとかしてたし……

engChrName: So don't worry! You won't get lost—not with me here!
engSearchText:
So don't worry! You won't get lost—not with
me here!
jpnChrName: 滅多な事じゃ、迷子なんかにはならねぇよ、 エスコートしてやるからさ！
jpnSearchText:
滅多な事じゃ、迷子なんかにはならねぇよ、
エスコートしてやるからさ！

engChrName: This is my first time in Edith, so I'm glad Lashkar came with me.
engSearchText:
This is my first time in Edith, so I'm glad Lashkar
came with me.
jpnChrName: わたしも首都に来るのは初めてだけど、 ラシュカル君と一緒にこれて嬉しいな。
jpnSearchText:
わたしも首都に来るのは初めてだけど、
ラシュカル君と一緒にこれて嬉しいな。

engChrName: I know we're gonna have tons of fun! I never get bored with him around, and I know I can trust him.
engSearchText:
I know we're gonna have tons of fun! I never get
bored with him around, and I know I can trust him.
jpnChrName: ラシュカル君、お話面白いから一緒に周るの 楽しいと思うし、何より頼りになるし……
jpnSearchText:
ラシュカル君、お話面白いから一緒に周るの
楽しいと思うし、何より頼りになるし……

engChrName: Primo and I were able to take shelter along the road here. I need to make sure she doesn't run out into the thick of danger...
engSearchText:
Primo and I were able to take shelter along the
road here. I need to make sure she doesn't run out
into the thick of danger...
jpnChrName: プリモと逃げ込んできたんだが、この通りでな…… 飛び出さねえように引き留めておかねえと。
jpnSearchText:
プリモと逃げ込んできたんだが、この通りでな……
飛び出さねえように引き留めておかねえと。

engChrName: How can she be so calm through all of this? It's uncanny...
engSearchText:
How can she be so calm through all of this?
It's uncanny...
jpnChrName: しかしこの状況で全く動揺しねえってのは ある意味大したもんだな……
jpnSearchText:
しかしこの状況で全く動揺しねえってのは
ある意味大したもんだな……

engChrName: But I guess it's helped me cool off a bit.
engSearchText: But I guess it's helped me cool off a bit.
jpnChrName: お陰でこっちまで冷静になるぜ。
jpnSearchText: お陰でこっちまで冷静になるぜ。

engChrName: Are you sure y'all are fine walking around in all this?
engSearchText: Are you sure y'all are fine walking around in all this?
jpnChrName: あんたらは外を歩き回って平気なのかい……？
jpnSearchText: あんたらは外を歩き回って平気なのかい……？

engChrName: Just be careful, hear? I don't want y'all getting hurt, or worse.
engSearchText:
Just be careful, hear? I don't want y'all getting hurt,
or worse.
jpnChrName: ともかく気を付けてな。 自分の命は大切にしてくれよ？
jpnSearchText:
ともかく気を付けてな。
自分の命は大切にしてくれよ？

engChrName: Welcome, welcome! What d'ya say you give our Revolution Festival special a try?
engSearchText:
Welcome, welcome! What d'ya say you give our
Revolution Festival special a try?
jpnChrName: よう、らっしゃ～い！ 革命記念日限定の特別メニューはいかがだい！
jpnSearchText:
よう、らっしゃ～い！
革命記念日限定の特別メニューはいかがだい！

engChrName: It packs a punch flavor-wise! You can eat it here or take it to go, but either way, I'd recommend you get the drink and salad combo!
engSearchText:
It packs a punch flavor-wise! You can eat it here
or take it to go, but either way, I'd recommend you
get the drink and salad combo!
jpnChrName: ちょいとくどめの味付けだが、ドリンクや サラダと摘まめば食べ歩きにもいいぜ！
jpnSearchText:
ちょいとくどめの味付けだが、ドリンクや
サラダと摘まめば食べ歩きにもいいぜ！

engChrName: Primo's makin' a ruckus, but don't pay her any mind.
engSearchText: Primo's makin' a ruckus, but don't pay her any mind.
jpnChrName: ……プリモのヤツが騒いでるが、 まあそっちは気にしないでくれ。
jpnSearchText:
……プリモのヤツが騒いでるが、
まあそっちは気にしないでくれ。

engChrName: If she likes my tacos so much, I wish she'd just say so and leave it at that.
engSearchText:
If she likes my tacos so much, I wish she'd just say so
and leave it at that.
jpnChrName: オレとしちゃ美味しく 食べてもらえりゃ十分だからよ。
jpnSearchText:
オレとしちゃ美味しく
食べてもらえりゃ十分だからよ。

engChrName: Oh, right. Those idol girls are putting on a performance today.
engSearchText:
Oh, right. Those idol girls are putting on a
performance today.
jpnChrName: そういや今日はアイドルの子たちが ライブをやるって言ってたなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
そういや今日はアイドルの子たちが
ライブをやるって言ってたなぁ。

engChrName: Lulua asked me to come and watch 'em, so I'll mosey on down and see how it goes.
engSearchText:
Lulua asked me to come and watch 'em, so I'll mosey
on down and see how it goes.
jpnChrName: ルルアちゃんにも応援を頼まれててな、 どこかで軽く様子を見に行くとするかね。
jpnSearchText:
ルルアちゃんにも応援を頼まれててな、
どこかで軽く様子を見に行くとするかね。

engChrName: I think I can trust Primo to run the cart on her own while I'm gone.
engSearchText:
I think I can trust Primo to run the cart on her own
while I'm gone.
jpnChrName: 店はまあ、少しの間なら プリモに任せて大丈夫だろ。
jpnSearchText:
店はまあ、少しの間なら
プリモに任せて大丈夫だろ。

engChrName: I'm glad I could go show my support after Lulua asked me to come out to her performance.
engSearchText:
I'm glad I could go show my support after Lulua
asked me to come out to her performance.
jpnChrName: ルルアちゃんに頼まれてたのもあって、 ライブってのの応援にも行ってきたぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ルルアちゃんに頼まれてたのもあって、
ライブってのの応援にも行ってきたぜ。

engChrName: I ain't an idol guy, but I can tell she's working her hardest every day.
engSearchText:
I ain't an idol guy, but I can tell she's working her
hardest every day.
jpnChrName: アイドルっつーのはよく分かんねえが、 毎日練習してたのを知ってるしなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
アイドルっつーのはよく分かんねえが、
毎日練習してたのを知ってるしなぁ……

engChrName: Almost brings a tear to my eye. Heh. I hope her career is a prosperous one!
engSearchText:
Almost brings a tear to my eye. Heh. I hope her
career is a prosperous one!
jpnChrName: ついウルッと来るものがあったぜ…… へへっ、これからも頑張って欲しいよな！
jpnSearchText:
ついウルッと来るものがあったぜ……
へへっ、これからも頑張って欲しいよな！

engChrName: Dang, does she ever slow down? I barely just hired her, and she's already plannin' new menu items!
engSearchText:
Dang, does she ever slow down? I barely just hired
her, and she's already plannin' new menu items!
jpnChrName: 二人で新メニューの試作をしてるのさ。 気づいたらこの時間だぜ。
jpnSearchText:
二人で新メニューの試作をしてるのさ。
気づいたらこの時間だぜ。

engChrName: But we're headed in the right direction, I'd say! We'll see what customers think of the new menu tomorrow.
engSearchText:
But we're headed in the right direction, I'd say!
We'll see what customers think of the new
menu tomorrow.
jpnChrName: ま、大体の方向は見えてきたしな。 明日からは客にも試食してもらうかね。
jpnSearchText:
ま、大体の方向は見えてきたしな。
明日からは客にも試食してもらうかね。

engChrName: Gotta hand it to her, though—Primo's enthusiasm is downright infectious. Girl's a firecracker.
engSearchText:
Gotta hand it to her, though—Primo's enthusiasm is
downright infectious. Girl's a firecracker.
jpnChrName: しかしまあ……コイツの情熱には ホントに頭が下がるよなぁ～。
jpnSearchText:
しかしまあ……コイツの情熱には
ホントに頭が下がるよなぁ～。

engChrName: I wasn't planning on addin' anything to the menu this year, but having a limited special for the festival's a great idea.
engSearchText:
I wasn't planning on addin' anything to the menu this
year, but having a limited special for the festival's a
great idea.
jpnChrName: 今年も特に何かするつもりは無かったが…… 記念祭メニューか、まあ悪くないかもなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
今年も特に何かするつもりは無かったが……
記念祭メニューか、まあ悪くないかもなぁ。

engChrName: There's a whole lotta demand for our regular menu items as is, so stackin' on new prep time on top of that's gonna be a real hassle.
engSearchText:
There's a whole lotta demand for our regular menu
items as is, so stackin' on new prep time on top of
that's gonna be a real hassle.
jpnChrName: 通常メニューだけでも結構売れるからな、 仕込みでそれなりに忙しいんだが──
jpnSearchText:
通常メニューだけでも結構売れるからな、
仕込みでそれなりに忙しいんだが──

engChrName: But I ain't worried. Not with Primo around. We should be able to handle it between the two of us.
engSearchText:
But I ain't worried. Not with Primo around.
We should be able to handle it between the two of us.
jpnChrName: 今年はプリモのヤツもいるしな。 ここは一つ挑戦してみるかね。
jpnSearchText:
今年はプリモのヤツもいるしな。
ここは一つ挑戦してみるかね。

engChrName: Good grief... How am I supposed to run a business without any customers?
engSearchText:
Good grief... How am I supposed to run a business
without any customers?
jpnChrName: やれやれ……客もガクンと減ったし 商売上がったりだぜ、こりゃあ。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……客もガクンと減ったし
商売上がったりだぜ、こりゃあ。

engChrName: I went ahead and told Primo to take some time off.
engSearchText: I went ahead and told Primo to take some time off.
jpnChrName: プリモにも、しばらく来ないよう 言ってるんだがなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
プリモにも、しばらく来ないよう
言ってるんだがなぁ……

engChrName: There's plenty I could say about the lass, but she's smart enough to listen to people's advice.
engSearchText:
There's plenty I could say about the lass, but she's
smart enough to listen to people's advice.
jpnChrName: まあコイツは良くも悪くも 人の話なんざ聞くタマじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
まあコイツは良くも悪くも
人の話なんざ聞くタマじゃねえか。

engChrName: I sure hope there won't be any terrorist attacks in the city...
engSearchText:
I sure hope there won't be any terrorist attacks in
the city...
jpnChrName: 流石に街中でテロなんざ 起きないと信じたいが……
jpnSearchText:
流石に街中でテロなんざ
起きないと信じたいが……

engChrName: In case there are, it's my responsibility to make sure Primo's safe.
engSearchText:
In case there are, it's my responsibility to make sure
Primo's safe.
jpnChrName: プリモにも万が一がねえように オレも気を張っておかねえとな。
jpnSearchText:
プリモにも万が一がねえように
オレも気を張っておかねえとな。

engChrName: I recall seeing Lulua, the old lady, and a man talking to each other.
engSearchText:
I recall seeing Lulua, the old lady, and a man
talking to each other.
jpnChrName: ルルアちゃんと婆さん、 それと男の３人で話をしてたっけな。
jpnSearchText:
ルルアちゃんと婆さん、
それと男の３人で話をしてたっけな。

engChrName: They seemed real cut up about somethin' or other— started raisin' their voices. They ended up crossing the river after.
engSearchText:
They seemed real cut up about somethin' or other—
started raisin' their voices. They ended up crossing
the river after.
jpnChrName: そのうち男が声を荒げはじめたと思ったら、 ３人とも川向うに移動しちまったよ。
jpnSearchText:
そのうち男が声を荒げはじめたと思ったら、
３人とも川向うに移動しちまったよ。

engChrName: Dunno what happened after that, sorry. I wonder what that all was about...
engSearchText:
Dunno what happened after that, sorry. I wonder
what that all was about...
jpnChrName: 何事かと思ってはいたんだが…… 悪いがその後のことまでは分からねえな。
jpnSearchText:
何事かと思ってはいたんだが……
悪いがその後のことまでは分からねえな。

engChrName: Hey there. Good to see ya. Me an' all the food stall owners are out for drinks today.
engSearchText:
Hey there. Good to see ya. Me an' all the food stall
owners are out for drinks today.
jpnChrName: おう、いらっしゃい。 今日は屋台仲間で飲んでてな。
jpnSearchText:
おう、いらっしゃい。
今日は屋台仲間で飲んでてな。

engChrName: There's a lot we've gotta talk about, with the Revolution Festival right 'round the corner.
engSearchText:
There's a lot we've gotta talk about, with the
Revolution Festival right 'round the corner.
jpnChrName: 革命記念祭も近いから 色々相談事とかあんだよなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
革命記念祭も近いから
色々相談事とかあんだよなぁ。

engChrName: Primo'll take your order while I'm here!
engSearchText: Primo'll take your order while I'm here!
jpnChrName: つーわけで、注文ならプリモに頼むぜ！
jpnSearchText: つーわけで、注文ならプリモに頼むぜ！

engChrName: I'm sure Primo can handle the stall on her own for a little while.
engSearchText:
I'm sure Primo can handle the stall on her own for a
little while.
jpnChrName: プリモも少しの間なら 店を任せられる程度にはなったしな。
jpnSearchText:
プリモも少しの間なら
店を任せられる程度にはなったしな。

engChrName: What I'm not so sure about is whether she'll get experimental and start offerin' customers some new, weirdo tacos.
engSearchText:
What I'm not so sure about is whether she'll get
experimental and start offerin' customers some new,
weirdo tacos.
jpnChrName: ……あんま目を離すと勝手に新メニューを 試し始めるのが玉にキズだが……
jpnSearchText:
……あんま目を離すと勝手に新メニューを
試し始めるのが玉にキズだが……

engChrName: But hey! The lass has passion in droves! Hah! She's an inspiration, that one.
engSearchText:
But hey! The lass has passion in droves! Hah! She's an
inspiration, that one.
jpnChrName: ま、熱意があるのはいいこった。 オレも刺激を受けてるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、熱意があるのはいいこった。
オレも刺激を受けてるぜ。

engChrName: Primo's new recipes are a total hit! Man, I've never seen our sales go higher!
engSearchText:
Primo's new recipes are a total hit! Man, I've never
seen our sales go higher!
jpnChrName: プリモの考案した新味、案外好評でな。 売り上げもアップしたぜ。
jpnSearchText:
プリモの考案した新味、案外好評でな。
売り上げもアップしたぜ。

engChrName: I wasn't so sure about all of her new ideas, but oh, boy! I'm sure glad I gave her a chance!
engSearchText:
I wasn't so sure about all of her new ideas, but
oh, boy! I'm sure glad I gave her a chance!
jpnChrName: いや～、最初はどうかと思ったが 何事もやってみるもんだな。
jpnSearchText:
いや～、最初はどうかと思ったが
何事もやってみるもんだな。

engChrName: And all the better, 'cause those sales are payin' off her paycheck, haha! ...We're actually barely breakin' even.
engSearchText:
And all the better, 'cause those sales are payin' off her
paycheck, haha! ...We're actually barely breakin' even.
jpnChrName: ……ま、アイツのバイト代がかかるから 実はトントンなんだがな、ハハハ！
jpnSearchText:
……ま、アイツのバイト代がかかるから
実はトントンなんだがな、ハハハ！

engChrName: Welcome! Grab yourself a taco or two before we close for the night!
engSearchText:
Welcome! Grab yourself a taco or two before we close
for the night!
jpnChrName: おう、らっしゃい！ そろそろ店じまいの時間だぜ！
jpnSearchText:
おう、らっしゃい！
そろそろ店じまいの時間だぜ！

engChrName: The sun's sure settin' quick these days. The days get shorter, but my part-timer's rants get longer!
engSearchText:
The sun's sure settin' quick these days. The days get
shorter, but my part-timer's rants get longer!
jpnChrName: 日が暮れるのも早くなってきたよな。 ……ウチのバイトは相変わらずうるせえが……
jpnSearchText:
日が暮れるのも早くなってきたよな。
……ウチのバイトは相変わらずうるせえが……

engChrName: I do worry about her gettin' back after dark, though. Maybe I'll walk her partway home after we finish cleanin' up.
engSearchText:
I do worry about her gettin' back after dark, though.
Maybe I'll walk her partway home after we finish
cleanin' up.
jpnChrName: ま、心配でもあるし、店を片付けたら 途中まで送ってってやるとするかね。
jpnSearchText:
ま、心配でもあるし、店を片付けたら
途中まで送ってってやるとするかね。

engChrName: Speakin' of which, there's a regular of mine who's an idol—comes over for her taco fix every day.
engSearchText:
Speakin' of which, there's a regular of mine who's an
idol—comes over for her taco fix every day.
jpnChrName: そういや、よくタコスを買いに来るアイドル？ ……とかいう子がいるんだが……
jpnSearchText:
そういや、よくタコスを買いに来るアイドル？
……とかいう子がいるんだが……

engChrName: Didn't see her 'round today, though. Wonder if somethin' happened?
engSearchText:
Didn't see her 'round today, though. Wonder if
somethin' happened?
jpnChrName: そろそろ店じまいなんだが…… 何かあったのかねぇ？
jpnSearchText:
そろそろ店じまいなんだが……
何かあったのかねぇ？

engChrName: This odd duck has been comin' around and naggin' my ear off about my menu nonstop.
engSearchText:
This odd duck has been comin' around and naggin'
my ear off about my menu nonstop.
jpnChrName: 最近入り浸ってた変な嬢ちゃんな、 ケチばかり付けてくるから迷惑してたんだが……
jpnSearchText:
最近入り浸ってた変な嬢ちゃんな、
ケチばかり付けてくるから迷惑してたんだが……

engChrName: At least she's got an eye for detail, that one. Figured that'd help the stand a li'l, so I up and hired 'er.
engSearchText:
At least she's got an eye for detail, that one.
Figured that'd help the stand a li'l, so I up and
hired 'er.
jpnChrName: どうもこだわりが強いだけらしくてな。 あんまりうるさいから雇っちまったよ。
jpnSearchText:
どうもこだわりが強いだけらしくてな。
あんまりうるさいから雇っちまったよ。

engChrName: Let me tell you, I've never seen a bigger food connoisseur that would not know which way up a pan goes.
engSearchText:
Let me tell you, I've never seen a bigger food
connoisseur that would not know which way up a
pan goes.
jpnChrName: ちなみにあれやこれやと口は出すが 料理はできないらしい……やれやれだな。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにあれやこれやと口は出すが
料理はできないらしい……やれやれだな。

engChrName: She's lackin' the cooking skills, but not the taste buds, at least! Maybe she's got an idea or two to help improve my marinades.
engSearchText:
She's lackin' the cooking skills, but not the taste buds,
at least! Maybe she's got an idea or two to help
improve my marinades.
jpnChrName: ま、意見は言ってくれるから 味付けの改良ははかどりそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、意見は言ってくれるから
味付けの改良ははかどりそうだ。

engChrName: We'll see if she's all bark and no bite after all!
engSearchText: We'll see if she's all bark and no bite after all!
jpnChrName: どこまでやってくれんのかは 様子見だがなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
どこまでやってくれんのかは
様子見だがなぁ。

engChrName: Sheesh, that's a mighty hard downpour to just come outta nowhere. I'm gonna have to close shop early again.
engSearchText:
Sheesh, that's a mighty hard downpour to just come
outta nowhere. I'm gonna have to close shop
early again.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、降ってきやがった。 早く畳んじまわねえとな。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、降ってきやがった。
早く畳んじまわねえとな。

engChrName: The crummy weather does nothin' but hurt my business. I wish it'd knock it off!
engSearchText:
The crummy weather does nothin' but hurt
my business. I wish it'd knock it off!
jpnChrName: にしても連休の天気が優れねえってのは 屋台としちゃ痛手だな。
jpnSearchText:
にしても連休の天気が優れねえってのは
屋台としちゃ痛手だな。

engChrName: Here's hoping the rest of the holidays are all sunshine!
engSearchText: Here's hoping the rest of the holidays are all sunshine!
jpnChrName: 連休後半は晴れてくれると いいんだがなぁ～。
jpnSearchText:
連休後半は晴れてくれると
いいんだがなぁ～。

engChrName: More importantly, I wonder what's up with that girl?
engSearchText: More importantly, I wonder what's up with that girl?
jpnChrName: にしても……あの嬢ちゃん、 大丈夫なのかねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
にしても……あの嬢ちゃん、
大丈夫なのかねぇ。

engChrName: She's been a little weird with me since I asked if her taste buds were messed up the other day.
engSearchText:
She's been a little weird with me since I asked if her
taste buds were messed up the other day.
jpnChrName: 日中に“味覚がおかしい”って 言っちまってから様子がおかしいっつーか……
jpnSearchText:
日中に“味覚がおかしい”って
言っちまってから様子がおかしいっつーか……

engChrName: Hope she's not gettin' herself too worked up about it.
engSearchText: Hope she's not gettin' herself too worked up about it.
jpnChrName: ふう、変に思いつめてなきゃいいんだがな。
jpnSearchText: ふう、変に思いつめてなきゃいいんだがな。

engChrName: I mean, she likes my tacos! Her sense of taste can't be that out of whack!
engSearchText:
I mean, she likes my tacos! Her sense of taste can't be
that out of whack!
jpnChrName: まあなんだ、この嬢ちゃんは何だかんだ言って ウチのタコスが気に入ってるみたいだしな。
jpnSearchText:
まあなんだ、この嬢ちゃんは何だかんだ言って
ウチのタコスが気に入ってるみたいだしな。

engChrName: I didn't mean to offend her or anything. I just don't really want to change any of my recipes anytime soon.
engSearchText:
I didn't mean to offend her or anything. I just don't
really want to change any of my recipes anytime soon.
jpnChrName: オレとしても悪い気はしないぜ。 メインの味を変えるつもりはねえがな。
jpnSearchText:
オレとしても悪い気はしないぜ。
メインの味を変えるつもりはねえがな。

engChrName: Hey, good to see you! Wish ya'd gotten here a bit sooner, though. I'm about to close up shop.
engSearchText:
Hey, good to see you! Wish ya'd gotten here a bit
sooner, though. I'm about to close up shop.
jpnChrName: よう、お疲れさん！ 悪いがうちはそろそろ店じまいだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
よう、お疲れさん！
悪いがうちはそろそろ店じまいだぜ。

engChrName: Proper restaurants have their dinner rush or are just plain popular at night, but food stalls usually only see traffic durin' the day.
engSearchText:
Proper restaurants have their dinner rush or are just
plain popular at night, but food stalls usually only see
traffic durin' the day.
jpnChrName: 夜から本番って店もあるが…… 屋台は日中営業が基本だからな。
jpnSearchText:
夜から本番って店もあるが……
屋台は日中営業が基本だからな。

engChrName: If you wanna put in an order here, better be quick next time! Just like this lass here!
engSearchText:
If you wanna put in an order here, better be quick
next time! Just like this lass here!
jpnChrName: もし注文したいなら、この嬢ちゃんみたいに 急いでくれよ、ははは！
jpnSearchText:
もし注文したいなら、この嬢ちゃんみたいに
急いでくれよ、ははは！

engChrName: You find what you need over at Horizon Heim?
engSearchText: You find what you need over at Horizon Heim?
jpnChrName: おっ、『ホライズンハイム』への 用事は済んだのか？
jpnSearchText:
おっ、『ホライズンハイム』への
用事は済んだのか？

engChrName: The landlord and I were discussing some recent goings-on a while back. We were drinking with one of my regulars.
engSearchText:
The landlord and I were discussing some recent
goings-on a while back. We were drinking with one
of my regulars.
jpnChrName: そういや、大家と例の話をしてた時 常連客のジャコモも一緒に飲んでたっけなあ……
jpnSearchText:
そういや、大家と例の話をしてた時
常連客のジャコモも一緒に飲んでたっけなあ……

engChrName: Come to think of it, 's been a while since I last saw Giacomo. Wonder why he's not come by...
engSearchText:
Come to think of it, 's been a while since I last
saw Giacomo. Wonder why he's not come by...
jpnChrName: あの人、最近来なくなっちまったが 今頃どうしてるのかねえ？
jpnSearchText:
あの人、最近来なくなっちまったが
今頃どうしてるのかねえ？

engChrName: Horizon Heim is that apartment building just across the bridge!
engSearchText:
Horizon Heim is that apartment building just across
the bridge!
jpnChrName: 『ホライズンハイム』は 橋を渡った先にあるアパートだぜ！
jpnSearchText:
『ホライズンハイム』は
橋を渡った先にあるアパートだぜ！

engChrName: You got business over there?
engSearchText: You got business over there?
jpnChrName: あそこに何か用でもあるのか？
jpnSearchText: あそこに何か用でもあるのか？

engChrName: Let me know if you do! I know the landlord, so I could introduce ya.
engSearchText:
Let me know if you do! I know the landlord, so I
could introduce ya.
jpnChrName: 必要だってんなら、今度大家を 紹介してやるから相談しろよな！
jpnSearchText:
必要だってんなら、今度大家を
紹介してやるから相談しろよな！

engChrName: Good grief, that girl that's been comin' 'round of late's starting to get real annoyin'...
engSearchText:
Good grief, that girl that's been comin' 'round of
late's starting to get real annoyin'...
jpnChrName: やれやれ、困った姉ちゃんだぜ。 この前からちょくちょく来るんだが……
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、困った姉ちゃんだぜ。
この前からちょくちょく来るんだが……

engChrName: If it's not one thing, it's another! But it's always the same thing. Naggin', naggin', naggin'!
engSearchText:
If it's not one thing, it's another! But it's always the
same thing. Naggin', naggin', naggin'!
jpnChrName: 妙にウルサイというか、 毎度毎度突っかかってくるんだよなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
妙にウルサイというか、
毎度毎度突っかかってくるんだよなぁ。

engChrName: Wish I knew what she's all hot and bothered over. Maybe if that got solved, she'd settle for orderin' like a normal person.
engSearchText:
Wish I knew what she's all hot and bothered over.
Maybe if that got solved, she'd settle for orderin' like
a normal person.
jpnChrName: 何が不満なんだか知らんが 黙って注文できんもんかね？
jpnSearchText:
何が不満なんだか知らんが
黙って注文できんもんかね？

engChrName: Sunset already? Dang, where did the day go? Days just keep gettin' shorter and shorter.
engSearchText:
Sunset already? Dang, where did the day go?
Days just keep gettin' shorter and shorter.
jpnChrName: もう夕方か…… 日が暮れるのも早くなったなあ。
jpnSearchText:
もう夕方か……
日が暮れるのも早くなったなあ。

engChrName: The one silver linin' is people get hungrier 'round autumn. Temperatures go down, but profits go up!
engSearchText:
The one silver linin' is people get hungrier
'round autumn. Temperatures go down, but profits
go up!
jpnChrName: ま、食欲の秋とも言うしな！ 屋台も腕のふるい所だぜ！
jpnSearchText:
ま、食欲の秋とも言うしな！
屋台も腕のふるい所だぜ！

engChrName: Might be time I come up with an autumn special menu!
engSearchText:
Might be time I come up with an autumn
special menu!
jpnChrName: 秋っぽい新メニューを考えるのも ありかもしれんなぁ、ははは！
jpnSearchText:
秋っぽい新メニューを考えるのも
ありかもしれんなぁ、ははは！

engChrName: Riverside's a real nice sightseeing hotspot. It ain't just tourists that come 'round here, either. Locals love it here, too.
engSearchText:
Riverside's a real nice sightseeing hotspot. It ain't just
tourists that come 'round here, either. Locals love it
here, too.
jpnChrName: リバーサイドには、近所の住民から 旅行者まで色んな人が訪れるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
リバーサイドには、近所の住民から
旅行者まで色んな人が訪れるんだ。

engChrName: I barely gotta move a rege, but it already feels like I'm travelin', meeting so many different people every day! I never tire of it.
engSearchText:
I barely gotta move a rege, but it already feels like I'm
travelin', meeting so many different people every day!
I never tire of it.
jpnChrName: 屋台をやってても色んな出会いがあってな。 はは、飽きないもんだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
屋台をやってても色んな出会いがあってな。
はは、飽きないもんだぜ。

engChrName: Have a walk around and see for yourself. I'm sure you'll meet all kinds of fascinating folk!
engSearchText:
Have a walk around and see for yourself. I'm sure
you'll meet all kinds of fascinating folk!
jpnChrName: 兄さんたちも一回りしてみな。 面白いヤツと会えるかもしれんぜ！
jpnSearchText:
兄さんたちも一回りしてみな。
面白いヤツと会えるかもしれんぜ！

engChrName: Did something bad happen nearby? The police just stopped by to ask some questions.
engSearchText:
Did something bad happen nearby? The police just
stopped by to ask some questions.
jpnChrName: なんか事件があったみたいだな？ オレも事情聴取されちまったよ。
jpnSearchText:
なんか事件があったみたいだな？
オレも事情聴取されちまったよ。

engChrName: It's the middle of the day, for cryin' out loud... You lot be careful, hear?
engSearchText:
It's the middle of the day, for cryin' out loud...
You lot be careful, hear?
jpnChrName: 怖いねぇ、真昼間から…… 兄さんたちも気を付けなよ？
jpnSearchText:
怖いねぇ、真昼間から……
兄さんたちも気を付けなよ？

engChrName: How about adding some spice to your life, friends? Once you have a taste, you'll come runnin' back for another!
engSearchText:
How about adding some spice to your life, friends?
