Once you have a taste, you'll come runnin' back
for another!
jpnChrName: らっしゃい、らっしゃ～い！ ウチのタコスはピリ辛でクセになるぜ！
jpnSearchText:
らっしゃい、らっしゃ～い！
ウチのタコスはピリ辛でクセになるぜ！

engChrName: Perfect for a snack on the go! Won't be a hassle to eat while you walk to your next date spot, eh?
engSearchText:
Perfect for a snack on the go! Won't be a hassle to eat
while you walk to your next date spot, eh?
jpnChrName: 食べ歩きにもピッタリだ！ どうだい、デートの合間におひとつ！
jpnSearchText:
食べ歩きにもピッタリだ！
どうだい、デートの合間におひとつ！

engChrName: Haha, umm... W-We're not on a date. But tacos are pretty typical fast food, right?
engSearchText:
Haha, umm... W-We're not on a date. But tacos are
pretty typical fast food, right?
jpnChrName: あ、あはは……タコスといえば 定番のファストフードですね。
jpnSearchText:
あ、あはは……タコスといえば
定番のファストフードですね。

engChrName: Junk food, more than anything, but the tacos here are pretty damn good.
engSearchText:
Junk food, more than anything, but the tacos here are
pretty damn good.
jpnChrName: ま、どっちかっつーとジャンクフードだが ここのは中々ウマいぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、どっちかっつーとジャンクフードだが
ここのは中々ウマいぜ。

engChrName: Really savory and rich. They hit just the right spot when you're hankerin' for some good food.
engSearchText:
Really savory and rich. They hit just the right spot
when you're hankerin' for some good food.
jpnChrName: たまに無性に食べたくなる味って ヤツだが、さて……
jpnSearchText:
たまに無性に食べたくなる味って
ヤツだが、さて……

engChrName: The secret to your success is carbs! Need more carbs in your recipes!
engSearchText:
The secret to your success is carbs! Need more carbs
in your recipes!
jpnChrName: ですから、炭水化物同士の組み合わせも 試してみるべきなのです……！
jpnSearchText:
ですから、炭水化物同士の組み合わせも
試してみるべきなのです……！

engChrName: *drool* Oooh, how about yakisoba tacos? Oh, wait! I know—how about we replace the meat with chocolate!
engSearchText:
*drool* Oooh, how about yakisoba tacos? Oh, wait!
I know—how about we replace the meat
with chocolate!
jpnChrName: ヤキソバｏｎタコス……じゅるり…… ここは敢えてチョコレート味というのも……
jpnSearchText:
ヤキソバｏｎタコス……じゅるり……
ここは敢えてチョコレート味というのも……

engChrName: The hell? Lass, are ya sure your taste buds ain't just messed up?
engSearchText:
The hell? Lass, are ya sure your taste buds ain't just
messed up?
jpnChrName: うーん、前からちょくちょく思ってたんだが ……姉ちゃん、味覚おかしくないか？
jpnSearchText:
うーん、前からちょくちょく思ってたんだが
……姉ちゃん、味覚おかしくないか？

engChrName: What?
engSearchText: What?

engChrName: Those kinds of goofy flavor fusions you always suggest are just cheap, gimmicky junk food.
engSearchText:
Those kinds of goofy flavor fusions you always
suggest are just cheap, gimmicky junk food.
jpnChrName: そういうジャンクな組み合わせは どっちかっつーとＢ級グルメっていうんだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
そういうジャンクな組み合わせは
どっちかっつーとＢ級グルメっていうんだぜ。

engChrName: Not that my tacos are any kind of white tablecloth fine dinin' or anything, and I don't think junk food's all that bad, but it's just plain weird.
engSearchText:
Not that my tacos are any kind of white tablecloth
fine dinin' or anything, and I don't think junk food's
all that bad, but it's just plain weird.
jpnChrName: まあウチも王道目指してるわけじゃねえし 個人的にも嫌いじゃないがな。
jpnSearchText:
まあウチも王道目指してるわけじゃねえし
個人的にも嫌いじゃないがな。

engChrName: ('Gimmicky junk food'? My sense of taste is not that bad...right?)
engSearchText:
('Gimmicky junk food'? My sense of taste is not that
bad...right?)
jpnChrName: （し、知りませんでしたわ……   そんな不名誉な味覚だったなんて……！）
jpnSearchText:
（し、知りませんでしたわ……
そんな不名誉な味覚だったなんて……！）

engChrName: Darn it! These assholes are mucking up my sales!
engSearchText: Darn it! These assholes are mucking up my sales!
jpnChrName: ぐぬぬぬ～っ！！　わたくしの 売上計画を邪魔立てするなど……！！
jpnSearchText:
ぐぬぬぬ～っ！！　わたくしの
売上計画を邪魔立てするなど……！！

engChrName: The sooner I get rid of them, the sooner we can open the stand up again!
engSearchText:
The sooner I get rid of them, the sooner we can open
the stand up again!
jpnChrName: あのバケモノども許すまじ！！ 必ず駆逐して営業を再開してやりますわ！！
jpnSearchText:
あのバケモノども許すまじ！！
必ず駆逐して営業を再開してやりますわ！！

engChrName: You guys! Help me out! I'm gonna make them mince meat and serve them on a taco!
engSearchText:
You guys! Help me out! I'm gonna make them mince
meat and serve them on a taco!
jpnChrName: 貴方がたも協力なさい！ 連中を根絶やしにするのですわッ！！
jpnSearchText:
貴方がたも協力なさい！
連中を根絶やしにするのですわッ！！

engChrName: Wh-Where's Shino?
engSearchText: Wh-Where's Shino?
jpnChrName: なななっ……なんでシノズ・バーが 来ないんですの──！？
jpnSearchText:
なななっ……なんでシノズ・バーが
来ないんですの──！？

engChrName: Is she just too scared to face me today? Or will she not even bother just 'cause she's already considered the top stall in Riverside?!
engSearchText:
Is she just too scared to face me today? Or will she
not even bother just 'cause she's already considered
the top stall in Riverside?!
jpnChrName: まさか勝負に怖気づいて…… いえ、勝ち逃げするつもりではっ！？
jpnSearchText:
まさか勝負に怖気づいて……
いえ、勝ち逃げするつもりではっ！？

engChrName: I can't believe you'd bail out on the day of the Revolution Festival! Right when the competition is the fairest and fiercest! Come defend your title!
engSearchText:
I can't believe you'd bail out on the day of the
Revolution Festival! Right when the competition is
the fairest and fiercest! Come defend your title!
jpnChrName: くっ、卑怯ですわ！！ これではリバーサイドのトップを取る意味が──！
jpnSearchText:
くっ、卑怯ですわ！！
これではリバーサイドのトップを取る意味が──！

engChrName: Argh! Darn it, Shino! Get over here and face me fair and square!
engSearchText:
Argh! Darn it, Shino! Get over here and face me fair
and square!
jpnChrName: ぐぬぬぬぬぬぬぅ……！！ 今すぐ現れて勝負しなさいですわあっ！！
jpnSearchText:
ぐぬぬぬぬぬぬぅ……！！
今すぐ現れて勝負しなさいですわあっ！！

engChrName: Where did you take that bar of yours this time?! Curse you, Shino!
engSearchText:
Where did you take that bar of yours this time?!
Curse you, Shino!
jpnChrName: おのれシノズ・バー！！ 一体どこへ行ったんですの！！
jpnSearchText:
おのれシノズ・バー！！
一体どこへ行ったんですの！！

engChrName: Get your boozy butt out here and face me!
engSearchText: Get your boozy butt out here and face me!
jpnChrName: 今すぐ現れて勝負しなさいですわあっ！！
jpnSearchText: 今すぐ現れて勝負しなさいですわあっ！！

engChrName: We've tried everything, but nothing beats some good ol' fried food!
engSearchText:
We've tried everything, but nothing beats some good
ol' fried food!
jpnChrName: 色々試しましたが、やはり ジャンキーな油ものがサイキョーです！！
jpnSearchText:
色々試しましたが、やはり
ジャンキーな油ものがサイキョーです！！

engChrName: Carbs are the way to go! Nothing better for the soul than some good fried chicken and a beer to wash it all down!
engSearchText:
Carbs are the way to go! Nothing better for the soul
than some good fried chicken and a beer to wash it
all down!
jpnChrName: カラアゲと炭水化物のフィーバー！ クク……ビールに合うのも中々ワルですわっ！
jpnSearchText:
カラアゲと炭水化物のフィーバー！
クク……ビールに合うのも中々ワルですわっ！

engChrName: Hmm... Still gotta nail the flavor on it. Maybe needs some more vinegar?
engSearchText:
Hmm... Still gotta nail the flavor on it. Maybe needs
some more vinegar?
jpnChrName: おうよ、ただ味は整えねえとな…… もう少しビネガーを足すかね。
jpnSearchText:
おうよ、ただ味は整えねえとな……
もう少しビネガーを足すかね。

engChrName: No, no! You're thinking too small! How about...we add some sides to it?! Like a salad combo?!
engSearchText:
No, no! You're thinking too small! How about...we
add some sides to it?! Like a salad combo?!
jpnChrName: いえっ！　あえて崩していくのもアリですわ！！ そしてサイドメニューのサラダとセットで──！
jpnSearchText:
いえっ！　あえて崩していくのもアリですわ！！
そしてサイドメニューのサラダとセットで──！

engChrName: Hey, that idea ain't half bad. You might be on to somethin' here!
engSearchText:
Hey, that idea ain't half bad. You might be on to
somethin' here!
jpnChrName: な、なるほどな…… お前さんも中々にワルだぜ、ハハハ！
jpnSearchText:
な、なるほどな……
お前さんも中々にワルだぜ、ハハハ！

engChrName: No one's gonna believe our comeback! We'll turn the tables on Shino and be the best ones in Riverside!
engSearchText:
No one's gonna believe our comeback! We'll turn the
tables on Shino and be the best ones in Riverside!
jpnChrName: フフン、どうせ挑むなら リバーサイドでトップを取ってやりますわ！！
jpnSearchText:
フフン、どうせ挑むなら
リバーサイドでトップを取ってやりますわ！！

engChrName: But we won't win if we don't come up with a tasty new menu!
engSearchText:
But we won't win if we don't come up with a tasty
new menu!
jpnChrName: そのために記念祭には 究極のＢ級グルメの投入が不可欠──
jpnSearchText:
そのために記念祭には
究極のＢ級グルメの投入が不可欠──

engChrName: It's time to debut a brand new menu! Shino will rue the day she decided to set up shop anywhere near us!
engSearchText:
It's time to debut a brand new menu! Shino will rue
the day she decided to set up shop anywhere near us!
jpnChrName: クックック……新メニュー開発の時間ですわよ！ そして必ずシノズ・バーに勝ってみせますわ！！
jpnSearchText:
クックック……新メニュー開発の時間ですわよ！
そして必ずシノズ・バーに勝ってみせますわ！！

engChrName: State of emergency or not, people need to eat if they wanna stay alive!
engSearchText:
State of emergency or not, people need to eat if they
wanna stay alive!
jpnChrName: フン、非常事態だか何だか知りませんが 人間生きていれば空腹になるものですわ！
jpnSearchText:
フン、非常事態だか何だか知りませんが
人間生きていれば空腹になるものですわ！

engChrName: There should be hundreds of potential hungry customers in Riverside!
engSearchText:
There should be hundreds of potential hungry
customers in Riverside!
jpnChrName: 即ち、リバーサイドだけでも 数百ものターゲットが存在するという事！！
jpnSearchText:
即ち、リバーサイドだけでも
数百ものターゲットが存在するという事！！

engChrName: Argh, I'm not throwing in the towel just yet! Even if we lose some customers, we can still offer them a great menu!
engSearchText:
Argh, I'm not throwing in the towel just yet! Even if
we lose some customers, we can still offer them a
great menu!
jpnChrName: フヌー！　負けませんわよ！！ 客足が減ったって必ず売り込む方法が──！！
jpnSearchText:
フヌー！　負けませんわよ！！
客足が減ったって必ず売り込む方法が──！！

engChrName: Huh. Guess the old man's not lookin' after the stall tonight?
engSearchText:
Huh. Guess the old man's not lookin' after the
stall tonight?
jpnChrName: おっと……今夜はいつものおやっさんが 店番じゃねえんだな。
jpnSearchText:
おっと……今夜はいつものおやっさんが
店番じゃねえんだな。

engChrName: Damn. I'd come over to get my taco fix, but the old man must be off havin' a drink.
engSearchText:
Damn. I'd come over to get my taco fix, but the old
man must be off havin' a drink.
jpnChrName: おっと……ついクセで来ちまったが、 今夜おやっさんはあっちで飲んでるんだったか。
jpnSearchText:
おっと……ついクセで来ちまったが、
今夜おやっさんはあっちで飲んでるんだったか。

engChrName: That he is! But don't you fret, for I am here! Allow me to take your taste buds on a heavenly voyage of culinary delight!
engSearchText:
That he is! But don't you fret, for I am here!
Allow me to take your taste buds on a heavenly
voyage of culinary delight!
jpnChrName: ええ、アドバイザー兼営業担当たる わたくしが接客させて頂きますわっ！
jpnSearchText:
ええ、アドバイザー兼営業担当たる
わたくしが接客させて頂きますわっ！

engChrName: May I recommend trying our new Chocolate Rice Taco? It's a smash hit among our customers, and I guarantee it'll be a smash hit in your mouth!
engSearchText:
May I recommend trying our new Chocolate
Rice Taco? It's a smash hit among our customers, and
I guarantee it'll be a smash hit in your mouth!
jpnChrName: さあさあ！　新商品のチョコライスタコスでも 是非召し上がって行ってくださいませ！
jpnSearchText:
さあさあ！　新商品のチョコライスタコスでも
是非召し上がって行ってくださいませ！

engChrName: Umm, thanks for the recommendation. I'll be sure to give it a try later.
engSearchText:
Umm, thanks for the recommendation. I'll be sure to
give it a try later.
jpnChrName: え、ええ、ありがとう…… また後で頂くわね。
jpnSearchText:
え、ええ、ありがとう……
また後で頂くわね。

engChrName: (The stall owner's over there. Let's go talk to him.)
engSearchText: (The stall owner's over there. Let's go talk to him.)
jpnChrName: （……店主はあちらにいるみたいね。 　早速話を聞いてみましょう。）
jpnSearchText:
（……店主はあちらにいるみたいね。
　早速話を聞いてみましょう。）

engChrName: Why is Shino's Bar so popular?!
engSearchText: Why is Shino's Bar so popular?!
jpnChrName: シノズ・バー…… くうっ、相変わらずの人気……！！
jpnSearchText:
シノズ・バー……
くうっ、相変わらずの人気……！！

engChrName: Damn her chic sense of style and pinpoint attention to detail!
engSearchText:
Damn her chic sense of style and pinpoint attention
to detail!
jpnChrName: さりげない気遣いも 小粋で憎らしい事この上ないですわ……！！
jpnSearchText:
さりげない気遣いも
小粋で憎らしい事この上ないですわ……！！

engChrName: W-We might be able to compete if we extend our business hours to 9PM!
engSearchText:
W-We might be able to compete if we extend our
business hours to 9PM!
jpnChrName: と、とりあえず対抗策として 夜の営業時間を２１時まで延長しますわ！
jpnSearchText:
と、とりあえず対抗策として
夜の営業時間を２１時まで延長しますわ！

engChrName: That should increase sales by at least ten percent! No, maybe even higher once the new menu rolls out!
engSearchText:
That should increase sales by at least ten percent!
No, maybe even higher once the new menu rolls out!
jpnChrName: これで売り上げが１割は伸びるハズ！ あとはメニューの改良と売り込みを……！
jpnSearchText:
これで売り上げが１割は伸びるハズ！
あとはメニューの改良と売り込みを……！

engChrName: The new menu I came up with is selling like crazy! Just as I planned!
engSearchText:
The new menu I came up with is selling like crazy!
Just as I planned!
jpnChrName: クックック……わたくしの考案した新味、 やはり狙い通りの売れ行きですわ！
jpnSearchText:
クックック……わたくしの考案した新味、
やはり狙い通りの売れ行きですわ！

engChrName: Soon the top spot among Riverside's food stalls will be ours!
engSearchText:
Soon the top spot among Riverside's food stalls will
be ours!
jpnChrName: この分ならリバーサイドの屋台で トップを取る日も遠くはありませんわね……！
jpnSearchText:
この分ならリバーサイドの屋台で
トップを取る日も遠くはありませんわね……！

engChrName: ...No. Not yet! If we aim for the top, there's one hurdle we must still overcome! That mobile bar people talk about is my next target!
engSearchText:
...No. Not yet! If we aim for the top, there's one
hurdle we must still overcome! That mobile bar
people talk about is my next target!
jpnChrName: ……いえ、確かリバーサイドの一番は “流しのバーテン屋台”だと聞いた覚えが……
jpnSearchText:
……いえ、確かリバーサイドの一番は
“流しのバーテン屋台”だと聞いた覚えが……

engChrName: I think I've seen it before. It's that food truck that shows up here sometimes, yeah? I'll go have a looksee next time they're here!
engSearchText:
I think I've seen it before. It's that food truck that
shows up here sometimes, yeah? I'll go have a looksee
next time they're here!
jpnChrName: きっとあのキッチンカーですわね……！ 今度改めて敵情視察を……ぶつぶつ……
jpnSearchText:
きっとあのキッチンカーですわね……！
今度改めて敵情視察を……ぶつぶつ……

engChrName: You plan on stayin' here all night? I'm gonna close up shop soon!
engSearchText:
You plan on stayin' here all night? I'm gonna close up
shop soon!
jpnChrName: おい嬢ちゃん、いつまでやってんだ。 もう店じまいの時間だぜ！
jpnSearchText:
おい嬢ちゃん、いつまでやってんだ。
もう店じまいの時間だぜ！

engChrName: B-But there's still so much we haven't talked about! You can't just leave me hanging here!
engSearchText:
B-But there's still so much we haven't talked about!
You can't just leave me hanging here!
jpnChrName: わ、私はまだやれますわ！！ 諦めたりしないんですから！！
jpnSearchText:
わ、私はまだやれますわ！！
諦めたりしないんですから！！

engChrName: I got no idea what yer on about. You're a strange, strange girl.
engSearchText:
I got no idea what yer on about. You're a strange,
strange girl.
jpnChrName: いや、そういう話じゃねえんだが…… ホント変わった嬢ちゃんだよなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
いや、そういう話じゃねえんだが……
ホント変わった嬢ちゃんだよなぁ。

engChrName: Th-There's still so much I can do! I can't just go home now!
engSearchText:
Th-There's still so much I can do! I can't just go
home now!
jpnChrName: わ、私はまだやれる！！ この程度で諦めたりしませんわ！！
jpnSearchText:
わ、私はまだやれる！！
この程度で諦めたりしませんわ！！

engChrName: Hah-HA! As of today, yours truly will be enacting her role as a newly-appointed flavor advisor and sales rep!
engSearchText:
Hah-HA! As of today, yours truly will be enacting her
role as a newly-appointed flavor advisor and sales rep!
jpnChrName: フフン！　今日から私、ここの アドバイザー兼営業担当に就任しましたの。
jpnSearchText:
フフン！　今日から私、ここの
アドバイザー兼営業担当に就任しましたの。

engChrName: Prepare, world! I will be unleashing a new wave of flavor onto you!
engSearchText:
Prepare, world! I will be unleashing a new wave of
flavor onto you!
jpnChrName: これで思う存分、わたくしの理想とする味を 世の中に売り込めますわっ！！
jpnSearchText:
これで思う存分、わたくしの理想とする味を
世の中に売り込めますわっ！！

engChrName: My first offering to the world will be this little gem I came up with: the Chocolate Rice Taco!
engSearchText:
My first offering to the world will be this little gem I
came up with: the Chocolate Rice Taco!
jpnChrName: 手始めに、先日考案した珠玉のＢ級グルメ…… 『チョコライスタコス』をご賞味あれですわっ！！
jpnSearchText:
手始めに、先日考案した珠玉のＢ級グルメ……
『チョコライスタコス』をご賞味あれですわっ！！

engChrName: Mhm! The perfect blend! This combination is simply sublime.
engSearchText:
Mhm! The perfect blend! This combination is
simply sublime.
jpnChrName: ぐぬぬ……絶妙な味わい…… 完璧なカクテルですわね……
jpnSearchText:
ぐぬぬ……絶妙な味わい……
完璧なカクテルですわね……

engChrName: Wait, I can't! The mere existence of this goes against everything I strive for! It's an affront to my very being!
engSearchText:
Wait, I can't! The mere existence of this goes against
everything I strive for! It's an affront to my
very being!
jpnChrName: いえ、これはこれで“Ｂ級感”が足りませんわ…… ……そう、私の目指す理想とは別物──！
jpnSearchText:
いえ、これはこれで“Ｂ級感”が足りませんわ……
……そう、私の目指す理想とは別物──！

engChrName: I might have to talk this over with the other food carts... Hmm...
engSearchText:
I might have to talk this over with the other
food carts... Hmm...
jpnChrName: やはり屋台のいずれかを 説得するしか……ぶつぶつ……
jpnSearchText:
やはり屋台のいずれかを
説得するしか……ぶつぶつ……

engChrName: J-Junk food... Just hearing that is as if an arrow pierced my heart.
engSearchText:
J-Junk food... Just hearing that is as if an arrow
pierced my heart.
jpnChrName: び、Ｂ級……なぜか永遠に トップが取れない気がする不名誉な呼び名……
jpnSearchText:
び、Ｂ級……なぜか永遠に
トップが取れない気がする不名誉な呼び名……

engChrName: No... NO! I can't—I WON'T give in! I can never give up! I have to trust my instincts—and my taste buds!
engSearchText:
No... NO! I can't—I WON'T give in! I can never
give up! I have to trust my instincts—and my
taste buds!
jpnChrName: くぅぅ！！　ですが諦めてなるものですか！！ わたくしは自分の味覚を信じるしか──！！
jpnSearchText:
くぅぅ！！　ですが諦めてなるものですか！！
わたくしは自分の味覚を信じるしか──！！

engChrName: That stubborn old man! Only I know the true potential behind his taco stand, but he won't listen to me!
engSearchText:
That stubborn old man! Only I know the true
potential behind his taco stand, but he won't listen
to me!
jpnChrName: あのタコス屋の主人、なんと頑固な！ 私の言う通りにすればもっと売れますのに！
jpnSearchText:
あのタコス屋の主人、なんと頑固な！
私の言う通りにすればもっと売れますのに！

engChrName: You're so close to perfection! Just push it a little harder! A change in seasonings and marinades could mean the world!
engSearchText:
You're so close to perfection! Just push it a
little harder! A change in seasonings and marinades
could mean the world!
jpnChrName: そうですわ、味付けだって まだまだ改善の余地が……
jpnSearchText:
そうですわ、味付けだって
まだまだ改善の余地が……

engChrName: Why will he not listen to me?! You have the culinary world at your fingertips! You just have to seize the opportunity!
engSearchText:
Why will he not listen to me?! You have the culinary
world at your fingertips! You just have to seize
the opportunity!
jpnChrName: 何故分かってくれませんの！ くううっ、口惜しい！　口惜しいですわ！！
jpnSearchText:
何故分かってくれませんの！
くううっ、口惜しい！　口惜しいですわ！！

engChrName: This food stand should offer mini tacos, too! I bet those would be a hit.
engSearchText:
This food stand should offer mini tacos, too! I bet
those would be a hit.
jpnChrName: くっ、ここの主人はスモールサイズの タコスも売るべきなのです！
jpnSearchText:
くっ、ここの主人はスモールサイズの
タコスも売るべきなのです！

engChrName: Who thinks about tacos when you're looking for food on the go? No one! Everyone wants ice cream and crêpes!
engSearchText:
Who thinks about tacos when you're looking for food
on the go? No one! Everyone wants ice cream
and crêpes!
jpnChrName: いいですか？　食べ歩きの王者といえば やはりアイス！　そしてクレープ！
jpnSearchText:
いいですか？　食べ歩きの王者といえば
やはりアイス！　そしてクレープ！

engChrName: You can't just ask everyone to enjoy them the same way if you don't think outside the box! They need more options!
engSearchText:
You can't just ask everyone to enjoy them the same
way if you don't think outside the box! They need
more options!
jpnChrName: そこにタコスが食い込むためには、 “ちょい足し”需要を攻めるのが得策──！
jpnSearchText:
そこにタコスが食い込むためには、
“ちょい足し”需要を攻めるのが得策──！

engChrName: But he just won't LISTEN TO ME!
engSearchText: But he just won't LISTEN TO ME!
jpnChrName: な、なのに何度力説しても どうして分からないんですの……！！
jpnSearchText:
な、なのに何度力説しても
どうして分からないんですの……！！

engChrName: Heh heh. I finally accomplished my goal of trying out every stall facing the river!
engSearchText:
Heh heh. I finally accomplished my goal of trying out
every stall facing the river!
jpnChrName: フフン、川沿いの屋台は これで完全制覇しましたわよ……！
jpnSearchText:
フフン、川沿いの屋台は
これで完全制覇しましたわよ……！

engChrName: I went from tacos, to noodles, to ice cream. It's a little weird, yeah.
engSearchText:
I went from tacos, to noodles, to ice cream. It's a little
weird, yeah.
jpnChrName: タコスと麺料理のシメにあえて アイスという組み合わせも案外……
jpnSearchText:
タコスと麺料理のシメにあえて
アイスという組み合わせも案外……

engChrName: But it was delicious! I would do it again! Though...maybe after my stomach settles first...
engSearchText:
But it was delicious! I would do it again!
Though...maybe after my stomach settles first...
jpnChrName: フフフ……少々胃もたれしますが 悪くなかったと言っておきますわ。
jpnSearchText:
フフフ……少々胃もたれしますが
悪くなかったと言っておきますわ。

engChrName: I couldn't help but come back for those delectable tacos... What flavor! What zest!
engSearchText:
I couldn't help but come back for those
delectable tacos... What flavor! What zest!
jpnChrName: くっ、今日もここに来てしまいましたわ…… あの屋台の“タコス”、なんという味付け……！
jpnSearchText:
くっ、今日もここに来てしまいましたわ……
あの屋台の“タコス”、なんという味付け……！

engChrName: That's why I can't abide these half-baked, overly lax culinary methods!
engSearchText:
That's why I can't abide these half-baked, overly lax
culinary methods!
jpnChrName: フ、フン……だからこそ気に入りませんわ…… ただ漫然と売っている中途半端なスタンスが──！
jpnSearchText:
フ、フン……だからこそ気に入りませんわ……
ただ漫然と売っている中途半端なスタンスが──！

engChrName: Does he truly think his customers will be satiated with such a one-note approach to tacos? Hah! Puerile ideas wrapped in a crispy shell!
engSearchText:
Does he truly think his customers will be satiated
with such a one-note approach to tacos? Hah!
Puerile ideas wrapped in a crispy shell!
jpnChrName: タコスの一点突破で客が満足するとでも！？ ……浅はか！　実に浅はかですわっ！
jpnSearchText:
タコスの一点突破で客が満足するとでも！？
……浅はか！　実に浅はかですわっ！

engChrName: Wh-What's with the food here?! It doesn't LOOK the best, but it's dirt cheap and doesn't skimp where it counts—FLAVOR!
engSearchText:
Wh-What's with the food here?! It doesn't LOOK
the best, but it's dirt cheap and doesn't skimp
where it counts—FLAVOR!
jpnChrName: くっ……なんですの、ここの食べ物は！ どれも安価で客ウケするメニューばかり……
jpnSearchText:
くっ……なんですの、ここの食べ物は！
どれも安価で客ウケするメニューばかり……

engChrName: It's not high end by any means, yet it's so good I can't stop stuffing my face... How dare food this delicious exist!
engSearchText:
It's not high end by any means, yet it's so good I can't
stop stuffing my face... How dare food this
delicious exist!
jpnChrName: 適度に安っぽく、なのに手が止まらない中毒性── くっ……許せませんわ……！！
jpnSearchText:
適度に安っぽく、なのに手が止まらない中毒性──
くっ……許せませんわ……！！

engChrName: I'm finally at Riverside. I heard all the good eateries are down by the water.
engSearchText:
I'm finally at Riverside. I heard all the good eateries
are down by the water.
jpnChrName: リバーサイド…… 河川敷に食事処が出ていますのね。
jpnSearchText:
リバーサイド……
河川敷に食事処が出ていますのね。

engChrName: The atmosphere is living up to my expectations, but we've yet to see if the food will!
engSearchText:
The atmosphere is living up to my expectations, but
we've yet to see if the food will!
jpnChrName: 雰囲気は悪くない…… でも果たして私の眼鏡にかなうかしら？
jpnSearchText:
雰囲気は悪くない……
でも果たして私の眼鏡にかなうかしら？

engChrName: Only one way to find out! Look out, stomach—here it comes!
engSearchText:
Only one way to find out! Look out, stomach—here
it comes!
jpnChrName: ──いいでしょう、直々に 見定めて差し上げますわ！
jpnSearchText:
──いいでしょう、直々に
見定めて差し上げますわ！

engChrName: I-I'm really scared, b-but I have to keep it together! For Irle!
engSearchText:
I-I'm really scared, b-but I have to keep it together!
For Irle!
jpnChrName: ぼ、僕も足が震えちゃうけど…… イルルちゃんのためにもしっかりしないと……！！
jpnSearchText:
ぼ、僕も足が震えちゃうけど……
イルルちゃんのためにもしっかりしないと……！！

engChrName: It's gonna be fine! Father Mansur and Mother Kyra are here! I'm sure the grace of Arusha will protect us all!
engSearchText:
It's gonna be fine! Father Mansur and Mother Kyra
are here! I'm sure the grace of Arusha will protect
us all!
jpnChrName: 大丈夫、教区長様やキーラ司祭もいるし 翼の女神（アルーシャ）の恩寵だってあるんだし。
jpnSearchText:
大丈夫、教区長様やキーラ司祭もいるし
翼の女神（アルーシャ）の恩寵だってあるんだし。

engChrName: A-And Irle's mom should come for us soon...
engSearchText: A-And Irle's mom should come for us soon...
jpnChrName: イルルちゃんのお母さんも きっと迎えに来てくれるはずだから……！
jpnSearchText:
イルルちゃんのお母さんも
きっと迎えに来てくれるはずだから……！

engChrName: Irle never changes.
engSearchText: Irle never changes.
jpnChrName: あはは……イルルちゃんも 相変わらずみたいだけど……
jpnSearchText:
あはは……イルルちゃんも
相変わらずみたいだけど……

engChrName: Since her mom's so busy, I need to take care of her!
engSearchText: Since her mom's so busy, I need to take care of her!
jpnChrName: お母さんもお仕事なんじゃ可哀想だし 僕がしっかり面倒見てあげないとね！
jpnSearchText:
お母さんもお仕事なんじゃ可哀想だし
僕がしっかり面倒見てあげないとね！

engChrName: I'm gonna go to the church to pray.
engSearchText: I'm gonna go to the church to pray.
jpnChrName: 今日もこれからお祈りにいく所なんだ。
jpnSearchText: 今日もこれからお祈りにいく所なんだ。

engChrName: I'm really worried about Lashkar. He hasn't been doing well lately.
engSearchText:
I'm really worried about Lashkar. He hasn't been doing
well lately.
jpnChrName: ラシュカル君が最近荒れてて…… ちょっと心配だなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
ラシュカル君が最近荒れてて……
ちょっと心配だなぁ……

engChrName: (It's like I can feel how sad Irle is just by how she's holding my hand. I...don't think I ever want to let go of her.)
engSearchText:
(It's like I can feel how sad Irle is just by how she's
holding my hand. I...don't think I ever want to let go
of her.)
jpnChrName: （イルルちゃんの悲しみが伝わってきて……   この手を放しちゃいけない気がするから……）
jpnSearchText:
（イルルちゃんの悲しみが伝わってきて……
この手を放しちゃいけない気がするから……）

engChrName: (I'm also really scared, and I know I can't do anything, but...I want to at least be here for her.)
engSearchText:
(I'm also really scared, and I know I can't do
anything, but...I want to at least be here for her.)
jpnChrName: （僕だって怖いし、何もできないけど……   せめて受け止めてあげないと……）
jpnSearchText:
（僕だって怖いし、何もできないけど……
せめて受け止めてあげないと……）

engChrName: I want to help tutor Irle and Lolo.
engSearchText: I want to help tutor Irle and Lolo.
jpnChrName: 僕、イルルちゃんとロロ君に 勉強を教えてあげたくて……
jpnSearchText:
僕、イルルちゃんとロロ君に
勉強を教えてあげたくて……

engChrName: So I'm brushing up on the Central East's culture and language first so I can do that.
engSearchText:
So I'm brushing up on the Central East's culture and
language first so I can do that.
jpnChrName: でもそのためには、まずは中東の習慣とか 言葉を知ってないとって思ったから。
jpnSearchText:
でもそのためには、まずは中東の習慣とか
言葉を知ってないとって思ったから。

engChrName: I asked Mother Kyra for help, and she said she'd be happy to! She's so nice.
engSearchText:
I asked Mother Kyra for help, and she said she'd be
happy to! She's so nice.
jpnChrName: キーラ司祭にお願いしたら熱心に教えてくれたよ！ えへへ、キーラ司祭っていい人だよね！
jpnSearchText:
キーラ司祭にお願いしたら熱心に教えてくれたよ！
えへへ、キーラ司祭っていい人だよね！

engChrName: (I hope Irle's mom doesn't get mad at her again...)
engSearchText: (I hope Irle's mom doesn't get mad at her again...)
jpnChrName: （イルルちゃん、またお母さんに   怒られないかなぁ……）
jpnSearchText:
（イルルちゃん、またお母さんに
怒られないかなぁ……）

engChrName: (Wait, why am I worrying about that?)
engSearchText: (Wait, why am I worrying about that?)
jpnChrName: （というかなんで僕が   心配してるんだろ……？）
jpnSearchText:
（というかなんで僕が
心配してるんだろ……？）

engChrName: Irle is so brave. Nothing scares her at all.
engSearchText: Irle is so brave. Nothing scares her at all.
jpnChrName: イルルちゃんは 怖いもの知らずなんだよね……
jpnSearchText:
イルルちゃんは
怖いもの知らずなんだよね……

engChrName: Feri, too! She's the bravest girl I've ever met! Are all the girls from the Central East like that?
engSearchText:
Feri, too! She's the bravest girl I've ever met! Are all
the girls from the Central East like that?
jpnChrName: フェリちゃんもしっかりしてるし、 中東の女の子はみんなそうなのかなぁ？
jpnSearchText:
フェリちゃんもしっかりしてるし、
中東の女の子はみんなそうなのかなぁ？

engChrName: I don't think Lolo's ever gone fishing, since his hometown is out in the desert.
engSearchText:
I don't think Lolo's ever gone fishing, since his
hometown is out in the desert.
jpnChrName: ロロ君、砂漠地帯の出身だから 釣りが珍しいんだね……！
jpnSearchText:
ロロ君、砂漠地帯の出身だから
釣りが珍しいんだね……！

engChrName: I'm not a pro or anything, but I can teach him a thing or two!
engSearchText:
I'm not a pro or anything, but I can teach him a thing
or two!
jpnChrName: えへへ、僕も得意じゃないけど ロロ君のためなら今日は頑張ろうかな！
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、僕も得意じゃないけど
ロロ君のためなら今日は頑張ろうかな！

engChrName: You're only two years older than me, Feri, but you're so cool already!
engSearchText:
You're only two years older than me, Feri, but you're
so cool already!
jpnChrName: 僕と２歳しか違わないのに なんだかカッコイイかも～！
jpnSearchText:
僕と２歳しか違わないのに
なんだかカッコイイかも～！

engChrName: Tell me about your hometown next time, okay?
engSearchText: Tell me about your hometown next time, okay?
jpnChrName: あのっ、またお話聞かせてね！ 故郷の話とかも！
jpnSearchText:
あのっ、またお話聞かせてね！
故郷の話とかも！

engChrName: You got it! See you at Sunday School!
engSearchText: You got it! See you at Sunday School!
jpnChrName: ええ、勿論！　また日曜学校で！
jpnSearchText: ええ、勿論！　また日曜学校で！

engChrName: I'm the oldest, so I'm taking care of Irle and Lolo.
engSearchText: I'm the oldest, so I'm taking care of Irle and Lolo.
jpnChrName: 僕は年長だから、イルルちゃんと ロロ君の面倒を見てるんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
僕は年長だから、イルルちゃんと
ロロ君の面倒を見てるんだよ。

engChrName: I come by to the church a lot 'cause it's close to my house.
engSearchText:
I come by to the church a lot 'cause it's close to
my house.
jpnChrName: ちなみに、この寺院に通ってるのは 家から近いからだけど……
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに、この寺院に通ってるのは
家から近いからだけど……

engChrName: I've been coming for so long, it almost feels more like home than my actual home does.
engSearchText:
I've been coming for so long, it almost feels more like
home than my actual home does.
jpnChrName: 小さい頃から通ってるから、 中東式の寺院が一番しっくりくるんだよね。
jpnSearchText:
小さい頃から通ってるから、
中東式の寺院が一番しっくりくるんだよね。

engChrName: I still don't know a lot about Central Eastern customs though, so Irle is teaching me.
engSearchText:
I still don't know a lot about Central Eastern customs
though, so Irle is teaching me.
jpnChrName: もちろん、まだまだ知らない習慣とかもあって イルルちゃんに教わってるんだけど。
jpnSearchText:
もちろん、まだまだ知らない習慣とかもあって
イルルちゃんに教わってるんだけど。

engChrName: You're Lolo? It's so cool that you're from another country!
engSearchText:
You're Lolo? It's so cool that you're from
another country!
jpnChrName: ロロ君か……外国から来たなんて凄いなぁ！
jpnSearchText: ロロ君か……外国から来たなんて凄いなぁ！

engChrName: Irle's family is also from the Central East, even if she was born in Calvard!
engSearchText:
Irle's family is also from the Central East, even if she
was born in Calvard!
jpnChrName: イルルちゃんも中東の家系だけど カルバードで産まれたんだって。
jpnSearchText:
イルルちゃんも中東の家系だけど
カルバードで産まれたんだって。

engChrName: She doesn't know a lot about places in the Central East, so I'd love to hear more from you!
engSearchText:
She doesn't know a lot about places in the Central
East, so I'd love to hear more from you!
jpnChrName: 中東の国は全然知らないって言ってたし、 ロロ君からは色んな話を聞きたいな～！
jpnSearchText:
中東の国は全然知らないって言ってたし、
ロロ君からは色んな話を聞きたいな～！

engChrName: Hmph! Your name shouldn't be Rooney, it should be Weenie! 'Cause you are one!
engSearchText:
Hmph! Your name shouldn't be Rooney,
it should be Weenie! 'Cause you are one!
jpnChrName: ぷん！　ルーニーのいくじなし！
jpnSearchText: ぷん！　ルーニーのいくじなし！

engChrName: C-C'mon! That's not fair!
engSearchText: C-C'mon! That's not fair!
jpnChrName: イ、イルルちゃん、怒らないでよ～！
jpnSearchText: イ、イルルちゃん、怒らないでよ～！

engChrName: Waaahh! I hate these monsters! Make 'em go away, Rooney!
engSearchText:
Waaahh! I hate these monsters! Make 'em go
away, Rooney!
jpnChrName: ～～～っ～～～　バケモノ嫌い！！ ルーニー、おいはらってよ～！！
jpnSearchText:
～～～っ～～～　バケモノ嫌い！！
ルーニー、おいはらってよ～！！

engChrName: I'm right here, Irle! Don't worry about a thing! I'll keep you safe!
engSearchText:
I'm right here, Irle! Don't worry about a thing!
I'll keep you safe!
jpnChrName: イルルちゃん、大丈夫……！ 僕がついてるから、落ち着いて……？
jpnSearchText:
イルルちゃん、大丈夫……！
僕がついてるから、落ち着いて……？

engChrName: *sniffle* R-Really? Will you stay with me?
engSearchText: *sniffle* R-Really? Will you stay with me?
jpnChrName: ぐすっ、ホント……？ いなくなっちゃダメよ……？
jpnSearchText:
ぐすっ、ホント……？
いなくなっちゃダメよ……？

engChrName: I promise you I will! We'll be fine if we stick together!
engSearchText: I promise you I will! We'll be fine if we stick together!
jpnChrName: うん、約束する！ だから一緒にがんばろうね……！
jpnSearchText:
うん、約束する！
だから一緒にがんばろうね……！

engChrName: I'm sorry that your mom's gonna be busy during the festival...
engSearchText:
I'm sorry that your mom's gonna be busy during
the festival...
jpnChrName: イルルちゃんのお母さん（ウンム）、 記念祭までお仕事なんて残念だったね……
jpnSearchText:
イルルちゃんのお母さん（ウンム）、
記念祭までお仕事なんて残念だったね……

engChrName: It's okay—I don't mind! That just means you and me get to go to the festival together!
engSearchText:
It's okay—I don't mind! That just means you and me
get to go to the festival together!
jpnChrName: へーきよ！　イルルはルーニーと オマツリ回るんだもの！！
jpnSearchText:
へーきよ！　イルルはルーニーと
オマツリ回るんだもの！！

engChrName: We can try all the yummy food and go watch a movie! Then... Then we can go to the tower and see what the city looks like at night!
engSearchText:
We can try all the yummy food and go watch
a movie! Then... Then we can go to the tower and see
what the city looks like at night!
jpnChrName: きょうはヤタイでおいしいものを食べて 映画かんにいってからタワーでヤケイをみるのよっ！
jpnSearchText:
きょうはヤタイでおいしいものを食べて
映画かんにいってからタワーでヤケイをみるのよっ！

engChrName: Oh, wow. You've got the whole day planned out, yeah? From dusk till dawn.
engSearchText:
Oh, wow. You've got the whole day planned
out, yeah? From dusk till dawn.
jpnChrName: えっと、なんだか盛りだくさんっていうか 夜景まで見るんだ……
jpnSearchText:
えっと、なんだか盛りだくさんっていうか
夜景まで見るんだ……

engChrName: We might get yelled at if we stay out for too long, so let's not go back home too late. Don't wanna worry anyone.
engSearchText:
We might get yelled at if we stay out for too long, so
let's not go back home too late. Don't wanna
worry anyone.
jpnChrName: あ、あんまり遅くなると心配だから ほどほどに回ろっか。
jpnSearchText:
あ、あんまり遅くなると心配だから
ほどほどに回ろっか。

engChrName: Okay! But we GOTTA see Edith at night from the tower!
engSearchText:
Okay! But we GOTTA see Edith at night from
the tower!
jpnChrName: うんっ！　ヤケイはゼッタイよっ！！
jpnSearchText: うんっ！　ヤケイはゼッタイよっ！！

engChrName: I'm glad the mafia's gone and everything, but Lashkar's still not doing too good.
engSearchText:
I'm glad the mafia's gone and everything, but Lashkar's
still not doing too good.
jpnChrName: 怖いマフィアがいなくなって 良かったけど、ラシュカル君は辛そうだし……
jpnSearchText:
怖いマフィアがいなくなって
良かったけど、ラシュカル君は辛そうだし……

engChrName: I make sure and pray every day for those who've lost their lives, so their souls can rest in peace.
engSearchText:
I make sure and pray every day for those who've lost
their lives, so their souls can rest in peace.
jpnChrName: だから僕、毎日お祈りしてるんだ。 死んじゃった人たちに安らぎがありますようにって。
jpnSearchText:
だから僕、毎日お祈りしてるんだ。
死んじゃった人たちに安らぎがありますようにって。

engChrName: I wanna pray every day, too! But I always forget...
engSearchText: I wanna pray every day, too! But I always forget...
jpnChrName: イルルもモチロン毎日お祈りする つもりだったけど、すぐわすれるのよ！
jpnSearchText:
イルルもモチロン毎日お祈りする
つもりだったけど、すぐわすれるのよ！

engChrName: So pray twice as hard for me, Rooney!
engSearchText: So pray twice as hard for me, Rooney!
jpnChrName: だから代わりにルーニーに お祈りしてもらってるの！！
jpnSearchText:
だから代わりにルーニーに
お祈りしてもらってるの！！

engChrName: You know prayers aren't effective unless you do them yourself, right?
engSearchText:
You know prayers aren't effective unless you do them
yourself, right?
jpnChrName: イ、イルルちゃん……やっぱりお祈りは 自分でやらないと意味がないよ……
jpnSearchText:
イ、イルルちゃん……やっぱりお祈りは
自分でやらないと意味がないよ……

engChrName: Don't worry, Rooney! You're like a grownup, so I'm sure Arusha will listen if it's you asking!
engSearchText:
Don't worry, Rooney! You're like a grownup, so I'm
sure Arusha will listen if it's you asking!
jpnChrName: だいじょーぶよ！　ルーニーはマジメだし アルーシャもききとどけてくれるわっ！！
jpnSearchText:
だいじょーぶよ！　ルーニーはマジメだし
アルーシャもききとどけてくれるわっ！！

engChrName: Haha. Here's hoping.
engSearchText: Haha. Here's hoping.
jpnChrName: あはは……うん、そうだといいね。
jpnSearchText: あはは……うん、そうだといいね。

engChrName: They said a lot of people died on the news.
engSearchText: They said a lot of people died on the news.
jpnChrName: いっぱいしんじゃったって ニュースで言ってた！！
jpnSearchText:
いっぱいしんじゃったって
ニュースで言ってた！！

engChrName: Everyone from the Central East that lived there... Even Lashkar's family...
engSearchText:
Everyone from the Central East that lived there...
Even Lashkar's family...
jpnChrName: それにラシュカル君のかぞく…… イルルたちとおなじ中東の人もいたって……
jpnSearchText:
それにラシュカル君のかぞく……
イルルたちとおなじ中東の人もいたって……

engChrName: Why, Rooney?! Why did they all die?!
engSearchText: Why, Rooney?! Why did they all die?!
jpnChrName: ねえどーしてルーニー！？ どーしてみんなしななきゃいけなかったのッ！？
jpnSearchText:
ねえどーしてルーニー！？
どーしてみんなしななきゃいけなかったのッ！？

engChrName: Irle. I... I don't...
engSearchText: Irle. I... I don't...
jpnChrName: イ、イルルちゃん……
jpnSearchText: イ、イルルちゃん……

engChrName: (I don't know... And I can't do anything other than listen to her and let her grieve.)
engSearchText:
(I don't know... And I can't do anything other than
listen to her and let her grieve.)
jpnChrName: （僕にもわかんないよ……   ……でも、今は受け止めてあげないと……）
jpnSearchText:
（僕にもわかんないよ……
……でも、今は受け止めてあげないと……）

engChrName: Yes, Rooney. There is a language unique to the Central East.
engSearchText:
Yes, Rooney. There is a language unique to the
Central East.
jpnChrName: ……ええ、中東で使われる 独特の言葉はこんな所かしら。
jpnSearchText:
……ええ、中東で使われる
独特の言葉はこんな所かしら。

engChrName: But I didn't expect you to want to learn it just to help tutor Irle and Lolo.
engSearchText:
But I didn't expect you to want to learn it just to help
tutor Irle and Lolo.
jpnChrName: それにしても、イルルちゃんとロロ君に 教えられるように勉強したいだなんて……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、イルルちゃんとロロ君に
教えられるように勉強したいだなんて……

engChrName: Your kindness knows no bounds, does it, Rooney? You're so dependable.
engSearchText:
Your kindness knows no bounds, does it, Rooney?
You're so dependable.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、ルーニー君はしっかり者ね！
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、ルーニー君はしっかり者ね！

engChrName: You really think so? Irle says I'm just wishy-washy.
engSearchText: You really think so? Irle says I'm just wishy-washy.
jpnChrName: そ、そうかなぁ……イルルちゃんには 優柔不断って言われますけど。
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうかなぁ……イルルちゃんには
優柔不断って言われますけど。

engChrName: Irle's not one to mince words, is she?
engSearchText: Irle's not one to mince words, is she?
jpnChrName: クスクス……あの子は はっきりした子だものね。
jpnSearchText:
クスクス……あの子は
はっきりした子だものね。

engChrName: But anyway. I'd be more than happy to teach you! Feel free to come by for a lesson whenever you're free.
engSearchText:
But anyway. I'd be more than happy to teach you!
Feel free to come by for a lesson whenever you're free.
jpnChrName: ともかく、私も協力するわ！ またいつでも声を掛けてね！
jpnSearchText:
ともかく、私も協力するわ！
またいつでも声を掛けてね！

engChrName: Thank you so much, Mother Kyra!
engSearchText: Thank you so much, Mother Kyra!
jpnChrName: うん！　ありがとう、キーラ司祭！
jpnSearchText: うん！　ありがとう、キーラ司祭！

engChrName: We've got Sunday School today! Did you both finish your homework?
engSearchText:
We've got Sunday School today! Did you both finish
your homework?
jpnChrName: 今日は日曜学校だね！ 二人とも宿題はやってきたかな？
jpnSearchText:
今日は日曜学校だね！
二人とも宿題はやってきたかな？

engChrName: Yup! I got the worksheet right here with me!
engSearchText: Yup! I got the worksheet right here with me!
jpnChrName: うん！　ぼくプリントやってきたよ～！
jpnSearchText: うん！　ぼくプリントやってきたよ～！

engChrName: Nope! I didn't even bring my worksheet!
engSearchText: Nope! I didn't even bring my worksheet!
jpnChrName: イルルはモチロンやってないわ！ プリントもわすれてきたの！
jpnSearchText:
イルルはモチロンやってないわ！
プリントもわすれてきたの！

engChrName: That's...not something you should be proud of, Irle.
engSearchText: That's...not something you should be proud of, Irle.
jpnChrName: イルルちゃん…… なんでいつも堂々としてるの……？
jpnSearchText:
イルルちゃん……
なんでいつも堂々としてるの……？

engChrName: Umm... You wanna copy mine?
engSearchText: Umm... You wanna copy mine?
jpnChrName: えっと、ぼくのプリントみる～？
jpnSearchText: えっと、ぼくのプリントみる～？

engChrName: Yeah!
engSearchText: Yeah!
jpnChrName: うん！　いいわよ！
jpnSearchText: うん！　いいわよ！

engChrName: (*sigh* I hope Irle's mom doesn't get mad at her again...)
engSearchText:
(*sigh* I hope Irle's mom doesn't get mad at
her again...)
jpnChrName: （イルルちゃん、またお母さんに   怒られないかなぁ……）
jpnSearchText:
（イルルちゃん、またお母さんに
怒られないかなぁ……）

engChrName: Man, going fishing the other day was so much fun! Lolo had a total blast!
engSearchText:
Man, going fishing the other day was so much fun!
Lolo had a total blast!
jpnChrName: この前はロロ君と釣りをしたけど、 とっても喜んでくれたよね～！
jpnSearchText:
この前はロロ君と釣りをしたけど、
とっても喜んでくれたよね～！

engChrName: Yeah, and he beat you real bad at it! You must be pretty awful!
engSearchText:
Yeah, and he beat you real bad at it! You must be
pretty awful!
jpnChrName: いちばんヘタッピなのが ルーニーだったのがしょーげきだったわね！
jpnSearchText:
いちばんヘタッピなのが
ルーニーだったのがしょーげきだったわね！

engChrName: Hey, I'm not AWFUL. I'm just, y'know, not great with slimy, wriggly things...
engSearchText:
Hey, I'm not AWFUL. I'm just, y'know, not great
with slimy, wriggly things...
jpnChrName: ううっ、ああいうのは苦手なんだよ～！ ピクピク動いて怖いし……
jpnSearchText:
ううっ、ああいうのは苦手なんだよ～！
ピクピク動いて怖いし……

engChrName: (You're such a wuss, Rooney! C'mon, you're the oldest one of us!)
engSearchText:
(You're such a wuss, Rooney! C'mon, you're the
oldest one of us!)
jpnChrName: （ルーニーって年上っぽくないし   男の子っぽくもないわね、む～。）
jpnSearchText:
（ルーニーって年上っぽくないし
男の子っぽくもないわね、む～。）

engChrName: All right guys, what game should we play toda—
engSearchText: All right guys, what game should we play toda—
jpnChrName: それじゃあ今日は、何して遊ぼ……
jpnSearchText: それじゃあ今日は、何して遊ぼ……

engChrName: We're playin' hide-and-seek! I'm it!
engSearchText: We're playin' hide-and-seek! I'm it!
jpnChrName: モチロンかくれんぼに決まりよ！ イルルがオニで大かつやくするんだもの！！
jpnSearchText:
モチロンかくれんぼに決まりよ！
イルルがオニで大かつやくするんだもの！！

engChrName: C'mon Irle. Shouldn't you let Lolo pick every now and then?
engSearchText:
C'mon Irle. Shouldn't you let Lolo pick every now
and then?
jpnChrName: イ、イルルちゃん…… たまにはロロ君の話を聞いてあげようよ～。
jpnSearchText:
イ、イルルちゃん……
たまにはロロ君の話を聞いてあげようよ～。

engChrName: Wait, but why?! *sigh* ...Fine. What do you want to play, Lolo?
engSearchText:
Wait, but why?! *sigh* ...Fine. What do you want to
play, Lolo?
jpnChrName: ええ～っ！？　いいケド…… ロロはしたい事あるの～っ？
jpnSearchText:
ええ～っ！？　いいケド……
ロロはしたい事あるの～っ？

engChrName: Me? Well, umm...
engSearchText: Me? Well, umm...
jpnChrName: ……えっと、ぼく……
jpnSearchText: ……えっと、ぼく……

engChrName: I wanna try catching fish! Er, fishing! I think that's what it's called.
engSearchText:
I wanna try catching fish! Er, fishing! I think that's
what it's called.
jpnChrName: “つり”っていうの、やってみたい！ オサカナがつれるんでしょ～！？
jpnSearchText:
“つり”っていうの、やってみたい！
オサカナがつれるんでしょ～！？

engChrName: Oh, yeah. I guess you wouldn't know, since you're from the desert and all.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah. I guess you wouldn't know, since you're
from the desert and all.
jpnChrName: そっか、ロロ君は 砂漠地帯の出身だから……
jpnSearchText:
そっか、ロロ君は
砂漠地帯の出身だから……

engChrName: Then let's go! I've gone fishing before! Come on, I'll lend you my fishing pole!
engSearchText:
Then let's go! I've gone fishing before!
Come on, I'll lend you my fishing pole!
jpnChrName: 決まりねっ！　イルルもやったことあるし どーぐはかしてあげるわっ！
jpnSearchText:
決まりねっ！　イルルもやったことあるし
どーぐはかしてあげるわっ！

engChrName: Hey, Feri!
engSearchText: Hey, Feri!
jpnChrName: あ、フェリちゃんだー！！
jpnSearchText: あ、フェリちゃんだー！！

engChrName: Hi, Feri! You said you were starting a new job, right?
engSearchText: Hi, Feri! You said you were starting a new job, right?
jpnChrName: こんにちは！　そういえばバイトを してるって言ってたけど、もしかして……？
jpnSearchText:
こんにちは！　そういえばバイトを
してるって言ってたけど、もしかして……？

engChrName: Yup! These are my coworkers from Arkride Solutions!
engSearchText:
Yup! These are my coworkers from
Arkride Solutions!
jpnChrName: はい、この人たちが解決事務所って ところの人たちです！
jpnSearchText:
はい、この人たちが解決事務所って
ところの人たちです！

engChrName: We're out on patrol right now!
engSearchText: We're out on patrol right now!
jpnChrName: えへん、今日はお仕事なんですよ！
jpnSearchText: えへん、今日はお仕事なんですよ！

engChrName: Wow! You're just like a grown up!
engSearchText: Wow! You're just like a grown up!
jpnChrName: す、すっごーい！！ フェリちゃん、オトナみたい！！
jpnSearchText:
す、すっごーい！！
フェリちゃん、オトナみたい！！

engChrName: I can't believe you're only two years older than I am! You're already so cool.
engSearchText:
I can't believe you're only two years older than I am!
You're already so cool.
jpnChrName: うん、僕と２歳しか違わないのに なんだかカッコイイかも～！
jpnSearchText:
うん、僕と２歳しか違わないのに
なんだかカッコイイかも～！

engChrName: (It's nice to see you've already made friends in Edith, Feri.)
engSearchText:
(It's nice to see you've already made friends in
Edith, Feri.)
jpnChrName: （フェリちゃん、ちゃんと   馴染めているみたいですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（フェリちゃん、ちゃんと
馴染めているみたいですね。）

engChrName: (Looks like they took a shine to you already.)
engSearchText: (Looks like they took a shine to you already.)
jpnChrName: （ああ、案外子供の間じゃ   ヒーローなのかもな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ああ、案外子供の間じゃ
ヒーローなのかもな。）

engChrName: Everyone, I have a surprise for you all before we start class. Starting today, Lolo here will be joining us!
engSearchText:
Everyone, I have a surprise for you all before we
start class. Starting today, Lolo here will be
joining us!
jpnChrName: さて、今日は授業の前にサプライズがあるわ！ 今日から、このロロ君がお友達になります！
jpnSearchText:
さて、今日は授業の前にサプライズがあるわ！
今日から、このロロ君がお友達になります！

engChrName: Everyone give him a big welcome! Why don't you tell us something about yourself, Lolo?
engSearchText:
Everyone give him a big welcome! Why don't you tell
us something about yourself, Lolo?
jpnChrName: ハイ皆さん、元気よく歓迎して～！ ロロ君もほら、自己紹介！
jpnSearchText:
ハイ皆さん、元気よく歓迎して～！
ロロ君もほら、自己紹介！

engChrName: Umm, me and my family moved here from Elsaim because of my daddy's job.
engSearchText:
Umm, me and my family moved here from Elsaim
because of my daddy's job.
jpnChrName: えっとボク、パパのおしごとで エルザイムからひっこしてきたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
えっとボク、パパのおしごとで
エルザイムからひっこしてきたんだ。

engChrName: I don't know anyone in Calvard yet, so I hope we can be friends.
engSearchText:
I don't know anyone in Calvard yet, so I hope we can
be friends.
jpnChrName: いまはカルバードにおともだちがいないけど、 なかよくなれたらいいなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
いまはカルバードにおともだちがいないけど、
なかよくなれたらいいなぁ……

engChrName: Welcome to Edith, Lolo! I'm Irle! I'm also from the Central East, so let's hang out!
engSearchText:
Welcome to Edith, Lolo! I'm Irle! I'm also from the
Central East, so let's hang out!
jpnChrName: ようこそロロくん、あたしはイルルよ！ おなじ中東人どうし、なかよくしましょう？
jpnSearchText:
ようこそロロくん、あたしはイルルよ！
おなじ中東人どうし、なかよくしましょう？

engChrName: We're totally gonna be good friends!
engSearchText: We're totally gonna be good friends!
jpnChrName: きっとすぐにトモダチになれるわ！
jpnSearchText: きっとすぐにトモダチになれるわ！

engChrName: My name's Rooney. It's nice to meet you, Lolo!
engSearchText: My name's Rooney. It's nice to meet you, Lolo!
jpnChrName: 僕はルーニー。 えっとよろしくね、ロロ君！
jpnSearchText:
僕はルーニー。
えっとよろしくね、ロロ君！

engChrName: It's really late now. Let's go home, Irle!
engSearchText: It's really late now. Let's go home, Irle!
jpnChrName: もうこんな時間…… 一緒に帰ろっか、イルルちゃん！
jpnSearchText:
もうこんな時間……
一緒に帰ろっか、イルルちゃん！

engChrName: Huh? Why? I wanna keep playing! Can't we hang out a little more? Please?
engSearchText:
Huh? Why? I wanna keep playing! Can't we hang out
a little more? Please?
jpnChrName: ええ～っ、イルルもっと遊びたいわ！！ ルーニーもつきあってよ！！
jpnSearchText:
ええ～っ、イルルもっと遊びたいわ！！
ルーニーもつきあってよ！！

engChrName: We can't. Remember, your mom told us to get home early.
engSearchText:
We can't. Remember, your mom told us to get
home early.
jpnChrName: だ、だめだよ……遅くならないようにって イルルちゃんのお母さんにも言われてるし……
jpnSearchText:
だ、だめだよ……遅くならないようにって
イルルちゃんのお母さんにも言われてるし……

engChrName: Why do you care about what she says?! Do you care about Ommah more than me?!
engSearchText:
Why do you care about what she says?! Do you care
about Ommah more than me?!
jpnChrName: ぷん！　ルーニーのいくじなし！ イルルよりウンムをだいじにするのね！
jpnSearchText:
ぷん！　ルーニーのいくじなし！
イルルよりウンムをだいじにするのね！

engChrName: ('Ommah'? Does that mean 'Mom'?) That's not true...
engSearchText:
('Ommah'? Does that mean 'Mom'?)
That's not true...
jpnChrName: （ウンムって、お母さんって意味だっけ……） ……そ、そういう訳じゃないんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
（ウンムって、お母さんって意味だっけ……）
……そ、そういう訳じゃないんだけど……

engChrName: Don't leave me, Rooney... You gotta protect me forever!
engSearchText:
Don't leave me, Rooney... You gotta protect
me forever!
jpnChrName: ルーニー、いなくなっちゃダメよ……？ ずっとイルルを守るんだから……っ！
jpnSearchText:
ルーニー、いなくなっちゃダメよ……？
ずっとイルルを守るんだから……っ！

engChrName: O-Okay, okay, I will! Just...stop squeezing, please. Can't...breathe.
engSearchText:
O-Okay, okay, I will! Just...stop squeezing, please.
Can't...breathe.
jpnChrName: う、うん、わかったから あんまりしがみつかないで、ちょっと痛いよ……
jpnSearchText:
う、うん、わかったから
あんまりしがみつかないで、ちょっと痛いよ……

engChrName: I'm hungry. Let's get chocolate crêpes!
engSearchText: I'm hungry. Let's get chocolate crêpes!
jpnChrName: イルル、おなかがすいたから チョコクレープがたべたいわっ！
jpnSearchText:
イルル、おなかがすいたから
チョコクレープがたべたいわっ！

engChrName: I also wanna go say hi to Father Mansur and Mother Kyra!
engSearchText:
I also wanna go say hi to Father Mansur and
Mother Kyra!
jpnChrName: あっ、あときょーくちょーとキーラしさいに ごあいさつもしないと！
jpnSearchText:
あっ、あときょーくちょーとキーラしさいに
ごあいさつもしないと！

engChrName: Mhm! I'm busy today!
engSearchText: Mhm! I'm busy today!
jpnChrName: きょうはいそがしーわねっ！！
jpnSearchText: きょうはいそがしーわねっ！！

engChrName: Rooney's always trying to act all grown up, but he's a big softie! He's a bit of a coward, but he's always nice.
engSearchText:
Rooney's always trying to act all grown up, but he's a
big softie! He's a bit of a coward, but he's always nice.
jpnChrName: ルーニーはゆーじゅーふだんだけど とってもマジメだしいい子なのよ！
jpnSearchText:
ルーニーはゆーじゅーふだんだけど
とってもマジメだしいい子なのよ！

engChrName: I'm sure Arusha will hear his prayers!
engSearchText: I'm sure Arusha will hear his prayers!
jpnChrName: きっとアルーシャも ききとどけてくれるわよねっ！！
jpnSearchText:
きっとアルーシャも
ききとどけてくれるわよねっ！！

engChrName: *sniffle* Why did Lashkar's family have to die?
engSearchText: *sniffle* Why did Lashkar's family have to die?
jpnChrName: ぐすっ、ラシュカル君のかぞく…… しんじゃったって……
jpnSearchText:
ぐすっ、ラシュカル君のかぞく……
しんじゃったって……

engChrName: His mom, and dad, and sister... It's just too awful!
engSearchText: His mom, and dad, and sister... It's just too awful!
jpnChrName: お父さん（アブ）とお母さん（ウンム）、お姉さん（ウフト）も…… ……そんなのかなしすぎるわよっ……！！
jpnSearchText:
お父さん（アブ）とお母さん（ウンム）、お姉さん（ウフト）も……
……そんなのかなしすぎるわよっ……！！

engChrName: You're fun, Lolo!
engSearchText: You're fun, Lolo!
jpnChrName: ロロったらいい子ね！！
jpnSearchText: ロロったらいい子ね！！

engChrName: You can come to me whenever you need to! I dunno if we're gonna get along, but we gotta try, heehee!
engSearchText:
You can come to me whenever you need to! I dunno
if we're gonna get along, but we gotta try, heehee!
jpnChrName: えへん！　イルルがみてあげてもいーわよ！ あってるかはわかんないケドっ！！
jpnSearchText:
えへん！　イルルがみてあげてもいーわよ！
あってるかはわかんないケドっ！！

engChrName: (Rooney always tries to act older, but he's just a big baby!)
engSearchText:
(Rooney always tries to act older, but he's just a
big baby!)
jpnChrName: （ルーニーってば、年上のくせに   ゆーじゅーふだんだし、コワがりだし……）
jpnSearchText:
（ルーニーってば、年上のくせに
ゆーじゅーふだんだし、コワがりだし……）

engChrName: (He's always running out of breath when running and can't climb a tree! I thought boys were supposed to be good at that!)
engSearchText:
(He's always running out of breath when running and
can't climb a tree! I thought boys were supposed to be
good at that!)
jpnChrName: （うんどーもニガテで   ぜんぜん男の子っぽくないわ！　む～！）
jpnSearchText:
（うんどーもニガテで
ぜんぜん男の子っぽくないわ！　む～！）

engChrName: I got a fishing pole!
engSearchText: I got a fishing pole!
jpnChrName: イルル、つりのどーぐ持ってるわ！
jpnSearchText: イルル、つりのどーぐ持ってるわ！

engChrName: I'm letting Lolo borrow it. I don't mind at all!
engSearchText: I'm letting Lolo borrow it. I don't mind at all!
jpnChrName: ロロ君にはトクベツに かしてあげるんだからっ！
jpnSearchText:
ロロ君にはトクベツに
かしてあげるんだからっ！

engChrName: Wow, Feri! You're just like a grown up! You're the coolest!
engSearchText:
Wow, Feri! You're just like a grown up! You're
the coolest!
jpnChrName: フェリちゃん、オトナみたい！！ いいないいな～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
フェリちゃん、オトナみたい！！
いいないいな～っ！！

engChrName: I'm gonna catch up to you soon! I'll be just as grown up in no time!
engSearchText:
I'm gonna catch up to you soon! I'll be just as grown
up in no time!
jpnChrName: む～、イルルだって…… すぐにおいついちゃうんだからっ！！
jpnSearchText:
む～、イルルだって……
すぐにおいついちゃうんだからっ！！

engChrName: Heehee, I look forward to it!
engSearchText: Heehee, I look forward to it!
jpnChrName: えへへ、楽しみにしてますね、 イルルちゃんっ！
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、楽しみにしてますね、
イルルちゃんっ！

engChrName: I'm older than Lolo, so it's my job to take care of him and teach him stuff!
engSearchText:
I'm older than Lolo, so it's my job to take care of him
and teach him stuff!
jpnChrName: ロロくんはイルルより年下なの。 ふふん、センパイとしてめんどーみてあげてるわ！
jpnSearchText:
ロロくんはイルルより年下なの。
ふふん、センパイとしてめんどーみてあげてるわ！

engChrName: Say, aren't you forgetting something great about me?
engSearchText: Say, aren't you forgetting something great about me?
jpnChrName: でもなんか足りないよーな…… イルル、ほかにもいートコあるわよね……？
jpnSearchText:
でもなんか足りないよーな……
イルル、ほかにもいートコあるわよね……？

engChrName: I mean, I'm just as polite as you are, Rooney! I'm a good girl!
engSearchText:
I mean, I'm just as polite as you are, Rooney! I'm a
good girl!
jpnChrName: おとなしそーでルーニーみたいだけど 中々いいこじゃないっ？
jpnSearchText:
おとなしそーでルーニーみたいだけど
中々いいこじゃないっ？

engChrName: I think I should be the oldest! I could take the bestest care of you and Lolo!
engSearchText:
I think I should be the oldest! I could take the bestest
care of you and Lolo!
jpnChrName: イルル、めんどーみてあげるわっ！ センパイとしてね！
jpnSearchText:
イルル、めんどーみてあげるわっ！
センパイとしてね！

engChrName: Hmph! Your name shouldn't be Rooney, it should be Weenie! 'Cause you are one!
engSearchText:
Hmph! Your name shouldn't be Rooney,
it should be Weenie! 'Cause you are one!
jpnChrName: ぷん！　ルーニーのいくじなし！
jpnSearchText: ぷん！　ルーニーのいくじなし！

engChrName: C-C'mon! That's not fair!
engSearchText: C-C'mon! That's not fair!
jpnChrName: イ、イルルちゃん、怒らないでよ～！
jpnSearchText: イ、イルルちゃん、怒らないでよ～！

engChrName: Your mom's gonna be here soon to pick you up, right? What do you think of the school? You know you can trust me!
engSearchText:
Your mom's gonna be here soon to pick you
up, right? What do you think of the school?
You know you can trust me!
jpnChrName: もうすぐお母さん（ウンム）が迎えに来るのよね。 きょうはどうだった？　なんでもきーていいわよ！
jpnSearchText:
もうすぐお母さん（ウンム）が迎えに来るのよね。
きょうはどうだった？　なんでもきーていいわよ！

engChrName: I like it here!
engSearchText: I like it here!
jpnChrName: うん、ダイジョーブだよ～！
jpnSearchText: うん、ダイジョーブだよ～！

engChrName: Mother Kyra's really nice, Rooney's helping me study, and—
engSearchText:
Mother Kyra's really nice, Rooney's helping me
study, and—
jpnChrName: しさいさんもいいヒトだし、 ルーニーお兄ちゃんもべんきょうみてくれたし……
jpnSearchText:
しさいさんもいいヒトだし、
ルーニーお兄ちゃんもべんきょうみてくれたし……

engChrName: And me? How about me?!
engSearchText: And me? How about me?!
jpnChrName: イルルはっ？　イルルはどーお！？
jpnSearchText: イルルはっ？　イルルはどーお！？

engChrName: You, Irle...
engSearchText: You, Irle...
jpnChrName: えっと、イルルお姉ちゃんは……
jpnSearchText: えっと、イルルお姉ちゃんは……

engChrName: You're a real ball of energy! Haha!
engSearchText: You're a real ball of energy! Haha!
jpnChrName: ゲンキだね！　えへへ！！
jpnSearchText: ゲンキだね！　えへへ！！

engChrName: (That's it? That's...disappointing...)
engSearchText: (That's it? That's...disappointing...)
jpnChrName: （……なんか足りないよーな……   なにかしら、このハイボクカン……）
jpnSearchText:
（……なんか足りないよーな……
なにかしら、このハイボクカン……）

engChrName: Dad couldn't make it today...
engSearchText: Dad couldn't make it today...
jpnChrName: きょうはこられなかったけど……
jpnSearchText: きょうはこられなかったけど……

engChrName: But he said he can come celebrate festival day with us at the temple!
engSearchText:
But he said he can come celebrate festival day with us
at the temple!
jpnChrName: キネンサイの日は、パパもイッショに寺院で おいわいできるんだって！
jpnSearchText:
キネンサイの日は、パパもイッショに寺院で
おいわいできるんだって！

engChrName: It's been a long time since we left Elsaim. I'm really excited to spend the festival with everyone!
engSearchText:
It's been a long time since we left Elsaim. I'm really
excited to spend the festival with everyone!
jpnChrName: エルザイムにいたころぶりだし、みんなで おまつり、ほんとにたのしみっ！
jpnSearchText:
エルザイムにいたころぶりだし、みんなで
おまつり、ほんとにたのしみっ！

engChrName: Why is everyone so scared? Is something going on?
engSearchText: Why is everyone so scared? Is something going on?
jpnChrName: なんだかみんなコワイって言ってるけど どうしたんだろう……？
jpnSearchText:
なんだかみんなコワイって言ってるけど
どうしたんだろう……？

engChrName: What's a 'steak of immersion sea'? Is it tasty?
engSearchText: What's a 'steak of immersion sea'? Is it tasty?
jpnChrName: ヒジョージタイ、センゲン？ って、なんなのかなぁ？
jpnSearchText:
ヒジョージタイ、センゲン？
って、なんなのかなぁ？

engChrName: Mom is really scared, too. Is there anything I can do?
engSearchText: Mom is really scared, too. Is there anything I can do?
jpnChrName: ママも、すごくこわがってるみたいだし…… ボクもなにかしたほうがいいのかな？
jpnSearchText:
ママも、すごくこわがってるみたいだし……
ボクもなにかしたほうがいいのかな？

engChrName: I did my homework, but Irle didn't. I'm letting her copy mine.
engSearchText:
I did my homework, but Irle didn't. I'm letting her
copy mine.
jpnChrName: ぼくプリントやってきたから イルルお姉ちゃんにみせてあげるけど……
jpnSearchText:
ぼくプリントやってきたから
イルルお姉ちゃんにみせてあげるけど……

engChrName: I wonder if it's okay for her to do that. Does she ever study?
engSearchText:
I wonder if it's okay for her to do that. Does she
ever study?
jpnChrName: イルルお姉ちゃん、ホントにおべんきょう できないよね……だいじょうぶかなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
イルルお姉ちゃん、ホントにおべんきょう
できないよね……だいじょうぶかなぁ……

engChrName: I saw someone fishing at the river the other day. It looked like fun!
engSearchText:
I saw someone fishing at the river the other day.
It looked like fun!
jpnChrName: あのね、この前かわで“つり”してるひとがいて たのしそ～だったんだ～！
jpnSearchText:
あのね、この前かわで“つり”してるひとがいて
たのしそ～だったんだ～！

engChrName: I wanna try that out, too!
engSearchText: I wanna try that out, too!
jpnChrName: えへへ、ぼくもやってみたい！！
jpnSearchText: えへへ、ぼくもやってみたい！！

engChrName: Mother Kyra is so kind. Rooney's helping me study, too!
engSearchText:
Mother Kyra is so kind. Rooney's helping me
study, too!
jpnChrName: しさいさんもいいヒトだし、 ルーニーお兄ちゃんもべんきょうみてくれたよ！
jpnSearchText:
しさいさんもいいヒトだし、
ルーニーお兄ちゃんもべんきょうみてくれたよ！

engChrName: And Irle is real nice! I like it here already.
engSearchText: And Irle is real nice! I like it here already.
jpnChrName: イルルお姉ちゃんもゲンキだし たのしくなりそう！！
jpnSearchText:
イルルお姉ちゃんもゲンキだし
たのしくなりそう！！

engChrName: I wonder what Sunday School in Calvard is like...
engSearchText: I wonder what Sunday School in Calvard is like...
jpnChrName: えっと、カルバードの日曜学校って どんなんなんだろう……？
jpnSearchText:
えっと、カルバードの日曜学校って
どんなんなんだろう……？

engChrName: I hope it's fun!
engSearchText: I hope it's fun!
jpnChrName: たのしくおべんきょうできるといいなぁ……
jpnSearchText: たのしくおべんきょうできるといいなぁ……

engChrName: We ourselves haven't been able to connect to the orbal net, but some folks have gotten their stuff up and running.
engSearchText:
We ourselves haven't been able to connect to the
orbal net, but some folks have gotten their stuff up
and running.
jpnChrName: 導力ネットは繋がらないけど…… 近隣の街区にも動ける人はいそうね。
jpnSearchText:
導力ネットは繋がらないけど……
近隣の街区にも動ける人はいそうね。

engChrName: I'll try to get in touch with them to set up a way of communicating with you.
engSearchText:
I'll try to get in touch with them to set up a way of
communicating with you.
jpnChrName: こちらでも連絡を取って 連携できるように体制を整えるわ。
jpnSearchText:
こちらでも連絡を取って
連携できるように体制を整えるわ。

engChrName: If anyone can get us through this, it's you all.
engSearchText: If anyone can get us through this, it's you all.
jpnChrName: きっとどこかに突破口があるはず── ヴァンちゃん達もしっかりね！
jpnSearchText:
きっとどこかに突破口があるはず──
ヴァンちゃん達もしっかりね！

engChrName: You bet. We'll figure somethin' out.
engSearchText: You bet. We'll figure somethin' out.
jpnChrName: ああ、こっちは任せとけ！
jpnSearchText: ああ、こっちは任せとけ！

engChrName: Keep an eye on Syd and the others, yeah?
engSearchText: Keep an eye on Syd and the others, yeah?
jpnChrName: 悪ィがシド達の事は頼んだぜ！
jpnSearchText: 悪ィがシド達の事は頼んだぜ！

engChrName: Don't you worry about Syd's injuries. I patched him up, so he'll be right as rain soon enough.
engSearchText:
Don't you worry about Syd's injuries. I patched him
up, so he'll be right as rain soon enough.
jpnChrName: シドちゃんの怪我なら心配いらないわ。 応急措置も済ませておいたし。
jpnSearchText:
シドちゃんの怪我なら心配いらないわ。
応急措置も済ませておいたし。

engChrName: Besides, the chief of security left a guard here. Shop's as safe a haven as you can get.
engSearchText:
Besides, the chief of security left a guard here.
Shop's as safe a haven as you can get.
jpnChrName: それに主任さんが警備員を置いていってね。 屋内は安全なはずよ。
jpnSearchText:
それに主任さんが警備員を置いていってね。
屋内は安全なはずよ。

engChrName: Marduk's nothin' if not thorough, I guess.
engSearchText: Marduk's nothin' if not thorough, I guess.
jpnChrName: そうみてーだな…… なんつー手際だ。
jpnSearchText:
そうみてーだな……
なんつー手際だ。

engChrName: Aww. It won't kill you to give them a compliment, you know.
engSearchText:
Aww. It won't kill you to give them a compliment,
you know.
jpnChrName: フフ、流石は天下の ＭＫ社といった所かな？
jpnSearchText:
フフ、流石は天下の
ＭＫ社といった所かな？

engChrName: Though even they are pretty in the dark about this.
engSearchText: Though even they are pretty in the dark about this.
jpnChrName: といっても事態を把握している わけじゃなさそうだが……
jpnSearchText:
といっても事態を把握している
わけじゃなさそうだが……

engChrName: That's just how they roll.
engSearchText: That's just how they roll.
jpnChrName: ん、流石は天下のＭＫ社だね。
jpnSearchText: ん、流石は天下のＭＫ社だね。

engChrName: But even they don't look like they know what's going on.
engSearchText:
But even they don't look like they know what's
going on.
jpnChrName: といっても事態を把握している わけじゃなさそうだけど……
jpnSearchText:
といっても事態を把握している
わけじゃなさそうだけど……

engChrName: So it goes for the mighty Marduk.
engSearchText: So it goes for the mighty Marduk.
jpnChrName: フフ、流石は天下の ＭＫ社といった所でしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
フフ、流石は天下の
ＭＫ社といった所でしょうか？

engChrName: Though for as mighty as they are, they seem none the wiser about this situation as well.
engSearchText:
Though for as mighty as they are, they seem none the
wiser about this situation as well.
jpnChrName: とはいっても事態を把握している わけではなさそうですが……
jpnSearchText:
とはいっても事態を把握している
わけではなさそうですが……

engChrName: They've got some of their men patrolling the area.
engSearchText: They've got some of their men patrolling the area.
jpnChrName: ええ、近隣で待機していた 部下たちみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、近隣で待機していた
部下たちみたいね。

engChrName: I'm sure we can at least depend on them for now.
engSearchText: I'm sure we can at least depend on them for now.
jpnChrName: けれど今は力を借りるだけでしょう。
jpnSearchText: けれど今は力を借りるだけでしょう。

engChrName: I'll try and get in touch with everyone. I leave the rest in all of your capable hands!
engSearchText:
I'll try and get in touch with everyone. I leave the rest
in all of your capable hands!
jpnChrName: 連絡方面は試してみるわ。 ヴァンちゃんたちも、頼んだわよ！
jpnSearchText:
連絡方面は試してみるわ。
ヴァンちゃんたちも、頼んだわよ！

engChrName: (Those are some fine specimens right there! I would take all three for myself if they let me!)
engSearchText:
(Those are some fine specimens right there! I would
take all three for myself if they let me!)
jpnChrName: （ああン！　３人とも好みで   思わずカラダが悶えちゃうけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（ああン！　３人とも好みで
思わずカラダが悶えちゃうけど……）

engChrName: (Help me, Van! I'm fit to burst just looking at them— let alone trying to talk to them!)
engSearchText:
(Help me, Van! I'm fit to burst just looking at them—
let alone trying to talk to them!)
jpnChrName: （面子がヤバすぎて声をかけられないのよォ！   ヴァンちゃん、どうにかして～っ！！）
jpnSearchText:
（面子がヤバすぎて声をかけられないのよォ！
ヴァンちゃん、どうにかして～っ！！）

engChrName: (Yeaaah. What you got in mind might be above their pay grade.)
engSearchText:
(Yeaaah. What you got in mind might be above their
pay grade.)
jpnChrName: （やれやれ、ベルモッティにとっちゃ   役得が過ぎるみてぇだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（やれやれ、ベルモッティにとっちゃ
役得が過ぎるみてぇだな。）

engChrName: You should tuck in early today, Van. Get some nice rest and relaxation in.
engSearchText:
You should tuck in early today, Van. Get some nice
rest and relaxation in.
jpnChrName: ふふ、とにかくヴァンちゃんも 今夜くらいはマッタリするといいわ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、とにかくヴァンちゃんも
今夜くらいはマッタリするといいわ。

engChrName: Better keep yourself in tip-top shape! There's a lot for us to look forward to.
engSearchText:
Better keep yourself in tip-top shape! There's a lot for
us to look forward to.
jpnChrName: またどうせ、これから先も お互い色々と忙しくなるでしょうし。
jpnSearchText:
またどうせ、これから先も
お互い色々と忙しくなるでしょうし。

engChrName: Heh. You said it. (...Lot to look forward to. Right.)
engSearchText:
Heh. You said it.
(...Lot to look forward to. Right.)
jpnChrName: ハハ、違いねぇ。 （………これから先、か。）
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、違いねぇ。
（………これから先、か。）

engChrName: Working hard as usual, I see.
engSearchText: Working hard as usual, I see.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、お疲れ様。 今日もお仕事みたいね？
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、お疲れ様。
今日もお仕事みたいね？

engChrName: The incident with A is still making waves. All of my sources are still abuzz talking about it.
engSearchText:
The incident with A is still making waves. All of my
sources are still abuzz talking about it.
jpnChrName: 《Ａ》の一件の“余波”…… まだ色々と影響が残っているみたいだけど。
jpnSearchText:
《Ａ》の一件の“余波”……
まだ色々と影響が残っているみたいだけど。

engChrName: Got any juicy info you wouldn't mind sharin'?
engSearchText: Got any juicy info you wouldn't mind sharin'?
jpnChrName: ああ、ベルモッティの方でも 何か掴んでるみたいだな？
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ベルモッティの方でも
何か掴んでるみたいだな？

engChrName: Of course I do! There's still some of A's gangsters out and about.
engSearchText:
Of course I do! There's still some of A's gangsters out
and about.
jpnChrName: ええ──当局から今も逃れている 半グレや“残党”がいるらしくてね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ──当局から今も逃れている
半グレや“残党”がいるらしくてね。

engChrName: It's quite concerning, knowing we have some stragglers laying low in the capital.
engSearchText:
It's quite concerning, knowing we have some
stragglers laying low in the capital.
jpnChrName: どうやら首都にも潜伏しているようだけど ……流石にちょっと気になるわね。
jpnSearchText:
どうやら首都にも潜伏しているようだけど
……流石にちょっと気になるわね。

engChrName: Yeah... It worries me, too.
engSearchText: Yeah... It worries me, too.
jpnChrName: 確かにそれは……
jpnSearchText: 確かにそれは……

engChrName: Not Melchior, not worth the time.
engSearchText: Not Melchior, not worth the time.
jpnChrName: ハッ、メルキオルの野郎以外は 雑魚ばっかだろうがな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、メルキオルの野郎以外は
雑魚ばっかだろうがな。

engChrName: We should still keep an eye out, just in case we come across any information regarding their whereabouts.
engSearchText:
We should still keep an eye out, just in case we come
across any information regarding their whereabouts.
jpnChrName: どこかで手掛かりが見つかるかもしれません。 一応気を配っておきましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
どこかで手掛かりが見つかるかもしれません。
一応気を配っておきましょうか。

engChrName: As long as it doesn't get in the way of everything else we're doing, it sounds good to me.
engSearchText:
As long as it doesn't get in the way of everything else
we're doing, it sounds good to me.
jpnChrName: ああ、それでいい。 足を取られねえ程度に行くぞ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、それでいい。
足を取られねえ程度に行くぞ。

engChrName: The streets are quite shaken after the aftermath of that A incident.
engSearchText:
The streets are quite shaken after the aftermath of
that A incident.
jpnChrName: 《Ａ》の一件の“余波”…… 揺れ戻しもそれなりに起きているようね。
jpnSearchText:
《Ａ》の一件の“余波”……
揺れ戻しもそれなりに起きているようね。

engChrName: It's going to be a while until things settle down, so take care of yourself.
engSearchText:
It's going to be a while until things settle down, so
take care of yourself.
jpnChrName: まだしばらくはゴタついているし ヴァンちゃんたちも気を付けてね？
jpnSearchText:
まだしばらくはゴタついているし
ヴァンちゃんたちも気を付けてね？

engChrName: If any new info comes in, you'll be the first to know.
engSearchText: If any new info comes in, you'll be the first to know.
jpnChrName: 何か分かったらまた連絡するわ♪
jpnSearchText: 何か分かったらまた連絡するわ♪

engChrName: I'll hit the pavement and see what I can find out, too. I owe Dingo that much.
engSearchText:
I'll hit the pavement and see what I can find out, too.
I owe Dingo that much.
jpnChrName: こちらでも情報を探ってみるわ。 ディンゴちゃんの弔いのためにも──
jpnSearchText:
こちらでも情報を探ってみるわ。
ディンゴちゃんの弔いのためにも──

engChrName: Do try to keep an eye on Marielle, too, if you can.
engSearchText: Do try to keep an eye on Marielle, too, if you can.
jpnChrName: それと、マリエルって子を見かけたら 気にかけてあげて頂戴。
jpnSearchText:
それと、マリエルって子を見かけたら
気にかけてあげて頂戴。

engChrName: I worry about what she might be up to, after everything that happened.
engSearchText:
I worry about what she might be up to, after
everything that happened.
jpnChrName: 危ない事をしてないといいのだけど……
jpnSearchText: 危ない事をしてないといいのだけど……

engChrName: Dingo sure's been putting in some overtime as of late.
engSearchText: Dingo sure's been putting in some overtime as of late.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、ディンゴちゃんも 苦労してるみたいねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、ディンゴちゃんも
苦労してるみたいねぇ。

engChrName: And here I am, just having to suffer, seeing him spend so much time with a beautiful lady that's not me!
engSearchText:
And here I am, just having to suffer, seeing him
spend so much time with a beautiful lady that's
not me!
jpnChrName: アタシ以外の女性と仲良くしてるのは ちょっと妬けちゃうけど♪
jpnSearchText:
アタシ以外の女性と仲良くしてるのは
ちょっと妬けちゃうけど♪

engChrName: I don't think your usual game's gonna catch his attention anytime soon.
engSearchText:
I don't think your usual game's gonna catch his
attention anytime soon.
jpnChrName: ま、ディンゴにしちゃ 振り回されてるよな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、ディンゴにしちゃ
振り回されてるよな。

engChrName: Boo. You're no fun.
engSearchText: Boo. You're no fun.
jpnChrName: う～ん、お安くないわねぇ～！
jpnSearchText: う～ん、お安くないわねぇ～！

engChrName: But I digress. It looks like you got all your work down pat for the day, eh?
engSearchText:
But I digress. It looks like you got all your work down
pat for the day, eh?
jpnChrName: まあそれはともかく、 日中の依頼も片付けてくれたみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
まあそれはともかく、
日中の依頼も片付けてくれたみたいね。

engChrName: I'm sure your assistance was more than appreciated! Arkride Solutions to the rescue!
engSearchText:
I'm sure your assistance was more than appreciated!
Arkride Solutions to the rescue!
jpnChrName: ふふっ、彼も感謝してたわよ？ 流石はアークライド解決事務所ね♪
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、彼も感謝してたわよ？
流石はアークライド解決事務所ね♪

engChrName: Chill. I didn't do anything other than show up.
engSearchText: Chill. I didn't do anything other than show up.
jpnChrName: なんだ、一応顔を出してやがったか。
jpnSearchText: なんだ、一応顔を出してやがったか。

engChrName: Guy's a clown, but he's at least got the balls to take responsibility. Guess we'll see how far that gets him.
engSearchText:
Guy's a clown, but he's at least got the balls to
take responsibility. Guess we'll see how far that
gets him.
jpnChrName: まあ調子乗りだがスジは通すみてえだしな。 今後については様子見だな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ調子乗りだがスジは通すみてえだしな。
今後については様子見だな。

engChrName: I don't quite know that I trust him or his claims of integrity just yet. I'll believe it when I see it.
engSearchText:
I don't quite know that I trust him or his claims of
integrity just yet. I'll believe it when I see it.
jpnChrName: どう思われているかはともあれ 誠意を貫きたい──そんな事を言ってたわね。
jpnSearchText:
どう思われているかはともあれ
誠意を貫きたい──そんな事を言ってたわね。

engChrName: Oh, but I'll still keep an eye on the dear myself, so don't worry about doing all the heavy lifting.
engSearchText:
Oh, but I'll still keep an eye on the dear myself, so
don't worry about doing all the heavy lifting.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、関わった者として アタシも見守らせてもらおうかしら。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、関わった者として
アタシも見守らせてもらおうかしら。

engChrName: I'm sure the media frenzy will calm down after a while.
engSearchText:
I'm sure the media frenzy will calm down after
a while.
jpnChrName: マスコミもしばらく経てば 落ち着いて来るでしょうし。
jpnSearchText:
マスコミもしばらく経てば
落ち着いて来るでしょうし。

engChrName: It'll be up to him to decide how to handle things from here.
engSearchText:
It'll be up to him to decide how to handle things
from here.
jpnChrName: どう振舞って誠意を貫くかは 彼次第でしょうね。
jpnSearchText:
どう振舞って誠意を貫くかは
彼次第でしょうね。

engChrName: Oh, but I'll still keep an eye on the dear myself, so don't worry about doing all the heavy lifting.
engSearchText:
Oh, but I'll still keep an eye on the dear myself, so
don't worry about doing all the heavy lifting.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、関わった者として アタシも見守らせてもらおうかしら。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、関わった者として
アタシも見守らせてもらおうかしら。

engChrName: Well, if it isn't Van and his crew! Welcome, dears! Welcome.
engSearchText:
Well, if it isn't Van and his crew! Welcome, dears!
Welcome.
jpnChrName: あら、ヴァンちゃんたち。 いらっしゃい。
jpnSearchText:
あら、ヴァンちゃんたち。
いらっしゃい。

engChrName: I'm entertaining some unusual guests at the moment, though I think you three might already be acquainted, no?
engSearchText:
I'm entertaining some unusual guests at the moment,
though I think you three might already be
acquainted, no?
jpnChrName: 珍しいお客さんが来てるけど やっぱり知り合いだったのね？
jpnSearchText:
珍しいお客さんが来てるけど
やっぱり知り合いだったのね？

engChrName: Acquainted? Yeah. But they sure ain't gonna be gettin' a birthday card from me.
engSearchText:
Acquainted? Yeah. But they sure ain't gonna be
gettin' a birthday card from me.
jpnChrName: まあ、間接的にくらいだがな。
jpnSearchText: まあ、間接的にくらいだがな。

engChrName: Gonna guess they stopped by for some info.
engSearchText: Gonna guess they stopped by for some info.
jpnChrName: しかしここに寄ってるってことは 何か情報でも集めに来たようだな？
jpnSearchText:
しかしここに寄ってるってことは
何か情報でも集めに来たようだな？

engChrName: Good try, darling, but you know I can't tell you that.
engSearchText: Good try, darling, but you know I can't tell you that.
jpnChrName: うふふ、それは企業秘密よ。
jpnSearchText: うふふ、それは企業秘密よ。

engChrName: Mmm. But I might be willing to relent this time, if you ask nicely. I might even be willing to tell you that they're here asking about A.
engSearchText:
Mmm. But I might be willing to relent this time, if
you ask nicely. I might even be willing to tell you that
they're here asking about A.
jpnChrName: ──と言いたいところだけど 《Ａ》絡みとだけは言っておくわ。
jpnSearchText:
──と言いたいところだけど
《Ａ》絡みとだけは言っておくわ。

engChrName: You see, they have their sights set on a certain organization that A happens to be employing.
engSearchText:
You see, they have their sights set on a certain
organization that A happens to be employing.
jpnChrName: どちらかというと連中に雇われた “例の組織”が目当てみたいだけど。
jpnSearchText:
どちらかというと連中に雇われた
“例の組織”が目当てみたいだけど。

engChrName: Oh, yeah?
engSearchText: Oh, yeah?
jpnChrName: なるほどな……
jpnSearchText: なるほどな……

engChrName: (All of the Gardens' overseers got artifacts with 'em.)
engSearchText: (All of the Gardens' overseers got artifacts with 'em.)
jpnChrName: （《庭園（ガーデン）》──管理人と呼ばれる幹部は   全員が古代遺物（アーティファクト）を使うらしい。）
jpnSearchText:
（《庭園（ガーデン）》──管理人と呼ばれる幹部は
全員が古代遺物（アーティファクト）を使うらしい。）

engChrName: (It was a matter of time till the Septian Church sent someone over to try and recover those.)
engSearchText:
(It was a matter of time till the Septian Church sent
someone over to try and recover those.)
jpnChrName: （なら教会の遺物回収の専門家が   出張ってるのも当然といえば当然か。）
jpnSearchText:
（なら教会の遺物回収の専門家が
出張ってるのも当然といえば当然か。）

engChrName: Oho! You finally brought over that fresh new hire I've been hearing so much about!
engSearchText:
Oho! You finally brought over that fresh new hire I've
been hearing so much about!
jpnChrName: ウフフ、それはそうと 噂の新人君も連れてきてるのね。
jpnSearchText:
ウフフ、それはそうと
噂の新人君も連れてきてるのね。

engChrName: Quatre Salision, right? You're one of Professor Hamilton's students, aren't you, sweetie?
engSearchText:
Quatre Salision, right? You're one of Professor
Hamilton's students, aren't you, sweetie?
jpnChrName: あのハミルトン博士門下の カトル・サリシオン君、だったかしら？
jpnSearchText:
あのハミルトン博士門下の
カトル・サリシオン君、だったかしら？

engChrName: That's right. And you must be Bermotti. I've heard my fair share about you as well.
engSearchText:
That's right. And you must be Bermotti. I've heard
my fair share about you as well.
jpnChrName: ええ、貴方がベルモッティさんですね。 お話は伺っています。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、貴方がベルモッティさんですね。
お話は伺っています。

engChrName: Namely about how you're a reputable information broker.
engSearchText:
Namely about how you're a reputable
information broker.
jpnChrName: どうやら日頃から各種情報などで お世話になっているそうですし……
jpnSearchText:
どうやら日頃から各種情報などで
お世話になっているそうですし……

engChrName: It's a pleasure. I'll be providing technical support from here on, so I'm at your service if ever the need arises.
engSearchText:
It's a pleasure. I'll be providing technical support from
here on, so I'm at your service if ever the need arises.
jpnChrName: 技術方面のサポートを担当する予定なので 何かあればよろしくお願いします。
jpnSearchText:
技術方面のサポートを担当する予定なので
何かあればよろしくお願いします。

engChrName: Oh, what a peach! Trust me, the pleasure is all mine.
engSearchText: Oh, what a peach! Trust me, the pleasure is all mine.
jpnChrName: うふふ、こちらこそ㈱ ホント粒ぞろいになってきたじゃない。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、こちらこそ㈱
ホント粒ぞろいになってきたじゃない。

engChrName: You've got a full litter of pups to watch over now, don't you, Van, dear? No more slacking off for you!
engSearchText:
You've got a full litter of pups to watch over now,
don't you, Van, dear? No more slacking off for you!
jpnChrName: メンバーが増えた分、所長さんとしても 今まで以上に頑張らないとねぇ？
jpnSearchText:
メンバーが増えた分、所長さんとしても
今まで以上に頑張らないとねぇ？

engChrName: Don't you have a cocktail to make or something?
engSearchText: Don't you have a cocktail to make or something?
jpnChrName: クソ、他人事だと思いやがって……
jpnSearchText: クソ、他人事だと思いやがって……

engChrName: Haha. Don't worry. We all do our best to pull our own weight.
engSearchText:
Haha. Don't worry. We all do our best to pull our
own weight.
jpnChrName: あはは……当然私たちも これまで以上に頑張りますから！
jpnSearchText:
あはは……当然私たちも
これまで以上に頑張りますから！

engChrName: Hear, hear!
engSearchText: Hear, hear!
jpnChrName: はいっ、わたしもです！
jpnSearchText: はいっ、わたしもです！

engChrName: As long as no one loses their head, I'm fine with slacking off a little.
engSearchText:
As long as no one loses their head, I'm fine with
slacking off a little.
jpnChrName: ま、俺は適当に 生暖かく見守ってやるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、俺は適当に
生暖かく見守ってやるぜ。

engChrName: I look forward to a mutually supportive relationship between us, Mr. Bermotti.
engSearchText:
I look forward to a mutually supportive relationship
between us, Mr. Bermotti.
jpnChrName: ええ、今後の業務拡大も見据えて サポートさせていただきます。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、今後の業務拡大も見据えて
サポートさせていただきます。

engChrName: Oh, by the by, Dingo mentioned that he wanted to make a reservation tonight.
engSearchText:
Oh, by the by, Dingo mentioned that he wanted to
make a reservation tonight.
jpnChrName: そういえばディンゴちゃんが 夜、席を予約したいとか言ってたわね。
jpnSearchText:
そういえばディンゴちゃんが
夜、席を予約したいとか言ってたわね。

engChrName: He's celebrating something with that little miss he's been looking after. That's so sweet of him.
engSearchText:
He's celebrating something with that little miss he's
been looking after. That's so sweet of him.
jpnChrName: 面倒見てる例の子へのお祝いらしいけど ……ふふっ、何だか微笑ましいわね。
jpnSearchText:
面倒見てる例の子へのお祝いらしいけど
……ふふっ、何だか微笑ましいわね。

engChrName: There's a special stipulation regarding this last request.
engSearchText:
There's a special stipulation regarding this
last request.
jpnChrName: さっきの依頼──ちょっと訳アリみたいでね。
jpnSearchText: さっきの依頼──ちょっと訳アリみたいでね。

engChrName: The client says they'll reach out while you're on Expressway Route 3.
engSearchText:
The client says they'll reach out while you're on
Expressway Route 3.
jpnChrName: 指定の場所は“環状三号線”…… 流していれば声を掛けるそうよ。
jpnSearchText:
指定の場所は“環状三号線”……
流していれば声を掛けるそうよ。

engChrName: Do me a favor and go see what they have to say.
engSearchText: Do me a favor and go see what they have to say.
jpnChrName: まあ話くらいは聞いてあげて頂戴な。
jpnSearchText: まあ話くらいは聞いてあげて頂戴な。

engChrName: Oho! You finally brought over that fresh new hire I've been hearing so much about!
engSearchText:
Oho! You finally brought over that fresh new hire I've
been hearing so much about!
jpnChrName: それはそうと…… 噂の新人君も連れてきてるのね。

噂の新人君も連れてきてるのね。
