engChrName: I look forward to a mutually supportive relationship between us, Mr. Bermotti.
engSearchText:
I look forward to a mutually supportive relationship
between us, Mr. Bermotti.
jpnChrName: ええ、今後の業務拡大も見据えて サポートさせていただきます。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、今後の業務拡大も見据えて
サポートさせていただきます。

engChrName: Van, darling. A little birdie let me know you were in the 13th District today.
engSearchText:
Van, darling. A little birdie let me know you were in
the 13th District today.
jpnChrName: ヴァンちゃん……今日は “１３区”に顔を出してたみたいね？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンちゃん……今日は
“１３区”に顔を出してたみたいね？

engChrName: That's a fast little birdie, then. But yeah. The Immovable decided I'd play as his errand boy today.
engSearchText:
That's a fast little birdie, then. But yeah.
The Immovable decided I'd play as his errand
boy today.
jpnChrName: 耳に入ってたか── ああ、《不動》にいいように使われてな。
jpnSearchText:
耳に入ってたか──
ああ、《不動》にいいように使われてな。

engChrName: Edith's gonna be pure chaos with people like that running around.
engSearchText:
Edith's gonna be pure chaos with people like that
running around.
jpnChrName: しかもあの面倒すぎるメンツ…… 首都も当分はカオスになりそうだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
しかもあの面倒すぎるメンツ……
首都も当分はカオスになりそうだぜ。

engChrName: Trust me, I know. I'm expecting all my sources to go wild with them in the mix.
engSearchText:
Trust me, I know. I'm expecting all my sources to go
wild with them in the mix.
jpnChrName: そのようねえ……アタシとしては “商品”には困らなさそうだけど。
jpnSearchText:
そのようねえ……アタシとしては
“商品”には困らなさそうだけど。

engChrName: The streets have already been going crazy, considering all those recent developments.
engSearchText:
The streets have already been going crazy,
considering all those recent developments.
jpnChrName: いずれにせよ最近の情勢で“裏”が 賑わっているのは間違いなさそうね。
jpnSearchText:
いずれにせよ最近の情勢で“裏”が
賑わっているのは間違いなさそうね。

engChrName: I hear a certain...unsavory group might be on the prowl right now.
engSearchText:
I hear a certain...unsavory group might be on the
prowl right now.
jpnChrName: 別口だけど、いくつかの勢力が 動き始めてるって情報もあるわ。
jpnSearchText:
別口だけど、いくつかの勢力が
動き始めてるって情報もあるわ。

engChrName: Do try to be careful, please?
engSearchText: Do try to be careful, please?
jpnChrName: ヴァンちゃん達も気を付けておいてね㈱
jpnSearchText: ヴァンちゃん達も気を付けておいてね㈱

engChrName: Yeah, yeah. Thanks for the heads up. (If you already know we're headin' out, you can just say so.)
engSearchText:
Yeah, yeah. Thanks for the heads up.
(If you already know we're headin' out, you can just
say so.)
jpnChrName: ああ、サンキューな。 （って今度の出張も見越してやがんな。）
jpnSearchText:
ああ、サンキューな。
（って今度の出張も見越してやがんな。）

engChrName: I'm hoping to see Agnès and the rest sometime soon. Don't be strangers, hear?
engSearchText:
I'm hoping to see Agnès and the rest sometime soon.
Don't be strangers, hear?
jpnChrName: ウフフ、またアニエスちゃんたちと 顔を見せに来て頂戴な♪
jpnSearchText:
ウフフ、またアニエスちゃんたちと
顔を見せに来て頂戴な♪

engChrName: A has been quite busy since the year started, don't you think?
engSearchText:
A has been quite busy since the year started, don't
you think?
jpnChrName: 今年に入ってからの《Ａ》の動きは ちょっと尋常じゃないものね。
jpnSearchText:
今年に入ってからの《Ａ》の動きは
ちょっと尋常じゃないものね。

engChrName: The streets are buzzing with gossip. Word is, a certain unsavory group is making moves right now.
engSearchText:
The streets are buzzing with gossip. Word is, a
certain unsavory group is making moves right now.
jpnChrName: “裏”もかなり賑わってきているし、 いくつかの勢力が動き始めてるみたい。
jpnSearchText:
“裏”もかなり賑わってきているし、
いくつかの勢力が動き始めてるみたい。

engChrName: Do try to be careful, please?
engSearchText: Do try to be careful, please?
jpnChrName: ヴァンちゃん達も気を付けておいてね㈱
jpnSearchText: ヴァンちゃん達も気を付けておいてね㈱

engChrName: By the by, I hear that your new assistant has made her official debut?
engSearchText:
By the by, I hear that your new assistant has made her
official debut?
jpnChrName: それはそうと……新しい助手さんも 正式に着任したそうね？
jpnSearchText:
それはそうと……新しい助手さんも
正式に着任したそうね？

engChrName: I'd already met the Marduk concierge while we were in Tharbad, but I'd almost forgotten how much of a cutie pie she was!
engSearchText:
I'd already met the Marduk concierge while we were
in Tharbad, but I'd almost forgotten how much of a
cutie pie she was!
jpnChrName: ＭＫ社のＳＣ──サルバッドでも 顔を合わせてるけど、やっぱりキュートね♪
jpnSearchText:
ＭＫ社のＳＣ──サルバッドでも
顔を合わせてるけど、やっぱりキュートね♪

engChrName: You flatter me, Mr. Bermotti. I look forward to serving you however I can.
engSearchText:
You flatter me, Mr. Bermotti. I look forward to
serving you however I can.
jpnChrName: 恐縮です、ベルモッティ様も改めて よろしくお願いいたしますね。
jpnSearchText:
恐縮です、ベルモッティ様も改めて
よろしくお願いいたしますね。

engChrName: I'll be looking forward to it, too. You know you can always count on me to help where information's concerned.
engSearchText:
I'll be looking forward to it, too. You know you can
always count on me to help where
information's concerned.
jpnChrName: ええ、“情報屋”として 協力できる所もあるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、“情報屋”として
協力できる所もあるでしょう。

engChrName: But goodness me, Van. You're a devious devil, darling, prying such a lovely maiden from the world to slave away in that musty office of yours!
engSearchText:
But goodness me, Van. You're a devious devil,
darling, prying such a lovely maiden from the world
to slave away in that musty office of yours!
jpnChrName: それにしてもヴァンちゃんもやるわねぇ。 こんな子を事務所に引き抜くだなんて。
jpnSearchText:
それにしてもヴァンちゃんもやるわねぇ。
こんな子を事務所に引き抜くだなんて。

engChrName: You should stop putting on airs if that's the kinda bad jab you're gonna come up with.
engSearchText:
You should stop putting on airs if that's the kinda bad
jab you're gonna come up with.
jpnChrName: 人聞きの悪い事を言うなっ。 つーか経緯はとっくに掴んでんだろうが？
jpnSearchText:
人聞きの悪い事を言うなっ。
つーか経緯はとっくに掴んでんだろうが？

engChrName: Aww, come on. No need to be so harsh! Trying to make myself feel a little better here. I wish I had an in with Marduk, too.
engSearchText:
Aww, come on. No need to be so harsh! Trying to
make myself feel a little better here. I wish I had an in
with Marduk, too.
jpnChrName: やだ、ちょっと拗ねてみただけじゃない。 ＭＫとのコネクションはアタシも欲しかったし♪
jpnSearchText:
やだ、ちょっと拗ねてみただけじゃない。
ＭＫとのコネクションはアタシも欲しかったし♪

engChrName: (All of Mr. Arkride's acquaintances have been so nice and welcoming.)
engSearchText:
(All of Mr. Arkride's acquaintances have been so nice
and welcoming.)
jpnChrName: （ふふ……ヴァン様の身近な皆様は   どこか温かい方ばかりですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（ふふ……ヴァン様の身近な皆様は
どこか温かい方ばかりですね。）

engChrName: (Right? Though I don't think he'd agree with you.)
engSearchText: (Right? Though I don't think he'd agree with you.)
jpnChrName: （ええ、本当に。   ヴァンさんに聞いたら否定しそうですけど。）
jpnSearchText:
（ええ、本当に。
ヴァンさんに聞いたら否定しそうですけど。）

engChrName: How wonderful it was to see Shino come by today!
engSearchText: How wonderful it was to see Shino come by today!
jpnChrName: 今日はシノちゃんが顔を出してくれて アタシも嬉しかったわ。
jpnSearchText:
今日はシノちゃんが顔を出してくれて
アタシも嬉しかったわ。

engChrName: Business has been booming at Arkride Solutions, too.
engSearchText: Business has been booming at Arkride Solutions, too.
jpnChrName: 解決事務所もますます賑やかに なってきたみたいだし……
jpnSearchText:
解決事務所もますます賑やかに
なってきたみたいだし……

engChrName: You two will go so far, I tell you! And I am excited to see you make it. Don't forget your old friend Bermotti when you're at the top.
engSearchText:
You two will go so far, I tell you! And I am excited to
see you make it. Don't forget your old friend
Bermotti when you're at the top.
jpnChrName: どちらも今後が楽しみね。 ふふっ、また顔を出して頂戴な♪
jpnSearchText:
どちらも今後が楽しみね。
ふふっ、また顔を出して頂戴な♪

engChrName: I'm not the biggest fan of rainy days. It's gloomy out, and I hate seeing everyone with a frown on their face.
engSearchText:
I'm not the biggest fan of rainy days. It's gloomy out,
and I hate seeing everyone with a frown on their face.
jpnChrName: 雨の日は少ししんみりしちゃうわねぇ。 この街も、人の心も。
jpnSearchText:
雨の日は少ししんみりしちゃうわねぇ。
この街も、人の心も。

engChrName: I do hope you and Elaine are getting on okay, Van, darling.
engSearchText:
I do hope you and Elaine are getting on okay,
Van, darling.
jpnChrName: ……ヴァンちゃん、エレインちゃんとは 上手くやってるのかしら？
jpnSearchText:
……ヴァンちゃん、エレインちゃんとは
上手くやってるのかしら？

engChrName: What happened in Langport was quite heavy.
engSearchText: What happened in Langport was quite heavy.
jpnChrName: 煌都では色々あったみたいだけど。
jpnSearchText: 煌都では色々あったみたいだけど。

engChrName: Elaine's a regular here, yeah?
engSearchText: Elaine's a regular here, yeah?
jpnChrName: ああ……ってそういや あいつもここの常連だったか。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……ってそういや
あいつもここの常連だったか。

engChrName: Sure is. Perfect place for you to take her on a date, if you ask me. Unless you're avoiding her, that is.
engSearchText:
Sure is. Perfect place for you to take her on a date, if
you ask me. Unless you're avoiding her, that is.
jpnChrName: ええ、たまに顔を出してるわよ？ ヴァンちゃんが避けてるだけで。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、たまに顔を出してるわよ？
ヴァンちゃんが避けてるだけで。

engChrName: Speaking of frowns, that's a face unsuited for them. Why don't you try and cheer her up sometime? She always looks so lonely.
engSearchText:
Speaking of frowns, that's a face unsuited for them.
Why don't you try and cheer her up sometime?
She always looks so lonely.
jpnChrName: いつも寂しそうにしてるんだから── 少しは気にかけてあげたら？
jpnSearchText:
いつも寂しそうにしてるんだから──
少しは気にかけてあげたら？

engChrName: I'd love to, but it really ain't up to me. (She'd probably just nag my ears off.)
engSearchText:
I'd love to, but it really ain't up to me.
(She'd probably just nag my ears off.)
jpnChrName: そうしたいのは山々なんだがな…… （口煩く言われちまうし……）
jpnSearchText:
そうしたいのは山々なんだがな……
（口煩く言われちまうし……）

engChrName: (And, well...)
engSearchText: (And, well...)
jpnChrName: （それに、やっぱ俺は──）
jpnSearchText: （それに、やっぱ俺は──）

engChrName: That's all right, darling. I'll stay out of your private business.
engSearchText:
That's all right, darling. I'll stay out of your
private business.
jpnChrName: ふふっ……余計なお世話、だったみたいね。
jpnSearchText: ふふっ……余計なお世話、だったみたいね。

engChrName: Sorry. Didn't mean to bring up such a touchy subject.
engSearchText: Sorry. Didn't mean to bring up such a touchy subject.
jpnChrName: ごめんなさい。 気にしないで、ヴァンちゃん。
jpnSearchText:
ごめんなさい。
気にしないで、ヴァンちゃん。

engChrName: Nah, it's fine. I'm not really avoiding her, either. We've been runnin' into each other a lot lately.
engSearchText:
Nah, it's fine. I'm not really avoiding her, either.
We've been runnin' into each other a lot lately.
jpnChrName: いや、いいさ。 確かに最近顔を合わせる機会もあったし──
jpnSearchText:
いや、いいさ。
確かに最近顔を合わせる機会もあったし──

engChrName: (Not like that's gone well at all, but yeah...)
engSearchText: (Not like that's gone well at all, but yeah...)
jpnChrName: （とはいえ億劫なんだよなぁ、単純に。）
jpnSearchText: （とはいえ億劫なんだよなぁ、単純に。）

engChrName: (You two still have a long ways to go.)
engSearchText: (You two still have a long ways to go.)
jpnChrName: （ふう、和解にはまだ遠いみたいね……）
jpnSearchText: （ふう、和解にはまだ遠いみたいね……）

engChrName: I maintain a good relationship with the guild, so bracers pop in from time to time.
engSearchText:
I maintain a good relationship with the guild, so
bracers pop in from time to time.
jpnChrName: ウチはギルドとも多少付き合いがあるし、 個人的に寄ってくれる遊撃士もいるわ。
jpnSearchText:
ウチはギルドとも多少付き合いがあるし、
個人的に寄ってくれる遊撃士もいるわ。

engChrName: I've had Zin and Elaine over, and even Kilika has come over with one of her subordinates from the CID.
engSearchText:
I've had Zin and Elaine over, and even Kilika has
come over with one of her subordinates from
the CID.
jpnChrName: ジンさんにエレインちゃん…… ＣＩＤのキリカ室長も部下と来た事があるわね。
jpnSearchText:
ジンさんにエレインちゃん……
ＣＩＤのキリカ室長も部下と来た事があるわね。

engChrName: The rest of my regular clientele is largely made up of black market merchants, gangsters, and other information brokers.
engSearchText:
The rest of my regular clientele is largely made up of
black market merchants, gangsters, and other
information brokers.
jpnChrName: あとは闇稼業や裏社会の住民、 他の情報屋なんかも常連客かしら㈱
jpnSearchText:
あとは闇稼業や裏社会の住民、
他の情報屋なんかも常連客かしら㈱

engChrName: Probably not a boring day in sight, eh?
engSearchText: Probably not a boring day in sight, eh?
jpnChrName: 相変わらずカオスだよな、この店もよ。
jpnSearchText: 相変わらずカオスだよな、この店もよ。

engChrName: If it isn't my darling Van!
engSearchText: If it isn't my darling Van!
jpnChrName: あらヴァンちゃん、いらっしゃい。
jpnSearchText: あらヴァンちゃん、いらっしゃい。

engChrName: And it's wonderful seeing you, too, Agnès. Getting used to the job, I hope.
engSearchText:
And it's wonderful seeing you, too, Agnès.
Getting used to the job, I hope.
jpnChrName: アニエスちゃんも中々 バイトが板について来たみたいね？
jpnSearchText:
アニエスちゃんも中々
バイトが板について来たみたいね？

engChrName: I am, yes.
engSearchText: I am, yes.
jpnChrName: そ、そうでしょうか？
jpnSearchText: そ、そうでしょうか？

engChrName: And how's my darling Feri doing today? Hope your job's treating you well!
engSearchText:
And how's my darling Feri doing today? Hope your
job's treating you well!
jpnChrName: フェリちゃんも中々 バイトが板について来たみたいね？
jpnSearchText:
フェリちゃんも中々
バイトが板について来たみたいね？

engChrName: Yeah! It's been great!
engSearchText: Yeah! It's been great!
jpnChrName: えへへ、そうだと嬉しいですっ。
jpnSearchText: えへへ、そうだと嬉しいですっ。

engChrName: She's still only workin' with me part time, mind you.
engSearchText: She's still only workin' with me part time, mind you.
jpnChrName: まだまだ半人前未満だっつの。
jpnSearchText: まだまだ半人前未満だっつの。

engChrName: Look at you puttin' up the customer service face. Don't see that every day. Someone leave you a bad review or somethin'?
engSearchText:
Look at you puttin' up the customer service face.
Don't see that every day. Someone leave you a bad
review or somethin'?
jpnChrName: それはそうと、妙に気合い入ってるな？ 誰かの注文でも無さそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
それはそうと、妙に気合い入ってるな？
誰かの注文でも無さそうだが。

engChrName: You're alarmingly overeager today. What gives?
engSearchText: You're alarmingly overeager today. What gives?
jpnChrName: よお、妙に気合い入ってるな？ 誰かの注文でも無さそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
よお、妙に気合い入ってるな？
誰かの注文でも無さそうだが。

engChrName: I can't go on and get rusty here! Need to crack out the customer service skills every now and then, you know.
engSearchText:
I can't go on and get rusty here! Need to crack out the
customer service skills every now and then, you know.
jpnChrName: うふふ、練習よ練習。 実はちょっと腕を披露する機会があってね。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、練習よ練習。
実はちょっと腕を披露する機会があってね。

engChrName: Goodness, might this be the strapping young lad I've heard so much about?
engSearchText:
Goodness, might this be the strapping young lad I've
heard so much about?
jpnChrName: ──ってあら、 そちらのハンサム君が噂の？
jpnSearchText:
──ってあら、
そちらのハンサム君が噂の？

engChrName: I'm Aaron Wei. You must be Bermotti.
engSearchText: I'm Aaron Wei. You must be Bermotti.
jpnChrName: アーロン・ウェイだ。 そっちはベルモッティだったか。
jpnSearchText:
アーロン・ウェイだ。
そっちはベルモッティだったか。

engChrName: Jack and Halle told me about you. Said you were a top-class bartender—and information broker.
engSearchText:
Jack and Halle told me about you. Said you were a
top-class bartender—and information broker.
jpnChrName: ジャックたちから話は聞いてるぜ。 腕利きの情報屋兼バーテンがいるってな。
jpnSearchText:
ジャックたちから話は聞いてるぜ。
腕利きの情報屋兼バーテンがいるってな。

engChrName: *gasp* Mean! I can't believe Jack and Halle would just up and talk behind my back like that! That's classified info, tsk tsk.
engSearchText:
*gasp* Mean! I can't believe Jack and Halle would just
up and talk behind my back like that! That's classified
info, tsk tsk.
jpnChrName: んもう、ジャックにハルちゃんったら。 乙女の秘密を軽々しく喋っちゃうなんて。
jpnSearchText:
んもう、ジャックにハルちゃんったら。
乙女の秘密を軽々しく喋っちゃうなんて。

engChrName: But I guess I'll let this one slide for you, handsome.
engSearchText: But I guess I'll let this one slide for you, handsome.
jpnChrName: うふふ……でも良いわね、アナタ。
jpnSearchText: うふふ……でも良いわね、アナタ。

engChrName: I see the ambition and passion burning in those eyes. I can see why people have taken to calling you Langport's prodigy!
engSearchText:
I see the ambition and passion burning in those eyes.
I can see why people have taken to calling you
Langport's prodigy!
jpnChrName: 若くてしなやかで覇気のある佇まい── さすが煌都の麒麟児といった所かしら？
jpnSearchText:
若くてしなやかで覇気のある佇まい──
さすが煌都の麒麟児といった所かしら？

engChrName: It's whatever. People can call me whatever the hell they want.
engSearchText:
It's whatever. People can call me whatever the hell
they want.
jpnChrName: ハン、俺は俺だ。 周りがどう呼ぼうが知らねえけどな。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、俺は俺だ。
周りがどう呼ぼうが知らねえけどな。

engChrName: But I guess I should start networking here, too. I'm not in Langport anymore.
engSearchText:
But I guess I should start networking here, too.
I'm not in Langport anymore.
jpnChrName: ま、アウェイの首都でもそれなりに ヨロシクさせてもらうつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、アウェイの首都でもそれなりに
ヨロシクさせてもらうつもりだ。

engChrName: Let me know if you ever need a hand for anything. I'll scratch your back if you scratch mine.
engSearchText:
Let me know if you ever need a hand for anything.
I'll scratch your back if you scratch mine.
jpnChrName: 何か困ったことがあれば力になるぜ？ 代わりにアンタの力も貸してもらうがな。
jpnSearchText:
何か困ったことがあれば力になるぜ？
代わりにアンタの力も貸してもらうがな。

engChrName: Absolutely! I can do more than just give you a scratch, if you catch my drift.
engSearchText:
Absolutely! I can do more than just give you a scratch,
if you catch my drift.
jpnChrName: あらやだ、喜んで㈱ 俺様な所もキュンキュン来ちゃう。
jpnSearchText:
あらやだ、喜んで㈱
俺様な所もキュンキュン来ちゃう。

engChrName: (You must be thrilled to have another promising new hire, Van, darling.)
engSearchText:
(You must be thrilled to have another promising new
hire, Van, darling.)
jpnChrName: （──うふふ、ヴァンちゃん。   またもや有望な新人で良かったわね？）
jpnSearchText:
（──うふふ、ヴァンちゃん。
またもや有望な新人で良かったわね？）

engChrName: (He's still on probation, so don't go inflatin' his ego too badly. I already can't hear myself think over how loud it is.)
engSearchText:
(He's still on probation, so don't go inflatin' his ego
too badly. I already can't hear myself think over how
loud it is.)
jpnChrName: （フン、あくまで試用期間中だ。   調子づかせんじゃねえっての。）
jpnSearchText:
（フン、あくまで試用期間中だ。
調子づかせんじゃねえっての。）

engChrName: Hmm? (I wonder what's going on.)
engSearchText:
Hmm?
(I wonder what's going on.)
jpnChrName: へえ……？ （何かのイベントでもあんのかねぇ。）
jpnSearchText:
へえ……？
（何かのイベントでもあんのかねぇ。）

engChrName: Goodness, might this be the strapping young lad I've heard so much about?
engSearchText:
Goodness, might this be the strapping young lad I've
heard so much about?
jpnChrName: ──ってあら、 そちらのハンサム君が噂の？
jpnSearchText:
──ってあら、
そちらのハンサム君が噂の？

engChrName: I'm Aaron Wei. You must be Bermotti.
engSearchText: I'm Aaron Wei. You must be Bermotti.

jpnChrName: あらやだ、喜んで㈱ 俺様な所もキュンキュン来ちゃう。
jpnSearchText:
あらやだ、喜んで㈱
俺様な所もキュンキュン来ちゃう。

engChrName: (You must be thrilled to have another promising new hire, Van, darling.)
engSearchText:
(You must be thrilled to have another promising new
hire, Van, darling.)
jpnChrName: （──うふふ、ヴァンちゃん。   またもや有望な新人で良かったわね？）
jpnSearchText:
（──うふふ、ヴァンちゃん。
またもや有望な新人で良かったわね？）

engChrName: (He's still on probation, so don't go inflatin' his ego too badly. I already can't hear myself think over how loud it is.)
engSearchText:
(He's still on probation, so don't go inflatin' his ego
too badly. I already can't hear myself think over how
loud it is.)
jpnChrName: （フン、あくまで試用期間中だ。   調子づかせんじゃねえっての。）
jpnSearchText:
（フン、あくまで試用期間中だ。
調子づかせんじゃねえっての。）

engChrName: Arkride Solutions is getting livelier by the day!
engSearchText: Arkride Solutions is getting livelier by the day!
jpnChrName: うふふ、ヴァンちゃんの事務所も 中々賑やかになってきたじゃない。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、ヴァンちゃんの事務所も
中々賑やかになってきたじゃない。

engChrName: No job you won't be able to solve if you keep this hiring spree going on.
engSearchText:
No job you won't be able to solve if you keep this
hiring spree going on.
jpnChrName: この調子で助手さんが増えていったら 面倒そうな案件なんかも回せそうね㈱
jpnSearchText:
この調子で助手さんが増えていったら
面倒そうな案件なんかも回せそうね㈱

engChrName: Shut it. I don't even want to THINK about takin' on more staff...
engSearchText:
Shut it. I don't even want to THINK about takin' on
more staff...
jpnChrName: おいコラ、 何しれっと抜かしてやがる……
jpnSearchText:
おいコラ、
何しれっと抜かしてやがる……

engChrName: You leave Edith's goings-on to me, darling. I'll let you know if I catch wind of anything juicy.
engSearchText:
You leave Edith's goings-on to me, darling. I'll let
you know if I catch wind of anything juicy.
jpnChrName: うふふ、首都方面の情報は任せて。 何かあればすぐに連絡するから。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、首都方面の情報は任せて。
何かあればすぐに連絡するから。

engChrName: Oh, and don't forget to bring me a souvenir! I'd never say no to some high-end liquor!
engSearchText:
Oh, and don't forget to bring me a souvenir! I'd never
say no to some high-end liquor!
jpnChrName: そうそう、お土産ヨロシク㈱ 本場の高級白酒（パイチュウ）あたりで良いわよ。
jpnSearchText:
そうそう、お土産ヨロシク㈱
本場の高級白酒（パイチュウ）あたりで良いわよ。

engChrName: Aren't you demanding?
engSearchText: Aren't you demanding?
jpnChrName: ったく、ちゃっかりしてやがんな。
jpnSearchText: ったく、ちゃっかりしてやがんな。

engChrName: Welcome, welcome! Is this your new little helper?
engSearchText: Welcome, welcome! Is this your new little helper?
jpnChrName: あらいらっしゃい！ そっちが新しい助手の子ね？
jpnSearchText:
あらいらっしゃい！
そっちが新しい助手の子ね？

engChrName: My, you're even cuter than I'd heard! Any more pretty things like us on Van's arm and we'll have to start up our own club, won't we, Ferida?
engSearchText:
My, you're even cuter than I'd heard! Any more
pretty things like us on Van's arm and we'll have to
start up our own club, won't we, Ferida?
jpnChrName: ふふっ、噂以上にキュートな子じゃない♪ 乙女同士よろしくね、フェリーダちゃん！
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、噂以上にキュートな子じゃない♪
乙女同士よろしくね、フェリーダちゃん！

engChrName: Oh, for sure! (...So he'd be in the club, too?)
engSearchText:
Oh, for sure!
(...So he'd be in the club, too?)
jpnChrName: はいっ！ （って乙女同士……？　えっと……）
jpnSearchText:
はいっ！
（って乙女同士……？　えっと……）

engChrName: C'mon, you out to confuse ALL my part-timers?
engSearchText: C'mon, you out to confuse ALL my part-timers?
jpnChrName: ってわざと混乱させてんじゃねえよ。
jpnSearchText: ってわざと混乱させてんじゃねえよ。

engChrName: I know I was certainly confused when he said you two had a special relationship, ahaha.
engSearchText:
I know I was certainly confused when he said you two
had a special relationship, ahaha.
jpnChrName: あはは、私の時もそうでしたけど……
jpnSearchText: あはは、私の時もそうでしたけど……

engChrName: By the way, Bermotti. Do you have any new leads?
engSearchText: By the way, Bermotti. Do you have any new leads?
jpnChrName: そういえば、ベルモッティさん。 何か目新しい話が入ってたりしませんか？
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、ベルモッティさん。
何か目新しい話が入ってたりしませんか？

engChrName: Look at you, Agnès! Growing into your role of assistant quite nicely, are you?
engSearchText:
Look at you, Agnès! Growing into your role of
assistant quite nicely, are you?
jpnChrName: あら、アニエスちゃんから 振ってくれるなんて、助手らしくなったわね♪
jpnSearchText:
あら、アニエスちゃんから
振ってくれるなんて、助手らしくなったわね♪

engChrName: I don't have much in the way of new info, but I may have something to share with our new recruit here.
engSearchText:
I don't have much in the way of new info, but I may
have something to share with our new recruit here.
jpnChrName: そうね、特別耳よりってわけでもないけど フェリちゃんへの挨拶代わりに１つだけ。
jpnSearchText:
そうね、特別耳よりってわけでもないけど
フェリちゃんへの挨拶代わりに１つだけ。

engChrName: I heard that the Kruga corps are en route to the Central East. The Eisenschild have returned home, too.
engSearchText:
I heard that the Kruga corps are en route to the
Central East. The Eisenschild have returned
home, too.
jpnChrName: クルガ戦士団は中東方面に移動、 アイゼンシルトも拠点に帰還したようだけど。
jpnSearchText:
クルガ戦士団は中東方面に移動、
アイゼンシルトも拠点に帰還したようだけど。

engChrName: They took on a new job already. One of their units is on the move as we speak.
engSearchText:
They took on a new job already. One of their units is
on the move as we speak.
jpnChrName: どうやら新しい仕事を受けたみたいね。 一部の部隊が動いてるらしいわ。
jpnSearchText:
どうやら新しい仕事を受けたみたいね。
一部の部隊が動いてるらしいわ。

engChrName: Really? Wait—and it's already international news?
engSearchText: Really? Wait—and it's already international news?
jpnChrName: そうだったんですか── というか国外の情報まで……
jpnSearchText:
そうだったんですか──
というか国外の情報まで……

engChrName: I wouldn't call it that. Info like that is Bermotti's bread and butter.
engSearchText:
I wouldn't call it that. Info like that is Bermotti's
bread and butter.
jpnChrName: まあコイツにとっちゃ朝飯前だろ。
jpnSearchText: まあコイツにとっちゃ朝飯前だろ。

engChrName: You ain't gonna get better info in all of Edith. There's a reason I let this jerk harass me.
engSearchText:
You ain't gonna get better info in all of Edith.
There's a reason I let this jerk harass me.
jpnChrName: 首都内の情報なら精度もさらに高い。 ──利用価値は把握できたか？
jpnSearchText:
首都内の情報なら精度もさらに高い。
──利用価値は把握できたか？

engChrName: Oh, okay! Then we can come here anytime we need information!
engSearchText:
Oh, okay! Then we can come here anytime we
need information!
jpnChrName: 了解（ウーラ）っ！　現地の 情報提供者として活用します！
jpnSearchText:
了解（ウーラ）っ！　現地の
情報提供者として活用します！

engChrName: I'm more than just an informant, you know!
engSearchText: I'm more than just an informant, you know!
jpnChrName: ってなんか扱い酷くなーい！？
jpnSearchText: ってなんか扱い酷くなーい！？

engChrName: I guess I'll let it slide for you, missy. But only 'cause you're such a cutie pie, I couldn't be mad at you.
engSearchText:
I guess I'll let it slide for you, missy. But only 'cause
you're such a cutie pie, I couldn't be mad at you.
jpnChrName: んもう、イケズね。 まあいいんだけど。
jpnSearchText:
んもう、イケズね。
まあいいんだけど。

engChrName: With Calvard being the largest country in the continent, lots of information passes through the capital.
engSearchText:
With Calvard being the largest country in the
continent, lots of information passes through
the capital.
jpnChrName: 共和国は大陸最大の国家── 首都にいるだけで諸外国の情報も手に入るわ。
jpnSearchText:
共和国は大陸最大の国家──
首都にいるだけで諸外国の情報も手に入るわ。

engChrName: Come by and give me a visit if you ever need anything! Even if that anything is just more of yours truly.
engSearchText:
Come by and give me a visit if you ever
need anything! Even if that anything is just more of
yours truly.
jpnChrName: 必要になったらいつでもいらっしゃい♪ モチロン遊びに来るだけでも大歓迎よ！
jpnSearchText:
必要になったらいつでもいらっしゃい♪
モチロン遊びに来るだけでも大歓迎よ！

engChrName: Okay! I'll come by later, then!
engSearchText: Okay! I'll come by later, then!
jpnChrName: わかりましたっ！ また来ますね、ベルモッティさん！
jpnSearchText:
わかりましたっ！
また来ますね、ベルモッティさん！

engChrName: It's been ten days since the incident. The streets are finally returning to normal.
engSearchText:
It's been ten days since the incident. The streets are
finally returning to normal.
jpnChrName: あの事件から十日── “裏”の方も落ち着いてはいるわね。
jpnSearchText:
あの事件から十日──
“裏”の方も落ち着いてはいるわね。

engChrName: I'd be more than happy to help if you need anything else. Stop by and visit anytime, hear?
engSearchText:
I'd be more than happy to help if you need
anything else. Stop by and visit anytime, hear?
jpnChrName: まあまた機会があれば協力してあげるわ。 いつでも訪ねてらっしゃい㈱
jpnSearchText:
まあまた機会があれば協力してあげるわ。
いつでも訪ねてらっしゃい㈱

engChrName: My, my! Glad to have you join us today, Van! We needed a few more cuties to round out the Cuties Club meeting.
engSearchText:
My, my! Glad to have you join us today, Van!
We needed a few more cuties to round out the Cuties
Club meeting.
jpnChrName: あらヴァンちゃん達、 乙女の女子会へようこそ㈱
jpnSearchText:
あらヴァンちゃん達、
乙女の女子会へようこそ㈱

engChrName: Heya. And hi, Shino. Didn't expect to catch you here. Feels weird seein' you on the other side of the counter.
engSearchText:
Heya. And hi, Shino. Didn't expect to catch
you here. Feels weird seein' you on the other side of
the counter.
jpnChrName: ベルモッティ、それにシノか。 客として来てんのは新鮮ではあるな。
jpnSearchText:
ベルモッティ、それにシノか。
客として来てんのは新鮮ではあるな。

engChrName: Today's my day off, actually.
engSearchText: Today's my day off, actually.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、今日はオフです。
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、今日はオフです。

engChrName: I figured I would take the chance to congratulate my former boss on winning runner-up in his bartending competition.
engSearchText:
I figured I would take the chance to congratulate my
former boss on winning runner-up in his
bartending competition.
jpnChrName: 先輩のバーテンダー大会・準優勝の お祝いも兼ねて。
jpnSearchText:
先輩のバーテンダー大会・準優勝の
お祝いも兼ねて。

engChrName: Oh, please. I told you not to fuss about that. Your presence is all I need.
engSearchText:
Oh, please. I told you not to fuss about that.
Your presence is all I need.
jpnChrName: いいって言ってるのに。 シノも義理堅いわねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
いいって言ってるのに。
シノも義理堅いわねぇ。

engChrName: Is that so? Well, maybe I'll stop by more often, then. ♪
engSearchText: Is that so? Well, maybe I'll stop by more often, then. ♪
jpnChrName: 当然です、ベルモッティさん♪
jpnSearchText: 当然です、ベルモッティさん♪

engChrName: Congratulations again, Bermotti!
engSearchText: Congratulations again, Bermotti!
jpnChrName: ふふっ、改めて 準優勝おめでとうございます。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、改めて
準優勝おめでとうございます。

engChrName: I had no idea you two were friends, or that Shino used to work for you.
engSearchText:
I had no idea you two were friends, or that Shino
used to work for you.
jpnChrName: それにお二人は仲がよろしいんですね。 シノさんがベルモッティさんの後輩だったなんて。
jpnSearchText:
それにお二人は仲がよろしいんですね。
シノさんがベルモッティさんの後輩だったなんて。

engChrName: That she did, and what a pleasant half a year it was! My sharp eyes immediately noticed her potential as a bartender.
engSearchText:
That she did, and what a pleasant half a year it was!
My sharp eyes immediately noticed her potential as
a bartender.
jpnChrName: ええ、ウチで半年くらいかしら。 シノちゃんのセンスは折り紙つきよ♪
jpnSearchText:
ええ、ウチで半年くらいかしら。
シノちゃんのセンスは折り紙つきよ♪

engChrName: I know you've been really busy since you went solo, Shino, dear, but I know it's nothing you can't handle.
engSearchText:
I know you've been really busy since you went solo,
Shino, dear, but I know it's nothing you can't handle.
jpnChrName: 独立してからは忙しそうだけど、 アナタならきっと大丈夫。
jpnSearchText:
独立してからは忙しそうだけど、
アナタならきっと大丈夫。

engChrName: I hope you have just as much faith in your abilities as I do. Someone like you deserves to make a name for herself.
engSearchText:
I hope you have just as much faith in your abilities as
I do. Someone like you deserves to make a name
for herself.
jpnChrName: 信じて進みなさい、シノちゃん㈱
jpnSearchText: 信じて進みなさい、シノちゃん㈱

engChrName: Oh.
engSearchText: Oh.
jpnChrName: はい……
jpnSearchText: はい……

engChrName: Thank you, Bermotti. For everything. I'll keep working hard, and maybe next time I'll have something to show for it.
engSearchText:
Thank you, Bermotti. For everything. I'll keep working
hard, and maybe next time I'll have something to show
for it.
jpnChrName: ありがとうございます、先輩。 いい報告ができるように頑張ります♪
jpnSearchText:
ありがとうございます、先輩。
いい報告ができるように頑張ります♪

engChrName: (That pep talk sure perked her up. Good. She's got a lot of potential in her.)
engSearchText:
(That pep talk sure perked her up. Good. She's got a
lot of potential in her.)
jpnChrName: （シノにとってもいい息抜きみたいだな。   今後とも楽しみだぜ。）
jpnSearchText:
（シノにとってもいい息抜きみたいだな。
今後とも楽しみだぜ。）

engChrName: Dingo? What are you doing here?
engSearchText: Dingo? What are you doing here?
jpnChrName: なんだ、ディンゴも来てたのか。
jpnSearchText: なんだ、ディンゴも来てたのか。

engChrName: Good to see you, Van, darling! Long day, yeah?
engSearchText: Good to see you, Van, darling! Long day, yeah?
jpnChrName: うふふ、いらっしゃいヴァンちゃん㈱ さぞお疲れなんじゃない？
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、いらっしゃいヴァンちゃん㈱
さぞお疲れなんじゃない？

engChrName: I just finished work a bit ago and was taking some time to check my messages.
engSearchText:
I just finished work a bit ago and was taking some
time to check my messages.
jpnChrName: 俺もちょうど一仕事終えた所でな。 メールは今しがた確認させてもらった。
jpnSearchText:
俺もちょうど一仕事終えた所でな。
メールは今しがた確認させてもらった。

engChrName: I'll be sure to send you any info I dig up around Edith straight away while you're gone.
engSearchText:
I'll be sure to send you any info I dig up around Edith
straight away while you're gone.
jpnChrName: 留守中、首都方面で引っかかった情報は すぐに送ってやろう。
jpnSearchText:
留守中、首都方面で引っかかった情報は
すぐに送ってやろう。

engChrName: 'Preciate you cuttin' to the chase. This is Almata I'm dealin' with, after all.
engSearchText:
'Preciate you cuttin' to the chase. This is Almata I'm
dealin' with, after all.
jpnChrName: 話が早くて助かるぜ。 何せ相手が相手（アルマータ）だからな。
jpnSearchText:
話が早くて助かるぜ。
何せ相手が相手（アルマータ）だからな。

engChrName: They're on Heiyue turf. If Heiyue's guys can handle it on their own until Cao gets back, things should be fine.
engSearchText:
They're on Heiyue turf. If Heiyue's guys can handle it
on their own until Cao gets back, things should
be fine.
jpnChrName: ま、黒月（ヘイユエ）の本拠地だし、ツァオのヤツが 戻ってくるまで凌げりゃ御の字だろうが。
jpnSearchText:
ま、黒月（ヘイユエ）の本拠地だし、ツァオのヤツが
戻ってくるまで凌げりゃ御の字だろうが。

engChrName: The White Orchid Dragon's been popping up a lot as of late.
engSearchText:
The White Orchid Dragon's been popping up a lot as
of late.
jpnChrName: 《白蘭竜（はくらんりゅう）》さんねぇ…… 最近、ますます頭角を現してるみたいだけど。
jpnSearchText:
《白蘭竜（はくらんりゅう）》さんねぇ……
最近、ますます頭角を現してるみたいだけど。

engChrName: I wouldn't rest on my laurels on this one, Van. If Cao's the one asking, things are bound to get ugly.
engSearchText:
I wouldn't rest on my laurels on this one, Van.
If Cao's the one asking, things are bound to get ugly.
jpnChrName: 彼からの依頼って時点で、どうあっても 単純な仕事（ヤマ）にはならないんじゃないの？
jpnSearchText:
彼からの依頼って時点で、どうあっても
単純な仕事（ヤマ）にはならないんじゃないの？

engChrName: Tch. Can't a man hope for an easy job every now and then?
engSearchText:
Tch. Can't a man hope for an easy job every now
and then?
jpnChrName: ぐっ……わーってるっつの。 せめてもの希望的観測くらいさせやがれ。
jpnSearchText:
ぐっ……わーってるっつの。
せめてもの希望的観測くらいさせやがれ。

engChrName: Hmm. The Lu family should be trustworthy to a certain degree...
engSearchText:
Hmm. The Lu family should be trustworthy to a
certain degree...
jpnChrName: ふむ、黒月のルウ家なら ある程度は信用してもよさそうだが……
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、黒月のルウ家なら
ある程度は信用してもよさそうだが……

engChrName: ...but don't let your guard down. You'll be taking your new assistants into the Heiyue snake pit, after all.
engSearchText:
...but don't let your guard down. You'll be taking your
new assistants into the Heiyue snake pit, after all.
jpnChrName: お前も今は助手持ちだ。 用心するに越したことはないだろう。
jpnSearchText:
お前も今は助手持ちだ。
用心するに越したことはないだろう。

engChrName: Though if you get in a bind, you know who you can turn to. I'm sure he hasn't lost his edge after all these years.
engSearchText:
Though if you get in a bind, you know who you can
turn to. I'm sure he hasn't lost his edge after all
these years.
jpnChrName: いざとなれば“彼”をアテにするといい。 腕は落ちていないはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
いざとなれば“彼”をアテにするといい。
腕は落ちていないはずだ。

engChrName: Yeah, I was plannin' on reaching out to him anyway. I just hope he hasn't drunk himself into the gutter.
engSearchText:
Yeah, I was plannin' on reaching out to him anyway.
I just hope he hasn't drunk himself into the gutter.
jpnChrName: ああ、元よりそのつもりだぜ。 飲んだくれが進行してなきゃいいんだが。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、元よりそのつもりだぜ。
飲んだくれが進行してなきゃいいんだが。

engChrName: Ooh, I know who we're talking about! I met him myself a year or so back.
engSearchText:
Ooh, I know who we're talking about! I met him
myself a year or so back.
jpnChrName: うふふ、“彼”ね。 アタシも一昨年会ったくらいかしら。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、“彼”ね。
アタシも一昨年会ったくらいかしら。

engChrName: You won't find him at the bottom of a bottle for once! That cute little assistant of his got him behaving for once.
engSearchText:
You won't find him at the bottom of a bottle
for once! That cute little assistant of his got him
behaving for once.
jpnChrName: 相変わらず可愛らしいお尻に敷かれてそうだし、 そこまでは心配いらないんじゃない？
jpnSearchText:
相変わらず可愛らしいお尻に敷かれてそうだし、
そこまでは心配いらないんじゃない？

engChrName: And I ain't letting him live that down once I get to Langport.
engSearchText:
And I ain't letting him live that down once I get
to Langport.
jpnChrName: クク、そうだな。 煌都で会ったら精々イジってやるか。
jpnSearchText:
クク、そうだな。
煌都で会ったら精々イジってやるか。

engChrName: Might just be what I need to turn my losin' streak around and let him have a taste of his own medicine.
engSearchText:
Might just be what I need to turn my losin' streak
around and let him have a taste of his own medicine.
jpnChrName: 折角だし、負け越してる勝負の方も そろそろひっくり返してやるぜ……！
jpnSearchText:
折角だし、負け越してる勝負の方も
そろそろひっくり返してやるぜ……！

engChrName: (Like you're any different. Agnès has you on a tighter leash, too.)
engSearchText:
(Like you're any different. Agnès has you on a tighter
leash, too.)
jpnChrName: （やれやれ、アニエス嬢の事を考えると   ブーメランになりそうな気もするが。）
jpnSearchText:
（やれやれ、アニエス嬢の事を考えると
ブーメランになりそうな気もするが。）

engChrName: (He and Van are almost like peas in a pod, and neither of them would ever realize—or admit it.)
engSearchText:
(He and Van are almost like peas in a pod, and
neither of them would ever realize—or admit it.)
jpnChrName: （うふふ、“彼”と同じく、   ヴァンちゃんもその辺は大概だからねぇ。）
jpnSearchText:
（うふふ、“彼”と同じく、
ヴァンちゃんもその辺は大概だからねぇ。）

engChrName: Pleasure to see you again, Van.
engSearchText: Pleasure to see you again, Van.
jpnChrName: あらヴァンさん、また会ったわね。
jpnSearchText: あらヴァンさん、また会ったわね。

engChrName: Good on you for coming, darling! We just got started here.
engSearchText:
Good on you for coming, darling! We just got
started here.
jpnChrName: うふふ、ついさっき こちらも開けたばかりでね㈱
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、ついさっき
こちらも開けたばかりでね㈱

engChrName: And I'm on my way out.
engSearchText: And I'm on my way out.
jpnChrName: ──そんじゃ邪魔したな。
jpnSearchText: ──そんじゃ邪魔したな。

engChrName: Haha! Come on, Arkride. Why not join us for a little chat?
engSearchText:
Haha! Come on, Arkride. Why not join us for a
little chat?
jpnChrName: クカカ……！ ゆっくりしてけや、アークライド。
jpnSearchText:
クカカ……！
ゆっくりしてけや、アークライド。

engChrName: Haven't seen you since Oración. I bet we got loads to catch up on.
engSearchText:
Haven't seen you since Oración. I bet we got loads to
catch up on.
jpnChrName: あの狂乱のオラシオンぶりじゃねえか。 少しは付き合っていけよ。
jpnSearchText:
あの狂乱のオラシオンぶりじゃねえか。
少しは付き合っていけよ。

engChrName: How about no.
engSearchText: How about no.
jpnChrName: チッ……
jpnSearchText: チッ……

engChrName: A temporary truce doesn't mean I'm lookin' to make friends with you.
engSearchText:
A temporary truce doesn't mean I'm lookin' to make
friends with you.
jpnChrName: アンタらとは協力したが 馴れ合ったつもりは１リジュもねぇぞ。
jpnSearchText:
アンタらとは協力したが
馴れ合ったつもりは１リジュもねぇぞ。

engChrName: 'Sides, I'm still pissed at the pay cut I took because of you.
engSearchText:
'Sides, I'm still pissed at the pay cut I took because
of you.
jpnChrName: 振り込まれた古都出張の報酬額も 微妙に減らしてきやがったしな。
jpnSearchText:
振り込まれた古都出張の報酬額も
微妙に減らしてきやがったしな。

engChrName: Sorry, nothing you can do 'bout that. It was the big dog's decision. Compensation for me and Lucrezia's troubles. I'm sure you understand.
engSearchText:
Sorry, nothing you can do 'bout that. It was the big
dog's decision. Compensation for me and
Lucrezia's troubles. I'm sure you understand.
jpnChrName: クク、ありゃ旦那の判断だ。 俺とルクレツィアの協力代ってな。
jpnSearchText:
クク、ありゃ旦那の判断だ。
俺とルクレツィアの協力代ってな。

engChrName: I'm supposed to tell you it wasn't payback for messin' with his plan.
engSearchText:
I'm supposed to tell you it wasn't payback for messin'
with his plan.
jpnChrName: 仕込みを見抜かれた腹いせじゃねえとは 伝えとくように言われたぜ。
jpnSearchText:
仕込みを見抜かれた腹いせじゃねえとは
伝えとくように言われたぜ。

engChrName: How very like him.
engSearchText: How very like him.
jpnChrName: ふう、あの人らしいわねぇ。
jpnSearchText: ふう、あの人らしいわねぇ。

engChrName: I've heard the rumors. He definitely makes an impression!
engSearchText:
I've heard the rumors. He definitely makes
an impression!
jpnChrName: 噂には聞いていたけど…… ホント、刺激的なヒトみたいねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
噂には聞いていたけど……
ホント、刺激的なヒトみたいねぇ。

engChrName: We had our fun, but I ain't looking to make friends.
engSearchText: We had our fun, but I ain't looking to make friends.
jpnChrName: アンタらとはやり合ったし 馴れ合ったつもりは１リジュもねぇぞ。
jpnSearchText:
アンタらとはやり合ったし
馴れ合ったつもりは１リジュもねぇぞ。

engChrName: My thanks go as far as you sendin' over the full payment for the Oración gig.
engSearchText:
My thanks go as far as you sendin' over the full
payment for the Oración gig.
jpnChrName: 古都出張の報酬をきっちり満額、 振り込んだのは評価してやるが。
jpnSearchText:
古都出張の報酬をきっちり満額、
振り込んだのは評価してやるが。

engChrName: Heh. The boss enjoyed himself a fair bit. Don't be surprised if you see a neat little bonus come your way.
engSearchText:
Heh. The boss enjoyed himself a fair bit. Don't be
surprised if you see a neat little bonus come your way.
jpnChrName: クク、旦那も随分楽しんでたし、 お捻りも兼ねてではあるんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
クク、旦那も随分楽しんでたし、
お捻りも兼ねてではあるんだろう。

engChrName: He was gonna pay you anyway, whether you figured out his plan or not.
engSearchText:
He was gonna pay you anyway, whether you figured
out his plan or not.
jpnChrName: 仕掛けを見抜かれなかったとしても 支払うつもりだったみてぇだしな。
jpnSearchText:
仕掛けを見抜かれなかったとしても
支払うつもりだったみてぇだしな。

engChrName: Oh. But if he hadn't...
engSearchText: Oh. But if he hadn't...
jpnChrName: えっと、それって……
jpnSearchText: えっと、それって……

engChrName: Van here would've sadly found himself too... indisposed to enjoy his paycheck.
engSearchText:
Van here would've sadly found himself too...
indisposed to enjoy his paycheck.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんたちが全滅したとしても 口座に振り込んだって事でしょうねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんたちが全滅したとしても
口座に振り込んだって事でしょうねぇ。

engChrName: The hell is his problem?!
engSearchText: The hell is his problem?!
jpnChrName: ああもう、なんだあのオッサンは……！
jpnSearchText: ああもう、なんだあのオッサンは……！

engChrName: You look like a saint by comparison! Bastard didn't even care about all those lives, did he?
engSearchText:
You look like a saint by comparison! Bastard didn't
even care about all those lives, did he?
jpnChrName: まさか、アンタの方が遙かにマシに思える 人間がいるなんて思いもしなかったぞ！？
jpnSearchText:
まさか、アンタの方が遙かにマシに思える
人間がいるなんて思いもしなかったぞ！？

engChrName: Like Retzy and I were sayin', that guy's pure poison.
engSearchText: Like Retzy and I were sayin', that guy's pure poison.
jpnChrName: クク、だから言っただろうが、 最悪にして猛毒のオヤジだってな。
jpnSearchText:
クク、だから言っただろうが、
最悪にして猛毒のオヤジだってな。

engChrName: That Dantès, though. Now there's a real son of a bitch.
engSearchText:
That Dantès, though. Now there's a real son of
a bitch.
jpnChrName: あのジェラールってのも 相当イッちまったヤツだったが。
jpnSearchText:
あのジェラールってのも
相当イッちまったヤツだったが。

engChrName: That Dantès, though. Now there's a real son of a bitch.
engSearchText:
That Dantès, though. Now there's a real son of
a bitch.
jpnChrName: あのジェラールってのも相当、 イッちまったヤツだったみてぇだが。
jpnSearchText:
あのジェラールってのも相当、
イッちまったヤツだったみてぇだが。

engChrName: Bastard's in a league all of his own—even when compared to an Anguis.
engSearchText:
Bastard's in a league all of his own—even when
compared to an Anguis.
jpnChrName: 別ベクトルで振り切ってるのは確かだろ。 《使徒》の中でもぶっちぎりにな。
jpnSearchText:
別ベクトルで振り切ってるのは確かだろ。
《使徒》の中でもぶっちぎりにな。

engChrName: You're joking.
engSearchText: You're joking.
jpnChrName: 洒落になってねぇぞ……
jpnSearchText: 洒落になってねぇぞ……

engChrName: Oh, I feel faint. I'm not sure how much more I can take hearing about him before my heart gives out...
engSearchText:
Oh, I feel faint. I'm not sure how much more I can
take hearing about him before my heart gives out...
jpnChrName: うーん、これ以上話を聞いていいか ちょっとドキドキしてきちゃったけど……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、これ以上話を聞いていいか
ちょっとドキドキしてきちゃったけど……

engChrName: While I'm no saint, it's a small comfort knowing I don't quite compare to the heights of this madman.
engSearchText:
While I'm no saint, it's a small comfort knowing I
don't quite compare to the heights of this madman.
jpnChrName: ま、倫理のネジは外れてるけど無差別の 殺人狂じゃないのがせめてもの救いかしら？
jpnSearchText:
ま、倫理のネジは外れてるけど無差別の
殺人狂じゃないのがせめてもの救いかしら？

engChrName: For a lapdog, you sure do love pulling at your master's leash.
engSearchText:
For a lapdog, you sure do love pulling at your
master's leash.
jpnChrName: といっても盟主（マスター）の課した“一線”を 踏み越えるギリギリを愉しんでるフシはあるけど。
jpnSearchText:
といっても盟主（マスター）の課した“一線”を
踏み越えるギリギリを愉しんでるフシはあるけど。

engChrName: It'll slip right out of his hands soon enough.
engSearchText: It'll slip right out of his hands soon enough.
jpnChrName: クク、確かにそれっぽいよな。 踏み越えんのも時間の問題な気もするが。
jpnSearchText:
クク、確かにそれっぽいよな。
踏み越えんのも時間の問題な気もするが。

engChrName: Please keep me far, FAR away from that business whenever that happens.
engSearchText:
Please keep me far, FAR away from that business
whenever that happens.
jpnChrName: そういう話は内輪だけでやれ、内輪だけで！
jpnSearchText: そういう話は内輪だけでやれ、内輪だけで！

engChrName: My, my, this info is solid gold! Too bad I'll have to keep mum about it, or I might not enjoy my life for much longer.
engSearchText:
My, my, this info is solid gold! Too bad I'll have to
keep mum about it, or I might not enjoy my life for
much longer.
jpnChrName: ああもう、情報屋として得難いネタだけど 扱うにはちょっとリスク高すぎィィ～……！
jpnSearchText:
ああもう、情報屋として得難いネタだけど
扱うにはちょっとリスク高すぎィィ～……！

engChrName: Are that walkin' disaster of a man and the Golden Butterfly in Edith?
engSearchText:
Are that walkin' disaster of a man and the Golden
Butterfly in Edith?
jpnChrName: ったく……つうか当の災厄オヤジと 黄金蝶は首都には来てねえのかよ？
jpnSearchText:
ったく……つうか当の災厄オヤジと
黄金蝶は首都には来てねえのかよ？

engChrName: Who knows? I haven't heard from 'em since Oración.
engSearchText: Who knows? I haven't heard from 'em since Oración.
jpnChrName: さあな、オラシオンで別れたきり、 別に連絡も取り合っちゃいねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
さあな、オラシオンで別れたきり、
別に連絡も取り合っちゃいねぇ。

engChrName: Probably out, reporting to the big boss. Don't get comfortable, though. Can't imagine they're gonna keep away for long.
engSearchText:
Probably out, reporting to the big boss. Don't get
comfortable, though. Can't imagine they're gonna
keep away for long.
jpnChrName: ま、“上”への報告かもしれねぇが どうせ近いうちに顔を出すんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
ま、“上”への報告かもしれねぇが
どうせ近いうちに顔を出すんじゃねえか？

engChrName: This year's Revolution Festival is shaping up to be quite the spectacle, eh?
engSearchText:
This year's Revolution Festival is shaping up to be
quite the spectacle, eh?
jpnChrName: なにせ今年の革命記念祭とやらは 色々イキって盛り上がりそうだしよ。
jpnSearchText:
なにせ今年の革命記念祭とやらは
色々イキって盛り上がりそうだしよ。

engChrName: Son of a bitch.
engSearchText: Son of a bitch.
jpnChrName: そいつは……
jpnSearchText: そいつは……

engChrName: It's been the talk of the town as of late.
engSearchText: It's been the talk of the town as of late.
jpnChrName: ……それは既に 各方面で言われている事ではあるわね。
jpnSearchText:
……それは既に
各方面で言われている事ではあるわね。

engChrName: Do you mean about Calvard finally overtaking Erebonia in terms of sheer power?
engSearchText:
Do you mean about Calvard finally overtaking
Erebonia in terms of sheer power?
jpnChrName: 帝国を追い越して大陸随一の超大国に なりつつあるカルバードの今後、か。
jpnSearchText:
帝国を追い越して大陸随一の超大国に
なりつつあるカルバードの今後、か。

engChrName: President Gramheart is many things, but a boring man he is not.
engSearchText:
President Gramheart is many things, but a boring
man he is not.
jpnChrName: 色々な意味で興味深い人ね── ロイ・グラムハート大統領閣下は。
jpnSearchText:
色々な意味で興味深い人ね──
ロイ・グラムハート大統領閣下は。

engChrName: That's one way of puttin' it.
engSearchText: That's one way of puttin' it.
jpnChrName: ……まあ、な。
jpnSearchText: ……まあ、な。

engChrName: By the way, weren't you goin' back to the dorms with Agnès?
engSearchText:
By the way, weren't you goin' back to the dorms
with Agnès?
jpnChrName: ってそういや、しれっと居るが アニエスと寮に戻ったんじゃねえのか？
jpnSearchText:
ってそういや、しれっと居るが
アニエスと寮に戻ったんじゃねえのか？

engChrName: Shouldn't you be studying or somethin'? Lot more interesting stuff to do with life than hang out with this bag of bones.
engSearchText:
Shouldn't you be studying or somethin'? Lot more
interesting stuff to do with life than hang out with
this bag of bones.
jpnChrName: なんで最悪よりマシってだけの迷惑オヤジと プチ同窓会をしてやがるんだ、不良学生。
jpnSearchText:
なんで最悪よりマシってだけの迷惑オヤジと
プチ同窓会をしてやがるんだ、不良学生。

engChrName: Watch it, Arkride.
engSearchText: Watch it, Arkride.
jpnChrName: アークライド、てめぇ……
jpnSearchText: アークライド、てめぇ……

engChrName: Walter reached out to me right after I arrived.
engSearchText: Walter reached out to me right after I arrived.
jpnChrName: うふふ、寮に帰ったところで ちょうど連絡があってね。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、寮に帰ったところで
ちょうど連絡があってね。

engChrName: He has some information I'm interested in hearing, so I figured a meetup would be worthwhile.
engSearchText:
He has some information I'm interested in hearing,
so I figured a meetup would be worthwhile.
jpnChrName: 気になる情報も持ってきてくれたから 折角だし付き合ってあげることにしたの。
jpnSearchText:
気になる情報も持ってきてくれたから
折角だし付き合ってあげることにしたの。

engChrName: And you needn't worry. I made sure to file the proper curfew extension, so I can stay out as late as I please.
engSearchText:
And you needn't worry. I made sure to file the proper
curfew extension, so I can stay out as late as I please.
jpnChrName: ちなみに今回もちゃんと 夜間の外出届は出しているわよ？
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに今回もちゃんと
夜間の外出届は出しているわよ？

engChrName: The hell kinda school are they even runnin' in there?!
engSearchText:
The hell kinda school are they even runnin'
in there?!
jpnChrName: だからどんだけ緩くなってんだよ、 アラミス学生寮の寮則は……！？
jpnSearchText:
だからどんだけ緩くなってんだよ、
アラミス学生寮の寮則は……！？

engChrName: Calm yourself, Van, darling.
engSearchText: Calm yourself, Van, darling.
jpnChrName: ヴァンちゃん、どうどう。
jpnSearchText: ヴァンちゃん、どうどう。

engChrName: No need to get your panties in a bunch. 'S not like I'm takin' her drinking or anything, so don't worry about that.
engSearchText:
No need to get your panties in a bunch. 'S not like
I'm takin' her drinking or anything, so don't worry
about that.
jpnChrName: クク、まあ酒は勧めちゃいねぇから そこは安心しとけや。
jpnSearchText:
クク、まあ酒は勧めちゃいねぇから
そこは安心しとけや。

engChrName: Huh? Where am I...? Wait! Wh-What date is it?!
engSearchText: Huh? Where am I...? Wait! Wh-What date is it?!
jpnChrName: はれぇ？　ここどこ～？ ……今日は何年の何日だっけ～？？
jpnSearchText:
はれぇ？　ここどこ～？
……今日は何年の何日だっけ～？？

engChrName: You're hardly halfway out of slumberland... Anyway, don't worry, Ms. Cocona. You just focus on getting your rest in.
engSearchText:
You're hardly halfway out of slumberland...
Anyway, don't worry, Ms. Cocona. You just focus
on getting your rest in.
jpnChrName: 先生、完全に寝ぼけてますね…… ……いえ、この際もう少し寝ていた方が……
jpnSearchText:
先生、完全に寝ぼけてますね……
……いえ、この際もう少し寝ていた方が……

engChrName: I'll stand watch and protect you!
engSearchText: I'll stand watch and protect you!
jpnChrName: 先生の事は自分が 責任を持ってお守りしますから！！
jpnSearchText:
先生の事は自分が
責任を持ってお守りしますから！！

engChrName: Hmm... Y'will? Great... Zzz...
engSearchText: Hmm... Y'will? Great... Zzz...

engChrName: Zzz... Zzz...
engSearchText: Zzz... Zzz...

engChrName: Mmm... Yes... Bow to me, my servants... Heh...
engSearchText: Mmm... Yes... Bow to me, my servants... Heh...
jpnChrName: スヤァ……夢の印税生活……… ………でへへへ………
jpnSearchText:
スヤァ……夢の印税生活………
………でへへへ………

engChrName: This year-end special's taking FOREVER to storyboard. I can't even figure out the panel layouts...
engSearchText:
This year-end special's taking FOREVER
to storyboard. I can't even figure out the
panel layouts...
jpnChrName: ネ、ネームが…… 年末の読み切り分のネームが終わらないよぉ……
jpnSearchText:
ネ、ネームが……
年末の読み切り分のネームが終わらないよぉ……

engChrName: Why do I have to work on the day of the festival?! Ugh! Cronin, you slave driver!
engSearchText:
Why do I have to work on the day of the festival?!
Ugh! Cronin, you slave driver!
jpnChrName: お祭りの日までお仕事なんて…… クローニンさんのバカ！　オニ～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
お祭りの日までお仕事なんて……
クローニンさんのバカ！　オニ～っ！！

engChrName: First some monaka and chocolate pudding, and then I'll grab some crêpes and donuts! This dinner will be the BEST!
engSearchText:
First some monaka and chocolate pudding, and then
I'll grab some crêpes and donuts! This dinner will be
the BEST!
jpnChrName: モナカにチョコプリン…… それと晩御飯はクレープとドーナツで……！
jpnSearchText:
モナカにチョコプリン……
それと晩御飯はクレープとドーナツで……！

engChrName: (Oh, shit. That sounds like a nice dinner idea to me.)
engSearchText: (Oh, shit. That sounds like a nice dinner idea to me.)
jpnChrName: （ほう……？　ちょいと偏りはあるが   悪くねえ食い合わせだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ほう……？　ちょいと偏りはあるが
悪くねえ食い合わせだな。）

engChrName: (Of course it does. If you're a five-year-old.)
engSearchText: (Of course it does. If you're a five-year-old.)
jpnChrName: （って反応してんじゃねーよ、   この激甘党が。）
jpnSearchText:
（って反応してんじゃねーよ、
この激甘党が。）

engChrName: (I'm getting heartburn just thinking about it...)
engSearchText: (I'm getting heartburn just thinking about it...)
jpnChrName: （う～ん、聞いてるだけで   胸やけしてきますけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（う～ん、聞いてるだけで
胸やけしてきますけど……）

engChrName: (You should really try to eat something more balanced...)
engSearchText:
(You should really try to eat something
more balanced...)
jpnChrName: （ふう、もう少し栄養バランスに   気を使ってくださいね？）
jpnSearchText:
（ふう、もう少し栄養バランスに
気を使ってくださいね？）

engChrName: Please feel free to consult me before submitting your next chapter storyboard, Ms. Cocona.
engSearchText:
Please feel free to consult me before submitting your
next chapter storyboard, Ms. Cocona.
jpnChrName: 先生っ！　次からはぜひ！！ ぜひネームを起こす前にご相談を！！
jpnSearchText:
先生っ！　次からはぜひ！！
ぜひネームを起こす前にご相談を！！

engChrName: (Hmm... I might be able to make a killer storyboard if Cronin writes the script for me.)
engSearchText:
(Hmm... I might be able to make a killer storyboard if
Cronin writes the script for me.)
jpnChrName: （……むしろクローニンさんが書いた方が   暑苦しいネームができそうかも～……）
jpnSearchText:
（……むしろクローニンさんが書いた方が
暑苦しいネームができそうかも～……）

engChrName: This is one of my favorite cafés. It'd be just perfect if they extended their hours just a little more.
engSearchText:
This is one of my favorite cafés. It'd be just perfect if
they extended their hours just a little more.
jpnChrName: ここ、お気に入りのカフェなんだよね～。 日中営業も増えて嬉しいかも～。
jpnSearchText:
ここ、お気に入りのカフェなんだよね～。
日中営業も増えて嬉しいかも～。

engChrName: Heehee, time to kick back and draw at my own pace. Deadlines be damned!
engSearchText:
Heehee, time to kick back and draw at my own pace.
Deadlines be damned!
jpnChrName: うふふ、今日はのんびりお絵かきしよ～♪ 締め切りなんて大っきらいだも～ん！
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、今日はのんびりお絵かきしよ～♪
締め切りなんて大っきらいだも～ん！

engChrName: M-Ms. Cocona! You're NOT gonna believe this!
engSearchText:
M-Ms. Cocona! You're NOT gonna
believe this!
jpnChrName: せ、先生、大変です──っ！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>せ、先生、大変です──っ！！

engChrName: Oh, Goddess. Do I even wanna hear about it?
engSearchText: Oh, Goddess. Do I even wanna hear about it?
jpnChrName: なななっ、今日はなんですかあっ！？
jpnSearchText: なななっ、今日はなんですかあっ！？

engChrName: You remember that readers' choice poll I brought up the other day? You won first place!
engSearchText:
You remember that readers' choice poll I brought up
the other day? You won first place!
jpnChrName: 以前言っていた人気投票── ココナ先生の作品が見事一位を獲得しました！！
jpnSearchText:
以前言っていた人気投票──
ココナ先生の作品が見事一位を獲得しました！！

engChrName: And that's not all! The editorial department's been flooded with fan mail! Congratulations!
engSearchText:
And that's not all! The editorial department's been
flooded with fan mail! Congratulations!
jpnChrName: 編集部にも沢山コメントが届いてますよ！ 先生、本当におめでとうございます！！
jpnSearchText:
編集部にも沢山コメントが届いてますよ！
先生、本当におめでとうございます！！

engChrName: Oh, really? Huh... Heh heh...
engSearchText: Oh, really? Huh... Heh heh...
jpnChrName: あ、そうなんだ……… ……そかそか、えへへ……
jpnSearchText:
あ、そうなんだ………
……そかそか、えへへ……

engChrName: Just goes to show all my work finally paid off!
engSearchText: Just goes to show all my work finally paid off!
jpnChrName: やっぱりちょっと嬉しいかも～。 今まで頑張ってきて良かったな～。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱりちょっと嬉しいかも～。
今まで頑張ってきて良かったな～。

engChrName: Thank you so much for your support all this time, Cronin! I owe you one.
engSearchText:
Thank you so much for your support all this
time, Cronin! I owe you one.
jpnChrName: グスッ……クローニンさんも 色々ありがとね！
jpnSearchText:
グスッ……クローニンさんも
色々ありがとね！

engChrName: Haha, but I didn't do anything! This was all you, Ms. Cocona.
engSearchText:
Haha, but I didn't do anything! This was all
you, Ms. Cocona.
jpnChrName: ははっ、とんでもありません……！ ココナ先生の才能あっての結果ですよ！！
jpnSearchText:
ははっ、とんでもありません……！
ココナ先生の才能あっての結果ですよ！！

engChrName: Speaking of which, I look forward to seeing what you cook up for your year-end special!
engSearchText:
Speaking of which, I look forward to seeing what you
cook up for your year-end special!
jpnChrName: というわけで、年末の特別読み切りも よろしくお願いします！！
jpnSearchText:
というわけで、年末の特別読み切りも
よろしくお願いします！！

engChrName: Huh? Special what now?
engSearchText: Huh? Special what now?
jpnChrName: え？　……ナニソレ？
jpnSearchText: え？　……ナニソレ？

engChrName: Oh, did I not mention that part? The grand prize winner gets to have a one-shot special published!
engSearchText:
Oh, did I not mention that part? The grand prize
winner gets to have a one-shot special published!
jpnChrName: 言いませんでしたっけ……？ グランプリ作品は特別編を載せるんです！
jpnSearchText:
言いませんでしたっけ……？
グランプリ作品は特別編を載せるんです！

engChrName: WHAAAAAAT?!
engSearchText: WHAAAAAAT?!
jpnChrName: えええええええええええ～～～！！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>えええええええええええ～～～！！！

engChrName: Think you can get us sixteen pages in three days?
engSearchText: Think you can get us sixteen pages in three days?
jpnChrName: あ、１６ページでいいので…… ３日でお願いできますか？
jpnSearchText:
あ、１６ページでいいので……
３日でお願いできますか？

engChrName: No, I DON'T, actually! What the hell, Cronin?! You jerk!
engSearchText:
No, I DON'T, actually! What the hell, Cronin?!
You jerk!
jpnChrName: ムリだよぉ！　クローニンさんのオニ！！ 人でなし～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
ムリだよぉ！　クローニンさんのオニ！！
人でなし～っ！！

engChrName: P-Please don't be mad! I-I'll do everything I can to help you through it!
engSearchText:
P-Please don't be mad! I-I'll do everything I can to
help you through it!
jpnChrName: ス、スミマセンッ！！ 自分も全力で付き合いますので！！
jpnSearchText:
ス、スミマセンッ！！
自分も全力で付き合いますので！！

engChrName: I can't believe Mia would escape all on her own.
engSearchText: I can't believe Mia would escape all on her own.
jpnChrName: くっ、まさか捕まっていたミーアちゃんが 自力で脱出してくるなんて……！
jpnSearchText:
くっ、まさか捕まっていたミーアちゃんが
自力で脱出してくるなんて……！

engChrName: I didn't see that one coming! Superheroes are so darned cool!
engSearchText:
I didn't see that one coming! Superheroes are so
darned cool!
jpnChrName: なんというアツイ展開！！ やはりヒーローものは最高ですね！！
jpnSearchText:
なんというアツイ展開！！
やはりヒーローものは最高ですね！！

engChrName: I mean, I couldn't let the story be all bleak. It needed a little hope.
engSearchText:
I mean, I couldn't let the story be all bleak.
It needed a little hope.
jpnChrName: だって早くほのぼの回が やりたかったんですも～ん……
jpnSearchText:
だって早くほのぼの回が
やりたかったんですも～ん……

engChrName: Is that bad? Maybe people don't wanna read about a happy and hopeful story with the way things are now...
engSearchText:
Is that bad? Maybe people don't wanna read about a
happy and hopeful story with the way things
are now...
jpnChrName: ……でもいいんですかね～。 世間がこんな有様なのに、ほのぼの回なんて……
jpnSearchText:
……でもいいんですかね～。
世間がこんな有様なのに、ほのぼの回なんて……

engChrName: What are you talking about, Ms. Cocona? We're still talking about comics, yeah?
engSearchText:
What are you talking about, Ms. Cocona? We're
still talking about comics, yeah?
jpnChrName: 何言ってるんですか、先生…… これはコミックなんですよ？
jpnSearchText:
何言ってるんですか、先生……
これはコミックなんですよ？

engChrName: Now's the PERFECT time for kids to be getting some hope through these comics!
engSearchText:
Now's the PERFECT time for kids to be getting
some hope through these comics!
jpnChrName: こんな時こそ子供たちの 心の支えになって欲しいじゃないですか！！
jpnSearchText:
こんな時こそ子供たちの
心の支えになって欲しいじゃないですか！！

engChrName: Umm...
engSearchText: Umm...
jpnChrName: あ……えっと………
jpnSearchText: あ……えっと………

engChrName: Y-You're right! I'll keep writing it, just the way I want it to be!
engSearchText:
Y-You're right! I'll keep writing it, just the way I want
it to be!
jpnChrName: そ、そうですね～。 ……描きたいように描いちゃいましょうか～。
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうですね～。
……描きたいように描いちゃいましょうか～。

engChrName: And here I thought you were too dense to understand people at all, Cronin.
engSearchText:
And here I thought you were too dense to understand
people at all, Cronin.
jpnChrName: クローニンさんって絶対 空気読めない人かと思ってました～。
jpnSearchText:
クローニンさんって絶対
空気読めない人かと思ってました～。

engChrName: Where did THAT come from?! Did I say something weird?!
engSearchText:
Where did THAT come from?! Did I say
something weird?!
jpnChrName: えええっ！？　そ、それって 今の話と関係あるんですかっ！？
jpnSearchText:
えええっ！？　そ、それって
今の話と関係あるんですかっ！？

engChrName: (Hmm. You might be a little dense, still, but I guess that's what makes you, you.)
engSearchText:
(Hmm. You might be a little dense, still, but I guess
that's what makes you, you.)
jpnChrName: （う～ん、やっぱり読めてなさそうだけど……   それがクローニンさんらしいのかもね～。）
jpnSearchText:
（う～ん、やっぱり読めてなさそうだけど……
それがクローニンさんらしいのかもね～。）

engChrName: I have something important to share with you today, Ms. Cocona.
engSearchText:
I have something important to share with you
today, Ms. Cocona.
jpnChrName: ……今日は先生に大切な報告があります。
jpnSearchText: ……今日は先生に大切な報告があります。

engChrName: Wh-What's up? (Oh, Goddess—is his contract getting renewed? Please, no!)
engSearchText:
Wh-What's up?
(Oh, Goddess—is his contract getting renewed?
Please, no!)
jpnChrName: な、なんですか……？ （クローニンさんが改まるとか……コワッ！）
jpnSearchText:
な、なんですか……？
（クローニンさんが改まるとか……コワッ！）

engChrName: We're holding a readers' choice poll over the next week to determine what our most popular title is.
engSearchText:
We're holding a readers' choice poll over the next
week to determine what our most popular title is.
jpnChrName: 来週にかけて、少年誌（ウチ）で連載している 作品の人気投票を行うんです。
jpnSearchText:
来週にかけて、少年誌（ウチ）で連載している
作品の人気投票を行うんです。

engChrName: There's a good chance Bravely Legends will be up amongst the top ranks.
engSearchText:
There's a good chance Bravely Legends will be up
amongst the top ranks.
jpnChrName: 先生の描く『ブレイブリーレジェンズ』なら 必ず上位に食い込むはず──
jpnSearchText:
先生の描く『ブレイブリーレジェンズ』なら
必ず上位に食い込むはず──

engChrName: No—I'm certain it will be first! So let's make sure your next chapter is the best one yet!
engSearchText:
No—I'm certain it will be first! So let's make sure
your next chapter is the best one yet!
jpnChrName: いえっ、絶対に一位を取りましょう！！ 最新号を最高に燃える回とする事で──！！
jpnSearchText:
いえっ、絶対に一位を取りましょう！！
最新号を最高に燃える回とする事で──！！

engChrName: Umm...
engSearchText: Umm...
jpnChrName: ……えっと……
jpnSearchText: ……えっと……

engChrName: I actually thought I might do a nice, uplifting chapter next. I've got the storyboard here if you wanna take a look?
engSearchText:
I actually thought I might do a nice, uplifting
chapter next. I've got the storyboard here if you
wanna take a look?
jpnChrName: 実はわたし、次はほのぼの系がやりたくて…… ネーム描いたから見てもらえますか～？
jpnSearchText:
実はわたし、次はほのぼの系がやりたくて……
ネーム描いたから見てもらえますか～？

engChrName: B-But what about the climactic fight against the evil organization?!
engSearchText:
B-But what about the climactic fight against the
evil organization?!
jpnChrName: 先生～っ！！　悪の組織との戦いは どこに行ったんですか～～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
先生～っ！！　悪の組織との戦いは
どこに行ったんですか～～っ！！

engChrName: I thought it might be nice to ease off the gas a little, story-wise. I could certainly use the break.
engSearchText:
I thought it might be nice to ease off the gas a
little, story-wise. I could certainly use the break.
jpnChrName: ほら、息抜き回って大事だと思うんです。 わたしも息抜きしたいですし～。
jpnSearchText:
ほら、息抜き回って大事だと思うんです。
わたしも息抜きしたいですし～。

engChrName: I might be overstepping here, but don't you think this isn't the best time to diverge from the plot?
engSearchText:
I might be overstepping here, but don't you think this
isn't the best time to diverge from the plot?
jpnChrName: 本音がダダ漏れですが…… と、とりあえず流石に脈絡がなさすぎでは！？
jpnSearchText:
本音がダダ漏れですが……
と、とりあえず流石に脈絡がなさすぎでは！？

engChrName: We need to see Mia rescued from the enemy's clutches at least!
engSearchText:
We need to see Mia rescued from the enemy's
clutches at least!
jpnChrName: せめて敵に捕まったミーアちゃんを 救出してからでないと……！
jpnSearchText:
せめて敵に捕まったミーアちゃんを
救出してからでないと……！

engChrName: I got something that will cheer you up, Ms. Cocona!
engSearchText:
I got something that will cheer you up,
Ms. Cocona!
jpnChrName: 今日は先生に元気を出して頂きたく……！
jpnSearchText: 今日は先生に元気を出して頂きたく……！

engChrName: I don't think there's a single thing you can do today that'll make me smile.
engSearchText:
I don't think there's a single thing you can do today
that'll make me smile.
jpnChrName: え～……クローニンさんが何をやっても 元気になる気がしませんけど～？
jpnSearchText:
え～……クローニンさんが何をやっても
元気になる気がしませんけど～？

engChrName: Okay. Guess I'll have to dispose of this six-year-old's passionate fan letter to you.
engSearchText:
Okay. Guess I'll have to dispose of this six-year-old's
passionate fan letter to you.
jpnChrName: ６歳の男の子からの熱いファンレターが 届いたので、お読みいたします！！
jpnSearchText:
６歳の男の子からの熱いファンレターが
届いたので、お読みいたします！！

engChrName: You're joking!
engSearchText: You're joking!
jpnChrName: うそっ……！　ホントに～っ！？
jpnSearchText: うそっ……！　ホントに～っ！？

engChrName: 'Dear Ms. Cocona. I love the heroes you draw in your story.'
engSearchText:
'Dear Ms. Cocona. I love the heroes you draw in
your story.'
jpnChrName: ココナせんせいへ。 ぼくは、せんせいのかくヒーローが大すきです。
jpnSearchText:
ココナせんせいへ。
ぼくは、せんせいのかくヒーローが大すきです。

engChrName: 'Akira is my favorite! He's so cool! I wanna be just like him when I grow up!'
engSearchText:
'Akira is my favorite! He's so cool! I wanna be just
like him when I grow up!'
jpnChrName: とくに、アキラがカッコイイです。 ぼくもしょうらいはアキラみたいになりたいです！
jpnSearchText:
とくに、アキラがカッコイイです。
ぼくもしょうらいはアキラみたいになりたいです！

engChrName: Oh, my heart! I loved hearing that so much! Even despite the humongous child that read it to me!
engSearchText:
Oh, my heart! I loved hearing that so much!
Even despite the humongous child that read it to me!
jpnChrName: い、癒し……！　目の前にいる子が 大きすぎる事以外はサイコーです！！
jpnSearchText:
い、癒し……！　目の前にいる子が
大きすぎる事以外はサイコーです！！

engChrName: Haha! Well, now we can't disappoint him with next week's issue!
engSearchText:
Haha! Well, now we can't disappoint him with next
week's issue!
jpnChrName: はははっ、来週号も一緒に 頑張りましょう、ココナ先生！！
jpnSearchText:
はははっ、来週号も一緒に
頑張りましょう、ココナ先生！！

engChrName: *sniffle* Just think of all the cute, little boys out there waiting for a new chapter...
engSearchText:
*sniffle* Just think of all the cute, little boys out there
waiting for a new chapter...
jpnChrName: ううっ……カワイイ男の子たちが 待ってると思うと………！
jpnSearchText:
ううっ……カワイイ男の子たちが
待ってると思うと………！

engChrName: Phew. Guess this means we won't have to skip the storyboarding process after all!
engSearchText:
Phew. Guess this means we won't have to skip the
storyboarding process after all!
jpnChrName: ははっ、これで来週号もネームを 落とさずに済みそうですね、ココナ先生！！
jpnSearchText:
ははっ、これで来週号もネームを
落とさずに済みそうですね、ココナ先生！！

engChrName: You've got this, Ms. Cocona! If you don't advance the plot, we'll never get to see the climactic battle with the evil organization!
engSearchText:
You've got this, Ms. Cocona! If you don't advance
the plot, we'll never get to see the climactic battle
with the evil organization!
jpnChrName: 先生、頑張ってください！！ ネタが決まらないと悪の組織との対決編が……！
jpnSearchText:
先生、頑張ってください！！
ネタが決まらないと悪の組織との対決編が……！

engChrName: Y-You're not helping! Ugh... I'm having a hard time coming up with anything!
engSearchText:
Y-You're not helping! Ugh... I'm having a hard time
coming up with anything!
jpnChrName: そそ、そんな事言ったって…… うう～……ダメ、何も思いつかない……！
jpnSearchText:
そそ、そんな事言ったって……
うう～……ダメ、何も思いつかない……！

engChrName: I might get inspired if I had some cherry pie... And maybe a parfait! Oooh, pancakes, too!
engSearchText:
I might get inspired if I had some cherry pie...
And maybe a parfait! Oooh, pancakes, too!
jpnChrName: チ、チェリーパイ…… あとパフェとパンケーキがあれば……
jpnSearchText:
チ、チェリーパイ……
あとパフェとパンケーキがあれば……

engChrName: I-I hear you loud and clear! Don't worry—it'll be my treat!
engSearchText:
I-I hear you loud and clear! Don't worry—it'll be
my treat!
jpnChrName: わ、分かりましたっ！ 今日は自分が奢りますから！！
jpnSearchText:
わ、分かりましたっ！
今日は自分が奢りますから！！

engChrName: These drawings are some of your best work, Ms. Cocona! The heat of combat comes across so well in them!
engSearchText:
These drawings are some of your best work, Ms.
Cocona! The heat of combat comes across so well
in them!
jpnChrName: おお、今回もアツいバトル展開！ ココナ先生の生ネーム……流石の画力です！！
jpnSearchText:
おお、今回もアツいバトル展開！
ココナ先生の生ネーム……流石の画力です！！

engChrName: But there are a couple parts that don't make sense to me. Like this cut here. Why are they suddenly playing tic-tac-toe?
engSearchText:
But there are a couple parts that don't make sense
to me. Like this cut here. Why are they suddenly
playing tic-tac-toe?
jpnChrName: ですが時々意味不明なセリフがあるので…… ……中盤のカット、なぜ唐突に敵としりとりを？
jpnSearchText:
ですが時々意味不明なセリフがあるので……
……中盤のカット、なぜ唐突に敵としりとりを？

engChrName: It's a joke.
engSearchText: It's a joke.
jpnChrName: ──ギャグです。
jpnSearchText: ──ギャグです。

engChrName: Sometimes I get tired of drawing all the action during the fight scenes, so I put in a joke here and there. Y'know, helps liven the mood!
engSearchText:
Sometimes I get tired of drawing all the action during
the fight scenes, so I put in a joke here and there.
Y'know, helps liven the mood!
jpnChrName: バトルばっかりだと（わたしが）疲れるので ギャグを入れました。
jpnSearchText:
バトルばっかりだと（わたしが）疲れるので
ギャグを入れました。

engChrName: Sorry, Ms. Cocona. I guess I just don't get it.
engSearchText: Sorry, Ms. Cocona. I guess I just don't get it.
jpnChrName: すみませんッ！！ 自分には今一つ良さが理解できず──！！
jpnSearchText:
すみませんッ！！
自分には今一つ良さが理解できず──！！

engChrName: Your comic's serialized in a magazine for boys. Shouldn't it be straightforward and action-packed?
engSearchText:
Your comic's serialized in a magazine for boys.
Shouldn't it be straightforward and action-packed?
jpnChrName: 少年誌に載せる劇画（コミック）ですので、 ストレートにアツい展開でいいと思うのですが！？
jpnSearchText:
少年誌に載せる劇画（コミック）ですので、
ストレートにアツい展開でいいと思うのですが！？

engChrName: Yeah, you're not wrong... Guess it's back to the drawing board for me.
engSearchText:
Yeah, you're not wrong... Guess it's back to the
drawing board for me.
jpnChrName: うん、そだね…… ……ネーム、書き直しだね……
jpnSearchText:
うん、そだね……
……ネーム、書き直しだね……

engChrName: Oh, good. I finally found you, Ms. Cocona! I was worried when I saw you weren't at work!
engSearchText:
Oh, good. I finally found you, Ms. Cocona! I was
worried when I saw you weren't at work!
jpnChrName: やっと見つけましたよ、先生！！ 仕事場にいらっしゃらないと思ったら！
jpnSearchText:
やっと見つけましたよ、先生！！
仕事場にいらっしゃらないと思ったら！

engChrName: Eek! Cronin?! I-I, umm, was just brainstorming some new ideas!
engSearchText:
Eek! Cronin?! I-I, umm, was just brainstorming some
new ideas!
jpnChrName: ひえええ！！　クローニンさん～！？ こここれはアイデアを練っていたというか～！
jpnSearchText:
ひえええ！！　クローニンさん～！？
こここれはアイデアを練っていたというか～！

engChrName: Is that so? You've been hard at work in here...
engSearchText: Is that so? You've been hard at work in here...
jpnChrName: そ、そうでしたか……！ 先生が真面目に取り組まれているのに、自分は……
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうでしたか……！
先生が真面目に取り組まれているのに、自分は……

engChrName: ...while I was running around wasting time looking for you! I'm so sorry for being so useless.
engSearchText:
...while I was running around wasting time looking
for you! I'm so sorry for being so useless.
jpnChrName: 先生を見つけるのに時間が掛かってしまいました！ 不器用で申し訳ありません！！
jpnSearchText:
先生を見つけるのに時間が掛かってしまいました！
不器用で申し訳ありません！！

engChrName: I know—I'll make up for it by staying with you all day to help work on your next storyboard!
engSearchText:
I know—I'll make up for it by staying with you all day
to help work on your next storyboard!
jpnChrName: つきましては今日は夜まで ネーム推敲に付き合わせて頂きますので！！
jpnSearchText:
つきましては今日は夜まで
ネーム推敲に付き合わせて頂きますので！！

engChrName: (No! Why is this happening?! I was trying to AVOID you!)
engSearchText:
(No! Why is this happening?! I was trying to
AVOID you!)
jpnChrName: （ふえぇ……なんでそうなるの～！   やっぱりクローニンさんは苦手だよぉ～！）
jpnSearchText:
（ふえぇ……なんでそうなるの～！
やっぱりクローニンさんは苦手だよぉ～！）

engChrName: Why are you always wearing a suit, Cronin? It's weird!
engSearchText:
Why are you always wearing a suit, Cronin?
It's weird!
jpnChrName: 大体なんでいつもスーツなんですかぁ！ コワイ！！
jpnSearchText:
大体なんでいつもスーツなんですかぁ！
コワイ！！

engChrName: It is? I guess I never really thought about it that way. I just think it makes me look more dedicated to my job!
engSearchText:
It is? I guess I never really thought about it that way.
I just think it makes me look more dedicated to
my job!
jpnChrName: ええっ！？　脈絡が掴みかねますが…… これは作品に対する自分なりの覚悟です！！
jpnSearchText:
ええっ！？　脈絡が掴みかねますが……
これは作品に対する自分なりの覚悟です！！

engChrName: (Why did my editor have to be such a pain in the ass?)
engSearchText:
(Why did my editor have to be such a pain in
the ass?)
jpnChrName: （……なんでこんな重い人が   わたしの担当なんだろ～……）
jpnSearchText:
（……なんでこんな重い人が
わたしの担当なんだろ～……）

engChrName: (I'm not sure why she's glaring daggers at me. Did I offend her?)
engSearchText:
(I'm not sure why she's glaring daggers at me. Did
I offend her?)
jpnChrName: （あれっ、凄く白けた目で見られているような……   何か失礼な事を言ってしまっただろうか！？）
jpnSearchText:
（あれっ、凄く白けた目で見られているような……
何か失礼な事を言ってしまっただろうか！？）

engChrName: Looks like things calmed down a little. You sure don't see stuff like that every day...
engSearchText:
Looks like things calmed down a little. You sure don't
see stuff like that every day...
jpnChrName: 少しは落ち着いた、のでしょうか…… ……異様な光景には違いありませんが……
jpnSearchText:
少しは落ち着いた、のでしょうか……
……異様な光景には違いありませんが……

engChrName: Anyway, be careful out there, everyone!
engSearchText: Anyway, be careful out there, everyone!
jpnChrName: と、ともかく君たちも どうかくれぐれも気を付けてください！！
jpnSearchText:
と、ともかく君たちも
どうかくれぐれも気を付けてください！！

engChrName: Everyone pins their hopes on heroes like yourselves. It wouldn't work as well if you came to harm!
engSearchText:
Everyone pins their hopes on heroes like yourselves.
It wouldn't work as well if you came to harm!
jpnChrName: ヒーローはいつだって みんなの希望なのですから……！！
jpnSearchText:
ヒーローはいつだって
みんなの希望なのですから……！！

engChrName: I-Is this actually happening?! It's like a comic scene come to life!
engSearchText:
I-Is this actually happening?! It's like a comic scene
come to life!
jpnChrName: ホ、ホントに何が起きてるんですっ！？ こんなの、まるでコミックとしか……！
jpnSearchText:
ホ、ホントに何が起きてるんですっ！？
こんなの、まるでコミックとしか……！

engChrName: Who cares about comic books?! I need to protect Ms. Cocona!
engSearchText:
Who cares about comic books?! I need to protect
Ms. Cocona!
jpnChrName: と、ともかく先生をお守りしないと！！
jpnSearchText: と、ともかく先生をお守りしないと！！

engChrName: Finishing that script really took it out of me—I completely zonked out!
engSearchText:
Finishing that script really took it out of me—I
completely zonked out!
jpnChrName: 実は原稿を上げた途端、 力尽きて寝ちゃったんですよ～！！
jpnSearchText:
実は原稿を上げた途端、
力尽きて寝ちゃったんですよ～！！

engChrName: I sure hope Ms. Cocona's draft will get to the editing room soon.
engSearchText:
I sure hope Ms. Cocona's draft will get to the
editing room soon.
jpnChrName: あと先生の原稿…… 早く編集部に届けたいのですが！！
jpnSearchText:
あと先生の原稿……
早く編集部に届けたいのですが！！

engChrName: Argh, I'm tired of being stuck in here!
engSearchText: Argh, I'm tired of being stuck in here!
jpnChrName: くぅぅ……いつになったら 外に出られるのでしょうか！！
jpnSearchText:
くぅぅ……いつになったら
外に出られるのでしょうか！！

engChrName: I'm so sorry, Ms. Cocona! I'll make it up to you! Let's go to your favorite café—my treat!
engSearchText:
I'm so sorry, Ms. Cocona! I'll make it up to you!
Let's go to your favorite café—my treat!
jpnChrName: ホントスミマセン、ココナ先生！！ この後奢りますから！！
jpnSearchText:
ホントスミマセン、ココナ先生！！
この後奢りますから！！

engChrName: I don't think so.
engSearchText: I don't think so.
jpnChrName: ……カワイイ男の子じゃないとヤダ。
jpnSearchText: ……カワイイ男の子じゃないとヤダ。

engChrName: I'm not going ANYWHERE unless there's a child with rosy-red cheeks coming along!
engSearchText:
I'm not going ANYWHERE unless there's a child
with rosy-red cheeks coming along!
jpnChrName: ６歳くらいのキュートな男の子が 一緒じゃないとヤダ～！！
jpnSearchText:
６歳くらいのキュートな男の子が
一緒じゃないとヤダ～！！

engChrName: Huh?! But I'm still a bachelor! I can't just produce a kid from nothing!
engSearchText:
Huh?! But I'm still a bachelor! I can't just produce
a kid from nothing!
jpnChrName: えええええええっ！？ ス、スミマセン！！　自分未婚でして……！！
jpnSearchText:
えええええええっ！？
ス、スミマセン！！　自分未婚でして……！！

engChrName: (Ugh... I know this was my idea...)
engSearchText: (Ugh... I know this was my idea...)
jpnChrName: （奢るとは言ったものの……   ……うっぷ………）
jpnSearchText:
（奢るとは言ったものの……
……うっぷ………）

engChrName: (...but all these sweets are starting to make me sick.)
engSearchText: (...but all these sweets are starting to make me sick.)
jpnChrName: （あ、甘々すぎて気持ち悪くなってきた……）
jpnSearchText: （あ、甘々すぎて気持ち悪くなってきた……）

engChrName: Believe it or not, Ms. Cocona is a renowned comic book artist.
engSearchText:
Believe it or not, Ms. Cocona is a renowned comic
book artist.
jpnChrName: こう見えてココナ先生は 大人気コミック作家なんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
こう見えてココナ先生は
大人気コミック作家なんですよ。

engChrName: She acts very laid back, but her stories are full of action-packed battle scenes!
engSearchText:
She acts very laid back, but her stories are full of
action-packed battle scenes!
jpnChrName: のんびりした方なのですが、 実は熱血バトル物を得意とされていて──
jpnSearchText:
のんびりした方なのですが、
実は熱血バトル物を得意とされていて──

engChrName: It's my responsibility as her editor to support her, no matter what! I do it for the sake of all the children waiting for each new episode!
engSearchText:
It's my responsibility as her editor to support her, no
matter what! I do it for the sake of all the children
waiting for each new episode!
jpnChrName: 担当編集として、自分も全力で支えねば……！ 連載を楽しみにしている子供たちのためにも！！
jpnSearchText:
担当編集として、自分も全力で支えねば……！
連載を楽しみにしている子供たちのためにも！！

engChrName: Nice seein' you in one piece, old man!
engSearchText: Nice seein' you in one piece, old man!
jpnChrName: おやっさん達も無事だったみてえだな！
jpnSearchText: おやっさん達も無事だったみてえだな！

engChrName: Yeah. Don't even got a scratch on me.
engSearchText: Yeah. Don't even got a scratch on me.
jpnChrName: ああ、こっちは問題ねえ。 怪我一つしてねえぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、こっちは問題ねえ。
怪我一つしてねえぜ。

engChrName: Though I'm a bit worried about Junifer and the rest. They left a while ago.
engSearchText:
Though I'm a bit worried about Junifer and the rest.
They left a while ago.
jpnChrName: 出かけちまってたユニファたちが心配だが……
jpnSearchText: 出かけちまってたユニファたちが心配だが……

engChrName: At least they took the cars. They're great drivers, so I'm sure they should be fine.
engSearchText:
At least they took the cars. They're great drivers, so
I'm sure they should be fine.
jpnChrName: 車だったしな、テクもそれなりのモンだ。 滅多な事はねえだろうよ。
jpnSearchText:
車だったしな、テクもそれなりのモンだ。
滅多な事はねえだろうよ。

engChrName: I'm sure they'll be fine.
engSearchText: I'm sure they'll be fine.
jpnChrName: ああ、今はそう信じるとするか……！
jpnSearchText: ああ、今はそう信じるとするか……！

engChrName: Let's get going. We got places to be.
engSearchText: Let's get going. We got places to be.
jpnChrName: ハッ、一回りしたら次に行くぞ！
jpnSearchText: ハッ、一回りしたら次に行くぞ！

engChrName: I ain't so sure what you're planning, but I trust you.
engSearchText: I ain't so sure what you're planning, but I trust you.
jpnChrName: ワケが分からねえが、 やるべき事は見えてるようだな。
jpnSearchText:
ワケが分からねえが、
やるべき事は見えてるようだな。

engChrName: Get goin' then. Take one of the cars if you need to.
engSearchText: Get goin' then. Take one of the cars if you need to.
jpnChrName: ならとっとと行ってこい。 車も必要なら預かってやる。
jpnSearchText:
ならとっとと行ってこい。
車も必要なら預かってやる。

engChrName: Just stay frosty, yeah? Go show those brutes who's boss!
engSearchText:
Just stay frosty, yeah? Go show those brutes
who's boss!
jpnChrName: 油断すんじゃねえぞ？ テメエらでブチかましてこい！！
jpnSearchText:
油断すんじゃねえぞ？
テメエらでブチかましてこい！！

engChrName: Buncha damned fools...
engSearchText: Buncha damned fools...
jpnChrName: 馬鹿どもがはしゃぎやがって……
jpnSearchText: 馬鹿どもがはしゃぎやがって……

engChrName: Don't get carried away just 'cause the festival's goin' on. Ya hear me, Van?
engSearchText:
Don't get carried away just 'cause the festival's
goin' on. Ya hear me, Van?
jpnChrName: ヴァン、お前も祭りだからって 羽目外しすぎんじゃねえぞ？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン、お前も祭りだからって
羽目外しすぎんじゃねえぞ？

engChrName: I won't.
engSearchText: I won't.
jpnChrName: ああ、分かってるっての。
jpnSearchText: ああ、分かってるっての。

engChrName: ('Fools,' huh? Wonder where Junifer and the others are up to.)
engSearchText:
('Fools,' huh? Wonder where Junifer and the others
are up to.)
jpnChrName: （にしても『馬鹿ども』か。   ユニファたちが来てるみてえだが……）
jpnSearchText:
（にしても『馬鹿ども』か。
ユニファたちが来てるみてえだが……）

engChrName: I doubt it'll take much work. She seems to be taking pretty good care of it herself.
engSearchText:
I doubt it'll take much work. She seems to be taking
pretty good care of it herself.
jpnChrName: 元々こまめにメンテしてるみてえだし、 そこまで手間はかからなさそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
元々こまめにメンテしてるみてえだし、
そこまで手間はかからなさそうだな。

engChrName: Well, can't have her throwing a tantrum. A nice wax finish can't hurt.
engSearchText:
Well, can't have her throwing a tantrum. A nice wax
finish can't hurt.
jpnChrName: ま……アイツが駄々をこねるから 特別に高級ワックスで仕上げてやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
ま……アイツが駄々をこねるから
特別に高級ワックスで仕上げてやるよ。

engChrName: Don't whine to me if you can't figure it out.
engSearchText: Don't whine to me if you can't figure it out.
jpnChrName: 謎が解けねえとか 泣き事は言わないでくれよ。
jpnSearchText:
謎が解けねえとか
泣き事は言わないでくれよ。

engChrName: Get along then—off to the next stop with you.
engSearchText: Get along then—off to the next stop with you.
jpnChrName: いいからさっさと次の場所に行ってきやがれ。
jpnSearchText: いいからさっさと次の場所に行ってきやがれ。

engChrName: She's not quite there yet, but she's coming along.
engSearchText: She's not quite there yet, but she's coming along.
jpnChrName: 手際は今一つだが、まあ何とかなったか。
jpnSearchText: 手際は今一つだが、まあ何とかなったか。

engChrName: Junifer's the hands-on type, so it's best to let her learn by throwing her into the fray.
engSearchText:
Junifer's the hands-on type, so it's best to let her learn
by throwing her into the fray.
jpnChrName: ユニファは体で覚えるタイプだからな。 一度やらせるのが一番だぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ユニファは体で覚えるタイプだからな。
一度やらせるのが一番だぜ。

engChrName: *sigh* I just hope this is a decent learning experience for her.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I just hope this is a decent learning experience
for her.
jpnChrName: ハッ……コイツなりに いい経験になったならいいんだがな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……コイツなりに
いい経験になったならいいんだがな。

engChrName: I finally came across a decent used engine. I've been huntin' one for a while.
engSearchText:
I finally came across a decent used engine. I've been
huntin' one for a while.
jpnChrName: ……前からねだられてた中古エンジンの イイのが見つかっちまってな。
jpnSearchText:
……前からねだられてた中古エンジンの
イイのが見つかっちまってな。

engChrName: Junifer there said she'd be willin' to work for free for a year. It's an offer I couldn't turn down, so I signed her on.
engSearchText:
Junifer there said she'd be willin' to work for free for
a year. It's an offer I couldn't turn down, so I signed
her on.
jpnChrName: コイツも１年タダ働きするってんで 仕方なくＯＫしてやったのさ。
jpnSearchText:
コイツも１年タダ働きするってんで
仕方なくＯＫしてやったのさ。

engChrName: But I don't intend on tightening a single screw for her.
engSearchText:
But I don't intend on tightening a single screw
for her.
jpnChrName: やれやれ……だが俺はネジ一本 締める気はねえからな。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……だが俺はネジ一本
締める気はねえからな。

engChrName: She's doing all the oil changes and maintenance by herself from here on out.
engSearchText:
She's doing all the oil changes and maintenance by
herself from here on out.
jpnChrName: これからは詰め替えも整備も 独りでやらせるつもりだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
これからは詰め替えも整備も
独りでやらせるつもりだぜ。

engChrName: Bein' a top-class mechanic's harder than it looks. It requires mental fortitude on top of technical know-how.
engSearchText:
Bein' a top-class mechanic's harder than it looks.
It requires mental fortitude on top of
technical know-how.
jpnChrName: 一流であり続けるってのは想像以上に難しい。 技術だけでなく精神的なモンも要求されるしな。
jpnSearchText:
一流であり続けるってのは想像以上に難しい。
技術だけでなく精神的なモンも要求されるしな。

engChrName: Well, I guess I could lend a hand if she asks for it.
engSearchText: Well, I guess I could lend a hand if she asks for it.
jpnChrName: ま、こいつがそこまで言うなら 俺も力になってやるまでだ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、こいつがそこまで言うなら
俺も力になってやるまでだ。

engChrName: It's not like I'll just ignore her if she asks for advice. I'm her trainer, after all.
engSearchText:
It's not like I'll just ignore her if she asks for advice.
I'm her trainer, after all.
jpnChrName: こいつのトレーナーとも相談が必要だろうが いくつかアドバイスしてやるとするか。
jpnSearchText:
こいつのトレーナーとも相談が必要だろうが
いくつかアドバイスしてやるとするか。

engChrName: Ah, great. She's throwin' another fit.
engSearchText: Ah, great. She's throwin' another fit.
jpnChrName: また癇癪起こしやがって、ったく……
jpnSearchText: また癇癪起こしやがって、ったく……

engChrName: Gotta admit, her driving skills have come a long way. She could stand to learn how to behave, though.
engSearchText:
Gotta admit, her driving skills have come a long way.
She could stand to learn how to behave, though.
jpnChrName: まあドラテク上がってんのは認めてやるが、 だからってそう簡単に──
jpnSearchText:
まあドラテク上がってんのは認めてやるが、
だからってそう簡単に──

engChrName: Braaadleeey! Come ooonn!
engSearchText: Braaadleeey! Come ooonn!
jpnChrName: お～じ～さ～～～ん！！ お願いだよぉぉぉ！！
jpnSearchText:
お～じ～さ～～～ん！！
お願いだよぉぉぉ！！

engChrName: Hey, knock that off! You ain't five years old, so behave yourself!
engSearchText:
Hey, knock that off! You ain't five years old, so
behave yourself!
jpnChrName: あーもー暑苦しい！！ ５歳児かお前はっ！！
jpnSearchText:
あーもー暑苦しい！！
５歳児かお前はっ！！

engChrName: I get that I fixed their cars and everything, but they don't gotta make such a big deal about it.
engSearchText:
I get that I fixed their cars and everything, but they
don't gotta make such a big deal about it.
jpnChrName: こいつらの車を直してやったんだがな。 ったく大袈裟に騒ぎやがって……
jpnSearchText:
こいつらの車を直してやったんだがな。
ったく大袈裟に騒ぎやがって……

engChrName: Hey, now. Don't make a scene in front of the shop.
engSearchText: Hey, now. Don't make a scene in front of the shop.
