jpnChrName: オイ、店の前で騒ぐんじゃねえ。
jpnSearchText: オイ、店の前で騒ぐんじゃねえ。

engChrName: And be careful out on the road!
engSearchText: And be careful out on the road!
jpnChrName: あと気ィつけて乗りやがれ、いいな！
jpnSearchText: あと気ィつけて乗りやがれ、いいな！

engChrName: I heard they had quite the joy ride out there.
engSearchText: I heard they had quite the joy ride out there.
jpnChrName: 聞いたぜ、思ってたよりも派手に 遊んできたみたいじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
聞いたぜ、思ってたよりも派手に
遊んできたみたいじゃねえか。

engChrName: I should've told 'em to go easier on the gas. It's all fun and games until the cops show up.
engSearchText:
I should've told 'em to go easier on the gas. It's all fun
and games until the cops show up.
jpnChrName: 飛ばすのはいいが、サツに捕まらねえよう 程々にしとけよと言いてえ所だが……
jpnSearchText:
飛ばすのはいいが、サツに捕まらねえよう
程々にしとけよと言いてえ所だが……

engChrName: But oh, well. Ain't gonna go rain on their parade. Let 'em rip, I say.
engSearchText:
But oh, well. Ain't gonna go rain on their parade.
Let 'em rip, I say.
jpnChrName: いい顔してるアイツらに 今それを言うのは野暮ってモンだよな。
jpnSearchText:
いい顔してるアイツらに
今それを言うのは野暮ってモンだよな。

engChrName: You can probably tell from how quiet it is 'round here, but Junifer and her buddies are out on the road tonight.
engSearchText:
You can probably tell from how quiet it is 'round
here, but Junifer and her buddies are out on the
road tonight.
jpnChrName: 今夜はウチの娘と走り屋の連中が出かけててな。 久しぶりに静かなもんだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
今夜はウチの娘と走り屋の連中が出かけててな。
久しぶりに静かなもんだぜ。

engChrName: I heard everyone talkin' about this other team they were gonna race against.
engSearchText:
I heard everyone talkin' about this other team they
were gonna race against.
jpnChrName: 確か……他所から来たチームと 揉めてるとかなんとか言ってたっけか？
jpnSearchText:
確か……他所から来たチームと
揉めてるとかなんとか言ってたっけか？

engChrName: Engines revved, blood pumpin', the cold breeze on your face. Ah, youth.
engSearchText:
Engines revved, blood pumpin', the cold breeze on
your face. Ah, youth.
jpnChrName: はぁ、若い連中は楽しそうでいいよな。
jpnSearchText: はぁ、若い連中は楽しそうでいいよな。

engChrName: Wish cars like these were 'round when I was their age.
engSearchText:
Wish cars like these were 'round when I was
their age.
jpnChrName: 俺の若い頃にも車がありゃあ…… なんて思っちまったりしてな。
jpnSearchText:
俺の若い頃にも車がありゃあ……
なんて思っちまったりしてな。

engChrName: No sign of the usual suspects today.
engSearchText: No sign of the usual suspects today.
jpnChrName: 今日はあいつら、顔を出さねえな……
jpnSearchText: 今日はあいつら、顔を出さねえな……

engChrName: Not like it's any of my business what they get up to anyhow.
engSearchText:
Not like it's any of my business what they get up
to anyhow.
jpnChrName: フン、まあ俺には関係のねえ話だが……
jpnSearchText: フン、まあ俺には関係のねえ話だが……

engChrName: Junifer and the crew? Sure, guess I worry about 'em some.
engSearchText:
Junifer and the crew? Sure, guess I worry about
'em some.
jpnChrName: ユニファ（姪っ子）たちか。 確かにちょいと心配ではあるよな。
jpnSearchText:
ユニファ（姪っ子）たちか。
確かにちょいと心配ではあるよな。

engChrName: Worry's wasted on the reckless.
engSearchText: Worry's wasted on the reckless.
jpnChrName: 馬鹿言え、心配なんざするかよ。
jpnSearchText: 馬鹿言え、心配なんざするかよ。

engChrName: Junifer and Graham, well... They eat, sleep, and breathe street racin'.
engSearchText:
Junifer and Graham, well... They eat, sleep, and
breathe street racin'.
jpnChrName: ただ……ユニファとグレアム、あの二人は レーサー気質ではあるからな。
jpnSearchText:
ただ……ユニファとグレアム、あの二人は
レーサー気質ではあるからな。

engChrName: One mistake is all it takes in that world. Just 'cause you're goin' fast doesn't mean life won't catch up to ya.
engSearchText:
One mistake is all it takes in that world. Just 'cause
you're goin' fast doesn't mean life won't catch up
to ya.
jpnChrName: 一線を踏み外しちまった時は── 逆に危険な存在にもなりかねねえ。
jpnSearchText:
一線を踏み外しちまった時は──
逆に危険な存在にもなりかねねえ。

engChrName: Big shots will slip up every now and then. Not even pros can avoid it.
engSearchText:
Big shots will slip up every now and then. Not even
pros can avoid it.
jpnChrName: ……たまにいるんだ、そういう馬鹿が。 プロの世界にもな。
jpnSearchText:
……たまにいるんだ、そういう馬鹿が。
プロの世界にもな。

engChrName: (Sometimes I forget Bradley used to be chief mechanic for a Z1 team.)
engSearchText:
(Sometimes I forget Bradley used to be chief
mechanic for a Z1 team.)
jpnChrName: （おやっさんはＺ１チームの技術チーフを   やってた事もあったんだったか……）
jpnSearchText:
（おやっさんはＺ１チームの技術チーフを
やってた事もあったんだったか……）

engChrName: (Must've seen some shit before quittin'.)
engSearchText: (Must've seen some shit before quittin'.)
jpnChrName: （辞めるまでにも色々あったみてえだが……）
jpnSearchText: （辞めるまでにも色々あったみてえだが……）

engChrName: By the by, ya got your hands on a rare part, yeah?
engSearchText: By the by, ya got your hands on a rare part, yeah?
jpnChrName: そういや……なんでも 珍しいパーツを入手したらしいな？
jpnSearchText:
そういや……なんでも
珍しいパーツを入手したらしいな？

engChrName: Sure did. A custom Nightbreaker part. Don't worry— there's no one else I'd come to get it installed at.
engSearchText:
Sure did. A custom Nightbreaker part. Don't worry—
there's no one else I'd come to get it installed at.
jpnChrName: ああ、《ナイトブレイカー》用の特注パーツでな。 取付の際にはおやっさんにも相談させてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、《ナイトブレイカー》用の特注パーツでな。
取付の際にはおやっさんにも相談させてくれ。

engChrName: Bring it by anytime, lad. Got plenty of openings today.
engSearchText:
Bring it by anytime, lad. Got plenty of
openings today.
jpnChrName: 分かった、いつでも掛けてこい。 今日なら時間にも余裕があるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
分かった、いつでも掛けてこい。
今日なら時間にも余裕があるぜ。

engChrName: Would be plenty swell if Junifer learned how to back off a little.
engSearchText:
Would be plenty swell if Junifer learned how to back
off a little.
jpnChrName: チッ……ユニファめ。 また何かねだろうとしてやがるな？
jpnSearchText:
チッ……ユニファめ。
また何かねだろうとしてやがるな？

engChrName: That girl's a thorn in my side.
engSearchText: That girl's a thorn in my side.
jpnChrName: そうはいくかよ。 ったくメンドクセェ娘だぜ……
jpnSearchText:
そうはいくかよ。
ったくメンドクセェ娘だぜ……

engChrName: This here's a limited edition '98 ETWS. It's got a real swell custom engine.
engSearchText:
This here's a limited edition '98 ETWS. It's got a real
swell custom engine.
jpnChrName: こいつはエトワスの’９８限定モデルでな。 エンジンに一工夫されてるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
こいつはエトワスの’９８限定モデルでな。
エンジンに一工夫されてるんだ。

engChrName: While Verne supplies engines for the four big car manufacturers, they handle their own tune-ups.
engSearchText:
While Verne supplies engines for the four big car
manufacturers, they handle their own tune-ups.
jpnChrName: 四大ライセンシーのエンジンは全て ヴェルヌ社の生産だが、チューンは各自でやる。
jpnSearchText:
四大ライセンシーのエンジンは全て
ヴェルヌ社の生産だが、チューンは各自でやる。

engChrName: It ain't yer standard ETWS engine. Baby's more in line with an Ingert's.
engSearchText:
It ain't yer standard ETWS engine. Baby's more in
line with an Ingert's.
jpnChrName: エトワスにしちゃ振り切った構成で インゲルトの思想に近いモンがあるな。
jpnSearchText:
エトワスにしちゃ振り切った構成で
インゲルトの思想に近いモンがあるな。

engChrName: I'm aware that ETWS focuses more on luxury cars while Ingert leads the sports car market.
engSearchText:
I'm aware that ETWS focuses more on luxury cars
while Ingert leads the sports car market.
jpnChrName: エトワスは確か高級車メーカーで、 インゲルトはスポーツタイプが多いですよね。
jpnSearchText:
エトワスは確か高級車メーカーで、
インゲルトはスポーツタイプが多いですよね。

engChrName: ET—what now? Are they the ones that make all the luxury limousines?
engSearchText:
ET—what now? Are they the ones that make all the
luxury limousines?
jpnChrName: えとわす……リムジンとか 高そうな車のメーカーでしたっけ。
jpnSearchText:
えとわす……リムジンとか
高そうな車のメーカーでしたっけ。

engChrName: Van's truck was like an 'Egret,' or something like that...
engSearchText:
Van's truck was like an 'Egret,' or something
like that...
jpnChrName: いんげるとはヴァンさんの車ですよね！？
jpnSearchText: いんげるとはヴァンさんの車ですよね！？

engChrName: ETWS is the cream of the crop of luxury cars for sure. I've never even been in one.
engSearchText:
ETWS is the cream of the crop of luxury cars
for sure. I've never even been in one.
jpnChrName: エトワスは高級車っつーイメージだよな。 まだ転がしたことはねえが……
jpnSearchText:
エトワスは高級車っつーイメージだよな。
まだ転がしたことはねえが……

engChrName: Does Ingert make anything that's not a sports car?
engSearchText: Does Ingert make anything that's not a sports car?
jpnChrName: インゲルトといやあ スポーツタイプばっか作ってんじゃね？
jpnSearchText:
インゲルトといやあ
スポーツタイプばっか作ってんじゃね？

engChrName: Ingert specializes in sports cars, but that ain't all they make. They got other models, too.
engSearchText:
Ingert specializes in sports cars, but that ain't all
they make. They got other models, too.
jpnChrName: ああ、といっても他のラインナップが ない訳じゃないが、得意分野ってのはあるよな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、といっても他のラインナップが
ない訳じゃないが、得意分野ってのはあるよな。

engChrName: Old man Bradley here used to be chief engineer over at Ingert. You ain't gonna find anyone that knows more than he does.
engSearchText:
Old man Bradley here used to be chief engineer over
at Ingert. You ain't gonna find anyone that knows
more than he does.
jpnChrName: 因みにおやっさんは元インゲルトの技師だからな、 専門知識の量たるや──！
jpnSearchText:
因みにおやっさんは元インゲルトの技師だからな、
専門知識の量たるや──！

engChrName: Don't go inflatin' my ego, now. It's been forever and a day since I had that gig.
engSearchText:
Don't go inflatin' my ego, now. It's been forever and a
day since I had that gig.
jpnChrName: ……こちとら現場から離れて長ぇんだ、 あんま持ち上げんじゃねえよ。
jpnSearchText:
……こちとら現場から離れて長ぇんだ、
あんま持ち上げんじゃねえよ。

engChrName: Each of the four big car manufacturers has their own design philosophies.
engSearchText:
Each of the four big car manufacturers has their own
design philosophies.
jpnChrName: 四大ライセンシーにはそれぞれ 設計思想っつーのがある。
jpnSearchText:
四大ライセンシーにはそれぞれ
設計思想っつーのがある。

engChrName: I may be an Ingert man, but I ain't afraid to get my hands dirty under the hood of another company's car.
engSearchText:
I may be an Ingert man, but I ain't afraid to get my
hands dirty under the hood of another company's car.
jpnChrName: 俺はインゲルトの出身だが、 他社の車を触るのも悪くねえぜ？
jpnSearchText:
俺はインゲルトの出身だが、
他社の車を触るのも悪くねえぜ？

engChrName: Cars ain't some wacko magic. It's just science. A buncha movin' parts whose job at the end of the day is to get that machine runnin'.
engSearchText:
Cars ain't some wacko magic. It's just science.
A buncha movin' parts whose job at the end of the
day is to get that machine runnin'.
jpnChrName: 車ってのは、人と機械を調和させる インターフェイス（仕掛け）だからな。
jpnSearchText:
車ってのは、人と機械を調和させる
インターフェイス（仕掛け）だからな。

engChrName: Off that bunch goes, drivin' without a care in the world.
engSearchText:
Off that bunch goes, drivin' without a care in
the world.
jpnChrName: あいつら、今日も 走りに行きやがるようだな。
jpnSearchText:
あいつら、今日も
走りに行きやがるようだな。

engChrName: What a buncha punks. They keep this up, someone's gonna get hurt.
engSearchText:
What a buncha punks. They keep this up, someone's
gonna get hurt.
jpnChrName: フン……ガキがヤンチャばっかしやがって。 痛い目を見なきゃいいがな。
jpnSearchText:
フン……ガキがヤンチャばっかしやがって。
痛い目を見なきゃいいがな。

engChrName: Worried about Junifer, old man?
engSearchText: Worried about Junifer, old man?
jpnChrName: おやっさん、ユニファが心配かよ？
jpnSearchText: おやっさん、ユニファが心配かよ？

engChrName: Hah, don't make me laugh. Anything happens to her, she'll have it comin'.
engSearchText:
Hah, don't make me laugh. Anything happens to her,
she'll have it comin'.
jpnChrName: フン、馬鹿言え…… 何かあっても自業自得だ。
jpnSearchText:
フン、馬鹿言え……
何かあっても自業自得だ。

engChrName: A driver that can't take care of their own ass has no business behind the wheel.
engSearchText:
A driver that can't take care of their own ass has no
business behind the wheel.
jpnChrName: ケツに責任持てねえ奴に ハンドルを握る資格はねえよ。
jpnSearchText:
ケツに責任持てねえ奴に
ハンドルを握る資格はねえよ。

engChrName: (Harsh, but he's got a point.)
engSearchText: (Harsh, but he's got a point.)
jpnChrName: （おやっさんも素直じゃねえよなぁ。   ま、その通りではあるんだが。）
jpnSearchText:
（おやっさんも素直じゃねえよなぁ。
ま、その通りではあるんだが。）

engChrName: Scavengin' for parts again, huh? You've sure put a lot of work into that Nightbreaker of yours.
engSearchText:
Scavengin' for parts again, huh? You've sure put a lot
of work into that Nightbreaker of yours.
jpnChrName: お前もまたパーツ漁りか？ 《ナイトブレイカー》も相当いじったろ。
jpnSearchText:
お前もまたパーツ漁りか？
《ナイトブレイカー》も相当いじったろ。

engChrName: Ya sure you ain't goin' overboard? You ain't got the deepest pockets in town, y'know.
engSearchText:
Ya sure you ain't goin' overboard? You ain't got the
deepest pockets in town, y'know.
jpnChrName: ミラもねえんだし そのくらいで満足しとけ。
jpnSearchText:
ミラもねえんだし
そのくらいで満足しとけ。

engChrName: Ugh. Don't remind me. But she still ain't on par with the old one. Mira's temporary, but my devotion is eternal!
engSearchText:
Ugh. Don't remind me. But she still ain't on par with
the old one. Mira's temporary, but my devotion
is eternal!
jpnChrName: ぐっ……“先代”に比べりゃまだまだ── ミラだってすぐに稼いでだな……！
jpnSearchText:
ぐっ……“先代”に比べりゃまだまだ──
ミラだってすぐに稼いでだな……！

engChrName: Geez. Fix up the car all you want—what ya really need is a tuneup on that junker between yer ears.
engSearchText:
Geez. Fix up the car all you want—what ya really
need is a tuneup on that junker between yer ears.
jpnChrName: ったく、お前の車バカも治らねえな。
jpnSearchText: ったく、お前の車バカも治らねえな。

engChrName: Dunno how, but somehow along the way, Junifer up an' became a car freak. It was not my doin'.
engSearchText:
Dunno how, but somehow along the way, Junifer up
an' became a car freak. It was not my doin'.
jpnChrName: 俺ァユニファに勧めた覚えはねえんだが…… いつの間にか車バカになってやがったからな。
jpnSearchText:
俺ァユニファに勧めた覚えはねえんだが……
いつの間にか車バカになってやがったからな。

engChrName: I need to keep a close eye on her while she works.
engSearchText: I need to keep a close eye on her while she works.
jpnChrName: だったら整備くらいはできた方がいい。
jpnSearchText: だったら整備くらいはできた方がいい。

engChrName: Tinkerin' with a car without the proper know-how can get you hurt—or worse. She still needs a lotta babyin' here.
engSearchText:
Tinkerin' with a car without the proper know-how
can get you hurt—or worse. She still needs a lotta
babyin' here.
jpnChrName: 適当にいじった車じゃ命に関わる。 コイツのためにもうるさく言ってやらんとな。
jpnSearchText:
適当にいじった車じゃ命に関わる。
コイツのためにもうるさく言ってやらんとな。

engChrName: She's always yappin' about one thing or another. I can't keep up with 'er.
engSearchText:
She's always yappin' about one thing or another.
I can't keep up with 'er.
jpnChrName: この馬鹿、いつまでもゴネやがって。
jpnSearchText: この馬鹿、いつまでもゴネやがって。

engChrName: Honestly, these rare aerodynamic parts are goin' to waste on a car like that.
engSearchText:
Honestly, these rare aerodynamic parts are goin' to
waste on a car like that.
jpnChrName: 大体エアロなんざ、テメエのドラテクにゃ 勿体なくて宝の持ち腐れだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
大体エアロなんざ、テメエのドラテクにゃ
勿体なくて宝の持ち腐れだぜ。

engChrName: I'd get it if she was tryin' to deck out a Z1 car, but she isn't.
engSearchText:
I'd get it if she was tryin' to deck out a Z1 car, but
she isn't.
jpnChrName: Ｚ１レーサーにでもなるんなら別だがな。
jpnSearchText: Ｚ１レーサーにでもなるんなら別だがな。

engChrName: Aww, yeah! Finally finished in here!
engSearchText: Aww, yeah! Finally finished in here!
jpnChrName: くはぁ～っ！！　やっと終わったぁ～っ！！
jpnSearchText: くはぁ～っ！！　やっと終わったぁ～っ！！

engChrName: Engine replacement done!
engSearchText: Engine replacement done!
jpnChrName: エンジン載せ替え、完了っ！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>エンジン載せ替え、完了っ！！

engChrName: (Well, doesn't she look pleased as punch.)
engSearchText: (Well, doesn't she look pleased as punch.)
jpnChrName: （フフ……いいカオすんじゃねえか。）
jpnSearchText: （フフ……いいカオすんじゃねえか。）

engChrName: Hold it there—you ain't done just yet.
engSearchText: Hold it there—you ain't done just yet.
jpnChrName: ──オイ、ユニファ。 まだ終わってねえぞ。
jpnSearchText:
──オイ、ユニファ。
まだ終わってねえぞ。

engChrName: It looks pretty done to me!
engSearchText: It looks pretty done to me!
jpnChrName: へえっ！？
jpnSearchText: へえっ！？

engChrName: But it's not. I told you before that if you wire everything to the orbal system like that, the balance will be all outta whack.
engSearchText:
But it's not. I told you before that if you wire
everything to the orbal system like that, the balance
will be all outta whack.
jpnChrName: 言ったろ、導力系統だけ繋いでも バランスが悪すぎてロクに走れねえ。
jpnSearchText:
言ったろ、導力系統だけ繋いでも
バランスが悪すぎてロクに走れねえ。

engChrName: This ain't yer run-of-the-mill Kabul anymore, so you can't go treatin' it like one.
engSearchText:
This ain't yer run-of-the-mill Kabul anymore, so you
can't go treatin' it like one.
jpnChrName: コイツはもう元の《カブール》じゃねえんだ。 新しい“あるべき姿”に整えてやれ。
jpnSearchText:
コイツはもう元の《カブール》じゃねえんだ。
新しい“あるべき姿”に整えてやれ。

engChrName: O-Oh! Right on, boss! I'll fix it up in a jiffy!
engSearchText: O-Oh! Right on, boss! I'll fix it up in a jiffy!
jpnChrName: りょ、了解っ！！ こうなったら徹底的にやるよーっ！！
jpnSearchText:
りょ、了解っ！！
こうなったら徹底的にやるよーっ！！

engChrName: (She plannin' on pullin' an all-nighter?)
engSearchText: (She plannin' on pullin' an all-nighter?)
jpnChrName: （ハハ、こいつは徹夜コースか？）
jpnSearchText: （ハハ、こいつは徹夜コースか？）

engChrName: (Welp. Better get used to it if she's gonna be workin' for the old man.)
engSearchText:
(Welp. Better get used to it if she's gonna be workin'
for the old man.)
jpnChrName: （おやっさんもなんだかんだ   付き合うつもりみてえだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（おやっさんもなんだかんだ
付き合うつもりみてえだな。）

engChrName: Here you go! A cup of your favorite coffee! And how're ya feelin'? Need a shoulder rub? Back massage? Just gotta ask!
engSearchText:
Here you go! A cup of your favorite coffee!
And how're ya feelin'? Need a shoulder rub?
Back massage? Just gotta ask!
jpnChrName: ハーイ、伯父さんの好きなコーヒー♪ あと肩でも揉んであげよっか～？
jpnSearchText:
ハーイ、伯父さんの好きなコーヒー♪
あと肩でも揉んであげよっか～？

engChrName: You either ain't the Junifer I know, or there's something yer after. Now spill.
engSearchText:
You either ain't the Junifer I know, or there's
something yer after. Now spill.
jpnChrName: オイ、気持ち悪ィぞ。 何を企んでやがる……？
jpnSearchText:
オイ、気持ち悪ィぞ。
何を企んでやがる……？

engChrName: Nope! I'm not after anything. At. All! I just wanted you to know how much I appreciate you!
engSearchText:
Nope! I'm not after anything. At. All! I just wanted
you to know how much I appreciate you!
jpnChrName: イヤイヤ、なんでもないんだよ？ 日頃の感謝を込めてってね㈱
jpnSearchText:
イヤイヤ、なんでもないんだよ？
日頃の感謝を込めてってね㈱

engChrName: Is it bad that I want to repay the kindness you've shown me?
engSearchText:
Is it bad that I want to repay the kindness you've
shown me?
jpnChrName: それともな～に？　優しくされたら あたしに恩返ししたくなっちゃう～？
jpnSearchText:
それともな～に？　優しくされたら
あたしに恩返ししたくなっちゃう～？

engChrName: No, but it's bad to get all up in my personal space like that! Shoo!
engSearchText:
No, but it's bad to get all up in my personal space
like that! Shoo!
jpnChrName: 耳元で囁くんじゃねえ！ あっち行きやがれ、シッシッ！
jpnSearchText:
耳元で囁くんじゃねえ！
あっち行きやがれ、シッシッ！

engChrName: (Family, all right. Barkin' at each other all the time, but at least they still get along.)
engSearchText:
(Family, all right. Barkin' at each other all the time,
but at least they still get along.)
jpnChrName: （何だかんだ仲いいよな、この二人もよ。）
jpnSearchText: （何だかんだ仲いいよな、この二人もよ。）

engChrName: Hey there, Van! Who's the cutie?
engSearchText: Hey there, Van! Who's the cutie?
jpnChrName: ヴァンじゃん～！ ワォ、しかもカワイイ子連れてる！？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンじゃん～！
ワォ、しかもカワイイ子連れてる！？

engChrName: Hey, Junifer. How're you and the old man?
engSearchText: Hey, Junifer. How're you and the old man?
jpnChrName: ようユニファ、おやっさんも。
jpnSearchText: ようユニファ、おやっさんも。

engChrName: I hope we're not interrupting.
engSearchText: I hope we're not interrupting.
jpnChrName: あの、お邪魔しています。
jpnSearchText: あの、お邪魔しています。

engChrName: I've never been to an auto repair shop.
engSearchText: I've never been to an auto repair shop.
jpnChrName: ここは車の整備屋……でしょうか？
jpnSearchText: ここは車の整備屋……でしょうか？

engChrName: Then mighty pleased to meet ya, young lass. We take care of car repairs and customization jobs alike in 'ere.
engSearchText:
Then mighty pleased to meet ya, young lass. We take
care of car repairs and customization jobs alike in 'ere.
jpnChrName: まあな、ウチは整備やら改造やらを 専門でやっててな。
jpnSearchText:
まあな、ウチは整備やら改造やらを
専門でやっててな。

engChrName: It ain't much, but feel free to take a look around if you're interested.
engSearchText:
It ain't much, but feel free to take a look around if
you're interested.
jpnChrName: 小綺麗な店じゃねえが 興味があるなら見ていけや。
jpnSearchText:
小綺麗な店じゃねえが
興味があるなら見ていけや。

engChrName: Thank you, sir.
engSearchText: Thank you, sir.
jpnChrName: はい……えっと。（チラッ）
jpnSearchText: はい……えっと。（チラッ）

engChrName: What're you up to this time? Another tire switch? Dang. Ever heard of brand loyalty?
engSearchText:
What're you up to this time? Another tire switch?
Dang. Ever heard of brand loyalty?
jpnChrName: なんだ、またホイール変えたのかよ。 ちょいと浮気しすぎなんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
なんだ、またホイール変えたのかよ。
ちょいと浮気しすぎなんじゃねえか？

engChrName: Nope! If I'm not happy with a part, it ain't goin' in my car! And I gotta fix the suspension anyway.
engSearchText:
Nope! If I'm not happy with a part, it ain't goin' in
my car! And I gotta fix the suspension anyway.
jpnChrName: あたしの恋は当たって砕けろなのだっ！ ……ついでにサスペンション周りもさ～！
jpnSearchText:
あたしの恋は当たって砕けろなのだっ！
……ついでにサスペンション周りもさ～！

engChrName: (Van looked like he was having fun with that magazine earlier. He really must like cars.)
engSearchText:
(Van looked like he was having fun with that
magazine earlier. He really must like cars.)
jpnChrName: （そういえばヴァンさん、   車雑誌を嬉しそうに読んでいたような……）
jpnSearchText:
（そういえばヴァンさん、
車雑誌を嬉しそうに読んでいたような……）

engChrName: Don't pay 'em any mind. You'll need an oil change before they shut up.
engSearchText:
Don't pay 'em any mind. You'll need an oil change
before they shut up.
jpnChrName: こいつらの事は気にすんな。 ……ったく、いつも長々話し込みやがって。
jpnSearchText:
こいつらの事は気にすんな。
……ったく、いつも長々話し込みやがって。

engChrName: C'mon, you two! You talk business, or you talk outta my shop!
engSearchText:
C'mon, you two! You talk business, or you
talk outta my shop!
jpnChrName: オラ、営業妨害だぞ！！ 用が済んだら帰りやがれ！！
jpnSearchText:
オラ、営業妨害だぞ！！
用が済んだら帰りやがれ！！

engChrName: C'mon, Uncle! I can totally pimp it up with some aerodynamic parts!
engSearchText:
C'mon, Uncle! I can totally pimp it up with some
aerodynamic parts!
jpnChrName: ねーねー伯父さん、 こうなったらエアロパーツとかもさ～！
jpnSearchText:
ねーねー伯父さん、
こうなったらエアロパーツとかもさ～！

engChrName: With what mira? Go on, get goin' home, you!
engSearchText: With what mira? Go on, get goin' home, you!
jpnChrName: お前、もうミラねえだろ…… 甘えてねえで今日は帰れ！
jpnSearchText:
お前、もうミラねえだろ……
甘えてねえで今日は帰れ！

engChrName: Oh, I didn't know they were related.
engSearchText: Oh, I didn't know they were related.
jpnChrName: あはは、よく分かりませんけど…… ……でも伯父さんって？
jpnSearchText:
あはは、よく分かりませんけど……
……でも伯父さんって？

engChrName: That they are, though they act more like cats and dogs.
engSearchText:
That they are, though they act more like cats
and dogs.
jpnChrName: ああ、そのまんまだ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、そのまんまだ。

engChrName: The old man's an expert on the field. Used to be a mechanic for Ingert.
engSearchText:
The old man's an expert on the field. Used to be a
mechanic for Ingert.
jpnChrName: ちなみにおやっさんは元インゲルトの技師でな。 その道じゃ腕利きなんだが……
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにおやっさんは元インゲルトの技師でな。
その道じゃ腕利きなんだが……

engChrName: Junifer here is his niece. She's been mentorin' under him for a while now, and working part time at his shop.
engSearchText:
Junifer here is his niece. She's been mentorin' under
him for a while now, and working part time at
his shop.
jpnChrName: 姪っ子のユニファは転がす方が好みってわけだ。 ここでバイトもしてるがな。
jpnSearchText:
姪っ子のユニファは転がす方が好みってわけだ。
ここでバイトもしてるがな。

engChrName: And I get to buy all the parts I want thanks to this job!
engSearchText:
And I get to buy all the parts I want thanks to
this job!
jpnChrName: そうそう、伯父さんトコでバイトして パーツ買い揃えてんの♪
jpnSearchText:
そうそう、伯父さんトコでバイトして
パーツ買い揃えてんの♪

engChrName: What do you think of my baby here? Pretty bomb for a Kabul, if I do say so myself!
engSearchText:
What do you think of my baby here? Pretty bomb for
a Kabul, if I do say so myself!
jpnChrName: ちなみにこの《カブール》、あたしの愛車㈱ ──イカスっしょ！？
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにこの《カブール》、あたしの愛車㈱
──イカスっしょ！？

engChrName: Bah. No point in customizin' a ride that won't pass inspection. Ya better stop spendin' money you don't got.
engSearchText:
Bah. No point in customizin' a ride that won't
pass inspection. Ya better stop spendin' money you
don't got.
jpnChrName: 車検通らねえ改造はしねえぞ。 あとツケ払いも無しだ、いいな！？
jpnSearchText:
車検通らねえ改造はしねえぞ。
あとツケ払いも無しだ、いいな！？

engChrName: And whose fault is that, huh?! Maybe you should give me a raise, then!
engSearchText:
And whose fault is that, huh?! Maybe you should give
me a raise, then!
jpnChrName: ぶーぶー、伯父さんのケチンボ～！
jpnSearchText: ぶーぶー、伯父さんのケチンボ～！

engChrName: You two are related, all right.
engSearchText: You two are related, all right.
jpnChrName: ああ、おやっさんは全然 まけてくんねえよなぁ～！
jpnSearchText:
ああ、おやっさんは全然
まけてくんねえよなぁ～！

engChrName: (Everyone here looks like they know a lot about cars.)
engSearchText: (Everyone here looks like they know a lot about cars.)
jpnChrName: （皆さん大の車好き、みたいですね。）
jpnSearchText: （皆さん大の車好き、みたいですね。）

engChrName: (And Van's a regular, it looks like. Maybe he has a car of his own?)
engSearchText:
(And Van's a regular, it looks like. Maybe he has a car
of his own?)
jpnChrName: （ヴァンさんも常連みたいだけど……   車を持っていたりするのかな？）
jpnSearchText:
（ヴァンさんも常連みたいだけど……
車を持っていたりするのかな？）

engChrName: Seein' everyone drive like that today gave a whole buncha new ideas to try and pull off myself!
engSearchText:
Seein' everyone drive like that today gave a whole
buncha new ideas to try and pull off myself!
jpnChrName: いやぁ～、ヴァンが呼んでくれた皆の 走りっぷりは色々と勉強になっちゃった！
jpnSearchText:
いやぁ～、ヴァンが呼んでくれた皆の
走りっぷりは色々と勉強になっちゃった！

engChrName: I still have a long way to go if I want to be a good driver. And, of course, if I want a sick ride!
engSearchText:
I still have a long way to go if I want to be a
good driver. And, of course, if I want a sick ride!
jpnChrName: 私自身のテクニックもマシンのカスタムも まだまだ磨いていく余地がありそう。
jpnSearchText:
私自身のテクニックもマシンのカスタムも
まだまだ磨いていく余地がありそう。

engChrName: Nothing's gonna stop me from being a racer!
engSearchText: Nothing's gonna stop me from being a racer!
jpnChrName: ふふっ、これだから 走り屋は止められないのよね！
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、これだから
走り屋は止められないのよね！

engChrName: Time to hunker down and start learnin' these racing rules! After that, I gotta pick a partner!
engSearchText:
Time to hunker down and start learnin' these
racing rules! After that, I gotta pick a partner!
jpnChrName: ゲームのルールや対戦相手の選び方は こっちで考えておくからね～！
jpnSearchText:
ゲームのルールや対戦相手の選び方は
こっちで考えておくからね～！

engChrName: For today's race, we're gonna need to go all in, no holds barred!
engSearchText:
For today's race, we're gonna need to go all in, no
holds barred!
jpnChrName: あっ、そうだ…… 勝負すると言ったらアレも必要だよね！？
jpnSearchText:
あっ、そうだ……
勝負すると言ったらアレも必要だよね！？

engChrName: I'll get it all up and runnin', so you just worry about flexin' those driver muscles today!
engSearchText:
I'll get it all up and runnin', so you just worry about
flexin' those driver muscles today!
jpnChrName: むふふ～、用意しておくから ヴァンも楽しみにしててよね～！
jpnSearchText:
むふふ～、用意しておくから
ヴァンも楽しみにしててよね～！

engChrName: Leave 'em eatin' dust! I know you're just as pumped for this as I am!
engSearchText:
Leave 'em eatin' dust! I know you're just as pumped
for this as I am!
jpnChrName: あっ、その様子だともしかして 最後の謎解きまで終わったの？
jpnSearchText:
あっ、その様子だともしかして
最後の謎解きまで終わったの？

engChrName: Did you enjoy 'Van Appreciation Day'? I bet it was cool! Wish I could've joined.
engSearchText:
Did you enjoy 'Van Appreciation Day'? I bet it
was cool! Wish I could've joined.
jpnChrName: どうだった、ヴァンありがとうパーティ！ あたしも参加してみたかったなぁ～！
jpnSearchText:
どうだった、ヴァンありがとうパーティ！
あたしも参加してみたかったなぁ～！

engChrName: C'mon, don't call it that. It's embarrassing. Even if it's not that far off...
engSearchText:
C'mon, don't call it that. It's embarrassing. Even if it's
not that far off...
jpnChrName: なんだその小恥ずかしい名前はよ…… まあ確かにそんな内容だったが。
jpnSearchText:
なんだその小恥ずかしい名前はよ……
まあ確かにそんな内容だったが。

engChrName: Thanks for washin' my truck, and sorry you got wrapped up in all the, er, 'appreciating.'
engSearchText:
Thanks for washin' my truck, and sorry you got
wrapped up in all the, er, 'appreciating.'
jpnChrName: 洗車してもらって助かってるが、 なんつうか、巻き込んで悪かったな。
jpnSearchText:
洗車してもらって助かってるが、
なんつうか、巻き込んで悪かったな。

engChrName: Don't mention it! Least I could do for a drivin' buddy!
engSearchText:
Don't mention it! Least I could do for a
drivin' buddy!
jpnChrName: 気にしないで、車乗り仲間として 協力したかっただけだし。
jpnSearchText:
気にしないで、車乗り仲間として
協力したかっただけだし。

engChrName: Don't worry about takin' her back—I'll drive her home once I'm done with this shiny new wax finish!
engSearchText:
Don't worry about takin' her back—I'll drive her
home once I'm done with this shiny new wax finish!
jpnChrName: 洗車が終わったら車庫に届けてあげるから 楽しみにしててね～！
jpnSearchText:
洗車が終わったら車庫に届けてあげるから
楽しみにしててね～！

engChrName: Looks like the Van Appreciation party went off without a hitch!
engSearchText:
Looks like the Van Appreciation party went off
without a hitch!
jpnChrName: ヴァンありがとうパーティも 成功したみたいでよかった～！
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンありがとうパーティも
成功したみたいでよかった～！

engChrName: I'll drive your truck over to your garage once I'm done washin' her. Look forward to seein' that sexy new wax job!
engSearchText:
I'll drive your truck over to your garage once I'm done
washin' her. Look forward to seein' that sexy new
wax job!
jpnChrName: 洗車が終わったら車庫に届けてあげるから 楽しみにしててね～。
jpnSearchText:
洗車が終わったら車庫に届けてあげるから
楽しみにしててね～。

engChrName: I'm gonna give your truck a new wax finish. Get ready to see her shine better than ever!
engSearchText:
I'm gonna give your truck a new wax finish. Get ready
to see her shine better than ever!
jpnChrName: ヴァンの愛車はピッカピカにしておくから 楽しみにしててよね～！
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンの愛車はピッカピカにしておくから
楽しみにしててよね～！

engChrName: Ahh, I can't wait to get behind the wheel of my new Kabul!
engSearchText:
Ahh, I can't wait to get behind the wheel of my
new Kabul!
jpnChrName: むふ～っ！！　興奮してきた！！ 早く新しい《カブール》を走らせたい！！
jpnSearchText:
むふ～っ！！　興奮してきた！！
早く新しい《カブール》を走らせたい！！

engChrName: The pedal's about to really hit the metal!
engSearchText: The pedal's about to really hit the metal!
jpnChrName: こうなったら徹底的にやるよーっ！！
jpnSearchText: こうなったら徹底的にやるよーっ！！

engChrName: Woohoo! I finally found it! Finally gonna get to install my brand new engine!
engSearchText:
Woohoo! I finally found it! Finally gonna get to
install my brand new engine!
jpnChrName: ひゃっほー！　やったよヴァン！！ これからエンジンを載せ替えるの！！
jpnSearchText:
ひゃっほー！　やったよヴァン！！
これからエンジンを載せ替えるの！！

engChrName: N-No way! Really?!
engSearchText: N-No way! Really?!
jpnChrName: なっ、なんだと……！？
jpnSearchText: なっ、なんだと……！？

engChrName: Damn. I'm green with envy... How did you even find an engine that fit?
engSearchText:
Damn. I'm green with envy... How did you even find
an engine that fit?
jpnChrName: チクショー、流石に羨ましいぜ…… だがよく丁度いいエンジンが見つかったな？
jpnSearchText:
チクショー、流石に羨ましいぜ……
だがよく丁度いいエンジンが見つかったな？

engChrName: I'm pretty sure your car's only meant to take its exact custom engine. Must've been a tough find.
engSearchText:
I'm pretty sure your car's only meant to take its exact
custom engine. Must've been a tough find.
jpnChrName: 基本的に他車のエンジンを乗せるようには 設計されてねえからな、レアなはずなんだが。
jpnSearchText:
基本的に他車のエンジンを乗せるようには
設計されてねえからな、レアなはずなんだが。

engChrName: Heh heh! Not as tough when you got my uncle's know-how and my mechanical prowess!
engSearchText:
Heh heh! Not as tough when you got my uncle's
know-how and my mechanical prowess!
jpnChrName: えっへん！　そこは伯父さんの知識と あたしの引きの強さかな！？
jpnSearchText:
えっへん！　そこは伯父さんの知識と
あたしの引きの強さかな！？

engChrName: Weight distribution's gonna be waaay different, but this'll put me in another class on the track anyway!
engSearchText:
Weight distribution's gonna be waaay different, but
this'll put me in another class on the track anyway!
jpnChrName: 車体の重量バランスは変えないとだけど なんとか一ランク上のが載せられそうなんだ～！
jpnSearchText:
車体の重量バランスは変えないとだけど
なんとか一ランク上のが載せられそうなんだ～！

engChrName: Just you sit tight, my little Kabul. You're about to be the hottest comet on the circuit!
engSearchText:
Just you sit tight, my little Kabul. You're about to be
the hottest comet on the circuit!
jpnChrName: 待っててね、あたしの《カブール》！ もっとカッコ良く仕上げてあげるからっ♪
jpnSearchText:
待っててね、あたしの《カブール》！
もっとカッコ良く仕上げてあげるからっ♪

engChrName: (Haha, her excitement is infectious.)
engSearchText: (Haha, her excitement is infectious.)
jpnChrName: （ふふっ、本当に夢中みたいですね。）
jpnSearchText: （ふふっ、本当に夢中みたいですね。）

engChrName: (Can't blame her. Ain't gonna be long before my sweet little Nightbreaker gets the same treatment.)
engSearchText:
(Can't blame her. Ain't gonna be long before my
sweet little Nightbreaker gets the same treatment.)
jpnChrName: （ああ、車好きにとっちゃ浪漫だぜ。   俺の《ナイトブレイカー》もそのうち……！）
jpnSearchText:
（ああ、車好きにとっちゃ浪漫だぜ。
俺の《ナイトブレイカー》もそのうち……！）

engChrName: (And off you go. You're like a kid that won't shut up about their toys. Oversized toys.)
engSearchText:
(And off you go. You're like a kid that won't shut up
about their toys. Oversized toys.)
jpnChrName: （ハッ、キモいからやめろやオッサン。）
jpnSearchText: （ハッ、キモいからやめろやオッサン。）

engChrName: My darling Kabul is finally gonna get a serious upgrade! I can't wait!
engSearchText:
My darling Kabul is finally gonna get a
serious upgrade! I can't wait!
jpnChrName: いよいよ《カブール》が生まれ変わるの！！ くぅ～～～っ、待ちきれないよーっ！！
jpnSearchText:
いよいよ《カブール》が生まれ変わるの！！
くぅ～～～っ、待ちきれないよーっ！！

engChrName: But my uncle said he wouldn't help me here.
engSearchText: But my uncle said he wouldn't help me here.
jpnChrName: でも伯父さん、今回は 手伝わないって言い張ってて。
jpnSearchText:
でも伯父さん、今回は
手伝わないって言い張ってて。

engChrName: So it's all up to me here! Don't worry, darlin'! I'll make you shine!
engSearchText:
So it's all up to me here! Don't worry, darlin'!
I'll make you shine!
jpnChrName: あたしが面倒見なくちゃいけないの。 よおっし、頑張るぞっ！！
jpnSearchText:
あたしが面倒見なくちゃいけないの。
よおっし、頑張るぞっ！！

engChrName: Everyone's takin' a break right now, so I've just been cooped up in here. Man, I could go out for a drive right now...
engSearchText:
Everyone's takin' a break right now, so I've just been
cooped up in here. Man, I could go out for a drive
right now...
jpnChrName: しばらくはチームも活動休止でさ、 走りに行けてないんだ～。
jpnSearchText:
しばらくはチームも活動休止でさ、
走りに行けてないんだ～。

engChrName: *sigh* I guess that's just life for ya. All I can do is busy myself around the shop and save up my mira.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I guess that's just life for ya. All I can do is busy
myself around the shop and save up my mira.
jpnChrName: はぁ、しょうがないよね。 今はバイトしてミラを溜めるしか──
jpnSearchText:
はぁ、しょうがないよね。
今はバイトしてミラを溜めるしか──

engChrName: (Wait, isn't this guy, like, super famous or somethin'?! What the heck is he doin' HERE?!)
engSearchText:
(Wait, isn't this guy, like, super famous or somethin'?!
What the heck is he doin' HERE?!)
jpnChrName: （てか、あの人ってあの有名人だよね！？   なんでこんなトコにいんのーっ！？）
jpnSearchText:
（てか、あの人ってあの有名人だよね！？
なんでこんなトコにいんのーっ！？）

engChrName: (Hot damn, I need to find something for him to sign! ASAP!)
engSearchText:
(Hot damn, I need to find something for him to sign!
ASAP!)
jpnChrName: （やばっ、マジサイン欲しいんですけど！！）
jpnSearchText: （やばっ、マジサイン欲しいんですけど！！）

engChrName: C'mooon, Uncle! I just wanna replace my engine!
engSearchText:
C'mooon, Uncle! I just wanna replace
my engine!
jpnChrName: お～じ～さ～～～ん！！ やっぱりエンジン載せ替えたいんだよ～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
お～じ～さ～～～ん！！
やっぱりエンジン載せ替えたいんだよ～っ！！

engChrName: It's the only way I'm gonna get max performance out of my Kabul!
engSearchText:
It's the only way I'm gonna get max
performance out of my Kabul!
jpnChrName: あたしの《カブール》の性能を 完全に引き出すにはそれしか──っ！！
jpnSearchText:
あたしの《カブール》の性能を
完全に引き出すにはそれしか──っ！！

engChrName: Goddess be, would ya knock it off?! Go on and annoy someone else!
engSearchText:
Goddess be, would ya knock it off?! Go on and annoy
someone else!
jpnChrName: うるせーな、ひっつくんじゃねえ！ 早く帰れっ！！
jpnSearchText:
うるせーな、ひっつくんじゃねえ！
早く帰れっ！！

engChrName: Pleeease! I'll cough up the mira—I just need your help findin' the right engine!
engSearchText:
Pleeease! I'll cough up the mira—I just need your
help findin' the right engine!
jpnChrName: ふえぇ……ミラは何とかするからぁ！ いい中古エンジン見つけてきてよ～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
ふえぇ……ミラは何とかするからぁ！
いい中古エンジン見つけてきてよ～っ！！

engChrName: That's the problem! Do you even understand how hard it'll be to find somethin' that'll even FIT?
engSearchText:
That's the problem! Do you even understand how
hard it'll be to find somethin' that'll even FIT?
jpnChrName: 鼻水つけんなっ！ 第一んな都合よく見つかるかっつーの……！
jpnSearchText:
鼻水つけんなっ！
第一んな都合よく見つかるかっつーの……！

engChrName: Losing's such a bummer.
engSearchText: Losing's such a bummer.
jpnChrName: ふぅ……何よりも個人戦で 負けちゃったのは悔しいけど。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ……何よりも個人戦で
負けちゃったのは悔しいけど。

engChrName: But it's not all bad! I got to let loose and drive my heart out! Ohh, that felt so good! My little baby's the best car in town!
engSearchText:
But it's not all bad! I got to let loose and drive my
heart out! Ohh, that felt so good! My little baby's the
best car in town!
jpnChrName: 思う存分走れて気持ちよかったわ。 やっぱり車はこれがサイコーよね！
jpnSearchText:
思う存分走れて気持ちよかったわ。
やっぱり車はこれがサイコーよね！

engChrName: (I'd love to go on a road trip with Graham, but I can't swing it.)
engSearchText:
(I'd love to go on a road trip with Graham, but I can't
swing it.)
jpnChrName: （グレアムとツーリングにでも行こうかと   思ってるんだけどさ、旅費がね～。）
jpnSearchText:
（グレアムとツーリングにでも行こうかと
思ってるんだけどさ、旅費がね～。）

engChrName: (All of my paychecks have been goin' straight to car parts. I could straight up declare bankruptcy on myself.)
engSearchText:
(All of my paychecks have been goin' straight to
car parts. I could straight up declare bankruptcy
on myself.)
jpnChrName: （ここのバイト代は全部パーツに   つぎ込んじゃったし、手持ちがなくって♪）
jpnSearchText:
（ここのバイト代は全部パーツに
つぎ込んじゃったし、手持ちがなくって♪）

engChrName: (Not to mention I'll never hear the end of it if my uncle gets wind of the idea.)
engSearchText:
(Not to mention I'll never hear the end of it if my
uncle gets wind of the idea.)
jpnChrName: （伯父さん何だかんだ言って   絡まれるとヨワイんだよね～㈱）
jpnSearchText:
（伯父さん何だかんだ言って
絡まれるとヨワイんだよね～㈱）

engChrName: Oh! Is that the new fall catalog with the latest car models?!
engSearchText:
Oh! Is that the new fall catalog with the latest
car models?!
jpnChrName: おっ、そいつは今秋発表の 新車カタログじゃねえか！
jpnSearchText:
おっ、そいつは今秋発表の
新車カタログじゃねえか！

engChrName: Welcome! And yup! Sharp as ever. Got all the newest models from every manufacturer!
engSearchText:
Welcome! And yup! Sharp as ever. Got all the newest
models from every manufacturer!
jpnChrName: あ、いらっしゃ～い！ そーそー、各メーカーの新車が載ってんの！
jpnSearchText:
あ、いらっしゃ～い！
そーそー、各メーカーの新車が載ってんの！

engChrName: Check out this Red Star! Engine's got a horsepower of over four hundred! Price just about matches it, too!
engSearchText:
Check out this Red Star! Engine's got a horsepower
of over four hundred! Price just about matches it, too!
jpnChrName: 見てみて、このレッドスターなんて ４００馬力越えだよ！？　値段もブッ飛んでるけど！
jpnSearchText:
見てみて、このレッドスターなんて
４００馬力越えだよ！？　値段もブッ飛んでるけど！

engChrName: Heard they did a test drive at the launch press event. Man, what I wouldn't give to get a chance behind the wheel of one of those puppies.
engSearchText:
Heard they did a test drive at the launch press event.
Man, what I wouldn't give to get a chance behind the
wheel of one of those puppies.
jpnChrName: 新車発表会じゃ試乗スペースもあったらしいが…… ハンドルだけでも握りたいモンだぜ！
jpnSearchText:
新車発表会じゃ試乗スペースもあったらしいが……
ハンドルだけでも握りたいモンだぜ！

engChrName: Ditto! Ingert and Leno forgive me, but I'll totally cheat on my favorites with one of these babies!
engSearchText:
Ditto! Ingert and Leno forgive me, but I'll totally
cheat on my favorites with one of these babies!
jpnChrName: だよね～！　あたしもインゲルトかレノ派だけど この子は気になっちゃうよ～！！
jpnSearchText:
だよね～！　あたしもインゲルトかレノ派だけど
この子は気になっちゃうよ～！！

engChrName: Haha... Sounds like the event was a must for car fans.
engSearchText: Haha... Sounds like the event was a must for car fans.
jpnChrName: あはは……車好きな人には 見逃せないイベントだったみたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……車好きな人には
見逃せないイベントだったみたいですね。

engChrName: I don't get it, but if you're happy, then I'm happy for you!
engSearchText:
I don't get it, but if you're happy, then I'm happy
for you!
jpnChrName: う～ん、よく分かりませんけど 熱い想いは伝わってきますっ！
jpnSearchText:
う～ん、よく分かりませんけど
熱い想いは伝わってきますっ！

engChrName: I wouldn't mind getting my hands on one, but I don't have the money to cough up for it.
engSearchText:
I wouldn't mind getting my hands on one, but I don't
have the money to cough up for it.
jpnChrName: チッ、俺も気にはなるが…… さすがにミラが足りねーな。
jpnSearchText:
チッ、俺も気にはなるが……
さすがにミラが足りねーな。

engChrName: Got a real hankering for checkin' out some new cars!
engSearchText: Got a real hankering for checkin' out some new cars!
jpnChrName: 新車はいいよね～、あたしも見に行きたいな～！
jpnSearchText: 新車はいいよね～、あたしも見に行きたいな～！

engChrName: I sooo wanna check out the motor pavilion in Basel. That's where the Verne Company is based.
engSearchText:
I sooo wanna check out the motor pavilion in Basel.
That's where the Verne Company is based.
jpnChrName: ヴェルヌ社の膝元、バーゼルには 《モーターパビリオン》があるんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
ヴェルヌ社の膝元、バーゼルには
《モーターパビリオン》があるんだけど……

engChrName: Maybe Graham and everyone else would be up for comin' with me?
engSearchText:
Maybe Graham and everyone else would be up for
comin' with me?
jpnChrName: 今度グレアム辺りを誘って ひとっ走り行ってこようかなぁ？
jpnSearchText:
今度グレアム辺りを誘って
ひとっ走り行ってこようかなぁ？

engChrName: We're just about to take our cars out!
engSearchText: We're just about to take our cars out!
jpnChrName: えっへへ～、これから走りに行く所なんだ～！
jpnSearchText: えっへへ～、これから走りに行く所なんだ～！

engChrName: Doin' a little drag racin' with friends. You up for it, Van?
engSearchText:
Doin' a little drag racin' with friends. You up for
it, Van?
jpnChrName: 身内でゼロヨンやるの！ ヴァンも一緒に行こうよ～！
jpnSearchText:
身内でゼロヨンやるの！
ヴァンも一緒に行こうよ～！

engChrName: Don't got time for that sort of thing when you're fully grown, kid.
engSearchText:
Don't got time for that sort of thing when you're fully
grown, kid.
jpnChrName: オトナは忙しいんだっつの。
jpnSearchText: オトナは忙しいんだっつの。

engChrName: But hey, have a good time. Don't go gettin' in any wrecks, hear?
engSearchText:
But hey, have a good time. Don't go gettin' in any
wrecks, hear?
jpnChrName: ……ま、お前らで楽しんで来いよ。 事故には気を付けろよ？
jpnSearchText:
……ま、お前らで楽しんで来いよ。
事故には気を付けろよ？

engChrName: Heh, I sure ain't plannin' on it!
engSearchText: Heh, I sure ain't plannin' on it!
jpnChrName: えっへへ～、分かってる！
jpnSearchText: えっへへ～、分かってる！

engChrName: Time to floor it!
engSearchText: Time to floor it!
jpnChrName: そんじゃ今日も吹かしてこっかな！
jpnSearchText: そんじゃ今日も吹かしてこっかな！

engChrName: Downey's always keepin' up with all the latest car models and whatnot. I should go see what he thinks!
engSearchText:
Downey's always keepin' up with all the latest car
models and whatnot. I should go see what he thinks!
jpnChrName: ダウニーが新車新車ってうるさいから 相談にも乗ってあげないとね！
jpnSearchText:
ダウニーが新車新車ってうるさいから
相談にも乗ってあげないとね！

engChrName: I'm cleaning the engine bays of used cars today!
engSearchText: I'm cleaning the engine bays of used cars today!
jpnChrName: 今日はバイトなんだよね～！ 中古車のエンジン回りを掃除してっと。
jpnSearchText:
今日はバイトなんだよね～！
中古車のエンジン回りを掃除してっと。

engChrName: *sigh* I need to be real careful about maintenance when it comes to Uncle. He's real strict about work.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I need to be real careful about maintenance
when it comes to Uncle. He's real strict about work.
jpnChrName: ふう、伯父さんってば整備だけは うるさいから、丁寧にやんないと。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、伯父さんってば整備だけは
うるさいから、丁寧にやんないと。

engChrName: You know, we started servicing orbal bikes recently, so I'll need to learn how to work on those, too.
engSearchText:
You know, we started servicing orbal bikes recently,
so I'll need to learn how to work on those, too.
jpnChrName: あと、最近はバイクも取扱を始めたみたいで そっちも整備を覚えないとね～。
jpnSearchText:
あと、最近はバイクも取扱を始めたみたいで
そっちも整備を覚えないとね～。

engChrName: That one over there's a Red Star, yeah? Looks a bit below the Direwolf's ride, but only barely.
engSearchText:
That one over there's a Red Star, yeah? Looks a bit
below the Direwolf's ride, but only barely.
jpnChrName: あのレッドスター製か…… 《痩せ狼》のよりワンランク下みてえだが。
jpnSearchText:
あのレッドスター製か……
《痩せ狼》のよりワンランク下みてえだが。

engChrName: But it's still so cool looking! Maybe we can try riding it?
engSearchText:
But it's still so cool looking! Maybe we can try
riding it?
jpnChrName: それでもカッコイイですね！ わたしたちでも乗れるんでしょうか……？
jpnSearchText:
それでもカッコイイですね！
わたしたちでも乗れるんでしょうか……？

engChrName: Haha, you need a license first, kiddo! But I bet you'd be a natural at it if you could ride one.
engSearchText:
Haha, you need a license first, kiddo! But I bet you'd
be a natural at it if you could ride one.
jpnChrName: あはは、導力車と同じで免許が必要かな！ 導力車免許があれば割と簡単らしいけど。
jpnSearchText:
あはは、導力車と同じで免許が必要かな！
導力車免許があれば割と簡単らしいけど。

engChrName: Not many people own bikes yet, so we're gonna start renting 'em out here.
engSearchText:
Not many people own bikes yet, so we're gonna start
renting 'em out here.
jpnChrName: バイクは持ってる人も少ないから ここでレンタルも始めるみたいだよ～。
jpnSearchText:
バイクは持ってる人も少ないから
ここでレンタルも始めるみたいだよ～。

engChrName: Even if we can't ride one now, I'd love to try it out someday.
engSearchText:
Even if we can't ride one now, I'd love to try it
out someday.
jpnChrName: そうなんですね。 私たちは乗れませんけど、面白そうです。
jpnSearchText:
そうなんですね。
私たちは乗れませんけど、面白そうです。

engChrName: They ain't goin' anywhere, so we can come back if we ever get the chance.
engSearchText:
They ain't goin' anywhere, so we can come back if we
ever get the chance.
jpnChrName: ああ、機会がありゃあ 乗ってみるのもありかもな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、機会がありゃあ
乗ってみるのもありかもな。

engChrName: Well, I've got a long road of learnin' ahead of me, but the first step is making sure I don't screw up the basics!
engSearchText:
Well, I've got a long road of learnin' ahead of me, but
the first step is making sure I don't screw up
the basics!
jpnChrName: さてと、覚える事はいっぱいだけど 丁寧にやってかないとね！
jpnSearchText:
さてと、覚える事はいっぱいだけど
丁寧にやってかないとね！

engChrName: By the by, a lot of the used cars we service here are gettin' shipped outside the country.
engSearchText:
By the by, a lot of the used cars we service here are
gettin' shipped outside the country.
jpnChrName: ちなみにココで整備した中古車、 最近は外国にも輸出してるみたい。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにココで整備した中古車、
最近は外国にも輸出してるみたい。

engChrName: Guess everyone's raring to get their hands on a Republic car!
engSearchText:
Guess everyone's raring to get their hands on a
Republic car!
jpnChrName: 共和国製の導力車は どこへ行っても人気だからね♪
jpnSearchText:
共和国製の導力車は
どこへ行っても人気だからね♪

engChrName: Ohh, listen to that baby purr! Leave it to Uncle to work his magic!
engSearchText:
Ohh, listen to that baby purr! Leave it to Uncle to
work his magic!
jpnChrName: うっひゃ～！　いい音！！ さっすが伯父さん、的確なチューン！
jpnSearchText:
うっひゃ～！　いい音！！
さっすが伯父さん、的確なチューン！

engChrName: I'd say it's time to slay the expressway and go full throttle!
engSearchText:
I'd say it's time to slay the expressway and go
full throttle!
jpnChrName: そんじゃま今日はニューホイールで 首都高をバンバン攻めちゃいますか！！
jpnSearchText:
そんじゃま今日はニューホイールで
首都高をバンバン攻めちゃいますか！！

engChrName: 'Slay'? Are you sure that's not dangerous?
engSearchText: 'Slay'? Are you sure that's not dangerous?
jpnChrName: “攻める”……？ よく分かりませんけど……
jpnSearchText:
“攻める”……？
よく分かりませんけど……

engChrName: Nah, don't worry about her. Think about it as just racer lingo.
engSearchText:
Nah, don't worry about her. Think about it as just
racer lingo.
jpnChrName: ま、最近流行の“走り屋”ってヤツだな。
jpnSearchText: ま、最近流行の“走り屋”ってヤツだな。

engChrName: Junifer's crew ain't got a reckless driver in sight.
engSearchText: Junifer's crew ain't got a reckless driver in sight.
jpnChrName: こいつらは危険走行みてえな 真似はしねえから、そこんとこは安心しな。
jpnSearchText:
こいつらは危険走行みてえな
真似はしねえから、そこんとこは安心しな。

engChrName: I'm supposed to go racin' with Graham and the crew later.
engSearchText:
I'm supposed to go racin' with Graham and the
crew later.
jpnChrName: 今夜もグレアム達と 走りに行く約束なんだよね～。
jpnSearchText:
今夜もグレアム達と
走りに行く約束なんだよね～。

engChrName: I've installed some new parts, so I'll just need to give 'er a tuneup before headin' out!
engSearchText:
I've installed some new parts, so I'll just need to give
'er a tuneup before headin' out!
jpnChrName: パーツも交換したし、 念入りにチューンしておかないと！
jpnSearchText:
パーツも交換したし、
念入りにチューンしておかないと！

engChrName: All right, might as well get that squared away while Uncle's not looking!
engSearchText:
All right, might as well get that squared away while
Uncle's not looking!
jpnChrName: よっしゃ、伯父さんがヒマそうに してる間にちゃっちゃと始めますか♪
jpnSearchText:
よっしゃ、伯父さんがヒマそうに
してる間にちゃっちゃと始めますか♪

engChrName: I'm tryin' my best out there, Graham!
engSearchText: I'm tryin' my best out there, Graham!
jpnChrName: グレアム～！！ あたしだって頑張ってんだよ～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
グレアム～！！
あたしだって頑張ってんだよ～っ！！

engChrName: I'm slayin' those corners, getting better at staying in my lane!
engSearchText:
I'm slayin' those corners, getting better at staying in
my lane!
jpnChrName: コーナーだって限界攻めてるし ライン取りだって上達したし──
jpnSearchText:
コーナーだって限界攻めてるし
ライン取りだって上達したし──

engChrName: But my Kabul still won't cut it against those darned High Bloods!
engSearchText:
But my Kabul still won't cut it against those darned
High Bloods!
jpnChrName: でもあたしの《カブール》じゃ絶対 ハイブラッズの連中に勝てっこないよ～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
でもあたしの《カブール》じゃ絶対
ハイブラッズの連中に勝てっこないよ～っ！！

engChrName: I-I hear you, Junifer. Just take a deep breath.
engSearchText: I-I hear you, Junifer. Just take a deep breath.
jpnChrName: わ、分かったから落ち着けって……
jpnSearchText: わ、分かったから落ち着けって……

engChrName: (Junifer's still pretty wound up about losing that race. Goes to show she's taking things seriously, at least.)
engSearchText:
(Junifer's still pretty wound up about losing that race.
Goes to show she's taking things seriously, at least.)
jpnChrName: （ユニファ、この前負けてから荒れてんなぁ。   案外真面目というか、純情な奴だし……）
jpnSearchText:
（ユニファ、この前負けてから荒れてんなぁ。
案外真面目というか、純情な奴だし……）

engChrName: (It's not skill that's holding her back—it's her car. She's a great driver in her own right.)
engSearchText:
(It's not skill that's holding her back—it's her car.
She's a great driver in her own right.)
jpnChrName: （けどドラテクは十分上手い──   負けたのは明らかにマシンの性能差だ。）
jpnSearchText:
（けどドラテクは十分上手い──
負けたのは明らかにマシンの性能差だ。）

engChrName: (But there's not a lot to really be done when it comes to her car...)
engSearchText:
(But there's not a lot to really be done when it comes
to her car...)
jpnChrName: （俺にできる助言なんて……）
jpnSearchText: （俺にできる助言なんて……）

engChrName: Grahaaam!
engSearchText: Grahaaam!
jpnChrName: ふえぇぇん、グレアム～！！
jpnSearchText: ふえぇぇん、グレアム～！！

engChrName: (Her Kabul's no slouch, but it's still bein' left in the dust despite all the work she's put into it.)
engSearchText:
(Her Kabul's no slouch, but it's still bein' left in the
dust despite all the work she's put into it.)
jpnChrName: （ユニファの《カブール》はいい車だ。   だが万全のチューンで勝てなかったなら……）
jpnSearchText:
（ユニファの《カブール》はいい車だ。
だが万全のチューンで勝てなかったなら……）

engChrName: (At that point, all you can really do is get a new ride.)
engSearchText: (At that point, all you can really do is get a new ride.)
jpnChrName: （もう乗り換えるしかないって事なんだよな……）
jpnSearchText: （もう乗り換えるしかないって事なんだよな……）

engChrName: (Or maybe... Hmm. We might not need to give it up just yet.)
engSearchText:
(Or maybe... Hmm. We might not need to give it up
just yet.)
jpnChrName: （……いや、もう一つだけ   可能性があるとすれば………）
jpnSearchText:
（……いや、もう一つだけ
可能性があるとすれば………）

engChrName: Look at you. Actin' like hot stuff earlier, but you finally mellowed out some.
engSearchText:
Look at you. Actin' like hot stuff earlier, but you
finally mellowed out some.
jpnChrName: あんなにオレサマって感じだったのに、 随分と丸くなっちゃったよね～。
jpnSearchText:
あんなにオレサマって感じだったのに、
随分と丸くなっちゃったよね～。

engChrName: What happened? Felt lonely at the top of the world, Your Majesty?
engSearchText:
What happened? Felt lonely at the top of the world,
Your Majesty?
jpnChrName: これはこれで、ちょっと寂しいかも～？
jpnSearchText: これはこれで、ちょっと寂しいかも～？

engChrName: Something came up, but it is nothing you peasants must concern yourselves with.
engSearchText:
Something came up, but it is nothing you peasants
must concern yourselves with.
jpnChrName: はあ？　……暢気なお前達とは違って こっちは色々とあったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
はあ？　……暢気なお前達とは違って
こっちは色々とあったんだ。

engChrName: I'd appreciate if you kept your nose out of my business.
engSearchText:
I'd appreciate if you kept your nose out of
my business.
jpnChrName: 言っておくが、余計な詮索はするなよ。
jpnSearchText: 言っておくが、余計な詮索はするなよ。

engChrName: You sure get around, Van. Looking forward to seeing your drivers.
engSearchText:
You sure get around, Van. Looking forward to seeing
your drivers.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんは顔が広いだろうから、 どんな面子が集まるのか楽しみだ。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんは顔が広いだろうから、
どんな面子が集まるのか楽しみだ。

engChrName: We should start prepping, too! I bet this'll be a race for the ages!
engSearchText:
We should start prepping, too! I bet this'll be a race
for the ages!
jpnChrName: いいレースが出来るように 俺達も準備しておかないとな！
jpnSearchText:
いいレースが出来るように
俺達も準備しておかないとな！

engChrName: Heya, guys. Stop by the bulletin board yet?
engSearchText: Heya, guys. Stop by the bulletin board yet?
jpnChrName: おっ、ヴァンさん達じゃないか！ もしかして掲示板を見て来てくれたのか？
jpnSearchText:
おっ、ヴァンさん達じゃないか！
もしかして掲示板を見て来てくれたのか？

engChrName: Why? You post a request?
engSearchText: Why? You post a request?
jpnChrName: 掲示板っつうと…… もしかして依頼を出したのか？
jpnSearchText:
掲示板っつうと……
もしかして依頼を出したのか？

engChrName: Yeah. Gonna guess you haven't seen it, then.
engSearchText: Yeah. Gonna guess you haven't seen it, then.
jpnChrName: その反応だと、まだ見てくれてなかったのか。
jpnSearchText: その反応だと、まだ見てくれてなかったのか。

engChrName: I know you're a busy man and all, but I'd appreciate it if you took a look at it if you got a sec.
engSearchText:
I know you're a busy man and all, but I'd appreciate it
if you took a look at it if you got a sec.
jpnChrName: 今日はヴァンさん忙しいだろうしな、 余裕ができたら確認してみてくれよ。
jpnSearchText:
今日はヴァンさん忙しいだろうしな、
余裕ができたら確認してみてくれよ。

engChrName: Got'cha. I'll give it a look when I have the time.
engSearchText: Got'cha. I'll give it a look when I have the time.
jpnChrName: ああ、それじゃ後で掲示板を確認しておくか。
jpnSearchText: ああ、それじゃ後で掲示板を確認しておくか。

engChrName: All right, everyone's cars passed inspection?
engSearchText: All right, everyone's cars passed inspection?
jpnChrName: よし、全員車両点検は済んだか！？
jpnSearchText: よし、全員車両点検は済んだか！？

engChrName: Junifer'll be joining us right before we start.
engSearchText: Junifer'll be joining us right before we start.
jpnChrName: 今日はユニファが恐らく途中参加になる──
jpnSearchText: 今日はユニファが恐らく途中参加になる──

engChrName: And she'll be coming with a total beast in tow, so look forward to that!
engSearchText:
And she'll be coming with a total beast in tow, so
look forward to that!
jpnChrName: モンスターを引っ提げて帰ってくるから みんな楽しみにしてな！
jpnSearchText:
モンスターを引っ提げて帰ってくるから
みんな楽しみにしてな！

engChrName: Got it!
engSearchText: Got it!
jpnChrName: うい～っす！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>うい～っす！！

engChrName: Then let's get out there! And no accidents, you hear?
engSearchText: Then let's get out there! And no accidents, you hear?
jpnChrName: そんじゃ今夜も事故がないように行くぞ！！
jpnSearchText: そんじゃ今夜も事故がないように行くぞ！！

engChrName: The Revolution Festival's right around the corner, so we're brainstorming for an event to put up.
engSearchText:
The Revolution Festival's right around the corner, so
we're brainstorming for an event to put up.
jpnChrName: そろそろ革命記念祭も近いし、 俺たちも催しを考えててな。
jpnSearchText:
そろそろ革命記念祭も近いし、
俺たちも催しを考えててな。

engChrName: We're always looking to improve our driving technique. Nothing wrong with having a little fun while we're at it.
engSearchText:
We're always looking to improve our
driving technique. Nothing wrong with having a little
fun while we're at it.
jpnChrName: ドラテクの向上はチームの課題でもある。 この機会に楽しく取り組めるといいよな。
jpnSearchText:
ドラテクの向上はチームの課題でもある。
この機会に楽しく取り組めるといいよな。

engChrName: I know Junifer's real excited for it.
engSearchText: I know Junifer's real excited for it.
jpnChrName: ちなみに……ユニファなら 中でお楽しみタイムだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに……ユニファなら
中でお楽しみタイムだぜ。

engChrName: I guess I'm starting to get pumped about it, too, haha.
engSearchText: I guess I'm starting to get pumped about it, too, haha.
jpnChrName: ま、俺も楽しみで ついてきちまったんだけどな、ハハ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、俺も楽しみで
ついてきちまったんだけどな、ハハ。

engChrName: I'd kinda pegged the High Bloods as simple assholes, but they ended up surprising me.
engSearchText:
I'd kinda pegged the High Bloods as simple assholes,
but they ended up surprising me.
jpnChrName: ハイブラッズ……思ってたよりも 悪い連中じゃなさそうだったな。
jpnSearchText:
ハイブラッズ……思ってたよりも
悪い連中じゃなさそうだったな。

engChrName: Infuriating as it was, races with 'em were always real blood-pumping.
engSearchText:
Infuriating as it was, races with 'em were always
real blood-pumping.
jpnChrName: 何だかんだで、 どの対戦もいい勝負になったし……
jpnSearchText:
何だかんだで、
どの対戦もいい勝負になったし……

engChrName: I'd welcome them back to challenge us again in Edith anytime.
engSearchText:
I'd welcome them back to challenge us again in
Edith anytime.
jpnChrName: 反省した上で首都に遊びに来てくれるなら 歓迎してやりたい所だな。
jpnSearchText:
反省した上で首都に遊びに来てくれるなら
歓迎してやりたい所だな。

engChrName: Some folks have been coming around lately trying to stir up shit with our crew.
engSearchText:
Some folks have been coming around lately trying to
stir up shit with our crew.
jpnChrName: 近頃、ウチのチームを わざわざ煽ってくる連中がいるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
近頃、ウチのチームを
わざわざ煽ってくる連中がいるんだ。

engChrName: I mean, yeah, we're a little rowdy and stuff, but we try to never get people involved.
engSearchText:
I mean, yeah, we're a little rowdy and stuff, but we try
to never get people involved.
jpnChrName: 俺たちも挑発的な走りをする事はあるが 一般人は巻き込まないのがルールなんだが……
jpnSearchText:
俺たちも挑発的な走りをする事はあるが
一般人は巻き込まないのがルールなんだが……

engChrName: Man, oh, man. I just hope things don't get any worse.
engSearchText: Man, oh, man. I just hope things don't get any worse.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、困ったな。 面倒な事にならなきゃいいんだが。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、困ったな。
面倒な事にならなきゃいいんだが。

engChrName: I keep trying to keep the crew out of danger, but some of them are permanently on a short fuse.
engSearchText:
I keep trying to keep the crew out of danger, but
some of them are permanently on a short fuse.
jpnChrName: チームの連中には乗せられないよう よく言い含めてあるんだが……
jpnSearchText:
チームの連中には乗せられないよう
よく言い含めてあるんだが……

engChrName: I worry about them as team lead, of course. I try to tell them to keep their cool, but it doesn't always work.
engSearchText:
I worry about them as team lead, of course. I try to
tell them to keep their cool, but it doesn't
always work.
jpnChrName: 血の気の多いメンバーもいるからな、 リーダーとしては気掛かりだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
血の気の多いメンバーもいるからな、
リーダーとしては気掛かりだぜ。

engChrName: Downey and the others are busy for the day, trying to get their hands on a new car, so they won't be joining us today.
engSearchText:
Downey and the others are busy for the day, trying to
get their hands on a new car, so they won't be joining
us today.
jpnChrName: ダウニーたちは新車を買いに行く 算段で忙しいらしくてな、今日は不参加なんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ダウニーたちは新車を買いに行く
算段で忙しいらしくてな、今日は不参加なんだ。

engChrName: Here's hoping they don't get carried away and end up in a big mess...
engSearchText:
Here's hoping they don't get carried away and end up
in a big mess...
jpnChrName: あいつら浮かれやがって…… どこかでヘマしなきゃいいんだが。
jpnSearchText:
あいつら浮かれやがって……
どこかでヘマしなきゃいいんだが。

engChrName: I'm sure it'll be fine, though. I remember just how pumped I was when I got approved for a loan to buy this puppy.
engSearchText:
I'm sure it'll be fine, though. I remember just how
pumped I was when I got approved for a loan to buy
this puppy.
jpnChrName: まあいいさ、俺もこいつを ローン組んで買った時は最高の気分だった。
jpnSearchText:
まあいいさ、俺もこいつを
ローン組んで買った時は最高の気分だった。

engChrName: My literal ride-or-die to this day. I hope Downey can find himself something just as special today.
engSearchText:
My literal ride-or-die to this day. I hope Downey can
find himself something just as special today.
jpnChrName: 今でも最高の相棒だ── あいつらにもそんな出会いがあるといいよな。
jpnSearchText:
今でも最高の相棒だ──
あいつらにもそんな出会いがあるといいよな。

engChrName: Lotta no-shows today. Oh, well. More road for us!
engSearchText: Lotta no-shows today. Oh, well. More road for us!
jpnChrName: 今日は集まりが悪いが…… まあいい、そろそろ出発するか！
jpnSearchText:
今日は集まりが悪いが……
まあいい、そろそろ出発するか！

engChrName: Tonight's a real beauty, but keep your eyes on the road, everyone!
engSearchText:
Tonight's a real beauty, but keep your eyes on the
road, everyone!
jpnChrName: 今夜もいい月だ。 引き締めていくぞ！
jpnSearchText:
今夜もいい月だ。
引き締めていくぞ！

engChrName: Hey, Graham. On your way out?
engSearchText: Hey, Graham. On your way out?
jpnChrName: よおグレアム、これから出かける所か？
jpnSearchText: よおグレアム、これから出かける所か？

engChrName: Hey, Van. And yeah. I called to get our crew together.
engSearchText:
Hey, Van. And yeah. I called to get our
crew together.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんじゃないか。 ああ、チームの皆に声をかけた所だ。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんじゃないか。
ああ、チームの皆に声をかけた所だ。

engChrName: We don't usually ride while it's still bright outside, but Junifer really wanted to go.
engSearchText:
We don't usually ride while it's still bright outside,
but Junifer really wanted to go.
jpnChrName: いつもは夜中が多いんだが、 今日はユニファが張り切っちまってな。
jpnSearchText:
いつもは夜中が多いんだが、
今日はユニファが張り切っちまってな。

engChrName: But don't worry! We'll keep an eye on her. Won't let her get into a wreck or nothing.
engSearchText:
But don't worry! We'll keep an eye on her. Won't let
her get into a wreck or nothing.
jpnChrName: はは、まあ事故には気を付けて 行かせてもらうさ！
jpnSearchText:
はは、まあ事故には気を付けて
行かせてもらうさ！

engChrName: Not worried at all. I know y'all aren't the type to drive recklessly.
engSearchText:
Not worried at all. I know y'all aren't the type to
drive recklessly.
jpnChrName: お前らは周りに迷惑かける タイプじゃねえし、心配してねえけどな。
jpnSearchText:
お前らは周りに迷惑かける
タイプじゃねえし、心配してねえけどな。

engChrName: Just be sure not to make a scene and end up gettin' caught, 'kay?
engSearchText:
Just be sure not to make a scene and end up gettin'
caught, 'kay?
jpnChrName: マナーと取り締まりには気を付けろよ？
jpnSearchText: マナーと取り締まりには気を付けろよ？

engChrName: Thanks for worrying, man. You should join us sometime!
engSearchText:
Thanks for worrying, man. You should join
us sometime!
jpnChrName: ああ、ヴァンさんこそ また混ざってくれよな！
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ヴァンさんこそ
また混ざってくれよな！

engChrName: All right, Downey and Hyades are here. Everyone else should be along shortly.
engSearchText:
All right, Downey and Hyades are here.
Everyone else should be along shortly.
jpnChrName: ダウニーとヒアデスも来たな。 他の連中もぼちぼちか。
jpnSearchText:
ダウニーとヒアデスも来たな。
他の連中もぼちぼちか。

engChrName: I'd say it's time we get on the road then! Pedals to the floor everyone!
engSearchText:
I'd say it's time we get on the road then! Pedals to the
floor everyone!
jpnChrName: よし、出発──！！ 今夜もＭＡＸ楽しんでいくか！
jpnSearchText:
よし、出発──！！
今夜もＭＡＸ楽しんでいくか！

engChrName: I'm taking my new ride to the limit! Let me show ya what this baby can do, Graham!
engSearchText:
I'm taking my new ride to the limit! Let me show ya
what this baby can do, Graham!
jpnChrName: 俺の新車の実力、限界まで 見せつけてやりますよ、グレアムさん！！
jpnSearchText:
俺の新車の実力、限界まで
見せつけてやりますよ、グレアムさん！！

engChrName: It's a nice ride, Downey, but be careful when it's raining.
engSearchText:
It's a nice ride, Downey, but be careful when
it's raining.
jpnChrName: ああ、イイ車だとは思うが── 今日は雨もパラついてるからなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、イイ車だとは思うが──
今日は雨もパラついてるからなぁ。

engChrName: Better to have a good time on the road than hydroplane off it, yeah?
engSearchText:
Better to have a good time on the road than
hydroplane off it, yeah?
jpnChrName: 煽られても無理はするなよ？ 俺たちは楽しく走れりゃいいんだからな。
jpnSearchText:
煽られても無理はするなよ？
俺たちは楽しく走れりゃいいんだからな。

engChrName: Used to think you guys were all just reckless drivers. Definitely too dangerous for Edith's streets.
engSearchText:
Used to think you guys were all just reckless drivers.
Definitely too dangerous for Edith's streets.
jpnChrName: 前は、お前達が危険走行をしてたもんだから 首都には寄り付かないで欲しいと思ってたが……
jpnSearchText:
前は、お前達が危険走行をしてたもんだから
首都には寄り付かないで欲しいと思ってたが……

engChrName: But today's race was one to remember. Come back soon, High Bloods!
engSearchText:
But today's race was one to remember. Come back
soon, High Bloods!
jpnChrName: 今日の勝負は最高だった。 またやりあおうぜ、《ハイブラッズ》！
jpnSearchText:
今日の勝負は最高だった。
またやりあおうぜ、《ハイブラッズ》！

engChrName: Hmph. I see no reason why I should take orders from a commoner like yourself.
engSearchText:
Hmph. I see no reason why I should take orders from
a commoner like yourself.
jpnChrName: フン、元よりお前のような 庶民の指図を受けるつもりはない。
jpnSearchText:
フン、元よりお前のような
庶民の指図を受けるつもりはない。

engChrName: But I suppose it is the philanthropic burden of nobility to give unto the have-nots... Let us meet on the road again.
engSearchText:
But I suppose it is the philanthropic burden of
nobility to give unto the have-nots... Let us meet on
the road again.
jpnChrName: だがまあ、持たざる者に施すのは貴族の義務。 ……また付き合ってやろうではないか。
jpnSearchText:
だがまあ、持たざる者に施すのは貴族の義務。
……また付き合ってやろうではないか。

engChrName: Hell yeah! I'm feeling like a million mira!
engSearchText: Hell yeah! I'm feeling like a million mira!
jpnChrName: っしゃあ！　調子も最高だぜ！！
jpnSearchText: っしゃあ！　調子も最高だぜ！！

engChrName: We're going full throttle today!
engSearchText: We're going full throttle today!
jpnChrName: 今日もかっ飛ばして行くぜっ！！ ひゃっほう──っ！！
jpnSearchText:
今日もかっ飛ばして行くぜっ！！
ひゃっほう──っ！！

engChrName: My baby came back to me! My sweet, sweet baby!
engSearchText: My baby came back to me! My sweet, sweet baby!
jpnChrName: 俺の愛車～～～っ！！ 帰ってきてくれたんだな～～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
俺の愛車～～～っ！！
帰ってきてくれたんだな～～っ！！

engChrName: You're a sight for sore eyes! I'll give you a big smooch and never let you go!
engSearchText:
You're a sight for sore eyes! I'll give you a big smooch
and never let you go!
jpnChrName: お前はなんてマブイんだっ！ 抱きしめてキスしてやるぜッ！！
jpnSearchText:
お前はなんてマブイんだっ！
抱きしめてキスしてやるぜッ！！

engChrName: I can't just sit on the sidelines after seeing a wild race like that!
engSearchText:
I can't just sit on the sidelines after seeing a wild race
like that!
jpnChrName: あんなアツい勝負を見せられちゃ、 黙ってみてられねえよ！
jpnSearchText:
あんなアツい勝負を見せられちゃ、
黙ってみてられねえよ！

engChrName: Damn it! Gotta get my sweet ride back in business so we can get back on the road!
engSearchText:
Damn it! Gotta get my sweet ride back in business so
we can get back on the road!
jpnChrName: クソッ！ 俺の愛車の修理、早く終わりやがれ！
jpnSearchText:
クソッ！
俺の愛車の修理、早く終わりやがれ！

engChrName: I made up my mind, Hyades: I'm buying a new ride!
engSearchText: I made up my mind, Hyades: I'm buying a new ride!
jpnChrName: ヒアデス！　俺は決めたぜ！！ 新車を買う！
jpnSearchText:
ヒアデス！　俺は決めたぜ！！
新車を買う！

engChrName: Man, I can't take it anymore! I got super pumped after that last race. I need some time on the road, too!
engSearchText:
Man, I can't take it anymore! I got super pumped
after that last race. I need some time on the road, too!
jpnChrName: この前のバトルでメチャ欲しくなっちまった！ もう我慢ならねえぜ！！
jpnSearchText:
この前のバトルでメチャ欲しくなっちまった！
もう我慢ならねえぜ！！

engChrName: Came by to see Graham and the gang! I'm so pumped!
engSearchText:
Came by to see Graham and the gang! I'm
so pumped!
jpnChrName: グレアムさんたちを迎えに来たんだ。 今日もタギるぜッ！！
jpnSearchText:
グレアムさんたちを迎えに来たんだ。
今日もタギるぜッ！！

engChrName: Graham's car is so sick, dude!
engSearchText: Graham's car is so sick, dude!
jpnChrName: にしてもいいよな～、グレアムさんの車！
jpnSearchText: にしてもいいよな～、グレアムさんの車！

engChrName: Man, I envy Junifer! No fair that she got her uncle to help pimp her car up!
engSearchText:
Man, I envy Junifer! No fair that she got her uncle to
help pimp her car up!
jpnChrName: ユニファさんもおやっさんのトコで 改造しまくってるし、羨ましくて仕方ねえぜ！
jpnSearchText:
ユニファさんもおやっさんのトコで
改造しまくってるし、羨ましくて仕方ねえぜ！

engChrName: Junifer's one of the best drivers on the team. She's the real deal!
engSearchText:
Junifer's one of the best drivers on the team. She's the
real deal!
jpnChrName: ユニファさんはチームの紅一点だし ドラテクも凄くて憧れなんスよ～！
jpnSearchText:
ユニファさんはチームの紅一点だし
ドラテクも凄くて憧れなんスよ～！

engChrName: Wonder just how fast she'll fly once her car's in top shape.
engSearchText:
Wonder just how fast she'll fly once her car's in
top shape.
jpnChrName: さらに愛車のパワーが上がったら どんな走りになるのか……
jpnSearchText:
さらに愛車のパワーが上がったら
どんな走りになるのか……

engChrName: I know I'm looking forward to seeing it!
engSearchText: I know I'm looking forward to seeing it!
jpnChrName: オレたちもマジ楽しみっスね！！
jpnSearchText: オレたちもマジ楽しみっスね！！

engChrName: I got my baby back! Ohh, leave it to Bradley to work his magic! It's like she never left my side!
engSearchText:
I got my baby back! Ohh, leave it to Bradley to work
his magic! It's like she never left my side!
jpnChrName: オレの車も戻ってきたッス！！ 流石はブラッドレイさん、完璧に元通りッス！！
jpnSearchText:
オレの車も戻ってきたッス！！
流石はブラッドレイさん、完璧に元通りッス！！

engChrName: It's also like the dirt never left my side. Geez, he could've at least cleaned her up a bit! She's FILTHY.
engSearchText:
It's also like the dirt never left my side. Geez, he
could've at least cleaned her up a bit! She's FILTHY.
jpnChrName: ……というか汚れも完璧、元通りっスね…… 修理ついでに洗車してくれても……
jpnSearchText:
……というか汚れも完璧、元通りっスね……
修理ついでに洗車してくれても……

engChrName: ...Man, that made me sound like a total jerk. I'LL give my baby a good wash!
engSearchText:
...Man, that made me sound like a total jerk.
I'LL give my baby a good wash!
jpnChrName: い、いや、厚かましすぎっスね。 洗車は自分でするッスよ～！！
jpnSearchText:
い、いや、厚かましすぎっスね。
洗車は自分でするッスよ～！！

engChrName: Downey weirds me out a bit. Dunno why.
engSearchText: Downey weirds me out a bit. Dunno why.
jpnChrName: それにしても、ダウニーさん ちょっとキモイっスね……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、ダウニーさん
ちょっとキモイっスね……

engChrName: I don't wanna hang out with him...
engSearchText: I don't wanna hang out with him...
jpnChrName: 正直近づきたくないっスよ……
jpnSearchText: 正直近づきたくないっスよ……

engChrName: I was at the edge of my seat that whole race. I get how you feel now, Downey.
engSearchText:
I was at the edge of my seat that whole race. I get
how you feel now, Downey.
jpnChrName: ダウニーさんの気持ちも分かるッス。 本当に手に汗握る勝負だったッスからね。
jpnSearchText:
ダウニーさんの気持ちも分かるッス。
本当に手に汗握る勝負だったッスからね。

engChrName: I need to catch up! I'll be pulling off tricks like that one day—I just gotta keep practicing!
engSearchText:
I need to catch up! I'll be pulling off tricks like that
one day—I just gotta keep practicing!
jpnChrName: オレの場合は、まずはテクを身に付けないとなぁ。 走り屋にも修業あるのみッスね！
jpnSearchText:
オレの場合は、まずはテクを身に付けないとなぁ。
走り屋にも修業あるのみッスね！

engChrName: Nothing beats having your own sweet ride! ...Even if the ride isn't so sweet.
engSearchText:
Nothing beats having your own sweet ride!
...Even if the ride isn't so sweet.
jpnChrName: ヒャッホウ！！　ボロくても やっぱ自分の車ってのはイイっスね！！
jpnSearchText:
ヒャッホウ！！　ボロくても
やっぱ自分の車ってのはイイっスね！！

engChrName: Or my driving skills, for that matter. I haven't scored a single win...
engSearchText:
Or my driving skills, for that matter. I haven't scored
a single win...
jpnChrName: でもオレ、ドラテクはまだまだなんで バトルじゃ全然勝てないっスよ……
jpnSearchText:
でもオレ、ドラテクはまだまだなんで
バトルじゃ全然勝てないっスよ……

engChrName: Nope! Nope! I'm letting the negativity get to me! That's lame, man! All I gotta do is get back behind the wheel and practice today.
engSearchText:
Nope! Nope! I'm letting the negativity get to me!
That's lame, man! All I gotta do is get back behind
the wheel and practice today.
jpnChrName: いや、諦めたら負けッス！！ 今日も走り込んで練習するッスよ～っ！
jpnSearchText:
いや、諦めたら負けッス！！
今日も走り込んで練習するッスよ～っ！

engChrName: Dang, that's a sick ride!
engSearchText: Dang, that's a sick ride!
jpnChrName: マジっすかカッケー！！ イイっスね新車！！
jpnSearchText:
マジっすかカッケー！！
イイっスね新車！！

engChrName: Not lending you another single mira, though! Gotta save to get myself my own ride!
engSearchText:
Not lending you another single mira, though!
Gotta save to get myself my own ride!
jpnChrName: あ、でもミラはもう貸さないッスよ？ 自分の車買うために溜めてるんスから～！！
jpnSearchText:
あ、でもミラはもう貸さないッスよ？
自分の車買うために溜めてるんスから～！！

engChrName: Oh, hey! Junifer's here, too!
engSearchText: Oh, hey! Junifer's here, too!
jpnChrName: あっ、ユニファさんも来てるっスね！
jpnSearchText: あっ、ユニファさんも来てるっスね！

engChrName: Tonight's a night to burn up the road, hell yeah! Er, not that I have a car, but... Yeah!
engSearchText:
Tonight's a night to burn up the road, hell yeah!
Er, not that I have a car, but... Yeah!
jpnChrName: へへ、今夜もかっ飛ばしましょうよ！！ オレは車持ってないッスけど！！
jpnSearchText:
へへ、今夜もかっ飛ばしましょうよ！！
オレは車持ってないッスけど！！

engChrName: Roger and Tebo were roaming from stall to stall in a stupor. I suppose they must've gotten themselves lost.
engSearchText:
Roger and Tebo were roaming from stall to stall in
a stupor. I suppose they must've gotten
themselves lost.
jpnChrName: ロジェとティボーのやつ……どうやら 屋台巡りに夢中になって、迷子になったらしい。
jpnSearchText:
ロジェとティボーのやつ……どうやら
屋台巡りに夢中になって、迷子になったらしい。

engChrName: What boorish behavior. We're High Bloods. Have they no shame?!
engSearchText:
What boorish behavior. We're High Bloods.
Have they no shame?!
jpnChrName: 高貴なる血（ハイブラッズ）だというのに 恥をかくような真似をしよって！
jpnSearchText:
高貴なる血（ハイブラッズ）だというのに
恥をかくような真似をしよって！

engChrName: I suppose I'd better enlist the help of the nearby constabulary to look for them.
engSearchText:
I suppose I'd better enlist the help of the nearby
constabulary to look for them.
jpnChrName: ……とりあえず、近くの交番に相談するよう 連絡をしておくか……
jpnSearchText:
……とりあえず、近くの交番に相談するよう
連絡をしておくか……

engChrName: That's that, then? Life sure comes at you fast.
engSearchText: That's that, then? Life sure comes at you fast.
jpnChrName: あーあ、あっという間に 終わっちまったなァ～。
jpnSearchText:
あーあ、あっという間に
終わっちまったなァ～。

engChrName: I'm not sure why they broke the group up. We still have driving left to do!
engSearchText:
I'm not sure why they broke the group up. We still
have driving left to do!
jpnChrName: まだ走り足りねえってのに どうして解散しちまうんだよ！
jpnSearchText:
まだ走り足りねえってのに
どうして解散しちまうんだよ！

engChrName: Maybe I should call up Roger and Tebo to get the High Bloods back on the road!
engSearchText:
Maybe I should call up Roger and Tebo to get the
High Bloods back on the road!
jpnChrName: こうなったら、ロジェとティボーを呼んで 《ハイブラッズ》で遊んじまうか！
jpnSearchText:
こうなったら、ロジェとティボーを呼んで
《ハイブラッズ》で遊んじまうか！

engChrName: Oh, right! I almost forgot the Revolution Festival was today.
engSearchText:
Oh, right! I almost forgot the Revolution Festival
was today.
jpnChrName: そういや今日は革命記念祭なんだったよなァ。
jpnSearchText: そういや今日は革命記念祭なんだったよなァ。

engChrName: I might just celebrate by getting a nice and loud new muffler installed!
engSearchText:
I might just celebrate by getting a nice and loud new
muffler installed!
jpnChrName: ヒヒッ、折角だから爆音で唸るマフラーに 取り替えて唸らせてやるかァ！？
jpnSearchText:
ヒヒッ、折角だから爆音で唸るマフラーに
取り替えて唸らせてやるかァ！？

engChrName: You do you, bud. But don't go whining if you end up losin' with that noisy piece of junk on ya.
engSearchText:
You do you, bud. But don't go whining if you end up
losin' with that noisy piece of junk on ya.
jpnChrName: ハッ、ソイツは結構だが それで負けても文句は言うなよ？
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、ソイツは結構だが
それで負けても文句は言うなよ？

engChrName: C-C'mon! It was just, umm, a joke!
engSearchText: C-C'mon! It was just, umm, a joke!
jpnChrName: チッ、冗談だっつーの！
jpnSearchText: チッ、冗談だっつーの！

engChrName: 'Boutta go out on all the wild customizations I can fit in!
engSearchText:
'Boutta go out on all the wild customizations I can
fit in!
jpnChrName: やっぱ選び抜いた最高の カスタムじゃねえとなァ！
jpnSearchText:
やっぱ選び抜いた最高の
カスタムじゃねえとなァ！

engChrName: All these tools feel so cheap! The ones in our garage are way better!
engSearchText:
All these tools feel so cheap! The ones in our garage
are way better!
jpnChrName: へー、ウチの格納庫にあるモンと比べたら どの工具も安っぽいモンだなァ！
jpnSearchText:
へー、ウチの格納庫にあるモンと比べたら
どの工具も安っぽいモンだなァ！

engChrName: Though I guess they're pretty easy to handle.
engSearchText: Though I guess they're pretty easy to handle.
jpnChrName: だがまあ、使い勝手は悪くなさそうかァ……
jpnSearchText: だがまあ、使い勝手は悪くなさそうかァ……

engChrName: Oh, hey! This would totally work for doing maintenance on my bike!
engSearchText:
Oh, hey! This would totally work for doing
maintenance on my bike!
jpnChrName: おっ、これなんてオレのバイクのメンテにも 丁度いいんじゃねーか？
jpnSearchText:
おっ、これなんてオレのバイクのメンテにも
丁度いいんじゃねーか？

engChrName: I was administering first aid to someone who was attacked by those monsters.
engSearchText:
I was administering first aid to someone who was
attacked by those monsters.
jpnChrName: あの化け物たちに襲われた人の 応急措置をしていたの。
jpnSearchText:
あの化け物たちに襲われた人の
応急措置をしていたの。

engChrName: The concert had gone off without a hitch, too...
engSearchText: The concert had gone off without a hitch, too...
jpnChrName: まさかライブが成功した途端 こんな事になってしまうなんて……
jpnSearchText:
まさかライブが成功した途端
こんな事になってしまうなんて……

engChrName: It's all like some waking nightmare... But I'll do what I can to help everyone.
engSearchText:
It's all like some waking nightmare... But I'll do what
I can to help everyone.
jpnChrName: 悪い夢でも見ている気分だけど…… 今はとにかく、できる事をするだけよ。
jpnSearchText:
悪い夢でも見ている気分だけど……
今はとにかく、できる事をするだけよ。

engChrName: Don't worry about us. Lulua's great at keeping her head cool, and Natalie's real dependable.
engSearchText:
Don't worry about us. Lulua's great at keeping her
head cool, and Natalie's real dependable.
jpnChrName: ……大丈夫、ルルアもしっかりしているし ナタリーも力になってくれているもの。
jpnSearchText:
……大丈夫、ルルアもしっかりしているし
ナタリーも力になってくれているもの。

engChrName: Lulua's surprisingly good at keeping her head cool under pressure. Just having her around is comforting.
engSearchText:
Lulua's surprisingly good at keeping her head cool
under pressure. Just having her around is comforting.
jpnChrName: ルルアが想像以上にしっかりしていて ふふ、私まで支えられている気がするわね。
jpnSearchText:
ルルアが想像以上にしっかりしていて
ふふ、私まで支えられている気がするわね。

engChrName: Not to mention—huh? Where'd those kids get off to?
engSearchText: Not to mention—huh? Where'd those kids get off to?
jpnChrName: あとは……あら？　逃げ込んできた 子供たちの姿が見えないけど……
jpnSearchText:
あとは……あら？　逃げ込んできた
子供たちの姿が見えないけど……

engChrName: Maybe they're in the bathroom? We gotta keep our eyes on them...
engSearchText:
Maybe they're in the bathroom? We gotta keep our
eyes on them...
jpnChrName: トイレにでも行っているのかしら。 あの子たちの事も気にかけておかないと……
jpnSearchText:
トイレにでも行っているのかしら。
あの子たちの事も気にかけておかないと……

engChrName: I heard you got those kids back to their parents safely.
engSearchText: I heard you got those kids back to their parents safely.
jpnChrName: あと、逃げ込んでいた子供たちを 両親の所まで送ってくれたんですってね。
jpnSearchText:
あと、逃げ込んでいた子供たちを
両親の所まで送ってくれたんですってね。

engChrName: Thank you. It's a huge weight off my shoulders knowing they're home safe now.
engSearchText:
Thank you. It's a huge weight off my shoulders
knowing they're home safe now.
jpnChrName: ありがとう──私たちも 少し肩の荷が下りた気がするわ。
jpnSearchText:
ありがとう──私たちも
少し肩の荷が下りた気がするわ。

engChrName: That's it, yes! Keep that rhythm! Mind your breathing!
engSearchText:
That's it, yes! Keep that rhythm! Mind
your breathing!
jpnChrName: そうそう、いいリズムよ！ 呼吸を意識して！
jpnSearchText:
そうそう、いいリズムよ！
呼吸を意識して！

engChrName: I asked Jess to brush up on the song, so now all that's left is to practice.
engSearchText:
I asked Jess to brush up on the song, so now all that's
left is to practice.
jpnChrName: 曲のブラッシュアップはジェスさんに お願いできる事になったし、あとは稽古ね──
jpnSearchText:
曲のブラッシュアップはジェスさんに
お願いできる事になったし、あとは稽古ね──

engChrName: It'd probably calm my nerves a little if we could do a full run of the show with an audience. Not sure how we'd swing that, though...
engSearchText:
It'd probably calm my nerves a little if we could do a
full run of the show with an audience. Not sure how
we'd swing that, though...
jpnChrName: ……できれば本番に近い緊張感で 場数を踏みたい所だけど、なにかいい方法は……
jpnSearchText:
……できれば本番に近い緊張感で
場数を踏みたい所だけど、なにかいい方法は……

engChrName: (Heehee. I gotta admit, I'm happy with our performance.)
engSearchText:
(Heehee. I gotta admit, I'm happy with
our performance.)
jpnChrName: （ふふ……でも案外   いいステージができるかもしれないわ。）
jpnSearchText:
（ふふ……でも案外
いいステージができるかもしれないわ。）

engChrName: (Lulua can still improve with her singing and dancing, but her energy on our last show was unmatched.)
engSearchText:
(Lulua can still improve with her singing and
dancing, but her energy on our last show
was unmatched.)
jpnChrName: （この子、歌も踊りもまだまだだけど……   この前の公演は不思議と盛り上がったし。）
jpnSearchText:
（この子、歌も踊りもまだまだだけど……
この前の公演は不思議と盛り上がったし。）

engChrName: (I'm ready to go full steam ahead! Things can definitely work out with her!)
engSearchText:
(I'm ready to go full steam ahead! Things can
definitely work out with her!)
jpnChrName: （……ええ、この子となら……   私はもう一度本気でやれるかもしれない！）
jpnSearchText:
（……ええ、この子となら……
私はもう一度本気でやれるかもしれない！）

engChrName: (Me and Lulua pairing up wasn't something that happened out of nowhere.)
engSearchText:
(Me and Lulua pairing up wasn't something that
happened out of nowhere.)
jpnChrName: （……色々あってね、この子と   ステージに上がる事になってしまったの。）
jpnSearchText:
（……色々あってね、この子と
ステージに上がる事になってしまったの。）

engChrName: (If everything goes well, then this might be one heck of a performance to make my swan song. I hope it can open some doors for her, though.)
engSearchText:
(If everything goes well, then this might be one heck
of a performance to make my swan song. I hope it
can open some doors for her, though.)
jpnChrName: （上手くいけばルルアも道が開けるかもだし、   “最後の仕事”としては悪くないかもね……）
jpnSearchText:
（上手くいけばルルアも道が開けるかもだし、
“最後の仕事”としては悪くないかもね……）

engChrName: (It's not like I wanna leave her alone in this dead-end idol industry...)
engSearchText:
(It's not like I wanna leave her alone in this dead-end
idol industry...)
jpnChrName: （売れないアイドル業界に、この子を一人   残していくのは気が引けるけれど………）
jpnSearchText:
（売れないアイドル業界に、この子を一人
残していくのは気が引けるけれど………）

engChrName: I've been practicing with her for two weeks now, and I'm not so sure Lulua's cut out to be an idol.
engSearchText:
I've been practicing with her for two weeks now, and
I'm not so sure Lulua's cut out to be an idol.
jpnChrName: あの子の稽古に付き合って２週間だけど、 アイドルになるのは難しいかもしれないわね……
jpnSearchText:
あの子の稽古に付き合って２週間だけど、
アイドルになるのは難しいかもしれないわね……

engChrName: Not for lack of talent, don't get me wrong. It's more of a genre issue.
engSearchText:
Not for lack of talent, don't get me wrong. It's more
of a genre issue.
jpnChrName: ……あの子の実力というより、そもそも 知名度もない“売れないジャンル”なのよね。
jpnSearchText:
……あの子の実力というより、そもそも
知名度もない“売れないジャンル”なのよね。

engChrName: Here in the Republic, people listen to either classical or jazz. Chanson singers are pretty popular, too.
engSearchText:
Here in the Republic, people listen to either classical
or jazz. Chanson singers are pretty popular, too.
jpnChrName: 共和国で音楽といえばクラシックやジャズ、 せいぜいがシャンソンといった所……
jpnSearchText:
共和国で音楽といえばクラシックやジャズ、
せいぜいがシャンソンといった所……

engChrName: Idol pop doesn't even cut it as an afterthought. It's worse than that. And it's a real shame.
engSearchText:
Idol pop doesn't even cut it as an afterthought.
It's worse than that. And it's a real shame.
jpnChrName: アイドルなんて見向きもされないのよ。 残念でしかないけれど……
jpnSearchText:
アイドルなんて見向きもされないのよ。
残念でしかないけれど……

engChrName: I've been throwing everything into making it as an idol, but maybe it's time I face reality.
engSearchText:
I've been throwing everything into making it as an
idol, but maybe it's time I face reality.
jpnChrName: 私もアイドルの一人として 精一杯やってきたつもりよ、でも……
jpnSearchText:
私もアイドルの一人として
精一杯やってきたつもりよ、でも……

engChrName: My partner Natalie decided to become a chanson singer because she couldn't imagine any success coming from being an idol.
engSearchText:
My partner Natalie decided to become a chanson
singer because she couldn't imagine any success
coming from being an idol.
jpnChrName: 相方のナタリーがシャンソン歌手に転向したの。 アイドルではやっていけないからって。
jpnSearchText:
相方のナタリーがシャンソン歌手に転向したの。
アイドルではやっていけないからって。

engChrName: That's why Cupid broke up. Maybe it's about time I throw in the towel...
engSearchText:
That's why Cupid broke up. Maybe it's about time I
throw in the towel...
jpnChrName: だから《キューピット》はもう解散。 私ももう辞めるしかないっていうのに……
jpnSearchText:
だから《キューピット》はもう解散。
私ももう辞めるしかないっていうのに……

engChrName: I don't even know what I'm doing anymore, to be honest.
engSearchText:
I don't even know what I'm doing anymore, to
be honest.
jpnChrName: ホント、何やってるのかしらね、私は……
jpnSearchText: ホント、何やってるのかしらね、私は……

engChrName: I've known for a while it's time to call it a day and walk away from all of this. I didn't really see a reason to keep at it.
engSearchText:
I've known for a while it's time to call it a day and
walk away from all of this. I didn't really see a reason
to keep at it.
jpnChrName: 自分も辞めるしかないっていうのに 何やってるのかしらね、私は……
jpnSearchText:
自分も辞めるしかないっていうのに
何やってるのかしらね、私は……

engChrName: But then Lulua came along. She's got a great attitude, and massive potential.
engSearchText:
But then Lulua came along. She's got a great attitude,
and massive potential.
jpnChrName: ……というかあの子、またおまけしてもらってるのね。 ホント調子のいい子っていうか……
jpnSearchText:
……というかあの子、またおまけしてもらってるのね。
ホント調子のいい子っていうか……

engChrName: *sigh* I really should tell her to reconsider, though. Me having my dreams crushed is bad enough. We don't need two depressed washouts.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I really should tell her to reconsider, though.
Me having my dreams crushed is bad enough.
