We don't need two depressed washouts.
jpnChrName: ふう、人懐っこいのはいいけれど 先の事もきちんと考えるように言わないとね。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、人懐っこいのはいいけれど
先の事もきちんと考えるように言わないとね。

engChrName: Stand up! Back straight! You're singing out of tune, by the way! Stop that!
engSearchText:
Stand up! Back straight! You're singing out of tune,
by the way! Stop that!
jpnChrName: 背筋を伸ばして──！ 音程もズレてきてるわよ！
jpnSearchText:
背筋を伸ばして──！
音程もズレてきてるわよ！

engChrName: What a sorry excuse for an idol, Lulua! Gehenna'll freeze over before you get your debut at this rate!
engSearchText:
What a sorry excuse for an idol, Lulua!
Gehenna'll freeze over before you get your debut at
this rate!
jpnChrName: ……ルルア、貴女アイドルを舐めているの？ その程度じゃデビューなんて夢のまた夢よっ！
jpnSearchText:
……ルルア、貴女アイドルを舐めているの？
その程度じゃデビューなんて夢のまた夢よっ！

engChrName: I can't just be all depressed about it forever. I need to face reality sooner or later...
engSearchText:
I can't just be all depressed about it forever. I need to
face reality sooner or later...
jpnChrName: いつまでも落ち込んでられないわね。 ちゃんと現実を見ないと──
jpnSearchText:
いつまでも落ち込んでられないわね。
ちゃんと現実を見ないと──

engChrName: Maybe it's time to go job hunting. Find a normal job, work hard, and make a living that way.
engSearchText:
Maybe it's time to go job hunting. Find a normal job,
work hard, and make a living that way.
jpnChrName: バイトでも探しましょうか。 そして真面目に働いて生きていく事。
jpnSearchText:
バイトでも探しましょうか。
そして真面目に働いて生きていく事。

engChrName: This whole industry's just a popularity contest anyway. Why am I even surprised?
engSearchText:
This whole industry's just a popularity
contest anyway. Why am I even surprised?
jpnChrName: ……元々が人気商売だもの。 仕方のない事だわ。
jpnSearchText:
……元々が人気商売だもの。
仕方のない事だわ。

engChrName: Not a lot matters in this biz as much as public opinion. Without that, you might as well not even exist.
engSearchText:
Not a lot matters in this biz as much as
public opinion. Without that, you might as well not
even exist.
jpnChrName: 周りからの評価が全て…… 所詮は客商売なのかもしれないけど……
jpnSearchText:
周りからの評価が全て……
所詮は客商売なのかもしれないけど……

engChrName: But that's what we wanted, right? We've come so far.
engSearchText: But that's what we wanted, right? We've come so far.
jpnChrName: でも、私たちは…… そんな事のためにやってきたんじゃ……
jpnSearchText:
でも、私たちは……
そんな事のためにやってきたんじゃ……

engChrName: Why give up now, Natalie?
engSearchText: Why give up now, Natalie?
jpnChrName: そうでしょ、ナタリー…… ……なのにどうして……
jpnSearchText:
そうでしょ、ナタリー……
……なのにどうして……

engChrName: *sigh* You didn't even stick around to see if we'd get into Summer Fest.
engSearchText:
*sigh* You didn't even stick around to see if we'd get
into Summer Fest.
jpnChrName: はぁ、結局サマーフェスタでも 結果を残せなかった……
jpnSearchText:
はぁ、結局サマーフェスタでも
結果を残せなかった……

engChrName: A show like that in front of Trion Tower would've been huge for us. You were so excited about it...
engSearchText:
A show like that in front of Trion Tower would've
been huge for us. You were so excited about it...
jpnChrName: トリオンタワー前のイベントだし すごく盛り上がっていたのに、どうして……
jpnSearchText:
トリオンタワー前のイベントだし
すごく盛り上がっていたのに、どうして……

engChrName: Are we not good enough? Is that why you left?!
engSearchText: Are we not good enough? Is that why you left?!
jpnChrName: ……やっぱり今の私たちには 力が足りない……そういう事なの……！？
jpnSearchText:
……やっぱり今の私たちには
力が足りない……そういう事なの……！？

engChrName: (Wow, she's beautiful. Is she involved with Summer Fest?)
engSearchText:
(Wow, she's beautiful. Is she involved with
Summer Fest?)
jpnChrName: （随分綺麗な人……   サマーフェスタの関係者なのかな。）
jpnSearchText:
（随分綺麗な人……
サマーフェスタの関係者なのかな。）

engChrName: (I probably shouldn't bother her...)
engSearchText: (I probably shouldn't bother her...)
jpnChrName: （声をかけるのはちょっと   ためらわれる雰囲気だけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（声をかけるのはちょっと
ためらわれる雰囲気だけど……）

engChrName: Great job during today's show! Got a couple of slipups here and there, but I thought it was otherwise spot on!
engSearchText:
Great job during today's show! Got a couple of
slipups here and there, but I thought it was otherwise
spot on!
jpnChrName: ひとまず今日のイベント、お疲れ様！ 失敗もあったけど息は合ってたと思うわ。
jpnSearchText:
ひとまず今日のイベント、お疲れ様！
失敗もあったけど息は合ってたと思うわ。

engChrName: The audience loved it! Just gotta perfect our act for the Revolution Festival, and then—
engSearchText:
The audience loved it! Just gotta perfect our act for
the Revolution Festival, and then—
jpnChrName: お客さんの反応も良かったし…… あとは革命記念祭当日の本番ライブで──
jpnSearchText:
お客さんの反応も良かったし……
あとは革命記念祭当日の本番ライブで──

engChrName: C'mon, Seyla! Don't be such a killjoy! Save the business talk for later. Right now, let's toast!
engSearchText:
C'mon, Seyla! Don't be such a killjoy! Save the
business talk for later. Right now, let's toast!
jpnChrName: セイラさんっ！　ムズカシー話は置いて 今はカンパイしましょうよっ！！
jpnSearchText:
セイラさんっ！　ムズカシー話は置いて
今はカンパイしましょうよっ！！

engChrName: To the success of WithU's first show!
engSearchText: To the success of WithU's first show!
jpnChrName: 《ウィズユー》初ライブの成功を祈って！！
jpnSearchText: 《ウィズユー》初ライブの成功を祈って！！

engChrName: Y-You're right. Today calls for a celebration!
engSearchText: Y-You're right. Today calls for a celebration!
jpnChrName: そ、そうね……貴女の言う通りだわ。 ──今日は前祝いと行きましょう！
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうね……貴女の言う通りだわ。
──今日は前祝いと行きましょう！

engChrName: Definitely! I know things are going to go great! Cheers to a great show together!
engSearchText:
Definitely! I know things are going to go great!
Cheers to a great show together!
jpnChrName: はいっ！！　ゼッタイ上手く行きます！！ ライブ成功を祈って、カンパーイ！！
jpnSearchText:
はいっ！！　ゼッタイ上手く行きます！！
ライブ成功を祈って、カンパーイ！！

engChrName: I've been thinking about it constantly for the past few days.
engSearchText:
I've been thinking about it constantly for the past
few days.
jpnChrName: あれから何日も考えましたけど……
jpnSearchText: あれから何日も考えましたけど……

engChrName: We only got one thing left now...
engSearchText: We only got one thing left now...
jpnChrName: とにかく私たちにできる事は……
jpnSearchText: とにかく私たちにできる事は……

engChrName: And it's to tear it up even harder next time we take the stage!
engSearchText:
And it's to tear it up even harder next time we take
the stage!
jpnChrName: 次のステージを最高の舞台にする事！！
jpnSearchText: 次のステージを最高の舞台にする事！！

engChrName: Let's prove to the label that idols can be successful!
engSearchText: Let's prove to the label that idols can be successful!
jpnChrName: アイドルが“ちゃんと売れる”と証明する──
jpnSearchText: アイドルが“ちゃんと売れる”と証明する──

engChrName: That way they won't even THINK about disbanding us!
engSearchText:
That way they won't even THINK about
disbanding us!
jpnChrName: 事務所にユニット解散を 思いとどまらせるにはそれしかないわ……！
jpnSearchText:
事務所にユニット解散を
思いとどまらせるにはそれしかないわ……！

engChrName: We've got a new original song ready to rip. Let's make sure it's a smash hit!
engSearchText:
We've got a new original song ready to rip.
Let's make sure it's a smash hit!
jpnChrName: オリジナルの新曲も考えましたし、 ババーンってヒットさせちゃいましょうよ！！
jpnSearchText:
オリジナルの新曲も考えましたし、
ババーンってヒットさせちゃいましょうよ！！

engChrName: Yeah, you said it. (Lulua's all wishful thinking. I wish it was that easy...)
engSearchText:
Yeah, you said it.
(Lulua's all wishful thinking. I wish it was that easy...)
jpnChrName: そ、そうね。 （この子、自分の実力分かってるのかしら……）
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうね。
（この子、自分の実力分かってるのかしら……）

engChrName: (But either way, we're out of options. This is our last shot, so we've got to make it count.)
engSearchText:
(But either way, we're out of options. This is our last
shot, so we've got to make it count.)
jpnChrName: （でも私たちには後がない──   何としてもやり遂げないと……！）
jpnSearchText:
（でも私たちには後がない──
何としてもやり遂げないと……！）

engChrName: Let's practice for a bit more. Make sure everything's perfect. All we need is for fifty people to show up...
engSearchText:
Let's practice for a bit more. Make sure
everything's perfect. All we need is for fifty people to
show up...
jpnChrName: 少しでも稽古時間を増やして完成度を上げるわよ。 目標は５０人……それくらい入ってくれれば……
jpnSearchText:
少しでも稽古時間を増やして完成度を上げるわよ。
目標は５０人……それくらい入ってくれれば……

engChrName: Ohh, okay! I'll talk to my neighbors again and see if they can come!
engSearchText:
Ohh, okay! I'll talk to my neighbors again and see if
they can come!
jpnChrName: あ、じゃああたし またご近所さんに声掛けてみますよ！
jpnSearchText:
あ、じゃああたし
またご近所さんに声掛けてみますよ！

engChrName: I made friends with my bus driver and manager at work, so I'll invite them, too!
engSearchText:
I made friends with my bus driver and manager at
work, so I'll invite them, too!
jpnChrName: あとバスの運転手さんと、バイト先の店長とも 仲良くなっちゃったので誘ってみます！！
jpnSearchText:
あとバスの運転手さんと、バイト先の店長とも
仲良くなっちゃったので誘ってみます！！

engChrName: Heehee, I'm counting on you! I'll handle the music side of things.
engSearchText:
Heehee, I'm counting on you! I'll handle the music
side of things.
jpnChrName: フフ……期待してるわ。 私は曲の方を何とかしてみる。
jpnSearchText:
フフ……期待してるわ。
私は曲の方を何とかしてみる。

engChrName: I know a pretty popular singer, so I might be able to ask for help there.
engSearchText:
I know a pretty popular singer, so I might be able to
ask for help there.
jpnChrName: 知り合いに結構人気の歌手がいるの。 お願いすれば協力してくれるかもしれない──
jpnSearchText:
知り合いに結構人気の歌手がいるの。
お願いすれば協力してくれるかもしれない──

engChrName: (I got no choice. I'm running thin on options here.)
engSearchText: (I got no choice. I'm running thin on options here.)
jpnChrName: （……あと打てる手は……   この際手段は選んでられないわね……）
jpnSearchText:
（……あと打てる手は……
この際手段は選んでられないわね……）

engChrName: Umm, it's a surprise seeing you here, Natalie.
engSearchText: Umm, it's a surprise seeing you here, Natalie.
jpnChrName: えっと、ナタリーさん。 どうしたんですか、今日は……
jpnSearchText:
えっと、ナタリーさん。
どうしたんですか、今日は……

engChrName: Yeah, I thought you gave up on being an idol. What are you doing here?
engSearchText:
Yeah, I thought you gave up on being an idol.
What are you doing here?
jpnChrName: そうよ、貴女はアイドルを辞めたはず── 今更何をしに来たの？
jpnSearchText:
そうよ、貴女はアイドルを辞めたはず──
今更何をしに来たの？

engChrName: *sigh* You haven't changed a bit, Seyla. Pretty as a rose, and about as thorny as one.
engSearchText:
*sigh* You haven't changed a bit, Seyla. Pretty as a
rose, and about as thorny as one.
jpnChrName: ……ふう、相変わらずねセイラは。 美形で人気もあるのに性格キツイんだから。
jpnSearchText:
……ふう、相変わらずねセイラは。
美形で人気もあるのに性格キツイんだから。

engChrName: Think you'll ever bag a boyfriend with an attitude like that?
engSearchText:
Think you'll ever bag a boyfriend with an attitude
like that?
jpnChrName: そんなんじゃ男だって寄ってこないわよ？
jpnSearchText: そんなんじゃ男だって寄ってこないわよ？

engChrName: Just hurry up and tell us what you want! Unlike you, we don't have all that much time to waste.
engSearchText:
Just hurry up and tell us what you want! Unlike you,
we don't have all that much time to waste.
jpnChrName: 早く用件を言いなさい……！ 私たちも暇じゃないのよ！
jpnSearchText:
早く用件を言いなさい……！
私たちも暇じゃないのよ！

engChrName: All right, I'll cut you part-timers some slack, since the idol life is already hell enough. I'll be straight here.
engSearchText:
All right, I'll cut you part-timers some slack, since the
idol life is already hell enough. I'll be straight here.
jpnChrName: はいはい、今日もバイト三昧してるみたいね。 ……本当にアイドルなんてくだらない。
jpnSearchText:
はいはい、今日もバイト三昧してるみたいね。
……本当にアイドルなんてくだらない。

engChrName: You need to become a singer, Seyla.
engSearchText: You need to become a singer, Seyla.
jpnChrName: というわけで、セイラ。 あなた歌手になりなさいよ。
jpnSearchText:
というわけで、セイラ。
あなた歌手になりなさいよ。

engChrName: Direct order from the higher ups. But you and I can go back to being a duo act.
engSearchText:
Direct order from the higher ups. But you and I can
go back to being a duo act.
jpnChrName: 私とデュオを組んでシャンソンを歌うのよ。 ……ちなみにこれ、事務所命令だから。
jpnSearchText:
私とデュオを組んでシャンソンを歌うのよ。
……ちなみにこれ、事務所命令だから。

engChrName: WHAT?!
engSearchText: WHAT?!
jpnChrName: ええええええええええええ！？
jpnSearchText: <S5>ええええええええええええ！？

engChrName: Th-That's not possible! Seyla and I are already a duo—we're WithU!
engSearchText:
Th-That's not possible! Seyla and I are already a
duo—we're WithU!
jpnChrName: そ、そんなはずっ……！　セイラさんは あたしと《ウィズユー》を組むんですから！
jpnSearchText:
そ、そんなはずっ……！　セイラさんは
あたしと《ウィズユー》を組むんですから！

engChrName: And we're all real happy for you, new kid. Seyla, you get what this means, don't you?
engSearchText:
And we're all real happy for you, new kid. Seyla, you
get what this means, don't you?
jpnChrName: ふう、新米はおめでたいわね。 ……セイラ、貴女ならこの意味、分かるでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
ふう、新米はおめでたいわね。
……セイラ、貴女ならこの意味、分かるでしょう？

engChrName: (It was a little suspicious that they'd approve Lulua's debut just like that...)
engSearchText:
(It was a little suspicious that they'd approve Lulua's
debut just like that...)
jpnChrName: （………ルルアのデビューを   あっさり認めるなんておかしいと思った……）
jpnSearchText:
（………ルルアのデビューを
あっさり認めるなんておかしいと思った……）

engChrName: (Did they have no faith in us from the start?!)
engSearchText: (Did they have no faith in us from the start?!)
jpnChrName: （事務所は最初からこうするつもりだったのね……   アイドル事業を畳むために──！！）
jpnSearchText:
（事務所は最初からこうするつもりだったのね……
アイドル事業を畳むために──！！）

engChrName: Er, ahem... So, I got some news from the label.
engSearchText: Er, ahem... So, I got some news from the label.
jpnChrName: え──コホン、 事務所からの連絡を伝えるわね。
jpnSearchText:
え──コホン、
事務所からの連絡を伝えるわね。

engChrName: It's official: you're a real idol now.
engSearchText: It's official: you're a real idol now.
jpnChrName: ルルア、正式にデビュー決定おめでとう。 今日から貴女も本物のアイドルよ。
jpnSearchText:
ルルア、正式にデビュー決定おめでとう。
今日から貴女も本物のアイドルよ。

engChrName: GODDESS, YES!
engSearchText: GODDESS, YES!
jpnChrName: や、やったあああああ！！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>や、やったあああああ！！！

engChrName: YES, YESSSSS! I DID IT, SEYLA!
engSearchText: YES, YESSSSS! I DID IT, SEYLA!
jpnChrName: やったあ！　やったあ！ やりましたよ、セイラさん～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
やったあ！　やったあ！
やりましたよ、セイラさん～っ！！

engChrName: Stop. Zip it for a sec.
engSearchText: Stop. Zip it for a sec.
jpnChrName: ──少し黙りなさい。
jpnSearchText: ──少し黙りなさい。

engChrName: Y-Yes, ma'am! (You're real scary when you're angry!)
engSearchText:
Y-Yes, ma'am!
(You're real scary when you're angry!)
jpnChrName: は、はいぃっ！！ （セイラさん、怒ると怖いよ～！）
jpnSearchText:
は、はいぃっ！！
（セイラさん、怒ると怖いよ～！）

engChrName: We'll be working together as a duo. Cupid is officially disbanding.
engSearchText:
We'll be working together as a duo. Cupid is
officially disbanding.
jpnChrName: 貴方は私とユニットを組んで活動する事になる。 ……《キューピット》はもう解散よ。
jpnSearchText:
貴方は私とユニットを組んで活動する事になる。
……《キューピット》はもう解散よ。

engChrName: I see... Your partner, Natalie, became a chanson singer, right? Is that why?
engSearchText:
I see... Your partner, Natalie, became a chanson
singer, right? Is that why?
jpnChrName: そっか……相方のナタリーさん、 シャンソン歌手になっちゃったんでしたっけ。
jpnSearchText:
そっか……相方のナタリーさん、
シャンソン歌手になっちゃったんでしたっけ。

engChrName: Yeah... She's a gifted singer. She's basically set up for success now that she's out of the idol business.
engSearchText:
Yeah... She's a gifted singer. She's basically set up for
success now that she's out of the idol business.
jpnChrName: ええ……あの子は歌唱力があるから 売れないアイドルより将来性もあるし。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……あの子は歌唱力があるから
売れないアイドルより将来性もあるし。

engChrName: It's been tough... But you're here now.
engSearchText: It's been tough... But you're here now.
jpnChrName: 私も辛かったけど……今は貴女がいる。
jpnSearchText: 私も辛かったけど……今は貴女がいる。

engChrName: Let's keep moving forward together as a new group— as WithU!
engSearchText:
Let's keep moving forward together as a new group—
as WithU!
jpnChrName: 前を向いていきましょう、 新ユニット《ウィズユー》として！
jpnSearchText:
前を向いていきましょう、
新ユニット《ウィズユー》として！

engChrName: Definitely! I won't disappoint you!
engSearchText: Definitely! I won't disappoint you!
jpnChrName: はいっ！！　よろしくお願いします！！
jpnSearchText: はいっ！！　よろしくお願いします！！

engChrName: All right, Lulua. Let's get started.
engSearchText: All right, Lulua. Let's get started.
jpnChrName: じゃあ早速始めるわよ、ルルア！
jpnSearchText: じゃあ早速始めるわよ、ルルア！

engChrName: I'm so gonna hit the ground running! I'll give this massive opportunity my all and it's going to be perf—
engSearchText:
I'm so gonna hit the ground running! I'll give this
massive opportunity my all and it's going to be perf—
jpnChrName: えへへ、まずは稽古からですよねっ！ あたしも今まで以上に本気で──
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、まずは稽古からですよねっ！
あたしも今まで以上に本気で──

engChrName: This is a part-time gig.
engSearchText: This is a part-time gig.

engChrName: P-Part-time?
engSearchText: P-Part-time?
jpnChrName: えっ……？　バイト？？
jpnSearchText: えっ……？　バイト？？

engChrName: You heard me. There's no way the label would put up the mira for full-time idols.
engSearchText:
You heard me. There's no way the label would put up
the mira for full-time idols.
jpnChrName: そう、バイトよ。アイドルなんかに 事務所が十分なミラを出す訳ないじゃない。
jpnSearchText:
そう、バイトよ。アイドルなんかに
事務所が十分なミラを出す訳ないじゃない。

engChrName: We pay for everything. That's costumes, venues, et cetera. Our only budget will come from our own blood, sweat, and tears.
engSearchText:
We pay for everything. That's costumes, venues,
et cetera. Our only budget will come from our own
blood, sweat, and tears.
jpnChrName: 衣装代に箱代……いいステージに立ちたければ 予算は自分の足で稼ぐ事！！
jpnSearchText:
衣装代に箱代……いいステージに立ちたければ
予算は自分の足で稼ぐ事！！

engChrName: And don't forget all the rehearsing in between those. Better kiss your free time and a good night's sleep goodbye!
engSearchText:
And don't forget all the rehearsing in between those.
Better kiss your free time and a good night's
sleep goodbye!
jpnChrName: 稽古はその合間に行うわ！ 今日からは寝る間も無いと思いなさい！
jpnSearchText:
稽古はその合間に行うわ！
今日からは寝る間も無いと思いなさい！

engChrName: Whaaat?! We're gonna get worked to the bone!
engSearchText: Whaaat?! We're gonna get worked to the bone!
jpnChrName: ひえええええ…… 想像以上にハードだよぉ～！！
jpnSearchText:
ひえええええ……
想像以上にハードだよぉ～！！

engChrName: The big day's here! Aaah, I'm so dang nervous!
engSearchText: The big day's here! Aaah, I'm so dang nervous!
jpnChrName: いよいよ今日ですね！！ くぅぅ～～！　緊張するなぁ！！
jpnSearchText:
いよいよ今日ですね！！
くぅぅ～～！　緊張するなぁ！！

engChrName: Let's get out there and give it our best, Seyla!
engSearchText: Let's get out there and give it our best, Seyla!
jpnChrName: ──セイラさん！ 今日はよろしくお願いしますっ！！
jpnSearchText:
──セイラさん！
今日はよろしくお願いしますっ！！

engChrName: Someone's excited here. Maybe too much...
engSearchText: Someone's excited here. Maybe too much...
jpnChrName: えっと……ルルア、 少し張り切りすぎじゃない？
jpnSearchText:
えっと……ルルア、
少し張り切りすぎじゃない？

engChrName: It's never enough! I mean, I'm about to take the stage with you, Seyla!
engSearchText:
It's never enough! I mean, I'm about to take the stage
with you, Seyla!
jpnChrName: 当然じゃないですかっ！！ セイラさんとステージに立てるんですよ！？
jpnSearchText:
当然じゃないですかっ！！
セイラさんとステージに立てるんですよ！？

engChrName: And I'm making my debut as an idol to boot! Ahh! This is a dream come true!
engSearchText:
And I'm making my debut as an idol to boot! Ahh!
This is a dream come true!
jpnChrName: そしてアイドルデビューだなんて…… はぁ～っ！　もう夢みたいです！！
jpnSearchText:
そしてアイドルデビューだなんて……
はぁ～っ！　もう夢みたいです！！

engChrName: (This is a tiny gig, and she's just performing as a stand-in...but okay.)
engSearchText:
(This is a tiny gig, and she's just performing as a
stand-in...but okay.)
jpnChrName: （今日は小さな公演だし、ルルアは   あくまで代打メンバーなのだけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（今日は小さな公演だし、ルルアは
あくまで代打メンバーなのだけど……）

engChrName: Okay, yes, dream come true. How about we start rehearsal? The clock's ticking.
engSearchText:
Okay, yes, dream come true. How about we
start rehearsal? The clock's ticking.
jpnChrName: まあいいわ……あまり時間もないし 最後のリハーサルを始めましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
まあいいわ……あまり時間もないし
最後のリハーサルを始めましょうか。

engChrName: Wow, I can't believe I found you so quickly! Today must be my lucky day!
engSearchText:
Wow, I can't believe I found you so quickly!
Today must be my lucky day!
jpnChrName: わ～っ！！　さっそく見つけちゃった！ 今日のあたし、めっちゃツイてるかもっ♪
jpnSearchText:
わ～っ！！　さっそく見つけちゃった！
今日のあたし、めっちゃツイてるかもっ♪

engChrName: Umm, you're Seyla, right? The idol?
engSearchText: Umm, you're Seyla, right? The idol?
jpnChrName: あのあのっ、“アイドル”のセイラさんですよね！？
jpnSearchText: あのあのっ、“アイドル”のセイラさんですよね！？

engChrName: You...know who I am?
engSearchText: You...know who I am?
jpnChrName: えっ…… 私の事、知っているの？
jpnSearchText:
えっ……
私の事、知っているの？

engChrName: Heehee, of course! I'm a huge Cupidhead! Your biggest fan!
engSearchText:
Heehee, of course! I'm a huge Cupidhead!
Your biggest fan!
jpnChrName: えへへ～、あたし《キューピット》の 大ファンなんです！！
jpnSearchText:
えへへ～、あたし《キューピット》の
大ファンなんです！！

engChrName: I first heard about you two years ago. I was so excited to see you live! You two were so cute on stage!
engSearchText:
I first heard about you two years ago. I was so excited
to see you live! You two were so cute on stage!
jpnChrName: ２年くらい前に見かけて～、 可愛いステージにキュンキュンしちゃって！
jpnSearchText:
２年くらい前に見かけて～、
可愛いステージにキュンキュンしちゃって！

engChrName: Oh, umm, thanks?
engSearchText: Oh, umm, thanks?
jpnChrName: そ、そうだったの……
jpnSearchText: そ、そうだったの……

engChrName: I'm honestly surprised you even know what an idol is. Not many people around here do.
engSearchText:
I'm honestly surprised you even know what an idol is.
Not many people around here do.
jpnChrName: ……ありがとう、“アイドル”なんて 一握りの人しか知らないのにね。
jpnSearchText:
……ありがとう、“アイドル”なんて
一握りの人しか知らないのにね。

engChrName: I guess it's still catching on here, haha. But I keep up with idols more than I do actresses!
engSearchText:
I guess it's still catching on here, haha. But I keep up
with idols more than I do actresses!
jpnChrName: あはは、まだまだ珍しいですもんね。 女優さんより身近だし、大好きですけど！
jpnSearchText:
あはは、まだまだ珍しいですもんね。
女優さんより身近だし、大好きですけど！

engChrName: That's why I moved to Edith from my hometown, actually. I want to be an idol, too!
engSearchText:
That's why I moved to Edith from my
hometown, actually. I want to be an idol, too!
jpnChrName: それであの……実はあたしも アイドルになりたくて地元から出てきたんです！
jpnSearchText:
それであの……実はあたしも
アイドルになりたくて地元から出てきたんです！

engChrName: W-Would you take me under your wing, Seyla?!
engSearchText: W-Would you take me under your wing, Seyla?!
jpnChrName: セイラさんっ！　どうか あたしに稽古をつけてください！！
jpnSearchText:
セイラさんっ！　どうか
あたしに稽古をつけてください！！

engChrName: ...Wait, WHAT?!
engSearchText: ...Wait, WHAT?!
jpnChrName: え──、えええええ～～～～～っ！？

engChrName: (She sure is a go-getter...)
engSearchText: (She sure is a go-getter...)
jpnChrName: （な、なんだかアクティブな子みたいですね。）
jpnSearchText: （な、なんだかアクティブな子みたいですね。）

engChrName: (But what's an 'idol'? I feel like I've heard the term somewhere before...)
engSearchText:
(But what's an 'idol'? I feel like I've heard the term
somewhere before...)
jpnChrName: （それにしても“アイドル”ですか……   聞いた事がありませんでしたけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（それにしても“アイドル”ですか……
聞いた事がありませんでしたけど……）

engChrName: (It's some kinda brand new pop some indie labels are pushing lately.)
engSearchText:
(It's some kinda brand new pop some indie labels are
pushing lately.)
jpnChrName: （最近、一部のインディーズレーベルで   売り出し始めたジャンルらしいぜ。）
jpnSearchText:
（最近、一部のインディーズレーベルで
売り出し始めたジャンルらしいぜ。）

engChrName: (Figured it was something just for nerds and geeks, but I guess it can have all kinds of fans.)
engSearchText:
(Figured it was something just for nerds and geeks,
but I guess it can have all kinds of fans.)
jpnChrName: （オタク受けを狙ってるとか聞いたが……   どうやら色々あるみてえだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（オタク受けを狙ってるとか聞いたが……
どうやら色々あるみてえだな。）

engChrName: I've decided to become an idol just like you and Natalie!
engSearchText:
I've decided to become an idol just like you
and Natalie!
jpnChrName: あたし決めたんです！　セイラさんや ナタリーさんみたいなアイドルになるって！！
jpnSearchText:
あたし決めたんです！　セイラさんや
ナタリーさんみたいなアイドルになるって！！

engChrName: Hold your horses there! This is so much to ask out of nowhere!
engSearchText:
Hold your horses there! This is so much to ask out
of nowhere!
jpnChrName: ……待って、ちょっと落ち着いて。 突然そんな事を言われても──
jpnSearchText:
……待って、ちょっと落ち着いて。
突然そんな事を言われても──

engChrName: (Not to mention that Natalie already...)
engSearchText: (Not to mention that Natalie already...)
jpnChrName: （それに、ナタリーとはもう……）
jpnSearchText: （それに、ナタリーとはもう……）

engChrName: I'll do anything! I swear, I'll do whatever it takes!
engSearchText: I'll do anything! I swear, I'll do whatever it takes!
jpnChrName: な、何でもします！！ ゼッタイに諦めませんから～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
な、何でもします！！
ゼッタイに諦めませんから～っ！！

engChrName: Okay, I'm coming up with a brand new dance!
engSearchText: Okay, I'm coming up with a brand new dance!
jpnChrName: え～い！　アドリブのダンス～っ！！
jpnSearchText: え～い！　アドリブのダンス～っ！！

engChrName: I can't really use a mic, but that won't stop me from singing and dancing my heart out!
engSearchText:
I can't really use a mic, but that won't stop me from
singing and dancing my heart out!
jpnChrName: なんだかマイクが使えなくなっちゃったけど 歌も踊りもバッチリできちゃいますよ！！
jpnSearchText:
なんだかマイクが使えなくなっちゃったけど
歌も踊りもバッチリできちゃいますよ！！

engChrName: So cheer up, everyone! Let's put smiles on those faces!
engSearchText: So cheer up, everyone! Let's put smiles on those faces!
jpnChrName: だから皆さんも、落ち込んでちゃダメです！ 元気を出していきましょ～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
だから皆さんも、落ち込んでちゃダメです！
元気を出していきましょ～っ！！

engChrName: Haha, well said. No point in being all gloomy!
engSearchText: Haha, well said. No point in being all gloomy!
jpnChrName: はは……そうだよな。 暗くなっても仕方ないし……
jpnSearchText:
はは……そうだよな。
暗くなっても仕方ないし……

engChrName: We're so lucky! We get to see Lulua dancing so close!
engSearchText: We're so lucky! We get to see Lulua dancing so close!
jpnChrName: むしろルルアちゃんの踊りを 間近で見れるなんてラッキーさ！！
jpnSearchText:
むしろルルアちゃんの踊りを
間近で見れるなんてラッキーさ！！

engChrName: It's not like I'm not worried about what's happening, but I decided I would rather use that energy in helping out!
engSearchText:
It's not like I'm not worried about what's happening,
but I decided I would rather use that energy in
helping out!
jpnChrName: あたしも不安がない訳じゃないですけど…… やれる事を精一杯やるって決めましたから！
jpnSearchText:
あたしも不安がない訳じゃないですけど……
やれる事を精一杯やるって決めましたから！

engChrName: It's safe here, so I want to support everyone while we wait for help to arrive!
engSearchText:
It's safe here, so I want to support everyone while we
wait for help to arrive!
jpnChrName: ここは安全みたいだし、皆さんと支え合って 救助が来るのを待ってます！
jpnSearchText:
ここは安全みたいだし、皆さんと支え合って
救助が来るのを待ってます！

engChrName: Don't strain yourself, okay? Take a breather if you need it!
engSearchText:
Don't strain yourself, okay? Take a breather if you
need it!
jpnChrName: 皆さんも無理しないでくださいね。 疲れた時は休んでいってください！
jpnSearchText:
皆さんも無理しないでくださいね。
疲れた時は休んでいってください！

engChrName: I can hear your voice crying for me! ♪
engSearchText: I can hear your voice crying for me! ♪
jpnChrName: ……君の～♪　声が聞こえてる叫んでる～！
jpnSearchText: ……君の～♪　声が聞こえてる叫んでる～！

engChrName: (Man, I'm starving! I could really go for some of Gordon's tacos right about now.)
engSearchText:
(Man, I'm starving! I could really go for some of
Gordon's tacos right about now.)
jpnChrName: （お腹へった……今日も   オジサンのタコスが食べたい～！！）
jpnSearchText:
（お腹へった……今日も
オジサンのタコスが食べたい～！！）

engChrName: (But no! Focus! This is our last shot at proving ourselves!)
engSearchText:
(But no! Focus! This is our last shot at
proving ourselves!)
jpnChrName: （でもでも頑張らないと！！   あたしたちの最後のチャンスなんだから！！）
jpnSearchText:
（でもでも頑張らないと！！
あたしたちの最後のチャンスなんだから！！）

engChrName: I never imagined being an idol would be so tough.
engSearchText: I never imagined being an idol would be so tough.
jpnChrName: アイドルの舞台裏が こんなにハードだったなんて～……
jpnSearchText:
アイドルの舞台裏が
こんなにハードだったなんて～……

engChrName: Pleeease, at least let me have a taco stipend or, like, a snack fund! C'mon, Seyla!
engSearchText:
Pleeease, at least let me have a taco stipend or, like, a
snack fund! C'mon, Seyla!
jpnChrName: ひえ～ん！　せめてタコスと オヤツ代だけは許して、セイラさ～ん！！
jpnSearchText:
ひえ～ん！　せめてタコスと
オヤツ代だけは許して、セイラさ～ん！！

engChrName: I can't believe I'm going to share the stage with THE Seyla!
engSearchText:
I can't believe I'm going to share the stage with
THE Seyla!
jpnChrName: 憧れのセイラさんと ステージに上がれる事になったんです！！
jpnSearchText:
憧れのセイラさんと
ステージに上がれる事になったんです！！

engChrName: Ahh! I'm the luckiest girl alive!
engSearchText: Ahh! I'm the luckiest girl alive!
jpnChrName: くぅぅ～～！　あたしの人生に こんな幸運が巡ってくるなんてっ！！
jpnSearchText:
くぅぅ～～！　あたしの人生に
こんな幸運が巡ってくるなんてっ！！

engChrName: I'll give it my all! Trust me, this will be the show of a lifetime!
engSearchText:
I'll give it my all! Trust me, this will be the show of
a lifetime!
jpnChrName: あたし、精一杯頑張りますっ！！ ぜったいやりとげてみせますから！！
jpnSearchText:
あたし、精一杯頑張りますっ！！
ぜったいやりとげてみせますから！！

engChrName: I'm hungry! Taco me, Gordon!
engSearchText: I'm hungry! Taco me, Gordon!
jpnChrName: お腹へった～！！ オジサ～ン！　タコスちょうだい～！！
jpnSearchText:
お腹へった～！！
オジサ～ン！　タコスちょうだい～！！

engChrName: Tacos, tacos, and more tacos! My soul will leave my body if I don't get my daily dose of tacos!
engSearchText:
Tacos, tacos, and more tacos! My soul will leave my
body if I don't get my daily dose of tacos!
jpnChrName: タコスタコスタコスタコスタコス～！！ オジサンのタコスがないと力が出ないよ～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
タコスタコスタコスタコスタコス～！！
オジサンのタコスがないと力が出ないよ～っ！！

engChrName: Hahaha! I can see you've been workin' hard today, eh?
engSearchText:
Hahaha! I can see you've been workin' hard
today, eh?
jpnChrName: はっはっは！　今日はまた 相当頑張ってたみてえだな！
jpnSearchText:
はっはっは！　今日はまた
相当頑張ってたみてえだな！

engChrName: Ain't so sure what'cha up to, but it must be a tough gig, you rollin' in here so late all the time. Let me whip ya somethin' up real quick.
engSearchText:
Ain't so sure what'cha up to, but it must be a
tough gig, you rollin' in here so late all the
time. Let me whip ya somethin' up real quick.
jpnChrName: よく知らんが、毎日遅くまで大変だなァ！ よしっ、今日もおまけしてやるか！
jpnSearchText:
よく知らんが、毎日遅くまで大変だなァ！
よしっ、今日もおまけしてやるか！

engChrName: Yay! You're an angel, Gordon!
engSearchText: Yay! You're an angel, Gordon!
jpnChrName: わぁ～い！！　オジサン大好き──っ！！
jpnSearchText: わぁ～い！！　オジサン大好き──っ！！

engChrName: Hahaha! Eat up and get that life back in you, lass!
engSearchText: Hahaha! Eat up and get that life back in you, lass!
jpnChrName: はっはっは！　沢山食って元気出せ！！
jpnSearchText: はっはっは！　沢山食って元気出せ！！

engChrName: Can always count on you, Gordon!
engSearchText: Can always count on you, Gordon!
jpnChrName: オジサン大好き──！ お陰で生き返っちゃうよ～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
オジサン大好き──！
お陰で生き返っちゃうよ～っ！！

engChrName: Do re mi fa so la ti do... ♪
engSearchText: Do re mi fa so la ti do... ♪
jpnChrName: あ！　え！　い！　う！　え！　お！ あ！　お！
jpnSearchText:
あ！　え！　い！　う！　え！　お！
あ！　お！

engChrName: (I'm really thankful Seyla's letting me rehearse with her...)
engSearchText:
(I'm really thankful Seyla's letting me rehearse
with her...)
jpnChrName: （稽古をつけてもらえる事に   なったのはいいけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（稽古をつけてもらえる事に
なったのはいいけど……）

engChrName: (But, umm, when can I move on from practicing scales? It feels like I've been doing this for forever...)
engSearchText:
(But, umm, when can I move on from
practicing scales? It feels like I've been doing this
for forever...)
jpnChrName: （ひえ～ん……セイラさんってば   めちゃくちゃ厳しいよぉぉ～！！）
jpnSearchText:
（ひえ～ん……セイラさんってば
めちゃくちゃ厳しいよぉぉ～！！）

engChrName: I'm finally in Edith! I haven't been here since dad brought me forever ago!
engSearchText:
I'm finally in Edith! I haven't been here since dad
brought me forever ago!
jpnChrName: 首都イーディス、到着～っ！ お父さんに連れて来てもらって以来だよー！！
jpnSearchText:
首都イーディス、到着～っ！
お父さんに連れて来てもらって以来だよー！！

engChrName: There's so many new buildings! But the tower still takes the cake!
engSearchText:
There's so many new buildings! But the tower still
takes the cake!
jpnChrName: わわっ、オシャレな建物が増えてるっ！！ あのタワーも相変わらずカッコイイし……！
jpnSearchText:
わわっ、オシャレな建物が増えてるっ！！
あのタワーも相変わらずカッコイイし……！

engChrName: Wait, what am I doing? I'm not here to sightsee!
engSearchText: Wait, what am I doing? I'm not here to sightsee!
jpnChrName: ……って、ダメダメ！ 観光に来たんじゃないんだから！
jpnSearchText:
……って、ダメダメ！
観光に来たんじゃないんだから！

engChrName: I'm here on a mission! Let Operation S Hunter commence!
engSearchText:
I'm here on a mission! Let Operation S Hunter
commence!
jpnChrName: まずはあの人を探さないと……！ よーし、頑張っちゃうぞっ！！
jpnSearchText:
まずはあの人を探さないと……！
よーし、頑張っちゃうぞっ！！

engChrName: (What the hell is happening?! I just wanna curl up in a corner and cry...)
engSearchText:
(What the hell is happening?! I just wanna curl up in
a corner and cry...)
jpnChrName: （くぅぅ……！　一体何が起きてるのよぅ！！   正直泣きたいくらいだけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（くぅぅ……！　一体何が起きてるのよぅ！！
正直泣きたいくらいだけど……）

engChrName: (But I can't with Seyla and that girl around... Gotta show 'em I'm made of tougher stuff!)
engSearchText:
(But I can't with Seyla and that girl around...
Gotta show 'em I'm made of tougher stuff!)
jpnChrName: （セイラやあのルルアって子がいる手前、   私もきっちりしたトコ見せないと……）
jpnSearchText:
（セイラやあのルルアって子がいる手前、
私もきっちりしたトコ見せないと……）

engChrName: (Maybe moving around will help me get my mind off of things. Maybe help pass out food and drinks? ...Yeah, that sounds good.)
engSearchText:
(Maybe moving around will help me get my mind off
of things. Maybe help pass out food and drinks?
...Yeah, that sounds good.)
jpnChrName: （ドリンクとか軽食配ったり、やる事はあるし……   ええ、むしろ動いてた方が落ち着くかもね……）
jpnSearchText:
（ドリンクとか軽食配ったり、やる事はあるし……
ええ、むしろ動いてた方が落ち着くかもね……）

engChrName: This isn't good. I might not even be able to book you another show unless you get on stage with Seyla.
engSearchText:
This isn't good. I might not even be able to book you
another show unless you get on stage with Seyla.
jpnChrName: 困ったねぇ、セイラちゃんが加入してくれないと 次のステージの予定も組めないよ？
jpnSearchText:
困ったねぇ、セイラちゃんが加入してくれないと
次のステージの予定も組めないよ？

engChrName: You know what this means, right?
engSearchText: You know what this means, right?
jpnChrName: このままだと、君のためにも ならないと思うけどねぇ～。
jpnSearchText:
このままだと、君のためにも
ならないと思うけどねぇ～。

engChrName: I hear you. And I appreciate your candor as my producer. But...could I have just a little more time?
engSearchText:
I hear you. And I appreciate your candor as
my producer. But...could I have just a little
more time?
jpnChrName: 分かってます、プロデューサー。 ……でも、もう少し時間をもらえませんか？
jpnSearchText:
分かってます、プロデューサー。
……でも、もう少し時間をもらえませんか？

engChrName: Seyla won't accept if I just spring it on her out of nowhere. Give me some time to ease her into the idea.
engSearchText:
Seyla won't accept if I just spring it on her out
of nowhere. Give me some time to ease her into
the idea.
jpnChrName: あの子も……急な話に戸惑ってるんです。 私は大丈夫ですから、もう少しだけ──
jpnSearchText:
あの子も……急な話に戸惑ってるんです。
私は大丈夫ですから、もう少しだけ──

engChrName: Sheesh, you're just as soft as she is. But fine. With how things are, maybe time is what she needs to gain some perspective.
engSearchText:
Sheesh, you're just as soft as she is. But fine.
With how things are, maybe time is what she needs
to gain some perspective.
jpnChrName: やれやれ……君も甘いねぇ。 まあこのご時世だし、私はいいけどねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……君も甘いねぇ。
まあこのご時世だし、私はいいけどねぇ。

engChrName: She will. Seyla and I have been talking, so all I gotta do is lay it out and—
engSearchText:
She will. Seyla and I have been talking, so all I gotta
do is lay it out and—
jpnChrName: ええ、セイラにはちゃんと 話をしてありますから、だから……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、セイラにはちゃんと
話をしてありますから、だから……

engChrName: Whatever. Just take care of it.
engSearchText: Whatever. Just take care of it.
jpnChrName: ふう、まあいいさ。
jpnSearchText: ふう、まあいいさ。

engChrName: Just keep in mind we have our own bottom line to look out for. The most we can stall is two weeks.
engSearchText:
Just keep in mind we have our own bottom line to
look out for. The most we can stall is two weeks.
jpnChrName: ただし事務所の都合もある、 引き延ばせるのはせいぜい２週間だよ？
jpnSearchText:
ただし事務所の都合もある、
引き延ばせるのはせいぜい２週間だよ？

engChrName: O-Okay! Thank you so much!
engSearchText: O-Okay! Thank you so much!
jpnChrName: はい……！　ありがとうございます！
jpnSearchText: はい……！　ありがとうございます！

engChrName: I think Lulua and that old woman were talking about getting a snack down at the food stalls after leaving the concert hall.
engSearchText:
I think Lulua and that old woman were talking about
getting a snack down at the food stalls after leaving
the concert hall.
jpnChrName: ルルアとお婆さんは、ライブハウスを出た後 屋台でお茶しようって話していた気がするわ。
jpnSearchText:
ルルアとお婆さんは、ライブハウスを出た後
屋台でお茶しようって話していた気がするわ。

engChrName: I think I heard something about trying out the tacos.
engSearchText: I think I heard something about trying out the tacos.
jpnChrName: タコスがオススメとも言っていたかしらね。
jpnSearchText: タコスがオススメとも言っていたかしらね。

engChrName: Did she start working part time as a caregiver?
engSearchText: Did she start working part time as a caregiver?
jpnChrName: 介護のバイトでも始めたのかしら……？
jpnSearchText: 介護のバイトでも始めたのかしら……？

engChrName: If she quit trying to be an idol, she wouldn't have to work so hard to make ends meet.
engSearchText:
If she quit trying to be an idol, she wouldn't have to
work so hard to make ends meet.
jpnChrName: アイドルなんて辞めてしまえば バイト三昧になる事もないのにね……
jpnSearchText:
アイドルなんて辞めてしまえば
バイト三昧になる事もないのにね……

engChrName: Guess Seyla and Lulua aren't giving up on making it as idols just yet.
engSearchText:
Guess Seyla and Lulua aren't giving up on making it
as idols just yet.
jpnChrName: セイラとルルア……あの様子だと まだアイドルを諦めていないみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
セイラとルルア……あの様子だと
まだアイドルを諦めていないみたいね。

engChrName: Are they defying the label's direct order? This isn't like you, Seyla...
engSearchText:
Are they defying the label's direct order? This isn't
like you, Seyla...
jpnChrName: まさか事務所の命令に逆らうつもり？ セイラらしくもない……
jpnSearchText:
まさか事務所の命令に逆らうつもり？
セイラらしくもない……

engChrName: She's...changed. A lot, actually. I wonder if it's Lulua's doing.
engSearchText:
She's...changed. A lot, actually. I wonder if it's
Lulua's doing.
jpnChrName: いえ……彼女（ルルア）との出会いで 変わってしまったのかしらね……
jpnSearchText:
いえ……彼女（ルルア）との出会いで
変わってしまったのかしらね……

engChrName: Yeah, I think someone like that was here.
engSearchText: Yeah, I think someone like that was here.
jpnChrName: ああ、確かにそれっぽい人なら来たぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、確かにそれっぽい人なら来たぜ。

engChrName: But I told them Jess was playing tonight, said the vibe was going to be chill.
engSearchText:
But I told them Jess was playing tonight, said the vibe
was going to be chill.
jpnChrName: だが今夜の演奏はジェスのシットリとした 演奏だって伝えたら……
jpnSearchText:
だが今夜の演奏はジェスのシットリとした
演奏だって伝えたら……

engChrName: Got the feeling they were hoping for something a little heavier. They left without even buying a ticket.
engSearchText:
Got the feeling they were hoping for something a
little heavier. They left without even buying a ticket.
jpnChrName: 激しい曲が好みだったみたいでな。 入場券も買わずに帰って行っちまったよ。
jpnSearchText:
激しい曲が好みだったみたいでな。
入場券も買わずに帰って行っちまったよ。

engChrName: I see... You guys talk about anything else? Anything at all you can tell me will be a big help.
engSearchText:
I see... You guys talk about anything else?
Anything at all you can tell me will be a big help.
jpnChrName: そうか……他に言ってなかったか？ なんでもいいから情報があれば教えてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
そうか……他に言ってなかったか？
なんでもいいから情報があれば教えてくれ。

engChrName: Uhh, let's see...
engSearchText: Uhh, let's see...
jpnChrName: うーん、そうだな……
jpnSearchText: うーん、そうだな……

engChrName: Oh, right! I remember they were muttering as they walked out.
engSearchText:
Oh, right! I remember they were muttering as they
walked out.
jpnChrName: あっ！　そういえば去り際に 独り言を言ってたぜ。
jpnSearchText:
あっ！　そういえば去り際に
独り言を言ってたぜ。

engChrName: 'Guess I'll head to the theater, then. I got a feeling they're playing something I'll like to see.'
engSearchText:
'Guess I'll head to the theater, then. I got a feeling
they're playing something I'll like to see.'
jpnChrName: なら映画にするか…… ちょうど観たいものがあった気がする、ってな。
jpnSearchText:
なら映画にするか……
ちょうど観たいものがあった気がする、ってな。

engChrName: To the theater, then? Thanks a bunch, man.
engSearchText: To the theater, then? Thanks a bunch, man.
jpnChrName: ふむ……今度は映画か。 情報提供助かったぜ、ありがとな。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……今度は映画か。
情報提供助かったぜ、ありがとな。

engChrName: No worries. Please come by again!
engSearchText: No worries. Please come by again!
jpnChrName: 別に構わねえよ、また来てくれ！
jpnSearchText: 別に構わねえよ、また来てくれ！

engChrName: (Only place you might catch a movie this late is Esprit Cinema in Tyrell.)
engSearchText:
(Only place you might catch a movie this late is
Esprit Cinema in Tyrell.)
jpnChrName: （この時間からも観れる映画館っつうと、   タイレル地区にあるシネマ・エスプリか？）
jpnSearchText:
（この時間からも観れる映画館っつうと、
タイレル地区にあるシネマ・エスプリか？）

engChrName: (Better get a move on before the trail goes cold.)
engSearchText: (Better get a move on before the trail goes cold.)
jpnChrName: （奴（やっこ）さんに追い付けなくなる前に   さっさと向かってみるか。）
jpnSearchText:
（奴（やっこ）さんに追い付けなくなる前に
さっさと向かってみるか。）

engChrName: Hey, y'all! Glad to see you in one piece.
engSearchText: Hey, y'all! Glad to see you in one piece.
jpnChrName: よう、兄さんたち…… よく無事でここまで来れたな。
jpnSearchText:
よう、兄さんたち……
よく無事でここまで来れたな。

engChrName: No clue what the heck's going on, but the coast looks safe for the time being.
engSearchText:
No clue what the heck's going on, but the coast looks
safe for the time being.
jpnChrName: 何が起きてんのかサッパリだが、 とりあえずここは安全みたいだ……
jpnSearchText:
何が起きてんのかサッパリだが、
とりあえずここは安全みたいだ……

engChrName: We set the place up as a makeshift shelter, so feel free to take a breather if you gotta.
engSearchText:
We set the place up as a makeshift shelter, so feel free
to take a breather if you gotta.
jpnChrName: せめて避難してきた連中を匿ってる所だぜ。 あんたらも体を休めていってくれ！
jpnSearchText:
せめて避難してきた連中を匿ってる所だぜ。
あんたらも体を休めていってくれ！

engChrName: We've got drinks and snacks aplenty, so everyone should be set. At least for a while.
engSearchText:
We've got drinks and snacks aplenty, so everyone
should be set. At least for a while.
jpnChrName: ドリンクや軽食も提供してるぜ。 しばらくなら皆を匿えるはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
ドリンクや軽食も提供してるぜ。
しばらくなら皆を匿えるはずだ。

engChrName: You guys take care of yourselves out there! Don't do anything I wouldn't do!
engSearchText:
You guys take care of yourselves out there! Don't do
anything I wouldn't do!
jpnChrName: あんたらも気を付けてな！ 無理だけはするんじゃねえぞ！
jpnSearchText:
あんたらも気を付けてな！
無理だけはするんじゃねえぞ！

engChrName: Hey, man! Good to see you around. We've got an idol performance on for the Revolution Festival show.
engSearchText:
Hey, man! Good to see you around. We've got an
idol performance on for the Revolution Festival show.
jpnChrName: よう兄さん、よく来てくれたな。 栄えある記念祭の公演は“アイドル”の二人組だぜ。
jpnSearchText:
よう兄さん、よく来てくれたな。
栄えある記念祭の公演は“アイドル”の二人組だぜ。

engChrName: They're a duo called WithU. This'll be their debut.
engSearchText: They're a duo called WithU. This'll be their debut.
jpnChrName: アイドルユニット《ウィズユー》は 今日がデビュー初日らしいんだが──
jpnSearchText:
アイドルユニット《ウィズユー》は
今日がデビュー初日らしいんだが──

engChrName: And to top it off, Jess wrote their songs! They're kinda nobodies right now, but I got a feeling they're on their way to being somebodies!
engSearchText:
And to top it off, Jess wrote their songs!
They're kinda nobodies right now, but I got a feeling
they're on their way to being somebodies!
jpnChrName: なんでも曲はあのジェスが監修したとか。 無名だが何気に期待できるかもしれねえぜ。
jpnSearchText:
なんでも曲はあのジェスが監修したとか。
無名だが何気に期待できるかもしれねえぜ。

engChrName: Stop by and check the show out if you feel like it!
engSearchText: Stop by and check the show out if you feel like it!
jpnChrName: 良けりゃ見て行ってくれよな！
jpnSearchText: 良けりゃ見て行ってくれよな！

engChrName: No one's seen or heard from Jess since he suddenly canceled his show the other day...
engSearchText:
No one's seen or heard from Jess since he suddenly
canceled his show the other day...
jpnChrName: ……ジェスといやあ、この前のドタキャンから ちょいと行方が分からないらしいが──
jpnSearchText:
……ジェスといやあ、この前のドタキャンから
ちょいと行方が分からないらしいが──

engChrName: Guess he's just going through the patented Artist Drama Hour. I do hope he'll be back soon, though...
engSearchText:
Guess he's just going through the patented Artist
Drama Hour. I do hope he'll be back soon, though...
jpnChrName: まあ、アーティストには時々聞く話だしな。 どうにか復帰してくれりゃいいんだが……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、アーティストには時々聞く話だしな。
どうにか復帰してくれりゃいいんだが……

engChrName: Today's Jess' big day! He'll be debuting his first major label single live today!
engSearchText:
Today's Jess' big day! He'll be debuting his first major
label single live today!
jpnChrName: 今日はジェスの晴れ舞台！ メジャーデビュー曲の生演奏だったんだが──
jpnSearchText:
今日はジェスの晴れ舞台！
メジャーデビュー曲の生演奏だったんだが──

engChrName: ...If he makes it, that is. He's actually running late.
engSearchText: ...If he makes it, that is. He's actually running late.
jpnChrName: ……な、なんか遅れてるらしくてな。 まだ到着してねえんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
……な、なんか遅れてるらしくてな。
まだ到着してねえんだよ。

engChrName: I got a bad feeling about this. We don't sell this much every day. And Jess isn't the type to no call, no show...right?
engSearchText:
I got a bad feeling about this. We don't sell this much
every day. And Jess isn't the type to no call, no
show...right?
jpnChrName: 参ったな……こんだけチケットが売れるのも 珍しいんだぜ？　ドタキャンなんて事ねえよな？
jpnSearchText:
参ったな……こんだけチケットが売れるのも
珍しいんだぜ？　ドタキャンなんて事ねえよな？

engChrName: Hey, dude! We're putting on a free show tonight!
engSearchText: Hey, dude! We're putting on a free show tonight!
jpnChrName: よう兄さん、今夜は フリーの公演をやってるぜ！
jpnSearchText:
よう兄さん、今夜は
フリーの公演をやってるぜ！

engChrName: The opener is our own local up-and-comer, Jess. He's really been making a name for himself around here lately.
engSearchText:
The opener is our own local up-and-comer, Jess.
He's really been making a name for himself around
here lately.
jpnChrName: 今夜の一発目はお馴染みのジェスなんだが、 近頃人気がうなぎ上りでな。
jpnSearchText:
今夜の一発目はお馴染みのジェスなんだが、
近頃人気がうなぎ上りでな。

engChrName: Word is he's about to sign with a major label. It's getting harder and harder to get tickets to see him before they sell out!
engSearchText:
Word is he's about to sign with a major label.
It's getting harder and harder to get tickets to see him
before they sell out!
jpnChrName: メジャーデビュー直前でもあるし チケットの入手も難しくなってきてるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
メジャーデビュー直前でもあるし
チケットの入手も難しくなってきてるんだ。

engChrName: It's practically a miracle that he's playing a free show! This might be your one shot to see him live!
engSearchText:
It's practically a miracle that he's playing a free show!
This might be your one shot to see him live!
jpnChrName: 今夜は奇跡のフリー公演だが 本公演は観れるかどうか──聴くなら今だぜ？
jpnSearchText:
今夜は奇跡のフリー公演だが
本公演は観れるかどうか──聴くなら今だぜ？

engChrName: Hey, next act's still getting ready. You mind waiting outside?
engSearchText:
Hey, next act's still getting ready. You mind
waiting outside?
jpnChrName: よお、次の公演は準備中だぜ。 外で待っててくんな。
jpnSearchText:
よお、次の公演は準備中だぜ。
外で待っててくんな。

engChrName: I'll go do a sound check with 'em when I'm done here.
engSearchText:
I'll go do a sound check with 'em when I'm
done here.
jpnChrName: さぁて、ここが終わったら 音響の具合を確かめてくるかねェ～。
jpnSearchText:
さぁて、ここが終わったら
音響の具合を確かめてくるかねェ～。

engChrName: Hey, dude! We're putting on a free show tonight!
engSearchText: Hey, dude! We're putting on a free show tonight!
jpnChrName: よう兄さん、今夜は フリーの公演をやってるぜ！
jpnSearchText:
よう兄さん、今夜は
フリーの公演をやってるぜ！

engChrName: We've got an idol duo performing. Not exactly a venue seller right now, not gonna lie.
engSearchText:
We've got an idol duo performing. Not exactly a
venue seller right now, not gonna lie.
jpnChrName: 今夜の公演は“アイドル”の二人組だ。 ……まだまだ珍しいジャンルだよな。
jpnSearchText:
今夜の公演は“アイドル”の二人組だ。
……まだまだ珍しいジャンルだよな。

engChrName: Rock bands are the wave right now. It's tough for idol bands to even make a breakthrough.
engSearchText:
Rock bands are the wave right now. It's tough
for idol bands to even make a breakthrough.
jpnChrName: ロックバンドってのも徐々に流行りつつあるが…… アイドルは音楽で売ってくスタイルじゃねえからな。
jpnSearchText:
ロックバンドってのも徐々に流行りつつあるが……
アイドルは音楽で売ってくスタイルじゃねえからな。

engChrName: Some music fans even say idol pop is just an excuse for artists in cute dresses to flirt with the audience.
engSearchText:
Some music fans even say idol pop is just an excuse
for artists in cute dresses to flirt with the audience.
jpnChrName: あの衣装も相まって“客に媚びてる”なんて いう音楽ファンもいるくらいだ。
jpnSearchText:
あの衣装も相まって“客に媚びてる”なんて
いう音楽ファンもいるくらいだ。

engChrName: But even then, those girls are working real hard. No reason they don't deserve our support!
engSearchText:
But even then, those girls are working real hard.
No reason they don't deserve our support!
jpnChrName: だがまあ、頑張り屋の嬢ちゃんらみてえだし 応援してやるのもアリじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
だがまあ、頑張り屋の嬢ちゃんらみてえだし
応援してやるのもアリじゃねえか？

engChrName: Hey, dude! We're putting on a free show tonight!
engSearchText: Hey, dude! We're putting on a free show tonight!
jpnChrName: よう兄さん、今夜は フリーの公演をやってるぜ！
jpnSearchText:
よう兄さん、今夜は
フリーの公演をやってるぜ！

engChrName: The popular singer-songwriter Jess is going to be treating us to some of his heart-wrenching tunes.
engSearchText:
The popular singer-songwriter Jess is going to be
treating us to some of his heart-wrenching tunes.
jpnChrName: 人気のシンガーソングライター・ジェスが 沁みる曲を披露してくれてるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
人気のシンガーソングライター・ジェスが
沁みる曲を披露してくれてるんだ。

engChrName: How about enjoying 'em with a drink?
engSearchText: How about enjoying 'em with a drink?
jpnChrName: ドリンク片手に一杯どうだい？
jpnSearchText: ドリンク片手に一杯どうだい？

engChrName: Jess has really been making waves at the concert hall. He's even about to make his major label debut.
engSearchText:
Jess has really been making waves at the concert hall.
He's even about to make his major label debut.
jpnChrName: ジェスはウチでも人気なんだぜ。 メジャーデビューも決まってるしな。
jpnSearchText:
ジェスはウチでも人気なんだぜ。
メジャーデビューも決まってるしな。

engChrName: He'll be a big deal soon enough! Better see him before he gets his big break!
engSearchText:
He'll be a big deal soon enough! Better see him
before he gets his big break!
jpnChrName: 実力は折り紙付き── ハハッ、ブレイク前に観といて損はねえぜ。
jpnSearchText:
実力は折り紙付き──
ハハッ、ブレイク前に観といて損はねえぜ。

engChrName: All right. Time to get ready to open up.
engSearchText: All right. Time to get ready to open up.
jpnChrName: さァて、そろそろ時間だし 開ける準備を始めるかねェ～。
jpnSearchText:
さァて、そろそろ時間だし
開ける準備を始めるかねェ～。

engChrName: We've got two acts on the bill tonight that I'm sure are gonna fire up the audience!
engSearchText:
We've got two acts on the bill tonight that I'm sure
are gonna fire up the audience!
jpnChrName: 今夜は２本ほど公演が入っててな。 観客をフィーバーさせてくれるに違いねえぜ！
jpnSearchText:
今夜は２本ほど公演が入っててな。
観客をフィーバーさせてくれるに違いねえぜ！

engChrName: That said, looks like things are fired up enough outside. Did something happen?
engSearchText:
That said, looks like things are fired up
enough outside. Did something happen?
jpnChrName: それにしても……随分騒がしいよな。 なにか事件があったみてえだが。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても……随分騒がしいよな。
なにか事件があったみてえだが。

engChrName: Never could I have imagined that such devils would overrun this fair city...
engSearchText:
Never could I have imagined that such devils would
overrun this fair city...
jpnChrName: まさかあのような“悪魔”が 街を蹂躙することになるとは……
jpnSearchText:
まさかあのような“悪魔”が
街を蹂躙することになるとは……

engChrName: But the Winged Goddess will protect us. We shall persevere through this.
engSearchText:
But the Winged Goddess will protect us. We shall
persevere through this.
jpnChrName: ──ですが、《翼の女神》の恩寵も 必ずやあることでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
──ですが、《翼の女神》の恩寵も
必ずやあることでしょう。

engChrName: It's a great relief to see you unharmed, Feri. You must take the utmost caution out there!
engSearchText:
It's a great relief to see you unharmed, Feri. You must
take the utmost caution out there!
jpnChrName: フェリさん、無事で良かった。 どうかこの先も無茶などなさいませんよう。
jpnSearchText:
フェリさん、無事で良かった。
どうかこの先も無茶などなさいませんよう。

engChrName: And please return to us safely.
engSearchText: And please return to us safely.
jpnChrName: そして必ず無事に戻ってきてください。
jpnSearchText: そして必ず無事に戻ってきてください。

engChrName: I promise I will! Take care of everyone here while I'm out, Father!
engSearchText:
I promise I will! Take care of everyone here while I'm
out, Father!
jpnChrName: はいっ！　みんなの事、 どうかよろしくお願いします！！
jpnSearchText:
はいっ！　みんなの事、
どうかよろしくお願いします！！

engChrName: If you intend to continue on, please be careful and come back to us safely.
engSearchText:
If you intend to continue on, please be careful and
come back to us safely.
jpnChrName: この先も進まれるのであれば、どうか慎重に。 必ず無事に戻ってきてください。
jpnSearchText:
この先も進まれるのであれば、どうか慎重に。
必ず無事に戻ってきてください。

engChrName: I must tend to and protect those who have sought shelter here.
engSearchText:
I must tend to and protect those who have sought
shelter here.
jpnChrName: 私はここに逃げてきた方々を 守らねばなりません。
jpnSearchText:
私はここに逃げてきた方々を
守らねばなりません。

engChrName: Please be careful, everyone. I would hate to see harm come to any of you.
engSearchText:
Please be careful, everyone. I would hate to see harm
come to any of you.
jpnChrName: 皆さんも、どうかお気をつけて。 必ず無事に戻ってきてください。
jpnSearchText:
皆さんも、どうかお気をつけて。
必ず無事に戻ってきてください。

engChrName: Welcome to our temple. We'll be holding special prayer services soon.
engSearchText:
Welcome to our temple. We'll be holding special
prayer services soon.
jpnChrName: ようこそいらっしゃいました。 当寺院では、特別な祈祷を執り行う予定です。
jpnSearchText:
ようこそいらっしゃいました。
当寺院では、特別な祈祷を執り行う予定です。

engChrName: Though we are still recovering from the tragic events of last month, we must hold fast to hope.
engSearchText:
Though we are still recovering from the tragic events
of last month, we must hold fast to hope.
jpnChrName: 先月はあのような事件が起き、 多くの悲しみもまだ癒えぬ中ではありますが……
jpnSearchText:
先月はあのような事件が起き、
多くの悲しみもまだ癒えぬ中ではありますが……

engChrName: Let us pray together to the Goddess. May she hear our prayers and bless us with peace henceforth.
engSearchText:
Let us pray together to the Goddess. May she hear
our prayers and bless us with peace henceforth.
jpnChrName: 希望を信じ、共に女神に 平穏と祝福を祈ると致しましょう。
jpnSearchText:
希望を信じ、共に女神に
平穏と祝福を祈ると致しましょう。

engChrName: Peace be with you. May you be blessed by the Winged Goddess.
engSearchText:
Peace be with you. May you be blessed by the
Winged Goddess.
jpnChrName: 安らかであらん事を。 どうか貴方がたに《翼の女神（アルーシャ）》の恩寵を。
jpnSearchText:
安らかであらん事を。
どうか貴方がたに《翼の女神（アルーシャ）》の恩寵を。

engChrName: I've prescribed some medication to help soothe Lashkar's mind.
engSearchText:
I've prescribed some medication to help soothe
Lashkar's mind.
jpnChrName: ラシュカル君には 心を落ち着ける薬を処方した所です。
jpnSearchText:
ラシュカル君には
心を落ち着ける薬を処方した所です。

engChrName: It's certainly not enough, that much I know. That boy is going through so much right now.
engSearchText:
It's certainly not enough, that much I know. That boy
is going through so much right now.
jpnChrName: あの子の身に起きた事を考えれば 無理もない事でしょうが……
jpnSearchText:
あの子の身に起きた事を考えれば
無理もない事でしょうが……

engChrName: We must hold steadfast for him, and support him through these trying times.
engSearchText:
We must hold steadfast for him, and support him
through these trying times.
jpnChrName: せめて、私たちも精一杯 支えてあげたいものです。
jpnSearchText:
せめて、私たちも精一杯
支えてあげたいものです。

engChrName: The citizenry has started to regain a sense of normalcy, albeit small.
engSearchText:
The citizenry has started to regain a sense of
normalcy, albeit small.
jpnChrName: ようやく人々の顔にも 安堵が戻ってきたようですね。
jpnSearchText:
ようやく人々の顔にも
安堵が戻ってきたようですね。

engChrName: It does bring me joy seeing people moving on slowly. We can never take back what has already been lost, so all we can do is move on.
engSearchText:
It does bring me joy seeing people moving on slowly.
We can never take back what has already been lost, so
all we can do is move on.
jpnChrName: ……ですが、失われた命は戻りません。 そして人は誰かの代わりにはなれないのです。
jpnSearchText:
……ですが、失われた命は戻りません。
そして人は誰かの代わりにはなれないのです。

engChrName: Sorrow and grief still plague us all. I'll pray for the souls of those gone, and for those left behind to mourn them.
engSearchText:
Sorrow and grief still plague us all. I'll pray for the
souls of those gone, and for those left behind to
mourn them.
jpnChrName: まだまだ深い悲しみが横たわっております。 私も引き続き、祈りを捧げると致しましょう。
jpnSearchText:
まだまだ深い悲しみが横たわっております。
私も引き続き、祈りを捧げると致しましょう。

engChrName: I've heard tell that the incident could've been racially motivated.
engSearchText:
I've heard tell that the incident could've been
racially motivated.
jpnChrName: ……かの事件の背後には 民族問題が関係していたと言われていますが……
jpnSearchText:
……かの事件の背後には
民族問題が関係していたと言われていますが……

engChrName: To think such hatred for one's neighbors brought this tragedy about...
engSearchText:
To think such hatred for one's neighbors brought this
tragedy about...
jpnChrName: 果たしてそれが何だと言うのでしょう。
jpnSearchText: 果たしてそれが何だと言うのでしょう。

engChrName: The wound left behind is deep, and maybe it shall never truly heal. We must unite in prayer, however, and support those affected the most.
engSearchText:
The wound left behind is deep, and maybe it shall
never truly heal. We must unite in prayer, however,
and support those affected the most.
jpnChrName: 私たちにできるのは、祈り、支え合う中で 深い悲しみを癒すことだけです。
jpnSearchText:
私たちにできるのは、祈り、支え合う中で
深い悲しみを癒すことだけです。

engChrName: The sorrow and despair are too heavy for one to bear alone. We must unite in prayer to lift up those who need it most.
engSearchText:
The sorrow and despair are too heavy for one to
bear alone. We must unite in prayer to lift up those
who need it most.
jpnChrName: 悲しみは深く、あまりに大きい── 私も引き続き、祈りを捧げると致しましょう。
jpnSearchText:
悲しみは深く、あまりに大きい──
私も引き続き、祈りを捧げると致しましょう。

engChrName: Oh, Arusha, please shepherd the poor, innocent souls of those lost in Creil...
engSearchText:
Oh, Arusha, please shepherd the poor, innocent souls
of those lost in Creil...
jpnChrName: 《翼の女神（アルーシャ）》よ、 クレイユ村の民を、無垢なる魂を……
jpnSearchText:
《翼の女神（アルーシャ）》よ、
クレイユ村の民を、無垢なる魂を……

engChrName: May your radiance guide them to paradise and your wings envelop them in warmth everlasting.
engSearchText:
May your radiance guide them to paradise and your
wings envelop them in warmth everlasting.
jpnChrName: 貴女の輝ける翼により、 安らかな楽園へお導き下さい……
jpnSearchText:
貴女の輝ける翼により、
安らかな楽園へお導き下さい……

engChrName: May you be a refuge for those who remain in this world, and protect them as they continue to walk through life.
engSearchText:
May you be a refuge for those who remain in this
world, and protect them as they continue to walk
through life.
jpnChrName: そして、現世に留まりし者たちに、 どうかその恩寵を賜り下さい……
jpnSearchText:
そして、現世に留まりし者たちに、
どうかその恩寵を賜り下さい……

engChrName: Everyone is beside themselves, grieving over the tragedy in Creil.
engSearchText:
Everyone is beside themselves, grieving over the
tragedy in Creil.
jpnChrName: これほど多くの命が失われたとあって、 人々の動揺も相当のものです。
jpnSearchText:
これほど多くの命が失われたとあって、
人々の動揺も相当のものです。

engChrName: Our temple is feeling the waves quite strongly, having a particularly strong connection with the village.
engSearchText:
Our temple is feeling the waves quite strongly, having
a particularly strong connection with the village.
jpnChrName: そして当寺院は、クレイユ村と いくらかの縁もあります。
jpnSearchText:
そして当寺院は、クレイユ村と
いくらかの縁もあります。

engChrName: We should all dedicate some time to pray for the eternal rest of those lost souls.
engSearchText:
We should all dedicate some time to pray for the
eternal rest of those lost souls.
jpnChrName: 少しでも彼らの魂の安息を祈らねば……
jpnSearchText: 少しでも彼らの魂の安息を祈らねば……

engChrName: Mother Kyra hails from an impoverished town in the Central East.
engSearchText:
Mother Kyra hails from an impoverished town in the
Central East.
jpnChrName: キーラ司祭は、とある中東辺境にある 貧民街の出身でしてね。
jpnSearchText:
キーラ司祭は、とある中東辺境にある
貧民街の出身でしてね。

engChrName: Life has guided her to the cloth, despite everything that's happened to her. I imagine heavenly hands ensured she'd never go astray.
engSearchText:
Life has guided her to the cloth, despite everything
that's happened to her. I imagine heavenly hands
ensured she'd never go astray.
jpnChrName: 様々な縁と出会いの導きによって 聖職者となる道を選んだようです。
jpnSearchText:
様々な縁と出会いの導きによって
聖職者となる道を選んだようです。

engChrName: Perhaps that is why her dedication to the salvation of others is so unshakeable.
engSearchText:
Perhaps that is why her dedication to the salvation of
others is so unshakeable.
jpnChrName: ですから人一倍、誰かを救う事に 一生懸命になれるのでしょうね。
jpnSearchText:
ですから人一倍、誰かを救う事に
一生懸命になれるのでしょうね。

engChrName: I believe that she is of a divine fate. There are tasks only she is able to accomplish.
engSearchText:
I believe that she is of a divine fate. There are tasks
only she is able to accomplish.
jpnChrName: ふふ、きっと彼女にしかできない事が あると私は信じていますよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、きっと彼女にしかできない事が
あると私は信じていますよ。

engChrName: Calvard's Revolution Festival is fast approaching, now only a month away.
engSearchText:
Calvard's Revolution Festival is fast approaching,
now only a month away.
jpnChrName: そういえば、来月はいよいよ カルバードの革命記念祭ですね。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、来月はいよいよ
カルバードの革命記念祭ですね。

engChrName: We'll need to start preparations on our end in concordance with Edith Grand Cathedral and the other chapels.
engSearchText:
We'll need to start preparations on our end in
concordance with Edith Grand Cathedral and the
other chapels.
jpnChrName: イーディス大聖堂や、他の礼拝堂とも 連携しつつ準備を始めなければ。
jpnSearchText:
イーディス大聖堂や、他の礼拝堂とも
連携しつつ準備を始めなければ。

engChrName: It's a very special day to all the citizens of our country.
engSearchText: It's a very special day to all the citizens of our country.
jpnChrName: この国に住まう人にとって特別な日──
jpnSearchText: この国に住まう人にとって特別な日──

engChrName: The Central Eastern temples will be joining the prayer services offered. Feel free to participate, if you're so inclined.
engSearchText:
The Central Eastern temples will be joining the
prayer services offered. Feel free to participate, if
you're so inclined.
jpnChrName: 中東寺院でも祈祷を執り行いますよ。 よろしければ是非ご参加くださいね。
jpnSearchText:
中東寺院でも祈祷を執り行いますよ。
よろしければ是非ご参加くださいね。

engChrName: The abundance of resources in the Principality of Elsaim has made it the economic superpower governing the Central East.
engSearchText:
The abundance of resources in the Principality of
Elsaim has made it the economic superpower
governing the Central East.
jpnChrName: 中東地域の盟主とされる《エルザイム公国》は 地下資源が豊富で、豊かな国として知られます。
jpnSearchText:
中東地域の盟主とされる《エルザイム公国》は
地下資源が豊富で、豊かな国として知られます。

engChrName: The role it plays is pivotal, both with its status as a diplomatic powerhouse and its flourishing initiatives regarding the desert's forestation.
engSearchText:
The role it plays is pivotal, both with its status as a
diplomatic powerhouse and its flourishing initiatives
regarding the desert's forestation.
jpnChrName: 砂漠地帯にありながら緑化に成功した都市も ありますしね、周辺国との関係も良好です。
jpnSearchText:
砂漠地帯にありながら緑化に成功した都市も
ありますしね、周辺国との関係も良好です。

engChrName: Though we must not forget about Valis, it having become a wealthy city state through maritime trading.
engSearchText:
Though we must not forget about Valis, it having
become a wealthy city state through maritime trading.
jpnChrName: ただ……近年、《ヴァリス市国》が 南海貿易で莫大な富を稼いでいるらしく。
jpnSearchText:
ただ……近年、《ヴァリス市国》が
南海貿易で莫大な富を稼いでいるらしく。

engChrName: Rumors say that tensions have arisen between nations, mostly attributed to certain groups.
engSearchText:
Rumors say that tensions have arisen between
nations, mostly attributed to certain groups.
jpnChrName: 一部では緊張が 高まり始めているという噂も……
jpnSearchText:
一部では緊張が
高まり始めているという噂も……

engChrName: Things are changing in the Central East. It would do us well to pay attention.
engSearchText:
Things are changing in the Central East. It would do
us well to pay attention.
jpnChrName: 中東も少しずつ変わり始めているのでしょう。 私たちも留意しておかねばなりませんね。
jpnSearchText:
中東も少しずつ変わり始めているのでしょう。
私たちも留意しておかねばなりませんね。

engChrName: The Principality of Elsaim is a wealthy nation, but Valis has made economic strides to rival it in recent years.
engSearchText:
The Principality of Elsaim is a wealthy nation, but
Valis has made economic strides to rival it in
recent years.
jpnChrName: 《エルザイム公国》は豊かな国ですが、 近年は《ヴァリス市国》の躍進が著しい様子。
jpnSearchText:
《エルザイム公国》は豊かな国ですが、
近年は《ヴァリス市国》の躍進が著しい様子。

engChrName: But they're not the only outliers. Some impoverished nations are moving along nicely, too. A major upset might envelop the region soon enough.
engSearchText:
But they're not the only outliers. Some impoverished
nations are moving along nicely, too. A major upset
might envelop the region soon enough.
jpnChrName: 中東には貧困に喘ぐ地域もあり…… 中々ままならないものですが。
jpnSearchText:
中東には貧困に喘ぐ地域もあり……
中々ままならないものですが。

engChrName: As head of this temple, I must endeavor to keep abreast of developments between both countries.
engSearchText:
As head of this temple, I must endeavor to keep
abreast of developments between both countries.
jpnChrName: 七耀寺院の者としても、両国の関係は 留意しておかねばなりませんね。
jpnSearchText:
七耀寺院の者としても、両国の関係は
留意しておかねばなりませんね。

engChrName: An unexpected guest graced us with a visit today.
engSearchText: An unexpected guest graced us with a visit today.
jpnChrName: 今日は珍しい客人が来ていますね。
jpnSearchText: 今日は珍しい客人が来ていますね。

engChrName: Her name is Sister Belicia. She's from Creil Village in Vichy County.
engSearchText:
Her name is Sister Belicia. She's from Creil Village in
Vichy County.
jpnChrName: ヴィシー郡・クレイユ村からいらした シスター・ベルシアです。
jpnSearchText:
ヴィシー郡・クレイユ村からいらした
シスター・ベルシアです。

engChrName: She's very familiar with Mother Kyra, as she was her understudy for a time. I'm certain they must be eager to catch up with each other.
engSearchText:
She's very familiar with Mother Kyra, as she was her
understudy for a time. I'm certain they must be eager
to catch up with each other.
jpnChrName: 彼女はキーラ司祭の後輩でしてね、 ふふ、色々積もる話もある様子。
jpnSearchText:
彼女はキーラ司祭の後輩でしてね、
ふふ、色々積もる話もある様子。

engChrName: I'd rather she take the day off today, so that they may have ample time to speak with each other.
engSearchText:
I'd rather she take the day off today, so that they may
have ample time to speak with each other.
jpnChrName: 今日くらいはゆっくりと、 昔話に花を咲かせてもらいましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
今日くらいはゆっくりと、
昔話に花を咲かせてもらいましょうか。

engChrName: I'll handle any of her remaining tasks for the day, so that she may relax.
engSearchText:
I'll handle any of her remaining tasks for the day, so
that she may relax.
jpnChrName: 今日の雑務は私が引き受けると致しましょう。
jpnSearchText: 今日の雑務は私が引き受けると致しましょう。

engChrName: I imagine the time to catch up with each other will be much needed and appreciated.
engSearchText:
I imagine the time to catch up with each other will be
much needed and appreciated.
jpnChrName: 二人にはゆっくり昔話に 花を咲かせてもらいましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
二人にはゆっくり昔話に
花を咲かせてもらいましょうか。

engChrName: I heard there will be a film festival underway in Tharbad next week.
engSearchText:
I heard there will be a film festival underway in
Tharbad next week.
jpnChrName: そういえば来週にも、サルバッドで 映画祭が開催されるそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば来週にも、サルバッドで
映画祭が開催されるそうですね。

engChrName: Tharbad bordering with the Central East has deeply influenced its culture, even when it's still part of the Republic.
engSearchText:
Tharbad bordering with the Central East has deeply
influenced its culture, even when it's still part of
the Republic.
jpnChrName: サルバッドは中東地域との国境近くに位置し 共和国ながらその影響が色濃い街です。
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドは中東地域との国境近くに位置し
共和国ながらその影響が色濃い街です。

engChrName: It may be in the middle of the desert, but luxurious hotels and other amenities are never lacking. It's developed widely in the past years.
engSearchText:
It may be in the middle of the desert, but luxurious
hotels and other amenities are never lacking.
It's developed widely in the past years.
jpnChrName: 砂漠の中にあり、近年では 豪奢なホテルなども建造されているとか。
jpnSearchText:
砂漠の中にあり、近年では
豪奢なホテルなども建造されているとか。

engChrName: I'm curious to see the continued impact the film industry has had in the Republic.
engSearchText:
I'm curious to see the continued impact the film
industry has had in the Republic.
jpnChrName: 共和国の映画という文化が何をもたらすのか…… 私も少々気になっていますね。
jpnSearchText:
共和国の映画という文化が何をもたらすのか……
私も少々気になっていますね。

engChrName: Tharbad borders with the Principality of Elsaim, the Central East's economic powerhouse.
engSearchText:
Tharbad borders with the Principality of Elsaim, the
Central East's economic powerhouse.
jpnChrName: サルバッドは中東地域──中東の盟主たる 《エルザイム公国》との国境近くにあります。
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドは中東地域──中東の盟主たる
《エルザイム公国》との国境近くにあります。

engChrName: The Republic has maintained good relations with them for the longest time. The cultural exchanges seen in the film festival are fascinating.
engSearchText:
The Republic has maintained good relations with
them for the longest time. The cultural exchanges
seen in the film festival are fascinating.
jpnChrName: 古くから共和国とは友好国ですが、 映画祭を通じてどんな文化的交流があるのか……
jpnSearchText:
古くから共和国とは友好国ですが、
映画祭を通じてどんな文化的交流があるのか……

engChrName: I'm eager to see what this year brings.
engSearchText: I'm eager to see what this year brings.
jpnChrName: ふふ、私も楽しみにしていましょうか。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、私も楽しみにしていましょうか。

engChrName: It's a blessing to see the faces of our neighbors here at the temple.
engSearchText:
It's a blessing to see the faces of our neighbors here at
the temple.
jpnChrName: この寺院には、近隣の住民も 顔を出してくれていましてね。
jpnSearchText:
この寺院には、近隣の住民も
顔を出してくれていましてね。

engChrName: Despite Rooney not being from the Central East, he attends Sunday School with us regularly.
engSearchText:
Despite Rooney not being from the Central East, he
attends Sunday School with us regularly.
jpnChrName: ルーニー君は西方人ですが 日曜学校にも通っているのです。
jpnSearchText:
ルーニー君は西方人ですが
日曜学校にも通っているのです。

engChrName: It does my old heart good to see our youth getting along, despite the racial differences.
engSearchText:
It does my old heart good to see our youth getting
along, despite the racial differences.
jpnChrName: ふふ、子供たちが人種の差を感じさせず 仲良くしている姿には、希望を感じますね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、子供たちが人種の差を感じさせず
仲良くしている姿には、希望を感じますね。

engChrName: It's children like these that will carry our future. I look forward to seeing them fully grown.
engSearchText:
It's children like these that will carry our future. I look
forward to seeing them fully grown.
jpnChrName: あの子たちが大きくなり、 活躍する時代が楽しみでなりませんよ。
jpnSearchText:
あの子たちが大きくなり、
活躍する時代が楽しみでなりませんよ。

engChrName: Our current society is regretfully plagued by racism. We live in an era where terrorism and anti-immigration sentiments are all too common.
engSearchText:
Our current society is regretfully plagued by racism.
We live in an era where terrorism and
anti-immigration sentiments are all too common.
jpnChrName: 今はまだ、反移民活動やテロといった 差別主義が根強く残っておりますが……
jpnSearchText:
今はまだ、反移民活動やテロといった
差別主義が根強く残っておりますが……

engChrName: My hope is for children such as these to bring forth a brighter future, free of such hate.
engSearchText:
My hope is for children such as these to bring forth a
brighter future, free of such hate.
jpnChrName: あの子たちのような子が大きくなり 活躍する時代が楽しみでなりませんよ。
jpnSearchText:
あの子たちのような子が大きくなり
活躍する時代が楽しみでなりませんよ。

engChrName: You can always count on Mother Kyra when you need to. Having her assistance has been quite the blessing.
engSearchText:
You can always count on Mother Kyra when you
need to. Having her assistance has been quite
the blessing.
jpnChrName: キーラ司祭はいつもテキパキしていて。 ふふ、私も助かっていますよ。
jpnSearchText:
キーラ司祭はいつもテキパキしていて。
ふふ、私も助かっていますよ。

engChrName: My work here is of great importance, though not so much that I must rush to tend to it.
engSearchText:
My work here is of great importance, though not so
much that I must rush to tend to it.
jpnChrName: さて……こちらの調べ物は、大切ではありますが 急ぎという訳ではありませんし。
jpnSearchText:
さて……こちらの調べ物は、大切ではありますが
急ぎという訳ではありませんし。

engChrName: Though I suppose now's as good a time as any to tend to the documents Mother Kyra prepared for me.
engSearchText:
Though I suppose now's as good a time as any to tend
to the documents Mother Kyra prepared for me.
jpnChrName: キーラ司祭が用意してくれた書類に 目を通すとしましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
キーラ司祭が用意してくれた書類に
目を通すとしましょうか。

engChrName: Oh, it's a pleasure seeing you today, Feri. What brings you by? I don't believe Sunday School's due today.
engSearchText:
Oh, it's a pleasure seeing you today, Feri.
What brings you by? I don't believe Sunday School's
due today.
jpnChrName: おや、フェリさんではありませんか。 今日は年長組の日曜学校はお休みですが……
jpnSearchText:
おや、フェリさんではありませんか。
今日は年長組の日曜学校はお休みですが……

engChrName: Are these fine folks the ones taking care of you during your stay in Edith?
engSearchText:
Are these fine folks the ones taking care of you
during your stay in Edith?
jpnChrName: そちらの方々がもしや 首都で世話になっているという……？
jpnSearchText:
そちらの方々がもしや
首都で世話になっているという……？

engChrName: Yup! They're taking me around 'cause I haven't had a chance to see the other districts!
engSearchText:
Yup! They're taking me around 'cause I haven't had a
chance to see the other districts!
jpnChrName: はい、今は首都を案内してもらっていました！ 他の街区にはあまり行っていなかったので……
jpnSearchText:
はい、今は首都を案内してもらっていました！
他の街区にはあまり行っていなかったので……

engChrName: I see! That sounds like a delightful time.
engSearchText: I see! That sounds like a delightful time.
jpnChrName: なるほど、そうでしたか。 それは楽しそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、そうでしたか。
それは楽しそうですね。

engChrName: I'm certain you'll come to find out how different things can be here from what you're used to back home.
engSearchText:
I'm certain you'll come to find out how different
things can be here from what you're used to
back home.
jpnChrName: フェリさんは中東でも山岳部の出身との事、 きっと多くの発見があるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
フェリさんは中東でも山岳部の出身との事、
きっと多くの発見があるでしょう。

engChrName: If you have any questions, I'd be more than happy to sit down with you to address them.
engSearchText:
If you have any questions, I'd be more than happy to
sit down with you to address them.
jpnChrName: よろしければまた今度 お話を聞かせてくださいね。
jpnSearchText:
よろしければまた今度
お話を聞かせてくださいね。

engChrName: Thank you, Father! I'll definitely take you up on that!
engSearchText: Thank you, Father! I'll definitely take you up on that!
jpnChrName: はい、またよろしく お願いします、教区長様！
jpnSearchText:
はい、またよろしく
お願いします、教区長様！

engChrName: The Kruga hail from the foothills of the Ishgal Mountains, right, Feri?
engSearchText:
The Kruga hail from the foothills of the Ishgal
Mountains, right, Feri?
jpnChrName: フェリさんはイシュガル山脈の麓に 住まう部族の出身だそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
フェリさんはイシュガル山脈の麓に
住まう部族の出身だそうですね。

engChrName: I'm not particularly familiar with that region myself, but I can still guarantee that Edith will prove to be a whole new experience.
engSearchText:
I'm not particularly familiar with that region myself,
but I can still guarantee that Edith will prove to be a
whole new experience.
jpnChrName: 私もあまり馴染みのない地域ですが── きっとこの首都では多くの発見があるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
私もあまり馴染みのない地域ですが──
きっとこの首都では多くの発見があるでしょう。

engChrName: If you have any questions, I'd be more than happy to sit down with you to address them.
engSearchText:
If you have any questions, I'd be more than happy to
sit down with you to address them.
jpnChrName: よろしければまた今度 お話を聞かせてくださいね。
jpnSearchText:
よろしければまた今度
お話を聞かせてくださいね。

engChrName: Are you here for the worship service? All are welcome to join.
engSearchText:
Are you here for the worship service? All are welcome
to join.
jpnChrName: おや、礼拝でしょうか？ どなたでも自由にご参加ください。
jpnSearchText:
おや、礼拝でしょうか？
どなたでも自由にご参加ください。

engChrName: Our temple here is dedicated to the Winged Goddess Arusha. Though modeled after those in the Central East, our beliefs align with the West's chapels.
engSearchText:
Our temple here is dedicated to the Winged Goddess
Arusha. Though modeled after those in the Central
East, our beliefs align with the West's chapels.
jpnChrName: こちらは中東式の寺院、《翼の女神（アル─シャ）》を 奉っておりますが、信仰に違いはありませんから。
jpnSearchText:
こちらは中東式の寺院、《翼の女神（アル─シャ）》を
奉っておりますが、信仰に違いはありませんから。

engChrName: The Winged Goddess worshiped in the Central East is the same as Aidios, then?
engSearchText:
The Winged Goddess worshiped in the Central East
is the same as Aidios, then?
jpnChrName: 《翼の女神（アル─シャ）》……中東では空の女神が 少し違った形で伝わっているんですよね。
jpnSearchText:
《翼の女神（アル─シャ）》……中東では空の女神が
少し違った形で伝わっているんですよね。

engChrName: That's a wonderful question. People and cultures vary immensely from the East and West, and everything in between, but she's different in name only.
engSearchText:
That's a wonderful question. People and cultures vary
immensely from the East and West, and everything
in between, but she's different in name only.
jpnChrName: ええ、西方とはやや違った文化や形式には なりますが、同じ女神であるとされていますね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、西方とはやや違った文化や形式には
なりますが、同じ女神であるとされていますね。

engChrName: You can even find a Central Eastern temple right alongside the Holy City of Arteria's grand cathedral.
engSearchText:
You can even find a Central Eastern temple right
alongside the Holy City of Arteria's grand cathedral.
jpnChrName: 七耀教会の総本山、アルテリア法国でも 大聖堂に並んで中東式の大寺院が存在するんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
七耀教会の総本山、アルテリア法国でも
大聖堂に並んで中東式の大寺院が存在するんですよ。

engChrName: I'd heard something about this before, but not from an actual temple. It's very different hearing about it from the source.
engSearchText:
I'd heard something about this before, but not from
an actual temple. It's very different hearing about it
from the source.
jpnChrName: 知識としては知ってはいましたが…… 実際に寺院の方から聞くと重みが違いますね。
jpnSearchText:
知識としては知ってはいましたが……
実際に寺院の方から聞くと重みが違いますね。

engChrName: Makes sense. Lotta people from the Central East call Calvard home. The Republic's a melting pot of cultures.
engSearchText:
Makes sense. Lotta people from the Central East call
Calvard home. The Republic's a melting pot
of cultures.
jpnChrName: ああ、それに共和国は多民族国家だ。 中東系の住民も決して少なくはないからな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、それに共和国は多民族国家だ。
中東系の住民も決して少なくはないからな。

engChrName: This place is always full on days of worship.
engSearchText: This place is always full on days of worship.
jpnChrName: この中東寺院もいつも賑わってるぜ？
jpnSearchText: この中東寺院もいつも賑わってるぜ？

engChrName: Haha, that it is. Exchange with the Central East has been on the rise in the past few years, after all.
engSearchText:
Haha, that it is. Exchange with the Central East has
been on the rise in the past few years, after all.
jpnChrName: はは、近年は中東諸国との交流も ますます盛んになっていますからね。
jpnSearchText:
はは、近年は中東諸国との交流も
ますます盛んになっていますからね。

engChrName: It might not be perfect yet. Cultural differences have, on occasion, led to tragedies.
engSearchText:
It might not be perfect yet. Cultural differences have,
on occasion, led to tragedies.
jpnChrName: 稀に文化的理解がすれ違い、 悲劇が起きる事もありますが──
jpnSearchText:
稀に文化的理解がすれ違い、
悲劇が起きる事もありますが──

engChrName: But we should still try and bridge the difference between us all. And, of course, you two are more than welcome to stop by anytime.
engSearchText:
But we should still try and bridge the difference
between us all. And, of course, you two are more than
welcome to stop by anytime.
jpnChrName: 我々は理解し合える隣人であるはず。 お二人も気軽に来ていただければ幸いですよ。
jpnSearchText:
我々は理解し合える隣人であるはず。
お二人も気軽に来ていただければ幸いですよ。

engChrName: Thank you so much. We'll definitely stop by again!
engSearchText: Thank you so much. We'll definitely stop by again!
jpnChrName: はい、お言葉に甘えて また伺わせていただきますね！
jpnSearchText:
はい、お言葉に甘えて
また伺わせていただきますね！

engChrName: Central Easterners are definitely still a minority in the Republic.
engSearchText:
Central Easterners are definitely still a minority in
the Republic.
jpnChrName: 共和国においては中東出身者は 少数派ではありますが……
jpnSearchText:
共和国においては中東出身者は
少数派ではありますが……

engChrName: But regardless of that, the Republic continues contact and exchange with the Central East. It's increased in the last few years, as a matter of fact.
engSearchText:
But regardless of that, the Republic continues contact
and exchange with the Central East. It's increased in
the last few years, as a matter of fact.
jpnChrName: 近年は中東諸国との交流も ますます盛んになっていますからね。
jpnSearchText:
近年は中東諸国との交流も
ますます盛んになっていますからね。

engChrName: We're at the cusp of something great, and cultural understanding between us all is nigh on paramount.
engSearchText:
We're at the cusp of something great, and cultural
understanding between us all is nigh on paramount.
jpnChrName: 相互の文化的理解が 一層求められていると言えるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
相互の文化的理解が
一層求められていると言えるでしょう。

engChrName: Please come pay us a visit whenever you'd like. We welcome you with open arms as friends and neighbors.
engSearchText:
Please come pay us a visit whenever you'd like.
We welcome you with open arms as friends
and neighbors.
jpnChrName: どうかいつでもお越しください。 良き隣人としてお話をいたしましょう。
jpnSearchText:
どうかいつでもお越しください。
良き隣人としてお話をいたしましょう。

engChrName: Lashkar finally fell asleep.
engSearchText: Lashkar finally fell asleep.
jpnChrName: ラシュカル君、ようやく寝ました。
jpnSearchText: ラシュカル君、ようやく寝ました。

engChrName: It was really sudden. The exhaustion might've finally caught up to him.
engSearchText:
It was really sudden. The exhaustion might've finally
caught up to him.
jpnChrName: 精神的にも酷く疲れていたみたいで 緊張の糸が切れるみたいに……
jpnSearchText:
精神的にも酷く疲れていたみたいで
緊張の糸が切れるみたいに……

engChrName: Though small, I'm grateful he's able to find some respite in sleep.
engSearchText:
Though small, I'm grateful he's able to find some
respite in sleep.
jpnChrName: そうですか……ひとまずは良かった。
jpnSearchText: そうですか……ひとまずは良かった。

engChrName: I'll provide him with some medication to help soothe him once he wakes up.
engSearchText:
I'll provide him with some medication to help soothe
him once he wakes up.
jpnChrName: 目が覚めたらもう一度、 心を落ち着ける薬を処方しましょう。
jpnSearchText:
目が覚めたらもう一度、
心を落ち着ける薬を処方しましょう。

engChrName: I just hope it can help, if even a little.
engSearchText: I just hope it can help, if even a little.
jpnChrName: それからしばらくは様子見でしょうが……
jpnSearchText: それからしばらくは様子見でしょうが……

engChrName: Likewise. I'll be there for him however I can from here on.
engSearchText:
Likewise. I'll be there for him however I can from
here on.
jpnChrName: はい、私があの子の傍におります。
jpnSearchText: はい、私があの子の傍におります。

engChrName: Things will eventually start looking up. At least he's not alone, and will still have Kaina with him.
engSearchText:
Things will eventually start looking up. At least he's
not alone, and will still have Kaina with him.
jpnChrName: カイナさんも気遣ってくれていますし きっと大丈夫です……！
jpnSearchText:
カイナさんも気遣ってくれていますし
きっと大丈夫です……！

engChrName: I've finished organizing the documents listing our parishioners and messages from the grand cathedral.
engSearchText:
I've finished organizing the documents listing our
parishioners and messages from the grand cathedral.
jpnChrName: 教区長、ミサ参加者の名簿と大聖堂との 連絡書類、一通り仕分け終わりましたよ！
jpnSearchText:
教区長、ミサ参加者の名簿と大聖堂との
連絡書類、一通り仕分け終わりましたよ！

engChrName: All that's left is your seal and signature, Father!
engSearchText: All that's left is your seal and signature, Father!
jpnChrName: あとは教区長の署名だけです！
jpnSearchText: あとは教区長の署名だけです！

engChrName: You're early as ever, Mother Kyra! I...suppose I don't mind pausing my research for a moment.
engSearchText:
You're early as ever, Mother Kyra! I...suppose I don't
mind pausing my research for a moment.
jpnChrName: ああ、相変わらず早いねキーラ司祭は。 では調べ物を一旦やめて目を通しておこうか……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、相変わらず早いねキーラ司祭は。
では調べ物を一旦やめて目を通しておこうか……

engChrName: Are you certain your research cannot wait?
engSearchText: Are you certain your research cannot wait?
jpnChrName: それ、今やる必要あるんですか？
jpnSearchText: それ、今やる必要あるんですか？

engChrName: Well, it's relatively urgent, I suppose. You should know, after all, since you originally—
engSearchText:
Well, it's relatively urgent, I suppose. You should
know, after all, since you originally—
jpnChrName: まあ、大切といえば大切だね。 なにせほら、君だって元々は……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、大切といえば大切だね。
なにせほら、君だって元々は……

engChrName: Y-Yes, Father, I get it. Please just sign those documents as soon as you're able!
engSearchText:
Y-Yes, Father, I get it. Please just sign those
documents as soon as you're able!
jpnChrName: わ、私の事は良いですから、 早いところ署名をお願いします！
jpnSearchText:
わ、私の事は良いですから、
早いところ署名をお願いします！

engChrName: Especially those missives from the grand cathedral. They'll be expecting a reply sent back as soon as possible!
engSearchText:
Especially those missives from the grand cathedral.
They'll be expecting a reply sent back as soon
as possible!
jpnChrName: 特に大聖堂の方は、なるべく早めに 提出して欲しいって事ですし！
jpnSearchText:
特に大聖堂の方は、なるべく早めに
提出して欲しいって事ですし！

engChrName: I must thank you for your assistance.
engSearchText: I must thank you for your assistance.
jpnChrName: 皆さん……助けてくれて 本当にありがとう……
jpnSearchText:
皆さん……助けてくれて
本当にありがとう……

engChrName: The neighborhood has thankfully been evacuated, but tensions still run high. Everyone fears these monsters may attack again.
engSearchText:
The neighborhood has thankfully been evacuated, but
tensions still run high. Everyone fears these monsters
may attack again.
jpnChrName: 近隣の住民も避難してきているけれど いつ化物が襲ってくるかと皆怯えてて……
jpnSearchText:
近隣の住民も避難してきているけれど
いつ化物が襲ってくるかと皆怯えてて……

engChrName: I'll be praying with everyone for a reprieve from this madness.
engSearchText:
I'll be praying with everyone for a reprieve from
this madness.
jpnChrName: 私は少しでも落ち着けるよう 皆さんと祈りを捧げるつもりです。
jpnSearchText:
私は少しでも落ち着けるよう
皆さんと祈りを捧げるつもりです。

engChrName: I'll pray that fortune favors you as well! May the Winged Goddess guide your way.
engSearchText:
I'll pray that fortune favors you as well! May the
Winged Goddess guide your way.
jpnChrName: そちらもどうかご武運を！ 必ずや翼の女神が導いてくださるわ……！
jpnSearchText:
そちらもどうかご武運を！
