必ずや翼の女神が導いてくださるわ……！

engChrName: Welcome to our temple! Blessed are we to share this day together.
engSearchText:
Welcome to our temple! Blessed are we to share this
day together.
jpnChrName: 七耀寺院へようこそ！ 共にこの日を迎えられて良かったわ。
jpnSearchText:
七耀寺院へようこそ！
共にこの日を迎えられて良かったわ。

engChrName: It's been a hard year, and not every bump in the road has come to a conclusion yet.
engSearchText:
It's been a hard year, and not every bump in the road
has come to a conclusion yet.
jpnChrName: 今年は本当に色んな事があったし まだ解決したわけでもないけど……
jpnSearchText:
今年は本当に色んな事があったし
まだ解決したわけでもないけど……

engChrName: But I still wish for us to celebrate today.
engSearchText: But I still wish for us to celebrate today.
jpnChrName: それでもこの日を迎えられた事、 今は精一杯祝いたいわね。
jpnSearchText:
それでもこの日を迎えられた事、
今は精一杯祝いたいわね。

engChrName: I'm certain Lashkar will be back to his old self soon!
engSearchText: I'm certain Lashkar will be back to his old self soon!
jpnChrName: ……ええ、きっとラシュカル君も 立ち直ってくれるはずよ！
jpnSearchText:
……ええ、きっとラシュカル君も
立ち直ってくれるはずよ！

engChrName: If you're looking for Lashkar, Kaina took him out to enjoy the festivities.
engSearchText:
If you're looking for Lashkar, Kaina took him out to
enjoy the festivities.
jpnChrName: ラシュカル君なら、今朝から カイナさんが記念祭に連れて行っててね。
jpnSearchText:
ラシュカル君なら、今朝から
カイナさんが記念祭に連れて行っててね。

engChrName: He's been in shock for a while now. My hope is maybe the festival will be able to lift his spirits, if ever so slightly.
engSearchText:
He's been in shock for a while now. My hope is
maybe the festival will be able to lift his spirits, if ever
so slightly.
jpnChrName: ショックだったのは分かるけど…… 少しでも立ち直るきっかけになればいいわね……
jpnSearchText:
ショックだったのは分かるけど……
少しでも立ち直るきっかけになればいいわね……

engChrName: Lashkar's asleep in the dormitory thanks to the medicine Father Mansur gave him.
engSearchText:
Lashkar's asleep in the dormitory thanks to the
medicine Father Mansur gave him.
jpnChrName: ラシュカル君は、宿舎の方で寝ているわ…… 教区長様の薬のお陰でね。
jpnSearchText:
ラシュカル君は、宿舎の方で寝ているわ……
教区長様の薬のお陰でね。

engChrName: Don't worry about him. I'll be sure to look after him.
engSearchText: Don't worry about him. I'll be sure to look after him.
jpnChrName: 大丈夫、私があの子の傍にいるから。
jpnSearchText: 大丈夫、私があの子の傍にいるから。

engChrName: Both Kaina and the guild will be looking after him as well.
engSearchText:
Both Kaina and the guild will be looking after him
as well.
jpnChrName: ギルドの人や、同郷のカイナさんも 気にかけてくれているし……
jpnSearchText:
ギルドの人や、同郷のカイナさんも
気にかけてくれているし……

engChrName: I truly believe that Lashkar will one day be able to move on from this tragedy.
engSearchText:
I truly believe that Lashkar will one day be able to
move on from this tragedy.
jpnChrName: いつかきっと立ち直ってくれる……！ 私はそう信じているわ。
jpnSearchText:
いつかきっと立ち直ってくれる……！
私はそう信じているわ。

engChrName: We're keeping Lashkar here at the temple for the time being.
engSearchText:
We're keeping Lashkar here at the temple for the
time being.
jpnChrName: ……ラシュカル君のことは しばらく寺院で預かっているのだけど……
jpnSearchText:
……ラシュカル君のことは
しばらく寺院で預かっているのだけど……

engChrName: I worry most about his mental health, considering everything that's happened, but all we can do for now is look after him.
engSearchText:
I worry most about his mental health, considering
everything that's happened, but all we can do for now
is look after him.
jpnChrName: この調子だと心配ね…… 今は見守るしかないけど……
jpnSearchText:
この調子だと心配ね……
今は見守るしかないけど……

engChrName: I'm sure Sister Belicia would hate to see him this way, too... I'll do everything in my power to help him, in her memory.
engSearchText:
I'm sure Sister Belicia would hate to see him this
way, too... I'll do everything in my power to help him,
in her memory.
jpnChrName: ベルシアも……きっと無念だったはず。 あの子のためにも、私がラシュカル君を……！
jpnSearchText:
ベルシアも……きっと無念だったはず。
あの子のためにも、私がラシュカル君を……！

engChrName: Heehee, having a kid like Rooney around keeps things lively for all of us.
engSearchText:
Heehee, having a kid like Rooney around keeps
things lively for all of us.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、ルーニー君みたいな子がいると こっちまで熱くなっちゃうわね……
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、ルーニー君みたいな子がいると
こっちまで熱くなっちゃうわね……

engChrName: Speaking of lively, Lashkar came by again with a girl from the village workshop.
engSearchText:
Speaking of lively, Lashkar came by again with a girl
from the village workshop.
jpnChrName: そういえば、夕方にラシュカル君がまた来てね、 村の工房に勤めてるって女の子と一緒に。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、夕方にラシュカル君がまた来てね、
村の工房に勤めてるって女の子と一緒に。

engChrName: They'll be staying at the Bracer Guild for the next couple of days, actually. You should pay them a visit.
engSearchText:
They'll be staying at the Bracer Guild for the next
couple of days, actually. You should pay them a visit.
jpnChrName: 何でも、数日間遊撃士協会で色々体験させて もらうそうよ、何なら会いに行ってあげたら？
jpnSearchText:
何でも、数日間遊撃士協会で色々体験させて
もらうそうよ、何なら会いに行ってあげたら？

engChrName: Well, then. I'd better start preparing for today's lesson...
engSearchText:
Well, then. I'd better start preparing for
today's lesson...
jpnChrName: さてと、今日の授業の準備はと……
jpnSearchText: さてと、今日の授業の準備はと……

engChrName: I'm so glad to see Sister Belicia is doing well!
engSearchText: I'm so glad to see Sister Belicia is doing well!
jpnChrName: シスター・ベルシアが元気そうで 本当に良かったわ！
jpnSearchText:
シスター・ベルシアが元気そうで
本当に良かったわ！

engChrName: Even though we're both of Central Eastern heritage, we were raised in different countries and cultures.
engSearchText:
Even though we're both of Central Eastern heritage,
we were raised in different countries and cultures.
jpnChrName: 同じ中東系とはいっても 生まれた国も文化も全然違うけど……
jpnSearchText:
同じ中東系とはいっても
生まれた国も文化も全然違うけど……

engChrName: That, thankfully, has never come between us. I feel like we truly understand each other.
engSearchText:
That, thankfully, has never come between us. I feel
like we truly understand each other.
jpnChrName: あの子とはなんだか 通じ合うものがあるのよね。
jpnSearchText:
あの子とはなんだか
通じ合うものがあるのよね。

engChrName: I wish her the best in tending to her duties in Creil!
engSearchText: I wish her the best in tending to her duties in Creil!
jpnChrName: ふふっ、クレイユ村でも立派に 勤めを果たしてほしいものだわ！
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、クレイユ村でも立派に
勤めを果たしてほしいものだわ！

engChrName: Belicia really loves her hometown. She felt called to serve in Creil despite being approached by many other temples.
engSearchText:
Belicia really loves her hometown. She felt called to
serve in Creil despite being approached by many
other temples.
jpnChrName: ベルシア、本当に生まれた村が好きなのねぇ。 あれだけ各地の寺院から打診もあったってのに。
jpnSearchText:
ベルシア、本当に生まれた村が好きなのねぇ。
あれだけ各地の寺院から打診もあったってのに。

engChrName: Maybe it would have been too much to ask for her to leave all she's ever known to attend to a temple in the Central East.
engSearchText:
Maybe it would have been too much to ask for her to
leave all she's ever known to attend to a temple in the
Central East.
jpnChrName: まあ、それだけ馴染んでるっていうなら、むしろ無理に 中東式を勧める方が酷だったのかもしれないわねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、それだけ馴染んでるっていうなら、むしろ無理に
中東式を勧める方が酷だったのかもしれないわねぇ……

engChrName: I'm just thankful that the Sunday School children and Belicia's brother are happy and healthy.
engSearchText:
I'm just thankful that the Sunday School children and
Belicia's brother are happy and healthy.
jpnChrName: それにしても日曜学校の子も、ベルシアの弟も…… この寺院に縁のある子どもは皆元気で良いわよね。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても日曜学校の子も、ベルシアの弟も……
この寺院に縁のある子どもは皆元気で良いわよね。

engChrName: Oh, what am I saying? Of course they should be! Children being happy and healthy is the bare minimum!
engSearchText:
Oh, what am I saying? Of course they should be!
Children being happy and healthy is the
bare minimum!
jpnChrName: 私が言うのも何だけど…… やっぱり子供は元気でいなくっちゃ！
jpnSearchText:
私が言うのも何だけど……
やっぱり子供は元気でいなくっちゃ！

engChrName: Even if I can't directly impact their health and happiness...
engSearchText:
Even if I can't directly impact their health
and happiness...
jpnChrName: ……私にはそういう事ができなかったから……
jpnSearchText: ……私にはそういう事ができなかったから……

engChrName: ...I can still hope they'll be able to lead great lives of their own!
engSearchText:
...I can still hope they'll be able to lead great lives of
their own!
jpnChrName: せめてあの子達には、毎日を楽しく 生きていってほしいのよね……！
jpnSearchText:
せめてあの子達には、毎日を楽しく
生きていってほしいのよね……！

engChrName: I've been friends with Sister Belicia for a while now, but I hadn't had the pleasure of meeting her brother. He just stopped by to introduce himself.
engSearchText:
I've been friends with Sister Belicia for a while now,
but I hadn't had the pleasure of meeting her brother.
He just stopped by to introduce himself.
jpnChrName: さっき、後輩──シスター・ベルシアの 弟君が挨拶に来てくれてね。
jpnSearchText:
さっき、後輩──シスター・ベルシアの
弟君が挨拶に来てくれてね。

engChrName: He was such an energetic boy! And the girl he was with was so adorable.
engSearchText:
He was such an energetic boy! And the girl he was
with was so adorable.
jpnChrName: いやあ、あんなに元気な子だったとはね！ おまけに女の子も連れてたし！
jpnSearchText:
いやあ、あんなに元気な子だったとはね！
おまけに女の子も連れてたし！

engChrName: Heehee, maybe I shouldn't say this out loud, but I'm totally rooting for them and that cute and innocent relationship they have!
engSearchText:
Heehee, maybe I shouldn't say this out loud, but I'm
totally rooting for them and that cute and innocent
relationship they have!
jpnChrName: ふふ、司祭の身で言うのもなんだけど、 初々しくて後押ししたくなっちゃうわね～！
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、司祭の身で言うのもなんだけど、
初々しくて後押ししたくなっちゃうわね～！

engChrName: Since they'll be sticking around Riverside to sightsee, I'll be a good sister and keep an eye on them. From a distance, of course!
engSearchText:
Since they'll be sticking around Riverside to sightsee,
I'll be a good sister and keep an eye on them. From a
distance, of course!
jpnChrName: 二人はまだリバーサイドを回ってるみたいね。 ここは司祭らしく、一歩引いて見守らせてもらうわ！
jpnSearchText:
二人はまだリバーサイドを回ってるみたいね。
ここは司祭らしく、一歩引いて見守らせてもらうわ！

engChrName: Though seeing them both sure has made me miss Belicia even more.
engSearchText:
Though seeing them both sure has made me miss
Belicia even more.
jpnChrName: それにしても……あの子たちを見てたら、 一層ベルシアに会いたくなってきたわ。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても……あの子たちを見てたら、
一層ベルシアに会いたくなってきたわ。

engChrName: Father Mansur is such a wonderful man. He's taught me so much.
engSearchText:
Father Mansur is such a wonderful man. He's taught
me so much.
jpnChrName: マンスール教区長、とても良い方だし、 私も学ばせてもらっているけれど……
jpnSearchText:
マンスール教区長、とても良い方だし、
私も学ばせてもらっているけれど……

engChrName: Whenever I assist him with his tasks, though, I can't tell if he's being overly discreet or just careless.
engSearchText:
Whenever I assist him with his tasks, though, I can't
tell if he's being overly discreet or just careless.
jpnChrName: いざ補佐してみると、けっこう慎重派というか のんびりしているところも多いのよね。
jpnSearchText:
いざ補佐してみると、けっこう慎重派というか
のんびりしているところも多いのよね。

engChrName: Or maybe he's just overwhelmed from doing too much!
engSearchText:
Or maybe he's just overwhelmed from doing
too much!
jpnChrName: まあ、私がどんどん早く進めていきたい だけなのかもしれないけど！
jpnSearchText:
まあ、私がどんどん早く進めていきたい
だけなのかもしれないけど！

engChrName: Hello, Feri! It's nice to see you, but Sunday School's not in session today.
engSearchText:
Hello, Feri! It's nice to see you, but Sunday School's
not in session today.
jpnChrName: あらフェリ、日曜学校は休みなのに 来てくれたのね！
jpnSearchText:
あらフェリ、日曜学校は休みなのに
来てくれたのね！

engChrName: Is something the matter? Are you in some sort of trouble?
engSearchText:
Is something the matter? Are you in some sort
of trouble?
jpnChrName: どうしたの、何か困り事でもあるのかしら？
jpnSearchText: どうしたの、何か困り事でもあるのかしら？

engChrName: Nope! I'm on the job today! They're showing me around today, so I thought I'd pop in and say hello!
engSearchText:
Nope! I'm on the job today! They're showing me
around today, so I thought I'd pop in and say hello!
jpnChrName: いえ、今日はお仕事をしつつ案内して もらっていまして、ついでに挨拶に来ました！
jpnSearchText:
いえ、今日はお仕事をしつつ案内して
もらっていまして、ついでに挨拶に来ました！

engChrName: Was a mighty shame that she'd only seen Riverside, so we're takin' her on a tour 'round Edith.
engSearchText:
Was a mighty shame that she'd only seen Riverside,
so we're takin' her on a tour 'round Edith.
jpnChrName: リバーサイドくらいしか知らねぇらしいしな。 折角だし首都を回ってる所だ。
jpnSearchText:
リバーサイドくらいしか知らねぇらしいしな。
折角だし首都を回ってる所だ。

engChrName: My! I half expected dear Feri here to already have run a few laps around Edith!
engSearchText:
My! I half expected dear Feri here to already have run
a few laps around Edith!
jpnChrName: えーっ、フェリってば意外ね、元気な子だし もっとあちこち行ってるかと思ってたわ！
jpnSearchText:
えーっ、フェリってば意外ね、元気な子だし
もっとあちこち行ってるかと思ってたわ！

engChrName: But I hope you enjoy your tour of the capital, dear. It's a wonderful place, so you should take in the sights.
engSearchText:
But I hope you enjoy your tour of the capital, dear.
It's a wonderful place, so you should take in
the sights.
jpnChrName: 首都は色々と面白いモノがあるのよ、 もっと楽しまなくっちゃ！
jpnSearchText:
首都は色々と面白いモノがあるのよ、
もっと楽しまなくっちゃ！

engChrName: I will! Everything is so cool! I don't wanna miss out on anything!
engSearchText:
I will! Everything is so cool! I don't wanna miss out
on anything!
jpnChrName: そ、そうですね……！ この機会ですし、色々見て経験しないとですね！
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうですね……！
この機会ですし、色々見て経験しないとですね！

engChrName: By the way, Feri, I hear you met a Central Eastern sister of the cloth in Creil Village.
engSearchText:
By the way, Feri, I hear you met a Central Eastern
sister of the cloth in Creil Village.
jpnChrName: そういえばこの前フェリから、クレイユ村で 中東系のシスターに会ったって聞いたわね。
jpnSearchText:
そういえばこの前フェリから、クレイユ村で
中東系のシスターに会ったって聞いたわね。

engChrName: If it is who I think it is, you might've just met one of my friends! She'd mentioned wanting to work at the chapel in her hometown.
engSearchText:
If it is who I think it is, you might've just met one of
my friends! She'd mentioned wanting to work at the
chapel in her hometown.
jpnChrName: その子ね、多分私の修行時代の後輩ね！ 地元の西方式礼拝堂で働きたいって言ってて……
jpnSearchText:
その子ね、多分私の修行時代の後輩ね！
地元の西方式礼拝堂で働きたいって言ってて……

engChrName: I hear she's doing well for herself of late. Oh, how I hope we can meet sometime soon.
engSearchText:
I hear she's doing well for herself of late. Oh, how I
hope we can meet sometime soon.
jpnChrName: 聞く限り元気そうでよかった…… また会いたいものね。
jpnSearchText:
聞く限り元気そうでよかった……
また会いたいものね。

engChrName: We have a lot of catching up to do after all these years!
engSearchText:
We have a lot of catching up to do after all
these years!
jpnChrName: 久しぶりに話したい事も 沢山あるしね！
jpnSearchText:
久しぶりに話したい事も
沢山あるしね！

engChrName: Our newest kid's been fitting in just fine. That's such a relief... I suppose now I can focus on my other duties.
engSearchText:
Our newest kid's been fitting in just fine. That's such
a relief... I suppose now I can focus on my
other duties.
jpnChrName: さーて、新しい子も問題無く馴染めそうだったし、 私も他の仕事も張り切っていかなくちゃ！
jpnSearchText:
さーて、新しい子も問題無く馴染めそうだったし、
私も他の仕事も張り切っていかなくちゃ！

engChrName: Even though Father Mansur looks so well put, he's more forgetful than he seems. I have to stay on top of things like announcements and such.
engSearchText:
Even though Father Mansur looks so well put, he's
more forgetful than he seems. I have to stay on top of
things like announcements and such.
jpnChrName: マンスール教区長もああ見えて、ちょくちょく祭事の 告知とか忘れるしね、私もしっかりしないと！
jpnSearchText:
マンスール教区長もああ見えて、ちょくちょく祭事の
告知とか忘れるしね、私もしっかりしないと！

engChrName: We haven't seen each other in a while, but I'm sure she must be holding up well in the countryside.
engSearchText:
We haven't seen each other in a while, but I'm sure
she must be holding up well in the countryside.
jpnChrName: しばらく会ってないけど、後輩のあの子も…… あんな田舎で頑張ってるはずだしね！
jpnSearchText:
しばらく会ってないけど、後輩のあの子も……
あんな田舎で頑張ってるはずだしね！

engChrName: I believe she said she'd ended up in a chapel in her home village, no less.
engSearchText:
I believe she said she'd ended up in a chapel in her
home village, no less.
jpnChrName: 確か西方式の礼拝堂に行ったんだっけ。 生まれ故郷の村なんだって言ってたわね！
jpnSearchText:
確か西方式の礼拝堂に行ったんだっけ。
生まれ故郷の村なんだって言ってたわね！

engChrName: She did that, even despite her Central Eastern heritage.
engSearchText:
She did that, even despite her Central
Eastern heritage.
jpnChrName: 法国時代の後輩の子、中東系なのに 西方式の礼拝堂に行っちゃってね。
jpnSearchText:
法国時代の後輩の子、中東系なのに
西方式の礼拝堂に行っちゃってね。

engChrName: It really shows her dedication to her hometown, that she'd be willing to work in a western chapel.
engSearchText:
It really shows her dedication to her hometown, that
she'd be willing to work in a western chapel.
jpnChrName: 何でも生まれ故郷のために働きたいんだって。
jpnSearchText: 何でも生まれ故郷のために働きたいんだって。

engChrName: Can't guarantee she feels about it the same as I do, to be fair, but it doesn't matter. As long as she's happy, I'm happy.
engSearchText:
Can't guarantee she feels about it the same as I do, to
be fair, but it doesn't matter. As long as she's happy,
I'm happy.
jpnChrName: 私みたいな移民とも違う感覚があるのかしらね…… 何にせよ、自分で選んだ道は大切にして欲しいわ。
jpnSearchText:
私みたいな移民とも違う感覚があるのかしらね……
何にせよ、自分で選んだ道は大切にして欲しいわ。

engChrName: Heehee, I'm pleased to see Lolo's fitting right in with everyone.
engSearchText:
Heehee, I'm pleased to see Lolo's fitting right in
with everyone.
jpnChrName: ふふ、新しく入ってきたロロ君も 元気が良さそうな子で何より何より。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、新しく入ってきたロロ君も
元気が良さそうな子で何より何より。

engChrName: These three are about to become a real handful! But lively children are nothing to balk at.
engSearchText:
These three are about to become a real handful!
But lively children are nothing to balk at.
jpnChrName: 私も改めて、この子らに 全力で向き合って行かなくっちゃ！
jpnSearchText:
私も改めて、この子らに
全力で向き合って行かなくっちゃ！

engChrName: Oww... Ugh, it hurts... Oww!
engSearchText: Oww... Ugh, it hurts... Oww!
jpnChrName: ぐ……ぐあぁ……痛い……！
jpnSearchText: ぐ……ぐあぁ……痛い……！

engChrName: But... But I bet it hurt even more...when Annie and the others...
engSearchText:
But... But I bet it hurt even more...when Annie and
the others...
jpnChrName: でも……アニーたちの苦しみは こんなんじゃ……！
jpnSearchText:
でも……アニーたちの苦しみは
こんなんじゃ……！

engChrName: Wh-What happened?
engSearchText: Wh-What happened?
jpnChrName: えっと、一体何が！？
jpnSearchText: えっと、一体何が！？

engChrName: Oh, it's you guys... Don't worry about it. Damn it...
engSearchText: Oh, it's you guys... Don't worry about it. Damn it...
jpnChrName: ……あんたら……か、関係ねぇだろ。 畜生……あいつらめ……
jpnSearchText:
……あんたら……か、関係ねぇだろ。
畜生……あいつらめ……

engChrName: But you're hurt.
engSearchText: But you're hurt.
jpnChrName: 見たところ怪我をしている みたいですが……
jpnSearchText:
見たところ怪我をしている
みたいですが……

engChrName: He is. After what happened...then hearing about the events in Oración, Lashkar hasn't...been himself lately.
engSearchText:
He is. After what happened...then hearing about
the events in Oración, Lashkar hasn't...been
himself lately.
jpnChrName: ええ……この子ったら、あれ以来…… オラシオンの一件からずっと荒んでてね……
jpnSearchText:
ええ……この子ったら、あれ以来……
オラシオンの一件からずっと荒んでてね……

engChrName: I believe he picked a fight with some miscreants in town today.
engSearchText:
I believe he picked a fight with some miscreants in
town today.
jpnChrName: 今日も、街で不良相手に 喧嘩を仕掛けたみたいで……
jpnSearchText:
今日も、街で不良相手に
喧嘩を仕掛けたみたいで……

engChrName: A kid like him shouldn't write checks his skinny wrists can't cash.
engSearchText:
A kid like him shouldn't write checks his skinny
wrists can't cash.
jpnChrName: ハッ、ガキが敵うワケねーだろうによ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、ガキが敵うワケねーだろうによ。

engChrName: You ain't exactly picky with targets when you just gotta lash out. Anyone will do, especially when Almata's outta the picture now.
engSearchText:
You ain't exactly picky with targets when you just
gotta lash out. Anyone will do, especially when
Almata's outta the picture now.
jpnChrName: ……仕方ねぇさ……こいつが一番復讐したかった アルマータすらもういねぇからな……
jpnSearchText:
……仕方ねぇさ……こいつが一番復讐したかった
アルマータすらもういねぇからな……

engChrName: Probably bit off more than he could chew with some punk that looked like he'd fit right in with Almata.
engSearchText:
Probably bit off more than he could chew with some
punk that looked like he'd fit right in with Almata.
jpnChrName: 自暴自棄になって、アルマータに近そうな 半グレに当たった……そんなところか。
jpnSearchText:
自暴自棄になって、アルマータに近そうな
半グレに当たった……そんなところか。

engChrName: Yeah, so what?! What do you care, anyway?! Everyone's gone already! Even the bad guys, and I couldn't do anything!
engSearchText:
Yeah, so what?! What do you care, anyway?!
Everyone's gone already! Even the bad guys, and I
couldn't do anything!
jpnChrName: ……ああそうだよ、悪いかよ！　オレは誰も 守れなくて、悪党はいなくなっちまって……！
jpnSearchText:
……ああそうだよ、悪いかよ！　オレは誰も
守れなくて、悪党はいなくなっちまって……！

engChrName: Here I was, thinking I could become a bracer... Hah, turns out I'm just useless! Worthless, damn it!
engSearchText:
Here I was, thinking I could become a bracer...
Hah, turns out I'm just useless! Worthless, damn it!
jpnChrName: くそ、遊撃士になりたいだなんて言ってた癖に…… オレは何にもできねえじゃねえかよぉぉっ……！！
jpnSearchText:
くそ、遊撃士になりたいだなんて言ってた癖に……
オレは何にもできねえじゃねえかよぉぉっ……！！

engChrName: (So that's what this is all about...)
engSearchText: (So that's what this is all about...)
jpnChrName: （そういう事、だったんですね……）
jpnSearchText: （そういう事、だったんですね……）

engChrName: (I don't think this is something he can punch his way out of, but is there anything else he can really do?)
engSearchText:
(I don't think this is something he can punch his way
out of, but is there anything else he can really do?)
jpnChrName: （当たって解決する話でもありませんが、   きっと彼にはそうするしか……）
jpnSearchText:
（当たって解決する話でもありませんが、
きっと彼にはそうするしか……）

engChrName: (If there is, we ain't gonna be the ones findin' the answer to that for him. Best we leave him be.)
engSearchText:
(If there is, we ain't gonna be the ones findin' the
answer to that for him. Best we leave him be.)
jpnChrName: （……俺たちが首を突っ込める話でもねえ。   今はそっとしておくしかねえな。）
jpnSearchText:
（……俺たちが首を突っ込める話でもねえ。
今はそっとしておくしかねえな。）

engChrName: This can't be happening... The village... Everyone... Belicia, Annie. All of them...gone.
engSearchText:
This can't be happening... The village... Everyone...
Belicia, Annie. All of them...gone.
jpnChrName: …………うそだ……村が、みんなが…… 姉ちゃんが……アニーが…………
jpnSearchText:
…………うそだ……村が、みんなが……
姉ちゃんが……アニーが…………

engChrName: L-Lashkar?! Oh, thank goodness you're all right!
engSearchText: L-Lashkar?! Oh, thank goodness you're all right!
jpnChrName: その子は……ラシュカル君！？ 良かった、無事だったんですね……！
jpnSearchText:
その子は……ラシュカル君！？
良かった、無事だったんですね……！

engChrName: You been here all along? Guess you dodged a pretty hefty bullet there...
engSearchText:
You been here all along? Guess you dodged a pretty
hefty bullet there...
jpnChrName: 首都に来ていて難を逃れたってワケか…… だが、他の連中はやはり……
jpnSearchText:
首都に来ていて難を逃れたってワケか……
だが、他の連中はやはり……

engChrName: That's right, I remember seeing him in Creil Village!
engSearchText: That's right, I remember seeing him in Creil Village!
jpnChrName: その子は、確かクレイユ村で見かけた……！
jpnSearchText: その子は、確かクレイユ村で見かけた……！

engChrName: Anyone else make it out?
engSearchText: Anyone else make it out?
jpnChrName: 難を逃れられたやつがいたのか……！
jpnSearchText: 難を逃れられたやつがいたのか……！

engChrName: Oh, it's you guys. Yes. Lashkar and Kaina both were in Edith at the time.
engSearchText:
Oh, it's you guys. Yes. Lashkar and Kaina both were in
Edith at the time.
jpnChrName: あ、あなた達……そう、この子と首都に 一緒に来ていたカイナさんだけが何とか……
jpnSearchText:
あ、あなた達……そう、この子と首都に
一緒に来ていたカイナさんだけが何とか……

engChrName: But Belicia and everyone else... We don't know if they made it. *sniffle*
engSearchText:
But Belicia and everyone else... We don't know if they
made it. *sniffle*
jpnChrName: 他の人は……ベルシアは……皆…… ぐすっ、私もどう声を掛けたらいいか……！
jpnSearchText:
他の人は……ベルシアは……皆……
ぐすっ、私もどう声を掛けたらいいか……！

engChrName: Ah, my apologies. I must keep it together. I need to be there for Lashkar. I owe that much to everyone that was lost...
engSearchText:
Ah, my apologies. I must keep it together. I need to
be there for Lashkar. I owe that much to everyone that
was lost...
jpnChrName: でも司祭として……ベルシアの先輩として、 ……この子を支えていかないと……！
jpnSearchText:
でも司祭として……ベルシアの先輩として、
……この子を支えていかないと……！

engChrName: (Almata's gone too far...)
engSearchText: (Almata's gone too far...)
jpnChrName: （……アルマータ………   本当になんて連中よ……！）
jpnSearchText:
（……アルマータ………
本当になんて連中よ……！）

engChrName: We'll do somethin' about all this.
engSearchText: We'll do somethin' about all this.
jpnChrName: ……俺達は俺達のやり方で この状況に対処するつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
……俺達は俺達のやり方で
この状況に対処するつもりだ。

engChrName: You and Father Mansur take care of him in the meantime.
engSearchText:
You and Father Mansur take care of him in
the meantime.
jpnChrName: 司祭さん、その子の事は…… あんたと教区長を信じて任せるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
司祭さん、その子の事は……
あんたと教区長を信じて任せるぜ。

engChrName: If you need anything, feel free to get in touch. And I really do mean anything.
engSearchText:
If you need anything, feel free to get in touch. And I
really do mean anything.
jpnChrName: だが……何かあったら連絡してくれ、 これでも“解決屋”なんでな。
jpnSearchText:
だが……何かあったら連絡してくれ、
これでも“解決屋”なんでな。

engChrName: Thank you, Van. I'll keep that in mind. For now...all I can do is pray the souls lost in Creil can find peace. And look after Lashkar, of course.
engSearchText:
Thank you, Van. I'll keep that in mind. For now...all
I can do is pray the souls lost in Creil can find peace.
And look after Lashkar, of course.
jpnChrName: わかったわ……とにかく、今は村人たちの 安息を祈りつつ、この子を責任を持って守るから。
jpnSearchText:
わかったわ……とにかく、今は村人たちの
安息を祈りつつ、この子を責任を持って守るから。

engChrName: May Arusha light your path.
engSearchText: May Arusha light your path.
jpnChrName: あなた達も……解決屋さんたちにも、 どうか翼の女神のご加護を……！
jpnSearchText:
あなた達も……解決屋さんたちにも、
どうか翼の女神のご加護を……！

engChrName: Belicia, it's been forever! We haven't had a chance to sit down and talk since we were still studying in Arteria.
engSearchText:
Belicia, it's been forever! We haven't had a chance to
sit down and talk since we were still studying
in Arteria.
jpnChrName: ベルシア、本当に久しぶりね！ 法国で修行してた頃以来になるかしら……
jpnSearchText:
ベルシア、本当に久しぶりね！
法国で修行してた頃以来になるかしら……

engChrName: Your brother mentioned that you've been doing wonderfully in Creil.
engSearchText:
Your brother mentioned that you've been doing
wonderfully in Creil.
jpnChrName: 弟君からも聞いたわよ、元気に 村の人たちと仲良くやれているってさ！
jpnSearchText:
弟君からも聞いたわよ、元気に
村の人たちと仲良くやれているってさ！

engChrName: Heehee, of course I would be! I grew up there, after all.
engSearchText:
Heehee, of course I would be! I grew up there,
after all.
jpnChrName: ふふ、生まれ育った村ですし、 当然と言えば当然ですが……
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、生まれ育った村ですし、
当然と言えば当然ですが……

engChrName: I do wish I could use more of your teachings there, though. It's so different from a Central Eastern temple.
engSearchText:
I do wish I could use more of your teachings
there, though. It's so different from a Central
Eastern temple.
jpnChrName: でも、キーラ先輩に中東寺院について 教えてもらえた事も活かしていきたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
でも、キーラ先輩に中東寺院について
教えてもらえた事も活かしていきたいですね。

engChrName: I know that what I'm serving is a Western chapel, but learning more about my heritage has really expanded my worldview. Wish I could share it!
engSearchText:
I know that what I'm serving is a Western chapel, but
learning more about my heritage has really expanded
my worldview. Wish I could share it!
jpnChrName: 故郷の西方礼拝堂に奉仕するとは言え…… 自分のルーツを知って、色々と世界も広がりましたし。
jpnSearchText:
故郷の西方礼拝堂に奉仕するとは言え……
自分のルーツを知って、色々と世界も広がりましたし。

engChrName: Sounds like this has been on your mind for a while now. But even if it's bothering you, I'm glad everything else is going great!
engSearchText:
Sounds like this has been on your mind for a
while now. But even if it's bothering you, I'm glad
everything else is going great!
jpnChrName: 相変わらず真面目ねぇ！ でも、上手くやれてるみたいでよかった。
jpnSearchText:
相変わらず真面目ねぇ！
でも、上手くやれてるみたいでよかった。

engChrName: I heard Creil makes a point to markedly differentiate between the practices of East and West, so I was a bit worried!
engSearchText:
I heard Creil makes a point to markedly differentiate
between the practices of East and West, so I was a
bit worried!
jpnChrName: まあ、あの村はそういう所で区別しないとは 聞いてたけど、やっぱり少し心配だったし！
jpnSearchText:
まあ、あの村はそういう所で区別しないとは
聞いてたけど、やっぱり少し心配だったし！

engChrName: I'll wake her shortly and call a cab for her if she needs one.
engSearchText:
I'll wake her shortly and call a cab for her if she
needs one.
jpnChrName: もう少ししたら起こして 必要そうならタクシーも呼びますね。
jpnSearchText:
もう少ししたら起こして
必要そうならタクシーも呼びますね。

engChrName: Good night, Van. And do remember to take it easy once in a while.
engSearchText:
Good night, Van. And do remember to take it easy
once in a while.
jpnChrName: 良い夜を──ヴァンさんもどうか、 一息つかれてください。
jpnSearchText:
良い夜を──ヴァンさんもどうか、
一息つかれてください。

engChrName: Will do... Thanks, Shino.
engSearchText: Will do... Thanks, Shino.
jpnChrName: ああ……あんがとよ。
jpnSearchText: ああ……あんがとよ。

engChrName: I've set up shop in every district before, but I always come back to good old Riverside.
engSearchText:
I've set up shop in every district before, but I always
come back to good old Riverside.
jpnChrName: 色々な街区を巡っていますが、 このリバーサイドは落ち着きますね。
jpnSearchText:
色々な街区を巡っていますが、
このリバーサイドは落ち着きますね。

engChrName: Where dreams come true and friendly faces are aplenty. Plus, this is where all my regulars are.
engSearchText:
Where dreams come true and friendly faces are
aplenty. Plus, this is where all my regulars are.
jpnChrName: 夢を追う方、のんびり寛ぐ方、 いつも来て下さる常連さん達……
jpnSearchText:
夢を追う方、のんびり寛ぐ方、
いつも来て下さる常連さん達……

engChrName: Riverside's where I set up shop for the first time, so it holds a special place in my heart.
engSearchText:
Riverside's where I set up shop for the first time, so
it holds a special place in my heart.
jpnChrName: 私が初めて店を開いた場所でもあります。 ……ふふ、やはり思い入れがありますね。
jpnSearchText:
私が初めて店を開いた場所でもあります。
……ふふ、やはり思い入れがありますね。

engChrName: I make sure to stop by at least once a month, and every time still feels just as fresh.
engSearchText:
I make sure to stop by at least once a month, and
every time still feels just as fresh.
jpnChrName: ここには月一くらいでお邪魔してますけど そのたびに発見がありますね。
jpnSearchText:
ここには月一くらいでお邪魔してますけど
そのたびに発見がありますね。

engChrName: Bermotti's always looking for ways to improve his craft. Maybe I should ask if I could study under him again...
engSearchText:
Bermotti's always looking for ways to improve his craft.
Maybe I should ask if I could study under him again...
jpnChrName: 先輩もますます腕を磨かれているようで。 ふふっ、私も一層学ばないとです。
jpnSearchText:
先輩もますます腕を磨かれているようで。
ふふっ、私も一層学ばないとです。

engChrName: This light drizzle's really brought a chill out. I'm serving up warm cocktails to fight it off.
engSearchText:
This light drizzle's really brought a chill out.
I'm serving up warm cocktails to fight it off.
jpnChrName: 小雨ですけど、少し冷えますね。 今夜は体の温まるカクテルをお出ししています。
jpnSearchText:
小雨ですけど、少し冷えますね。
今夜は体の温まるカクテルをお出ししています。

engChrName: Out for an evening stroll? Careful you don't catch a cold.
engSearchText:
Out for an evening stroll? Careful you don't catch
a cold.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんは夜のお散歩ですか？ 風邪を引かれないようにして下さいね。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんは夜のお散歩ですか？
風邪を引かれないようにして下さいね。

engChrName: Heh, I'll try. Thanks, Shino.
engSearchText: Heh, I'll try. Thanks, Shino.
jpnChrName: ああ、サンキュー、シノ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、サンキュー、シノ。

engChrName: Just got a few things to take care of before headin' back.
engSearchText:
Just got a few things to take care of before
headin' back.
jpnChrName: 一通り用事が片付いたら 引き上げるとするぜ。
jpnSearchText:
一通り用事が片付いたら
引き上げるとするぜ。

engChrName: Thanks again for your help. It's a relief knowing my customers are safe and sound.
engSearchText:
Thanks again for your help. It's a relief knowing my
customers are safe and sound.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、改めてありがとうございました。 お客様が無事で本当に良かったです……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん、改めてありがとうございました。
お客様が無事で本当に良かったです……

engChrName: I'll have to make sure he's well taken care of next time I see him around.
engSearchText:
I'll have to make sure he's well taken care of next time
I see him around.
jpnChrName: またウチに来てくれたなら 私の方でも見守らせて頂きたいと思います。
jpnSearchText:
またウチに来てくれたなら
私の方でも見守らせて頂きたいと思います。

engChrName: You look like you could use a drink yourself, Van. How about a cocktail before heading home?
engSearchText:
You look like you could use a drink yourself, Van.
How about a cocktail before heading home?
jpnChrName: さて、ヴァンさんも今夜はお疲れでしょうし 良ければ飲んで行って下さいね。
jpnSearchText:
さて、ヴァンさんも今夜はお疲れでしょうし
良ければ飲んで行って下さいね。

engChrName: It's concerning that one of my customers would leave something like that behind...
engSearchText:
It's concerning that one of my customers would leave
something like that behind...
jpnChrName: 忘れ物の事も勿論ですけど……
jpnSearchText: 忘れ物の事も勿論ですけど……

engChrName: I'll leave it to you to get it back to them.
engSearchText: I'll leave it to you to get it back to them.
jpnChrName: あのお客様の事、 どうかよろしくお願いしますね。
jpnSearchText:
あのお客様の事、
どうかよろしくお願いしますね。

engChrName: I've got your favorite flavor of gelato today, Van.
engSearchText: I've got your favorite flavor of gelato today, Van.
jpnChrName: 今日のジェラートは ヴァンさん好みのテイストにしてあります。
jpnSearchText:
今日のジェラートは
ヴァンさん好みのテイストにしてあります。

engChrName: Would you like some to go?
engSearchText: Would you like some to go?
jpnChrName: ご自宅でゆっくり召し上がって下さいね。
jpnSearchText: ご自宅でゆっくり召し上がって下さいね。

engChrName: You know me too well.
engSearchText: You know me too well.
jpnChrName: ああ、そうさせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、そうさせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Don't forget to stop by the orbal café in front of the station on our way back.
engSearchText:
Don't forget to stop by the orbal café in front of the
station on our way back.
jpnChrName: それじゃあ駅前の 《オーバルカフェ》に向かいましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ駅前の
《オーバルカフェ》に向かいましょうか。

engChrName: Well, look who it is.
engSearchText: Well, look who it is.
jpnChrName: あら……
jpnSearchText: あら……

engChrName: Been a while, Shino. You open yet?
engSearchText: Been a while, Shino. You open yet?
jpnChrName: ようシノ、久しぶりだな。 ……その様子だと準備中か？
jpnSearchText:
ようシノ、久しぶりだな。
……その様子だと準備中か？

engChrName: Still setting up, I'm afraid.
engSearchText: Still setting up, I'm afraid.
jpnChrName: 申し訳ないけど、そうなります。
jpnSearchText: 申し訳ないけど、そうなります。

engChrName: I'll be done by evening, if you want to stop by then. Your favorite sweets will be on the menu.
engSearchText:
I'll be done by evening, if you want to stop by then.
Your favorite sweets will be on the menu.
jpnChrName: 今日の営業は夕方から── ヴァンさんの好きなスイーツもありますよ。
jpnSearchText:
今日の営業は夕方から──
ヴァンさんの好きなスイーツもありますよ。

engChrName: A woman after my own heart! You know me so well.
engSearchText: A woman after my own heart! You know me so well.
jpnChrName: おっ、さすがシノ…… 分かってんじゃねーか。
jpnSearchText:
おっ、さすがシノ……
分かってんじゃねーか。

engChrName: I don't think I've ever seen a mobile food stand like this before.
engSearchText:
I don't think I've ever seen a mobile food stand like
this before.
jpnChrName: あはは……でもちょっと変わった キッチンカーみたいですね？
jpnSearchText:
あはは……でもちょっと変わった
キッチンカーみたいですね？

engChrName: It's pretty unique, to be fair. Welcome to Shino's roamin' bar.
engSearchText:
It's pretty unique, to be fair. Welcome to Shino's
roamin' bar.
jpnChrName: ああ、シノは“流し”のバーをやっててな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、シノは“流し”のバーをやっててな。

engChrName: Goes wherever the clients are at.
engSearchText: Goes wherever the clients are at.
jpnChrName: その日の人の流れを読んで 中々気の利いた場所に店を出すんだ。
jpnSearchText:
その日の人の流れを読んで
中々気の利いた場所に店を出すんだ。

engChrName: Cocktails and snacks are out of this world. I stop by whenever I can find her.
engSearchText:
Cocktails and snacks are out of this world. I stop by
whenever I can find her.
jpnChrName: 甘めのカクテルも菓子（ツマミ）も美味いから、 俺もちょくちょく顔を出すな。
jpnSearchText:
甘めのカクテルも菓子（ツマミ）も美味いから、
俺もちょくちょく顔を出すな。

engChrName: And your business is always appreciated. ♪
engSearchText: And your business is always appreciated. ♪
jpnChrName: いつもご来店ありがとうございます♪
jpnSearchText: いつもご来店ありがとうございます♪

engChrName: Not every drink on the menu's alcoholic, so I can whip you something up later if you're up for it.
engSearchText:
Not every drink on the menu's alcoholic, so I can
whip you something up later if you're up for it.
jpnChrName: ノンアルコールもありますから そちらのお嬢様も、機会があればぜひ。
jpnSearchText:
ノンアルコールもありますから
そちらのお嬢様も、機会があればぜひ。

engChrName: Definitely! With Van talking you up so much, I'd love to try something out.
engSearchText:
Definitely! With Van talking you up so much, I'd
love to try something out.
jpnChrName: はい……！　また寄らせて頂きますね。
jpnSearchText: はい……！　また寄らせて頂きますね。

engChrName: I should be open later this evening, Van. By the way, I'll have a few of your favorite sweets on the menu.
engSearchText:
I should be open later this evening, Van. By the way,
I'll have a few of your favorite sweets on the menu.
jpnChrName: 今日の営業は夕方から── ヴァンさんの好きなスイーツも用意しています。
jpnSearchText:
今日の営業は夕方から──
ヴァンさんの好きなスイーツも用意しています。

engChrName: Do stop by if you get the chance.
engSearchText: Do stop by if you get the chance.
jpnChrName: よければ立ち寄ってくださいね。
jpnSearchText: よければ立ち寄ってくださいね。

engChrName: Zzz... Dingo...
engSearchText: Zzz... Dingo...
jpnChrName: ムニャムニャ…… ……ディンゴさぁん……
jpnSearchText:
ムニャムニャ……
……ディンゴさぁん……

engChrName: Just you watch... I'll become...
engSearchText: Just you watch... I'll become...
jpnChrName: 見ててください…… きっとわたしがディンゴさんの……
jpnSearchText:
見ててください……
きっとわたしがディンゴさんの……

engChrName: (Look at you, gettin' wasted all by your lonesome.)
engSearchText: (Look at you, gettin' wasted all by your lonesome.)
jpnChrName: （やれやれ、打ち上げの後、   一人で二次会と洒落込んだわけか。）
jpnSearchText:
（やれやれ、打ち上げの後、
一人で二次会と洒落込んだわけか。）

engChrName: (At least she's got what it takes to make it as far as the afterparty.)
engSearchText:
(At least she's got what it takes to make it as far as
the afterparty.)
jpnChrName: （ただまあ……何だかんだ   将来有望になりそうじゃねえか。）
jpnSearchText:
（ただまあ……何だかんだ
将来有望になりそうじゃねえか。）

engChrName: Sorry for the hassle, Shino. Want me to look after her?
engSearchText:
Sorry for the hassle, Shino. Want me to look
after her?
jpnChrName: ──すまねぇな、シノ。 よかったらこっちで面倒を見るか？
jpnSearchText:
──すまねぇな、シノ。
よかったらこっちで面倒を見るか？

engChrName: Don't worry about it. Let her sleep. Marielle's put in a lot of work today—I'd say she's earned it.
engSearchText:
Don't worry about it. Let her sleep. Marielle's put in
a lot of work today—I'd say she's earned it.
jpnChrName: いえいえ、寝かせてあげてください。 マリエルさん、頑張ったみたいですし。
jpnSearchText:
いえいえ、寝かせてあげてください。
マリエルさん、頑張ったみたいですし。

engChrName: I heard you two found Dingo's notebook.
engSearchText: I heard you two found Dingo's notebook.
jpnChrName: それにディンゴさんの形見の手帳を 一緒に見つけ出したそうですね？
jpnSearchText:
それにディンゴさんの形見の手帳を
一緒に見つけ出したそうですね？

engChrName: Sure did. Couldn't have done it if Dingo hadn't laid it out for us so well, though.
engSearchText:
Sure did. Couldn't have done it if Dingo hadn't laid it
out for us so well, though.
jpnChrName: ああ、つっても半分以上、 あいつに導かれての結果だが。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、つっても半分以上、
あいつに導かれての結果だが。

engChrName: Did everything in style, right till the end.
engSearchText: Did everything in style, right till the end.
jpnChrName: マジでやることなすこと イケメンすぎるんだっつーの。
jpnSearchText:
マジでやることなすこと
イケメンすぎるんだっつーの。

engChrName: Sounds like Dingo, all right.
engSearchText: Sounds like Dingo, all right.
jpnChrName: ふふ……格好良かったですものね、 ディンゴさん。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ……格好良かったですものね、
ディンゴさん。

engChrName: Care for a drink? Here's a sidecar—a little on the sweet side.
engSearchText:
Care for a drink? Here's a sidecar—a little on the
sweet side.
jpnChrName: よかったら一杯どうですか？ サイドカー、少し甘めで。
jpnSearchText:
よかったら一杯どうですか？
サイドカー、少し甘めで。

engChrName: On the house, of course. Consider it my congratulations for a job well done.
engSearchText:
On the house, of course. Consider it my
congratulations for a job well done.
jpnChrName: 依頼達成のお祝いも兼ねて サービスさせてください。
jpnSearchText:
依頼達成のお祝いも兼ねて
サービスさせてください。

engChrName: Haha... Dingo's favorite drink, yeah?
engSearchText: Haha... Dingo's favorite drink, yeah?
jpnChrName: ハハ…… あいつのお気に入りか。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ……
あいつのお気に入りか。

engChrName: Much appreciated. Cheers to the pretty boy.
engSearchText: Much appreciated. Cheers to the pretty boy.
jpnChrName: わかった、ありがたく頂くぜ。
jpnSearchText: わかった、ありがたく頂くぜ。

engChrName: I loved getting to talk to Mother Kyra after all this time. Busy as always, but she hasn't changed a bit.
engSearchText:
I loved getting to talk to Mother Kyra after all
this time. Busy as always, but she hasn't changed
a bit.
jpnChrName: 先輩に久しぶりに会えて良かった…… お忙しそうですが、変わらず何より……
jpnSearchText:
先輩に久しぶりに会えて良かった……
お忙しそうですが、変わらず何より……

engChrName: She told me Lashkar stopped by the other day and updated her on how I was doing.
engSearchText:
She told me Lashkar stopped by the other day and
updated her on how I was doing.
jpnChrName: ラシュカルも先日、挨拶に来たようで…… 私のお話もしてくれたのだとか。
jpnSearchText:
ラシュカルも先日、挨拶に来たようで……
私のお話もしてくれたのだとか。

engChrName: Mind you, he filled me in on her, too. If he hadn't, I might've not been able to make the trip here to Edith to see her.
engSearchText:
Mind you, he filled me in on her, too. If he hadn't, I
might've not been able to make the trip here to Edith
to see her.
jpnChrName: 私もラシュカルから先輩の事が聞けましたし、 弟のお陰ですね、ここに訪れられたのも。
jpnSearchText:
私もラシュカルから先輩の事が聞けましたし、
弟のお陰ですね、ここに訪れられたのも。

engChrName: Can I help you with somethin'? This is a restricted area.
engSearchText:
Can I help you with somethin'? This is a
restricted area.
jpnChrName: ん？　なんだい？ ここは立ち入り禁止だよ。
jpnSearchText:
ん？　なんだい？
ここは立ち入り禁止だよ。

engChrName: I'd appreciate if you'd stand back. We're dealing with an incident inside. We've sure had no shortage of those lately...
engSearchText:
I'd appreciate if you'd stand back. We're dealing
with an incident inside. We've sure had no
shortage of those lately...
jpnChrName: 中でちょっとした事件もあってね。 ふう、最近多いんだよなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
中でちょっとした事件もあってね。
ふう、最近多いんだよなぁ……

engChrName: Monsters're thinnin' out, but stay on your guards, y'all.
engSearchText:
Monsters're thinnin' out, but stay on your
guards, y'all.
jpnChrName: 化物どもも弱体化したようですが 油断はされない方がいいでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
化物どもも弱体化したようですが
油断はされない方がいいでしょう。

engChrName: Tricky bastards may still have somethin' up their sleeve. Gotta watch each other's backs here.
engSearchText:
Tricky bastards may still have somethin' up
their sleeve. Gotta watch each other's backs here.
jpnChrName: 連中の仕掛けがこれで終わりとも限らない。 お互い警戒しておくとしましょう。
jpnSearchText:
連中の仕掛けがこれで終わりとも限らない。
お互い警戒しておくとしましょう。

engChrName: Leave securing this area to me. Chief's orders.
engSearchText: Leave securing this area to me. Chief's orders.
jpnChrName: こちらの警備はお任せください。 主任にも言い含められてますんでね！
jpnSearchText:
こちらの警備はお任せください。
主任にも言い含められてますんでね！

engChrName: Chief ordered me to keep the area secure for the time being.
engSearchText:
Chief ordered me to keep the area secure for the
time being.
jpnChrName: しばらく警備に当たるよう 主任から指示が出ていましてね。
jpnSearchText:
しばらく警備に当たるよう
主任から指示が出ていましてね。

engChrName: You guys moving on? Be careful out there.
engSearchText: You guys moving on? Be careful out there.
jpnChrName: 皆さんは移動ですか？ 十分にお気を付けて！
jpnSearchText:
皆さんは移動ですか？
十分にお気を付けて！

engChrName: We still have several evacuees here to take care of, but don't worry.
engSearchText:
We still have several evacuees here to take care of, but
don't worry.
jpnChrName: こちらにも何人か避難していますよ。
jpnSearchText: こちらにも何人か避難していますよ。

engChrName: Those monsters aren't getting even a selge within us.
engSearchText: Those monsters aren't getting even a selge within us.
jpnChrName: 化け物共など近づけさせません。 どうかご安心を！
jpnSearchText:
化け物共など近づけさせません。
どうかご安心を！

engChrName: Phew. Looks like there's not as many monsters in the area anymore.
engSearchText:
Phew. Looks like there's not as many monsters in the
area anymore.
jpnChrName: ふう、化け物どもの数も減ったようですね。
jpnSearchText: ふう、化け物どもの数も減ったようですね。

engChrName: But we're still concerned about the whole neighborhood's safety. We'll start patrolling once we got everything under control.
engSearchText:
But we're still concerned about the whole
neighborhood's safety. We'll start patrolling once we
got everything under control.
jpnChrName: 近隣の住民も心配ですし 手が空いたら巡回も始めるとしましょう。
jpnSearchText:
近隣の住民も心配ですし
手が空いたら巡回も始めるとしましょう。

engChrName: Plenty of people are still holed up in their homes. We gotta make sure they're safe, too.
engSearchText:
Plenty of people are still holed up in their homes.
We gotta make sure they're safe, too.
jpnChrName: どうやら屋内に立て籠もっている人も それなりにいる様子──現状確認は必要でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
どうやら屋内に立て籠もっている人も
それなりにいる様子──現状確認は必要でしょう。

engChrName: Chief put me in charge of guarding this area.
engSearchText: Chief put me in charge of guarding this area.
jpnChrName: この辺りの警備につくよう 主任の指示を受けているのですが──
jpnSearchText:
この辺りの警備につくよう
主任の指示を受けているのですが──

engChrName: But then that barrier appeared and the monsters went berserk! It's a goddamn mess.
engSearchText:
But then that barrier appeared and the monsters
went berserk! It's a goddamn mess.
jpnChrName: 直後にあの障壁が現れましてね。 化け物どもも狂暴になるし、やれやれです。
jpnSearchText:
直後にあの障壁が現れましてね。
化け物どもも狂暴になるし、やれやれです。

engChrName: We got some evacuees taking shelter here, but don't worry about them. I'll make sure they're safe.
engSearchText:
We got some evacuees taking shelter here, but don't
worry about them. I'll make sure they're safe.
jpnChrName: ともあれ、逃げ込んでいる住民もいますからね。 守りの方はどうかお任せを。
jpnSearchText:
ともあれ、逃げ込んでいる住民もいますからね。
守りの方はどうかお任せを。

engChrName: You're such a talented singer, Jess! You're the talk of the town! The label has high expectations for you!
engSearchText:
You're such a talented singer, Jess! You're the talk of
the town! The label has high expectations for you!
jpnChrName: ジェス、貴方の歌は大したものよ。 評判も上々──事務所だって今後に期待してる。
jpnSearchText:
ジェス、貴方の歌は大したものよ。
評判も上々──事務所だって今後に期待してる。

engChrName: That's why we need you to put out this new record.
engSearchText: That's why we need you to put out this new record.
jpnChrName: だからこその“新曲レコード”なのよ？
jpnSearchText: だからこその“新曲レコード”なのよ？

engChrName: This could be your big break! You get how important the cover art is, right?
engSearchText:
This could be your big break! You get how important
the cover art is, right?
jpnChrName: これで貴方はブレイクするかもしれない…… そのジャケットがどれだけ大事か分かるわよね？
jpnSearchText:
これで貴方はブレイクするかもしれない……
そのジャケットがどれだけ大事か分かるわよね？

engChrName: Of course I do. I wouldn't be so worried otherwise.
engSearchText: Of course I do. I wouldn't be so worried otherwise.
jpnChrName: ええ、もちろんです。 ……だからこそ拘りたいんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、もちろんです。
……だからこそ拘りたいんですよ。

engChrName: I want to work with an artist that understands my music. It can't be just anyone.
engSearchText:
I want to work with an artist that understands
my music. It can't be just anyone.
jpnChrName: どこの誰かも分からない絵描きより、 僕の曲を誰よりも理解してくれている人──
jpnSearchText:
どこの誰かも分からない絵描きより、
僕の曲を誰よりも理解してくれている人──

engChrName: If they don't get it, then it'll just bring everything down. It has to be perfect.
engSearchText:
If they don't get it, then it'll just bring
everything down. It has to be perfect.
jpnChrName: そんな人に手掛けてほしい。 最高のレコードにするために。
jpnSearchText:
そんな人に手掛けてほしい。
最高のレコードにするために。

engChrName: Perfect, yes! Which is why we asked this famous artist to work with us! Their portfolio is impressive and they—Jess? Are you listening?
engSearchText:
Perfect, yes! Which is why we asked this famous artist
to work with us! Their portfolio is impressive and
they—Jess? Are you listening?
jpnChrName: いえだから、ここは実績のある有名画家に…… ……ねえ聞いてるの、ジェス！？
jpnSearchText:
いえだから、ここは実績のある有名画家に……
……ねえ聞いてるの、ジェス！？

engChrName: This is the first record I'll be releasing after coming here to Edith. It's important, and that's why I need someone that understands it all.
engSearchText:
This is the first record I'll be releasing after coming
here to Edith. It's important, and that's why I need
someone that understands it all.
jpnChrName: ……首都に来て初めてのレコード…… だったら僕の曲を誰よりも理解している人でないと──
jpnSearchText:
……首都に来て初めてのレコード……
だったら僕の曲を誰よりも理解している人でないと──

engChrName: *sigh* You really should just leave us to take care of it...
engSearchText:
*sigh* You really should just leave us to take care
of it...
jpnChrName: まったく……そこは 事務所を信じて任せてほしいものね。
jpnSearchText:
まったく……そこは
事務所を信じて任せてほしいものね。

engChrName: You're a great artist, but you can really get stuck in the little things.
engSearchText:
You're a great artist, but you can really get stuck in
the little things.
jpnChrName: 貴方はいいアーティストだけど どうもヘンな拘りが強いというか……
jpnSearchText:
貴方はいいアーティストだけど
どうもヘンな拘りが強いというか……

engChrName: *sniffle* Damn it, Jess... You're really going to make me cry.
engSearchText:
*sniffle* Damn it, Jess... You're really going to make
me cry.
jpnChrName: ………グスッ……ジェスってば……… 本気で泣かせに来るんだから……
jpnSearchText:
………グスッ……ジェスってば………
本気で泣かせに来るんだから……

engChrName: (He's so damn cool... I can already feel my heart breaking.)
engSearchText:
(He's so damn cool... I can already feel my
heart breaking.)
jpnChrName: （それにあんなにカッコ良くて……   ………もう胸が張り裂けそう………）
jpnSearchText:
（それにあんなにカッコ良くて……
………もう胸が張り裂けそう………）

engChrName: (I...don't think I can take any more of this.)
engSearchText: (I...don't think I can take any more of this.)
jpnChrName: （………やっぱり私これ以上は………）
jpnSearchText: （………やっぱり私これ以上は………）

engChrName: Phew! Made it in time! Cut it real close, what with my shift running late.
engSearchText:
Phew! Made it in time! Cut it real close, what with
my shift running late.
jpnChrName: ふう、間に合った！ 仕事が長引いてギリギリになっちゃったけど！
jpnSearchText:
ふう、間に合った！
仕事が長引いてギリギリになっちゃったけど！

engChrName: At least it looks like Jess is having fun up there.
engSearchText: At least it looks like Jess is having fun up there.
jpnChrName: それにしても…… ふふっ、盛り上がってるじゃない♪
jpnSearchText:
それにしても……
ふふっ、盛り上がってるじゃない♪

engChrName: He's been feeling a little down lately, so it's a relief seeing that he's doing well today.
engSearchText:
He's been feeling a little down lately, so it's a relief
seeing that he's doing well today.
jpnChrName: 最近少し元気が無さそうだったけど、 今日は絶好調みたいね！
jpnSearchText:
最近少し元気が無さそうだったけど、
今日は絶好調みたいね！

engChrName: I've been worried since Jess has been looking a little down lately, but I guess it was nothing.
engSearchText:
I've been worried since Jess has been looking a little
down lately, but I guess it was nothing.
jpnChrName: 最近少し元気が無さそうだったから 気になってたけど……無駄な心配だったみたいね！
jpnSearchText:
最近少し元気が無さそうだったから
気になってたけど……無駄な心配だったみたいね！

engChrName: We were able to bike away from the monsters, but Mark's frozen up with fear...
engSearchText:
We were able to bike away from the monsters, but
Mark's frozen up with fear...
jpnChrName: 自転車のお陰でバケモノからは 逃げ切れたんだけどよ、マークが怖がっちまって……
jpnSearchText:
自転車のお陰でバケモノからは
逃げ切れたんだけどよ、マークが怖がっちまって……

engChrName: I'm worried about Mom and Dad, too! I hope they're all right...
engSearchText:
I'm worried about Mom and Dad, too! I hope they're
all right...
jpnChrName: けど、父ちゃんたちも心配だぜ！！ チクショ～……無事だといいんだけどな……
jpnSearchText:
けど、父ちゃんたちも心配だぜ！！
チクショ～……無事だといいんだけどな……

engChrName: *sniffle* There's so many scary monsters around... Don't leave me, Harry!
engSearchText:
*sniffle* There's so many scary monsters around...
Don't leave me, Harry!
jpnChrName: グスッ……コワイのがいっぱい…… ハリー、いかないでぇ……！
jpnSearchText:
グスッ……コワイのがいっぱい……
ハリー、いかないでぇ……！

engChrName: I-I can't... It's too scary without you, Harry!
engSearchText: I-I can't... It's too scary without you, Harry!
jpnChrName: ぼく、ぼく、ハリーがいないと コワイよぉ～っ！！
jpnSearchText:
ぼく、ぼく、ハリーがいないと
コワイよぉ～っ！！

engChrName: Come on, Mark! Get a grip! I'm right here with you!
engSearchText: Come on, Mark! Get a grip! I'm right here with you!
jpnChrName: も、もうマーク、しゃきっとしなさい！ お姉ちゃんが付いててあげるから！！
jpnSearchText:
も、もうマーク、しゃきっとしなさい！
お姉ちゃんが付いててあげるから！！

engChrName: We were gonna take a walk as family through Riverside today, but we ended up coming ahead of our parents.
engSearchText:
We were gonna take a walk as family through
Riverside today, but we ended up coming ahead of
our parents.
jpnChrName: 今日は家族でリバーサイドを回ろうって…… でも、私たちだけ先に来ちゃって……
jpnSearchText:
今日は家族でリバーサイドを回ろうって……
でも、私たちだけ先に来ちゃって……

engChrName: I...still don't get what's happening, but Harry said we could run here.
engSearchText:
I...still don't get what's happening, but Harry said we
could run here.
jpnChrName: も、もう頭の中ぐちゃぐちゃだけど ハリーがここに逃げ込もうって──
jpnSearchText:
も、もう頭の中ぐちゃぐちゃだけど
ハリーがここに逃げ込もうって──

engChrName: I can take care of Harry and Mark! So please...
engSearchText: I can take care of Harry and Mark! So please...
jpnChrName: あの、ハリーとマークのことは 私がなんとかします！　だから……
jpnSearchText:
あの、ハリーとマークのことは
私がなんとかします！　だから……

engChrName: Find and help Mom and Dad!
engSearchText: Find and help Mom and Dad!
jpnChrName: お父さんとお母さんのこと、 どうかよろしくお願いします！！
jpnSearchText:
お父さんとお母さんのこと、
どうかよろしくお願いします！！

engChrName: The heck are you kids doin' here?!
engSearchText: The heck are you kids doin' here?!
jpnChrName: お前ら……！ こんな所で何してやがるんだ！？
jpnSearchText:
お前ら……！
こんな所で何してやがるんだ！？

engChrName: Van! It's Harry, he's...
engSearchText: Van! It's Harry, he's...
jpnChrName: あっ、ヴァンさん！ 聞いてくださいよ、ハリーが……！
jpnSearchText:
あっ、ヴァンさん！
聞いてくださいよ、ハリーが……！

engChrName: I'm glad you're all safe! We ran away and came here, too!
engSearchText:
I'm glad you're all safe! We ran away and came
here, too!
jpnChrName: ヴァン兄ちゃんたち、無事だったんだな！ オレたちもここに逃げ込んでてよ～！
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン兄ちゃんたち、無事だったんだな！
オレたちもここに逃げ込んでてよ～！

engChrName: But I'm worried about Mom and Dad! What if they got attacked by monsters out there?!
engSearchText:
But I'm worried about Mom and Dad! What if they
got attacked by monsters out there?!
jpnChrName: けど、父ちゃんたちが心配だぜ！！ どっかでバケモノに襲われてるかもしんねー……
jpnSearchText:
けど、父ちゃんたちが心配だぜ！！
どっかでバケモノに襲われてるかもしんねー……

engChrName: I gotta go out and help them! I should be fine, I got my bike!
engSearchText:
I gotta go out and help them! I should be fine, I got
my bike!
jpnChrName: オレちょっと助けに行ってくるぜ！ なーに、この自転車さえありゃ……！
jpnSearchText:
オレちょっと助けに行ってくるぜ！
なーに、この自転車さえありゃ……！

engChrName: You got a death wish or something? Right now's not the time to play hero, kid.
engSearchText:
You got a death wish or something? Right now's not
the time to play hero, kid.
jpnChrName: ……って待てや、ガキに どうこうできる状況じゃねーんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
……って待てや、ガキに
どうこうできる状況じゃねーんだよ。

engChrName: He's right. 'Sides, I'm sure your folks are holed up somewhere safe.
engSearchText:
He's right. 'Sides, I'm sure your folks are holed up
somewhere safe.
jpnChrName: つーか親父さんたちは ちゃんと避難してるから安心しな！
jpnSearchText:
つーか親父さんたちは
ちゃんと避難してるから安心しな！

engChrName: A bike's neither a safe nor efficient way of gettin' around, either.
engSearchText:
A bike's neither a safe nor efficient way of gettin'
around, either.
jpnChrName: しかしこうなったら、車で 連れていっちまった方が早そうだな……
jpnSearchText:
しかしこうなったら、車で
連れていっちまった方が早そうだな……

engChrName: Ohh! You're right! We should give them a ride!
engSearchText: Ohh! You're right! We should give them a ride!
jpnChrName: はいっ！　ハリーたちを 送ってあげましょう！！
jpnSearchText:
はいっ！　ハリーたちを
送ってあげましょう！！

engChrName: Sounds more like a pain than anything, but it's better than you biking straight into a monster's mouth. Let's get this over with!
engSearchText:
Sounds more like a pain than anything, but it's better
than you biking straight into a monster's mouth.
Let's get this over with!
jpnChrName: 面倒だがその方が後腐れもねえか。 ──ならとっとと片付けるかよ！
jpnSearchText:
面倒だがその方が後腐れもねえか。
──ならとっとと片付けるかよ！

engChrName: With that, Van and company drove the kids back to Montmart in Old Town.
engSearchText:
With that, Van and company drove the kids back to
Montmart in Old Town.
jpnChrName: こうしてヴァン達は、旧市街の子供たちを 車に乗せ、モンマルトまで送り届けたのだった。
jpnSearchText:
こうしてヴァン達は、旧市街の子供たちを
車に乗せ、モンマルトまで送り届けたのだった。

engChrName: Are your folks in Old Town? We're plannin' on headin' there after this.
engSearchText:
Are your folks in Old Town? We're plannin' on
headin' there after this.
jpnChrName: 親父さんたちは旧市街にいんのか……？ この後向かう予定だが……
jpnSearchText:
親父さんたちは旧市街にいんのか……？
この後向かう予定だが……

engChrName: If you're heading that way—
engSearchText: If you're heading that way—
jpnChrName: あの、だったら……！
jpnSearchText: あの、だったら……！

engChrName: Please tell them we're safe!
engSearchText: Please tell them we're safe!
jpnChrName: 父ちゃんたちに伝えてくれよ！ オレたちは無事だってさ！！
jpnSearchText:
父ちゃんたちに伝えてくれよ！
オレたちは無事だってさ！！

engChrName: All right. You kids be good and stay safe here, got it?
engSearchText: All right. You kids be good and stay safe here, got it?
jpnChrName: ハッ、了解だ。 お前らもここで大人しくしてろよ！
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、了解だ。
お前らもここで大人しくしてろよ！

engChrName: Got this new brother who's been callin' back over an' over.
engSearchText:
Got this new brother who's been callin' back over
an' over.
jpnChrName: オレのアクティス（愛車）に乗ったブラザーは たいてい何度も声をかけてくれるのさ。
jpnSearchText:
オレのアクティス（愛車）に乗ったブラザーは
たいてい何度も声をかけてくれるのさ。

engChrName: Always nice havin' a repeat client like that in my job.
engSearchText: Always nice havin' a repeat client like that in my job.
jpnChrName: 俗に言うリピーターってヤツだが…… 何てことはねえ、オレは仕事をしているだけさ。
jpnSearchText:
俗に言うリピーターってヤツだが……
何てことはねえ、オレは仕事をしているだけさ。

engChrName: That's one of those once-in-a-lifetime fated meetings ya hear so much about. Glad he liked my ride enough to approach me.
engSearchText:
That's one of those once-in-a-lifetime fated meetings
ya hear so much about. Glad he liked my ride enough
to approach me.
jpnChrName: そいつを気に入ってくれるってんなら本望だが 人と人の出会いはあくまで一期一会──
jpnSearchText:
そいつを気に入ってくれるってんなら本望だが
人と人の出会いはあくまで一期一会──

engChrName: I'll always just keep carrying the vibe with me wherever I go. If you ever need anything, brother, just let me know.
engSearchText:
I'll always just keep carrying the vibe with me
wherever I go. If you ever need anything, brother, just
let me know.
jpnChrName: フフ、オレはいつも変わらず“想い”を運ぶだけだ。 ご用命があればいつでも言ってくれ、ブラザー。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、オレはいつも変わらず“想い”を運ぶだけだ。
ご用命があればいつでも言ってくれ、ブラザー。

engChrName: Nothin' beats the cool autumn air blowing right through yer hair.
engSearchText:
Nothin' beats the cool autumn air blowing right
through yer hair.
jpnChrName: ベイビー、たまには秋空を渡る風を 感じるのも悪くねぇ……そうだろう？
jpnSearchText:
ベイビー、たまには秋空を渡る風を
感じるのも悪くねぇ……そうだろう？

engChrName: And speakin' of air, I caught wind of somethin' interesting.
engSearchText:
And speakin' of air, I caught wind of
somethin' interesting.
jpnChrName: ふむ、風と言えば、風の噂で聞いたが……
jpnSearchText: ふむ、風と言えば、風の噂で聞いたが……

engChrName: Heard o' this new back alley courier. Gets all manner of packages to ya.
engSearchText:
Heard o' this new back alley courier. Gets all manner
of packages to ya.
jpnChrName: どんなブツでも運ぶ 裏社会の“運び屋”がいるらしいな？
jpnSearchText:
どんなブツでも運ぶ
裏社会の“運び屋”がいるらしいな？

engChrName: Got a sweet ride, white as snow. Quick, courteous, an' will do anything for the right price.
engSearchText:
Got a sweet ride, white as snow. Quick, courteous,
an' will do anything for the right price.
jpnChrName: 純白のバイクに跨り、迅速丁寧、 ミラ次第でどんなオーダーでも請けるらしいが……
jpnSearchText:
純白のバイクに跨り、迅速丁寧、
ミラ次第でどんなオーダーでも請けるらしいが……

engChrName: Heh. I swear I can almost hear that sweet engine purrin' already.
engSearchText:
Heh. I swear I can almost hear that sweet engine
purrin' already.
jpnChrName: フフ、クールで小気味良い走行音が 聞こえてくるようだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、クールで小気味良い走行音が
聞こえてくるようだぜ。

engChrName: Sounds like I got m'self a new rival, eh? 'S good to have something to look forward to.
engSearchText:
Sounds like I got m'self a new rival, eh? 'S good to
have something to look forward to.
jpnChrName: さしずめオレのライバルといった所だろうな。 ベイビー……また１つ楽しみが増えたぜ。
jpnSearchText:
さしずめオレのライバルといった所だろうな。
ベイビー……また１つ楽しみが増えたぜ。

engChrName: Seems like that back alley courier an' I are kindred souls.
engSearchText:
Seems like that back alley courier an' I are
kindred souls.
jpnChrName: 裏社会の“運び屋”…… 伝え聞く限りだがオレと同じ信念を感じるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
裏社会の“運び屋”……
伝え聞く限りだがオレと同じ信念を感じるぜ。

engChrName: Heh, can't wait to cross paths with 'em. Got somethin' good to look forward to.
engSearchText:
Heh, can't wait to cross paths with 'em.
Got somethin' good to look forward to.
jpnChrName: フフ、いつか巡り合う気がしてならねえな。 ベイビー……また１つ楽しみが増えたぜ。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、いつか巡り合う気がしてならねえな。
ベイビー……また１つ楽しみが増えたぜ。

engChrName: How about we take a walk around here today, Apollo?
engSearchText:
How about we take a walk around here
today, Apollo?
jpnChrName: 今日の散歩ルートは この辺りにしよっか、アポロ！
jpnSearchText:
今日の散歩ルートは
この辺りにしよっか、アポロ！

engChrName: Woof, woof!
engSearchText: Woof, woof!
jpnChrName: ウォフウォフ！
jpnSearchText: ウォフウォフ！

engChrName: Haha, that's the spirit!
engSearchText: Haha, that's the spirit!
jpnChrName: あははっ、お前はいつも元気ね！
jpnSearchText: あははっ、お前はいつも元気ね！

engChrName: I thought it would be a good idea to bring my family for a visit now that tensions have calmed down between Crossbell and the Empire.
engSearchText:
I thought it would be a good idea to bring my family
for a visit now that tensions have calmed down
between Crossbell and the Empire.
jpnChrName: せっかくクロスベルや帝国の情勢も安定しているので 家族を招待しようと思ったのですが……
jpnSearchText:
せっかくクロスベルや帝国の情勢も安定しているので
家族を招待しようと思ったのですが……

engChrName: But I guess not? I thought Mishy was all the rage with girls Amia's age...
engSearchText:
But I guess not? I thought Mishy was all the rage
with girls Amia's age...
jpnChrName: うーむ、何か間違っていましたかね……みっしぃ、 娘くらいの子に人気のはずなのに……
jpnSearchText:
うーむ、何か間違っていましたかね……みっしぃ、
娘くらいの子に人気のはずなのに……

engChrName: Oh, well. It's not like Mishelam's all there is to see in Crossbell. It'd still be worth it to have them visit.
engSearchText:
Oh, well. It's not like Mishelam's all there is to see
in Crossbell. It'd still be worth it to have them visit.
jpnChrName: まあ、他にも見所は多いですし、どの道 家族を連れて行く甲斐はあるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、他にも見所は多いですし、どの道
家族を連れて行く甲斐はあるでしょう。

engChrName: There's been a lot of interest in Altair as of late due to the plans to build a Z1 racetrack there.
engSearchText:
There's been a lot of interest in Altair as of late due to
the plans to build a Z1 racetrack there.
jpnChrName: 最近では近隣のアルタイル市でＺ１サーキット場の 建設計画が進んでいる影響か、そちらの関心も高く……
jpnSearchText:
最近では近隣のアルタイル市でＺ１サーキット場の
建設計画が進んでいる影響か、そちらの関心も高く……

engChrName: There's a lot of interest in holding the Z1 Grand Prix in Crossbell, too. It'll be nice seeing all the cultural exchange the future will bring.
engSearchText:
There's a lot of interest in holding the Z1 Grand Prix
in Crossbell, too. It'll be nice seeing all the cultural
exchange the future will bring.
jpnChrName: クロスベルでのＺ１グランプリ開催を望む声なども── まあ、これに限らず文化・経済の交流も一層活発で。
jpnSearchText:
クロスベルでのＺ１グランプリ開催を望む声なども──
まあ、これに限らず文化・経済の交流も一層活発で。

engChrName: I'd love it for my family to get a chance to see that— to enjoy and take it all in. I wanna show them all that my workplace has to offer.
engSearchText:
I'd love it for my family to get a chance to see that—
to enjoy and take it all in. I wanna show them all
that my workplace has to offer.
jpnChrName: そういう面を含め、今私が赴任している地の 雰囲気を家族にも感じて欲しいですねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
そういう面を含め、今私が赴任している地の
雰囲気を家族にも感じて欲しいですねぇ。

engChrName: The high tensions between us and the Empire made it so we couldn't visit Culleo after he went there.
engSearchText:
The high tensions between us and the Empire made
it so we couldn't visit Culleo after he went there.
jpnChrName: クレオさん、帝国に赴任していた時には情勢も あって私達も会いに行けなかったけど……
jpnSearchText:
クレオさん、帝国に赴任していた時には情勢も
あって私達も会いに行けなかったけど……

engChrName: I guess that's just part of the job when you're a diplomat. Culleo's always been very passionate about other countries.
engSearchText:
I guess that's just part of the job when you're
a diplomat. Culleo's always been very passionate
about other countries.
jpnChrName: 本当は外国が本質的に好きなのよ、彼は。 だから外交官をしている訳だしねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
本当は外国が本質的に好きなのよ、彼は。
だから外交官をしている訳だしねぇ……

engChrName: Only natural he'd want to share that passion with us. I really hope some of his worldliness will rub off on our daughter.
engSearchText:
Only natural he'd want to share that passion with us.
I really hope some of his worldliness will rub off on
our daughter.
jpnChrName: 私達にその魅力を教えたいのも尤もだし、 私もそういう機会は娘のためにも使いたいもので。
jpnSearchText:
私達にその魅力を教えたいのも尤もだし、
私もそういう機会は娘のためにも使いたいもので。

engChrName: I'd love the chance to get to meet some new artists and visit foreign museums.
engSearchText:
I'd love the chance to get to meet some new artists
and visit foreign museums.
jpnChrName: 国外の画家との交流とか、美術館巡りも 画家としてはそそられるしね。
jpnSearchText:
国外の画家との交流とか、美術館巡りも
画家としてはそそられるしね。

engChrName: N-No, I wasn't scared of Mishy in that movie! It was just, umm...
engSearchText:
N-No, I wasn't scared of Mishy in that movie! It was
just, umm...
jpnChrName: べ、別にあの映画のみっしぃが怖かった わけじゃないわ、ただ、その……
jpnSearchText:
べ、別にあの映画のみっしぃが怖かった
わけじゃないわ、ただ、その……

engChrName: A-Anyway! I'm really excited to visit Crossbell! We'll be going after the Revolution Festival.
engSearchText:
A-Anyway! I'm really excited to visit Crossbell!
We'll be going after the Revolution Festival.
jpnChrName: まあ、それはそうと記念祭の後に クロスベルに行けるなら楽しみよ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、それはそうと記念祭の後に
クロスベルに行けるなら楽しみよ。

engChrName: It's gonna be my first time seeing Daddy's workplace, I think. I've never seen him work!
engSearchText:
It's gonna be my first time seeing Daddy's workplace,
I think. I've never seen him work!
jpnChrName: パパのお仕事している姿もパパのお仕事する場所も、 よく考えたら見た事なかったしね……
jpnSearchText:
パパのお仕事している姿もパパのお仕事する場所も、
よく考えたら見た事なかったしね……

engChrName: I'm looking forward to the Revolution Festival next month, but what do you say you two come pay me a visit in Crossbell after the new year?
engSearchText:
I'm looking forward to the Revolution Festival next
month, but what do you say you two come pay me a
visit in Crossbell after the new year?
jpnChrName: 来月の記念祭も楽しみだが、年明け辺りに 二人共クロスベルに遊びに来ないかい？
jpnSearchText:
来月の記念祭も楽しみだが、年明け辺りに
二人共クロスベルに遊びに来ないかい？

engChrName: I hear they're playing that new Mishy movie in theaters here in the Republic.
engSearchText:
I hear they're playing that new Mishy movie in
theaters here in the Republic.
jpnChrName: ほら、最近は共和国でも“みっしぃ”の 映画をやってるしね。
jpnSearchText:
ほら、最近は共和国でも“みっしぃ”の
映画をやってるしね。

engChrName: I'd love the chance to take Amia to Mishelam Wonderland.
engSearchText:
I'd love the chance to take Amia to
Mishelam Wonderland.
jpnChrName: アミアも一度、ミシュラム・ワンダーランドに 連れて行ってあげたいんだ。
jpnSearchText:
アミアも一度、ミシュラム・ワンダーランドに
連れて行ってあげたいんだ。

engChrName: That sounds nice. I myself am interested in Crossbell's dolls and its theater.
engSearchText:
That sounds nice. I myself am interested in
Crossbell's dolls and its theater.
jpnChrName: それは良いわね……私も、クロスベルの演劇や 精巧な人形も前から興味があったけれど……
jpnSearchText:
それは良いわね……私も、クロスベルの演劇や
精巧な人形も前から興味があったけれど……

engChrName: I just never had the chance to visit because of the tumult.
engSearchText:
I just never had the chance to visit because of
the tumult.
jpnChrName: ごたごたがあったせいで、 行くタイミングを逃しちゃってたわね。
jpnSearchText:
ごたごたがあったせいで、
行くタイミングを逃しちゃってたわね。

engChrName: Haha, you're just as focused on art as always, Nadiya. I can't say I've seen much when it comes to dolls lately...
engSearchText:
Haha, you're just as focused on art as always,
Nadiya. I can't say I've seen much when it comes to
dolls lately...
jpnChrName: はは、芸術家らしい着眼点だね相変わらず。 まあ、人形の方は最近はあまり見なくなったが……
jpnSearchText:
はは、芸術家らしい着眼点だね相変わらず。
まあ、人形の方は最近はあまり見なくなったが……

engChrName: ...but Arc en Ciel is much more interesting than the movies. I bet even Amia will have a blast.
engSearchText:
...but Arc en Ciel is much more interesting than
the movies. I bet even Amia will have a blast.
jpnChrName: アルカンシェルは映画とは違う面白さもあるし、 案外アミアも楽しめるかもしれないね。
jpnSearchText:
アルカンシェルは映画とは違う面白さもあるし、
案外アミアも楽しめるかもしれないね。

engChrName: Oh, I heard about Arc en Ciel in Sunday School!
engSearchText: Oh, I heard about Arc en Ciel in Sunday School!
jpnChrName: あ、アルカンシェルって日曜学校で聞いたわ！
jpnSearchText: あ、アルカンシェルって日曜学校で聞いたわ！

engChrName: They say the action scenes and the dancing are sooo cool! And they don't even use special effects like in the movies!
engSearchText:
They say the action scenes and the dancing are
sooo cool! And they don't even use special effects like
in the movies!
jpnChrName: 映画のトクサツじゃないのに、 ものすごいおどりとアクションだって……
jpnSearchText:
映画のトクサツじゃないのに、
ものすごいおどりとアクションだって……

engChrName: Oh, you want to see them, too, Amia? You've grown so much!
engSearchText:
Oh, you want to see them, too, Amia? You've grown
so much!
jpnChrName: へぇ、アミアもそっちに興味があるのか。 本当に大きくなったんだな……
jpnSearchText:
へぇ、アミアもそっちに興味があるのか。
本当に大きくなったんだな……

engChrName: Here I thought you'd only want to go to Mishelam Wonderland because of Mishy in Boots.
engSearchText:
Here I thought you'd only want to go to Mishelam
Wonderland because of Mishy in Boots.
jpnChrName: てっきり、最近やってる『長靴をはいたみっしぃ』 辺りでミシュラムに興味があるかなと……
jpnSearchText:
てっきり、最近やってる『長靴をはいたみっしぃ』
辺りでミシュラムに興味があるかなと……

engChrName: Er, well... About Mishy, umm...
engSearchText: Er, well... About Mishy, umm...
jpnChrName: あ……あのみっしぃは…… あれは……その……
jpnSearchText:
あ……あのみっしぃは……
あれは……その……

engChrName: Culleo, that movie, umm... How can I put this?
engSearchText: Culleo, that movie, umm... How can I put this?
jpnChrName: クレオさん……あの映画はね、 ちょっと色々とね……
jpnSearchText:
クレオさん……あの映画はね、
ちょっと色々とね……

engChrName: Amia went to go see it with some friends the other day. Isn't that right, sweetie?
engSearchText:
Amia went to go see it with some friends the
other day. Isn't that right, sweetie?
jpnChrName: 一応、この前アミアも友達と 観には行ったのだけれど……ねぇ？
jpnSearchText:
一応、この前アミアも友達と
観には行ったのだけれど……ねぇ？

engChrName: Uh... Am I missing something?
engSearchText: Uh... Am I missing something?
jpnChrName: え……な、何かまずかったか？
jpnSearchText: え……な、何かまずかったか？

engChrName: Heehee. There's no need to worry about me. I'll be heading home shortly.
engSearchText:
Heehee. There's no need to worry about me. I'll be
heading home shortly.
jpnChrName: うふふ、心配しなくても もうちょっとしたら帰るから。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、心配しなくても
もうちょっとしたら帰るから。

engChrName: Good job with work today. Would you be up for a drink?
engSearchText:
Good job with work today. Would you be up for
a drink?
jpnChrName: ──とりあえず、お疲れ様。 よかったらお酒でも注（つ）ごうかしら？
jpnSearchText:
──とりあえず、お疲れ様。
よかったらお酒でも注（つ）ごうかしら？

engChrName: How 'bout no. 'Specially if it'll get you home sooner. You're gonna worry Agnès if you keep this up, you know.
engSearchText:
How 'bout no. 'Specially if it'll get you home sooner.
You're gonna worry Agnès if you keep this up,
you know.
jpnChrName: そういう気遣いはいらねえっつの。 ……たく、アニエスを心配させんなよ？
jpnSearchText:
そういう気遣いはいらねえっつの。
……たく、アニエスを心配させんなよ？

engChrName: We have an eventful week ahead of us, but I can't say I'm not looking forward to it.
engSearchText:
We have an eventful week ahead of us, but I can't say
I'm not looking forward to it.
jpnChrName: 来週は忙しくなりそうだけど 個人的にも面白い出会いがありそうね。
jpnSearchText:
来週は忙しくなりそうだけど
個人的にも面白い出会いがありそうね。

engChrName: It looks like you-know-who read my research thesis as well.
engSearchText:
It looks like you-know-who read my research thesis
as well.
jpnChrName: フフ、“あの方”も私の論文は 読んでくれたようだし……
jpnSearchText:
フフ、“あの方”も私の論文は
読んでくれたようだし……

engChrName: I'm sure we'll have a lovely discussion of it over tea and biscuits.
engSearchText:
I'm sure we'll have a lovely discussion of it over tea
and biscuits.
jpnChrName: なかなか刺激的なお茶会もできそうね。
jpnSearchText: なかなか刺激的なお茶会もできそうね。

engChrName: I managed to get hold of a sword, so please let me protect you.
engSearchText:
I managed to get hold of a sword, so please let me
protect you.
jpnChrName: ふう、どうにか剣が調達できまして。 僕も護衛に立たせて頂きます。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、どうにか剣が調達できまして。
僕も護衛に立たせて頂きます。

engChrName: All of this just reminds me of the Great Twilight back in the Empire...
engSearchText:
All of this just reminds me of the Great Twilight
back in the Empire...
jpnChrName: しかし、この状況……ある意味 帝国の“黄昏”以上かもしれません──
jpnSearchText:
しかし、この状況……ある意味
帝国の“黄昏”以上かもしれません──

engChrName: Stay on your toes, everyone. Let me take care of things here. I know what I'm doing.
engSearchText:
Stay on your toes, everyone. Let me take care of
things here. I know what I'm doing.
jpnChrName: 皆さんもどうか油断なさらず。 僕も心得がある者として全力を尽くしますので！
jpnSearchText:
皆さんもどうか油断なさらず。
僕も心得がある者として全力を尽くしますので！

engChrName: I managed to catch a glimpse of the Oathbreaker and the Khamsin.
engSearchText:
I managed to catch a glimpse of the Oathbreaker and
the Khamsin.
jpnChrName: それにしても……チラッと見かけましたが あれが《破戒》に《灼飆（カムシン）》ですか──
jpnSearchText:
それにしても……チラッと見かけましたが
あれが《破戒》に《灼飆（カムシン）》ですか──

engChrName: Doesn't look like they're up to anything right now, but we still need to be careful...
engSearchText:
Doesn't look like they're up to anything right now,
but we still need to be careful...
jpnChrName: 成程、それぞれの思惑も錯綜している様子。 今は慎重に動くべきでしょうね。
jpnSearchText:
成程、それぞれの思惑も錯綜している様子。
今は慎重に動くべきでしょうね。

engChrName: So this is what idols are all about, huh? They're pretty intense.
engSearchText:
So this is what idols are all about, huh? They're
pretty intense.
jpnChrName: なるほど、これがアイドル…… なかなかの熱気ですね。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、これがアイドル……
なかなかの熱気ですね。

engChrName: I'm really enjoying it here. Lyle picked a good spot, I'll say.
engSearchText:
I'm really enjoying it here. Lyle picked a good spot,
I'll say.
jpnChrName: ライエルに連れて来てもらって 正解だったかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
ライエルに連れて来てもらって
正解だったかもしれません。

engChrName: I asked around to see if I could do something.
engSearchText: I asked around to see if I could do something.
jpnChrName: 受付の人に聞いてみりゃ、オレでもできそうな 事はいくらでもあるようだ！
jpnSearchText:
受付の人に聞いてみりゃ、オレでもできそうな
事はいくらでもあるようだ！

engChrName: I can't fight like Julian, but I can still make myself useful in other ways! Time to prove what I'm made of!
engSearchText:
I can't fight like Julian, but I can still make myself
useful in other ways! Time to prove what I'm
made of!
jpnChrName: ユリアンみたいに戦う事は出来なくても、 ここで良いところ見せなくてどうすんだ！
jpnSearchText:
ユリアンみたいに戦う事は出来なくても、
ここで良いところ見せなくてどうすんだ！

engChrName: Lulua and the others are terrified. I can't have that! We gotta protect them!
engSearchText:
Lulua and the others are terrified. I can't have that!
We gotta protect them!
jpnChrName: ……ルルア達だって怖がってる、オレらが 少しでも安心させてやらねぇと……！
jpnSearchText:
……ルルア達だって怖がってる、オレらが
少しでも安心させてやらねぇと……！

engChrName: Man, oh, MAN! You two are just amazing!
engSearchText: Man, oh, MAN! You two are just amazing!
jpnChrName: ひゅ～、やっぱ二人のライブは最高だな！
jpnSearchText: ひゅ～、やっぱ二人のライブは最高だな！

engChrName: Wh-What the hell is this?!
engSearchText: Wh-What the hell is this?!
jpnChrName: こ、こいつは一体……！！
jpnSearchText: こ、こいつは一体……！！

engChrName: Had shitty luck picking up chicks today, so right now I'm just chilling. And, hey, lucky me! Got here just in time to see them dancing.
engSearchText:
Had shitty luck picking up chicks today, so right now
I'm just chilling. And, hey, lucky me! Got here just in
time to see them dancing.
jpnChrName: 昼間のナンパが芳しくなかったから 気分転換に来てみりゃ、女の子が踊ってるだと！？
jpnSearchText:
昼間のナンパが芳しくなかったから
気分転換に来てみりゃ、女の子が踊ってるだと！？

engChrName: I'd heard of idols before. Cheap as hell in the looks department, but they're real cute! Really makes you wanna cheer for the underdog.
engSearchText:
I'd heard of idols before. Cheap as hell in the looks
department, but they're real cute! Really makes you
wanna cheer for the underdog.
jpnChrName: “アイドル”だったか……衣装も気になっちまうが ビミョーにしょぼいのも応援したくなるっつーか……！
jpnSearchText:
“アイドル”だったか……衣装も気になっちまうが
ビミョーにしょぼいのも応援したくなるっつーか……！

engChrName: I'll have to reach out and coordinate with Renne since she's the one handling the underclassmen.
engSearchText:
I'll have to reach out and coordinate with Renne since
she's the one handling the underclassmen.
jpnChrName: 後輩たちの引率があるから レンとはすり合わせておかないとね！
jpnSearchText:
後輩たちの引率があるから
レンとはすり合わせておかないとね！

engChrName: I'd like to do something about James, but it's just a matter of time at this point before he gets punished.
engSearchText:
I'd like to do something about James, but it's just a
matter of time at this point before he gets punished.
jpnChrName: ジェイムスの奴も何とかしてやりたいけど、 この調子だとお仕置きコースかもね～？
jpnSearchText:
ジェイムスの奴も何とかしてやりたいけど、
この調子だとお仕置きコースかもね～？

engChrName: Oh, hi, Renne. It's nice to see you. You, too, Sasha.
engSearchText: Oh, hi, Renne. It's nice to see you. You, too, Sasha.
jpnChrName: レン先輩、それにサーシャ先輩も……
jpnSearchText: レン先輩、それにサーシャ先輩も……

engChrName: Look at you, working so hard at your part-time job today. Ever the overachiever.
engSearchText:
Look at you, working so hard at your part-time
job today. Ever the overachiever.
jpnChrName: あら、今日も解決屋のお仕事かしら？ 相変わらず熱心みたいね。
jpnSearchText:
あら、今日も解決屋のお仕事かしら？
相変わらず熱心みたいね。

engChrName: Renne filled me in a little on what you do. It's certainly...interesting.
engSearchText:
Renne filled me in a little on what you do.
It's certainly...interesting.
jpnChrName: ふ～ん、レンから聞いていたけど 中々興味深い人たちみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
ふ～ん、レンから聞いていたけど
中々興味深い人たちみたいね。

engChrName: Especially that stud you're working with. I didn't take you for one to be into older men! Oh, the Student Council's gonna have a field day with this!
engSearchText:
Especially that stud you're working with. I didn't take
you for one to be into older men! Oh, the Student
Council's gonna have a field day with this!
jpnChrName: それもカッコイイ系のお兄さんまで。 これは生徒会が荒れるぞ～♪
jpnSearchText:
それもカッコイイ系のお兄さんまで。
これは生徒会が荒れるぞ～♪

engChrName: Y-You got the wrong idea here!
engSearchText: Y-You got the wrong idea here!
jpnChrName: サ、サーシャ先輩、そういうのは……
jpnSearchText: サ、サーシャ先輩、そういうのは……

engChrName: I imagine they'll love hearing about that little incident from the other day.
engSearchText:
I imagine they'll love hearing about that little incident
from the other day.
jpnChrName: むしろ既に一悶着あった後だものね。
jpnSearchText: むしろ既に一悶着あった後だものね。

engChrName: Oh? I know I would love hearing about it! Come on, give!
engSearchText:
Oh? I know I would love hearing about it! Come
on, give!
jpnChrName: ありゃりゃ、そうなの……？ あちゃ～、見逃したか～！
jpnSearchText:
ありゃりゃ、そうなの……？
あちゃ～、見逃したか～！

engChrName: Heehee. Maybe we can give Agnès here a bit of a break from all the gossip.
engSearchText:
Heehee. Maybe we can give Agnès here a bit of a
break from all the gossip.
jpnChrName: クスクス……まあ この話はこれくらいにして。
jpnSearchText:
クスクス……まあ
この話はこれくらいにして。

engChrName: Be careful out there, Agnès. Especially next week.
engSearchText: Be careful out there, Agnès. Especially next week.
jpnChrName: アニエス、怪我には気を付けなさいな。 来週の件のためにもね。
jpnSearchText:
アニエス、怪我には気を付けなさいな。
来週の件のためにもね。

engChrName: Th-Thanks, I'll be sure to take care.
engSearchText: Th-Thanks, I'll be sure to take care.
jpnChrName: は、はい、もちろんです。
jpnSearchText: は、はい、もちろんです。

engChrName: Don't worry. I'm not so lousy a boss that I'll let her get hurt.
engSearchText:
Don't worry. I'm not so lousy a boss that I'll let her
get hurt.
jpnChrName: ま、そこは雇用主として 最大限配慮させてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、そこは雇用主として
最大限配慮させてもらうぜ。

engChrName: By the way, what were you two talking about before I got here?
engSearchText:
By the way, what were you two talking about before I
got here?
jpnChrName: ところで先輩たちは何の話を……？
jpnSearchText: ところで先輩たちは何の話を……？

engChrName: Oh, you know. Budget and all that.
engSearchText: Oh, you know. Budget and all that.
jpnChrName: ああ、まあ予算とか諸々かな？
jpnSearchText: ああ、まあ予算とか諸々かな？

engChrName: Since I'm in charge of club activities, I always have one thing or another to discuss with her.
engSearchText:
Since I'm in charge of club activities, I always have
one thing or another to discuss with her.
jpnChrName: レンは生徒会長、あたしは部活連の総括だし すり合わせも多くてね。
jpnSearchText:
レンは生徒会長、あたしは部活連の総括だし
すり合わせも多くてね。

engChrName: I always enjoy our talks as long as we got some tea with them.
engSearchText:
I always enjoy our talks as long as we got some tea
with them.
jpnChrName: ついでに紅茶の趣味も合うものだから つい、ね。
jpnSearchText:
ついでに紅茶の趣味も合うものだから
つい、ね。

engChrName: Getting back into it, maybe we should go ahead and discuss who'll be leading next week?
engSearchText:
Getting back into it, maybe we should go ahead and
discuss who'll be leading next week?
jpnChrName: そうそう、来週の引率についても 分担を決めておきましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
そうそう、来週の引率についても
分担を決めておきましょうか。

engChrName: Yup, let's!
engSearchText: Yup, let's!
jpnChrName: 了解、会長♪
jpnSearchText: 了解、会長♪

engChrName: Personally, I'd like to do something about James.
engSearchText: Personally, I'd like to do something about James.
jpnChrName: あと個人的にはジェイムスの奴を どうにかしてやりたくてね～。
jpnSearchText:
あと個人的にはジェイムスの奴を
どうにかしてやりたくてね～。

engChrName: Ah, yes. James. He's been grumbling nonstop ever since that happened.
engSearchText:
Ah, yes. James. He's been grumbling nonstop ever
since that happened.
jpnChrName: ジェイムス──ああ、彼ね。 あの件以来、くだを巻いている……
jpnSearchText:
ジェイムス──ああ、彼ね。
あの件以来、くだを巻いている……

engChrName: We could always go ahead and ensure he'll be participating. That might keep him occupied.
engSearchText:
We could always go ahead and ensure he'll
be participating. That might keep him occupied.
jpnChrName: じゃあ強制参加させましょうか♪
jpnSearchText: じゃあ強制参加させましょうか♪

engChrName: That's just how I like it! You're an evil genius, you know that?
engSearchText:
That's just how I like it! You're an evil genius, you
know that?
jpnChrName: アハハ、レンは相変わらず コワイ女だな～！
jpnSearchText:
アハハ、レンは相変わらず
コワイ女だな～！

engChrName: (I have no idea what they're talking about, but it sounds scary...)
engSearchText:
(I have no idea what they're talking about, but it
sounds scary...)
jpnChrName: （えっと、なんだか   不穏な話みたいですけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（えっと、なんだか
不穏な話みたいですけど……）

engChrName: (I got no idea what they're on about, and I'd rather not find out.)
engSearchText:
(I got no idea what they're on about, and I'd rather
not find out.)
jpnChrName: （ハン……？　身内しか   分からねえ話みてえだが……）
jpnSearchText:
（ハン……？　身内しか
分からねえ話みてえだが……）

engChrName: (S-Sorry for the interruption, everyone. Should we get going?)
engSearchText:
(S-Sorry for the interruption, everyone. Should we
get going?)
jpnChrName: （じゃ、邪魔しちゃ悪いですね。   そろそろ行きましょうか。）
jpnSearchText:
（じゃ、邪魔しちゃ悪いですね。
そろそろ行きましょうか。）

engChrName: Hmph... They're sure making a big deal out of nothing.
engSearchText:
Hmph... They're sure making a big deal out
of nothing.
jpnChrName: ……フン、どいつもこいつも こぞって騒ぎ立てやがって……
jpnSearchText:
……フン、どいつもこいつも
こぞって騒ぎ立てやがって……

engChrName: People only ever care about those at the top, anyway.
engSearchText: People only ever care about those at the top, anyway.
jpnChrName: どうせ人間なんざ、テメエの都合しか 考えてねえんだからよ。
jpnSearchText:
どうせ人間なんざ、テメエの都合しか
考えてねえんだからよ。

engChrName: And if not that, themselves. What a bunch of shit.
engSearchText: And if not that, themselves. What a bunch of shit.
jpnChrName: 自分の身が可愛いだけだろ？ ハッ、下らねえ……
jpnSearchText:
自分の身が可愛いだけだろ？
ハッ、下らねえ……

engChrName: I never imagined seeing the idols' exalted forms caught in such harrowing scenery.
engSearchText:
I never imagined seeing the idols' exalted forms
caught in such harrowing scenery.
jpnChrName: まさかアイドルたちの尊い姿を拝みに来て このような事に巻き込まれるとは……
jpnSearchText:
まさかアイドルたちの尊い姿を拝みに来て
このような事に巻き込まれるとは……

engChrName: I'm worried about the cathedral, but I'm certain this, too, is all a part of the Goddess' plan.
engSearchText:
I'm worried about the cathedral, but I'm certain this,
too, is all a part of the Goddess' plan.
jpnChrName: 大聖堂の方も心配ですが これもきっと女神様の導きやもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
大聖堂の方も心配ですが
これもきっと女神様の導きやもしれません。

engChrName: For now, we must cooperate with the temple to do all we can for those who've found refuge here.
engSearchText:
For now, we must cooperate with the temple to do all
we can for those who've found refuge here.
jpnChrName: 今はここに避難されている人々のため、 寺院とも連携しつつ力を尽くすとしましょう。
jpnSearchText:
今はここに避難されている人々のため、
寺院とも連携しつつ力を尽くすとしましょう。

engChrName: May the Goddess' blessing be with you.
engSearchText: May the Goddess' blessing be with you.
jpnChrName: 皆さま方にも、どうか改めて 女神の加護がありますように……
jpnSearchText:
皆さま方にも、どうか改めて
女神の加護がありますように……

engChrName: Citizens of Central Eastern descent come to this temple to celebrate during the Revolution Festival.
engSearchText:
Citizens of Central Eastern descent come to this
temple to celebrate during the Revolution Festival.
jpnChrName: 記念祭の夜には、この寺院で中東系住民で 集まってお祝いをするらしくて……
jpnSearchText:
記念祭の夜には、この寺院で中東系住民で
集まってお祝いをするらしくて……

engChrName: I'm still new around these parts, so it's nice getting the chance to experience something familiar.
engSearchText:
I'm still new around these parts, so it's nice getting
the chance to experience something familiar.
jpnChrName: 私みたいなニューカマーにとっては、 故郷の祭事に近い様式で祝えるのは有難いわ。
jpnSearchText:
私みたいなニューカマーにとっては、
故郷の祭事に近い様式で祝えるのは有難いわ。
