engChrName: Can't properly celebrate if you're not comfortable, after all. You can't properly enjoy it otherwise.
engSearchText:
Can't properly celebrate if you're not comfortable,
after all. You can't properly enjoy it otherwise.
jpnChrName: やっぱり、お祝い事の時は一層…… 馴染む雰囲気の中で祝福したいからねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり、お祝い事の時は一層……
馴染む雰囲気の中で祝福したいからねぇ……

engChrName: Winged Goddess, please light our paths and protect us, so that such a tragedy may never befall us again.
engSearchText:
Winged Goddess, please light our paths and protect
us, so that such a tragedy may never befall us again.
jpnChrName: 翼の女神様……どうか、あのような惨劇が 二度と起きないよう私達をお守りください……
jpnSearchText:
翼の女神様……どうか、あのような惨劇が
二度と起きないよう私達をお守りください……

engChrName: Please protect this child from falling victim to such unspeakable evil.
engSearchText:
Please protect this child from falling victim to such
unspeakable evil.
jpnChrName: この子が……あのような邪悪なものの 犠牲にならないよう、どうか……
jpnSearchText:
この子が……あのような邪悪なものの
犠牲にならないよう、どうか……

engChrName: And may you lead those lost in Creil to everlasting peace and tranquility.
engSearchText:
And may you lead those lost in Creil to everlasting
peace and tranquility.
jpnChrName: そしてクレイユ村の方々を楽園にお導き下さい……
jpnSearchText: そしてクレイユ村の方々を楽園にお導き下さい……

engChrName: I'm showing Saara and Shaheena around since we already know each other.
engSearchText:
I'm showing Saara and Shaheena around since we
already know each other.
jpnChrName: 一応縁もあるし あちこち案内してるところ。
jpnSearchText:
一応縁もあるし
あちこち案内してるところ。

engChrName: Speaking of, I heard these two recently got into an agency.
engSearchText:
Speaking of, I heard these two recently got into
an agency.
jpnChrName: ちなみに二人とも、しばらく前から 女優たちの事務所預かりになってるみたいだね。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに二人とも、しばらく前から
女優たちの事務所預かりになってるみたいだね。

engChrName: That's good. Probably saves them some hassle.
engSearchText: That's good. Probably saves them some hassle.
jpnChrName: 余計なトラブルも避けられそうだし そっちは安心しても良さそうかな。
jpnSearchText:
余計なトラブルも避けられそうだし
そっちは安心しても良さそうかな。

engChrName: What do you want? You're not getting a free drink out of me, you know.
engSearchText:
What do you want? You're not getting a free drink
out of me, you know.
jpnChrName: ん？　なんだ？ 言っておくがお前には奢らないぞ。
jpnSearchText:
ん？　なんだ？
言っておくがお前には奢らないぞ。

engChrName: Wasn't gunnin' for one. Just checkin' in on you, makin' sure you're not totally wasted.
engSearchText:
Wasn't gunnin' for one. Just checkin' in on you,
makin' sure you're not totally wasted.
jpnChrName: いやいや、案外 面倒見のいい事だと思ってな。
jpnSearchText:
いやいや、案外
面倒見のいい事だと思ってな。

engChrName: *sigh* I hate to admit it, but you're probably not far off.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I hate to admit it, but you're probably not
far off.
jpnChrName: ぐっ、お前に言われても全然嬉しくないが──
jpnSearchText: ぐっ、お前に言われても全然嬉しくないが──

engChrName: Listen, man. Try to not make a mess of Edith while we're away, got it?
engSearchText:
Listen, man. Try to not make a mess of Edith while
we're away, got it?
jpnChrName: ……フン、ともかく俺たちが首都を 留守にしている間に面倒事を起こすなよ！？
jpnSearchText:
……フン、ともかく俺たちが首都を
留守にしている間に面倒事を起こすなよ！？

engChrName: I can't believe all three of us are heading out on the same day. And Gray's finally starting his journey from branch to branch.
engSearchText:
I can't believe all three of us are heading out on the
same day. And Gray's finally starting his journey from
branch to branch.
jpnChrName: ３人とも出張に行く日が被るとはなぁ。 それに……グレイもいよいよ“支部巡り”か。
jpnSearchText:
３人とも出張に行く日が被るとはなぁ。
それに……グレイもいよいよ“支部巡り”か。

engChrName: Sure takes me back to doing the same when we were still junior bracers.
engSearchText:
Sure takes me back to doing the same when we were
still junior bracers.
jpnChrName: 懐かしいな…… 俺たちもやったよな、新人の頃に。
jpnSearchText:
懐かしいな……
俺たちもやったよな、新人の頃に。

engChrName: Yeah. It's a hard task, getting a recommendation letter from every branch, but it's good work before becoming a senior bracer.
engSearchText:
Yeah. It's a hard task, getting a recommendation
letter from every branch, but it's good work before
becoming a senior bracer.
jpnChrName: ええ、正遊撃士になるために 各支部で働いて推薦状を貰うプロセスね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、正遊撃士になるために
各支部で働いて推薦状を貰うプロセスね。

engChrName: Not just that, but it's the best way for all bracers to acquire their most useful tool on the job.
engSearchText:
Not just that, but it's the best way for all bracers to
acquire their most useful tool on the job.
jpnChrName: そしてこの国で遊撃士をやっていく以上、 絶対に必要な“あるもの”を身に付けてもらう──
jpnSearchText:
そしてこの国で遊撃士をやっていく以上、
絶対に必要な“あるもの”を身に付けてもらう──

engChrName: What tool?
engSearchText: What tool?
jpnChrName: “あるもの”ですか……？
jpnSearchText: “あるもの”ですか……？

engChrName: Spoiler alert, but it's cultural understanding.
engSearchText: Spoiler alert, but it's cultural understanding.
jpnChrName: ……正解を言っちまえば、文化への理解だよ。
jpnSearchText: ……正解を言っちまえば、文化への理解だよ。

engChrName: The Republic's full of folks from all cultures and backgrounds. You won't be a good bracer if you don't learn how to approach them all.
engSearchText:
The Republic's full of folks from all cultures
and backgrounds. You won't be a good bracer if you
don't learn how to approach them all.
jpnChrName: 共和国には多種多様な人種が暮らしている。 その文化を肌で知っておく必要があるのさ。
jpnSearchText:
共和国には多種多様な人種が暮らしている。
その文化を肌で知っておく必要があるのさ。

engChrName: Oooh, that's why... I hear I'll be assigned to a branch steeped in Central Eastern culture.
engSearchText:
Oooh, that's why... I hear I'll be assigned to a branch
steeped in Central Eastern culture.
jpnChrName: なるほど……！　僕の配属先は東方文化が 色濃い町と聞いてるんですが、そういう意図が──
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……！　僕の配属先は東方文化が
色濃い町と聞いてるんですが、そういう意図が──

engChrName: Give it your best out there! It's a tough road ahead, but I know you can pull it off.
engSearchText:
Give it your best out there! It's a tough road ahead,
but I know you can pull it off.
jpnChrName: ふふ、頑張って。色々あると思うけど 一回り大きくなって帰ってくるのを待ってるわ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、頑張って。色々あると思うけど
一回り大きくなって帰ってくるのを待ってるわ。

engChrName: Best of luck out there, man. Can't look after you since we're going in opposite directions, but I have a feeling I won't need to. You got this.
engSearchText:
Best of luck out there, man. Can't look after you since
we're going in opposite directions, but I have a feeling
I won't need to. You got this.
jpnChrName: お前は筋もいい──俺たちは別方面の 出張になるが、健闘を祈ってるぜ！
jpnSearchText:
お前は筋もいい──俺たちは別方面の
出張になるが、健闘を祈ってるぜ！

engChrName: Thanks, to the both of you! Safe travels, and I hope you enjoy your drinks!
engSearchText:
Thanks, to the both of you! Safe travels, and I hope
you enjoy your drinks!
jpnChrName: はい！　先輩たちもどうかご活躍を！ ささ、どうか飲んでください！
jpnSearchText:
はい！　先輩たちもどうかご活躍を！
ささ、どうか飲んでください！

engChrName: Speaking of, I still can't believe you're not even slightly drunk, Regina.
engSearchText:
Speaking of, I still can't believe you're not even
slightly drunk, Regina.
jpnChrName: しかしレジーナ…… お前、相変わらず酔わないよなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
しかしレジーナ……
お前、相変わらず酔わないよなぁ……

engChrName: Is it really that weird? I've only had a few drinks so far. I don't throw them back as recklessly as you do.
engSearchText:
Is it really that weird? I've only had a few drinks
so far. I don't throw them back as recklessly as
you do.
jpnChrName: そう？　まだ飲み始めたばかりだし。 アルヴィスこそ程々にね？
jpnSearchText:
そう？　まだ飲み始めたばかりだし。
アルヴィスこそ程々にね？

engChrName: Talk about lack of restraint. It's not long before you're a blubbering, drunken mess.
engSearchText:
Talk about lack of restraint. It's not long before you're
a blubbering, drunken mess.
jpnChrName: 貴方、調子に乗って飲むくせに すぐに赤くなって騒ぎだすんだから。
jpnSearchText:
貴方、調子に乗って飲むくせに
すぐに赤くなって騒ぎだすんだから。

engChrName: I still remember when we got promoted to senior bracers. You got so drunk that you told Elaine that—
engSearchText:
I still remember when we got promoted to
senior bracers. You got so drunk that you told Elaine
that—
jpnChrName: 一緒に正遊撃士になった時だって 悪酔いしてエレインさんに──
jpnSearchText:
一緒に正遊撃士になった時だって
悪酔いしてエレインさんに──

engChrName: H-Hey! No need to bring that back up, yeah? (You don't have to throw that back in my face...)
engSearchText:
H-Hey! No need to bring that back up, yeah?
(You don't have to throw that back in my face...)
jpnChrName: あ、あの時は悪かったって。 （たまに辛辣なんだよな、レジーナって……）
jpnSearchText:
あ、あの時は悪かったって。
（たまに辛辣なんだよな、レジーナって……）

engChrName: Huh? Li'l miss, are you...?
engSearchText: Huh? Li'l miss, are you...?
jpnChrName: んあ？　そっちのチビッこいのは もしかして……
jpnSearchText:
んあ？　そっちのチビッこいのは
もしかして……

engChrName: Me? I'm Ferida!
engSearchText: Me? I'm Ferida!
jpnChrName: わたしですか？　フェリーダといいます！
jpnSearchText: わたしですか？　フェリーダといいます！

engChrName: I had no idea you had a Kruga on your payroll, spriggan. Pulling out the big guns, huh?
engSearchText:
I had no idea you had a Kruga on your
payroll, spriggan. Pulling out the big guns, huh?
jpnChrName: へーえ、《クルガ》の戦士まで引きこむとは 大したもんじゃねえか、裏解決屋ァ。
jpnSearchText:
へーえ、《クルガ》の戦士まで引きこむとは
大したもんじゃねえか、裏解決屋ァ。

engChrName: I heard about that case you solved the other day. You might just regret it if you keep kicking the hornet's nest.
engSearchText:
I heard about that case you solved the other day.
You might just regret it if you keep kicking the
hornet's nest.
jpnChrName: 先日あった事件についちゃ聞いてるが…… あんまヤブをつつくなよ？　煩ェ奴も多いぞ？
jpnSearchText:
先日あった事件についちゃ聞いてるが……
あんまヤブをつつくなよ？　煩ェ奴も多いぞ？

engChrName: Yeah, yeah. I got'cha. (Not like I'm TRYIN' to get us in trouble.)
engSearchText:
Yeah, yeah. I got'cha.
(Not like I'm TRYIN' to get us in trouble.)
jpnChrName: へいへい、ご忠告どうも。 （好き好んでってワケじゃねえんだが……）
jpnSearchText:
へいへい、ご忠告どうも。
（好き好んでってワケじゃねえんだが……）

engChrName: (You might've missed the mark a little there.)
engSearchText: (You might've missed the mark a little there.)
jpnChrName: （もう、今更ですよ、ヴァンさん！）
jpnSearchText: （もう、今更ですよ、ヴァンさん！）

engChrName: (Still, I'm impressed how far and wide the Kruga are known.)
engSearchText:
(Still, I'm impressed how far and wide the Kruga
are known.)
jpnChrName: （でもやっぱり……   有名なんですね、クルガ戦士団って。）
jpnSearchText:
（でもやっぱり……
有名なんですね、クルガ戦士団って。）

engChrName: (Don't think anyone from the Central East could possibly not know about 'em. Especially a bracer worth his salt.)
engSearchText:
(Don't think anyone from the Central East could
possibly not know about 'em. Especially a bracer
worth his salt.)
jpnChrName: （まあ中東出身なら聞いた事くらいはあんだろ。   腕の立つ遊撃士となりゃ猶更だ。）
jpnSearchText:
（まあ中東出身なら聞いた事くらいはあんだろ。
腕の立つ遊撃士となりゃ猶更だ。）

engChrName: (I get the feeling that this guy really knows his stuff! He might even know Abi and everyone else!)
engSearchText:
(I get the feeling that this guy really knows his stuff!
He might even know Abi and everyone else!)
jpnChrName: （はい、この人はベテランの匂いがします！   お父さん（アブ）達とやり合った事もあるかもしれません。）
jpnSearchText:
（はい、この人はベテランの匂いがします！
お父さん（アブ）達とやり合った事もあるかもしれません。）

engChrName: Listen, I'm not trying to rain on your parade or anything. Just...be careful. Not everyone'll be too fond of what you get up to.
engSearchText:
Listen, I'm not trying to rain on your parade
or anything. Just...be careful. Not everyone'll be too
fond of what you get up to.
jpnChrName: 俺は煩ェ事を言うつもりはねえが── 各方面で気にする奴もいるしな、気を付けろよ。
jpnSearchText:
俺は煩ェ事を言うつもりはねえが──
各方面で気にする奴もいるしな、気を付けろよ。

engChrName: Heh! Careful you don't go worrying Elaine!
engSearchText: Heh! Careful you don't go worrying Elaine!
jpnChrName: 別の意味でエレインなんかも煩そうだしな、 クックック！
jpnSearchText:
別の意味でエレインなんかも煩そうだしな、
クックック！

engChrName: All right! It's about time you get started on your way to becoming a senior bracer.
engSearchText:
All right! It's about time you get started on your way
to becoming a senior bracer.
jpnChrName: うっし、そんじゃいよいよ始めっか。 正遊撃士への“推薦状試験”ってヤツをな！
jpnSearchText:
うっし、そんじゃいよいよ始めっか。
正遊撃士への“推薦状試験”ってヤツをな！

engChrName: *gulp* Y-Yes, sir! I'm ready!
engSearchText: *gulp* Y-Yes, sir! I'm ready!
jpnChrName: ゴクリ…… よろしくお願いします！
jpnSearchText:
ゴクリ……
よろしくお願いします！

engChrName: But before I send you off from branch to branch, I wanna ask you one thing, Gray. What're you striving for?
engSearchText:
But before I send you off from branch to branch, I
wanna ask you one thing, Gray. What're you
striving for?
jpnChrName: その前に…… グレイ、テメーの信念は何だ？
jpnSearchText:
その前に……
グレイ、テメーの信念は何だ？

engChrName: Striving for...? I... I guess I want to be someone capable of helping those in need.
engSearchText:
Striving for...? I... I guess I want to be someone
capable of helping those in need.
jpnChrName: 信念、ですか……？ ええと、困ってる人の力になりたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
信念、ですか……？
ええと、困ってる人の力になりたいですね。

engChrName: Not a bad answer, but it's a little bland, don't ya think?
engSearchText:
Not a bad answer, but it's a little bland, don't
ya think?
jpnChrName: まァ悪かねぇが、イマイチパンチに欠けるな……
jpnSearchText: まァ悪かねぇが、イマイチパンチに欠けるな……

engChrName: Listen, Gray. Keep a hold of your ideals. Don't lose sight of them. Draw strength from them and the path forward will always be clear.
engSearchText:
Listen, Gray. Keep a hold of your ideals. Don't lose
sight of them. Draw strength from them and the path
forward will always be clear.
jpnChrName: いいか、信念ってのは想いの核だ。 絶体絶命の時に力が湧いてくる源なワケよ。
jpnSearchText:
いいか、信念ってのは想いの核だ。
絶体絶命の時に力が湧いてくる源なワケよ。

engChrName: You can't help anyone when you're lost yourself. You've got a good heart, but you better not forget that.
engSearchText:
You can't help anyone when you're lost yourself.
You've got a good heart, but you better not
forget that.
jpnChrName: そいつを“分かってない”ヤツは何も守れねえ。 ──お前のその優しさは好きだが、よく覚えとけ。
jpnSearchText:
そいつを“分かってない”ヤツは何も守れねえ。
──お前のその優しさは好きだが、よく覚えとけ。

engChrName: Y-Yes, sir! (Draw strength from my ideals...)
engSearchText:
Y-Yes, sir!
(Draw strength from my ideals...)
jpnChrName: は、はい…… （………信念、か………僕の信念は……）
jpnSearchText:
は、はい……
（………信念、か………僕の信念は……）

engChrName: Haha, you all seem like such good friends!
engSearchText: Haha, you all seem like such good friends!
jpnChrName: あはは、先輩たちって仲いいですよね～！
jpnSearchText: あはは、先輩たちって仲いいですよね～！

engChrName: I'm a little anxious, but I know they have big expectations for me. I'm going to do my best out there so that they can be proud of me!
engSearchText:
I'm a little anxious, but I know they have big
expectations for me. I'm going to do my best out
there so that they can be proud of me!
jpnChrName: ……不安もありますけど、期待の方が大きいかな。 精一杯やって帰ってきますよ！
jpnSearchText:
……不安もありますけど、期待の方が大きいかな。
精一杯やって帰ってきますよ！

engChrName: I'm planning on taking on a solo request today. Haha... I'm honestly a little nervous.
engSearchText:
I'm planning on taking on a solo request today.
Haha... I'm honestly a little nervous.
jpnChrName: 今日は一人で依頼を請ける予定なんです。 ……はは、ちょっと緊張しちゃいますね。
jpnSearchText:
今日は一人で依頼を請ける予定なんです。
……はは、ちょっと緊張しちゃいますね。

engChrName: You're that spriggan, right? I heard about what you got up to in Langport.
engSearchText:
You're that spriggan, right? I heard about what you
got up to in Langport.
jpnChrName: 皆さんは確か“裏解決屋”とか…… ラングポートでの一件は噂に聞きました。
jpnSearchText:
皆さんは確か“裏解決屋”とか……
ラングポートでの一件は噂に聞きました。

engChrName: I heard you didn't exactly solve that case by the book. Maybe it's not my place to say anything, but—
engSearchText:
I heard you didn't exactly solve that case by the book.
Maybe it's not my place to say anything, but—
jpnChrName: 非合法な手段も使いつつ強引に解決したとか── その、僕の立場で言う事じゃないかもですが……
jpnSearchText:
非合法な手段も使いつつ強引に解決したとか──
その、僕の立場で言う事じゃないかもですが……

engChrName: We all draw the line somewhere. And we didn't commit any crimes while doing it.
engSearchText:
We all draw the line somewhere. And we didn't
commit any crimes while doing it.
jpnChrName: それはその……私たちも一線は引いていますし 決して犯罪と呼べるほどでは……
jpnSearchText:
それはその……私たちも一線は引いていますし
決して犯罪と呼べるほどでは……

engChrName: Yeah, we worked with Heiyue and all, but I don't think that's a big deal.
engSearchText:
Yeah, we worked with Heiyue and all, but I don't
think that's a big deal.
jpnChrName: ？　確かに一部黒月の手も借りましたが それほど問題でしょうか……？
jpnSearchText:
？　確かに一部黒月の手も借りましたが
それほど問題でしょうか……？

engChrName: Did we ruffle some feathers there? Are you actually bothered about the legality of it all, or about getting upstaged?
engSearchText:
Did we ruffle some feathers there? Are you actually
bothered about the legality of it all, or about
getting upstaged?
jpnChrName: 遊撃士サマの癇に障っちまったかよ？ だが余所者が抜かす方がヤボってもんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士サマの癇に障っちまったかよ？
だが余所者が抜かす方がヤボってもんだろ。

engChrName: Er, no, I didn't mean it that way. What I wanted to say was...keep up the good work!
engSearchText:
Er, no, I didn't mean it that way. What I wanted to
say was...keep up the good work!
jpnChrName: いえ、そうじゃなくて。 ……どうか頑張ってください！
jpnSearchText:
いえ、そうじゃなくて。
……どうか頑張ってください！

engChrName: What?
engSearchText: What?
jpnChrName: はん……？
jpnSearchText: はん……？

engChrName: We can all do with different perspectives. Our way of seeing things can't be the only justice that exists.
engSearchText:
We can all do with different perspectives. Our way of
seeing things can't be the only justice that exists.
jpnChrName: みんながみんな、“正義の味方” じゃなくてもいいと思うんです。
jpnSearchText:
みんながみんな、“正義の味方”
じゃなくてもいいと思うんです。

engChrName: I'm just happy that there are people out there willing to do what needs to be done!
engSearchText:
I'm just happy that there are people out there willing
to do what needs to be done!
jpnChrName: 皆さんみたいな人たちがいると知れただけで ──僕は何だか嬉しいですから！
jpnSearchText:
皆さんみたいな人たちがいると知れただけで
──僕は何だか嬉しいですから！

engChrName: (Bright-eyed rookie stereotype at its finest.)
engSearchText: (Bright-eyed rookie stereotype at its finest.)
jpnChrName: （オイオイ、こいつは……   まさかこれが“若さ”ってヤツか！？）
jpnSearchText:
（オイオイ、こいつは……
まさかこれが“若さ”ってヤツか！？）

engChrName: (Ahaha... He sure does come on a bit strong. But it goes to show that not all bracers are the same.)
engSearchText:
(Ahaha... He sure does come on a bit strong. But it
goes to show that not all bracers are the same.)
jpnChrName: （あははは……確かに眩しいというか……   遊撃士にも色んな方がいるんですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（あははは……確かに眩しいというか……
遊撃士にも色んな方がいるんですね。）

engChrName: (Yeah, he's really laying it on thick! Guess there are all types of bracers, huh?)
engSearchText:
(Yeah, he's really laying it on thick! Guess there are
all types of bracers, huh?)
jpnChrName: （うーん、確かに眩しい感じです！   遊撃士にも色んな方がいるんですねっ！）
jpnSearchText:
（うーん、確かに眩しい感じです！
遊撃士にも色んな方がいるんですねっ！）

engChrName: (He's got eyes full of stars, and they're looking straight at you. Dude's kind of a suck-up.)
engSearchText:
(He's got eyes full of stars, and they're looking
straight at you. Dude's kind of a suck-up.)
jpnChrName: （オッサンには眩しいってか？   ……ま、確かに糞がつくお人好しがいたもんだ。）
jpnSearchText:
（オッサンには眩しいってか？
……ま、確かに糞がつくお人好しがいたもんだ。）

engChrName: I'm doing my best every day to stand on my own as a proper bracer.
engSearchText:
I'm doing my best every day to stand on my own as a
proper bracer.
jpnChrName: 僕も遊撃士として独り立ちできるよう、 毎日全力を尽くしているつもりですが──
jpnSearchText:
僕も遊撃士として独り立ちできるよう、
毎日全力を尽くしているつもりですが──

engChrName: But I take heart knowing there are people out there like you doing what needs to be done to ensure justice is served!
engSearchText:
But I take heart knowing there are people out there
like you doing what needs to be done to ensure justice
is served!
jpnChrName: 皆さんみたいな人たちがいると知れただけで ──僕は何だか嬉しいんです。
jpnSearchText:
皆さんみたいな人たちがいると知れただけで
──僕は何だか嬉しいんです。

engChrName: Let's work together to make the world a better place!
engSearchText: Let's work together to make the world a better place!
jpnChrName: 一緒に頑張りませんか？ この世の中を良くするために！
jpnSearchText:
一緒に頑張りませんか？
この世の中を良くするために！

engChrName: All right, let's get going. We still have stuff to do before we wrap up.
engSearchText:
All right, let's get going. We still have stuff to do
before we wrap up.
jpnChrName: まァ面倒な事は今はいい。 今までの総仕上げをやってもらうだけだからな。
jpnSearchText:
まァ面倒な事は今はいい。
今までの総仕上げをやってもらうだけだからな。

engChrName: Yes, sir! I'll work my hardest today with you, sir!
engSearchText: Yes, sir! I'll work my hardest today with you, sir!
jpnChrName: はいっ……！ よろしくお願いします、先輩！！
jpnSearchText:
はいっ……！
よろしくお願いします、先輩！！

engChrName: Ahh... Nothing beats kicking back and binging with the boys. But the thought of work is killing my buzz...
engSearchText:
Ahh... Nothing beats kicking back and binging with
the boys. But the thought of work is killing my buzz...
jpnChrName: あー、ダチと食って遊んで最高だな。 仕事に戻るのが怠くなっちまいそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
あー、ダチと食って遊んで最高だな。
仕事に戻るのが怠くなっちまいそうだ。

engChrName: Well, at the very least, doing the rounds lets me suss out a new watering hole or two.
engSearchText:
Well, at the very least, doing the rounds lets me suss
out a new watering hole or two.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、街を回って次の遊び場を チェックしとくのも必要か。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、街を回って次の遊び場を
チェックしとくのも必要か。

engChrName: So I guess, just lemme know when you need me to do my sweep.
engSearchText:
So I guess, just lemme know when you need me to do
my sweep.
jpnChrName: ま、巡回で俺様が必要な時は呼んでくれや。
jpnSearchText: ま、巡回で俺様が必要な時は呼んでくれや。

engChrName: All right, time to kick back and get some proper R&R.
engSearchText:
All right, time to kick back and get some
proper R&R.
jpnChrName: さぁて、こっちは適当に マッタリさせてもらうかねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
さぁて、こっちは適当に
マッタリさせてもらうかねぇ。

engChrName: Hmph... I see that bunch are up to their usual tricks.
engSearchText: Hmph... I see that bunch are up to their usual tricks.
jpnChrName: ハン……あいつらも 相変わらずみてぇだしなァ。
jpnSearchText:
ハン……あいつらも
相変わらずみてぇだしなァ。

engChrName: (Is he talking about...?)
engSearchText: (Is he talking about...?)
jpnChrName: （……ああ、ひょっとして。）
jpnSearchText: （……ああ、ひょっとして。）

engChrName: (Heehee, he sure knows how to keep things lively.)
engSearchText: (Heehee, he sure knows how to keep things lively.)
jpnChrName: （ふふ、このヒトも結構、   拗らせちゃってるからねぇ。）
jpnSearchText:
（ふふ、このヒトも結構、
拗らせちゃってるからねぇ。）

engChrName: (Heehee, he sure knows how to keep things lively.)
engSearchText: (Heehee, he sure knows how to keep things lively.)
jpnChrName: （ふふ、まあこのヒトも   結構拗らせちゃってるだけよ。）
jpnSearchText:
（ふふ、まあこのヒトも
結構拗らせちゃってるだけよ。）

engChrName: Zzz... You'll get the scoop...
engSearchText: Zzz... You'll get the scoop...
jpnChrName: ムニャムニャ…… ……きっとスクープを………
jpnSearchText:
ムニャムニャ……
……きっとスクープを………

engChrName: Cheer up...Dingo...
engSearchText: Cheer up...Dingo...
jpnChrName: ディンゴさん…… ………もっと喜んで…………
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴさん……
………もっと喜んで…………

engChrName: I'm not givin' up, Dingo...
engSearchText: I'm not givin' up, Dingo...
jpnChrName: ディンゴさん……わらし…… あきらめましぇんから…………
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴさん……わらし……
あきらめましぇんから…………

engChrName: I'll be...just as good as you...
engSearchText: I'll be...just as good as you...
jpnChrName: あなたの……しぇなかに……おいつくまで……
jpnSearchText: あなたの……しぇなかに……おいつくまで……

engChrName: Zzz...zzz...
engSearchText: Zzz...zzz...
jpnChrName: すぴー……すぴー…………
jpnSearchText: すぴー……すぴー…………

engChrName: Things have been pretty lively up in Arkride Solutions, huh.
engSearchText:
Things have been pretty lively up in Arkride
Solutions, huh.
jpnChrName: 気付けば解決事務所も賑やかになったものだ。
jpnSearchText: 気付けば解決事務所も賑やかになったものだ。

engChrName: Guess it calmed down some, at least. It's good to see you got it in you to make some good friends.
engSearchText:
Guess it calmed down some, at least. It's good to see
you got it in you to make some good friends.
jpnChrName: お前の雰囲気も丸くなったように思う。 ……良い縁に恵まれたようで安心してるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
お前の雰囲気も丸くなったように思う。
……良い縁に恵まれたようで安心してるぞ。

engChrName: I'm an adult, you know!
engSearchText: I'm an adult, you know!
jpnChrName: だあっ、兄貴面すんじゃねえ！
jpnSearchText: だあっ、兄貴面すんじゃねえ！

engChrName: You're one to talk anyway. Been rekindlin' your passion for reportin' with this little go-getter 'round?
engSearchText:
You're one to talk anyway. Been rekindlin' your
passion for reportin' with this little go-getter 'round?
jpnChrName: そういうお前こそコイツが来てから 記者として張り合いが出てるんじゃねえのか？
jpnSearchText:
そういうお前こそコイツが来てから
記者として張り合いが出てるんじゃねえのか？

engChrName: I'm not going to deny that.
engSearchText: I'm not going to deny that.
jpnChrName: フッ……まあ否定はしないでおこう。
jpnSearchText: フッ……まあ否定はしないでおこう。

engChrName: It looks like she's really drunk.
engSearchText: It looks like she's really drunk.
jpnChrName: やれやれ…… 本格的に酔い潰れているようだな。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……
本格的に酔い潰れているようだな。

engChrName: Not sure if she'll come to, but I'll stick around to send her home if she wakes up.
engSearchText:
Not sure if she'll come to, but I'll stick around to send
her home if she wakes up.
jpnChrName: 目を覚ますか分からないが、 もう少しだけ様子を見てから送るとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
目を覚ますか分からないが、
もう少しだけ様子を見てから送るとしよう。

engChrName: Hmm... Langport...
engSearchText: Hmm... Langport...
jpnChrName: ふむ、しかし煌都か……
jpnSearchText: ふむ、しかし煌都か……

engChrName: What about it?
engSearchText: What about it?
jpnChrName: ？　どうした？
jpnSearchText: ？　どうした？

engChrName: Nothing. It's just that the Tyrell Times is planning on running a special feature on Langport in their culture section next month.
engSearchText:
Nothing. It's just that the Tyrell Times is planning on
running a special feature on Langport in their culture
section next month.
jpnChrName: いや、タイレル通信が来月、 文化面で煌都特集を組むらしくてな。
jpnSearchText:
いや、タイレル通信が来月、
文化面で煌都特集を組むらしくてな。

engChrName: Today's the first I've heard about it. Isn't that a funny coincidence.
engSearchText:
Today's the first I've heard about it. Isn't that
a funny coincidence.
jpnChrName: 今日、そんな話を聞いたばかりだから 妙な偶然もあるものだと思っただけだ。
jpnSearchText:
今日、そんな話を聞いたばかりだから
妙な偶然もあるものだと思っただけだ。

engChrName: Funny? Why?
engSearchText: Funny? Why?
jpnChrName: へえ、そうなのかよ。
jpnSearchText: へえ、そうなのかよ。

engChrName: Langport's economy is boomin' these days. Pretty on par with Edith's, even. It makes sense there'd be interest in it.
engSearchText:
Langport's economy is boomin' these days. Pretty on
par with Edith's, even. It makes sense there'd be
interest in it.
jpnChrName: ま、最近首都に劣らず好景気らしいから 注目されても不思議じゃなさそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
ま、最近首都に劣らず好景気らしいから
注目されても不思議じゃなさそうだが。

engChrName: Maybe you're right.
engSearchText: Maybe you're right.
jpnChrName: ……そうだな。
jpnSearchText: ……そうだな。

engChrName: (I don't want to jump to conclusions, but if worse comes to worst, then I'll have to rely on him.)
engSearchText:
(I don't want to jump to conclusions, but if worse
comes to worst, then I'll have to rely on him.)
jpnChrName: （まさかとは思うが……まあ、   その時にはコイツを頼らせてもらうか。）
jpnSearchText:
（まさかとは思うが……まあ、
その時にはコイツを頼らせてもらうか。）

engChrName: I hope you and your assistants have a safe trip.
engSearchText: I hope you and your assistants have a safe trip.
jpnChrName: まあ、助手たちも含めて くれぐれも気をつけて行ってくるといい。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、助手たちも含めて
くれぐれも気をつけて行ってくるといい。

engChrName: If you end up crossing paths with him, tell him I said hi.
engSearchText:
If you end up crossing paths with him, tell him I
said hi.
jpnChrName: それと“彼”に会ったらよろしくな。
jpnSearchText: それと“彼”に会ったらよろしくな。

engChrName: Listen here. You can call me Sister Celis.
engSearchText: Listen here. You can call me Sister Celis.
jpnChrName: いいか、アタシの事は シスター・セリス様って呼べよ。
jpnSearchText:
いいか、アタシの事は
シスター・セリス様って呼べよ。

engChrName: Think of me as a wanderin' nun of sorts. How's about a sermon for you poor, lost souls?
engSearchText:
Think of me as a wanderin' nun of sorts.
How's about a sermon for you poor, lost souls?
jpnChrName: なんなら巡回シスターらしく 迷えるお前らに説教を説いてやってもいいぜ？
jpnSearchText:
なんなら巡回シスターらしく
迷えるお前らに説教を説いてやってもいいぜ？

engChrName: Umm, no thanks...
engSearchText: Umm, no thanks...
jpnChrName: え、遠慮しておきます……
jpnSearchText: え、遠慮しておきます……

engChrName: (She doesn't exactly look like a stereotypical woman of the cloth...)
engSearchText:
(She doesn't exactly look like a stereotypical woman
of the cloth...)
jpnChrName: （シスターって肩書が全然似合わない人だな……）
jpnSearchText: （シスターって肩書が全然似合わない人だな……）

engChrName: It would seem Arkride Solutions is even more lively than the rumors say.
engSearchText:
It would seem Arkride Solutions is even more lively
than the rumors say.
jpnChrName: しかし、噂で聞いていたよりも 裏解決屋というのは賑やかなようですね。
jpnSearchText:
しかし、噂で聞いていたよりも
裏解決屋というのは賑やかなようですね。

engChrName: I have to admit, I was fairly surprised to hear how widely varied your clientele is.
engSearchText:
I have to admit, I was fairly surprised to hear how
widely varied your clientele is.
jpnChrName: 各方面も貴方達の腕は買っているようですし、 少し驚かされました。
jpnSearchText:
各方面も貴方達の腕は買っているようですし、
少し驚かされました。

engChrName: I'd be more than glad to work with you all if the opportunity arises—Arkride notwithstanding.
engSearchText:
I'd be more than glad to work with you all if the
opportunity arises—Arkride notwithstanding.
jpnChrName: 今後とも縁があれば、所長以外の皆さんは よろしくお願いしますね。
jpnSearchText:
今後とも縁があれば、所長以外の皆さんは
よろしくお願いしますね。

engChrName: O-Of course...
engSearchText: O-Of course...
jpnChrName: は、はい……
jpnSearchText: は、はい……

engChrName: Hey, Arkride. Did you hear?
engSearchText: Hey, Arkride. Did you hear?
jpnChrName: おっと、そういやアークライド。 そっちは知ってるのかよ？
jpnSearchText:
おっと、そういやアークライド。
そっちは知ってるのかよ？

engChrName: 'Bout what happened three years ago—
engSearchText: 'Bout what happened three years ago—
jpnChrName: ３年前にあの人が──
jpnSearchText: ３年前にあの人が──

engChrName: Celis.
engSearchText: Celis.
jpnChrName: ……セリスさん。
jpnSearchText: ……セリスさん。

engChrName: Three years ago? Don't tell me that—
engSearchText: Three years ago? Don't tell me that—
jpnChrName: ３年前？　あの人？ ……やっぱりアンタらも──
jpnSearchText:
３年前？　あの人？
……やっぱりアンタらも──

engChrName: Didn't say nothin'. Don't pay me any mind.
engSearchText: Didn't say nothin'. Don't pay me any mind.
jpnChrName: あー……いや、何でもねぇよ。 妙なことを口走っちまった。
jpnSearchText:
あー……いや、何でもねぇよ。
妙なことを口走っちまった。

engChrName: You're free to speculate amongst yourselves as much as you want, but we won't be providing any further information.
engSearchText:
You're free to speculate amongst yourselves as much
as you want, but we won't be providing any
further information.
jpnChrName: 何を想像しているか知りませんが その件について話すつもりはありません。
jpnSearchText:
何を想像しているか知りませんが
その件について話すつもりはありません。

engChrName: Though we are on the same boat, our goals couldn't be further apart.
engSearchText:
Though we are on the same boat, our goals couldn't
be further apart.
jpnChrName: “同じ立場”かもしれませんが── 貴方と僕たちとでは“前提”が違いすぎる。
jpnSearchText:
“同じ立場”かもしれませんが──
貴方と僕たちとでは“前提”が違いすぎる。

engChrName: I would, at the very least, appreciate it if you took care not to bring shame upon him.
engSearchText:
I would, at the very least, appreciate it if you took care
not to bring shame upon him.
jpnChrName: せめてあの人に恥じる生き方はしないよう、 忠告くらいはしておきますがね。
jpnSearchText:
せめてあの人に恥じる生き方はしないよう、
忠告くらいはしておきますがね。

engChrName: Uh-huh... Got'cha.
engSearchText: Uh-huh... Got'cha.
jpnChrName: ハッ……そりゃ親切にどうも。
jpnSearchText: ハッ……そりゃ親切にどうも。

engChrName: (Hmm... Something's going on here.)
engSearchText: (Hmm... Something's going on here.)
jpnChrName: （……やっぱり   何か因縁があるみたいだね。）
jpnSearchText:
（……やっぱり
何か因縁があるみたいだね。）

engChrName: Got a bottle here I promised Dingo I'd open up next time he visited Langport...
engSearchText:
Got a bottle here I promised Dingo I'd open up next
time he visited Langport...
jpnChrName: 次にディンゴが煌都に来た時に 開ける約束をしてたボトルもあったんだがな……
jpnSearchText:
次にディンゴが煌都に来た時に
開ける約束をしてたボトルもあったんだがな……

engChrName: Anyway, I've got some contacts here in Edith. I'll see what I can dig up outside of Bermotti's network.
engSearchText:
Anyway, I've got some contacts here in Edith. I'll see
what I can dig up outside of Bermotti's network.
jpnChrName: とにかく、首都にもそれなりのツテがある。 コイツ（ベルモッティ）とは別のルートで探りを入れていくつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
とにかく、首都にもそれなりのツテがある。
コイツ（ベルモッティ）とは別のルートで探りを入れていくつもりだ。

engChrName: I know it's easier said than done, but try to hold out a little longer before going on the offensive.
engSearchText:
I know it's easier said than done, but try to hold out a
little longer before going on the offensive.
jpnChrName: お前らも辛いだろうが 一矢報いてやる為にも踏ん張るとしようぜ。
jpnSearchText:
お前らも辛いだろうが
一矢報いてやる為にも踏ん張るとしようぜ。

engChrName: No matter how tough the going gets, now's not the time to skulk about.
engSearchText:
No matter how tough the going gets, now's not the
time to skulk about.
jpnChrName: どれだけ辛くても…… 今は蹲ってる場合じゃないからね。
jpnSearchText:
どれだけ辛くても……
今は蹲ってる場合じゃないからね。

engChrName: I have my own history with A. Even if it's not under the same leadership anymore, that doesn't mean I can just let them do as they please.
engSearchText:
I have my own history with A. Even if it's not under
the same leadership anymore, that doesn't mean I can
just let them do as they please.
jpnChrName: 私にとっては先代との因縁もある── このまま《Ａ》の思い通りになんてさせないわ。
jpnSearchText:
私にとっては先代との因縁もある──
このまま《Ａ》の思い通りになんてさせないわ。

engChrName: It's been a while since I last came to a Revolution Festival.
engSearchText:
It's been a while since I last came to a
Revolution Festival.
jpnChrName: ほほ、革命記念祭に足を運ぶのは 何年ぶりじゃろうか。
jpnSearchText:
ほほ、革命記念祭に足を運ぶのは
何年ぶりじゃろうか。

engChrName: Seeing this river makes me wish I could drop a line in.
engSearchText:
Seeing this river makes me wish I could drop a
line in.
jpnChrName: 川を見ると釣り糸を垂らしたくなるが……
jpnSearchText: 川を見ると釣り糸を垂らしたくなるが……

engChrName: But I guess it'd be a darn waste of a trip if I just cooped myself up with my rod and fished the whole time.
engSearchText:
But I guess it'd be a darn waste of a trip if I just
cooped myself up with my rod and fished the
whole time.
jpnChrName: せっかくの首都旅行じゃ。 釣りだけで終わってしまっては勿体ない。
jpnSearchText:
せっかくの首都旅行じゃ。
釣りだけで終わってしまっては勿体ない。

engChrName: This might be the perfect chance to catch a movie. Been a while since I saw one of those.
engSearchText:
This might be the perfect chance to catch a movie.
Been a while since I saw one of those.
jpnChrName: となれば久方ぶりに導力映画の一本でも 観ておきたいところじゃが……
jpnSearchText:
となれば久方ぶりに導力映画の一本でも
観ておきたいところじゃが……

engChrName: I don't have all the time in the world, though. I probably could watch a film or two in the time it'd take me to decide which one to watch!
engSearchText:
I don't have all the time in the world, though.
I probably could watch a film or two in the time it'd
take me to decide which one to watch!
jpnChrName: 滞在時間は限られておるからのう。 どれを観たらよいか迷ってしまうわい。
jpnSearchText:
滞在時間は限られておるからのう。
どれを観たらよいか迷ってしまうわい。

engChrName: (Pretty sure this guy's from Longlai.)
engSearchText: (Pretty sure this guy's from Longlai.)
jpnChrName: （確かこの爺さんは龍來で見かけたな。）
jpnSearchText: （確かこの爺さんは龍來で見かけたな。）

engChrName: I get'cha, old timer. Hard enough to pick a movie as is, but film festivals crank that up to a whole different level.
engSearchText:
I get'cha, old timer. Hard enough to pick a movie as
is, but film festivals crank that up to a whole
different level.
jpnChrName: 気持ちは分かるぜ、爺さん。 特に今は記念祭で上映されてる数も多いしな。
jpnSearchText:
気持ちは分かるぜ、爺さん。
特に今は記念祭で上映されてる数も多いしな。

engChrName: Well said, lad.
engSearchText: Well said, lad.
jpnChrName: うむ、そうなんじゃよ。
jpnSearchText: うむ、そうなんじゃよ。

engChrName: (But if it gets late enough, then the only real choice is Golden Blood Director's Cut.)
engSearchText:
(But if it gets late enough, then the only real choice is
Golden Blood Director's Cut.)
jpnChrName: （ま、夜はゴールデンブラッド完全版   一択なんじゃがな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、夜はゴールデンブラッド完全版
一択なんじゃがな。）

engChrName: (If you catch my drift!)
engSearchText: (If you catch my drift!)
jpnChrName: （理由は……   おぬしも男（おのこ）なら分かるじゃろ。）
jpnSearchText:
（理由は……
おぬしも男（おのこ）なら分かるじゃろ。）

engChrName: ...Please stop whispering. It already sounds bad enough without you doin' that.
engSearchText:
...Please stop whispering. It already sounds bad
enough without you doin' that.
jpnChrName: 小声で言うんじゃねえよ。 無駄に変態っぽく聞こえるだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
小声で言うんじゃねえよ。
無駄に変態っぽく聞こえるだろうが。

engChrName: (I...think I'm flattered?)
engSearchText: (I...think I'm flattered?)
jpnChrName: （興味を持ってくれてるのは嬉しいけど……   なんだか複雑な気分ね。）
jpnSearchText:
（興味を持ってくれてるのは嬉しいけど……
なんだか複雑な気分ね。）

engChrName: Ahem... I digress. Always a good idea to keep up with trends. You'd be surprised by what you can learn from 'em. A veritable mirror of the world.
engSearchText:
Ahem... I digress. Always a good idea to keep up
with trends. You'd be surprised by what you can learn
from 'em. A veritable mirror of the world.
jpnChrName: コホン……ともあれ、流行とは 世の在り方を映し出す鏡のようなモノじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
コホン……ともあれ、流行とは
世の在り方を映し出す鏡のようなモノじゃ。

engChrName: Heh! If you think about it, it's a duty to expose yourself to even the hottest summer blockbusters!
engSearchText:
Heh! If you think about it, it's a duty to expose
yourself to even the hottest summer blockbusters!
jpnChrName: その意味において、昨今人気の映画作品に 触れることは非常に有意義なことと言える。
jpnSearchText:
その意味において、昨今人気の映画作品に
触れることは非常に有意義なことと言える。

engChrName: But alas, if only I had unlimited time to see everything coming out. I can at least peruse all the upcoming movie brochures before I make a pick.
engSearchText:
But alas, if only I had unlimited time to see
everything coming out. I can at least peruse all the
upcoming movie brochures before I make a pick.
jpnChrName: じゃが限られた時間の中で全てを観るのは不可能。 ならばパンフレットだけでも目を通しておきたくてな。
jpnSearchText:
じゃが限られた時間の中で全てを観るのは不可能。
ならばパンフレットだけでも目を通しておきたくてな。

engChrName: If you have any on you, would you mind sharing them with me?
engSearchText:
If you have any on you, would you mind sharing them
with me?
jpnChrName: もしもそれらを持っておるなら、 どうかこのわしに譲ってはくれぬかのう？
jpnSearchText:
もしもそれらを持っておるなら、
どうかこのわしに譲ってはくれぬかのう？

engChrName: A few will do just fine! Let's see... How about a dozen?
engSearchText:
A few will do just fine! Let's see... How about
a dozen?
jpnChrName: この際じゃし一揃え── 数にして１２種くらいは欲しいんじゃが。
jpnSearchText:
この際じゃし一揃え──
数にして１２種くらいは欲しいんじゃが。

engChrName: A dozen? That's a whole lot more than just 'a few.'
engSearchText: A dozen? That's a whole lot more than just 'a few.'
jpnChrName: １２種類のパンフか…… 集めるとなるとそれなりに大変な数だな。
jpnSearchText:
１２種類のパンフか……
集めるとなるとそれなりに大変な数だな。

engChrName: (Whatever. I think I got that many on me. Should I give 'em to him?)
engSearchText:
(Whatever. I think I got that many on me. Should I
give 'em to him?)
jpnChrName: （まあだが、それくらいは持ってたか。   ……爺さんに譲っちまうか？）
jpnSearchText:
（まあだが、それくらいは持ってたか。
……爺さんに譲っちまうか？）

engChrName: I get what you're after, though.
engSearchText: I get what you're after, though.
jpnChrName: とりあえず、爺さんの要望は分かった。
jpnSearchText: とりあえず、爺さんの要望は分かった。

engChrName: I'm a spriggan by trade, so I can get this figured out for you—for a price.
engSearchText:
I'm a spriggan by trade, so I can get this figured out
for you—for a price.
jpnChrName: 何を隠そう俺は裏解決屋でな。 手配してやってもいいが対価次第だな。
jpnSearchText:
何を隠そう俺は裏解決屋でな。
手配してやってもいいが対価次第だな。

engChrName: Oh, believe me, lad! I'm well aware.
engSearchText: Oh, believe me, lad! I'm well aware.
jpnChrName: ほほ、おぬしが裏解決屋というのは 分かっておったぞ。
jpnSearchText:
ほほ、おぬしが裏解決屋というのは
分かっておったぞ。

engChrName: Ain't gonna fleece ya for them. I'm ready to pay for them, fair and square.
engSearchText:
Ain't gonna fleece ya for them. I'm ready to pay for
them, fair and square.
jpnChrName: 心配せずとも相応の礼はさせてもらう。
jpnSearchText: 心配せずとも相応の礼はさせてもらう。

engChrName: So if you're feeling up for it, how about getting those brochures together for me?
engSearchText:
So if you're feeling up for it, how about getting those
brochures together for me?
jpnChrName: というわけで、気が向いたら パンフレットを用意してもらえるかのう。
jpnSearchText:
というわけで、気が向いたら
パンフレットを用意してもらえるかのう。

engChrName: You got it, boss.
engSearchText: You got it, boss.
jpnChrName: ハッ、了解だ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、了解だ。

engChrName: Were you able to get your hands on twelve different brochures for me?
engSearchText:
Were you able to get your hands on twelve different
brochures for me?
jpnChrName: パンフレット１２種…… このわしに譲ってくれるかのう？
jpnSearchText:
パンフレット１２種……
このわしに譲ってくれるかのう？

engChrName: (No dice. Don't have that many brochures on me.)
engSearchText: (No dice. Don't have that many brochures on me.)
jpnChrName: （いや……   そんなにパンフは持ってねえな。）
jpnSearchText:
（いや……
そんなにパンフは持ってねえな。）

engChrName: (Would be a mighty fine idea to go catch a movie or hunt for 'em somewhere else.)
engSearchText:
(Would be a mighty fine idea to go catch a movie or
hunt for 'em somewhere else.)
jpnChrName: （映画を観るか、   他の場所で探してみるとするか。）
jpnSearchText:
（映画を観るか、
他の場所で探してみるとするか。）

engChrName: Here you go. This should be all of them.
engSearchText: Here you go. This should be all of them.
jpnChrName: そらよ、お望みのパンフを持って来てやったぜ。
jpnSearchText: そらよ、お望みのパンフを持って来てやったぜ。

engChrName: Handed Old Master Kukai the complete set of movie brochures.
engSearchText:
Handed Old Master Kukai the complete set of
movie brochures.
jpnChrName: クウカイ老師に映画のパンフレット１２種を渡した。
jpnSearchText: <C1>クウカイ老師に映画のパンフレット１２種を渡した。

engChrName: Hmm... All of these look like a fun watch. The brochures will sure come in handy when I have to pick.
engSearchText:
Hmm... All of these look like a fun watch.
The brochures will sure come in handy when I have
to pick.
jpnChrName: なるほど……どの作品も面白そうじゃのう。 ぜひとも映画選びの参考にさせて貰おう。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……どの作品も面白そうじゃのう。
ぜひとも映画選びの参考にさせて貰おう。

engChrName: If I even get that far! Starting to feel like this'll just make the choice paralysis even harder.
engSearchText:
If I even get that far! Starting to feel like this'll just
make the choice paralysis even harder.
jpnChrName: ……しかしながら、 ますます迷ってしまいそうな気もするが。
jpnSearchText:
……しかしながら、
ますます迷ってしまいそうな気もするが。

engChrName: Heh. I feel you.
engSearchText: Heh. I feel you.
jpnChrName: ハハ、確かにな。
jpnSearchText: ハハ、確かにな。

engChrName: But don't mind me! That's a job well done, lad. Thank you kindly for the brochures.
engSearchText:
But don't mind me! That's a job well done, lad.
Thank you kindly for the brochures.
jpnChrName: ともあれ、パンフレットは有難く受け取った。
jpnSearchText: ともあれ、パンフレットは有難く受け取った。

engChrName: And here's your payment.
engSearchText: And here's your payment.
jpnChrName: それではこいつが報酬じゃ。
jpnSearchText: それではこいつが報酬じゃ。

engChrName: Received Onyx Steel!
engSearchText: Received Onyx Steel!
jpnChrName: 黒玉鋼（くろたまはがね）を手に入れた！
jpnSearchText: <C1>黒玉鋼（くろたまはがね）を手に入れた！

engChrName: Is this some kinda metal?
engSearchText: Is this some kinda metal?
jpnChrName: こいつは……鉱石か？
jpnSearchText: こいつは……鉱石か？

engChrName: Yup. I came across it in one of my fishing trips. It's called Onyx Steel.
engSearchText:
Yup. I came across it in one of my fishing trips.
It's called Onyx Steel.
jpnChrName: うむ、これは釣り道楽のさなかに見つけた 黒玉鋼（くろたまはがね）と呼ばれる鉱石での。
jpnSearchText:
うむ、これは釣り道楽のさなかに見つけた
黒玉鋼（くろたまはがね）と呼ばれる鉱石での。

engChrName: We also call it Star Steel in the East. Very rare and precious metal you got there.
engSearchText:
We also call it Star Steel in the East. Very rare and
precious metal you got there.
jpnChrName: 東方では星鋼と呼ばれることもある 大変に貴重で珍しい品物じゃ。
jpnSearchText:
東方では星鋼と呼ばれることもある
大変に貴重で珍しい品物じゃ。

engChrName: Legends say a weapon crafted with it can cut down a thousand enemies without showing any wear.
engSearchText:
Legends say a weapon crafted with it can cut down a
thousand enemies without showing any wear.
jpnChrName: こいつで武器を造れば、千の敵を倒しても 刃こぼれ一つせぬ武器を生み出せるという。
jpnSearchText:
こいつで武器を造れば、千の敵を倒しても
刃こぼれ一つせぬ武器を生み出せるという。

engChrName: Mighty impressive.
engSearchText: Mighty impressive.
jpnChrName: へぇ……そいつはすげえな。
jpnSearchText: へぇ……そいつはすげえな。

engChrName: But you need to be careful with it. Your run-of-the-mill smith won't be able to draw out its true power.
engSearchText:
But you need to be careful with it.
Your run-of-the-mill smith won't be able to draw out
its true power.
jpnChrName: ちなみにその鉱石を加工するには 特殊な技法が必要らしくてな。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにその鉱石を加工するには
特殊な技法が必要らしくてな。

engChrName: You need proper technique to mold it.
engSearchText: You need proper technique to mold it.
jpnChrName: 並みの技師には扱えんから気をつけるがよいぞ。
jpnSearchText: 並みの技師には扱えんから気をつけるがよいぞ。

engChrName: Heard you loud and clear. 'Preciate it, old timer. This is somethin' else, all right.
engSearchText:
Heard you loud and clear. 'Preciate it, old timer.
This is somethin' else, all right.
jpnChrName: 心得たぜ、爺さん。 すいぶん貴重なモンをあんがとな。
jpnSearchText:
心得たぜ、爺さん。
すいぶん貴重なモンをあんがとな。

engChrName: You're most welcome, lad.
engSearchText: You're most welcome, lad.
jpnChrName: ほほ、礼には及ばん。
jpnSearchText: ほほ、礼には及ばん。

engChrName: I'll need to find a specialist to handle this baby.
engSearchText: I'll need to find a specialist to handle this baby.
jpnChrName: 並みの技師には扱えない、か……
jpnSearchText: 並みの技師には扱えない、か……

engChrName: Maybe I should see what ol' Giscard can do with it.
engSearchText: Maybe I should see what ol' Giscard can do with it.
jpnChrName: ここはジスカールの爺さんに 頼んでみるのがよさそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
ここはジスカールの爺さんに
頼んでみるのがよさそうだな。

engChrName: Good idea. I'm sure the supervisor will know what to do.
engSearchText:
Good idea. I'm sure the supervisor will know what
to do.
jpnChrName: うん、親方なら間違いないと思うよ。
jpnSearchText: うん、親方なら間違いないと思うよ。

engChrName: Think I'll ask Quatre to get in touch with him for me.
engSearchText:
Think I'll ask Quatre to get in touch with
him for me.
jpnChrName: カトルを通じて話をしてみるか。
jpnSearchText: カトルを通じて話をしてみるか。

engChrName: Bet somethin' like this'll be a cakewalk for Basel's chief engineer.
engSearchText:
Bet somethin' like this'll be a cakewalk for Basel's
chief engineer.
jpnChrName: それこそバーゼルのジスカール親方クラスなら 安心して任せられるんだろうが……
jpnSearchText:
それこそバーゼルのジスカール親方クラスなら
安心して任せられるんだろうが……

engChrName: I don't doubt it.
engSearchText: I don't doubt it.
jpnChrName: うん、確かに。
jpnSearchText: うん、確かに。

engChrName: And speaking of, I believe the supervisor is at the grand cathedral in Auber.
engSearchText:
And speaking of, I believe the supervisor is at the
grand cathedral in Auber.
jpnChrName: ちなみに親方なら、 オーベル地区の大聖堂にいると思うよ。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに親方なら、
オーベル地区の大聖堂にいると思うよ。

engChrName: That works.
engSearchText: That works.
jpnChrName: はは、そいつは好都合だな。
jpnSearchText: はは、そいつは好都合だな。

engChrName: Bet somethin' like this'll be a cakewalk for Basel's chief engineer.
engSearchText:
Bet somethin' like this'll be a cakewalk for Basel's
chief engineer.
jpnChrName: それこそバーゼルのジスカール親方クラスなら 安心して任せられるんだろうが……
jpnSearchText:
それこそバーゼルのジスカール親方クラスなら
安心して任せられるんだろうが……

engChrName: I should bring it up to Quatre, see what he thinks.
engSearchText: I should bring it up to Quatre, see what he thinks.
jpnChrName: とりあえずカトルにも相談してみるか。
jpnSearchText: とりあえずカトルにも相談してみるか。

engChrName: They really do just keep pumping out these orbal movies, huh. But I guess that's to be expected.
engSearchText:
They really do just keep pumping out these orbal
movies, huh. But I guess that's to be expected.
jpnChrName: 次々に新しい物が生み出される導力映画…… これぞまさしく万物流転じゃな。
jpnSearchText:
次々に新しい物が生み出される導力映画……
これぞまさしく万物流転じゃな。

engChrName: I'll give the brochures a good read so I can pick one.
engSearchText: I'll give the brochures a good read so I can pick one.
jpnChrName: どれを観るべきか、パンフレットを見て 吟味させてもらうとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
どれを観るべきか、パンフレットを見て
吟味させてもらうとしよう。

engChrName: (But if the sun sets before I make a pick, then we're going for Golden Blood Director's Cut!)
engSearchText:
(But if the sun sets before I make a pick, then we're
going for Golden Blood Director's Cut!)
jpnChrName: （ま、夜はゴールデンブラッド完全版   一択で変わりはないんじゃがな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、夜はゴールデンブラッド完全版
一択で変わりはないんじゃがな。）

engChrName: I'm really grateful for this year's film festival. It might've been a little bumpy, but it gave me the chance to be in my first film.
engSearchText:
I'm really grateful for this year's film festival.
It might've been a little bumpy, but it gave me the
chance to be in my first film.
jpnChrName: 映画祭では色々ありましたけど、映画に出演する 機会に恵まれたのはあの日のおかげです。
jpnSearchText:
映画祭では色々ありましたけど、映画に出演する
機会に恵まれたのはあの日のおかげです。

engChrName: And on top of it, I got to meet you all.
engSearchText: And on top of it, I got to meet you all.
jpnChrName: それに……こうして、 皆さんとの縁にも恵まれましたから。
jpnSearchText:
それに……こうして、
皆さんとの縁にも恵まれましたから。

engChrName: It's all the Winged Goddess' blessing. I owe it all to her guidance.
engSearchText:
It's all the Winged Goddess' blessing. I owe it all to
her guidance.
jpnChrName: ふふ、改めて翼の女神（アルーシャ）に感謝しないといけませんね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、改めて翼の女神（アルーシャ）に感謝しないといけませんね。

engChrName: Saara and I are planning on checking out all of Edith during our visit!
engSearchText:
Saara and I are planning on checking out all of Edith
during our visit!
jpnChrName: 首都にいる間、お姉と行ってみたい所を チェックして来てあるんだ～！
jpnSearchText:
首都にいる間、お姉と行ってみたい所を
チェックして来てあるんだ～！

engChrName: And that includes the Arkride Solutions office! We'd love to swing by later.
engSearchText:
And that includes the Arkride Solutions office!
We'd love to swing by later.
jpnChrName: お邪魔していいって事なら、そこに 解決事務所も入れさせてもらっちゃうから！
jpnSearchText:
お邪魔していいって事なら、そこに
解決事務所も入れさせてもらっちゃうから！

engChrName: I really wanna see what your workplace is like!
engSearchText: I really wanna see what your workplace is like!
jpnChrName: ふふ～、どんな場所でお仕事してるのか 見に行くのが楽しみだな～！
jpnSearchText:
ふふ～、どんな場所でお仕事してるのか
見に行くのが楽しみだな～！

engChrName: I'm not much of a drinker myself, but I won't say no when the opportunity presents itself.
engSearchText:
I'm not much of a drinker myself, but I won't say no
when the opportunity presents itself.
jpnChrName: 酒はそれほど飲まない方だが こういった機会ならば遠慮なく頂こう。
jpnSearchText:
酒はそれほど飲まない方だが
こういった機会ならば遠慮なく頂こう。

engChrName: A CID aide and a top official of the society... This might shape up to be an interesting exchange.
engSearchText:
A CID aide and a top official of the society...
This might shape up to be an interesting exchange.
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤの補佐官と《結社》の最高幹部…… それなりに有意義な交流となりそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
ＣＩＤの補佐官と《結社》の最高幹部……
それなりに有意義な交流となりそうだ。

engChrName: (We're right here, man. Does he just like thinkin' out loud or somethin'?)
engSearchText:
(We're right here, man. Does he just like thinkin' out
loud or somethin'?)
jpnChrName: （この人はこの人で、微妙に   ボケてるんだか何なんだか……）
jpnSearchText:
（この人はこの人で、微妙に
ボケてるんだか何なんだか……）

engChrName: (He's always been like that, actually. He hasn't changed a bit.)
engSearchText:
(He's always been like that, actually. He hasn't
changed a bit.)
jpnChrName: （うーん、お兄ちゃんのそういう所、   昔から変わってないなぁ……）
jpnSearchText:
（うーん、お兄ちゃんのそういう所、
昔から変わってないなぁ……）

engChrName: Don't worry about the bill—I'll handle it. I can write it off as a business expense.
engSearchText:
Don't worry about the bill—I'll handle it. I can write
it off as a business expense.
jpnChrName: 安心しろ、接待費として 支払いはこちらで持ってやろう。
jpnSearchText:
安心しろ、接待費として
支払いはこちらで持ってやろう。

engChrName: And how about you join us if you have the time?
engSearchText: And how about you join us if you have the time?
jpnChrName: 代わりと言ってはなんだが…… 手が空いたらお前もこっちに混ざらないか？
jpnSearchText:
代わりと言ってはなんだが……
手が空いたらお前もこっちに混ざらないか？

engChrName: I'm certain you'd be a very interesting addition to the conversation.
engSearchText:
I'm certain you'd be a very interesting addition to
the conversation.
jpnChrName: その方が話題も弾んで 面白い話を引き出せそうだからな。
jpnSearchText:
その方が話題も弾んで
面白い話を引き出せそうだからな。

engChrName: Hell no! I'm not some party favor, man. Drinks and food with y'all sounds more exhausting than anything.
engSearchText:
Hell no! I'm not some party favor, man. Drinks and
food with y'all sounds more exhausting than anything.
jpnChrName: 俺をダシに使うんじゃねえ！ こんな気疲れしそうな飲み会は願い下げだっつの。
jpnSearchText:
俺をダシに使うんじゃねえ！
こんな気疲れしそうな飲み会は願い下げだっつの。

engChrName: I'm ever so grateful for that little agreement of ours. Wouldn't get the chance to have a drink with these two gentlemen here otherwise.
engSearchText:
I'm ever so grateful for that little agreement of ours.
Wouldn't get the chance to have a drink with these
two gentlemen here otherwise.
jpnChrName: クク、協定のおかげでこんな面白い面子と 飲み交わすことが出来てる訳だ。
jpnSearchText:
クク、協定のおかげでこんな面白い面子と
飲み交わすことが出来てる訳だ。

engChrName: They're great conversationalists, I'll say! All the entertainment has given me a wealth of ideas for some nasty crimes to commit.
engSearchText:
They're great conversationalists, I'll say! All the
entertainment has given me a wealth of ideas for
some nasty crimes to commit.
jpnChrName: 刺激的でいいねぇ、オジサン新しい 犯罪プランの着想を得ちゃいそうだよ。
jpnSearchText:
刺激的でいいねぇ、オジサン新しい
犯罪プランの着想を得ちゃいそうだよ。

engChrName: The hell, man?! Why are you even allowed out in broad daylight?!
engSearchText:
The hell, man?! Why are you even allowed out in
broad daylight?!
jpnChrName: 最悪じゃねえか！ やっぱ誰かコイツを引っ込ませろ！
jpnSearchText:
最悪じゃねえか！
やっぱ誰かコイツを引っ込ませろ！

engChrName: I wonder if the girls are worried about the incident in Creil Village? It certainly is concerning.
engSearchText:
I wonder if the girls are worried about the incident in
Creil Village? It certainly is concerning.
jpnChrName: クレイユ村の一件で彼女たちが 不安がっていないか、気がかりではあるが……
jpnSearchText:
クレイユ村の一件で彼女たちが
不安がっていないか、気がかりではあるが……

engChrName: But at least Victor is with them, so that's good. I'll do all I can to support them, too.
engSearchText:
But at least Victor is with them, so that's good. I'll do
all I can to support them, too.
jpnChrName: お父上もいるわけだし、僕は僕にできる事を 真摯にやっていくべきだろうと思ってね。
jpnSearchText:
お父上もいるわけだし、僕は僕にできる事を
真摯にやっていくべきだろうと思ってね。

engChrName: I'll just need to update my machine tuning policy and dynamic reflex training...
engSearchText:
I'll just need to update my machine tuning policy and
dynamic reflex training...
jpnChrName: ……マシンのチューニング方針に 動体反射のトレーニングもアップデートして……
jpnSearchText:
……マシンのチューニング方針に
動体反射のトレーニングもアップデートして……

engChrName: Nice seein' you around here, champ.
engSearchText: Nice seein' you around here, champ.
jpnChrName: お、誰かと思えば チャンピオンじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
お、誰かと思えば
チャンピオンじゃねえか。

engChrName: Wait. If you're here, then...
engSearchText: Wait. If you're here, then...
jpnChrName: この店に来てるっつーことは もしかして……
jpnSearchText:
この店に来てるっつーことは
もしかして……

engChrName: Indeed. I'm here to see Bradley—the famed mechanic from back in the heyday of early Z1 racing.
engSearchText:
Indeed. I'm here to see Bradley—the famed mechanic
from back in the heyday of early Z1 racing.
jpnChrName: ああ、ブラッドレイさんと言えば Ｚ１黎明期に名を馳せた名整備士だからね。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ブラッドレイさんと言えば
Ｚ１黎明期に名を馳せた名整備士だからね。

engChrName: I was part of the Red Star team back then. We got our behinds handed to us plenty of times by Ingert.
engSearchText:
I was part of the Red Star team back then. We got
our behinds handed to us plenty of times by Ingert.
jpnChrName: 当時僕はレッドスターに所属していたが インゲルト陣営には何度も後塵を拝したものだ……
jpnSearchText:
当時僕はレッドスターに所属していたが
インゲルト陣営には何度も後塵を拝したものだ……

engChrName: I still keep in touch with Bradley. It's nice to kick back and talk shop with him, or just come asking for advice.
engSearchText:
I still keep in touch with Bradley. It's nice to kick
back and talk shop with him, or just come asking
for advice.
jpnChrName: その時の縁で、今でも時々 アドバイスを貰ったりしているのさ。
jpnSearchText:
その時の縁で、今でも時々
アドバイスを貰ったりしているのさ。

engChrName: That's mighty flatterin', coming from the proud consecutive Z1 champion!
engSearchText:
That's mighty flatterin', coming from the proud
consecutive Z1 champion!
jpnChrName: ハッ、今やＺ１最多優勝者が 殊勝な事を言うようになったもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、今やＺ１最多優勝者が
殊勝な事を言うようになったもんだ。

engChrName: From where I stand, you look like you're doin' just fine without my advice! Somethin' shake up the ol' narcissistic worldview lately?
engSearchText:
From where I stand, you look like you're doin' just
fine without my advice! Somethin' shake up the ol'
narcissistic worldview lately?
jpnChrName: 好調なのに助言を求めに来るたぁ、 心境の変化でもあったのかよ？
jpnSearchText:
好調なのに助言を求めに来るたぁ、
心境の変化でもあったのかよ？

engChrName: Well, er... I just...want the people in my life to be able to trust me. I can't let pride be my downfall.
engSearchText:
Well, er... I just...want the people in my life to be able
to trust me. I can't let pride be my downfall.
jpnChrName: い、いやぁその……ここで慢心して 周囲の信頼を失うわけにはいきませんから。
jpnSearchText:
い、いやぁその……ここで慢心して
周囲の信頼を失うわけにはいきませんから。

engChrName: As a top-class racer—and top-class man—I want to make a sincere effort to earn that respect.
engSearchText:
As a top-class racer—and top-class man—I want to
make a sincere effort to earn that respect.
jpnChrName: 一流のレーサーとして、一人の男として 今は真摯に努力を積み重ねたいんです。
jpnSearchText:
一流のレーサーとして、一人の男として
今は真摯に努力を積み重ねたいんです。

engChrName: Well, now... You've changed, kid. And for the better.
engSearchText: Well, now... You've changed, kid. And for the better.
jpnChrName: ほお……どうやら本当に 一皮むけてきたみてえだな。
jpnSearchText:
ほお……どうやら本当に
一皮むけてきたみてえだな。

engChrName: It's up to you to prove whether it's all lip service or not. But if there's anything I can do to help, you know where to find me.
engSearchText:
It's up to you to prove whether it's all lip service
or not. But if there's anything I can do to help, you
know where to find me.
jpnChrName: まあいい、それを証明するのは他ならぬお前さんだ。 俺に協力できる事があれば遠慮なく言いな。
jpnSearchText:
まあいい、それを証明するのは他ならぬお前さんだ。
俺に協力できる事があれば遠慮なく言いな。

engChrName: Thank you, Bradley! First, I'd like to discuss the start of the next racing circuit...
engSearchText:
Thank you, Bradley! First, I'd like to discuss the start
of the next racing circuit...
jpnChrName: ええ、感謝しますよ！ ……まずは来期のレースに向けて……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、感謝しますよ！
……まずは来期のレースに向けて……

engChrName: (Heh. Dude's more genuine than I gave him credit for.)
engSearchText:
(Heh. Dude's more genuine than I gave him
credit for.)
jpnChrName: （はは、案外真面目にやってるみてえだな。）
jpnSearchText: （はは、案外真面目にやってるみてえだな。）

engChrName: (It's real sweet seeing him like that. He looks like he'll really do what's best for Paulette and Yumé.)
engSearchText:
(It's real sweet seeing him like that. He looks like he'll
really do what's best for Paulette and Yumé.)
jpnChrName: （きっとポーレットさんとユメちゃんの為に   ……ふふっ、ちょっと素敵です。）
jpnSearchText:
（きっとポーレットさんとユメちゃんの為に
……ふふっ、ちょっと素敵です。）

engChrName: (Yeah. Bet he feels real guilty about it. But seeing him trying to make up for it kinda makes me want to cheer for him.)
engSearchText:
(Yeah. Bet he feels real guilty about it. But seeing
him trying to make up for it kinda makes me want to
cheer for him.)
jpnChrName: （そ、そうね……流石に罪悪感あるし   こっそり応援してあげようかしら。）
jpnSearchText:
（そ、そうね……流石に罪悪感あるし
こっそり応援してあげようかしら。）

engChrName: Damn... I thought this might be the perfect opportunity to make a speech, but the authorities are out in full force today!
engSearchText:
Damn... I thought this might be the perfect
opportunity to make a speech, but the authorities are
out in full force today!
jpnChrName: くっ、演説をしようにも 当局の巡回が思った以上にあるようだな……！
jpnSearchText:
くっ、演説をしようにも
当局の巡回が思った以上にあるようだな……！

engChrName: The only purpose of the Revolution Festival should be to fire up the spirits of the true Calvardian people!
engSearchText:
The only purpose of the Revolution Festival should
be to fire up the spirits of the true Calvardian people!
jpnChrName: この革命記念祭にこそ真のカルバード国民の 精神を鼓舞するのは当然なのだが──
jpnSearchText:
この革命記念祭にこそ真のカルバード国民の
精神を鼓舞するのは当然なのだが──

engChrName: At this rate, I'll need to be on the lookout for new patrons... Agh, I can't just give up and roll over now!
engSearchText:
At this rate, I'll need to be on the lookout for
new patrons... Agh, I can't just give up and roll
over now!
jpnChrName: このままでは新たなパトロン探しも…… むむむ、だが諦めてなるものか……！
jpnSearchText:
このままでは新たなパトロン探しも……
むむむ、だが諦めてなるものか……！

engChrName: I'm so relieved you're okay, Aaron...
engSearchText: I'm so relieved you're okay, Aaron...
jpnChrName: アーロンが無事で本当に何よりだ……
jpnSearchText: アーロンが無事で本当に何よりだ……

engChrName: We'll take care of Syd's injuries, so don't worry about him. We'll keep an eye on him.
engSearchText:
We'll take care of Syd's injuries, so don't worry
about him. We'll keep an eye on him.
jpnChrName: シドは怪我をしているが、俺がサポートして やるから心配しないでくれ。
jpnSearchText:
シドは怪我をしているが、俺がサポートして
やるから心配しないでくれ。

engChrName: Be careful out there, Aaron!
engSearchText: Be careful out there, Aaron!
jpnChrName: アーロン、どうかこの先も気を付けてな！
jpnSearchText: アーロン、どうかこの先も気を付けてな！

engChrName: Don't worry about me, dude. You guys just stay put and make sure these guys don't screw anything up.
engSearchText:
Don't worry about me, dude. You guys just stay put
and make sure these guys don't screw anything up.
jpnChrName: ハッ、たりめーだ。 お前はこいつらを頼んだぜ！
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、たりめーだ。
お前はこいつらを頼んだぜ！

engChrName: It never even crossed my mind that something like this could happen. Please take care of Aaron.
engSearchText:
It never even crossed my mind that something like
this could happen. Please take care of Aaron.
jpnChrName: まさかこんな事になるなんて…… とにかくアーロンをよろしく頼むよ……
jpnSearchText:
まさかこんな事になるなんて……
とにかくアーロンをよろしく頼むよ……

engChrName: I'd love to give him the benefit of the doubt and trust that he won't do anything reckless...
engSearchText:
I'd love to give him the benefit of the doubt and trust
that he won't do anything reckless...
jpnChrName: アーロンに限って滅多な事は無いと 信じたいが……
jpnSearchText:
アーロンに限って滅多な事は無いと
信じたいが……

engChrName: You're that spriggan, right? I heard about you from Syd.
engSearchText:
You're that spriggan, right? I heard about you
from Syd.
jpnChrName: あんたが裏解決屋ってヤツなんだな、 シドからも話を聞いているぜ。
jpnSearchText:
あんたが裏解決屋ってヤツなんだな、
シドからも話を聞いているぜ。

engChrName: I know you're the one looking after Aaron now. I can't put into words how grateful I am. Aaron looks like he's been having the time of his life.
engSearchText:
I know you're the one looking after Aaron now.
I can't put into words how grateful I am. Aaron looks
like he's been having the time of his life.
jpnChrName: アーロンはいまそっちで世話になっている みたいだけど、楽しそうにやってて何よりだ。
jpnSearchText:
アーロンはいまそっちで世話になっている
みたいだけど、楽しそうにやってて何よりだ。

engChrName: I'm glad Aaron's okay. Now it's the monsters outside I'm worried about...
engSearchText:
I'm glad Aaron's okay. Now it's the monsters outside
I'm worried about...
jpnChrName: アーロンが無事でよかった…… あとは外の化け物たちだけど……
jpnSearchText:
アーロンが無事でよかった……
あとは外の化け物たちだけど……

engChrName: Agh, this isn't the time to worry! It's the time for action!
engSearchText:
Agh, this isn't the time to worry! It's the time
for action!
jpnChrName: ううん、弱気になんてなってちゃダメよね！
jpnSearchText: ううん、弱気になんてなってちゃダメよね！

engChrName: You guys are still here, after all. I'm sure you'll figure something out!
engSearchText:
You guys are still here, after all. I'm sure you'll figure
something out!
jpnChrName: アーロンたちもいてくれるんだもの。 きっと何とかなるはずよ！
jpnSearchText:
アーロンたちもいてくれるんだもの。
きっと何とかなるはずよ！

engChrName: I sure hope Aaron's okay... He went off on his own.
engSearchText: I sure hope Aaron's okay... He went off on his own.
jpnChrName: アーロンは大丈夫かしら…… 一人で出ていってしまって……
jpnSearchText:
アーロンは大丈夫かしら……
一人で出ていってしまって……

engChrName: He did the same back then, too. This isn't going to become a regular thing, right?
engSearchText:
He did the same back then, too. This isn't going to
become a regular thing, right?
jpnChrName: この前も一人で突っ走って…… ……ううん、もうあんな事起きないわよね……？
jpnSearchText:
この前も一人で突っ走って……
……ううん、もうあんな事起きないわよね……？

engChrName: Syd's the glue that keeps us all sticking together these days.
engSearchText:
Syd's the glue that keeps us all sticking together
these days.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、今ではシドがみんなの事を 纏めてくれてるのよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、今ではシドがみんなの事を
纏めてくれてるのよ。

engChrName: But I really missed Aaron. I hope he at least comes back for the Lunar New Year festivities!
engSearchText:
But I really missed Aaron. I hope he at least comes
back for the Lunar New Year festivities!
jpnChrName: でもやっぱりアーロンがいないと寂しいしね、 新節には帰ってきて欲しいわね～。
jpnSearchText:
でもやっぱりアーロンがいないと寂しいしね、
新節には帰ってきて欲しいわね～。

engChrName: Oh, it's you guys. Thanks again for everything you did for Aaron.
engSearchText:
Oh, it's you guys. Thanks again for everything you
did for Aaron.
jpnChrName: あんた達……改めてアーロンを 助けてくれて本当にありがとうな。
jpnSearchText:
あんた達……改めてアーロンを
助けてくれて本当にありがとうな。

engChrName: If anything happens to him again, I...
engSearchText: If anything happens to him again, I...
jpnChrName: またアーロンに何かあったら、 俺は……
jpnSearchText:
またアーロンに何かあったら、
俺は……

engChrName: Don't mention it.
engSearchText: Don't mention it.
jpnChrName: ま、礼には及ばねぇさ。
jpnSearchText: ま、礼には及ばねぇさ。

engChrName: Heh, c'mon Syd, you really think I'd go down that easily? What do you take me for?
engSearchText:
Heh, c'mon Syd, you really think I'd go down
that easily? What do you take me for?
jpnChrName: ハッ、っつーかシド……オレがそう簡単に くたばるとでも思ってんのかよ？
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、っつーかシド……オレがそう簡単に
くたばるとでも思ってんのかよ？

engChrName: Well, I heard something bad overcame you when you went to Heilong Cheng Zhai while I was out cold.
engSearchText:
Well, I heard something bad overcame you when you
went to Heilong Cheng Zhai while I was out cold.
jpnChrName: だってよ……俺が昏睡してた時に黒龍城砦に 乗り込んで、それで何かに呑まれたって……
jpnSearchText:
だってよ……俺が昏睡してた時に黒龍城砦に
乗り込んで、それで何かに呑まれたって……

engChrName: It worried me so much to think I'd lose you, too. That you wouldn't be yourself anymore.
engSearchText:
It worried me so much to think I'd lose you, too.
That you wouldn't be yourself anymore.
jpnChrName: アーロンが……俺の知ってるアーロンじゃなく なっちまわないか、不安で……
jpnSearchText:
アーロンが……俺の知ってるアーロンじゃなく
なっちまわないか、不安で……

engChrName: You talkin' about that ancient, crusty bastard? How did you even hear about that?
engSearchText:
You talkin' about that ancient, crusty bastard?
How did you even hear about that?
jpnChrName: ハッ、あの骨董品の野郎か。 たく、寝てたくせに知りやがって……
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、あの骨董品の野郎か。
たく、寝てたくせに知りやがって……

engChrName: Look, man. He's nothing to worry about. Not back then, and not now.
engSearchText:
Look, man. He's nothing to worry about. Not back
then, and not now.
jpnChrName: だが、あん時もオレはあの《大君》を 抑え込んだ、今だってそのままだ。
jpnSearchText:
だが、あん時もオレはあの《大君》を
抑え込んだ、今だってそのままだ。

engChrName: No need to worry about it. Trust me, you're not getting rid of me that easy.
engSearchText:
No need to worry about it. Trust me, you're not
getting rid of me that easy.
jpnChrName: だからお前の案ずる事じゃねぇよシド。 お前は今まで通りオレを信じやがれ。
jpnSearchText:
だからお前の案ずる事じゃねぇよシド。
お前は今まで通りオレを信じやがれ。

engChrName: Haha... It does make me feel better, hearing you say that.
engSearchText:
Haha... It does make me feel better, hearing you
say that.
jpnChrName: アーロン……はは、そう言ってもらえると 俺も不思議と気が楽になるな。
jpnSearchText:
アーロン……はは、そう言ってもらえると
俺も不思議と気が楽になるな。

engChrName: You're amazing, you know that? Please never change.
engSearchText: You're amazing, you know that? Please never change.
jpnChrName: やっぱりアーロンはスゲェよ…… どうか、この後の事も……頼むぜ。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱりアーロンはスゲェよ……
どうか、この後の事も……頼むぜ。

engChrName: I wish I could tag along, but my injuries...
engSearchText: I wish I could tag along, but my injuries...
jpnChrName: 怪我で同行できないのが心苦しいが……
jpnSearchText: 怪我で同行できないのが心苦しいが……

engChrName: Don't worry about it, man. I'll make sure we never need to mourn anyone ever again.
engSearchText:
Don't worry about it, man. I'll make sure we never
need to mourn anyone ever again.
jpnChrName: 任せておけ、二度も仲間を喪うような 事だけは絶対にしねぇからよ。
jpnSearchText:
任せておけ、二度も仲間を喪うような
事だけは絶対にしねぇからよ。

engChrName: You can stick around, do your part. Help as much as you can. I'll take care of the rest.
engSearchText:
You can stick around, do your part. Help as much as
you can. I'll take care of the rest.
jpnChrName: お前は……無理のない範囲で この場を手伝っていてやれ。
jpnSearchText:
お前は……無理のない範囲で
この場を手伝っていてやれ。

engChrName: Take it easy, kid. I ain't gonna let this punk get hurt.
engSearchText: Take it easy, kid. I ain't gonna let this punk get hurt.
jpnChrName: ま、俺の方でもコイツの事は ちゃんと見ておいてやるさ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、俺の方でもコイツの事は
ちゃんと見ておいてやるさ。

engChrName: So let's hope that recklessness of his doesn't rub off on you.
engSearchText:
So let's hope that recklessness of his doesn't rub off
on you.
jpnChrName: お前も、あまり気に病み過ぎない事だ。
jpnSearchText: お前も、あまり気に病み過ぎない事だ。

engChrName: Yeah...okay!
engSearchText: Yeah...okay!
jpnChrName: ああ……わかった！
jpnSearchText: ああ……わかった！

engChrName: There's not too much we can do in this situation, so please...take care of Aaron for us.
engSearchText:
There's not too much we can do in this situation, so
please...take care of Aaron for us.
jpnChrName: どうか、改めてアーロンを頼む…… この状況で俺達に出来る事は少ねぇが……
jpnSearchText:
どうか、改めてアーロンを頼む……
この状況で俺達に出来る事は少ねぇが……

engChrName: I'm sure you guys can figure something out! We'll support you as much as we can from here.
engSearchText:
I'm sure you guys can figure something out!
We'll support you as much as we can from here.
jpnChrName: アーロンとあんたらならきっとやってくれるはずだ、 俺達はこの場で出来る事をするぜ……！
jpnSearchText:
アーロンとあんたらならきっとやってくれるはずだ、
俺達はこの場で出来る事をするぜ……！

engChrName: It's up to you. You helped us out back in Langport. I'm counting on you again.
engSearchText:
It's up to you. You helped us out back in Langport.
I'm counting on you again.
jpnChrName: あんた達……煌都の時も世話にはなったが、 改めて……アーロンの事を頼む。
jpnSearchText:
あんた達……煌都の時も世話にはなったが、
改めて……アーロンの事を頼む。

engChrName: Heard Aaron was being reckless again while I was out cold.
engSearchText:
Heard Aaron was being reckless again while I was
out cold.
jpnChrName: アーロン、あの時……俺が昏睡してた時も 無茶しやがったって聞くしな……
jpnSearchText:
アーロン、あの時……俺が昏睡してた時も
無茶しやがったって聞くしな……

engChrName: We've done a lousy job keeping an eye on him as part of his crew. I'm sorry.
engSearchText:
We've done a lousy job keeping an eye on him as part
of his crew. I'm sorry.
jpnChrName: これ以上あいつに……背負い込ませるのは 俺達としても申し訳ねぇんだ……
jpnSearchText:
これ以上あいつに……背負い込ませるのは
俺達としても申し訳ねぇんだ……

engChrName: Part of your crew, but don't go forgettin' he's my employee, too.
engSearchText:
Part of your crew, but don't go forgettin' he's my
employee, too.
jpnChrName: ああ……あいつはお前達の仲間だが、 今やウチの助手でもあるからな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……あいつはお前達の仲間だが、
今やウチの助手でもあるからな。

engChrName: I'll keep a tight leash on him. And I'll bring him back safe, so don't worry.
engSearchText:
I'll keep a tight leash on him. And I'll bring him back
safe, so don't worry.
jpnChrName: 俺が責任を持って連れ帰ってやる、 心配すんな。
jpnSearchText:
俺が責任を持って連れ帰ってやる、
心配すんな。

engChrName: Still, it really is pathetic that I'm always the one getting hurt.
engSearchText:
Still, it really is pathetic that I'm always the one
getting hurt.
jpnChrName: それにしても……またしても俺が 一番に怪我しちまうとは、情けねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても……またしても俺が
一番に怪我しちまうとは、情けねぇな。

engChrName: I feel bad for all Doctor Longkai has had to do for me...
engSearchText:
I feel bad for all Doctor Longkai has had to do
for me...
jpnChrName: これじゃあロンカイ先生にも 申し訳が立たねぇよ……
jpnSearchText:
これじゃあロンカイ先生にも
申し訳が立たねぇよ……

engChrName: I might've been able to help Aaron if I didn't get hurt so bad...
engSearchText:
I might've been able to help Aaron if I didn't get hurt
so bad...
jpnChrName: せめてもう少し軽傷なら…… 俺もアーロンの助力に……
jpnSearchText:
せめてもう少し軽傷なら……
俺もアーロンの助力に……

engChrName: I'm glad to hear you're enjoying your time in Edith.
engSearchText:
I'm glad to hear you're enjoying your
time in Edith.
jpnChrName: 何にせよアーロンは首都でも面白く やってるみてぇで何よりだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
何にせよアーロンは首都でも面白く
やってるみてぇで何よりだぜ。

engChrName: That's the Aaron we know and love! I can't wait for us all to get together and have a blast during the Revolution Festival!
engSearchText:
That's the Aaron we know and love! I can't wait for
us all to get together and have a blast during the
Revolution Festival!
jpnChrName: やっぱり俺達のアーロンはこうでなくっちゃな！ 記念祭も一層、一緒に盛り上がれるってモンだ！
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり俺達のアーロンはこうでなくっちゃな！
記念祭も一層、一緒に盛り上がれるってモンだ！

engChrName: Just the boys on the town! Let's go even more beast mode than we do during Lunar New Year in Langport!
engSearchText:
Just the boys on the town! Let's go even more beast
mode than we do during Lunar New Year
in Langport!
jpnChrName: 俺達らしく、煌都の新節以上にド派手に 楽しもうじゃないかアーロン！
jpnSearchText:
俺達らしく、煌都の新節以上にド派手に
楽しもうじゃないかアーロン！

engChrName: It's good to see you being back to your old self. Sounds like a plan to me! Let's tear shit up!
engSearchText:
It's good to see you being back to your old self.
Sounds like a plan to me! Let's tear shit up!
jpnChrName: ハッ、お前もすっかり元の調子じゃねぇか。 良いぜ、一緒に楽しもうじゃねぇか。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、お前もすっかり元の調子じゃねぇか。
良いぜ、一緒に楽しもうじゃねぇか。

engChrName: No sense in just sulking around, anyway. Sei and Huang wouldn't want that.
engSearchText:
No sense in just sulking around, anyway. Sei and
Huang wouldn't want that.
jpnChrName: オレらがじんめりしてんのは、あの世の セイやホアンも望まねぇだろうしな。
jpnSearchText:
オレらがじんめりしてんのは、あの世の
セイやホアンも望まねぇだろうしな。

engChrName: You said it, man! C'mon everyone, let's really kick this Revolution Festival into gear!
engSearchText:
You said it, man! C'mon everyone, let's really kick
this Revolution Festival into gear!
jpnChrName: ああ、それでこそのアーロンだぜ！ さあ、お前達も記念祭を楽しもうじゃねぇか！
jpnSearchText:
ああ、それでこそのアーロンだぜ！
さあ、お前達も記念祭を楽しもうじゃねぇか！

row: Eastern Style Young Man & Eastern Style Girl
engChrName: Hell yeah!
engSearchText: Hell yeah!
engHtmlText: 東方風の青年＆東方風の娘
jpnChrName: おーっ！
jpnSearchText: おーっ！

engChrName: After everything that happened back in Langport, I can finally say things are almost back to normal. We still mourn Sei and Huang, of course.
engSearchText:
After everything that happened back in Langport, I
can finally say things are almost back to normal.
We still mourn Sei and Huang, of course.
jpnChrName: あの時の煌都では色々あったが、俺達もホアン達は しっかり弔えたし諸々のケジメもつけた。
jpnSearchText:
あの時の煌都では色々あったが、俺達もホアン達は
しっかり弔えたし諸々のケジメもつけた。

engChrName: But we can't grieve forever. And now that Aaron's here, it's almost like the crew's back to its glory days.
engSearchText:
But we can't grieve forever. And now that Aaron's
here, it's almost like the crew's back to its glory days.
jpnChrName: いつまでも引きずる訳にもいかないしな、 アーロンがいる以上、一緒に元気にやるまでだ。
jpnSearchText:
いつまでも引きずる訳にもいかないしな、
アーロンがいる以上、一緒に元気にやるまでだ。

engChrName: I'm sure Huang and Sei are smiling down on us now.
engSearchText: I'm sure Huang and Sei are smiling down on us now.
jpnChrName: 二人もきっと、それを望んでくれてるだろうよ。
jpnSearchText: 二人もきっと、それを望んでくれてるだろうよ。

engChrName: I'm glad to hear you're enjoying your time in Edith.
engSearchText:
I'm glad to hear you're enjoying your
time in Edith.
jpnChrName: 何にせよアーロンは首都でも面白く やってるみてぇで何よりだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
何にせよアーロンは首都でも面白く
やってるみてぇで何よりだぜ。

engChrName: That's the Aaron we know and love! We're all gonna have a blast during the Revolution Festival!
engSearchText:
That's the Aaron we know and love! We're all
gonna have a blast during the
Revolution Festival!
jpnChrName: やっぱり俺達のアーロンはこうでなくっちゃな！ 記念祭も一層、一緒に盛り上がれるってモンだ！
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり俺達のアーロンはこうでなくっちゃな！
記念祭も一層、一緒に盛り上がれるってモンだ！

engChrName: Just the boys on the town! Let's go even more beast mode than we do during Lunar New Year in Langport!
engSearchText:
Just the boys on the town! Let's go even more beast
mode than we do during Lunar New Year
in Langport!
jpnChrName: 俺達らしく、煌都の新節以上にド派手に 楽しもうじゃないかアーロン！
jpnSearchText:
俺達らしく、煌都の新節以上にド派手に
楽しもうじゃないかアーロン！

engChrName: It's good to see you being back to your old self. Sounds like a plan to me! Let's tear shit up!
engSearchText:
It's good to see you being back to your old self.
Sounds like a plan to me! Let's tear shit up!
jpnChrName: ハッ、お前もすっかり元の調子じゃねぇか。 良いぜ、一緒に楽しもうじゃねぇか。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、お前もすっかり元の調子じゃねぇか。
良いぜ、一緒に楽しもうじゃねぇか。

engChrName: No sense in just sulking around, anyway. Sei and Huang wouldn't want that.
engSearchText:
No sense in just sulking around, anyway. Sei and
Huang wouldn't want that.
jpnChrName: オレらがじんめりしてんのは、あの世の セイやホアンも望まねぇだろうしな。
jpnSearchText:
オレらがじんめりしてんのは、あの世の
セイやホアンも望まねぇだろうしな。

engChrName: You said it, man! C'mon everyone, let's really kick this Revolution Festival into gear!
engSearchText:
You said it, man! C'mon everyone, let's really kick
this Revolution Festival into gear!
jpnChrName: ああ、それでこそのアーロンだぜ！ さあ、お前達も記念祭を楽しもうじゃねぇか！
jpnSearchText:
ああ、それでこそのアーロンだぜ！
さあ、お前達も記念祭を楽しもうじゃねぇか！

row: Eastern Style Young Man & Eastern Style Girl
engChrName: Hell yeah!
engSearchText: Hell yeah!
engHtmlText: 東方風の青年＆東方風の娘
jpnChrName: おーっ！
jpnSearchText: おーっ！

engChrName: This would have never happened if I'd paid attention and realized this was a scam...
engSearchText:
This would have never happened if I'd paid attention
and realized this was a scam...
jpnChrName: もっと早く詐欺だと気付いていれば こんな事にならずに済んだのに……
jpnSearchText:
もっと早く詐欺だと気付いていれば
こんな事にならずに済んだのに……

engChrName: I'm sorry... Please, you have to help Lulua!
engSearchText: I'm sorry... Please, you have to help Lulua!
jpnChrName: すみませんが…… どうかルルアちゃんの事をお願いします……！
jpnSearchText:
すみませんが……
どうかルルアちゃんの事をお願いします……！

engChrName: August 27th, 11:00AM
engSearchText: August 27th, 11:00AM

engChrName: Sixth District, Riverside
engSearchText: Sixth District, Riverside
jpnChrName: 首都イーディス六区　リバーサイド
jpnSearchText: 首都イーディス六区　リバーサイド

engChrName: Wow. This place is so gorgeous.
engSearchText: Wow. This place is so gorgeous.
jpnChrName: わぁ……素敵な所ですね。
jpnSearchText: わぁ……素敵な所ですね。

engChrName: Believe it or not, I've never actually visited this district before.
engSearchText:
Believe it or not, I've never actually visited this
district before.
jpnChrName: 噂は聞いていましたけど、 初めて来ました。
jpnSearchText:
噂は聞いていましたけど、
初めて来ました。

engChrName: It's a pretty chill spot. There ain't much hustle and bustle...
engSearchText:
It's a pretty chill spot. There ain't much hustle and
bustle...
jpnChrName: 中心部からは外れてるから 繁華街みたいに騒がしくはねえな。
jpnSearchText:
中心部からは外れてるから
繁華街みたいに騒がしくはねえな。

engChrName: ...and that makes it a perfect hangout for more...disreputable characters.
engSearchText:
...and that makes it a perfect hangout for
more...disreputable characters.
jpnChrName: 色々面白い店もあるが…… 静かな分、たまに怪しげな連中も来る。
jpnSearchText:
色々面白い店もあるが……
静かな分、たまに怪しげな連中も来る。

engChrName: I'm included in that category, by the way.
engSearchText: I'm included in that category, by the way.
jpnChrName: 俺なんかも含めてな。
jpnSearchText: 俺なんかも含めてな。

engChrName: Ahaha... And I assume the man we're meeting is as well?
engSearchText:
Ahaha... And I assume the man we're meeting is
as well?
jpnChrName: あはは…… えっと、その盗品に詳しい方も？
jpnSearchText:
あはは……
えっと、その盗品に詳しい方も？

engChrName: Yeah. That guy's nothing if not cautious. He's always jumping from hideout to hideout.
engSearchText:
Yeah. That guy's nothing if not cautious. He's
always jumping from hideout to hideout.
jpnChrName: ああ、用心深いオッサンで 幾つかのヤサを転々としていてな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、用心深いオッサンで
幾つかのヤサを転々としていてな。

engChrName: Though around this time on Wednesdays, he likes to go out and grab somethin' from one of the stalls.
engSearchText:
Though around this time on Wednesdays, he likes
to go out and grab somethin' from one of the stalls.
jpnChrName: 水曜の昼は、下の屋台あたりで 済ませることが多かった筈だ。
jpnSearchText:
水曜の昼は、下の屋台あたりで
済ませることが多かった筈だ。

engChrName: No sign of him yet...
engSearchText: No sign of him yet...
jpnChrName: ……まだ来てないみたいだな。
jpnSearchText: ……まだ来てないみたいだな。

engChrName: ...but he'll come out to play sooner or later. Let's just wander around until he shows his ugly mug.
engSearchText:
...but he'll come out to play sooner or later. Let's
just wander around until he shows his ugly mug.
jpnChrName: このあたりを適当に周りながら 現れるのを待つぞ。
jpnSearchText:
このあたりを適当に周りながら
現れるのを待つぞ。

engChrName: That sounds like a plan.
engSearchText: That sounds like a plan.
jpnChrName: はい、分かりました。
jpnSearchText: はい、分かりました。

engChrName: Oh, right. He's an acquaintance of yours, correct?
engSearchText: Oh, right. He's an acquaintance of yours, correct?
jpnChrName: ……えっと、その方は一応 ヴァンさんのお知り合いなんですよね？
jpnSearchText:
……えっと、その方は一応
ヴァンさんのお知り合いなんですよね？

engChrName: If he's supplying us with information, I'm guessing he'll want something in return.
engSearchText:
If he's supplying us with information, I'm guessing
he'll want something in return.
jpnChrName: もし情報提供をしてくださったら それなりの謝礼をした方が──
jpnSearchText:
もし情報提供をしてくださったら
それなりの謝礼をした方が──

engChrName: Probably. Oh, and I forgot to mention somethin'.
engSearchText: Probably. Oh, and I forgot to mention somethin'.
jpnChrName: ああ、言い忘れてたぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、言い忘れてたぜ。

engChrName: Hmm?
engSearchText: Hmm?

engChrName: That guy might know his stuff—and it's possible that he'll lend us a hand—but don't forget that he's a real piece of shit.
engSearchText:
That guy might know his stuff—and it's possible
that he'll lend us a hand—but don't forget that he's
a real piece of shit.
jpnChrName: そのオッサン── 盗品に詳しい情報屋はゲス野郎だ。
jpnSearchText:
そのオッサン──
盗品に詳しい情報屋はゲス野郎だ。

engChrName: The man knows no loyalties. Give him a bag of mira, and that rat bastard'll sell anyone out. Doesn't matter if they're friend, foe, or even family.
engSearchText:
The man knows no loyalties. Give him a bag of
mira, and that rat bastard'll sell anyone out.
Doesn't matter if they're friend, foe, or even family.
jpnChrName: 金（ミラ）のためなら親兄弟だって売るし、 ヤツのために破滅した連中は山程いる。
jpnSearchText:
金（ミラ）のためなら親兄弟だって売るし、
ヤツのために破滅した連中は山程いる。

engChrName: I recommend lettin' me do most of the talking, and no matter what, don't give him anything he could use against you.
engSearchText:
I recommend lettin' me do most of the talking, and
no matter what, don't give him anything he could
use against you.
jpnChrName: 探りを入れるのは俺に任せて あんたは隙を見せずに応対してくれ。
jpnSearchText:
探りを入れるのは俺に任せて
あんたは隙を見せずに応対してくれ。

engChrName: D-Duly noted.
engSearchText: D-Duly noted.
jpnChrName: りょ、了解しました……
jpnSearchText: りょ、了解しました……

engChrName: Expanding the Minimap
engSearchText: Expanding the Minimap
jpnChrName: ～ミニマップの拡大表示について～
jpnSearchText: <C1>～ミニマップの拡大表示について～

engChrName: Press  to expand the minimap.
engSearchText: Press  to expand the minimap.
jpnChrName: を押すと、ミニマップを 拡大して見ることができます。
jpnSearchText:
を押すと、ミニマップを
拡大して見ることができます。

engChrName: This feature will let you see the specific locations of surrounding facilities and the geography of the area more clearly.
engSearchText:
This feature will let you see the specific locations of
surrounding facilities and the geography of the area
more clearly.
jpnChrName: 周囲の地形や各種位置情報を より詳しく見たい時に活用して下さい。
jpnSearchText:
周囲の地形や各種位置情報を
より詳しく見たい時に活用して下さい。

engChrName: Nice. We got a hit.
engSearchText: Nice. We got a hit.
jpnChrName: ……ハッ、お出でなすったか。
jpnSearchText: ……ハッ、お出でなすったか。

engChrName: A hit?
engSearchText: A hit?
jpnChrName: えっ……
jpnSearchText: えっ……

engChrName: Oh, you mean that man. Is he the one we're looking for?
engSearchText:
Oh, you mean that man. Is he the one we're
looking for?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、 ひょっとしてあの方が……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん、
ひょっとしてあの方が……

engChrName: Sure is. Let's go see what we can get outta him.
engSearchText: Sure is. Let's go see what we can get outta him.
jpnChrName: ああ、例のオッサンだ。 声を掛けてみるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、例のオッサンだ。
声を掛けてみるぞ。

engChrName: *munch* What to do, what to do...
engSearchText: *munch* What to do, what to do...
engHtmlText: ハンチング帽の中年男
jpnChrName: モグモグ…… さーて、どうしたもんか。
jpnSearchText:
モグモグ……
さーて、どうしたもんか。

engChrName: They haven't caught on to me yet, don't think. If I can pull this off, I'm gonna be SO rich...
engSearchText:
They haven't caught on to me yet, don't think. If I
can pull this off, I'm gonna be SO rich...
engHtmlText: ハンチング帽の中年男
jpnChrName: 連中には悟られてねえ筈だし 上手く吹っかけられりゃあ──
jpnSearchText:
連中には悟られてねえ筈だし
上手く吹っかけられりゃあ──

engChrName: What's goin' on, Giacomo?
engSearchText: What's goin' on, Giacomo?
jpnChrName: よう、ジャコモのオッサン。
jpnSearchText: よう、ジャコモのオッサン。

engChrName: The hell do you want, Arkride?
engSearchText: The hell do you want, Arkride?
engHtmlText: ハンチング帽の中年男
jpnChrName: てめえか…… アークライドの小僧。
jpnSearchText:
てめえか……
アークライドの小僧。

engChrName: Any time you want me, it leads me to nothin' but trouble.
engSearchText:
Any time you want me, it leads me to nothin'
but trouble.
jpnChrName: 何の用だ、この疫病神が。
jpnSearchText: 何の用だ、この疫病神が。

engChrName: Damn. Some way to greet an old friend.
engSearchText: Damn. Some way to greet an old friend.
jpnChrName: 疫病神とはご挨拶だな。 知らぬ仲でもあるまいしよ。
jpnSearchText:
疫病神とはご挨拶だな。
知らぬ仲でもあるまいしよ。

engChrName: And here I thought our last job together ended pretty well for both of us.
engSearchText:
And here I thought our last job together ended pretty
well for both of us.
jpnChrName: 前回のヤマだってお互い 悪くない落とし所だっただろう？
jpnSearchText:
前回のヤマだってお互い
悪くない落とし所だっただろう？

engChrName: You kiddin' me?!
engSearchText: You kiddin' me?!
jpnChrName: な、何が悪くないだ！
jpnSearchText: な、何が悪くないだ！

engChrName: I would've made bank from that old hag if you hadn't got in my way!
