engSearchText:
I would've made bank from that old hag if you hadn't
got in my way!
jpnChrName: てめえが横槍入れてくれたおかげで あのババアからの臨時収入がフイだ！
jpnSearchText:
てめえが横槍入れてくれたおかげで
あのババアからの臨時収入がフイだ！

engChrName: We're supposed to be in the same business, here!
engSearchText: We're supposed to be in the same business, here!
jpnChrName: 裏稼業同士としての 仁義が通ると思ってんのか！？
jpnSearchText:
裏稼業同士としての
仁義が通ると思ってんのか！？

engChrName: I got my job, and you got yours. 'Sides, you got what was comin' to you 'cause you got greedy.
engSearchText:
I got my job, and you got yours. 'Sides, you got what
was comin' to you 'cause you got greedy.
jpnChrName: こっちも仕事だからな。 欲をかきすぎたアンタが悪いのさ。
jpnSearchText:
こっちも仕事だからな。
欲をかきすぎたアンタが悪いのさ。

engChrName: Anyway—why not let bygones be bygones so we can talk us some business?
engSearchText:
Anyway—why not let bygones be bygones so we can
talk us some business?
jpnChrName: それはそうと──過去は水に流して 未来のビジネスの話でもしねえか？
jpnSearchText:
それはそうと──過去は水に流して
未来のビジネスの話でもしねえか？

engChrName: Oh, yeah?
engSearchText: Oh, yeah?
jpnChrName: ビジネスだぁ……？
jpnSearchText: ビジネスだぁ……？

engChrName: Wait. Who's the pretty thing with you?
engSearchText: Wait. Who's the pretty thing with you?
jpnChrName: って、えらく可愛らしいのを 連れてんじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
って、えらく可愛らしいのを
連れてんじゃねえか。

engChrName: You hangin' out with schoolkids now?
engSearchText: You hangin' out with schoolkids now?
jpnChrName: しかもその制服は……
jpnSearchText: しかもその制服は……

engChrName: M-My name is Agnès Claudel. It's nice to meet you, sir.
engSearchText:
M-My name is Agnès Claudel. It's nice to meet
you, sir.
jpnChrName: は、初めまして。 アニエス・クローデルと申します。
jpnSearchText:
は、初めまして。
アニエス・クローデルと申します。

engChrName: Don't worry about it. She's a client.
engSearchText: Don't worry about it. She's a client.
jpnChrName: ああ、いいから。 ──彼女は俺の依頼人（クライアント）でな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、いいから。
──彼女は俺の依頼人（クライアント）でな。

engChrName: Wanted me to help her look for something.
engSearchText: Wanted me to help her look for something.
jpnChrName: ちょっとした捜し物をしてるんだよ。
jpnSearchText: ちょっとした捜し物をしてるんだよ。

engChrName: That so...?
engSearchText: That so...?
jpnChrName: 捜し物……
jpnSearchText: 捜し物……

engChrName: ...Huh.
engSearchText: ...Huh.
jpnChrName: ………はあん？
jpnSearchText: ………はあん？

engChrName: It's an orbment that was stolen from an antique shop a week ago.
engSearchText:
It's an orbment that was stolen from an antique shop
a week ago.
jpnChrName: 一週間前に某古物商から盗まれた 骨董品めいた導力器（オーブメント）らしい。
jpnSearchText:
一週間前に某古物商から盗まれた
骨董品めいた導力器（オーブメント）らしい。

engChrName: Sounds like it was stolen right when it got to them, too, so they didn't tell the cops about it.
engSearchText:
Sounds like it was stolen right when it got to them,
too, so they didn't tell the cops about it.
jpnChrName: 元々盗品だったらしいから届け出はナシ。
jpnSearchText: 元々盗品だったらしいから届け出はナシ。

engChrName: Judging by how the robbery went down, my guess is it's the work of some local gang.
engSearchText:
Judging by how the robbery went down, my guess is
it's the work of some local gang.
jpnChrName: ま、荒らされた時のやり口を見るに どこぞの半グレあたりの仕業なんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ま、荒らされた時のやり口を見るに
どこぞの半グレあたりの仕業なんだろう。

engChrName: Whole thing feels like your wheelhouse, yeah?
engSearchText: Whole thing feels like your wheelhouse, yeah?
jpnChrName: ───アンタの得意分野だろ？
jpnSearchText: ───アンタの得意分野だろ？

engChrName: Sure does.
engSearchText: Sure does.
jpnChrName: ふむふむ、成程なぁ。
jpnSearchText: ふむふむ、成程なぁ。

engChrName: Normally I'd jump at a job like this, but I'm comin' up empty on clues.
engSearchText:
Normally I'd jump at a job like this, but I'm comin'
up empty on clues.
jpnChrName: ……なかなかソソる話だが、 あいにく心当たりはねぇなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
……なかなかソソる話だが、
あいにく心当たりはねぇなぁ。

engChrName: I got my hands full with another job at the moment... though if I looked into it, I'm sure I could find SOMETHING.
engSearchText:
I got my hands full with another job at the moment...
though if I looked into it, I'm sure I could
find SOMETHING.
jpnChrName: ちょうど別のヤマで忙しくてよ。 少し当たりゃあ掴めるかもしれねえが。
jpnSearchText:
ちょうど別のヤマで忙しくてよ。
少し当たりゃあ掴めるかもしれねえが。

engChrName: Y-You really think so?!
engSearchText: Y-You really think so?!
jpnChrName: ……！　本当ですか！？
jpnSearchText: ……！　本当ですか！？

engChrName: Heh. What can I say, young lady? I'm good at what I do.
engSearchText:
Heh. What can I say, young lady? I'm good at what
I do.
jpnChrName: おお、オジサンはこう見えても 腕利きの情報屋だからなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
おお、オジサンはこう見えても
腕利きの情報屋だからなぁ。

engChrName: So what's the deal with it? You look like you're an upstanding type—what's this orbment got to do with you?
engSearchText:
So what's the deal with it? You look like you're an
upstanding type—what's this orbment got to do
with you?
jpnChrName: ちなみにどういった品なんだい？ 良いところのお嬢ちゃんみたいだが。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにどういった品なんだい？
良いところのお嬢ちゃんみたいだが。

engChrName: It's a memento of my great-grandfather. I'm not at liberty to discuss how it left our possession.
engSearchText:
It's a memento of my great-grandfather. I'm not at
liberty to discuss how it left our possession.
jpnChrName: その……曾祖父の遺品なんです。 とある事情で手放されたもので……
jpnSearchText:
その……曾祖父の遺品なんです。
とある事情で手放されたもので……

engChrName: Or much else about it, I'm afraid. I'm sorry.
engSearchText: Or much else about it, I'm afraid. I'm sorry.
jpnChrName: ……済みません、 詳しいことは話せないんですが。
jpnSearchText:
……済みません、
詳しいことは話せないんですが。

engChrName: Heh. Real sweet of ya to care about him that much.
engSearchText: Heh. Real sweet of ya to care about him that much.
jpnChrName: ほうほう、よく分からんがお嬢ちゃんが ひい祖父ちゃん想いということは分かった。
jpnSearchText:
ほうほう、よく分からんがお嬢ちゃんが
ひい祖父ちゃん想いということは分かった。

engChrName: All right, now. Here's an idea: how 'bout you leave the whole thing to me?
engSearchText:
All right, now. Here's an idea: how 'bout you leave
the whole thing to me?
jpnChrName: そこで相談なんだが…… この件、オジサンに任せる気はないか？
jpnSearchText:
そこで相談なんだが……
この件、オジサンに任せる気はないか？

engChrName: I bet I'll be a lot more help at this kinda thing than Arkride ever will.
engSearchText:
I bet I'll be a lot more help at this kinda thing than
Arkride ever will.
jpnChrName: この手の話なら、そこの若造なんぞより よっぽど頼りになると思うぞ？
jpnSearchText:
この手の話なら、そこの若造なんぞより
よっぽど頼りになると思うぞ？

engChrName: What?
engSearchText: What?
jpnChrName: えっ……
jpnSearchText: えっ……

engChrName: I'm sorry. I appreciate the offer, but I'd like to trust him with this.
engSearchText:
I'm sorry. I appreciate the offer, but I'd like to trust
him with this.
jpnChrName: ……申し訳ありません。 アークライド所長にお任せしているので。
jpnSearchText:
……申し訳ありません。
アークライド所長にお任せしているので。

engChrName: I also need him to confirm the veracity of any information gathered as well.
engSearchText:
I also need him to confirm the veracity of any
information gathered as well.
jpnChrName: 集めた情報の真偽も含めて 相談させていただこうと思っています。
jpnSearchText:
集めた情報の真偽も含めて
相談させていただこうと思っています。

engChrName: (Heh.)
engSearchText: (Heh.)

engChrName: That's that Aramis brain right there—one look at the uniform'll tell you she's smarter than your average kid.
engSearchText:
That's that Aramis brain right there—one look at the
uniform'll tell you she's smarter than your average kid.
jpnChrName: ま、名門校の学生さんだけあって 見た目よりはしっかりしてるって事だ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、名門校の学生さんだけあって
見た目よりはしっかりしてるって事だ。

engChrName: Anyway, if you do catch wind of anything, gimme a call. You'll get your cut for it.
engSearchText:
Anyway, if you do catch wind of anything, gimme
a call. You'll get your cut for it.
jpnChrName: 心当たりがあれば俺の方に連絡をくれ。 ネタに見合った情報料は仲介するからよ。
jpnSearchText:
心当たりがあれば俺の方に連絡をくれ。
ネタに見合った情報料は仲介するからよ。

engChrName: Hmph.
engSearchText: Hmph.
jpnChrName: ハン……何か入ってきたらな。
jpnSearchText: ハン……何か入ってきたらな。

engChrName: Well, see you 'round, girly. If you ever change your mind, you know where to find me.
engSearchText:
Well, see you 'round, girly. If you ever change your
mind, you know where to find me.
jpnChrName: そんじゃあな、お嬢ちゃん。 気が変わったらオジサンを頼ってくれよ～。
jpnSearchText:
そんじゃあな、お嬢ちゃん。
気が変わったらオジサンを頼ってくれよ～。

engChrName: Sorry. Did I talk a little too much?
engSearchText: Sorry. Did I talk a little too much?
jpnChrName: ……済みません。 話しすぎ、だったでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
……済みません。
話しすぎ、だったでしょうか？

engChrName: I'd give you about a seven out of ten.
engSearchText: I'd give you about a seven out of ten.
jpnChrName: ７０点ってトコだな。
jpnSearchText: ７０点ってトコだな。

engChrName: Average?
engSearchText: Average?
jpnChrName: え。
jpnSearchText: え。

engChrName: You did give him your name and some bare minimum info—made it look like you were an easy target...
engSearchText:
You did give him your name and some bare minimum
info—made it look like you were an easy target...
jpnChrName: 身元と最低限の手札は明かして 上手い具合に隙を見せながら──
jpnSearchText:
身元と最低限の手札は明かして
上手い具合に隙を見せながら──

engChrName: ...but when it came down to it, you backed me up and knew where to draw the line.
engSearchText:
...but when it came down to it, you backed me up and
knew where to draw the line.
jpnChrName: 俺という世慣れた協力者を立てて 締めるべきところは締める。
jpnSearchText:
俺という世慣れた協力者を立てて
締めるべきところは締める。

engChrName: I'm guessin' you were pretty aware of what you were doing, huh?
engSearchText:
I'm guessin' you were pretty aware of what you were
doing, huh?
jpnChrName: 半分以上は意図的だっただろう？
jpnSearchText: 半分以上は意図的だっただろう？

engChrName: Well, I...
engSearchText: Well, I...
jpnChrName: そ、それは──
jpnSearchText: そ、それは──

engChrName: I do have an idea of how to conduct myself in situations like these, yes.
engSearchText:
I do have an idea of how to conduct myself in
situations like these, yes.
jpnChrName: ………はい。 小娘の浅知恵ですけど。
jpnSearchText:
………はい。
小娘の浅知恵ですけど。

engChrName: I just don't know if there's much hope he'll contact us with his attitude by the end.
engSearchText:
I just don't know if there's much hope he'll contact us
with his attitude by the end.
jpnChrName: でも、あの様子だと いつ連絡があるか分かりませんね。
jpnSearchText:
でも、あの様子だと
いつ連絡があるか分かりませんね。

engChrName: Doesn't matter if we don't hear a peep. This ain't hangin' on him.
engSearchText:
Doesn't matter if we don't hear a peep. This ain't
hangin' on him.
jpnChrName: 待つ必要はねえさ。
jpnSearchText: 待つ必要はねえさ。

engChrName: All we gotta do is wait for him to slip up... then pounce.
engSearchText:
All we gotta do is wait for him to slip up...
then pounce.
jpnChrName: このままヤツが尻尾を出すのを 掴んじまえばいいんだからな。
jpnSearchText:
このままヤツが尻尾を出すのを
掴んじまえばいいんだからな。

engChrName: A story about an antique shop getting an old memento stolen by a gang? Couldn't have baited him with a better prospect of a payday.
engSearchText:
A story about an antique shop getting an old
memento stolen by a gang? Couldn't have baited him
with a better prospect of a payday.
jpnChrName: 古物商、半グレによる犯行、 あんたの曾祖父の遺品という情報……
jpnSearchText:
古物商、半グレによる犯行、
あんたの曾祖父の遺品という情報……

engChrName: He couldn't even hide he was interested—so why'd he never bother to follow up with any questions?
engSearchText:
He couldn't even hide he was interested—so why'd he
never bother to follow up with any questions?
jpnChrName: 儲け話に絡みたい下心を見せながら ぜんぶ中途半端に流しやがった。
jpnSearchText:
儲け話に絡みたい下心を見せながら
ぜんぶ中途半端に流しやがった。

engChrName: Never so much as asked for a copy of the photo. That just seals the deal in my book.
engSearchText:
Never so much as asked for a copy of the photo.
That just seals the deal in my book.
jpnChrName: 決め手は受け取りもしなかった、 例の画像のコピーだ。
jpnSearchText:
決め手は受け取りもしなかった、
例の画像のコピーだ。

engChrName: Oh!
engSearchText: Oh!

engChrName: So you think he's already involved in some way. Perhaps even directly!
engSearchText:
So you think he's already involved in some way.
Perhaps even directly!
jpnChrName: ……何らかの形で既に関わっている、 もしくは当事者そのもの……？
jpnSearchText:
……何らかの形で既に関わっている、
もしくは当事者そのもの……？

engChrName: He's laid eyes on the thing, at the very least.
engSearchText: He's laid eyes on the thing, at the very least.
jpnChrName: 少なくとも現物を見てる可能性は高い。
jpnSearchText: 少なくとも現物を見てる可能性は高い。

engChrName: So we're goin' after him.
engSearchText: So we're goin' after him.
jpnChrName: ──てわけで追いかけるぞ。
jpnSearchText: ──てわけで追いかけるぞ。

engChrName: Right now?
engSearchText: Right now?
jpnChrName: ええっ……！？
jpnSearchText: ええっ……！？

engChrName: But how are we going to find him? All we know is that he went that way.
engSearchText:
But how are we going to find him? All we know is
that he went that way.
jpnChrName: で、でもどちらに…… あっちの方に行ったみたいですけど。
jpnSearchText:
で、でもどちらに……
あっちの方に行ったみたいですけど。

engChrName: I told you, he likes to rotate his spots, right?
engSearchText: I told you, he likes to rotate his spots, right?
jpnChrName: さっきも言ったが 色々なヤサを用意している野郎でな。
jpnSearchText:
さっきも言ったが
色々なヤサを用意している野郎でな。

engChrName: One of his hideouts just so happens to be in this district.
engSearchText:
One of his hideouts just so happens to be in
this district.
jpnChrName: このリバーサイドにも ちょっとした拠点があった筈だ。
jpnSearchText:
このリバーサイドにも
ちょっとした拠点があった筈だ。

engChrName: It's far enough from here, he won't think he'll be followed, either. So come on.
engSearchText:
It's far enough from here, he won't think he'll be
followed, either. So come on.
jpnChrName: 距離は十分に離した、行ってみるぞ。
jpnSearchText: 距離は十分に離した、行ってみるぞ。

engChrName: C-Coming!
engSearchText: C-Coming!
jpnChrName: は、はい……！
jpnSearchText: は、はい……！

engChrName: About the Notebook
engSearchText: About the Notebook
jpnChrName: ～手帳メニューとヘルプの再確認について～
jpnSearchText: <C1>～手帳メニューとヘルプの再確認について～

engChrName: Press  to open the notebook.
engSearchText: Press  to open the notebook.
jpnChrName: （タッチパッドボタン）を押すと 『ノートメニュー』が開きます。
jpnSearchText:
（タッチパッドボタン）を押すと
『ノートメニュー』が開きます。

engChrName: You can also view any tutorial graphics you've already seen from the Help section of this menu.
engSearchText:
You can also view any tutorial graphics you've already
seen from the Help section of this menu.
jpnChrName: ゲーム内で確認したヘルプは、ノートメニューの 『ヘルプ』タブから再び見ることができます。
jpnSearchText:
ゲーム内で確認したヘルプは、ノートメニューの
『ヘルプ』タブから再び見ることができます。

engChrName: Is this the place?
engSearchText: Is this the place?
jpnChrName: ここが……
jpnSearchText: ここが……

engChrName: This doesn't lead into any ordinary building, I'm assuming.
engSearchText:
This doesn't lead into any ordinary building,
I'm assuming.
jpnChrName: ……えっと、 普通の扉じゃありませんよね？
jpnSearchText:
……えっと、
普通の扉じゃありませんよね？

engChrName: Yep. The subway company's in charge of this door and everything beyond.
engSearchText:
Yep. The subway company's in charge of this door
and everything beyond.
jpnChrName: ああ、地下鉄公社が管理するゲートだ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、地下鉄公社が管理するゲートだ。

engChrName: But the lock got switched, so now you don't even need a key to get in if you know the trick to it.
engSearchText:
But the lock got switched, so now you don't even
need a key to get in if you know the trick to it.
jpnChrName: ──既にロック周りが差し替えられてて、 鍵無しでもちょっとしたコツで解除できる。
jpnSearchText:
──既にロック周りが差し替えられてて、
鍵無しでもちょっとしたコツで解除できる。

engChrName: B-But doesn't that mean we'll be trespassing?
engSearchText: B-But doesn't that mean we'll be trespassing?
jpnChrName: そ、そんな事が…… でも、不法侵入になるんじゃ……！？
jpnSearchText:
そ、そんな事が……
でも、不法侵入になるんじゃ……！？

engChrName: Ehh. It's not ILLegal, but I'm not gonna say the authorities'll be quick to agree on that point. If you wanna turn back...
engSearchText:
Ehh. It's not ILLegal, but I'm not gonna say the
authorities'll be quick to agree on that point. If you
wanna turn back...
jpnChrName: 不法までは行かないがグレーだな。 あんたは止めておくか？
jpnSearchText:
不法までは行かないがグレーだな。
あんたは止めておくか？

engChrName: No. I'm going with you.
engSearchText: No. I'm going with you.
jpnChrName: ……大丈夫です。 連れて行ってください。
jpnSearchText:
……大丈夫です。
連れて行ってください。

engChrName: Good on you. Then watch your footing.
engSearchText: Good on you. Then watch your footing.
jpnChrName: 上等だ、足元には気をつけろよ。
jpnSearchText: 上等だ、足元には気をつけろよ。

engChrName: August 27th, 4:39PM
engSearchText: August 27th, 4:39PM

engChrName: Looks like they still have it cordoned off.
engSearchText: Looks like they still have it cordoned off.
jpnChrName: ……やっぱりまだ 封鎖されているみたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
……やっぱりまだ
封鎖されているみたいですね。

engChrName: What do you think will happen to Giacomo?
engSearchText: What do you think will happen to Giacomo?
jpnChrName: その、ジャコモさんは……
jpnSearchText: その、ジャコモさんは……

engChrName: They should've already had his body taken out for an autopsy a while ago.
engSearchText:
They should've already had his body taken out for an
autopsy a while ago.
jpnChrName: とっくに運び出されて 検死に回されてるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
とっくに運び出されて
検死に回されてるだろう。

engChrName: But you don't need to be an expert to see whoever slit his throat was a pro.
engSearchText:
But you don't need to be an expert to see whoever slit
his throat was a pro.
jpnChrName: あの鮮やかな切り口…… かなりの手練れの仕事だったな。
jpnSearchText:
あの鮮やかな切り口……
かなりの手練れの仕事だったな。

engChrName: So...where, exactly, are we going?
engSearchText: So...where, exactly, are we going?
jpnChrName: それで…… “別筋”というのは？
jpnSearchText:
それで……
“別筋”というのは？

engChrName: The café and bar over there.
engSearchText: The café and bar over there.
jpnChrName: あっちのカフェバーだ。
jpnSearchText: あっちのカフェバーだ。

engChrName: Oh? Is it open now?
engSearchText: Oh? Is it open now?
jpnChrName: あ…… 営業を始めたんですね。
jpnSearchText:
あ……
営業を始めたんですね。

engChrName: About to be. Today's hours should be from 5PM to 2AM.
engSearchText:
About to be. Today's hours should be from 5PM
to 2AM.
jpnChrName: 今日は１７時開店、 ２６時閉店ってトコだろう。
jpnSearchText:
今日は１７時開店、
２６時閉店ってトコだろう。

engChrName: Might be better to kill a little time before going in. He's probably still settin' up for the evening.
engSearchText:
Might be better to kill a little time before going in.
He's probably still settin' up for the evening.
jpnChrName: 開店準備中かもしれんが、 適当に時間を潰して行ってみるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
開店準備中かもしれんが、
適当に時間を潰して行ってみるぞ。

engChrName: Oh, sure.
engSearchText: Oh, sure.
jpnChrName: わ、分かりました。
jpnSearchText: わ、分かりました。

engChrName: (Looks like he's still getting ready to open. Should I go in anyway or keep wanderin' around?)
engSearchText:
(Looks like he's still getting ready to open. Should I
go in anyway or keep wanderin' around?)
jpnChrName: （準備中か……気にするヤツじゃねえが   少し間を置いてから入るか？）
jpnSearchText:
（準備中か……気にするヤツじゃねえが
少し間を置いてから入るか？）

engChrName: The main story will advance upon entering the café.
engSearchText: The main story will advance upon entering the café.
jpnChrName: この店を訪ねるとメインストーリーが 進むので注意してください。
jpnSearchText:
この店を訪ねるとメインストーリーが
進むので注意してください。

engChrName: Well! Hello again, handsome.
engSearchText: Well! Hello again, handsome.
jpnChrName: あらぁ、いらっしゃーい♪
jpnSearchText: あらぁ、いらっしゃーい♪

engChrName: I've been waiting for you. I figured you'd show up early enough.
engSearchText:
I've been waiting for you. I figured you'd show up
early enough.
jpnChrName: 待っていたわよ、ヴァンちゃん❤ そろそろ来るんじゃないかと思ったわ。
jpnSearchText:
待っていたわよ、ヴァンちゃん❤
そろそろ来るんじゃないかと思ったわ。

engChrName: I suppose the girl next to you is your client? She suits that uniform to a tee.
engSearchText:
I suppose the girl next to you is your client? She suits
that uniform to a tee.
jpnChrName: そっちのカワイコちゃんが依頼者かしら？ うふふっ、制服が似合ってるわねぇ～。
jpnSearchText:
そっちのカワイコちゃんが依頼者かしら？
うふふっ、制服が似合ってるわねぇ～。

engChrName: Oh... Umm... H-Hello.
engSearchText: Oh... Umm... H-Hello.

engChrName: Come on... We only just walked in the door and you already got her read.
engSearchText:
Come on... We only just walked in the door and you
already got her read.
jpnChrName: ったく、挨拶早々、 見透かしてくるんじゃねえよ。
jpnSearchText:
ったく、挨拶早々、
見透かしてくるんじゃねえよ。

engChrName: My name's Bermotti, sweetheart. I'm the owner and bartender of this fine establishment.
engSearchText:
My name's Bermotti, sweetheart. I'm the owner and
bartender of this fine establishment.
jpnChrName: アタシはベルモッティ、 このお店のオーナー兼バーテンダーでね。
jpnSearchText:
アタシはベルモッティ、
このお店のオーナー兼バーテンダーでね。

engChrName: Van and I have a very...special relationship. ❤
engSearchText: Van and I have a very...special relationship. ❤
jpnChrName: ヴァンちゃんとは只ならぬ関係でもあるわ❤
jpnSearchText: ヴァンちゃんとは只ならぬ関係でもあるわ❤

engChrName: You have a boyfriend?
engSearchText: You have a boyfriend?
jpnChrName: ええっ……！？
jpnSearchText: ええっ……！？

engChrName: We just scratch each other's backs, that's all. Helps that he makes some of the best coffee and cocktails in town.
engSearchText:
We just scratch each other's backs, that's all.
Helps that he makes some of the best coffee and
cocktails in town.
jpnChrName: 持ちつ持たれつの関係ってだけだ。 ここのコーヒーとカクテルは絶品だがな。
jpnSearchText:
持ちつ持たれつの関係ってだけだ。
ここのコーヒーとカクテルは絶品だがな。

engChrName: He's also a first-rate information dealer with a hell of a lotta fishy contacts.
engSearchText:
He's also a first-rate information dealer with a hell of
a lotta fishy contacts.
jpnChrName: 色々胡散臭いコネなんかもあって、 その筋じゃ“情報屋”としても有名だ。
jpnSearchText:
色々胡散臭いコネなんかもあって、
その筋じゃ“情報屋”としても有名だ。

engChrName: Oh, I see.
engSearchText: Oh, I see.

engChrName: My name is Agnès Claudel. It's a pleasure to meet you.
engSearchText:
My name is Agnès Claudel. It's a pleasure to
meet you.
jpnChrName: ──アニエス・クローデルと申します。 よろしくお願いします、ベルモッティさん。
jpnSearchText:
──アニエス・クローデルと申します。
よろしくお願いします、ベルモッティさん。

engChrName: Well, isn't she a polite one! What a lovely client you have today.
engSearchText:
Well, isn't she a polite one! What a lovely client you
have today.
jpnChrName: あらご丁寧に。 ヴァンちゃん、良いわねこの子❤
jpnSearchText:
あらご丁寧に。
ヴァンちゃん、良いわねこの子❤

engChrName: So I assume whatever led you here regards Giacomo?
engSearchText: So I assume whatever led you here regards Giacomo?
jpnChrName: どういう経緯かは置いておいて── ジャコモのオジサン絡みで来たのよね？
jpnSearchText:
どういう経緯かは置いておいて──
ジャコモのオジサン絡みで来たのよね？

engChrName: ...That's right.
engSearchText: ...That's right.

engChrName: Word travels fast.
engSearchText: Word travels fast.
jpnChrName: 既に一通りは掴んでいるよな？
jpnSearchText: 既に一通りは掴んでいるよな？

engChrName: Of course it would. The scene of the crime was practically in my front yard.
engSearchText:
Of course it would. The scene of the crime was
practically in my front yard.
jpnChrName: そりゃもう、目と鼻の先だし。
jpnSearchText: そりゃもう、目と鼻の先だし。

engChrName: I found him difficult to like as someone in the same trade...
engSearchText:
I found him difficult to like as someone in the
same trade...
jpnChrName: 同業者の風上にも置けない ロクデナシなオジサンだったけど……
jpnSearchText:
同業者の風上にも置けない
ロクデナシなオジサンだったけど……

engChrName: ...but I'd have never wished this on him—even if he did most likely bring it on himself.
engSearchText:
...but I'd have never wished this on him—even if he
did most likely bring it on himself.
jpnChrName: 流石に可哀想だったわよねぇ、 自業自得の可能性が高いとはいえ。
jpnSearchText:
流石に可哀想だったわよねぇ、
自業自得の可能性が高いとはいえ。

engChrName: What do you mean?
engSearchText: What do you mean?
jpnChrName: 自業自得……ですか？
jpnSearchText: 自業自得……ですか？

engChrName: So he did put his hand in the fire.
engSearchText: So he did put his hand in the fire.
jpnChrName: ハン、やっぱり 何かやらかしてたってワケか。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、やっぱり
何かやらかしてたってワケか。

engChrName: Guessin' it was last night?
engSearchText: Guessin' it was last night?
jpnChrName: ……ちなみに昨日の夜あたりか？
jpnSearchText: ……ちなみに昨日の夜あたりか？

engChrName: Well guessed. You're absolutely right.
engSearchText: Well guessed. You're absolutely right.
jpnChrName: よく分かるわねぇ、その通りよ。
jpnSearchText: よく分かるわねぇ、その通りよ。

engChrName: One of my sources tells me he tipped off the police.
engSearchText: One of my sources tells me he tipped off the police.
jpnChrName: その筋から入ってきたんだけど…… 彼、警察にタレコミしたそうでね。
jpnSearchText:
その筋から入ってきたんだけど……
彼、警察にタレコミしたそうでね。

engChrName: He said a criminal gang was in the midst of a massive drug deal.
engSearchText:
He said a criminal gang was in the midst of a massive
drug deal.
jpnChrName: 『巨額の薬物取引を半グレ集団が   行っている』って内容だったらしいわ。
jpnSearchText:
『巨額の薬物取引を半グレ集団が
行っている』って内容だったらしいわ。

engChrName: Th-That's no good...
engSearchText: Th-That's no good...
jpnChrName: や、薬物取引……？
jpnSearchText: や、薬物取引……？

engChrName: It's not that uncommon...
engSearchText: It's not that uncommon...
jpnChrName: 聞かない話じゃねえが……
jpnSearchText: 聞かない話じゃねえが……

engChrName: ...but I'm more thinking it was a hoax.
engSearchText: ...but I'm more thinking it was a hoax.
jpnChrName: ──だが、偽情報だったんだな？
jpnSearchText: ──だが、偽情報だったんだな？

engChrName: Indeed, it was. The police arrested several from the scene, but they found no evidence that drugs ever changed hands.
engSearchText:
Indeed, it was. The police arrested several from the
scene, but they found no evidence that drugs ever
changed hands.
jpnChrName: ええ、警察が何人か拘束したけど 薬物取引がされていた形跡はナシ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、警察が何人か拘束したけど
薬物取引がされていた形跡はナシ。

engChrName: However, it did look like they were in the middle of a dispute of some kind—but who the other party was, they could not ascertain.
engSearchText:
However, it did look like they were in the middle of a
dispute of some kind—but who the other party was,
they could not ascertain.
jpnChrName: ただ、何者かと争っていたみたいで その相手というのが分からないのよ。
jpnSearchText:
ただ、何者かと争っていたみたいで
その相手というのが分からないのよ。

engChrName: The ones caught were also saying something along the lines of...
engSearchText:
The ones caught were also saying something along
the lines of...
jpnChrName: ちなみに──捕まった半グレたちは こんな事も呟いていたらしいわ。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに──捕まった半グレたちは
こんな事も呟いていたらしいわ。

engChrName: 'Who ratted us out?' 'THEY wouldn't have done it...so was it someone on our side?'
engSearchText:
'Who ratted us out?'
'THEY wouldn't have done it...so was it someone
on our side?'
jpnChrName: 『いったい誰がパクりやがった？』 『連中じゃねえ……仲間の誰かか？』
jpnSearchText:
『いったい誰がパクりやがった？』
『連中じゃねえ……仲間の誰かか？』

engChrName: Huh.
engSearchText: Huh.
jpnChrName: ハン……
jpnSearchText: ハン……

engChrName: Erm... Judging by all you've said...
engSearchText: Erm... Judging by all you've said...
jpnChrName: その……もしかして。
jpnSearchText: その……もしかして。

engChrName: ...it sounds like those criminals and that other party were still scheduled to do some kind of deal, even if it wasn't drug related...
engSearchText:
...it sounds like those criminals and that other party
were still scheduled to do some kind of deal, even if it
wasn't drug related...
jpnChrName: 半グレ？の方々と、別の人たちが 何かの取引をしようとした所に……
jpnSearchText:
半グレ？の方々と、別の人たちが
何かの取引をしようとした所に……

engChrName: ...and Giacomo called the police on them, creating confusion by doing so?
engSearchText:
...and Giacomo called the police on them, creating
confusion by doing so?
jpnChrName: あのジャコモさんが警察を呼び込んで、 その場を混乱させたんでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
あのジャコモさんが警察を呼び込んで、
その場を混乱させたんでしょうか？

engChrName: Well, well.
engSearchText: Well, well.
jpnChrName: あら……
jpnSearchText: あら……

engChrName: Yeah. You're dead on.
engSearchText: Yeah. You're dead on.
jpnChrName: ああ、その可能性は高いだろ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、その可能性は高いだろ。

engChrName: He then took advantage of that to make off with somethin' from the scene...
engSearchText:
He then took advantage of that to make off with
somethin' from the scene...
jpnChrName: そして薬物以外の“何か”を 何らかの方法でチョロまかして──
jpnSearchText:
そして薬物以外の“何か”を
何らかの方法でチョロまかして──

engChrName: ...and ended up with a one-way ticket to the other side for it.
engSearchText:
...and ended up with a one-way ticket to the other
side for it.
jpnChrName: 結果的に、もう一方の連中に 狙われることになっちまった訳だ。
jpnSearchText:
結果的に、もう一方の連中に
狙われることになっちまった訳だ。

engChrName: My thinking is along the same line as yours, though I haven't got a clue what the 'something' in question is.
engSearchText:
My thinking is along the same line as yours, though I
haven't got a clue what the 'something' in question is.
jpnChrName: “何か”ってのは分からないけど そのあたりだとアタシも睨んでいるわ。
jpnSearchText:
“何か”ってのは分からないけど
そのあたりだとアタシも睨んでいるわ。

engChrName: As for how he was able to make off with it completely undetected, I can only speculate.
engSearchText:
As for how he was able to make off with it
completely undetected, I can only speculate.
jpnChrName: ちなみにジャコモのオジサンが二勢力の 裏を掻いた方法だけど。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにジャコモのオジサンが二勢力の
裏を掻いた方法だけど。

engChrName: There must have been some kind of trick to it.
engSearchText: There must have been some kind of trick to it.
jpnChrName: “とある裏技”を使った可能性が大ね。
jpnSearchText: “とある裏技”を使った可能性が大ね。

engChrName: You don't think he used a Xipha, do you?
engSearchText: You don't think he used a Xipha, do you?
jpnChrName: まさか……最新式（ザイファ）か？
jpnSearchText: まさか……最新式（ザイファ）か？

engChrName: No. There still aren't many of them in circulation.
engSearchText: No. There still aren't many of them in circulation.
jpnChrName: ううん、あれはまだ ごく一部にしか出回っていないわね。
jpnSearchText:
ううん、あれはまだ
ごく一部にしか出回っていないわね。

engChrName: I think he used the previous model—which fit his objective much better.
engSearchText:
I think he used the previous model—which fit his
objective much better.
jpnChrName: それより旧式で──ある意味、 彼の目的に適したブツでしょうね。
jpnSearchText:
それより旧式で──ある意味、
彼の目的に適したブツでしょうね。

engChrName: There's a fair number of them making the rounds on the black market these days.
engSearchText:
There's a fair number of them making the rounds on
the black market these days.
jpnChrName: 現在、裏のマーケットに それなりに流れているっていう。
jpnSearchText:
現在、裏のマーケットに
それなりに流れているっていう。

engChrName: A RAMDA, huh?
engSearchText: A RAMDA, huh?
jpnChrName: そうか──《ＲＡＭＤＡ（ラムダ）》か。
jpnSearchText: そうか──《ＲＡＭＤＡ（ラムダ）》か。

engChrName: Calvard's fifth-generation orbment?
engSearchText: Calvard's fifth-generation orbment?
jpnChrName: それって、共和国で一時使われていた 《第五世代》という……
jpnSearchText:
それって、共和国で一時使われていた
《第五世代》という……

engChrName: Yeah. The one developed between Verne and the Epstein Foundation a while back.
engSearchText:
Yeah. The one developed between Verne and the
Epstein Foundation a while back.
jpnChrName: ああ、ヴェルヌ社とエプスタイン財団が 共同開発した《第五世代戦術導力器》。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ヴェルヌ社とエプスタイン財団が
共同開発した《第五世代戦術導力器》。

engChrName: It was used by the police and army for a while, but soon as the sixth gen was introduced, they wasted no time dumpin' it.
engSearchText:
It was used by the police and army for a while, but
soon as the sixth gen was introduced, they wasted no
time dumpin' it.
jpnChrName: 軍や警察で採用されたが、第六世代の発表で 世代交替を余儀なくされた悲劇の規格──
jpnSearchText:
軍や警察で採用されたが、第六世代の発表で
世代交替を余儀なくされた悲劇の規格──

engChrName: Xipha's better, sure, but the RAMDA was just as good as Erebonia's ARCUS back then, with its most notable feature being stealth capabilities.
engSearchText:
Xipha's better, sure, but the RAMDA was just as
good as Erebonia's ARCUS back then, with its most
notable feature being stealth capabilities.
jpnChrName: 帝国のＡＲＣＵＳ規格にも遜色なかったそうだが ──特筆すべきは“偽装（ステルス）機能”だろう。
jpnSearchText:
帝国のＡＲＣＵＳ規格にも遜色なかったそうだが
──特筆すべきは“偽装（ステルス）機能”だろう。

engChrName: So you think he used that stealth to hide something?
engSearchText: So you think he used that stealth to hide something?
jpnChrName: 偽装（ステルス）機能…… 何かを隠す、ということでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
偽装（ステルス）機能……
何かを隠す、ということでしょうか？

engChrName: Quite. Well, less 'something' and more 'someone'—himself. It lets you disappear as if by magic.
engSearchText:
Quite. Well, less 'something' and more
'someone'—himself. It lets you disappear as if
by magic.
jpnChrName: どちらかというと使用者本人ね。 文字通り魔法のように姿が消えるの。
jpnSearchText:
どちらかというと使用者本人ね。
文字通り魔法のように姿が消えるの。

engChrName: How long it lasts depends on the user, and it can't avoid tripping sensors...
engSearchText:
How long it lasts depends on the user, and it can't
avoid tripping sensors...
jpnChrName: 持続時間は使用者の適性に依存し、 センサーにも引っかかるらしいけど……
jpnSearchText:
持続時間は使用者の適性に依存し、
センサーにも引っかかるらしいけど……

engChrName: ...but slipping into a scene that's already in disarray and stealing something? That would be child's play.
engSearchText:
...but slipping into a scene that's already in disarray
and stealing something? That would be child's play.
jpnChrName: 警察が乗り込んで混乱している場所から “何か”を盗むくらいは朝飯前でしょうね。
jpnSearchText:
警察が乗り込んで混乱している場所から
“何か”を盗むくらいは朝飯前でしょうね。

engChrName: Hmm... That does all make sense.
engSearchText: Hmm... That does all make sense.
jpnChrName: なるほど…… 確かにそれなら納得ですね。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……
確かにそれなら納得ですね。

engChrName: Puts it all into perspective for us, huh?
engSearchText: Puts it all into perspective for us, huh?
jpnChrName: クク……気付いたか。
jpnSearchText: クク……気付いたか。

engChrName: When we charged into the maintenance room after hearing a scream...
engSearchText:
When we charged into the maintenance room after
hearing a scream...
jpnChrName: 俺たちが悲鳴を聞いて あの整備室に乗り込んだ時──
jpnSearchText:
俺たちが悲鳴を聞いて
あの整備室に乗り込んだ時──

engChrName: ...all we found was Giacomo's corpse.
engSearchText: ...all we found was Giacomo's corpse.
jpnChrName: 殺られたばかりのジャコモの遺体しか 現場には見当たらなかった。
jpnSearchText:
殺られたばかりのジャコモの遺体しか
現場には見当たらなかった。

engChrName: But we weren't the only people who were there.
engSearchText: But we weren't the only people who were there.
jpnChrName: だが──実際には居たわけだ。
jpnSearchText: だが──実際には居たわけだ。

engChrName: The criminals who slit his throat were still there, too.
engSearchText: The criminals who slit his throat were still there, too.
jpnChrName: あの場所でジャコモを待ち伏せて その喉を掻き切り……
jpnSearchText:
あの場所でジャコモを待ち伏せて
その喉を掻き切り……

engChrName: They just snuck right past us using RAMDA's stealth capabilities.
engSearchText:
They just snuck right past us using RAMDA's
stealth capabilities.
jpnChrName: 俺たちの脇を偽装（ステルス）機能で まんまとすり抜けて離脱した連中がな。
jpnSearchText:
俺たちの脇を偽装（ステルス）機能で
まんまとすり抜けて離脱した連中がな。

engChrName: What fearless criminals they are. Certainly not bottom of the barrel.
engSearchText:
What fearless criminals they are. Certainly not
bottom of the barrel.
jpnChrName: 大胆不敵な連中よねぇ。 どう考えても只者じゃないでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
大胆不敵な連中よねぇ。
どう考えても只者じゃないでしょう。

engChrName: We could be dealing with jaegers. Or perhaps...
engSearchText: We could be dealing with jaegers. Or perhaps...
jpnChrName: どこかの猟兵か、それとも……
jpnSearchText: どこかの猟兵か、それとも……

engChrName: Whoever they are, they've recovered what they're looking for, so I doubt you'll find success in pursuing them any further.
engSearchText:
Whoever they are, they've recovered what they're
looking for, so I doubt you'll find success in pursuing
them any further.
jpnChrName: まあ、“目的のブツ”を奪い返した以上、 もう足取りも追えなさそうだけど。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、“目的のブツ”を奪い返した以上、
もう足取りも追えなさそうだけど。

engChrName: Oh, I wouldn't be so sure about that.
engSearchText: Oh, I wouldn't be so sure about that.
jpnChrName: いや、そうでもねぇぜ。
jpnSearchText: いや、そうでもねぇぜ。

engChrName: Oh?
engSearchText: Oh?
jpnChrName: え。
jpnSearchText: え。

engChrName: Knew he wouldn't keep me waiting.
engSearchText: Knew he wouldn't keep me waiting.
jpnChrName: 流石に仕事が早いな。
jpnSearchText: 流石に仕事が早いな。

engChrName: Here are all the bases he used for the past few years, complete with security logs.
engSearchText:
Here are all the bases he used for the past few years,
complete with security logs.
jpnChrName: ここ数年のヤツの拠点を送った。 監視カメラのログ付きだ。
jpnSearchText:
ここ数年のヤツの拠点を送った。
監視カメラのログ付きだ。

engChrName: Thanks. We'll call this even.
engSearchText: Thanks. We'll call this even.
jpnChrName: サンクス、これで例の貸しは チャラにしてやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
サンクス、これで例の貸しは
チャラにしてやるよ。

engChrName: Heh. Oh, and just to add, there's been no sign of any jaeger corps on the move as of yesterday.
engSearchText:
Heh. Oh, and just to add, there's been no sign of any
jaeger corps on the move as of yesterday.
jpnChrName: フッ……ちなみに昨日の時点で どこかの団が動いている気配はない。
jpnSearchText:
フッ……ちなみに昨日の時点で
どこかの団が動いている気配はない。

engChrName: Well, be seeing you.
engSearchText: Well, be seeing you.
jpnChrName: せいぜい気をつけておけ。
jpnSearchText: せいぜい気をつけておけ。

engChrName: All right. Guess I'm in your debt again.
engSearchText: All right. Guess I'm in your debt again.
jpnChrName: そうか……借り一つだ。
jpnSearchText: そうか……借り一つだ。

engChrName: What was that all about...?
engSearchText: What was that all about...?
jpnChrName: 今の方は……
jpnSearchText: 今の方は……

engChrName: So Giacomo had multiple hideouts, did he?
engSearchText: So Giacomo had multiple hideouts, did he?
jpnChrName: そっか、ジャコモのオジサン、 他にも隠れ家を確保していたわね。
jpnSearchText:
そっか、ジャコモのオジサン、
他にも隠れ家を確保していたわね。

engChrName: That could mean whatever he stole is in one of those. But if it wasn't a jaeger corps he had a run-in with...
engSearchText:
That could mean whatever he stole is in one of those.
But if it wasn't a jaeger corps he had a run-in with...
jpnChrName: するとブツはそちらの何処かに？ うーん、でも猟兵じゃないとすると……
jpnSearchText:
するとブツはそちらの何処かに？
うーん、でも猟兵じゃないとすると……

engChrName: Oh, forget it. I can't believe you turned to Dingo!
engSearchText: Oh, forget it. I can't believe you turned to Dingo!
jpnChrName: ──ってそれよりヴァンちゃん！ ディンゴちゃんにも頼んでたのねっ？
jpnSearchText:
──ってそれよりヴァンちゃん！
ディンゴちゃんにも頼んでたのねっ？

engChrName: And right in FRONT of me! You know I'll sing like a canary for you any day of the week!
engSearchText:
And right in FRONT of me! You know I'll sing like a
canary for you any day of the week!
jpnChrName: アタシという彼女（情報屋）がありながら イケズなんだからっ！
jpnSearchText:
アタシという彼女（情報屋）がありながら
イケズなんだからっ！

engChrName: Heh. Sorry, but I never was much of the faithful type.
engSearchText: Heh. Sorry, but I never was much of the faithful type.
jpnChrName: ハッ…… 悪いが節操はないんでな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……
悪いが節操はないんでな。

engChrName: Well, we got a lot of new information out of that...
engSearchText: Well, we got a lot of new information out of that...
jpnChrName: 色々驚くような情報が 新たに分かりましたけど……
jpnSearchText:
色々驚くような情報が
新たに分かりましたけど……

engChrName: I'm just...surprised at how well connected you are.
engSearchText: I'm just...surprised at how well connected you are.
jpnChrName: それにしてもヴァンさん、 本当にお顔が広いんですね？
jpnSearchText:
それにしてもヴァンさん、
本当にお顔が広いんですね？

engChrName: What can I say? I spend time puttin' people in my debt so I can cash in favors when I need 'em.
engSearchText:
What can I say? I spend time puttin' people in my
debt so I can cash in favors when I need 'em.
jpnChrName: ああ……まあこういう時のために 普段から貸しを作っているからな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……まあこういう時のために
普段から貸しを作っているからな。

engChrName: You must have amassed quite a collection by now.
engSearchText: You must have amassed quite a collection by now.
jpnChrName: ふぅん…… さぞご立派な貸しなのでしょうね。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅん……
さぞご立派な貸しなのでしょうね。

engChrName: Uh...
engSearchText: Uh...

engChrName: Oh...
engSearchText: Oh...

engChrName: OH!
engSearchText: OH!
jpnChrName: ああっ……！？
jpnSearchText: ああっ……！？

engChrName: I'd heard you were a regular at this establishment...
engSearchText: I'd heard you were a regular at this establishment...
jpnChrName: そちらの常連というのは 風の噂で聞いていたけど……
jpnSearchText:
そちらの常連というのは
風の噂で聞いていたけど……

engChrName: ...but I wasn't expecting to run into you just as it was opening.
engSearchText:
...but I wasn't expecting to run into you just as it
was opening.
jpnChrName: まさかこんなタイミングで 出くわすなんてね。
jpnSearchText:
まさかこんなタイミングで
出くわすなんてね。

engChrName: Heh. That makes two of us.
engSearchText: Heh. That makes two of us.
jpnChrName: ハッ……そうだな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ……そうだな。

engChrName: First René, then you. Hell of a day for me.
engSearchText: First René, then you. Hell of a day for me.
jpnChrName: ったく、ルネのヤツといい、 どんな日だっつーの。
jpnSearchText:
ったく、ルネのヤツといい、
どんな日だっつーの。

engChrName: You've certainly spent a lot of it skulking around. Up to no good, I assume.
engSearchText:
You've certainly spent a lot of it skulking around.
Up to no good, I assume.
jpnChrName: コソコソしていたものね、貴方。 よっぽど後ろ暗い所があるみたいだし。
jpnSearchText:
コソコソしていたものね、貴方。
よっぽど後ろ暗い所があるみたいだし。

engChrName: I imagine it was half your own fault that you got hauled off to the police station.
engSearchText:
I imagine it was half your own fault that you got
hauled off to the police station.
jpnChrName: 警察署に連行されたことだって 半分以上は自業自得といった所かしら？
jpnSearchText:
警察署に連行されたことだって
半分以上は自業自得といった所かしら？

engChrName: Wish I could argue otherwise... Should've known it wouldn't take long for you to hear about what happened and come runnin'.
engSearchText:
Wish I could argue otherwise... Should've known it
wouldn't take long for you to hear about what
happened and come runnin'.
jpnChrName: 否定はしねえが…… 早速、聞きつけて来やがったか。
jpnSearchText:
否定はしねえが……
早速、聞きつけて来やがったか。

engChrName: Of course. I've paid a visit to the scene of the crime as well.
engSearchText:
Of course. I've paid a visit to the scene of the crime
as well.
jpnChrName: ええ、そこの現場も見せてもらった。
jpnSearchText: ええ、そこの現場も見せてもらった。

engChrName: Giacomo was hardly a pleasant person, but he was a decent informant to use when work called for one.
engSearchText:
Giacomo was hardly a pleasant person, but he was a
decent informant to use when work called for one.
jpnChrName: ジャコモ氏は問題人物だったけど 情報屋として何度か接触していたから。
jpnSearchText:
ジャコモ氏は問題人物だったけど
情報屋として何度か接触していたから。

engChrName: I hope you know that the detectives at the station and that reporter are very displeased with you, by the way.
engSearchText:
I hope you know that the detectives at the station and
that reporter are very displeased with you, by the way.
jpnChrName: ──それより、捜査官さんたちと タイレルの女記者さんが怒っていたわよ？
jpnSearchText:
──それより、捜査官さんたちと
タイレルの女記者さんが怒っていたわよ？

engChrName: Your love of causing trouble for everyone and taking advantage of it to further your own goals has never been a bright spot for you.
engSearchText:
Your love of causing trouble for everyone and taking
advantage of it to further your own goals has never
been a bright spot for you.
jpnChrName: 引っかき回して“掴む”やり方…… 相変わらずみたいね？
jpnSearchText:
引っかき回して“掴む”やり方……
相変わらずみたいね？

engChrName: Don't got a clue what you're talkin' about. (Damn, this is awkward...)
engSearchText:
Don't got a clue what you're talkin' about.
(Damn, this is awkward...)
jpnChrName: さて、何のことかねぇ？ （……クソ、流石にやり辛ぇな。）
jpnSearchText:
さて、何のことかねぇ？
（……クソ、流石にやり辛ぇな。）

engChrName: I can't believe it...
engSearchText: I can't believe it...
jpnChrName: え、えっと……
jpnSearchText: え、えっと……

engChrName: Forgive me. My name is Elaine. I'm sorry for interrupting your conversation.
engSearchText:
Forgive me. My name is Elaine. I'm sorry for
interrupting your conversation.
jpnChrName: 初めまして、エレインよ。 いきなり割り込んでごめんなさい。
jpnSearchText:
初めまして、エレインよ。
いきなり割り込んでごめんなさい。

engChrName: O-Oh, not at all.
engSearchText: O-Oh, not at all.
jpnChrName: い、いえ……
jpnSearchText: い、いえ……

engChrName: I think we have much to discuss, but we're also both busy, so that can wait for another time.
engSearchText:
I think we have much to discuss, but we're also both
busy, so that can wait for another time.
jpnChrName: お互い忙しいでしょうし、 積もる話はまたいずれしましょう。
jpnSearchText:
お互い忙しいでしょうし、
積もる話はまたいずれしましょう。

engChrName: Whoever can solve this case first—the CID, the police, the guild—wins the prize lying in wait.
engSearchText:
Whoever can solve this case first—the CID, the
police, the guild—wins the prize lying in wait.
jpnChrName: この先は早い者勝ち…… ＣＩＤや警察、私たちも含めてね。
jpnSearchText:
この先は早い者勝ち……
ＣＩＤや警察、私たちも含めてね。

engChrName: That also goes for our presumed suspects.
engSearchText: That also goes for our presumed suspects.
jpnChrName: 言うまでもなく──“彼ら”も。
jpnSearchText: 言うまでもなく──“彼ら”も。

engChrName: I'm sure you know who I'm talking about. Be careful not to get too involved here, Van.
engSearchText:
I'm sure you know who I'm talking about. Be careful
not to get too involved here, Van.
jpnChrName: もう察していると思うけど この先はきちんと線引きしなさい。
jpnSearchText:
もう察していると思うけど
この先はきちんと線引きしなさい。

engChrName: I'm almost certain that the two people who killed Giacomo were from A.
engSearchText:
I'm almost certain that the two people who killed
Giacomo were from A.
jpnChrName: ジャコモ氏を殺めた“２人組”── おそらく《Ａ》よ。
jpnSearchText:
ジャコモ氏を殺めた“２人組”──
おそらく《Ａ》よ。

engChrName: Thinkin' the same. But I'll chalk myself up to owin' you one for tellin' me.
engSearchText:
Thinkin' the same. But I'll chalk myself up to owin'
you one for tellin' me.
jpnChrName: ………だろうな。 一つ借りにしてやる。
jpnSearchText:
………だろうな。
一つ借りにしてやる。

engChrName: Y-You know her?!
engSearchText: Y-You know her?!
jpnChrName: い、今の方は…… ヴァンさん、お知り合いだったんですか！？
jpnSearchText:
い、今の方は……
ヴァンさん、お知り合いだったんですか！？

engChrName: What, you do, too? Guess she does pop up in the paper every once in a blue moon.
engSearchText:
What, you do, too? Guess she does pop up in the
paper every once in a blue moon.
jpnChrName: なんだ、知ってたのかよ？ ……まあ雑誌とかでもたまに見るか。
jpnSearchText:
なんだ、知ってたのかよ？
……まあ雑誌とかでもたまに見るか。

engChrName: Of COURSE I know her! She's really famous!
engSearchText: Of COURSE I know her! She's really famous!
jpnChrName: 知ってるもなにも…… かなりの有名人じゃないですか！
jpnSearchText:
知ってるもなにも……
かなりの有名人じゃないですか！

engChrName: I don't think there's anyone in Calvard who DOESN'T know the face of Elaine Auclair!
engSearchText:
I don't think there's anyone in Calvard who
DOESN'T know the face of Elaine Auclair!
jpnChrName: エレイン・オークレールさん……！
jpnSearchText: エレイン・オークレールさん……！

engChrName: She's one of the youngest bracers ever to reach A-rank in the guild! Their ace!
engSearchText:
She's one of the youngest bracers ever to reach
A-rank in the guild! Their ace!
jpnChrName: カルバード遊撃士協会の若きエースで 最年少でＡ級になったという……！
jpnSearchText:
カルバード遊撃士協会の若きエースで
最年少でＡ級になったという……！

engChrName: A-And they even call her...I can't remember, but it's something like—
engSearchText:
A-And they even call her...I can't remember, but it's
something like—
jpnChrName: えっと、たしか人呼んで──
jpnSearchText: えっと、たしか人呼んで──

engChrName: —Beauty's Blade. Elegant enough for someone so adept with the swordsmanship of the old kingdom.
engSearchText:
—Beauty's Blade. Elegant enough for someone so
adept with the swordsmanship of the old kingdom.
jpnChrName: 《剣の乙女（ソード・メイデン）》。 旧王国流の剣術の達人って触れ込みだな。
jpnSearchText:
《剣の乙女（ソード・メイデン）》。
旧王国流の剣術の達人って触れ込みだな。

engChrName: Heh. Hard not to feel for her for having 'beauty' slapped on her title.
engSearchText:
Heh. Hard not to feel for her for having 'beauty'
slapped on her title.
jpnChrName: クク、よりによって“乙女”とは…… さすがに同情せざるを得ないっつーか。
jpnSearchText:
クク、よりによって“乙女”とは……
さすがに同情せざるを得ないっつーか。

engChrName: Are... Are the two of you close?
engSearchText: Are... Are the two of you close?
jpnChrName: え、えっと…… けっこう親しそう、でしたね？
jpnSearchText:
え、えっと……
けっこう親しそう、でしたね？

engChrName: She's just an old friend. Anyway, we've wasted enough time here.
engSearchText:
She's just an old friend. Anyway, we've wasted
enough time here.
jpnChrName: ただの昔馴染みだ。 ……それより時間が惜しい。
jpnSearchText:
ただの昔馴染みだ。
……それより時間が惜しい。

engChrName: We almost got this one in the bag. We can talk stuff through while we're on the move.
engSearchText:
We almost got this one in the bag. We can talk stuff
through while we're on the move.
jpnChrName: そろそろ大詰めだ。 移動しながら整理するぞ。
jpnSearchText:
そろそろ大詰めだ。
移動しながら整理するぞ。

engChrName: Hmm? Who are you calling?
engSearchText: Hmm? Who are you calling?
jpnChrName: ？　えっと、どちらに？
jpnSearchText: ？　えっと、どちらに？

engChrName: That hulking bear who pushed the job on us, of course.
engSearchText:
That hulking bear who pushed the job on us,
of course.
jpnChrName: こっちに仕事を押し付けやがった 熊野郎に決まってんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
こっちに仕事を押し付けやがった
熊野郎に決まってんだろ。

engChrName: I see...
engSearchText: I see...
jpnChrName: ああ……
jpnSearchText: ああ……

engChrName: Hey, Arkride. All taken care of?
engSearchText: Hey, Arkride. All taken care of?
jpnChrName: おお、アークライドか。 無事片付けてくれたようだな。
jpnSearchText:
おお、アークライドか。
無事片付けてくれたようだな。

engChrName: Will you stop reading me like a damn book?
engSearchText: Will you stop reading me like a damn book?
jpnChrName: ……見透かしてんじゃねえよ。
jpnSearchText: ……見透かしてんじゃねえよ。

engChrName: Took care of both the monster and that optional one. My own way, though.
engSearchText:
Took care of both the monster and that optional one.
My own way, though.
jpnChrName: 必須に加え、任意もクリアだ。 ケリの付け方は任せてもらったが。
jpnSearchText:
必須に加え、任意もクリアだ。
ケリの付け方は任せてもらったが。

engChrName: Haha. Hey, if it works.
engSearchText: Haha. Hey, if it works.
jpnChrName: ハハ、それで構わんさ。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ハハ、それで構わんさ。

engChrName: I know your style's not the same as ours, but I can trust you to handle it.
engSearchText:
I know your style's not the same as ours, but I can
trust you to handle it.
jpnChrName: 俺たちと流儀は違うかもしれんが お前さんの判断なら大丈夫だろう。
jpnSearchText:
俺たちと流儀は違うかもしれんが
お前さんの判断なら大丈夫だろう。

engChrName: Tch. Don't know why you would.
engSearchText: Tch. Don't know why you would.
jpnChrName: チッ、何を根拠に……
jpnSearchText: チッ、何を根拠に……

engChrName: Took care of the monster. Couldn't do the other one, though.
engSearchText:
Took care of the monster. Couldn't do the other
one, though.
jpnChrName: 悪いが、手配魔獣だけだがな。
jpnSearchText: 悪いが、手配魔獣だけだがな。

engChrName: No worries. Another bracer can cover that one tomorrow.
engSearchText:
No worries. Another bracer can cover that
one tomorrow.
jpnChrName: ああ、それで構わんさ。 明日には他の面子が当たるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、それで構わんさ。
明日には他の面子が当たるだろう。

engChrName: I'll wire you the money ASAP. Thanks for the save, man.
engSearchText:
I'll wire you the money ASAP. Thanks for the
save, man.
jpnChrName: ──とにかく助かった。 報酬も口座に振り込んでおく。
jpnSearchText:
──とにかく助かった。
報酬も口座に振り込んでおく。

engChrName: Looking forward to the next job with you!
engSearchText: Looking forward to the next job with you!
jpnChrName: 今後も宜しく頼むぜ、アークライド。
jpnSearchText: 今後も宜しく頼むぜ、アークライド。

engChrName: You have GOT to be kiddin' me.
engSearchText: You have GOT to be kiddin' me.
jpnChrName: っておい、冗談じゃ──
jpnSearchText: っておい、冗談じゃ──

engChrName: Oh, yeah. Elaine's on a transcontinental train going the opposite way.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah. Elaine's on a transcontinental train going
the opposite way.
jpnChrName: ああ、エレインは反対方面の 横断鉄道に乗っちまってな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、エレインは反対方面の
横断鉄道に乗っちまってな。

engChrName: She should still be in Xipha range if you want me to—
engSearchText:
She should still be in Xipha range if you want me
to—
jpnChrName: ザイファの通信なら届くだろうから 何だったら──
jpnSearchText:
ザイファの通信なら届くだろうから
何だったら──

engChrName: I'm good! Ugh!
engSearchText: I'm good! Ugh!
jpnChrName: そういう気遣いも要らねえんだよ！
jpnSearchText: そういう気遣いも要らねえんだよ！

engChrName: Hahaha. Well, see ya 'round!
engSearchText: Hahaha. Well, see ya 'round!
jpnChrName: ハッハッハッ、そんじゃあまたな。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ハッハッハッ、そんじゃあまたな。

engChrName: A wolf in sheep's clothing, that guy. What a monster.
engSearchText: A wolf in sheep's clothing, that guy. What a monster.
jpnChrName: な、なんてオッサンだ。 気の良さそうな顔しといて……
jpnSearchText:
な、なんてオッサンだ。
気の良さそうな顔しといて……

engChrName: Ahaha... I can see why he's so well respected at the guild.
engSearchText:
Ahaha... I can see why he's so well respected at
the guild.
jpnChrName: あはは……共和国のギルドの 重鎮というのも納得ですね。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……共和国のギルドの
重鎮というのも納得ですね。

engChrName: I heard he was integral to quelling a big problem in the Liberl Kingdom in the past.
engSearchText:
I heard he was integral to quelling a big problem in
the Liberl Kingdom in the past.
jpnChrName: そういえば、リベール王国での事件で 活躍したとも聞いたことがあるような。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、リベール王国での事件で
活躍したとも聞いたことがあるような。

engChrName: Huh. They teach that in class? Yeah, it was about six years back.
engSearchText:
Huh. They teach that in class? Yeah, it was about six
years back.
jpnChrName: よく知ってるな。 ６年くらい前の話らしいが。
jpnSearchText:
よく知ってるな。
６年くらい前の話らしいが。

engChrName: Around the same time that... Heh.
engSearchText: Around the same time that... Heh.
jpnChrName: ……そうか、 丁度同じくらいだったな。
jpnSearchText:
……そうか、
丁度同じくらいだったな。

engChrName: Hmm?
engSearchText: Hmm?

engChrName: Van?
engSearchText: Van?
jpnChrName: ？　ヴァンさん？
jpnSearchText: ？　ヴァンさん？

engChrName: It's nothin'. Like I said, we're still clocked in until we're back at the office.
engSearchText:
It's nothin'. Like I said, we're still clocked in until
we're back at the office.
jpnChrName: いや、さっきも言ったように 事務所に帰るまでが試用研修だ。
jpnSearchText:
いや、さっきも言ったように
事務所に帰るまでが試用研修だ。

engChrName: We can afford to stop by a few spots for some dessert on the way back, though.
engSearchText:
We can afford to stop by a few spots for some dessert
on the way back, though.
jpnChrName: 幾つか甘いモンを調達しながら ボチボチ旧市街に帰るぞ。
jpnSearchText:
幾つか甘いモンを調達しながら
ボチボチ旧市街に帰るぞ。

engChrName: Well, if you say so. Heehee. That sounds right for you.
engSearchText:
Well, if you say so. Heehee. That sounds right
for you.
jpnChrName: えっと……分かりました。 ふふっ、そこは外せないんですね。
jpnSearchText:
えっと……分かりました。
ふふっ、そこは外せないんですね。

engChrName: (Am I imagining things? It feels like there's more to this than his sweet tooth.)
engSearchText:
(Am I imagining things? It feels like there's more to
this than his sweet tooth.)
jpnChrName: （気のせい、かな？   何か含みがあるような……）
jpnSearchText:
（気のせい、かな？
何か含みがあるような……）

engChrName: Received
engSearchText: Received
jpnChrName: 報酬としてミラの振り込みを確認した。
jpnSearchText: 報酬として<C2><C0>ミラの振り込みを確認した。

engChrName: Visit places where sweet foods are sold around Riverside, Station Street, and Old Town.
engSearchText:
Visit places where sweet foods are sold around
Riverside, Station Street, and Old Town.
jpnChrName: リバーサイド、駅前通り、旧市街で、 甘い物が売っていそうな店を訪ねてみよう。
jpnSearchText:
リバーサイド、駅前通り、旧市街で、
甘い物が売っていそうな店を訪ねてみよう。

engChrName: I'm glad the rain finally let up. The weather tomorrow should be lovely.
engSearchText:
I'm glad the rain finally let up. The weather
tomorrow should be lovely.
jpnChrName: ──雨、止んでよかったわね。 明日はいい天気になりそうだし。
jpnSearchText:
──雨、止んでよかったわね。
明日はいい天気になりそうだし。

engChrName: Yeah. The forecast's clear skies all day for the southeast.
engSearchText:
Yeah. The forecast's clear skies all day for
the southeast.
jpnChrName: ああ、予報じゃ南東は快晴らしい。
jpnSearchText: ああ、予報じゃ南東は快晴らしい。

engChrName: But should you even be out this late? You just told your friend to hurry back.
engSearchText:
But should you even be out this late? You just told
your friend to hurry back.
jpnChrName: つーか夜更けに出歩いてていいのか？ 後輩には帰れっつったクセに。
jpnSearchText:
つーか夜更けに出歩いてていいのか？
後輩には帰れっつったクセに。

engChrName: Why, I'm out on patrol, silly! I have to make sure students are behaving themselves—new and old alike.
engSearchText:
Why, I'm out on patrol, silly! I have to make sure
students are behaving themselves—new and old alike.
jpnChrName: うふふ、見回りよ、見回り。 在学生に元生徒の素行を調査する。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、見回りよ、見回り。
在学生に元生徒の素行を調査する。

engChrName: Yeah, whatever you say.
engSearchText: Yeah, whatever you say.
jpnChrName: ったく……
jpnSearchText: ったく……

engChrName: Heh... It HAS been a while, huh, Kitty? Or would you rather I called you 'Renne Bright' these days?
engSearchText:
Heh... It HAS been a while, huh, Kitty? Or would
you rather I called you 'Renne Bright' these days?
jpnChrName: ──久しぶりだな、元仔猫。 いや、レン・ブライトって呼ぶべきか。
jpnSearchText:
──久しぶりだな、元仔猫。
いや、レン・ブライトって呼ぶべきか。

engChrName: Call me whatever you like—though I am pretty used to my new name now.
engSearchText:
Call me whatever you like—though I am pretty used
to my new name now.
jpnChrName: うふふ、その名前も馴染んだものね。
jpnSearchText: うふふ、その名前も馴染んだものね。

engChrName: It's really good to see you, too, spriggan.
engSearchText: It's really good to see you, too, spriggan.
jpnChrName: お久しぶりね、裏解決屋（スプリガン）さん。
jpnSearchText: お久しぶりね、裏解決屋（スプリガン）さん。

engChrName: I came over as an exchange student this past spring, but had I known how much you missed me, I would have paid you a visit a lot sooner.
engSearchText:
I came over as an exchange student this past spring,
but had I known how much you missed me, I would
have paid you a visit a lot sooner.
jpnChrName: 春から交換留学で通っているのだけど 挨拶に伺うべきだったかしら？
jpnSearchText:
春から交換留学で通っているのだけど
挨拶に伺うべきだったかしら？

engChrName: Nah. No need to go outta your way just 'cause you're a former client.
engSearchText:
Nah. No need to go outta your way just 'cause
you're a former client.
jpnChrName: いや、元依頼人との関係なんざ そのくらいが丁度いいだろ。
jpnSearchText:
いや、元依頼人との関係なんざ
そのくらいが丁度いいだろ。

engChrName: Hell, I wasn't even a pro when I helped you. Didn't have my current office or anything!
engSearchText:
Hell, I wasn't even a pro when I helped you.
Didn't have my current office or anything!
jpnChrName: 特にお前さんは、事務所を開く前の “半人前”だったころの客だしな。
jpnSearchText:
特にお前さんは、事務所を開く前の
“半人前”だったころの客だしな。

engChrName: And I mean, we have kind of crossed paths since. Like with that case with the pampered politician's son.
engSearchText:
And I mean, we have kind of crossed paths since.
Like with that case with the pampered
politician's son.
jpnChrName: 微妙にニアミスした気もするが…… ──汚職議員とドラ息子の一件とか。
jpnSearchText:
微妙にニアミスした気もするが……
──汚職議員とドラ息子の一件とか。

engChrName: Heehee. I had a feeling you might be involved with that based on what that reporter was telling me about it.
engSearchText:
Heehee. I had a feeling you might be involved with
that based on what that reporter was telling me
about it.
jpnChrName: ふふ、やっぱり裏で動いてたのね？ 記者さんの話で薄々気付いてたけど。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、やっぱり裏で動いてたのね？
記者さんの話で薄々気付いてたけど。

engChrName: I didn't think I'd end up Student Council president as a result of it all—but it's been a lot more fun than I was expecting.
engSearchText:
I didn't think I'd end up Student Council president as
a result of it all—but it's been a lot more fun than I
was expecting.
jpnChrName: あの件で生徒会長になっちゃったけど…… まあまあ楽しくやらせてもらっているわ。
jpnSearchText:
あの件で生徒会長になっちゃったけど……
まあまあ楽しくやらせてもらっているわ。

engChrName: Glad to hear it.
engSearchText: Glad to hear it.
jpnChrName: そいつは何よりだ。
jpnSearchText: そいつは何よりだ。

engChrName: Man. Five years since we first met through that introduction letter from the meister, huh? Where does time go.
engSearchText:
Man. Five years since we first met through that
introduction letter from the meister, huh?
Where does time go.
jpnChrName: 最初に会ったのは５年前── マイスターからの紹介だったか。
jpnSearchText:
最初に会ったのは５年前──
マイスターからの紹介だったか。

engChrName: Indeed. You really helped shake off the professor's attempts to follow me.
engSearchText:
Indeed. You really helped shake off the professor's
attempts to follow me.
jpnChrName: あの時は博士の追跡を振り切るのを 手伝ってもらったのよね。
jpnSearchText:
あの時は博士の追跡を振り切るのを
手伝ってもらったのよね。

engChrName: Not to mention helping the meister with his...'relocation' after all that chaos in Crossbell.
engSearchText:
Not to mention helping the meister with
his...'relocation' after all that chaos in Crossbell.
jpnChrName: 独立国騒ぎのあとはお爺さんの “引っ越し”まで手伝ってもらったし。
jpnSearchText:
独立国騒ぎのあとはお爺さんの
“引っ越し”まで手伝ってもらったし。

engChrName: I mean, I was in his debt to begin with.
engSearchText: I mean, I was in his debt to begin with.
jpnChrName: ま……あの爺さんには 個人的な“借り”もあったんでな。
jpnSearchText:
ま……あの爺さんには
個人的な“借り”もあったんでな。

engChrName: Ended up dumping a couple of kids with a bit of a history on him, too.
engSearchText:
Ended up dumping a couple of kids with a bit of a
history on him, too.
jpnChrName: 訳アリのガキ共の面倒を 押し付けちまったこともあったし。
jpnSearchText:
訳アリのガキ共の面倒を
押し付けちまったこともあったし。

engChrName: Wasn't really expectin' anything in return, so I was pretty surprised when that gift showed up.
engSearchText:
Wasn't really expectin' anything in return, so I was
pretty surprised when that gift showed up.
jpnChrName: まさか最近になってあんなお返しが あるとは思ってなかったが。
jpnSearchText:
まさか最近になってあんなお返しが
あるとは思ってなかったが。

engChrName: Oh, the turbocharger? Heehee. I'm glad you're enjoying it.
engSearchText:
Oh, the turbocharger? Heehee. I'm glad you're
enjoying it.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ターボチャージャーね。 気に入ってくれているかしら？
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、ターボチャージャーね。
気に入ってくれているかしら？

engChrName: My best friend and I were actually involved in designing it, you know.
engSearchText:
My best friend and I were actually involved in
designing it, you know.
jpnChrName: 実は私と“親友”も設計に ちょっとだけ協力していてね。
jpnSearchText:
実は私と“親友”も設計に
ちょっとだけ協力していてね。

engChrName: Hold on, really?
engSearchText: Hold on, really?
jpnChrName: って、そうだったのかよ！？
jpnSearchText: って、そうだったのかよ！？

engChrName: I could tell it was pretty high tech and all, but I didn't realize you were behind that.
engSearchText:
I could tell it was pretty high tech and all, but I didn't
realize you were behind that.
jpnChrName: 妙に今時の最新技術がふんだんに 盛り込まれてると思ったが……
jpnSearchText:
妙に今時の最新技術がふんだんに
盛り込まれてると思ったが……

engChrName: Well, I heard that you were a sobbing mess after Walter turned your old truck inside out.
engSearchText:
Well, I heard that you were a sobbing mess after
Walter turned your old truck inside out.
jpnChrName: うふふ、ヴァルターに壊されて 泣きベソかいてたって聞いたから。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、ヴァルターに壊されて
泣きベソかいてたって聞いたから。

engChrName: So I thought maybe you could use a little pick-me-up. You know...for old times' sake.
engSearchText:
So I thought maybe you could use a little pick-me-up.
You know...for old times' sake.
jpnChrName: 元身内としてそのくらいは、ね。
jpnSearchText: 元身内としてそのくらいは、ね。

engChrName: Sheesh... That figures.
engSearchText: Sheesh... That figures.
jpnChrName: ったく……
jpnSearchText: ったく……

engChrName: Still. I'm guessin' the society must be feelin' the pressure at this point.
engSearchText:
Still. I'm guessin' the society must be feelin' the
pressure at this point.
jpnChrName: しかし……流石に《結社》も 大分グダグダになってきてねぇか？
jpnSearchText:
しかし……流石に《結社》も
大分グダグダになってきてねぇか？

engChrName: They've had a lotta dropouts the past few years— you included.
engSearchText:
They've had a lotta dropouts the past few years—
you included.
jpnChrName: お前さんも含めて、ここ数年で 割とドロップアウトしたみたいだし。
jpnSearchText:
お前さんも含めて、ここ数年で
割とドロップアウトしたみたいだし。

engChrName: Just so long as they don't come lookin' for my help. You I can handle, but those other wackos? No, thanks.
engSearchText:
Just so long as they don't come lookin' for my help.
You I can handle, but those other wackos?
No, thanks.
jpnChrName: ま、お前さんはともかくヤバイ縁は これ以上は勘弁してほしいんだが。
jpnSearchText:
ま、お前さんはともかくヤバイ縁は
これ以上は勘弁してほしいんだが。

engChrName: But you have such a natural talent for attracting them!
engSearchText: But you have such a natural talent for attracting them!
jpnChrName: ふふ、それも人徳じゃないかしら？
jpnSearchText: ふふ、それも人徳じゃないかしら？

engChrName: They do say birds of a feather flock together, though. I'm afraid you're likely to meet more of them as time goes on.
engSearchText:
They do say birds of a feather flock together, though.
I'm afraid you're likely to meet more of them as time
goes on.
jpnChrName: 類は友をとも言うし、 これからもどんどん増えそうねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
類は友をとも言うし、
これからもどんどん増えそうねぇ。

engChrName: I'm just a normal, upstanding citizen. What'd I do to deserve this?
engSearchText:
I'm just a normal, upstanding citizen. What'd I do to
deserve this?
jpnChrName: 俺は善良な市民だっつの…… 恐ろしいことを言うんじゃねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
俺は善良な市民だっつの……
恐ろしいことを言うんじゃねぇ。

engChrName: Protest all you like, but you do seem awfully popular lately.
engSearchText:
Protest all you like, but you do seem awfully
popular lately.
jpnChrName: 世迷言はさておき、貴方のことが 気になってるヒトはそこそこ多いわよ？
jpnSearchText:
世迷言はさておき、貴方のことが
気になってるヒトはそこそこ多いわよ？

engChrName: In fact, it looks like you've got another vicious young woman looking to get her hands on you. Ooh! How dreadful!
engSearchText:
In fact, it looks like you've got another vicious young
woman looking to get her hands on you. Ooh!
How dreadful!
jpnChrName: ──そちらの有能で素敵な、 とっても怖～いお姉さんとかね。
jpnSearchText:
──そちらの有能で素敵な、
とっても怖～いお姉さんとかね。

engChrName: Oh, I think I'm a little past 'young' at this point.
engSearchText: Oh, I think I'm a little past 'young' at this point.
jpnChrName: フフ、流石にお姉さんは とっくに恥ずかしい歳だけど。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、流石にお姉さんは
とっくに恥ずかしい歳だけど。

engChrName: Heh. Oh, boy.
engSearchText: Heh. Oh, boy.
jpnChrName: ハッ……参ったな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ……参ったな。

engChrName: And such perfect timing, too.
engSearchText: And such perfect timing, too.
jpnChrName: うふふ、時間通りだったわね。
jpnSearchText: うふふ、時間通りだったわね。

engChrName: Thank you for making time to meet with us. I know how busy you are.
engSearchText:
Thank you for making time to meet with us. I know
how busy you are.
jpnChrName: 忙しいのに体を空けてくれて 感謝するわ。
jpnSearchText:
忙しいのに体を空けてくれて
感謝するわ。

engChrName: Think nothing of it. I have some other business to take care of outside of the office as it is.
engSearchText:
Think nothing of it. I have some other business to
take care of outside of the office as it is.
jpnChrName: 気にしないで、ちょうど所用で 出てきたついででもあるから。
jpnSearchText:
気にしないで、ちょうど所用で
出てきたついででもあるから。

engChrName: You're René's boss, right? Heard a lot about you.
engSearchText: You're René's boss, right? Heard a lot about you.
jpnChrName: ルネんとこの……噂はかねがね。
jpnSearchText: ルネんとこの……噂はかねがね。

engChrName: Didn't realize the Flying Swallow was so fond of practical jokes. Was the lurkin' in the shadows bit really necessary?
engSearchText:
Didn't realize the Flying Swallow was so fond of
practical jokes. Was the lurkin' in the shadows bit
really necessary?
jpnChrName: 泰斗の《飛燕紅児（ひえんこうじ）》ともあろうお人が 本気で気配を消すのも大人げねぇが。
jpnSearchText:
泰斗の《飛燕紅児（ひえんこうじ）》ともあろうお人が
本気で気配を消すのも大人げねぇが。

engChrName: Haha. My apologies.
engSearchText: Haha. My apologies.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ごめんなさい。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、ごめんなさい。

engChrName: My name is Kilika Rouran, chief of the CID's Integrated Analysis Division.
engSearchText:
My name is Kilika Rouran, chief of the CID's
Integrated Analysis Division.
jpnChrName: ──ＣＩＤ統合分析室、 室長のキリカ・ロウランよ。
jpnSearchText:
──ＣＩＤ統合分析室、
室長のキリカ・ロウランよ。

engChrName: It's a pleasure to meet you, Mr. Arkride.
engSearchText: It's a pleasure to meet you, Mr. Arkride.
jpnChrName: 初めまして──解決事務所所長、 ヴァン・アークライドさん。
jpnSearchText:
初めまして──解決事務所所長、
ヴァン・アークライドさん。

engChrName: Even if this does not quite feel like our first meeting.
engSearchText: Even if this does not quite feel like our first meeting.
jpnChrName: と言ってもあまり 初対面という気はしないわね？
jpnSearchText:
と言ってもあまり
初対面という気はしないわね？

engChrName: No doubt. I'm sure he's told you a lot about me, huh?
engSearchText: No doubt. I'm sure he's told you a lot about me, huh?
jpnChrName: ま、あいつから 色々聞いてるだろうしな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、あいつから
色々聞いてるだろうしな。

engChrName: That he did. Including everything that went on behind the scenes two years ago.
engSearchText:
That he did. Including everything that went on
behind the scenes two years ago.
jpnChrName: フフ、それと２年前の “裏”での顛末も含めてね。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、それと２年前の
“裏”での顛末も含めてね。

engChrName: Haven't got a clue what you're talkin' about.
engSearchText: Haven't got a clue what you're talkin' about.
jpnChrName: さぁて、何のことやら？
jpnSearchText: さぁて、何のことやら？

engChrName: Looks like bringing you two together was worth it after all.
engSearchText:
Looks like bringing you two together was worth it
after all.
jpnChrName: クスクス…… 段取った甲斐があったわね。
jpnSearchText:
クスクス……
段取った甲斐があったわね。

engChrName: It's nice to see you again, Ms. Rouran. It's been what...four years now?
engSearchText:
It's nice to see you again, Ms. Rouran. It's been
what...four years now?
jpnChrName: 私とは４年振りくらいかしら？ 改めて宜しくね、ロウラン室長。
jpnSearchText:
私とは４年振りくらいかしら？
改めて宜しくね、ロウラン室長。

engChrName: The same to you. Our positions may be different, but we need not be at odds with one another, Ms. Bright.
engSearchText:
The same to you. Our positions may be different, but
we need not be at odds with one another, Ms. Bright.
jpnChrName: こちらこそ──立場は違えど 貴女とは対立する理由もない。
jpnSearchText:
こちらこそ──立場は違えど
貴女とは対立する理由もない。

engChrName: I'm glad we have a chance to catch up—of course, I'm pleased to make your acquaintance as well, Mr. Arkride.
engSearchText:
I'm glad we have a chance to catch up—of course, I'm
pleased to make your acquaintance as well,
Mr. Arkride.
jpnChrName: こうして顔を合わせる機会が あって良かった……彼も含めてね。
jpnSearchText:
こうして顔を合わせる機会が
あって良かった……彼も含めてね。

engChrName: It's getting to be more like a real tea party every minute.
engSearchText:
It's getting to be more like a real tea party
every minute.
jpnChrName: ……なるほど、紛う方なき “お茶会”ってわけか。
jpnSearchText:
……なるほど、紛う方なき
“お茶会”ってわけか。

engChrName: Maybe I should have invited Sylphid along after all?
engSearchText: Maybe I should have invited Sylphid along after all?
jpnChrName: うふふ、妖精のお姉さんも 呼ぼうかと思ったけど。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、妖精のお姉さんも
呼ぼうかと思ったけど。

engChrName: Sorry for the wait, Kilika—er, what did I just walk in on?
engSearchText:
Sorry for the wait, Kilika—er, what did I just walk
in on?
jpnChrName: 待たせたなキリカ── っておいおい、こいつは。
jpnSearchText:
待たせたなキリカ──
っておいおい、こいつは。

engChrName: I should think that's obvious, Zin.
engSearchText: I should think that's obvious, Zin.
jpnChrName: 遅かったわね、ジン。
jpnSearchText: 遅かったわね、ジン。

engChrName: And I had hoped you would be more punctual, considering this is our first meal together in some time.
engSearchText:
And I had hoped you would be more punctual,
considering this is our first meal together in
some time.
jpnChrName: 久しぶりの食事なのに 相変わらずルーズだこと。
jpnSearchText:
久しぶりの食事なのに
相変わらずルーズだこと。

engChrName: Sorry, an urgent job came in. I finished it off as quickly as I could.
engSearchText:
Sorry, an urgent job came in. I finished it off as
quickly as I could.
jpnChrName: スマン、急な依頼が入ってな。 なんとか急いで片付けたんだが。
jpnSearchText:
スマン、急な依頼が入ってな。
なんとか急いで片付けたんだが。

engChrName: I wasn't expecting to find the two of you here, though.
engSearchText:
I wasn't expecting to find the two of you
here, though.
jpnChrName: にしてもアークライドに お前さんまでいるとは……
jpnSearchText:
にしてもアークライドに
お前さんまでいるとは……

engChrName: It's good to see you again, too.
engSearchText: It's good to see you again, too.
jpnChrName: うふふ、ジンさんも久しぶりね。
jpnSearchText: うふふ、ジンさんも久しぶりね。

engChrName: I know we've spoken a few times over the phone, but I think it's been about a year and a half since we last met up in-person.
engSearchText:
I know we've spoken a few times over the phone, but
I think it's been about a year and a half since we last
met up in-person.
jpnChrName: 何度か通信で話はしてたけど 会うのは１年半ぶりかしら？
jpnSearchText:
何度か通信で話はしてたけど
会うのは１年半ぶりかしら？

engChrName: Oh, yeah. That was at the wedding, wasn't it?
engSearchText: Oh, yeah. That was at the wedding, wasn't it?
jpnChrName: ああ、あいつらの結婚式以来だな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、あいつらの結婚式以来だな。

engChrName: Man... You've really grown up. Hard to believe you're that same little girl that knocked us out in Grancel all those years ago.
engSearchText:
Man... You've really grown up. Hard to believe you're
that same little girl that knocked us out in Grancel all
those years ago.
jpnChrName: しかしレン、またデカくなったなぁ。 王都で眠らされた６年前が懐かしいぜ。
jpnSearchText:
しかしレン、またデカくなったなぁ。
王都で眠らされた６年前が懐かしいぜ。

engChrName: Oh, right! I nearly forgot about that.
engSearchText: Oh, right! I nearly forgot about that.
jpnChrName: クスクス。 あったわねぇ、そんな事も。
jpnSearchText:
クスクス。
あったわねぇ、そんな事も。

engChrName: You nearly forgot? Yeesh... You are somethin' else, kid.
engSearchText:
You nearly forgot? Yeesh... You are somethin'
else, kid.
jpnChrName: どこから突っ込んでいいのやら。
jpnSearchText: どこから突っ込んでいいのやら。

engChrName: Well, everything happens for a reason, they say. We wouldn't be here talking now if it wasn't for that.
engSearchText:
Well, everything happens for a reason, they say.
We wouldn't be here talking now if it wasn't for that.
jpnChrName: ふふ、それも含めての縁でしょう。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、それも含めての縁でしょう。

engChrName: Oh, now I see what's going on here. I thought it was odd when you told me you wanted to visit. Should've known you already had company.
engSearchText:
Oh, now I see what's going on here. I thought it was
odd when you told me you wanted to visit.
Should've known you already had company.
jpnChrName: ……なるほど、珍しく都合が ついたと思えば俺の方がついでか。
jpnSearchText:
……なるほど、珍しく都合が
ついたと思えば俺の方がついでか。

engChrName: Now don't give me that jealous look, Zin. It's less cute on a man your age. I promise I'll buy you a drink to make up for it.
engSearchText:
Now don't give me that jealous look, Zin. It's less
cute on a man your age. I promise I'll buy you a drink
to make up for it.
jpnChrName: フフ、いい歳なんだからスネないの。 お詫びに一杯奢るわ。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、いい歳なんだからスネないの。
お詫びに一杯奢るわ。

engChrName: You two might not be in the same line of work anymore, but it looks to me like not much has changed since your days back at the dojo.
engSearchText:
You two might not be in the same line of work
anymore, but it looks to me like not much has
changed since your days back at the dojo.
jpnChrName: つーか立場が違ってもアンタら、 同門のノリのまんまじゃねーか？
jpnSearchText:
つーか立場が違ってもアンタら、
同門のノリのまんまじゃねーか？

engChrName: You sure you really need help from a guy like me?
engSearchText: You sure you really need help from a guy like me?
jpnChrName: 俺なんぞを下請けに使う必要、 マジであんのかって勢いなんだが。
jpnSearchText:
俺なんぞを下請けに使う必要、
マジであんのかって勢いなんだが。

engChrName: Oh, definitely.
engSearchText: Oh, definitely.
jpnChrName: それはそれ、これはこれってな。
jpnSearchText: それはそれ、これはこれってな。

engChrName: We've barely been managing to make ends meet since Fie got here. We're going to need the help for a while, I think.
engSearchText:
We've barely been managing to make ends meet since
Fie got here. We're going to need the help for a
while, I think.
jpnChrName: こっちもフィーが来てギリギリでな、 しばらくの間は勘弁してくれ。
jpnSearchText:
こっちもフィーが来てギリギリでな、
しばらくの間は勘弁してくれ。

engChrName: You're extremely well connected, too.
engSearchText: You're extremely well connected, too.
jpnChrName: それに貴方の人脈と巡り合わせは どうも尋常ではなさそうだし。
jpnSearchText:
それに貴方の人脈と巡り合わせは
どうも尋常ではなさそうだし。

engChrName: I'm told you even have ties to another Taito student.
engSearchText: I'm told you even have ties to another Taito student.
jpnChrName: 私たちの“兄弟子”なんかも含めてね。
jpnSearchText: 私たちの“兄弟子”なんかも含めてね。

engChrName: As a matter of fact, we were actually just talking about that before you got here.
engSearchText:
As a matter of fact, we were actually just talking
about that before you got here.
jpnChrName: うふふ、丁度そんな話をしてた所よ。
jpnSearchText: うふふ、丁度そんな話をしてた所よ。

engChrName: It's like he fits right in no matter whose side he's on. Hmm... How should I put it? He's... He's like a singularity.
engSearchText:
It's like he fits right in no matter whose side he's on.
Hmm... How should I put it? He's... He's like
a singularity.
jpnChrName: 何物にも染まらぬ表と裏の橋渡し── ううん“特異点”みたいな人よねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
何物にも染まらぬ表と裏の橋渡し──
ううん“特異点”みたいな人よねぇ。

engChrName: Yeah. If you wanna know something, Arkride's your guy.
engSearchText:
Yeah. If you wanna know something, Arkride's
your guy.
jpnChrName: ああ、手っ取り早く何かを探るには 打ってつけとしか言いようがないからなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、手っ取り早く何かを探るには
打ってつけとしか言いようがないからなぁ。

engChrName: Hey, lay off with that singularity business! I don't appreciate bein' talked about like a research specimen, okay?
engSearchText:
Hey, lay off with that singularity business! I don't
appreciate bein' talked about like a research
specimen, okay?
jpnChrName: うるせえよ！ 人を何かの試験紙みたいに言いやがって！
jpnSearchText:
うるせえよ！
人を何かの試験紙みたいに言いやがって！

engChrName: And just so we're clear, you guys might not be as bad as the Direwolf or Cao, but you're still a major pain in the ass!
engSearchText:
And just so we're clear, you guys might not be as bad
as the Direwolf or Cao, but you're still a major pain in
the ass!
jpnChrName: 言っとくが痩せ狼やツァオほどじゃなくても アンタら全員“厄介”な部類だからな！？
jpnSearchText:
言っとくが痩せ狼やツァオほどじゃなくても
アンタら全員“厄介”な部類だからな！？

engChrName: Haha. Can't say I don't get where you're coming from.
engSearchText:
Haha. Can't say I don't get where you're
coming from.
jpnChrName: ハハ、まあそいつは否定はせんさ。
jpnSearchText: ハハ、まあそいつは否定はせんさ。

engChrName: So, what's the plan? I've got a reservation not too long from now at a restaurant near here. You coming, Kilika?
engSearchText:
So, what's the plan? I've got a reservation not too long
from now at a restaurant near here. You
coming, Kilika?
jpnChrName: っと、そろそろ時間だがどうする？ 一応店を予約してるんだが。
jpnSearchText:
っと、そろそろ時間だがどうする？
一応店を予約してるんだが。

engChrName: Of course. I think I've played my part here.
engSearchText: Of course. I think I've played my part here.
jpnChrName: ええ、もちろん付き合うわ。 “お茶会”も果たせたことだし。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、もちろん付き合うわ。
“お茶会”も果たせたことだし。

engChrName: I'll see you both again sometime. Take care in Tharbad.
engSearchText:
I'll see you both again sometime. Take care
in Tharbad.
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、今日はこのくらいで── サルバッドでも気をつけてちょうだい。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ、今日はこのくらいで──
サルバッドでも気をつけてちょうだい。

engChrName: Sheesh... Is there anybody around here that doesn't know my itinerary?
engSearchText:
Sheesh... Is there anybody around here that doesn't
know my itinerary?
jpnChrName: どいつもこいつも人のスケジュールを 当然のように把握しやがって……
jpnSearchText:
どいつもこいつも人のスケジュールを
当然のように把握しやがって……

engChrName: That aside, I guess you're not totally on board with the guild yet, after all, huh?
engSearchText:
That aside, I guess you're not totally on board with
the guild yet, after all, huh?
jpnChrName: ただまあ──どうやらギルドとは 完全に連携してるわけでも無さそうだな？
jpnSearchText:
ただまあ──どうやらギルドとは
完全に連携してるわけでも無さそうだな？

engChrName: We do work together sometimes, but I'm not a bracer like my siblings, after all.
engSearchText:
We do work together sometimes, but I'm not a bracer
like my siblings, after all.
jpnChrName: うふふ、馴染みはあるけど 姉たちと違って遊撃士でもないしね。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、馴染みはあるけど
姉たちと違って遊撃士でもないしね。

engChrName: I just do what I can to help and try to offer them my knowledge if I know it'll help the people I care for.
engSearchText:
I just do what I can to help and try to offer them my
knowledge if I know it'll help the people I care for.
jpnChrName: 大切なものを守るために 時に協力し、知恵を貸してるだけよ。
jpnSearchText:
大切なものを守るために
時に協力し、知恵を貸してるだけよ。

engChrName: Both in Liberl and in Crossbell.
engSearchText: Both in Liberl and in Crossbell.
jpnChrName: リベールやクロスベルにいる人たち……
jpnSearchText: リベールやクロスベルにいる人たち……

engChrName: I've been adding a lot of people here in Calvard to that list, too, lately.
engSearchText:
I've been adding a lot of people here in Calvard to
that list, too, lately.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、最近じゃこの国の人たちも そうなって来てるかもしれないけど。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、最近じゃこの国の人たちも
そうなって来てるかもしれないけど。

engChrName: That's good to hear.
engSearchText: That's good to hear.
jpnChrName: ………そうか。
jpnSearchText: ………そうか。

engChrName: Well, I should be getting home. Estelle and Joshua will be wondering where I've gotten to.
engSearchText:
Well, I should be getting home. Estelle and Joshua
will be wondering where I've gotten to.
jpnChrName: ──それじゃ、レンも帰るわね。 門限を破りすぎるのもアレだし。
jpnSearchText:
──それじゃ、レンも帰るわね。
門限を破りすぎるのもアレだし。

engChrName: I'll be counting on you to take care of Agnès while she's with you.
engSearchText:
I'll be counting on you to take care of Agnès while
she's with you.
jpnChrName: 明日からの４日間、 くれぐれもアニエスをよろしく。
jpnSearchText:
明日からの４日間、
くれぐれもアニエスをよろしく。

engChrName: I'll do what I can.
engSearchText: I'll do what I can.
jpnChrName: ああ、任せとけ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、任せとけ。

engChrName: Though, aren't the Brights back in Liberl? You goin' all the way back there? Just like that?
engSearchText:
Though, aren't the Brights back in Liberl? You goin'
all the way back there? Just like that?
jpnChrName: それはともかく…… 一人称、戻ってねぇか？
jpnSearchText:
それはともかく……
一人称、戻ってねぇか？

engChrName: ...Oh. Yes, of course. Home is...far away. Being around so many familiar faces made me think I was back there, I suppose.
engSearchText:
...Oh. Yes, of course. Home is...far away.
Being around so many familiar faces made me think I
was back there, I suppose.
jpnChrName: ……懐かしい人たちに会って 油断してしまったみたい。
jpnSearchText:
……懐かしい人たちに会って
油断してしまったみたい。

engChrName: I'm so ashamed. A girl on the cusp of adulthood should be a little more...focused.
engSearchText:
I'm so ashamed. A girl on the cusp of adulthood
should be a little more...focused.
jpnChrName: 一人前のレディとしては まだまだかしらね。
jpnSearchText:
一人前のレディとしては
まだまだかしらね。

engChrName: Think you're giving adults a little too much credit there, kiddo.
engSearchText:
Think you're giving adults a little too much credit
there, kiddo.
jpnChrName: ま、たまにはいいんじゃねぇか？
jpnSearchText: ま、たまにはいいんじゃねぇか？
ぁ……

engChrName: When I found you five years ago, you were still lost and tryin' to find your place in the world.
engSearchText:
When I found you five years ago, you were still lost
and tryin' to find your place in the world.
jpnChrName: ５年前…… お前さんは迷い、彷徨いまくってた。
jpnSearchText:
５年前……
お前さんは迷い、彷徨いまくってた。

engChrName: I'd only just finished my training and was still gettin' a feel for what it was to be a spriggan.
engSearchText:
I'd only just finished my training and was still gettin'
a feel for what it was to be a spriggan.
jpnChrName: 俺はちょうど“修行”を終えて この仕事を手探りで始めたくらいで──
jpnSearchText:
俺はちょうど“修行”を終えて
この仕事を手探りで始めたくらいで──

engChrName: I'll admit I kept you safe for a while and gave you a few pointers, but...I never really could do much for you.
engSearchText:
I'll admit I kept you safe for a while and gave you a
few pointers, but...I never really could do much
for you.
jpnChrName: 少しのあいだ匿い、アドバイスはしたが “何か”をしてやれたわけじゃねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
少しのあいだ匿い、アドバイスはしたが
“何か”をしてやれたわけじゃねぇ。

engChrName: Meanwhile, you managed to build yourself a new life, new friendships—hell, a whole new family―all on your own.
engSearchText:
Meanwhile, you managed to build yourself a new life,
new friendships—hell, a whole new family―all on
your own.
jpnChrName: だがお前さんは自分の手で絆を、 大切なものを手に入れたんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
だがお前さんは自分の手で絆を、
大切なものを手に入れたんだろう。

engChrName: You're no lost kitten anymore. You're as fine a lady as any.
engSearchText:
You're no lost kitten anymore. You're as fine a lady
as any.
jpnChrName: もう迷い猫、仔猫じゃねえ── じゅうぶん一人前のレディだろ。
jpnSearchText:
もう迷い猫、仔猫じゃねえ──
じゅうぶん一人前のレディだろ。

engChrName: So, is this how you treat all the young ladies you keep company with?
engSearchText:
So, is this how you treat all the young ladies you keep
company with?
jpnChrName: そのレディ相手にこの扱いは どうかと思うけど……？
jpnSearchText:
そのレディ相手にこの扱いは
どうかと思うけど……？

engChrName: Oh. Uhh... Guess not.
engSearchText: Oh. Uhh... Guess not.
jpnChrName: おっと……
jpnSearchText: おっと……

engChrName: You say you never did much for me, but you give yourself far too little credit.
engSearchText:
You say you never did much for me, but you give
yourself far too little credit.
jpnChrName: ふふ、それと何もできなかったというのは 流石に過小評価が過ぎるわね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、それと何もできなかったというのは
流石に過小評価が過ぎるわね。

engChrName: It's not just me you've helped, either—take your old friend, that bracer girl, for example.
engSearchText:
It's not just me you've helped, either—take your old
friend, that bracer girl, for example.
jpnChrName: レンにしても、噂の昔馴染さんにしても。
jpnSearchText: レンにしても、噂の昔馴染さんにしても。

engChrName: Or what about your assistants, including my dear dormmate?
engSearchText:
Or what about your assistants, including my
dear dormmate?
jpnChrName: 助手さんたちや── もちろん私の大切な後輩にしても。
jpnSearchText:
助手さんたちや──
もちろん私の大切な後輩にしても。

engChrName: You help more people than you think. People who wouldn't have found themselves without you to take them by the hand and show them the way.
engSearchText:
You help more people than you think. People who
wouldn't have found themselves without you to take
them by the hand and show them the way.
jpnChrName: 貴方の手は、貴方が思っている以上に 人を導き、引き上げ、背を押している筈よ。
jpnSearchText:
貴方の手は、貴方が思っている以上に
人を導き、引き上げ、背を押している筈よ。

jpnChrName: そいつは……
jpnSearchText: そいつは……

engChrName: If you ask me, you need to be a little more aware of the impact your words and deeds have had on people.
engSearchText:
If you ask me, you need to be a little more aware of
the impact your words and deeds have had on people.
jpnChrName: ま、そういった己の所業（カルマ）を、 貴方は一度自覚すべきでしょうね。
jpnSearchText:
ま、そういった己の所業（カルマ）を、
貴方は一度自覚すべきでしょうね。

engChrName: If you can manage that, then I might even be willing to overlook a little headpat every now and again. ❤
engSearchText:
If you can manage that, then I might even be willing
to overlook a little headpat every now and again. ❤
jpnChrName: そうすればさっきみたいな迂闊な扱いも 喜んで受け入れてあげるわ❤
jpnSearchText:
そうすればさっきみたいな迂闊な扱いも
喜んで受け入れてあげるわ❤
っ……？

engChrName: Heehee. And with that, I think I'll be off now. Good night...Mr. Spriggan.
engSearchText:
Heehee. And with that, I think I'll be off now.
Good night...Mr. Spriggan.
jpnChrName: うふふ、今度こそ私はこれで。 おやすみなさい──裏解決屋さん。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、今度こそ私はこれで。
おやすみなさい──裏解決屋さん。

engChrName: Yeah. G'night.
engSearchText: Yeah. G'night.
jpnChrName: ……ああ、おやすみだ。
jpnSearchText: ……ああ、おやすみだ。

engChrName: (Man, she's grown more than I could've ever imagined—and I know she's nowhere near done.)
engSearchText:
