(Man, she's grown more than I could've ever
imagined—and I know she's nowhere near done.)
jpnChrName: （一人前どころの話じゃねぇな。   どこまでデカくなるんだか、ったく。）
jpnSearchText:
（一人前どころの話じゃねぇな。
どこまでデカくなるんだか、ったく。）

engChrName: (I'll have to keep an eye on her the same way I do my part-timers now that fate's brought us back together like this.)
engSearchText:
(I'll have to keep an eye on her the same way I do my
part-timers now that fate's brought us back together
like this.)
jpnChrName: （ま、これも何かの縁か……   助手ども同様、見守らせてもらうかね。）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、これも何かの縁か……
助手ども同様、見守らせてもらうかね。）

engChrName: After leaving the district, they made their way to the surface, following a different route.
engSearchText:
After leaving the district, they made their way to the
surface, following a different route.
jpnChrName: その後、黒芒街を出たヴァンたちは 行きとは異なるルートを通って地上に戻った。
jpnSearchText:
その後、黒芒街を出たヴァンたちは
行きとは異なるルートを通って地上に戻った。

engChrName: October 18th, 5:05PM
engSearchText: October 18th, 5:05PM

engChrName: Damn, it's already this late? We were down there a while.
engSearchText:
Damn, it's already this late? We were down there
a while.
jpnChrName: もうこんな時間か…… 結構かかっちまったな。
jpnSearchText:
もうこんな時間か……
結構かかっちまったな。

engChrName: It connects to the Riverside District, too?
engSearchText: It connects to the Riverside District, too?
jpnChrName: リバーサイド…… こんな所にも繋がってたなんて。
jpnSearchText:
リバーサイド……
こんな所にも繋がってたなんて。

engChrName: Feels like waking up from a dream...
engSearchText: Feels like waking up from a dream...
jpnChrName: なんだか夢でも見ていた気分です。
jpnSearchText: なんだか夢でも見ていた気分です。

engChrName: Heh. Guess it was all a bit too much for a kid.
engSearchText: Heh. Guess it was all a bit too much for a kid.
jpnChrName: クク、さすがにお子ちゃまには 刺激が強かったんじゃねーのか？
jpnSearchText:
クク、さすがにお子ちゃまには
刺激が強かったんじゃねーのか？

engChrName: Speaking of kids, seems like that boy we ran into is the son of a jaeger.
engSearchText:
Speaking of kids, seems like that boy we ran into is
the son of a jaeger.
jpnChrName: つってもガキもいたな…… 女猟兵の息子だったみてぇだが。
jpnSearchText:
つってもガキもいたな……
女猟兵の息子だったみてぇだが。

engChrName: I really liked it down there! Shady criminals excluded.
engSearchText: I really liked it down there! Shady criminals excluded.
jpnChrName: はいっ、半グレとかはともかく わたしは嫌いじゃないですっ。
jpnSearchText:
はいっ、半グレとかはともかく
わたしは嫌いじゃないですっ。

engChrName: It was like a conflict could break out at any second—a perfect place for training!
engSearchText:
It was like a conflict could break out at any
second—a perfect place for training!
jpnChrName: 紛争地帯の街にも似てて…… 何より訓練にもなりますしっ！
jpnSearchText:
紛争地帯の街にも似てて……
何より訓練にもなりますしっ！

engChrName: Not this again...
engSearchText: Not this again...
jpnChrName: またそれかよ……
jpnSearchText: またそれかよ……

engChrName: At least it hadn't fully descended into anarchy, even if the rules were somewhat lax.
engSearchText:
At least it hadn't fully descended into anarchy, even if
the rules were somewhat lax.
jpnChrName: 最低限のルールはあるようですし 付き合い方しだいではないかと。
jpnSearchText:
最低限のルールはあるようですし
付き合い方しだいではないかと。

engChrName: It seemed like a good place to procure goods and materials you can't get on the surface.
engSearchText:
It seemed like a good place to procure goods and
materials you can't get on the surface.
jpnChrName: 表に流通していない資材などの 調達にも使えそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
表に流通していない資材などの
調達にも使えそうですね。

engChrName: Yeah. Don't want anyone getting hooked on the place, but use it when you need to—just follow the rules.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Don't want anyone getting hooked on the
place, but use it when you need to—just follow
the rules.
jpnChrName: ああ、ハマリすぎない程度に 筋を通して利用すればいい。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ハマリすぎない程度に
筋を通して利用すればいい。

engChrName: That goes for you in particular, Aaron.
engSearchText: That goes for you in particular, Aaron.
jpnChrName: 特にアーロン…… あんま入り浸るんじゃねえぞ？
jpnSearchText:
特にアーロン……
あんま入り浸るんじゃねえぞ？

engChrName: *whistle*
engSearchText: *whistle*

engChrName: You okay, Agnès? You're awfully quiet.
engSearchText: You okay, Agnès? You're awfully quiet.
jpnChrName: アニエスさん…… ……どうしましたか？
jpnSearchText:
アニエスさん……
……どうしましたか？

engChrName: N-No! I'm perfectly fine.
engSearchText: N-No! I'm perfectly fine.
jpnChrName: え、あ…… いえっ、何でもないですよ！
jpnSearchText:
え、あ……
いえっ、何でもないですよ！

engChrName: It was just a lot to take in. I'm feeling a bit of culture shock, I suppose.
engSearchText:
It was just a lot to take in. I'm feeling a bit of culture
shock, I suppose.
jpnChrName: ちょっとカルチャーショックで ぼうっとしていただけで。
jpnSearchText:
ちょっとカルチャーショックで
ぼうっとしていただけで。

engChrName: ...I can hardly blame you.
engSearchText: ...I can hardly blame you.
jpnChrName: ……無理もないかと。
jpnSearchText: ……無理もないかと。

engChrName: I-I'm sorry! I was probably making you feel even worse with how carried away I was getting.
engSearchText:
I-I'm sorry! I was probably making you feel even
worse with how carried away I was getting.
jpnChrName: す、すみませんっ……！ わたし、はしゃいじゃって……
jpnSearchText:
す、すみませんっ……！
わたし、はしゃいじゃって……

engChrName: Oh, you don't need to feel responsible!
engSearchText: Oh, you don't need to feel responsible!
jpnChrName: あはは、フェリちゃんが 謝る必要なんてないですって。
jpnSearchText:
あはは、フェリちゃんが
謝る必要なんてないですって。

engChrName: It's just... Umm... To be honest, I've got something else on my mind, too.
engSearchText:
It's just... Umm... To be honest, I've got something
else on my mind, too.
jpnChrName: その、それだけじゃなくって 別の考えごともあって……
jpnSearchText:
その、それだけじゃなくって
別の考えごともあって……

engChrName: It does kinda feel like something's been eating at you lately.
engSearchText:
It does kinda feel like something's been eating at
you lately.
jpnChrName: ……そういや最近、 なんか考えてる感じだったな。
jpnSearchText:
……そういや最近、
なんか考えてる感じだったな。

engChrName: Worried about things at school?
engSearchText: Worried about things at school?
jpnChrName: 学校の授業かなんかで 迷ってることでもあんのか？
jpnSearchText:
学校の授業かなんかで
迷ってることでもあんのか？

engChrName: Y-Yes, actually... There's a major opportunity coming up that I was considering opting into.
engSearchText:
Y-Yes, actually... There's a major opportunity coming
up that I was considering opting into.
jpnChrName: ！　ええ、実はちょっとした 特殊なカリキュラムがあるんです。
jpnSearchText:
！　ええ、実はちょっとした
特殊なカリキュラムがあるんです。

engChrName: But I think I've decided against it.
engSearchText: But I think I've decided against it.
jpnChrName: でも……やっぱり、 今回はやめておこうかなって。
jpnSearchText:
でも……やっぱり、
今回はやめておこうかなって。

engChrName: There's nothing more it can teach me that I haven't learned already, after all.
engSearchText:
There's nothing more it can teach me that I haven't
learned already, after all.
jpnChrName: 確かめたい事も出来ましたし……
jpnSearchText: 確かめたい事も出来ましたし……

engChrName: Oh?
engSearchText: Oh?
jpnChrName: 確かめる……？
jpnSearchText: 確かめる……？

engChrName: Hmm?
engSearchText: Hmm?
jpnChrName: ……ハン？
jpnSearchText: ……ハン？

engChrName: Our information did not lead us astray, I see.
engSearchText: Our information did not lead us astray, I see.
jpnChrName: ──やあ、情報通りだね。
jpnSearchText: ──やあ、情報通りだね。

engChrName: It's good to see you all, my friends.
engSearchText: It's good to see you all, my friends.
jpnChrName: 十日ぶりくらいか── また会えて嬉しいよ、諸君。
jpnSearchText:
十日ぶりくらいか──
また会えて嬉しいよ、諸君。

engChrName: That it is.
engSearchText: That it is.
jpnChrName: ご無沙汰しております。
jpnSearchText: ご無沙汰しております。

engChrName: Your Highness!
engSearchText: Your Highness!
jpnChrName: 公太子殿下……！？
jpnSearchText: 公太子殿下……！？

engChrName: Naje!
engSearchText: Naje!
jpnChrName: ナージェさんまで……
jpnSearchText: ナージェさんまで……

engChrName: Damn. Talk about showin' up unexpected.
engSearchText: Damn. Talk about showin' up unexpected.
jpnChrName: オイオイオイ…… どういう登場の仕方だっつの？
jpnSearchText:
オイオイオイ……
どういう登場の仕方だっつの？

engChrName: Ugh... So this is what the chief was talkin' about.
engSearchText: Ugh... So this is what the chief was talkin' about.
jpnChrName: ったく……お前んトコの 室長が言ってたのはこれかよ。
jpnSearchText:
ったく……お前んトコの
室長が言ってたのはこれかよ。

engChrName: Correct.
engSearchText: Correct.
jpnChrName: ああ、そういう事だ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、そういう事だ。

engChrName: His Highness and I have something to discuss with you. Please, climb in.
engSearchText:
His Highness and I have something to discuss
with you. Please, climb in.
jpnChrName: 殿下と合わせて話がある── お前たちも乗ってもらおうか。
jpnSearchText:
殿下と合わせて話がある──
お前たちも乗ってもらおうか。

engChrName: Dingooo...why won't you just listen to meee?
engSearchText: Dingooo...why won't you just listen to meee?
jpnChrName: も～、ディンゴさぁあん……！ どうして分かってくれないんですかあ。
jpnSearchText:
も～、ディンゴさぁあん……！
どうして分かってくれないんですかあ。

engChrName: I... I need you with me at the Tyrell Times...
engSearchText: I... I need you with me at the Tyrell Times...
jpnChrName: わたし……わたしディンゴさんに どうしてもタイレル通信にぃ……
jpnSearchText:
わたし……わたしディンゴさんに
どうしてもタイレル通信にぃ……

engChrName: Like I said, I'll leave the honest journalism to you.
engSearchText: Like I said, I'll leave the honest journalism to you.
jpnChrName: だから正道（そっち）はお前さんに任せるさ。
jpnSearchText: だから正道（そっち）はお前さんに任せるさ。

engChrName: Sorry for the trouble, Bermotti.
engSearchText: Sorry for the trouble, Bermotti.
jpnChrName: ──すまないな。 少しばかり迷惑をかけたようだ。
jpnSearchText:
──すまないな。
少しばかり迷惑をかけたようだ。

engChrName: Oh, please! This is nothing. Don't you worry about a thing.
engSearchText:
Oh, please! This is nothing. Don't you worry about
a thing.
jpnChrName: ふふ、いいのよ。 そのくらい可愛いもんじゃない。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、いいのよ。
そのくらい可愛いもんじゃない。

engChrName: Still, if you ask me, I think you're more than ready to leave the back alleys yourself.
engSearchText:
Still, if you ask me, I think you're more than ready to
leave the back alleys yourself.
jpnChrName: でもディンゴちゃん……貴方もそろそろ “表”を歩いてもいいと思うけどね。
jpnSearchText:
でもディンゴちゃん……貴方もそろそろ
“表”を歩いてもいいと思うけどね。

engChrName: It's been eight years, you know.
engSearchText: It's been eight years, you know.
jpnChrName: もう、８年になるんでしょう？
jpnSearchText: もう、８年になるんでしょう？

engChrName: It's not a matter of how much time's passed. Besides, I feel like my current path suits me better at this point.
engSearchText:
It's not a matter of how much time's passed.
Besides, I feel like my current path suits me better at
this point.
jpnChrName: 時間の問題じゃない。 このくらいが俺は丁度いいのさ。
jpnSearchText:
時間の問題じゃない。
このくらいが俺は丁度いいのさ。

engChrName: You should be saying that to Van...
engSearchText: You should be saying that to Van...
jpnChrName: その台詞はヴァンにでも──
jpnSearchText: その台詞はヴァンにでも──

engChrName: Oh, my. Is that him, cheating on me with Shino?
engSearchText: Oh, my. Is that him, cheating on me with Shino?
jpnChrName: あら、ヴァンちゃん。 シノちゃんのトコに浮気かしら？
jpnSearchText:
あら、ヴァンちゃん。
シノちゃんのトコに浮気かしら？

engChrName: I can't say I'm not jealous, but she's been refining her craft a lot lately—
engSearchText:
I can't say I'm not jealous, but she's been refining her
craft a lot lately—
jpnChrName: ちょっと妬けちゃうけど あの娘も随分と腕を上げてるし──
jpnSearchText:
ちょっと妬けちゃうけど
あの娘も随分と腕を上げてるし──

engChrName: Oh, my. Oh, my! My, my, MY!
engSearchText: Oh, my. Oh, my! My, my, MY!
jpnChrName: ってアラ……？ アラアラアラぁ～……！？
jpnSearchText:
ってアラ……？
アラアラアラぁ～……！？

engChrName: Heh. Looks like our boy might finally be starting to move on.
engSearchText:
Heh. Looks like our boy might finally be starting to
move on.
jpnChrName: フッ……あいつも少しは 前を向き始めているのかもな。
jpnSearchText:
フッ……あいつも少しは
前を向き始めているのかもな。

engChrName: Mmm... I wanna chase scoops togetheeer...
engSearchText: Mmm... I wanna chase scoops togetheeer...
jpnChrName: むにゃむにゃ…… ……いっしょにスクープを～………
jpnSearchText:
むにゃむにゃ……
……いっしょにスクープを～………

engChrName: Here are the Gimlet and Grasshopper that you ordered.
engSearchText:
Here are the Gimlet and Grasshopper that
you ordered.
jpnChrName: お待たせしました── ギムレットとグラスホッパーです。
jpnSearchText:
お待たせしました──
ギムレットとグラスホッパーです。

engChrName: Thanks. They've both got just the right amount of foam.
engSearchText:
Thanks. They've both got just the right amount
of foam.
jpnChrName: サンクス、絶妙な泡立ちだな。
jpnSearchText: サンクス、絶妙な泡立ちだな。

engChrName: Your shaking technique has really improved, Shino. I'm impressed.
engSearchText:
Your shaking technique has really improved, Shino.
I'm impressed.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、シェイクのキレといい、 また腕を上げたわね？
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、シェイクのキレといい、
また腕を上げたわね？

engChrName: Thank you for saying so, but I'm still not a patch on Bermotti. Well, please enjoy your drinks.
engSearchText:
Thank you for saying so, but I'm still not a patch
on Bermotti. Well, please enjoy your drinks.
jpnChrName: ベルモッティさんに比べればまだまだですよ。 どうぞごゆっくり。
jpnSearchText:
ベルモッティさんに比べればまだまだですよ。
どうぞごゆっくり。

engChrName: This is lovely. Still, I see you like even your cocktails sweet.
engSearchText:
This is lovely. Still, I see you like even your
cocktails sweet.
jpnChrName: 美味しい……それにしても カクテルまで甘いのが好きなのね？
jpnSearchText:
美味しい……それにしても
カクテルまで甘いのが好きなのね？

engChrName: Well, not all the time.
engSearchText: Well, not all the time.
jpnChrName: ま、辛口のも飲むが……
jpnSearchText: ま、辛口のも飲むが……

engChrName: Come to think of it, I've shot back a few with René, but I guess this is my first time doing it with you, huh?
engSearchText:
Come to think of it, I've shot back a few with René,
but I guess this is my first time doing it with
you, huh?
jpnChrName: そういや、ルネはともかくお前とは ちゃんと飲んだことがなかったな。
jpnSearchText:
そういや、ルネはともかくお前とは
ちゃんと飲んだことがなかったな。

engChrName: We were too young, remember? Although, I suppose that didn't stop you at the school festival afterparty.
engSearchText:
We were too young, remember? Although, I suppose
that didn't stop you at the school festival afterparty.
jpnChrName: 飲んでたら問題でしょう…… ──学藝祭の打ち上げは知らないけど。
jpnSearchText:
飲んでたら問題でしょう……
──学藝祭の打ち上げは知らないけど。

engChrName: *whistle* I got no idea what you're talkin' about.
engSearchText: *whistle* I got no idea what you're talkin' about.
jpnChrName: ～～♪　なんの事かなぁ？
jpnSearchText: ～～♪　なんの事かなぁ？

engChrName: I swear, you two are why they say 'boys will be boys.' Haha.
engSearchText:
I swear, you two are why they say 'boys will be boys.'
Haha.
jpnChrName: まったく貴方といいルネといい。 ……ふふっ………
jpnSearchText:
まったく貴方といいルネといい。
……ふふっ………

engChrName: Hahaha...
engSearchText: Hahaha...
jpnSearchText: ………ははっ…………

engChrName: Considering someone has been avoiding me these past four years, we really haven't run into each other much...
engSearchText:
Considering someone has been avoiding me these
past four years, we really haven't run into each
other much...
jpnChrName: この４年、誰かさんが避けていたせいで 殆ど顔を合わせなかったけど……
jpnSearchText:
この４年、誰かさんが避けていたせいで
殆ど顔を合わせなかったけど……

engChrName: But come to think of it, we've ended up with a lot of shared acquaintances. Bermotti, Shino...
engSearchText:
But come to think of it, we've ended up with a lot of
shared acquaintances. Bermotti, Shino...
jpnChrName: ベルモッティさんといいシノさんといい、 共通の知り合いは多いわね。
jpnSearchText:
ベルモッティさんといいシノさんといい、
共通の知り合いは多いわね。

engChrName: And I suppose even that actress qualifies now.
engSearchText: And I suppose even that actress qualifies now.
jpnChrName: ああ、あの女優さんも一応そうかしら？
jpnSearchText: ああ、あの女優さんも一応そうかしら？

engChrName: Hey, don't look at me like that. She's just a client, that's all.
engSearchText:
Hey, don't look at me like that. She's just a client,
that's all.
jpnChrName: た、ただの元依頼人だっつーの。
jpnSearchText: た、ただの元依頼人だっつーの。

engChrName: It's just what happens when two folks work the same city.
engSearchText:
It's just what happens when two folks work the
same city.
jpnChrName: ……ま、お互い首都を 拠点にしてりゃあそうなるだろ。
jpnSearchText:
……ま、お互い首都を
拠点にしてりゃあそうなるだろ。

engChrName: Especially when our jobs are like two sides of the same coin.
engSearchText:
Especially when our jobs are like two sides of the
same coin.
jpnChrName: ただでさえコインの 表と裏みたいな道を選んでるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ただでさえコインの
表と裏みたいな道を選んでるんだ。

engChrName: I suppose you're right...though what does that make René? Heads or tails?
engSearchText:
I suppose you're right...though what does that
make René? Heads or tails?
jpnChrName: ……そうね。 それで言うとルネは表、裏？
jpnSearchText:
……そうね。
それで言うとルネは表、裏？

engChrName: He's the edge of the coin. Or the guy with the coin in the palm of his hand.
engSearchText:
He's the edge of the coin. Or the guy with the coin in
the palm of his hand.
jpnChrName: あいつは側面（サイド）だろう。 もしくはコインを掌で転がす側だな。
jpnSearchText:
あいつは側面（サイド）だろう。
もしくはコインを掌で転がす側だな。

engChrName: *sigh* Good point.
engSearchText: *sigh* Good point.
jpnChrName: ふう、やっぱりそうよね。
jpnSearchText: ふう、やっぱりそうよね。

engChrName: I thought he'd made a very fitting career choice when he decided to join the Ministry of Home Affairs before graduation.
engSearchText:
I thought he'd made a very fitting career choice when
he decided to join the Ministry of Home Affairs
before graduation.
jpnChrName: ……卒業前、内務省入りを決めた時は 彼らしい進路だと思ったけど……
jpnSearchText:
……卒業前、内務省入りを決めた時は
彼らしい進路だと思ったけど……

engChrName: I never expected he'd end up transferring to the CID when it was established and become a rival of sorts.
engSearchText:
I never expected he'd end up transferring to the CID
when it was established and become a rival of sorts.
jpnChrName: まさかＣＩＤ設立時に移籍して 微妙に対立するとは思わなかったわ。
jpnSearchText:
まさかＣＩＤ設立時に移籍して
微妙に対立するとは思わなかったわ。

engChrName: That's just the kind of guy he is. Like how he acts like a venerable older brother figure, even though he's only a year older than us.
engSearchText:
That's just the kind of guy he is. Like how he acts like
a venerable older brother figure, even though he's
only a year older than us.
jpnChrName: あいつはそういうヤツだろ。 一つ上ってだけで兄貴面しやがって。
jpnSearchText:
あいつはそういうヤツだろ。
一つ上ってだけで兄貴面しやがって。

engChrName: Incidentally, he seemed surprised when he learned I was joining the guild. Happily, he wasn't opposed, either.
engSearchText:
Incidentally, he seemed surprised when he learned I
was joining the guild. Happily, he wasn't
opposed, either.
jpnChrName: ちなみに彼は、私のギルド入りを 驚きはしたけど反対はしなかったわ。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに彼は、私のギルド入りを
驚きはしたけど反対はしなかったわ。

engChrName: He was like my only ally, outside my circle of friends...after a certain someone disappeared.
engSearchText:
He was like my only ally, outside my circle of
friends...after a certain someone disappeared.
jpnChrName: 誰かさんが居なくなった後、友達以外では 唯一の味方だったとも言えるわね。
jpnSearchText:
誰かさんが居なくなった後、友達以外では
唯一の味方だったとも言えるわね。

engChrName: Erk...
engSearchText: Erk...
jpnChrName: ぐっ……
jpnSearchText: ぐっ……

engChrName: Haha... You really haven't changed at all, these last seven years.
engSearchText:
Haha... You really haven't changed at all, these last
seven years.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、何だか変わらないわね。 今も、７年前も。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、何だか変わらないわね。
今も、７年前も。

engChrName: Or the last fifteen, for that matter.
engSearchText: Or the last fifteen, for that matter.
jpnChrName: いえ……１５年前もかしら？
jpnSearchText: いえ……１５年前もかしら？

engChrName: While we're talking about not changing, you do know it's your fault I ended up with such a sweet tooth, right?
engSearchText:
While we're talking about not changing, you do know
it's your fault I ended up with such a sweet
tooth, right?
jpnChrName: 言っとくが、俺が甘党になったのは あのガキの頃がきっかけだからな？
jpnSearchText:
言っとくが、俺が甘党になったのは
あのガキの頃がきっかけだからな？

engChrName: All you did was stuff a poor, impressionable Van full of chocolate and macarons from your family biz all the time.
engSearchText:
All you did was stuff a poor, impressionable Van full
of chocolate and macarons from your family biz all
the time.
jpnChrName: 実家自慢のショコラだのマカロンだの、 庶民のガキにホイホイ喰わせやがって。
jpnSearchText:
実家自慢のショコラだのマカロンだの、
庶民のガキにホイホイ喰わせやがって。

engChrName: Mmm, perhaps. But René got just as stuffed and avoided sugar addiction, so I can only think you were doomed to end up this way regardless.
engSearchText:
Mmm, perhaps. But René got just as stuffed and
avoided sugar addiction, so I can only think you were
doomed to end up this way regardless.
jpnChrName: ルネはそうならなかったんだから 貴方自身の性向だと思うけど……
jpnSearchText:
ルネはそうならなかったんだから
貴方自身の性向だと思うけど……

engChrName: I really don't remember you having this much of a sweet tooth when you were younger, though. Are you sure something didn't happen after—
engSearchText:
I really don't remember you having this much of a
sweet tooth when you were younger, though. Are you
sure something didn't happen after—
jpnChrName: でも、そこまでじゃなかったわよね？ 引き取られた先で何か──
jpnSearchText:
でも、そこまでじゃなかったわよね？
引き取られた先で何か──

engChrName: ...I'm sorry. I didn't mean to rip at old scars.
engSearchText: ...I'm sorry. I didn't mean to rip at old scars.
jpnChrName: ………ご免なさい。 また、繰り返しちゃったわね。
jpnSearchText:
………ご免なさい。
また、繰り返しちゃったわね。

engChrName: Heh. Haven't got a clue what you're talkin' about.
engSearchText: Heh. Haven't got a clue what you're talkin' about.
jpnChrName: ハッ、何のことだ？
jpnSearchText: ハッ、何のことだ？

engChrName: Still. I don't have any regrets about ending up this way. Adds a bit of fun to life.
engSearchText:
Still. I don't have any regrets about ending up
this way. Adds a bit of fun to life.
jpnChrName: 色々あって甘党にはなったが おかげで日々堪能させてもらってるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
色々あって甘党にはなったが
おかげで日々堪能させてもらってるぜ。

engChrName: My employees always look at me funny, but if they're gonna complain about me loving sweet stuff, they can give theirs to me, I say.
engSearchText:
My employees always look at me funny, but if they're
gonna complain about me loving sweet stuff, they can
give theirs to me, I say.
jpnChrName: 助手どもは微妙に呆れ顔だが…… ハン、だったら全部俺に寄越せってんだ。
jpnSearchText:
助手どもは微妙に呆れ顔だが……
ハン、だったら全部俺に寄越せってんだ。

engChrName: Heehee...
engSearchText: Heehee...

engChrName: I...still have mixed feelings about your career choice.
engSearchText: I...still have mixed feelings about your career choice.
jpnChrName: ……やっぱり貴方の仕事に 無条件では賛成できないけれど。
jpnSearchText:
……やっぱり貴方の仕事に
無条件では賛成できないけれど。

engChrName: But I've been feeling a little better about it, lately, seeing the sort of people you're attracting.
engSearchText:
But I've been feeling a little better about it, lately,
seeing the sort of people you're attracting.
jpnChrName: アニエスさんを始め、 いい助手には恵まれているみたいね？
jpnSearchText:
アニエスさんを始め、
いい助手には恵まれているみたいね？

engChrName: I really didn't expect you to end up with a student of Professor Hamilton working under you, though.
engSearchText:
I really didn't expect you to end up with a student of
Professor Hamilton working under you, though.
jpnChrName: あのハミルトン博士のお弟子さんまで 加わるとは思わなかったけど。
jpnSearchText:
あのハミルトン博士のお弟子さんまで
加わるとは思わなかったけど。

engChrName: 'Attracting' is definitely the right word. It's like I'm a magnet for hard cases these days.
engSearchText:
'Attracting' is definitely the right word. It's like I'm a
magnet for hard cases these days.
jpnChrName: 揃いも揃って押しかけだがな。
jpnSearchText: 揃いも揃って押しかけだがな。

engChrName: Well, I guess Risette's technically different since she's on loan from Marduk.
engSearchText:
Well, I guess Risette's technically different since she's
on loan from Marduk.
jpnChrName: ……いや、出向って形だから リゼットは一応違うか。
jpnSearchText:
……いや、出向って形だから
リゼットは一応違うか。

engChrName: I'm honestly shocked at just how much you seem to trust her.
engSearchText:
I'm honestly shocked at just how much you seem to
trust her.
jpnChrName: そういえば彼女のことは 随分、信頼しているみたいね？
jpnSearchText:
そういえば彼女のことは
随分、信頼しているみたいね？

engChrName: Not that I have any doubts about how capable she is, given her employer.
engSearchText:
Not that I have any doubts about how capable she is,
given her employer.
jpnChrName: あの企業のＳＣともなれば 有能なのは間違いないでしょうけど。
jpnSearchText:
あの企業のＳＣともなれば
有能なのは間違いないでしょうけど。

engChrName: Oh, she's capable all right—and I know I can trust her. Just wish I could say the same about her bosses.
engSearchText:
Oh, she's capable all right—and I know I can
trust her. Just wish I could say the same about
her bosses.
jpnChrName: 本人は信用できるしマジで助かってるが、 どうしても出向元その物がなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
本人は信用できるしマジで助かってるが、
どうしても出向元その物がなぁ……

engChrName: Marduk... So shady, you can see the shadow for selge. You ain't got anything on them, do you?
engSearchText:
Marduk... So shady, you can see the shadow for selge.
You ain't got anything on them, do you?
jpnChrName: 胡散臭すぎんだろあの会社（マルドゥック）。 お前んとこは何か掴んでねえのかよ？
jpnSearchText:
胡散臭すぎんだろあの会社（マルドゥック）。
お前んとこは何か掴んでねえのかよ？

engChrName: They're as much of an enigma to us as the society is, I'm afraid.
engSearchText:
They're as much of an enigma to us as the society is,
I'm afraid.
jpnChrName: 残念ながら《結社》と同じくらい謎ね。
jpnSearchText: 残念ながら《結社》と同じくらい謎ね。

engChrName: Still, you're the one who has a contract with them. Good job, signing away your soul to the selge-long shadow.
engSearchText:
Still, you're the one who has a contract with them.
Good job, signing away your soul to the
selge-long shadow.
jpnChrName: そういった企業と契約上とはいえ、 付き合いがある不明を恥じたらどう？
jpnSearchText:
そういった企業と契約上とはいえ、
付き合いがある不明を恥じたらどう？

engChrName: Ugh... Bah. Shino! Bring me an Alexander, would ya?
engSearchText: Ugh... Bah. Shino! Bring me an Alexander, would ya?
jpnChrName: ぐっ……ああもう、 シノ、アレキサンダーを頼む！
jpnSearchText:
ぐっ……ああもう、
シノ、アレキサンダーを頼む！

engChrName: I would like a White Lady, please.
engSearchText: I would like a White Lady, please.
jpnChrName: こちらはホワイトレディをお願い。
jpnSearchText: こちらはホワイトレディをお願い。

engChrName: Certainly.
engSearchText: Certainly.
jpnChrName: はい、かしこまりました。
jpnSearchText: はい、かしこまりました。

engChrName: Damn... I really wasn't expectin' you to go and foot the bill.
engSearchText:
Damn... I really wasn't expectin' you to go and foot
the bill.
jpnChrName: ……ったく。 まさか奢られちまうとは。
jpnSearchText:
……ったく。
まさか奢られちまうとは。

engChrName: How's a guy supposed to look suave if you won't even let him pick up the check?
engSearchText:
How's a guy supposed to look suave if you won't even
let him pick up the check?
jpnChrName: こういう時は男に 格好付けさせるのが礼儀だろうが。
jpnSearchText:
こういう時は男に
格好付けさせるのが礼儀だろうが。

engChrName: I was the one who invited you here. And, please, that idea's so old-fashioned it's covered in moss.
engSearchText:
I was the one who invited you here. And, please, that
idea's so old-fashioned it's covered in moss.
jpnChrName: 誘ったのは私なんだし 今時、男も女もないでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
誘ったのは私なんだし
今時、男も女もないでしょう。

engChrName: You're going away next weekend with your team, right? If you really want to buy someone something nice, treat them instead.
engSearchText:
You're going away next weekend with your
team, right? If you really want to buy someone
something nice, treat them instead.
jpnChrName: 来週末、旅行に行くのよね？ 助手さんたちに奢ってあげなさい。
jpnSearchText:
来週末、旅行に行くのよね？
助手さんたちに奢ってあげなさい。

engChrName: Besides, I'm sure you're already aware, but being an A-rank bracer pays rather well.
engSearchText:
Besides, I'm sure you're already aware, but being an
A-rank bracer pays rather well.
jpnChrName: ──ちなみに知ってると思うけど Ａ級はそれなりに稼いでいるから。
jpnSearchText:
──ちなみに知ってると思うけど
Ａ級はそれなりに稼いでいるから。

engChrName: Geez... Rub it in some more, why don'tcha?
engSearchText: Geez... Rub it in some more, why don'tcha?
jpnChrName: ぐっ……コノヤロ。
jpnSearchText: ぐっ……コノヤロ。

engChrName: You can treat next time.
engSearchText: You can treat next time.
jpnChrName: ふふっ…… お返しに今度奢ってちょうだい。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ……
お返しに今度奢ってちょうだい。

engChrName: How does that sound?
engSearchText: How does that sound?
jpnChrName: それなら構わないでしょう？
jpnSearchText: それなら構わないでしょう？

engChrName: You're on. The tab'll be way bigger next time, anyway.
engSearchText:
You're on. The tab'll be way bigger next
time, anyway.
jpnChrName: ハッ、わーったよ。 甲斐性ってのを見せてやる。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、わーったよ。
甲斐性ってのを見せてやる。

engChrName: Could always call René, too... Ooh, wait. I got a better idea.
engSearchText:
Could always call René, too... Ooh, wait. I got a
better idea.
jpnChrName: 何だったらルネも呼ぶか── いや、それはまた別の機会だな。
jpnSearchText:
何だったらルネも呼ぶか──
いや、それはまた別の機会だな。

engChrName: Let's save that for when we go some place REALLY expensive. In his line of work, the guy's probably loaded by now.
engSearchText:
Let's save that for when we go some place
REALLY expensive. In his line of work, the guy's
probably loaded by now.
jpnChrName: あの野郎も相当稼いでそうだし、 思いっきり高い店で奢らせてやる！
jpnSearchText:
あの野郎も相当稼いでそうだし、
思いっきり高い店で奢らせてやる！

engChrName: Oh, you...
engSearchText: Oh, you...
jpnChrName: ふふ、まったくもう。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、まったくもう。

engChrName: I'm going to take a cab home. You're taking the subway back, right?
engSearchText:
I'm going to take a cab home. You're taking the
subway back, right?
jpnChrName: ……私はタクシーを拾うわ。 貴方は地下鉄だったわよね？
jpnSearchText:
……私はタクシーを拾うわ。
貴方は地下鉄だったわよね？

engChrName: Yeah. No buses run this late at night.
engSearchText: Yeah. No buses run this late at night.
jpnChrName: ああ、もうバスもねぇしな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、もうバスもねぇしな。

engChrName: Night, Elaine. Here's to...a good working relationship from here on out.
engSearchText:
Night, Elaine. Here's to...a good working relationship
from here on out.
jpnChrName: ──それじゃあな、エレイン。 今後もお手柔らかに頼むぜ。
jpnSearchText:
──それじゃあな、エレイン。
今後もお手柔らかに頼むぜ。

engChrName: That will be entirely dependent on you. ...Good night, Van.
engSearchText:
That will be entirely dependent on you.
...Good night, Van.
jpnChrName: ふふ、それは貴方次第でしょう。 ……おやすみなさい。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、それは貴方次第でしょう。
……おやすみなさい。

engChrName: Van!
engSearchText: Van!
jpnChrName: ヴァン──！
jpnSearchText: ヴァン──！

engChrName: ...Hmm? What's up?
engSearchText: ...Hmm? What's up?
jpnChrName: ……？　どうした？
jpnSearchText: ……？　どうした？

engChrName: Are you... Are you really going to go on that trip?
engSearchText: Are you... Are you really going to go on that trip?
jpnChrName: ……来週末……… 本当に旅行に行っちゃうの……？
jpnSearchText:
……来週末………
本当に旅行に行っちゃうの……？

engChrName: Wha...?
engSearchText: Wha...?

engChrName: What's gotten into—?
engSearchText: What's gotten into—?
jpnChrName: おい、エレイン──
jpnSearchText: おい、エレイン──

engChrName: It's nothing. I-I hope you have a good time.
engSearchText: It's nothing. I-I hope you have a good time.
jpnChrName: なんでもない、旅行楽しんできて。
jpnSearchText: なんでもない、旅行楽しんできて。

engChrName: Don't forget...you're a leader now. Don't get too carried away out there, okay?
engSearchText:
Don't forget...you're a leader now. Don't get too
carried away out there, okay?
jpnChrName: 引率者の自覚は忘れないように── あまり羽目も外しすぎないようにね？
jpnSearchText:
引率者の自覚は忘れないように──
あまり羽目も外しすぎないようにね？

engChrName: (What was that all about? Haven't seen her act like that since we were kids.)
engSearchText:
(What was that all about? Haven't seen her act like
that since we were kids.)
jpnChrName: （……なんだ………？   まるでガキの頃みたいな……）
jpnSearchText:
（……なんだ………？
まるでガキの頃みたいな……）

engChrName: (It's been so long since we first met in Oración, all those years ago.)
engSearchText:
(It's been so long since we first met in Oración, all
those years ago.)
jpnChrName: （……オラシオン……   俺たちが初めて出会った場所。）
jpnSearchText:
（……オラシオン……
俺たちが初めて出会った場所。）

engChrName: (She was the daughter of the biggest family in the area, René was the son of a government man slavin' away his life far from home, and I...)
engSearchText:
(She was the daughter of the biggest family in the
area, René was the son of a government man slavin'
away his life far from home, and I...)
jpnChrName: （あいつは街きっての名家のお嬢様で   ルネは出張役人の息子、そして俺は……）
jpnSearchText:
（あいつは街きっての名家のお嬢様で
ルネは出張役人の息子、そして俺は……）

engChrName: (Sounds like she stopped talkin' to her family after joining the guild, though.)
engSearchText:
(Sounds like she stopped talkin' to her family after
joining the guild, though.)
jpnChrName: （……ギルド入りしてから   どうやら実家と没交渉みたいだが……）
jpnSearchText:
（……ギルド入りしてから
どうやら実家と没交渉みたいだが……）

engChrName: (Maybe there's some kinda problem in her personal life she's not talking about?)
engSearchText:
(Maybe there's some kinda problem in her personal
life she's not talking about?)
jpnChrName: （ひょっとしたら仕事とは別に   プライベートでも何かあるのかもな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ひょっとしたら仕事とは別に
プライベートでも何かあるのかもな。）

engChrName: (Not like it'll make up for what happened seven years ago, but maybe I should talk to her about it sometime.)
engSearchText:
(Not like it'll make up for what happened seven years
ago, but maybe I should talk to her about
it sometime.)
jpnChrName: （……７年前の詫びってわけじゃねえが、   そのうち話でも聞いてみるか──）
jpnSearchText:
（……７年前の詫びってわけじゃねえが、
そのうち話でも聞いてみるか──）

engChrName: This is one of your favorite spots, right? Full of the law-abiding and the lawless!
engSearchText:
This is one of your favorite spots, right? Full of the
law-abiding and the lawless!
jpnChrName: “裏”でも有名な…… 貴方たちの行きつけだったみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
“裏”でも有名な……
貴方たちの行きつけだったみたいね。

engChrName: Yeah. It's one of the best places to hit up if you're looking for info.
engSearchText:
Yeah. It's one of the best places to hit up if you're
looking for info.
jpnChrName: ああ……情報収集なら ここを外すわけにはいかねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……情報収集なら
ここを外すわけにはいかねぇな。

engChrName: Let's head in.
engSearchText: Let's head in.
jpnChrName: 行くぞ。
jpnSearchText: 行くぞ。

engChrName: All right...
engSearchText: All right...
jpnChrName: ……はい。
jpnSearchText: ……はい。

engChrName: Van...
engSearchText: Van...
jpnChrName: ……ヴァンちゃん…………
jpnSearchText: ……ヴァンちゃん…………

engChrName: Long time no see.
engSearchText: Long time no see.
jpnChrName: ……久しぶりだな。
jpnSearchText: ……久しぶりだな。

engChrName: Yeah. It's been about two months, I think?
engSearchText: Yeah. It's been about two months, I think?
jpnChrName: ２ヶ月ぶり、くらいかな？
jpnSearchText: ２ヶ月ぶり、くらいかな？

engChrName: Oh! We didn't know you two would be here!
engSearchText: Oh! We didn't know you two would be here!
jpnChrName: あ……！ ハルさんにジャックさん……！
jpnSearchText:
あ……！
ハルさんにジャックさん……！

engChrName: Hey, guys.
engSearchText: Hey, guys.
jpnChrName: ジャック、それにハルも……
jpnSearchText: ジャック、それにハルも……

engChrName: Well, this is a shocker.
engSearchText: Well, this is a shocker.
jpnChrName: アンタら、こっちに来てたのかよ？
jpnSearchText: アンタら、こっちに来てたのかよ？

engChrName: You're looking well, Aaron.
engSearchText: You're looking well, Aaron.
jpnChrName: アーロンはまあ……元気そうね。
jpnSearchText: アーロンはまあ……元気そうね。

engChrName: Didn't think for a second he wouldn't be.
engSearchText: Didn't think for a second he wouldn't be.
jpnChrName: そこは心配しちゃいないがな。
jpnSearchText: そこは心配しちゃいないがな。

engChrName: Ashen told us about what happened. It's so awful...
engSearchText: Ashen told us about what happened. It's so awful...
jpnChrName: アシェンから聞いたけど…… 大変なことが起きちゃったね。
jpnSearchText:
アシェンから聞いたけど……
大変なことが起きちゃったね。

engChrName: Yes, it is...
engSearchText: Yes, it is...

engChrName: Please have a seat, everyone. I'm sure we have a lot to talk about.
engSearchText:
Please have a seat, everyone. I'm sure we have a lot to
talk about.
jpnChrName: とりあえず座って。 話はそれからよ。
jpnSearchText:
とりあえず座って。
話はそれからよ。

engChrName: So you were acquainted with Dingo, too, Jack?
engSearchText: So you were acquainted with Dingo, too, Jack?
jpnChrName: ……そうですか、ジャックさんも ディンゴさんと知り合いだったんですね。
jpnSearchText:
……そうですか、ジャックさんも
ディンゴさんと知り合いだったんですね。

engChrName: Yeah. I'm five years his senior, and even as capable as he is, he was kind of like a little brother to me.
engSearchText:
Yeah. I'm five years his senior, and even as capable as
he is, he was kind of like a little brother to me.
jpnChrName: ああ、俺の方が５歳上で、 出来た弟分のようなモンだった。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、俺の方が５歳上で、
出来た弟分のようなモンだった。

engChrName: I call the capital my home, while Jack's is in Langport.
engSearchText:
I call the capital my home, while Jack's is
in Langport.
jpnChrName: 首都が拠点のアタシ、 煌都を拠点とするジャックちゃん……
jpnSearchText:
首都が拠点のアタシ、
煌都を拠点とするジャックちゃん……

engChrName: Meanwhile, Dingo's work led him all around the country.
engSearchText:
Meanwhile, Dingo's work led him all around
the country.
jpnChrName: 職業柄、各地を飛び回るディンゴちゃん……
jpnSearchText: 職業柄、各地を飛び回るディンゴちゃん……

engChrName: The three of us all had other careers, but we dealt in information, too, and got along great.
engSearchText:
The three of us all had other careers, but we dealt in
information, too, and got along great.
jpnChrName: それぞれ別の顔を持っているけれど、 “情報屋”同士、いい関係を築けていたわ。
jpnSearchText:
それぞれ別の顔を持っているけれど、
“情報屋”同士、いい関係を築けていたわ。

engChrName: Yeah. Sometimes one of us would outwit the others, but none of us ever crossed the line like Giacomo did.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Sometimes one of us would outwit the others,
but none of us ever crossed the line like Giacomo did.
jpnChrName: 互いに出し抜く時もあるが、ジャコモのように “一線”は踏み外すことはなかった。
jpnSearchText:
互いに出し抜く時もあるが、ジャコモのように
“一線”は踏み外すことはなかった。

engChrName: Still hard to believe he's dead, too...
engSearchText: Still hard to believe he's dead, too...
jpnChrName: そういやあいつも 逝っちまったんだったな……
jpnSearchText:
そういやあいつも
逝っちまったんだったな……

engChrName: Giacomo got what was coming to him, but Dingo didn't deserve that at all!
engSearchText:
Giacomo got what was coming to him, but Dingo
didn't deserve that at all!
jpnChrName: ジャコモは自業自得だけど、 ディンゴちゃんは違うわ……！
jpnSearchText:
ジャコモは自業自得だけど、
ディンゴちゃんは違うわ……！

engChrName: I know. That's why me and Halle are here.
engSearchText: I know. That's why me and Halle are here.
jpnChrName: ああ、分かってる。 だからこうして俺とハルは首都に来た。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、分かってる。
だからこうして俺とハルは首都に来た。

engChrName: To help you guys figure out what Almata's up to.
engSearchText: To help you guys figure out what Almata's up to.
jpnChrName: アルマータの情報収集を手伝うためにね。
jpnSearchText: アルマータの情報収集を手伝うためにね。

engChrName: I've had some dealings with them in the past, too— which is all the more reason I feel like I should be here to help.
engSearchText:
I've had some dealings with them in the past, too—
which is all the more reason I feel like I should be
here to help.
jpnChrName: あたしも連中とは少しばかり縁があるし。 そういう意味では、責任もある。
jpnSearchText:
あたしも連中とは少しばかり縁があるし。
そういう意味では、責任もある。

engChrName: Huh? What do you mean?
engSearchText: Huh? What do you mean?
jpnChrName: ああ……？ アルマータとなんかあるのかよ？
jpnSearchText:
ああ……？
アルマータとなんかあるのかよ？

engChrName: Was there some kind of conflict between you and Almata in the past?
engSearchText:
Was there some kind of conflict between you and
Almata in the past?
jpnChrName: ハルさんもアルマータと 何か確執があったんですか？
jpnSearchText:
ハルさんもアルマータと
何か確執があったんですか？

engChrName: Well...we were involved in the events that led to Dantès taking over.
engSearchText:
Well...we were involved in the events that led to
Dantès taking over.
jpnChrName: ……連中のボスが今のジェラールになった “きっかけ”に関わっていたの。
jpnSearchText:
……連中のボスが今のジェラールになった
“きっかけ”に関わっていたの。

engChrName: As I'm sure you've heard, Almata weren't half as bad before him.
engSearchText:
As I'm sure you've heard, Almata weren't half as bad
before him.
jpnChrName: 知っての通り連中がここまでヤバい組織に なったのは、ボスが代わってからだから……
jpnSearchText:
知っての通り連中がここまでヤバい組織に
なったのは、ボスが代わってからだから……

engChrName: Yeah. The story goes that he was their underboss back in the day, then made their former boss pay the price for screwing up.
engSearchText:
Yeah. The story goes that he was their underboss
back in the day, then made their former boss pay the
price for screwing up.
jpnChrName: 又聞きだが……ヤツが若頭の頃、 先代ボスがやらかした不始末だったか。
jpnSearchText:
又聞きだが……ヤツが若頭の頃、
先代ボスがやらかした不始末だったか。

engChrName: It sounds like he got what was coming to him, and Dantès was never gonna be satisfied servin' under a two-bit thug like him to begin with.
engSearchText:
It sounds like he got what was coming to him, and
Dantès was never gonna be satisfied servin' under a
two-bit thug like him to begin with.
jpnChrName: そいつの自業自得だろうし、ジェラールが そんな小物の下に収まり続けてるタマかよ。
jpnSearchText:
そいつの自業自得だろうし、ジェラールが
そんな小物の下に収まり続けてるタマかよ。

engChrName: Yeah. For being this big, scary mafia boss, Enrique was basically leading two things—jack and shit—and Jack left town.
engSearchText:
Yeah. For being this big, scary mafia boss, Enrique
was basically leading two things—jack and shit—and
Jack left town.
jpnChrName: ああ、先代のエンリケはせいぜい、 北の港町の悪党どもの親玉クラス……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、先代のエンリケはせいぜい、
北の港町の悪党どもの親玉クラス……

engChrName: Meanwhile, Dantès is as dangerous as they come, and he's drawn the ire of every major player on the continent.
engSearchText:
Meanwhile, Dantès is as dangerous as they come, and
he's drawn the ire of every major player on
the continent.
jpnChrName: 対してジェラールは今や、大陸中の勢力が 注目するほどのＳＳＳ級の危険人物だしな。
jpnSearchText:
対してジェラールは今や、大陸中の勢力が
注目するほどのＳＳＳ級の危険人物だしな。

engChrName: Yeah... It sounds like Heiyue's elders are finally planning to do something about the problem, too.
engSearchText:
Yeah... It sounds like Heiyue's elders are finally
planning to do something about the problem, too.
jpnChrName: うん……ちなみに《黒月》の長老会も ついに重い腰を上げたみたいでね。
jpnSearchText:
うん……ちなみに《黒月》の長老会も
ついに重い腰を上げたみたいでね。

engChrName: I've heard rumors they're already making their move.
engSearchText: I've heard rumors they're already making their move.
jpnChrName: 既に動き始めてるって噂を聞いたわ。
jpnSearchText: 既に動き始めてるって噂を聞いたわ。

engChrName: Heh. About damn time.
engSearchText: Heh. About damn time.
jpnChrName: ハン、やっと動きやがったか。
jpnSearchText: ハン、やっと動きやがったか。

engChrName: (I wonder if that means she's working with them, too...?)
engSearchText:
(I wonder if that means she's working with them,
too...?)
jpnChrName: （……もしかすると彼女も……）
jpnSearchText: （……もしかすると彼女も……）

engChrName: Word is that some famous jaegers outside the Republic are also looking to get involved.
engSearchText:
Word is that some famous jaegers outside the
Republic are also looking to get involved.
jpnChrName: 国外でも、名だたる猟兵団が 動き始めてるって噂もあるわ。
jpnSearchText:
国外でも、名だたる猟兵団が
動き始めてるって噂もあるわ。

engChrName: The church and the society are getting ready, too.
engSearchText: The church and the society are getting ready, too.
jpnChrName: ……教会に例の《結社》なんかもね。
jpnSearchText: ……教会に例の《結社》なんかもね。

engChrName: The society again, huh? They were in the Blacklight District the other day, weren't they?
engSearchText:
The society again, huh? They were in the Blacklight
District the other day, weren't they?
jpnChrName: 噂の……つい先日にも 黒芒街に来ていたようですが。
jpnSearchText:
噂の……つい先日にも
黒芒街に来ていたようですが。

engChrName: Makes sense the church would be acting, considering that bomb was blown up using an artifact.
engSearchText:
Makes sense the church would be acting, considering
that bomb was blown up using an artifact.
jpnChrName: “騎士団”か──例の兵器の起爆に 古代遺物を使ったとなれば当然だろうが。
jpnSearchText:
“騎士団”か──例の兵器の起爆に
古代遺物を使ったとなれば当然だろうが。

engChrName: Sounds like it's not just the guys you'd expect, either.
engSearchText: Sounds like it's not just the guys you'd expect, either.
jpnChrName: ああ…… だが今回はそれだけじゃ無さそうだぜ？
jpnSearchText:
ああ……
だが今回はそれだけじゃ無さそうだぜ？

engChrName: I've heard talk that there's another armed group in the church on the move.
engSearchText:
I've heard talk that there's another armed group in the
church on the move.
jpnChrName: 別口の“武装組織”なんてのも 動き始めているっつう噂があるらしい。
jpnSearchText:
別口の“武装組織”なんてのも
動き始めているっつう噂があるらしい。

engChrName: (I wonder if that relates to the other man we saw in the Blacklight District...?)
engSearchText:
(I wonder if that relates to the other man we saw in
the Blacklight District...?)
jpnChrName: （もしや黒芒街にいた   “もう一人”の……）
jpnSearchText:
（もしや黒芒街にいた
“もう一人”の……）

engChrName: Hmm... That is interesting.
engSearchText: Hmm... That is interesting.
jpnChrName: そいつは…… ちょっとばかり気になるな。
jpnSearchText:
そいつは……
ちょっとばかり気になるな。

engChrName: I know they took part in Mille Mirage two years ago, but they don't normally interfere in other countries' affairs, do they?
engSearchText:
I know they took part in Mille Mirage two years ago,
but they don't normally interfere in other countries'
affairs, do they?
jpnChrName: ２年前に“陽炎”側では動いてたが 他国に介入するような連中だったか？
jpnSearchText:
２年前に“陽炎”側では動いてたが
他国に介入するような連中だったか？

engChrName: Apparently, they have been a lot lately—seemingly at the behest of whoever's at the top.
engSearchText:
Apparently, they have been a lot lately—seemingly at
the behest of whoever's at the top.
jpnChrName: うーん、最近じゃ割とそうみたいね。 どうやら“トップ”の意向みたいだけど。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、最近じゃ割とそうみたいね。
どうやら“トップ”の意向みたいだけど。

engChrName: Umm...
engSearchText: Umm...
jpnChrName: えっと……
jpnSearchText: えっと……

engChrName: I never associated the church with armed combat in the first place, so this is all a bit of a surprise.
engSearchText:
I never associated the church with armed combat in
the first place, so this is all a bit of a surprise.
jpnChrName: ……そもそもなんで教会の話で そんな物騒な話題になるわけ？
jpnSearchText:
……そもそもなんで教会の話で
そんな物騒な話題になるわけ？

engChrName: I wonder what the society is after in all of this?
engSearchText: I wonder what the society is after in all of this?
jpnChrName: それと“結社”──だったかしら？
jpnSearchText: それと“結社”──だったかしら？

engChrName: It seems like they've been after Almata for a while now.
engSearchText:
It seems like they've been after Almata for a
while now.
jpnChrName: あっちもアルマータを狙ってるそうだけど 何か因縁でもあるのかしら？
jpnSearchText:
あっちもアルマータを狙ってるそうだけど
何か因縁でもあるのかしら？

engChrName: Yeah. That Direwolf guy was looking for Melchior the first time we ran into him.
engSearchText:
Yeah. That Direwolf guy was looking for Melchior
the first time we ran into him.
jpnChrName: はい、《痩せ狼》って人が あのメルキオルを追っていて……
jpnSearchText:
はい、《痩せ狼》って人が
あのメルキオルを追っていて……

engChrName: Indeed. I've heard the Direwolf was pursuing Melchior for a while.
engSearchText:
Indeed. I've heard the Direwolf was pursuing
Melchior for a while.
jpnChrName: ええ、《痩せ狼》がメルキオルってのを 追っていたのもそうだけど……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、《痩せ狼》がメルキオルってのを
追っていたのもそうだけど……

engChrName: It sounds like they were up to something in Tharbad, too.
engSearchText:
It sounds like they were up to something in
Tharbad, too.
jpnChrName: どうやらサルバッドでも 怪しげな動きをしてたみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
どうやらサルバッドでも
怪しげな動きをしてたみたいね。

engChrName: During the film festival? Hmm... He did not get involved directly in the chaos, at least.
engSearchText:
During the film festival? Hmm... He did not get
involved directly in the chaos, at least.
jpnChrName: 映画祭のあの時に…… 直接関わっていないようですが。
jpnSearchText:
映画祭のあの時に……
直接関わっていないようですが。

engChrName: I see.
engSearchText: I see.
jpnChrName: ……フン、なるほどな。
jpnSearchText: ……フン、なるほどな。

engChrName: Perhaps there's some kinda shady connection between the society and Almata—or the Gardens, for that matter.
engSearchText:
Perhaps there's some kinda shady connection
between the society and Almata—or the Gardens, for
that matter.
jpnChrName: 結社とアルマータ──もしくは庭園には “後ろ暗い因縁”でもあるのかもしれねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
結社とアルマータ──もしくは庭園には
“後ろ暗い因縁”でもあるのかもしれねぇ。

engChrName: At the very least we can take some solace in the fact they're definitely not working together.
engSearchText:
At the very least we can take some solace in the fact
they're definitely not working together.
jpnChrName: 不幸中の幸いなのは “協力関係”じゃなさそうってくらいか。
jpnSearchText:
不幸中の幸いなのは
“協力関係”じゃなさそうってくらいか。

engChrName: It's hard to imagine how the current situation could get any worse, but I suppose that is something...
engSearchText:
It's hard to imagine how the current situation could
get any worse, but I suppose that is something...
jpnChrName: ……既に最悪の一歩手前に 踏み入れているような状況みたいだけど。
jpnSearchText:
……既に最悪の一歩手前に
踏み入れているような状況みたいだけど。

engChrName: Everything hinges on Almata's next move, I suppose...
engSearchText:
Everything hinges on Almata's next move,
I suppose...
jpnChrName: はい、全てはアルマータが どう動くか次第でしょうし……
jpnSearchText:
はい、全てはアルマータが
どう動くか次第でしょうし……

engChrName: Yeah. The current deadlock ain't gonna last. Someone's gonna act out sooner or later, and I'm betting it'll be sooner.
engSearchText:
Yeah. The current deadlock ain't gonna last.
Someone's gonna act out sooner or later, and I'm
betting it'll be sooner.
jpnChrName: ま、今の膠着状態も長くはねぇ。 すぐにでも“何か”が動き出すだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ま、今の膠着状態も長くはねぇ。
すぐにでも“何か”が動き出すだろう。

engChrName: You can count on us when it comes to info. We'll let you know as soon as we hear anything of interest.
engSearchText:
You can count on us when it comes to info. We'll let
you know as soon as we hear anything of interest.
jpnChrName: 情報面のバックアップは任せて。 何か分かったら連絡するから。
jpnSearchText:
情報面のバックアップは任せて。
何か分かったら連絡するから。

engChrName: 'Preciate that. You guys just stay out of trouble out there, all right?
engSearchText:
'Preciate that. You guys just stay out of trouble out
there, all right?
jpnChrName: ああ、よろしく頼むぜ。 そっちこそヘマはすんなよ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、よろしく頼むぜ。
そっちこそヘマはすんなよ。

engChrName: Pfft, Halle will be fine, but Jack's gonna have to avoid drinking himself into an early grave.
engSearchText:
Pfft, Halle will be fine, but Jack's gonna have to avoid
drinking himself into an early grave.
jpnChrName: ハルはともかく、ジャックは あんま飲み過ぎんじゃねぇぞ？
jpnSearchText:
ハルはともかく、ジャックは
あんま飲み過ぎんじゃねぇぞ？

engChrName: All right, all right! Shit...
engSearchText: All right, all right! Shit...
jpnChrName: わーってるっての……
jpnSearchText: わーってるっての……

engChrName: Oh, wait! Before you go.
engSearchText: Oh, wait! Before you go.
jpnChrName: あ、待って、ヴァンちゃん。 そういえば──
jpnSearchText:
あ、待って、ヴァンちゃん。
そういえば──

engChrName: You remember Marielle, the young lady who was always chasing after Dingo, right?
engSearchText:
You remember Marielle, the young lady who was
always chasing after Dingo, right?
jpnChrName: いつもディンゴちゃんに絡んでいた あのマリエルって子だけど……
jpnSearchText:
いつもディンゴちゃんに絡んでいた
あのマリエルって子だけど……

engChrName: You...haven't seen her today, have you?
engSearchText: You...haven't seen her today, have you?
jpnChrName: 今日は見てないかしら？
jpnSearchText: 今日は見てないかしら？

engChrName: ...Nah. Afraid not.
engSearchText: ...Nah. Afraid not.
jpnChrName: いや……見てねぇな。
jpnSearchText: いや……見てねぇな。

engChrName: I haven't seen her ever since the emergency declaration was put into effect, come to think of it.
engSearchText:
I haven't seen her ever since the emergency
declaration was put into effect, come to think of it.
jpnChrName: そういえば非常事態宣言以来、 ずっと姿を見ていませんね……
jpnSearchText:
そういえば非常事態宣言以来、
ずっと姿を見ていませんね……

engChrName: She...really looked up to Dingo, didn't she? The news must have been a real shock.
engSearchText:
She...really looked up to Dingo, didn't she? The news
must have been a real shock.
jpnChrName: ……ディンゴさんの後輩だっけ？ 相当ショックだったみたいだけど。
jpnSearchText:
……ディンゴさんの後輩だっけ？
相当ショックだったみたいだけど。

engChrName: I've heard she's been desperately seeking out information on what happened, but...I'm worried she's going to get herself into trouble.
engSearchText:
I've heard she's been desperately seeking out
information on what happened, but...I'm worried
she's going to get herself into trouble.
jpnChrName: どうも必死に嗅ぎまわっているみたい。 危ないことをしてないといいけど……
jpnSearchText:
どうも必死に嗅ぎまわっているみたい。
危ないことをしてないといいけど……

engChrName: I see what you mean... All right, we'll try and keep an eye out for her.
engSearchText:
I see what you mean... All right, we'll try and keep an
eye out for her.
jpnChrName: ……確かに気掛かりだな。 分かった、気にかけておく。
jpnSearchText:
……確かに気掛かりだな。
分かった、気にかけておく。

engChrName: Damn...
engSearchText: Damn...

engChrName: It looks like time has stopped in this area, too.
engSearchText: It looks like time has stopped in this area, too.
jpnChrName: ふむ、どうやらここも “停まって”いるようだね。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、どうやらここも
“停まって”いるようだね。

engChrName: The effect extends this far, huh?
engSearchText: The effect extends this far, huh?
jpnChrName: ここも……みたいですね。
jpnSearchText: ここも……みたいですね。

engChrName: Yeah. There are a lot more people frozen here than in Old Town, too.
engSearchText:
Yeah. There are a lot more people frozen here than in
Old Town, too.
jpnChrName: ん、旧市街より 結構“停まって”いるかな。
jpnSearchText:
ん、旧市街より
結構“停まって”いるかな。

engChrName: The effect extends this far, too, I see.
engSearchText: The effect extends this far, too, I see.
jpnChrName: やはりここも、ですか……
jpnSearchText: やはりここも、ですか……

engChrName: I expected as much.
engSearchText: I expected as much.
jpnChrName: フフ、予想された事態ですね。
jpnSearchText: フフ、予想された事態ですね。

engChrName: This area has been frozen, too...
engSearchText: This area has been frozen, too...
jpnChrName: ……ここもやっぱり……
jpnSearchText: ……ここもやっぱり……

engChrName: Indeed—even if there aren't as many people frozen in time here as there are in front of the station.
engSearchText:
Indeed—even if there aren't as many people frozen in
time here as there are in front of the station.
jpnChrName: 流石に駅前ほど“停まった”方は 多くありませんが……
jpnSearchText:
流石に駅前ほど“停まった”方は
多くありませんが……

engChrName: We should probably assume the whole city's like this at this point.
engSearchText:
We should probably assume the whole city's like this
at this point.
jpnChrName: もう首都全体が 同じと思った方がいいね。
jpnSearchText:
もう首都全体が
同じと思った方がいいね。

engChrName: I suspect the entire city is in the same state.
engSearchText: I suspect the entire city is in the same state.
jpnChrName: もはや首都全域が 同じと考えるべきでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
もはや首都全域が
同じと考えるべきでしょう。

engChrName: Here they come! And something's tellin' me they won't be as much of a pushover as the others.
engSearchText:
Here they come! And something's tellin' me they
won't be as much of a pushover as the others.
jpnChrName: 出やがったか！ ──だがコイツは……
jpnSearchText:
出やがったか！
──だがコイツは……

engChrName: Heh. Looks like—these seem like they'll put up much more of a fight.
engSearchText:
Heh. Looks like—these seem like they'll put up much
more of a fight.
jpnChrName: フフ、どうやら先ほどの 連中とは一味違うようだ……！
jpnSearchText:
フフ、どうやら先ほどの
連中とは一味違うようだ……！

engChrName: Evil spirits sighted!
engSearchText: Evil spirits sighted!
jpnChrName: 悪しきジンを確認……！
jpnSearchText: 悪しきジンを確認……！

engChrName: These look like they've been enhanced by a demon sphere, too!
engSearchText:
These look like they've been enhanced by a demon
sphere, too!
jpnChrName: しかもやっぱり“魔球”で 強化されているみたい……！
jpnSearchText:
しかもやっぱり“魔球”で
強化されているみたい……！

engChrName: Here they come!
engSearchText: Here they come!
jpnChrName: 現れましたわね……！
jpnSearchText: 現れましたわね……！

engChrName: These look to have been enhanced by a demon sphere as well.
engSearchText:
These look to have been enhanced by a demon sphere
as well.
jpnChrName: しかもやはり“魔球”で 強化されているようです。
jpnSearchText:
しかもやはり“魔球”で
強化されているようです。

engChrName: O Arusha, grant us your protection!
engSearchText: O Arusha, grant us your protection!
jpnChrName: 翼の女神（アルーシャ）よ、我らに加護を！
jpnSearchText: 翼の女神（アルーシャ）よ、我らに加護を！

engChrName: We shall defeat them swiftly!
engSearchText: We shall defeat them swiftly!
jpnChrName: 速やかに無力化します！
jpnSearchText: 速やかに無力化します！

engChrName: This'll be a breeze!
engSearchText: This'll be a breeze!
jpnChrName: 速攻で片付ける……！
jpnSearchText: 速攻で片付ける……！

engChrName: This will barely take a moment!
engSearchText: This will barely take a moment!
jpnChrName: フフ、刹那で片付けましょうか！
jpnSearchText: フフ、刹那で片付けましょうか！

engChrName: That takes care of 'em. What was up with those auras they had, though?
engSearchText:
That takes care of 'em. What was up with those auras
they had, though?
jpnChrName: 片付けたか…… だが、今のオーラは。
jpnSearchText:
片付けたか……
だが、今のオーラは。

engChrName: I'm wondering the same thing. They were in a different league compared to the last batch.
engSearchText:
I'm wondering the same thing. They were in a
different league compared to the last batch.
jpnChrName: うん、先ほど戦った時とは 明らかに違っていたようだね。
jpnSearchText:
うん、先ほど戦った時とは
明らかに違っていたようだね。

engChrName: Whew... These things are still a real headache.
engSearchText: Whew... These things are still a real headache.
jpnChrName: ふう…… 相変わらず手こずったが。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……
相変わらず手こずったが。

engChrName: At least they were kinda small.
engSearchText: At least they were kinda small.
jpnChrName: 比較的小型でしたし 何とかなりましたねっ。
jpnSearchText:
比較的小型でしたし
何とかなりましたねっ。

engChrName: At least they were comparatively low-level devils.
engSearchText: At least they were comparatively low-level devils.
jpnChrName: 比較的低級の部類ですし まだやりようはありそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
比較的低級の部類ですし
まだやりようはありそうですね。

engChrName: The demon spheres're gonna have to buff 'em up a hell of a lot more than that if they want 'em to stand a chance against this crew.
engSearchText:
The demon spheres're gonna have to buff 'em up a
hell of a lot more than that if they want 'em to stand a
chance against this crew.
jpnChrName: 魔球で強化されてたとはいえ、 この面子なら危なげはねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
魔球で強化されてたとはいえ、
この面子なら危なげはねぇな。

engChrName: Yeah!
engSearchText: Yeah!
jpnChrName: えへへ、そうですねっ。
jpnSearchText: えへへ、そうですねっ。

engChrName: That said, we still cannot afford to let our guard down against them.
engSearchText:
That said, we still cannot afford to let our guard down
against them.
jpnChrName: とはいえ油断は禁物でしょうが。
jpnSearchText: とはいえ油断は禁物でしょうが。

engChrName: Wha—?!
engSearchText: Wha—?!

engChrName: Oh? Planning to overwhelm us with numbers, are you?
engSearchText:
Oh? Planning to overwhelm us with numbers,
are you?
jpnChrName: へえ、数で来るか……！
jpnSearchText: へえ、数で来るか……！

engChrName: There's so many of them!
engSearchText: There's so many of them!
jpnChrName: 多い──！
jpnSearchText: 多い──！

engChrName: Oh, my.
engSearchText: Oh, my.
jpnChrName: これはこれは……！
jpnSearchText: これはこれは……！

engChrName: Stay back.
engSearchText: Stay back.
jpnChrName: ──下がっていろ。
jpnSearchText: ──下がっていろ。

engChrName: That looked like—
engSearchText: That looked like—
jpnChrName: この攻撃はまさか……！？
jpnSearchText: この攻撃はまさか……！？

engChrName: K-Kasim?!
engSearchText: K-Kasim?!
jpnChrName: お、お兄ちゃん……！？
jpnSearchText: お、お兄ちゃん……！？

engChrName: Mr. Al-Fayed!
engSearchText: Mr. Al-Fayed!
jpnChrName: アルファイド主任……！
jpnSearchText: アルファイド主任……！

engChrName: Hey there. Figured you guys would get involved.
engSearchText: Hey there. Figured you guys would get involved.
jpnChrName: よう、お前らも動き出したか。
jpnSearchText: よう、お前らも動き出したか。

engChrName: Poison...?
engSearchText: Poison...?

engChrName: Heh. Looks like we were fortunate not to get to see that in action in Oración.
engSearchText:
Heh. Looks like we were fortunate not to get to see
that in action in Oración.
jpnChrName: ふふ、オラシオンでは お目にかかれなかったけど……
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、オラシオンでは
お目にかかれなかったけど……

engChrName: I've heard that he's a criminal genius and renowned for his poisons, but...
engSearchText:
I've heard that he's a criminal genius and renowned
for his poisons, but...
jpnChrName: 使徒第四柱《破戒》。 犯罪の天才にして毒使い……
jpnSearchText:
使徒第四柱《破戒》。
犯罪の天才にして毒使い……

engChrName: Hmm... It looks significantly more potent than the poison we make use of, too.
engSearchText:
Hmm... It looks significantly more potent than the
poison we make use of, too.
jpnChrName: ふむ、我らが使う蠱毒を 軽く上回りますか……
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、我らが使う蠱毒を
軽く上回りますか……

engChrName: Bah. He feels like he's more of a malevolent force than whatever WE'RE up against.
engSearchText:
Bah. He feels like he's more of a malevolent force
than whatever WE'RE up against.
jpnChrName: ……ったく、どっちが悪魔か 分かったもんじゃねえな。
jpnSearchText:
……ったく、どっちが悪魔か
分かったもんじゃねえな。

engChrName: I couldn't agree more.
engSearchText: I couldn't agree more.
jpnChrName: ええ、まったくもって同感だわ。
jpnSearchText: ええ、まったくもって同感だわ。

engChrName: Good to see you safe, Bermotti. And you're...
engSearchText: Good to see you safe, Bermotti. And you're...
jpnChrName: ベルモッティ、無事だったか。 それにお前さんは……
jpnSearchText:
ベルモッティ、無事だったか。
それにお前さんは……

engChrName: Oh, you're the guy Aaron's staying with, right?!
engSearchText: Oh, you're the guy Aaron's staying with, right?!
jpnChrName: あんたら、確かアーロンが 世話になってるっていう……
jpnSearchText:
あんたら、確かアーロンが
世話になってるっていう……

engChrName: Ugh... Please! You've gotta help him!
engSearchText: Ugh... Please! You've gotta help him!
jpnChrName: ぐっ……頼む！ アーロンたちに助太刀してくれ！
jpnSearchText:
ぐっ……頼む！
アーロンたちに助太刀してくれ！

engChrName: Wh-What do you mean?
engSearchText: Wh-What do you mean?
jpnChrName: ど、どういう事ですか！？
jpnSearchText: ど、どういう事ですか！？

engChrName: Has something happened to him?
engSearchText: Has something happened to him?
jpnChrName: アーロン様に何が……？
jpnSearchText: アーロン様に何が……？

jpnChrName: そいつは……
jpnSearchText: そいつは……

engChrName: I'll leave the explaining to you, Bermotti.
engSearchText: I'll leave the explaining to you, Bermotti.
jpnChrName: 説明は任せた、ベルモッティ氏。
jpnSearchText: 説明は任せた、ベルモッティ氏。

engChrName: We're getting out of here. Catch you later.
engSearchText: We're getting out of here. Catch you later.
jpnChrName: 俺たちは行くぜ、そんじゃあな。
jpnSearchText: 俺たちは行くぜ、そんじゃあな。

engChrName: Wh-What?!
engSearchText: Wh-What?!
jpnChrName: ちょ、お兄ちゃんっ！？
jpnSearchText: ちょ、お兄ちゃんっ！？

engChrName: I'm glad you're well, but this city is a battlefield.
engSearchText: I'm glad you're well, but this city is a battlefield.
jpnChrName: 無事だったのは重畳だが もはやこの街は戦場だ。
jpnSearchText:
無事だったのは重畳だが
もはやこの街は戦場だ。

engChrName: I have my own battles to fight, and you should do the same.
engSearchText:
I have my own battles to fight, and you should do
the same.
jpnChrName: 俺は俺の戦を始める── フェリーダ、お前もそのつもりでいろ。
jpnSearchText:
俺は俺の戦を始める──
フェリーダ、お前もそのつもりでいろ。

engChrName: I have heard of your plans from Mr. Thorndyke. Take care, then.
engSearchText:
I have heard of your plans from Mr. Thorndyke.
Take care, then.
jpnChrName: ソーンダイクＧＭから話は聞いた。 君も気をつけるといい。
jpnSearchText:
ソーンダイクＧＭから話は聞いた。
君も気をつけるといい。

engChrName: I'll inform you if I learn anything of value.
engSearchText: I'll inform you if I learn anything of value.
jpnChrName: 何か分かったら連絡する。
jpnSearchText: 何か分かったら連絡する。

engChrName: Understood. Please take care as well.
engSearchText: Understood. Please take care as well.
jpnChrName: ええ、どうか警備主任も。
jpnSearchText: ええ、どうか警備主任も。

engChrName: Oh, well. There wouldn't be much point in trying to stop you, anyway.
engSearchText:
Oh, well. There wouldn't be much point in trying to
stop you, anyway.
jpnChrName: ふふ、貴方たちについては 干渉するだけ無駄みたいだね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、貴方たちについては
干渉するだけ無駄みたいだね。

engChrName: Heh. Same to you.
engSearchText: Heh. Same to you.
jpnChrName: クク、お前さんと同じくな。
jpnSearchText: クク、お前さんと同じくな。

engChrName: I was hoping we could at least get a little bit of info out of you before you waltzed off.
engSearchText:
I was hoping we could at least get a little bit of info
out of you before you waltzed off.
jpnChrName: 流石にもうちょっと 説明が欲しいんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
流石にもうちょっと
説明が欲しいんだけど……

engChrName: Heh. Sorry, Sylphid.
engSearchText: Heh. Sorry, Sylphid.
jpnChrName: クク、悪いな妖精。
jpnSearchText: クク、悪いな妖精。

engChrName: I had hoped we would be able to take the time to exchange information before parting, but alas.
engSearchText:
I had hoped we would be able to take the time to
exchange information before parting, but alas.
jpnChrName: ふむ、できれば情報交換と 洒落込みたかったのですが……
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、できれば情報交換と
洒落込みたかったのですが……

engChrName: That would've been nice, but it'll have to wait for another time, I'm afraid.
engSearchText:
That would've been nice, but it'll have to wait for
another time, I'm afraid.
jpnChrName: クク、そいつは魅力的だが そのうちにしようぜ。
jpnSearchText:
クク、そいつは魅力的だが
そのうちにしようぜ。

engChrName: I'm looking forward to seeing how you get through this, Arkride.
engSearchText:
I'm looking forward to seeing how you get through
this, Arkride.
jpnChrName: ──アークライド、この事態、 どう乗り越えるか愉しみにしてるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
──アークライド、この事態、
どう乗り越えるか愉しみにしてるぜ。

engChrName: That reward alone is enough to justify Almata's leaders returning from Gehenna.
engSearchText:
That reward alone is enough to justify Almata's
leaders returning from Gehenna.
jpnChrName: それが見られるだけでもアルマータどもが 煉獄から蘇った甲斐があるってもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
それが見られるだけでもアルマータどもが
煉獄から蘇った甲斐があるってもんだ。

engChrName: ...What?
engSearchText: ...What?
jpnChrName: なに……
jpnSearchText: なに……

engChrName: Cocky old bastard just had to throw us a bone to chew on, didn't he?
engSearchText:
Cocky old bastard just had to throw us a bone to
chew on, didn't he?
jpnChrName: クソッ……何なんだ あの思わせぶりな外道オヤジは！
jpnSearchText:
クソッ……何なんだ
あの思わせぶりな外道オヤジは！

engChrName: Kasim...
engSearchText: Kasim...
jpnChrName: ……お兄ちゃん……
jpnSearchText: ……お兄ちゃん……

engChrName: Either way, it appears we can't count on them for any further assistance.
engSearchText:
Either way, it appears we can't count on them for any
further assistance.
jpnChrName: ……いずれにせよ、こちらと 協力体制は結べなさそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
……いずれにせよ、こちらと
協力体制は結べなさそうですね。

engChrName: That's the society for you.
engSearchText: That's the society for you.
jpnChrName: ……フフ。 流石はかの組織の幹部かな？
jpnSearchText:
……フフ。
流石はかの組織の幹部かな？

jpnChrName: （？　ヴァンが一体……？）
jpnSearchText: （？　ヴァンが一体……？）

engChrName: I would expect no less of the infamous Oathbreaker.
engSearchText: I would expect no less of the infamous Oathbreaker.
jpnChrName: フフ、さすがは悪名高き 破戒殿と言うべきでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、さすがは悪名高き
破戒殿と言うべきでしょうか。

engChrName: *sigh* His face is my type, but he's also living proof that it's possible to be TOO much of a bad boy.
engSearchText:
*sigh* His face is my type, but he's also living proof
that it's possible to be TOO much of a bad boy.
jpnChrName: はあ、顔はタイプなんだけど ヤバすぎて流石に引いちゃうわね。
jpnSearchText:
はあ、顔はタイプなんだけど
ヤバすぎて流石に引いちゃうわね。

engChrName: Now that chief of security, on the other hand, is just plain dreamy. ❤
engSearchText:
Now that chief of security, on the other hand, is just
plain dreamy. ❤
jpnChrName: 警備主任さんの方は めちゃくちゃタイプなんだけど❤
jpnSearchText:
警備主任さんの方は
めちゃくちゃタイプなんだけど❤

engChrName: This isn't the time, Bermotti! We have to—agh...
engSearchText: This isn't the time, Bermotti! We have to—agh...
jpnChrName: ベルモッティさん……！ それよりもっ……ぐうっ！
jpnSearchText:
ベルモッティさん……！
それよりもっ……ぐうっ！

engChrName: Come now! I told you to try and stay calm until your wounds have healed.
engSearchText:
Come now! I told you to try and stay calm until your
wounds have healed.
jpnChrName: ああもう、傷が塞がってないんだから そんなに興奮しないの。
jpnSearchText:
ああもう、傷が塞がってないんだから
そんなに興奮しないの。

engChrName: Come on inside, everyone.
engSearchText: Come on inside, everyone.
jpnChrName: ──とりあえずヴァンちゃんたちも 店に入ってちょうだい。
jpnSearchText:
──とりあえずヴァンちゃんたちも
店に入ってちょうだい。

engChrName: I'll try to fill you in on everything that's been happening here.
engSearchText:
I'll try to fill you in on everything that's been
happening here.
jpnChrName: 何があったのか説明させてもらうわ。
jpnSearchText: 何があったのか説明させてもらうわ。

engChrName: They entered the café and bar, and Bermotti talked them through what he knew about the situation.
engSearchText:
They entered the café and bar, and Bermotti talked
them through what he knew about the situation.
jpnChrName: その後、カフェバーに入ったヴァンたちは ベルモッティから異変時の状況を改めて聞かされた。
jpnSearchText:
その後、カフェバーに入ったヴァンたちは
ベルモッティから異変時の状況を改めて聞かされた。

engChrName: His experience mirrored their own—a strange call followed by the city and sky changing ominously, and most people being frozen in time.
engSearchText:
His experience mirrored their own—a strange call
followed by the city and sky changing ominously, and
most people being frozen in time.
jpnChrName: やはり奇妙な通信が入った後、街と空に異変が発生し、 一部を除いた者たちは“停まって”しまったという。
jpnSearchText:
やはり奇妙な通信が入った後、街と空に異変が発生し、
一部を除いた者たちは“停まって”しまったという。

engChrName: They entered the café and bar, and Bermotti talked them through what he knew about the situation.
engSearchText:
They entered the café and bar, and Bermotti talked
them through what he knew about the situation.
jpnChrName: その後、カフェバーに入ったヴァンたちは ベルモッティと異変時の情報を改めて共有した。
jpnSearchText:
その後、カフェバーに入ったヴァンたちは
ベルモッティと異変時の情報を改めて共有した。

engChrName: He also told them about what happened to Aaron.
engSearchText: He also told them about what happened to Aaron.
jpnChrName: なお異変発生時、仲間のシドたちと 一緒にいたアーロンについてだったが──
jpnSearchText:
なお異変発生時、仲間のシドたちと
一緒にいたアーロンについてだったが──

engChrName: So René happened to be here right when it all happened, huh?
engSearchText:
So René happened to be here right when it all
happened, huh?
jpnChrName: そうか──ちょうどルネのヤツが この店に居合わせてたんだったか。
jpnSearchText:
そうか──ちょうどルネのヤツが
この店に居合わせてたんだったか。

engChrName: That's right. You might already know this, but when the chaos began, a strange sphere appeared with it.
engSearchText:
That's right. You might already know this, but when
the chaos began, a strange sphere appeared with it.
jpnChrName: ええ、知ってるかもしれないけど 異変発生時に“球”みたいなのが現れてね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、知ってるかもしれないけど
異変発生時に“球”みたいなのが現れてね。

engChrName: It's disappeared since, but it seems like that little ball is the cause of a lot of our problems.
engSearchText:
It's disappeared since, but it seems like that little ball
is the cause of a lot of our problems.
jpnChrName: いつの間にか消えちゃったけど どうもそれが悪さをしてるみたいなのよ。
jpnSearchText:
いつの間にか消えちゃったけど
どうもそれが悪さをしてるみたいなのよ。

engChrName: A-As soon as he found out, Aaron set off with the guy in the glasses to go look into it.
engSearchText:
A-As soon as he found out, Aaron set off with the
guy in the glasses to go look into it.
jpnChrName: そ、それでアーロンが眼鏡のヤツと 調べてくるって飛び出しちまって……
jpnSearchText:
そ、それでアーロンが眼鏡のヤツと
調べてくるって飛び出しちまって……

engChrName: I really hope he's okay... Something seemed to be weighing hard on him.
engSearchText:
I really hope he's okay... Something seemed to be
weighing hard on him.
jpnChrName: だ、大丈夫かなアーロン…… なんだか思い詰めてたみたいだし……
jpnSearchText:
だ、大丈夫かなアーロン……
なんだか思い詰めてたみたいだし……

engChrName: Yeah. He had the same eyes he did when Sei and Huang were killed.
engSearchText:
Yeah. He had the same eyes he did when Sei and
Huang were killed.
jpnChrName: ああ……セイやホアンが 殺られた時みたいな目を……
jpnSearchText:
ああ……セイやホアンが
殺られた時みたいな目を……

engChrName: Aaron...
engSearchText: Aaron...
jpnChrName: アーロンさん……
jpnSearchText: アーロンさん……

engChrName: That is rather concerning...
engSearchText: That is rather concerning...
jpnChrName: ……少々、心配ですね。
jpnSearchText: ……少々、心配ですね。

engChrName: Still, if he had that presidential aide from the CID with him, I'm sure he's fine.
engSearchText:
Still, if he had that presidential aide from the CID
with him, I'm sure he's fine.
jpnChrName: まあ、ＣＩＤの補佐官殿がいるなら 大丈夫そうな気もするけど。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、ＣＩＤの補佐官殿がいるなら
大丈夫そうな気もするけど。

engChrName: We should go and have a look at this strange sphere, though.
engSearchText:
We should go and have a look at this strange
sphere, though.
jpnChrName: “球”っていうのも気になるし 見に行った方がいいかもしれないね。
jpnSearchText:
“球”っていうのも気になるし
見に行った方がいいかもしれないね。

engChrName: Still, if he had that presidential aide from the CID with him, I'm sure he's fine.
engSearchText:
Still, if he had that presidential aide from the CID
with him, I'm sure he's fine.
jpnChrName: あのＣＩＤ補佐官がいるなら 大丈夫そうだけど……
jpnSearchText:
あのＣＩＤ補佐官がいるなら
大丈夫そうだけど……

engChrName: We should still go and check on them, though—and help to destroy the sphere.
engSearchText:
We should still go and check on them, though—and
help to destroy the sphere.
jpnChrName: “魔球”を破壊する意味でも 追いかけた方が良さそうだね。
jpnSearchText:
“魔球”を破壊する意味でも
追いかけた方が良さそうだね。

engChrName: I suspect we have nothing to worry about. He's a strong young man, and he has that presidential aide from the CID with him.
engSearchText:
I suspect we have nothing to worry about. He's a
strong young man, and he has that presidential aide
from the CID with him.
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤの補佐官殿もいますし アーロンなら大丈夫だと思いますが。
jpnSearchText:
ＣＩＤの補佐官殿もいますし
アーロンなら大丈夫だと思いますが。

engChrName: Still, I'm sure our support would be appreciated.
engSearchText: Still, I'm sure our support would be appreciated.
jpnChrName: “魔球”を破壊するためにも 加勢に行くべきかもしれませんねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
“魔球”を破壊するためにも
加勢に行くべきかもしれませんねぇ。

engChrName: Can see 'em saying they didn't need it, though.
engSearchText: Can see 'em saying they didn't need it, though.
jpnChrName: ああ、アーロンにしてもルネにしても 余計なお世話とか言いそうだが……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、アーロンにしてもルネにしても
余計なお世話とか言いそうだが……

engChrName: But I guess they'll just have to owe us one.
engSearchText: But I guess they'll just have to owe us one.
jpnChrName: せいぜい貸しを作ってやるか。
jpnSearchText: せいぜい貸しを作ってやるか。

engChrName: Anyway, we'll go check things out. In the meantime, see if you can get in touch with anyone else.
engSearchText:
Anyway, we'll go check things out. In the meantime,
see if you can get in touch with anyone else.
jpnChrName: とりあえず様子を見てくる。 各方面との連絡は試しててくれ。
jpnSearchText:
とりあえず様子を見てくる。
各方面との連絡は試しててくれ。

engChrName: No problem. I'll see if I can find some way we haven't thought of yet.
engSearchText:
No problem. I'll see if I can find some way we haven't
thought of yet.
jpnChrName: ええ、任せて。 使えるルートが無いか試しておくわ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、任せて。
使えるルートが無いか試しておくわ。

engChrName: Thanks, everyone. Please take care of Aaron!
engSearchText: Thanks, everyone. Please take care of Aaron!
jpnChrName: 悪い…… アーロンのことは頼む……！
jpnSearchText:
悪い……
アーロンのことは頼む……！

engChrName: He's our friend, too. We'll do everything we can to bring him back!
engSearchText:
He's our friend, too. We'll do everything we can to
bring him back!
jpnChrName: もちろんですっ……！ わたしたちにとっても仲間ですから。
jpnSearchText:
もちろんですっ……！
わたしたちにとっても仲間ですから。

engChrName: We will not let you down.
engSearchText: We will not let you down.
jpnChrName: どうかお任せください。
jpnSearchText: どうかお任せください。

engChrName: The mists are clearing!
engSearchText: The mists are clearing!
jpnChrName: モヤが薄れて……！？
jpnSearchText: モヤが薄れて……！？

engChrName: They must have done it! What a relief.
engSearchText: They must have done it! What a relief.
jpnChrName: やったわね……！ ヴァンちゃんにアーロンちゃんたち！
jpnSearchText:
やったわね……！
ヴァンちゃんにアーロンちゃんたち！

engChrName: They returned to the café and bar to both report back to Bermotti and to discuss their next move.
engSearchText:
They returned to the café and bar to both report back
to Bermotti and to discuss their next move.
jpnChrName: ──その後、カフェバーに戻ったヴァンたちは ベルモッティに報告しつつ今後について話し合った。
jpnSearchText:
──その後、カフェバーに戻ったヴァンたちは
ベルモッティに報告しつつ今後について話し合った。

engChrName: I'm so glad you're all right, Aaron! If we'd lost you, too...
engSearchText:
I'm so glad you're all right, Aaron! If we'd lost
you, too...
jpnChrName: アーロン、良かった……！ お前まで何かあったらオレらは……
jpnSearchText:
アーロン、良かった……！
お前まで何かあったらオレらは……

engChrName: Hah. There ain't anything in the world strong enough to take ME out.
engSearchText:
Hah. There ain't anything in the world strong enough
to take ME out.
jpnChrName: ハッ、この俺に 何かあるわけねーだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、この俺に
何かあるわけねーだろうが。

engChrName: Glad you're doin' good, too, man.
engSearchText: Glad you're doin' good, too, man.
jpnChrName: ……そっちこそ 大したことなくて良かったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
……そっちこそ
大したことなくて良かったぜ。

engChrName: I bet you are. You completely lost it when Syd was hurt.
engSearchText:
I bet you are. You completely lost it when Syd
was hurt.
jpnChrName: アーロン、シドがやられて 血相変えてたもんねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
アーロン、シドがやられて
血相変えてたもんねぇ。

engChrName: Haha. Yep, the ol' prodigy of Langport hasn't changed a bit.
engSearchText:
Haha. Yep, the ol' prodigy of Langport hasn't
changed a bit.
jpnChrName: ははっ、煌都の麒麟児も 相変わらずっちゃ相変わらずか。
jpnSearchText:
ははっ、煌都の麒麟児も
相変わらずっちゃ相変わらずか。

engChrName: Aww, whatever! Knock it off with that shit!
engSearchText: Aww, whatever! Knock it off with that shit!
jpnChrName: だああっ、うるせえっての！
jpnSearchText: だああっ、うるせえっての！

engChrName: Haha... I'm glad you were all able to meet up again, either way.
engSearchText:
Haha... I'm glad you were all able to meet up again,
either way.
jpnChrName: フフ、とにかく 無事に合流できて良かったわね。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、とにかく
無事に合流できて良かったわね。

engChrName: Same here. We'd better get going, though. We still have other places we need to check out.
engSearchText:
Same here. We'd better get going, though. We still
have other places we need to check out.
jpnChrName: まあな……いずれにせよ とっとと次に向かうとするか。
jpnSearchText:
まあな……いずれにせよ
とっとと次に向かうとするか。

engChrName: Old Town and Central Station, in particular...
engSearchText: Old Town and Central Station, in particular...
jpnChrName: 旧市街か中央駅前……
jpnSearchText: 旧市街か中央駅前……

engChrName: Feri's in one place, and Risette's in the other... I'm sure they're both fine, though.
engSearchText:
Feri's in one place, and Risette's in the other...
I'm sure they're both fine, though.
jpnChrName: フェリにせよリゼットにせよ、 必ず無事でいるはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
フェリにせよリゼットにせよ、
必ず無事でいるはずだ。

engChrName: Heh. Yeah, goes without saying the maid's tough, but Feri's proven herself in battle plenty of times already, too.
engSearchText:
Heh. Yeah, goes without saying the maid's tough, but
Feri's proven herself in battle plenty of times
already, too.
jpnChrName: ハン、メイドはもちろん、 チビにしても修羅場は強いしな。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、メイドはもちろん、
チビにしても修羅場は強いしな。

engChrName: Hmm... Either way, perhaps it would be worth me joining you for a while.
engSearchText:
Hmm... Either way, perhaps it would be worth me
joining you for a while.
jpnChrName: ふむ、ならば私も 少しばかりのあいだ同行しよう。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、ならば私も
少しばかりのあいだ同行しよう。

engChrName: I want to assess the situation in the other districts as well.
engSearchText:
I want to assess the situation in the other districts
as well.
jpnChrName: 他の街区を探っておきたいからな。
jpnSearchText: 他の街区を探っておきたいからな。

engChrName: We've been around all the major districts in this part of the city now.
engSearchText:
We've been around all the major districts in this part
of the city now.
jpnChrName: このあたりの街区は 一通り回った──
jpnSearchText:
このあたりの街区は
一通り回った──

engChrName: Think it's about time we made our way to the north side of the city.
engSearchText:
Think it's about time we made our way to the north
side of the city.
jpnChrName: そろそろ首都の中心部から 北の方に足を延ばすべきだろう。
jpnSearchText:
そろそろ首都の中心部から
北の方に足を延ばすべきだろう。

engChrName: Hmm... In that case, allow me to accompany you for a while.
engSearchText:
Hmm... In that case, allow me to accompany you for
a while.
jpnChrName: ふむ、ならば私も 少しばかりのあいだ同行しよう。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、ならば私も
少しばかりのあいだ同行しよう。

engChrName: I want to assess the situation in the city's other districts as well.
engSearchText:
I want to assess the situation in the city's other
districts as well.
jpnChrName: この“停止”状況について 他の街区も探っておきたいからな。
jpnSearchText:
この“停止”状況について
他の街区も探っておきたいからな。

engChrName: The area around Central Station's the only district in this part of town that we haven't visited yet.
engSearchText:
The area around Central Station's the only district in
this part of town that we haven't visited yet.
jpnChrName: この近くだったら 残るは中央駅前だけだ。
jpnSearchText:
この近くだったら
残るは中央駅前だけだ。

engChrName: Risette was in charge of that area. I'm sure she's fine, though.
engSearchText:
Risette was in charge of that area. I'm sure she's
fine, though.
jpnChrName: 担当はリゼット── まあ、間違いなく無事だろう。
jpnSearchText:
担当はリゼット──
まあ、間違いなく無事だろう。

engChrName: I don't doubt it for a moment!
engSearchText: I don't doubt it for a moment!
jpnChrName: はい、リゼットさんなら！
jpnSearchText: はい、リゼットさんなら！

engChrName: Yeah, that chick's tough as a tank.
engSearchText: Yeah, that chick's tough as a tank.
jpnChrName: あのメイドなら余裕だろうな。
jpnSearchText: あのメイドなら余裕だろうな。

engChrName: Hmm... In that case, allow me to accompany you for a while.
engSearchText:
Hmm... In that case, allow me to accompany you for
a while.
jpnChrName: ふむ、ならば私も 少しばかりのあいだ同行しよう。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、ならば私も
少しばかりのあいだ同行しよう。

engChrName: I want to assess the situation in the city's other districts as well.
engSearchText:
I want to assess the situation in the city's other
districts as well.
jpnChrName: この“停止”状況について 他の街区も探っておきたいからな。
jpnSearchText:
この“停止”状況について
他の街区も探っておきたいからな。

engChrName: Old Town is the only district in this part of town that we haven't visited yet.
engSearchText:
Old Town is the only district in this part of town that
we haven't visited yet.
jpnChrName: この近くだったら 残るは旧市街だけだ。
jpnSearchText:
この近くだったら
残るは旧市街だけだ。

engChrName: Feri was in charge of that area. I'm sure she's fine, though.
engSearchText:
Feri was in charge of that area. I'm sure she's
fine, though.
jpnChrName: 担当はフェリ── しっかりしてきたし大丈夫だろう。
jpnSearchText:
担当はフェリ──
しっかりしてきたし大丈夫だろう。

engChrName: As am I.
engSearchText: As am I.
jpnChrName: ええ、きっと無事でしょう。
jpnSearchText: ええ、きっと無事でしょう。

engChrName: Yeah. She's proven herself at this point.
engSearchText: Yeah. She's proven herself at this point.
jpnChrName: ま、あれで修羅場には強いしな。
jpnSearchText: ま、あれで修羅場には強いしな。

engChrName: Hmm... In that case, allow me to accompany you for a while.
engSearchText:
Hmm... In that case, allow me to accompany you for
a while.
jpnChrName: ふむ、ならば私も 少しばかりのあいだ同行しよう。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、ならば私も
少しばかりのあいだ同行しよう。

engChrName: I want to assess the situation in the city's other districts as well.
engSearchText:
I want to assess the situation in the city's other
districts as well.
jpnChrName: この“停止”状況について 他の街区も探っておきたいからな。
jpnSearchText:
この“停止”状況について
他の街区も探っておきたいからな。

engChrName: That's a shame... I was rather hoping you'd stay.
engSearchText: That's a shame... I was rather hoping you'd stay.
jpnChrName: そっか……キンケイド君が 残ってくれて助かっちゃったけど。
jpnSearchText:
そっか……キンケイド君が
残ってくれて助かっちゃったけど。

engChrName: Especially since the other two wasted no time in leaving.
engSearchText:
Especially since the other two wasted no time
in leaving.
jpnChrName: 他の２人ときたら さっさと居なくなっちゃうし。
jpnSearchText:
他の２人ときたら
さっさと居なくなっちゃうし。

engChrName: I will arrange for this area to be protected as soon as I can establish contact with those who can provide it.
engSearchText:
I will arrange for this area to be protected as soon as I
can establish contact with those who can provide it.
jpnChrName: 各方面と連絡がつき次第、 こちらもカバーするようにしますよ。
jpnSearchText:
各方面と連絡がつき次第、
こちらもカバーするようにしますよ。

engChrName: Though I suspect Marduk has already set the wheels in motion on that front.
engSearchText:
Though I suspect Marduk has already set the wheels
in motion on that front.
jpnChrName: まあ、マルドゥック方面が 既に動いているようですが。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、マルドゥック方面が
既に動いているようですが。

engChrName: Wouldn't be surprised. That chief of security never misses a beat.
engSearchText:
Wouldn't be surprised. That chief of security never
misses a beat.
jpnChrName: 警備主任殿か…… 流石に抜かりはなさそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
警備主任殿か……
流石に抜かりはなさそうだな。

engChrName: No kidding. I really wonder just how much he's been preparing for this.
engSearchText:
No kidding. I really wonder just how much he's been
preparing for this.
jpnChrName: はい……お兄ちゃん、 どこまで備えてたんでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
はい……お兄ちゃん、
どこまで備えてたんでしょう。

engChrName: Indeed. I wouldn't be at all shocked if both he and our general manager had seen this crisis coming to some degree.
engSearchText:
Indeed. I wouldn't be at all shocked if both he and
our general manager had seen this crisis coming to
some degree.
jpnChrName: 彼もそうですが、ソーンダイクＧＭも ある程度見越していそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
彼もそうですが、ソーンダイクＧＭも
ある程度見越していそうですね。

engChrName: Yes. The situation's still dire, but maybe there's a ray of hope on the horizon.
engSearchText:
Yes. The situation's still dire, but maybe there's a ray
of hope on the horizon.
jpnChrName: フフ、状況は厳しそうだけど 少し光明は見えてきたのかな？
jpnSearchText:
フフ、状況は厳しそうだけど
少し光明は見えてきたのかな？

engChrName: Still, if our friend from the CID is going with you, I think you'll be fine without me. I'm gonna head off on my own.
engSearchText:
Still, if our friend from the CID is going with you, I
think you'll be fine without me. I'm gonna head off
on my own.
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤ補佐官殿も同行するなら 私はここまでとしておこうかな。
jpnSearchText:
ＣＩＤ補佐官殿も同行するなら
私はここまでとしておこうかな。

engChrName: Makes sense. Thanks for all the help you've given us.
engSearchText: Makes sense. Thanks for all the help you've given us.
jpnChrName: そうか……短い間だが 世話になっちまったな。
jpnSearchText:
そうか……短い間だが
世話になっちまったな。

engChrName: Not at all. Hanging out with you helped me get a better handle on the situation, so it worked out for both of us.
engSearchText:
Not at all. Hanging out with you helped me get a
better handle on the situation, so it worked out for
both of us.
jpnChrName: いや、こちらこそ 色々と状況が整理できたよ。
jpnSearchText:
いや、こちらこそ
色々と状況が整理できたよ。

engChrName: I'm going to meet up with Kurogane and the others, so if we learn anything, we'll give you a heads up.
engSearchText:
I'm going to meet up with Kurogane and the others,
so if we learn anything, we'll give you a heads up.
jpnChrName: クロガネたちと合流するつもりだけど 何か分かったらお互い協力しよう。
jpnSearchText:
クロガネたちと合流するつもりだけど
何か分かったらお互い協力しよう。

engChrName: See you around.
engSearchText: See you around.
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、お先に失礼するよ。
jpnSearchText: それじゃあ、お先に失礼するよ。

engChrName: Well, things are still pretty tense, but maybe there's finally a ray of hope shining through.
engSearchText:
Well, things are still pretty tense, but maybe there's
