engChrName: The Libra Domina feel more dangerous than I first thought they would be.
engSearchText:
The Libra Domina feel more dangerous than I first
thought they would be.
jpnChrName: 《リブラ・ドミナ》……思っていたよりも 危険な新興宗教のようですね。
jpnSearchText:
《リブラ・ドミナ》……思っていたよりも
危険な新興宗教のようですね。

engChrName: The silver lining is that it sounds like our client's father is still well.
engSearchText:
The silver lining is that it sounds like our client's
father is still well.
jpnChrName: 幸い、依頼主のお父さんの ウォルトンさんは無事みたいですけど。
jpnSearchText:
幸い、依頼主のお父さんの
ウォルトンさんは無事みたいですけど。

engChrName: I do hope we'll be able to find him at this meeting.
engSearchText: I do hope we'll be able to find him at this meeting.
jpnChrName: この集会で見つけられるでしょうか……？
jpnSearchText: この集会で見つけられるでしょうか……？

engChrName: Nothin' we can do except roll with the punches. Did sound like everyone would turn up, though.
engSearchText:
Nothin' we can do except roll with the punches.
Did sound like everyone would turn up, though.
jpnChrName: まぁ出たとこ勝負って所だろうな。 教徒全員が参加する雰囲気ではあったが。
jpnSearchText:
まぁ出たとこ勝負って所だろうな。
教徒全員が参加する雰囲気ではあったが。

engChrName: Y'all be careful while we're there.
engSearchText: Y'all be careful while we're there.
jpnChrName: とにかく潜入する時は 言動にも注意しながらいくぞ。
jpnSearchText:
とにかく潜入する時は
言動にも注意しながらいくぞ。

engChrName: Of course. A mistake could turn an entire room of disciples into enemies.
engSearchText:
Of course. A mistake could turn an entire room of
disciples into enemies.
jpnChrName: ええ、迂闊な事を言えば 教徒全員を敵に回しかねません。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、迂闊な事を言えば
教徒全員を敵に回しかねません。

engChrName: Dunno what they were going on about, with the concert hall being 'sacred' or whatever...
engSearchText:
Dunno what they were going on about, with the
concert hall being 'sacred' or whatever...
jpnChrName: ライブハウスが霊場とかなんとか、 変な事を言ってましたけど……
jpnSearchText:
ライブハウスが霊場とかなんとか、
変な事を言ってましたけど……

engChrName: Anyway, let's stop these weirdos!
engSearchText: Anyway, let's stop these weirdos!
jpnChrName: 不気味な息吹にも立ち向かうのみですっ！
jpnSearchText: 不気味な息吹にも立ち向かうのみですっ！

engChrName: Let's get going to the concert hall, then.
engSearchText: Let's get going to the concert hall, then.
jpnChrName: ハン……それじゃライブハウスに行くぞ。
jpnSearchText: ハン……それじゃライブハウスに行くぞ。

engChrName: Bunch of weirdos, trying to sell the concert hall of all places as some sorta of holy ground.
engSearchText:
Bunch of weirdos, trying to sell the concert hall of all
places as some sorta of holy ground.
jpnChrName: 霊場とか何とか格好つけて、 ライブハウスで開催する所は笑っちまうが……
jpnSearchText:
霊場とか何とか格好つけて、
ライブハウスで開催する所は笑っちまうが……

engChrName: At least it should make things quick and easy. Should be done with those creeps quick enough.
engSearchText:
At least it should make things quick and easy.
Should be done with those creeps quick enough.
jpnChrName: 不気味な連中と、とっととケリを付けるには これが一番手っ取り早いしな。
jpnSearchText:
不気味な連中と、とっととケリを付けるには
これが一番手っ取り早いしな。

engChrName: Hello again, everyone. I've been waiting for you.
engSearchText: Hello again, everyone. I've been waiting for you.
jpnChrName: 皆さん、お待ちしていました。
jpnSearchText: 皆さん、お待ちしていました。

engChrName: I've already spoken to the receptionist about your wish to observe our ceremony.
engSearchText:
I've already spoken to the receptionist about your
wish to observe our ceremony.
jpnChrName: 見学者を呼んであると 受付には話を通しておきましたよ。
jpnSearchText:
見学者を呼んであると
受付には話を通しておきましたよ。

engChrName: It will begin momentarily. Are you ready to join us?
engSearchText: It will begin momentarily. Are you ready to join us?
jpnChrName: 間もなく儀式が始まりますが、 よろしいですか？
jpnSearchText:
間もなく儀式が始まりますが、
よろしいですか？

engChrName: Sorry, just gimme a quick sec here.
engSearchText: Sorry, just gimme a quick sec here.
jpnChrName: 悪いな、少しだけ待ってもらえるか。
jpnSearchText: 悪いな、少しだけ待ってもらえるか。

engChrName: Of course. The ceremony will begin momentarily, though, so please hurry.
engSearchText:
Of course. The ceremony will begin momentarily,
though, so please hurry.
jpnChrName: 分かりました。 間もなく儀式が始まるので急いで下さいね。
jpnSearchText:
分かりました。
間もなく儀式が始まるので急いで下さいね。

engChrName: Yeah, we're good. Show us in.
engSearchText: Yeah, we're good. Show us in.
jpnChrName: ああ、大丈夫だ。 案内してもらってもいいか。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、大丈夫だ。
案内してもらってもいいか。

engChrName: Of course, come with me.
engSearchText: Of course, come with me.
jpnChrName: ええ、お任せください。
jpnSearchText: ええ、お任せください。

engChrName: Goddess Aidios! We offer our gratitude on this holy day!
engSearchText:
Goddess Aidios! We offer our gratitude on this
holy day!
jpnChrName: 女神エイドスよ！ 今日という聖なる日に感謝します！
jpnSearchText:
女神エイドスよ！
今日という聖なる日に感謝します！

engChrName: I've done so many good deeds, I'm guaranteed a blessing!
engSearchText:
I've done so many good deeds, I'm guaranteed
a blessing!
jpnChrName: 沢山の善行を積んだんだ。 祝福を授けてもらえるに違いない……！
jpnSearchText:
沢山の善行を積んだんだ。
祝福を授けてもらえるに違いない……！

engChrName: Glory to Libra Domina! Glory to Libra Domina!
engSearchText: Glory to Libra Domina! Glory to Libra Domina!
jpnChrName: 《リブラ・ドミナ》万歳ッ！ 《リブラ・ドミナ》万歳ッ！
jpnSearchText:
《リブラ・ドミナ》万歳ッ！
《リブラ・ドミナ》万歳ッ！

engChrName: (I-I already kinda regret coming here... It's so...overwhelming.)
engSearchText:
(I-I already kinda regret coming here... It's
so...overwhelming.)
jpnChrName: （い、異様な息吹を感じます……   なんだか圧倒されちゃいますね……）
jpnSearchText:
（い、異様な息吹を感じます……
なんだか圧倒されちゃいますね……）

engChrName: (Well, that went from zero to nuts real quick.)
engSearchText: (Well, that went from zero to nuts real quick.)
jpnChrName: （早くもイカれちまってる雰囲気だな……）
jpnSearchText: （早くもイカれちまってる雰囲気だな……）

engChrName: I'll excuse myself now.
engSearchText: I'll excuse myself now.
jpnChrName: それでは私はこれで失礼しますね。
jpnSearchText: それでは私はこれで失礼しますね。

engChrName: May our guru bless you all.
engSearchText: May our guru bless you all.
jpnChrName: どうぞ貴方達にも教祖様の祝福が ありますように。
jpnSearchText:
どうぞ貴方達にも教祖様の祝福が
ありますように。

engChrName: Yeah. Thanks.
engSearchText: Yeah. Thanks.
jpnChrName: ああ、どうもな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、どうもな。

engChrName: Goodness. They are certainly...passionate.
engSearchText: Goodness. They are certainly...passionate.
jpnChrName: ふぅ……信者の方々から とてつもない熱量を感じますね。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ……信者の方々から
とてつもない熱量を感じますね。

engChrName: They sure are. Might be new and all, but I get the feelin' they're soon gonna be a big pain in the ass at this rate.
engSearchText:
They sure are. Might be new and all, but I get the
feelin' they're soon gonna be a big pain in the ass at
this rate.
jpnChrName: ああ、新興宗教っつう話だったが コイツは近い内相当デカくなりそうな勢いだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、新興宗教っつう話だったが
コイツは近い内相当デカくなりそうな勢いだ。

engChrName: Honestly, I'd be out the door already, but we gotta find our client's father first.
engSearchText:
Honestly, I'd be out the door already, but we gotta
find our client's father first.
jpnChrName: 早い所トンズラしてえ所だが、 依頼主の父親を見つけねえとな……
jpnSearchText:
早い所トンズラしてえ所だが、
依頼主の父親を見つけねえとな……

engChrName: I believe I've located him. That man over there might be him.
engSearchText:
I believe I've located him. That man over there might
be him.
jpnChrName: 発見しました──あそこにいらっしゃる方では？
jpnSearchText: 発見しました──あそこにいらっしゃる方では？

engChrName: Yes, he matches the description!
engSearchText: Yes, he matches the description!
jpnChrName: 確かに、教えてもらった人相と一致しますね！
jpnSearchText: 確かに、教えてもらった人相と一致しますね！

engChrName: Sure looks like our guy.
engSearchText: Sure looks like our guy.
jpnChrName: ああ、依頼主から聞いた人相と一致するな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、依頼主から聞いた人相と一致するな。

engChrName: Good. That confirms that he's alive at least.
engSearchText: Good. That confirms that he's alive at least.
jpnChrName: ハッ、これで一応 父親が生きてる事は確認できたわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、これで一応
父親が生きてる事は確認できたわけだ。

engChrName: What do we do now?
engSearchText: What do we do now?
jpnChrName: だがどうしたもんかね……
jpnSearchText: だがどうしたもんかね……

engChrName: Everyone, let us offer up our prayers of gratitude for this day, guided by the scales.
engSearchText:
Everyone, let us offer up our prayers of gratitude for
this day, guided by the scales.
jpnChrName: 皆さん、天秤が導きし今日という日に 感謝の祈りを捧げましょう……
jpnSearchText:
皆さん、天秤が導きし今日という日に
感謝の祈りを捧げましょう……

engChrName: Oh, dear Aidios, Goddess of the Sky, we thank you for this day of salvation!
engSearchText:
Oh, dear Aidios, Goddess of the Sky, we thank you
for this day of salvation!
jpnChrName: 空の女神よ、この救いの日に感謝いたします！
jpnSearchText: 空の女神よ、この救いの日に感謝いたします！

engChrName: Very well, then. In the name of Aidios, I hereby proclaim the beginning of the Ceremony of Purifying Scales!
engSearchText:
Very well, then. In the name of Aidios, I hereby
proclaim the beginning of the Ceremony of
Purifying Scales!
jpnChrName: それでは、女神エイドスの名の下に 天秤の浄化の儀を執り行います。
jpnSearchText:
それでは、女神エイドスの名の下に
天秤の浄化の儀を執り行います。

engChrName: We shall correct the injustices that have been left untouched, for right and wrong, and purify our chaotic world.
engSearchText:
We shall correct the injustices that have been left
untouched, for right and wrong, and purify our
chaotic world.
jpnChrName: 因果応報の乱れを正し、 今こそ混迷の世を浄化するのです──
jpnSearchText:
因果応報の乱れを正し、
今こそ混迷の世を浄化するのです──

engChrName: (More like mindless drones than people here.)
engSearchText: (More like mindless drones than people here.)
jpnChrName: （訓練された部隊か何かかっつの。）
jpnSearchText: （訓練された部隊か何かかっつの。）

engChrName: (Should we follow along as well?)
engSearchText: (Should we follow along as well?)
jpnChrName: （私達も合わせた方がいいんでしょうか……？）
jpnSearchText: （私達も合わせた方がいいんでしょうか……？）

engChrName: (Nah. We're just observers, remember. Don't gotta do anything. Yet.)
engSearchText:
(Nah. We're just observers, remember. Don't gotta
do anything. Yet.)
jpnChrName: （いや、見学者っつう話が通ってるなら   無理する必要もねえはずだ。）
jpnSearchText:
（いや、見学者っつう話が通ってるなら
無理する必要もねえはずだ。）

engChrName: (I get creeped the hell out anyway, just thinkin' about actin' like them.)
engSearchText:
(I get creeped the hell out anyway, just thinkin' about
actin' like them.)
jpnChrName: （つうか、付き合ってやるのも気色悪いしな。）
jpnSearchText: （つうか、付き合ってやるのも気色悪いしな。）

engChrName: (Me, too... I feel like even just imitating them would be an offense to Arusha.)
engSearchText:
(Me, too... I feel like even just imitating them would
be an offense to Arusha.)
jpnChrName: （そうですね……翼の女神（アルーシャ）様にも   失礼な気がしますし。）
jpnSearchText:
（そうですね……翼の女神（アルーシャ）様にも
失礼な気がしますし。）

engChrName: (For once, I agree with you.)
engSearchText: (For once, I agree with you.)
jpnChrName: （ハッ、珍しく同感だ。）
jpnSearchText: （ハッ、珍しく同感だ。）

engChrName: First, let us begin by rewarding those whose scales tip heavy with good deeds.
engSearchText:
First, let us begin by rewarding those whose scales tip
heavy with good deeds.
jpnChrName: それでは、今期において 善行の天秤が重き者に祝福を授けましょう。
jpnSearchText:
それでは、今期において
善行の天秤が重き者に祝福を授けましょう。

engChrName: Followers Carson and Dolly, please step forward.
engSearchText: Followers Carson and Dolly, please step forward.
jpnChrName: カーソン信徒、ドリー信徒、 前へお越しください。
jpnSearchText:
カーソン信徒、ドリー信徒、
前へお越しください。

engChrName: Your worthy tithes and deeds in attracting new followers have caught the eye of our Goddess.
engSearchText:
Your worthy tithes and deeds in attracting new
followers have caught the eye of our Goddess.
jpnChrName: 貴方達の多大なるお布施と勧誘による貢献は 女神様の目にも留まりました。
jpnSearchText:
貴方達の多大なるお布施と勧誘による貢献は
女神様の目にも留まりました。

engChrName: Therefore, I grant you both the title of Honorary Evangelist. May you both be a role model for all followers of our faith.
engSearchText:
Therefore, I grant you both the title of
Honorary Evangelist. May you both be a role model
for all followers of our faith.
jpnChrName: よって、信徒の模範となり導く者として “名誉伝道師”の称号を授けましょう。
jpnSearchText:
よって、信徒の模範となり導く者として
“名誉伝道師”の称号を授けましょう。

engChrName: H-Honorary Evangelist! I'm hardly worthy of such a great honor!
engSearchText:
H-Honorary Evangelist! I'm hardly worthy of such a
great honor!
jpnChrName: め、名誉伝道師……っ！ ああっ身に余る光栄です！
jpnSearchText:
め、名誉伝道師……っ！
ああっ身に余る光栄です！

engChrName: *sniffle* I... I'll dedicate my whole life to proving myself worthy of such a title!
engSearchText:
*sniffle* I... I'll dedicate my whole life to proving
myself worthy of such a title!
jpnChrName: ぐすっ……私の人生全てを賭けて 称号に恥じぬよう務めて参ります！
jpnSearchText:
ぐすっ……私の人生全てを賭けて
称号に恥じぬよう務めて参ります！

engChrName: That's the same Carson we were speaking to before, yes? At least he looks happy, but with the donations and recruitments...
engSearchText:
That's the same Carson we were speaking to
before, yes? At least he looks happy, but with the
donations and recruitments...
jpnChrName: カーソンさんというと、先程の方ですよね。 とても嬉しそうですけど……
jpnSearchText:
カーソンさんというと、先程の方ですよね。
とても嬉しそうですけど……

engChrName: It just feels like your classic pyramid scheme in here.
engSearchText: It just feels like your classic pyramid scheme in here.
jpnChrName: お布施と勧誘ねぇ。 そのまんま“ねずみ講”じゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
お布施と勧誘ねぇ。
そのまんま“ねずみ講”じゃねえか。

engChrName: To continue forward, it is time to punish those whose scales tip heavy with evil deeds.
engSearchText:
To continue forward, it is time to punish those whose
scales tip heavy with evil deeds.
jpnChrName: 続きまして──悪行の天秤が重き者に 裁きを下しましょう。
jpnSearchText:
続きまして──悪行の天秤が重き者に
裁きを下しましょう。

engChrName: Follower Walton, and the two transgressors from the other day, please step up.
engSearchText:
Follower Walton, and the two transgressors from the
other day, please step up.
jpnChrName: ウォルトン信徒と、 先日の“違反者”の２名は前へ。
jpnSearchText:
ウォルトン信徒と、
先日の“違反者”の２名は前へ。

engChrName: There's Mr. Walton, but who does he mean by transgressors?
engSearchText:
There's Mr. Walton, but who does he mean
by transgressors?
jpnChrName: ウォルトン様ですか…… それと違反者というのは……
jpnSearchText:
ウォルトン様ですか……
それと違反者というのは……

engChrName: This is goin' from bad to worse.
engSearchText: This is goin' from bad to worse.
jpnChrName: こいつは雲行きが怪しくなってきやがったな……
jpnSearchText: こいつは雲行きが怪しくなってきやがったな……

engChrName: First, the transgressors...
engSearchText: First, the transgressors...
jpnChrName: まずは、違反者２名について……
jpnSearchText: まずは、違反者２名について……

engChrName: Though followers of your faith you may be, you are insincere. You consider us deviants, going so far as to report us to the authorities.
engSearchText:
Though followers of your faith you may be, you
are insincere. You consider us deviants, going so far as
to report us to the authorities.
jpnChrName: 信徒でありながら、我々を異常者と非難して 遊撃士や警察に申し立てようとしたそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
信徒でありながら、我々を異常者と非難して
遊撃士や警察に申し立てようとしたそうですね。

engChrName: Violating the teachings of Aidios is a sin heavier than any other.
engSearchText:
Violating the teachings of Aidios is a sin heavier than
any other.
jpnChrName: 女神様の教えを侮辱した罪は どの悪行よりも重い。
jpnSearchText:
女神様の教えを侮辱した罪は
どの悪行よりも重い。

engChrName: Therefore, I shall hand down your deserved divine punishment in Her place.
engSearchText:
Therefore, I shall hand down your deserved divine
punishment in Her place.
jpnChrName: よって、女神様に代わり “神罰”を下す事となりました。
jpnSearchText:
よって、女神様に代わり
“神罰”を下す事となりました。

engChrName: What?! Screw that, you crazy cultist! You're a madman!
engSearchText:
What?! Screw that, you crazy cultist! You're
a madman!
jpnChrName: はぁ！？　ふざけんなイカレ宗教家が！ やっぱり狂ってやがる！
jpnSearchText:
はぁ！？　ふざけんなイカレ宗教家が！
やっぱり狂ってやがる！

engChrName: I just stopped by for the hell of it! I'm so done with this! Let us go!
engSearchText:
I just stopped by for the hell of it! I'm so done
with this! Let us go!
jpnChrName: 興味本位で入ってみたのが間違いだったんだ…… いいから俺達を解放しやがれ！
jpnSearchText:
興味本位で入ってみたのが間違いだったんだ……
いいから俺達を解放しやがれ！

engChrName: And you, Follower Walton, stand to receive the Goddess' divine punishment as well.
engSearchText:
And you, Follower Walton, stand to receive the
Goddess' divine punishment as well.
jpnChrName: そしてウォルトン信徒── 貴方にも“神罰”を下す事となりました。
jpnSearchText:
そしてウォルトン信徒──
貴方にも“神罰”を下す事となりました。

engChrName: I-I'm well aware that my tithes are insufficient and I've failed to do enough good deeds!
engSearchText:
I-I'm well aware that my tithes are insufficient and
I've failed to do enough good deeds!
jpnChrName: お、お布施が出来ず私の善行が 足りない事はよく分かっています！
jpnSearchText:
お、お布施が出来ず私の善行が
足りない事はよく分かっています！

engChrName: But I've been trying very hard to serve the faith by handing out flyers and recruiting people!
engSearchText:
But I've been trying very hard to serve the faith by
handing out flyers and recruiting people!
jpnChrName: だからその代わり、チラシ配りや 信者の勧誘に勤めて来ました！
jpnSearchText:
だからその代わり、チラシ配りや
信者の勧誘に勤めて来ました！

engChrName: I will serve as best I possibly can. Please, I beg for a merciful judgment!
engSearchText:
I will serve as best I possibly can. Please, I beg for a
merciful judgment!
jpnChrName: これからも頑張りますから、 どうか慈悲のある裁定を……！
jpnSearchText:
これからも頑張りますから、
どうか慈悲のある裁定を……！

engChrName: You admit your failure at doing enough good deeds, but fail to acknowledge all the evil burdens you carry with you.
engSearchText:
You admit your failure at doing enough good deeds,
but fail to acknowledge all the evil burdens you carry
with you.
jpnChrName: 貴方は善行が足りないばかりか、 かつて悪行を行っていたようですね？
jpnSearchText:
貴方は善行が足りないばかりか、
かつて悪行を行っていたようですね？

engChrName: You continue to fail to take responsibility for your past. Were you not a drinker and a gambler? One that neglected his family while at it?
engSearchText:
You continue to fail to take responsibility for
your past. Were you not a drinker and a gambler?
One that neglected his family while at it?
jpnChrName: 家庭を省みず酒やギャンブルに溺れていた ようではありませんか。
jpnSearchText:
家庭を省みず酒やギャンブルに溺れていた
ようではありませんか。

engChrName: Your lack of good deeds and the heavy weight of your evil deeds tip the Goddess' scales ever away from Her favor.
engSearchText:
Your lack of good deeds and the heavy weight of your
evil deeds tip the Goddess' scales ever away from
Her favor.
jpnChrName: 善行の不足、そして重き悪行の数々。 女神様の天秤は大きく傾いています……
jpnSearchText:
善行の不足、そして重き悪行の数々。
女神様の天秤は大きく傾いています……

engChrName: Th-That can't be!
engSearchText: Th-That can't be!
jpnChrName: そ、そんな！？
jpnSearchText: そ、そんな！？

engChrName: I thought that by repenting and dedicating myself to my faith, my sins would go away and I'd be able to return to my family!
engSearchText:
I thought that by repenting and dedicating myself to
my faith, my sins would go away and I'd be able to
return to my family!
jpnChrName: 心を入れ替えて勤めれば、罪は消えて 家族を取り戻せると言っていたではありませんか！
jpnSearchText:
心を入れ替えて勤めれば、罪は消えて
家族を取り戻せると言っていたではありませんか！

engChrName: That would only be possible if you'd evened the scales with good deeds. Dare you object to the Goddess' judgment?
engSearchText:
That would only be possible if you'd evened the scales
with good deeds. Dare you object to the
Goddess' judgment?
jpnChrName: それは善行を積んでいた場合の話です。 貴方は女神様の裁定に異を唱えるつもりですか？
jpnSearchText:
それは善行を積んでいた場合の話です。
貴方は女神様の裁定に異を唱えるつもりですか？

engChrName: Agh... N-No!
engSearchText: Agh... N-No!
jpnChrName: クッ……そ、それは……！
jpnSearchText: クッ……そ、それは……！

engChrName: You needn't fear. Divine punishment as it may be, our sacred ritual will cleanse you from your sins.
engSearchText:
You needn't fear. Divine punishment as it may be,
our sacred ritual will cleanse you from your sins.
jpnChrName: 心配せずとも、神罰というのは 罰によって浄化される神聖なる儀式です。
jpnSearchText:
心配せずとも、神罰というのは
罰によって浄化される神聖なる儀式です。

engChrName: Open your arms wide to your judgment. I shall observe your last moments myself.
engSearchText:
Open your arms wide to your judgment. I shall
observe your last moments myself.
jpnChrName: 最後の時まで、喜びを持ってお勤めなさい。 私が直々に見届けて差し上げますので。
jpnSearchText:
最後の時まで、喜びを持ってお勤めなさい。
私が直々に見届けて差し上げますので。

engChrName: Now, away with you three.
engSearchText: Now, away with you three.
jpnChrName: それでは３名ともお下がりください。
jpnSearchText: それでは３名ともお下がりください。

engChrName: With today's judgments, Aidios' scales find themselves even once more.
engSearchText:
With today's judgments, Aidios' scales find
themselves even once more.
jpnChrName: さて……本日の裁定によって 女神様の天秤は浄化されました。
jpnSearchText:
さて……本日の裁定によって
女神様の天秤は浄化されました。

engChrName: May you all continue with your good deeds evermore, so that the Goddess may acknowledge you.
engSearchText:
May you all continue with your good deeds evermore,
so that the Goddess may acknowledge you.
jpnChrName: 皆さんも引き続き、善行を積んで 女神様の目に留まるよう励んで下さい。
jpnSearchText:
皆さんも引き続き、善行を積んで
女神様の目に留まるよう励んで下さい。

engChrName: Glory to Libra Domina! Praise be to Libra Domina!
engSearchText:
Glory to Libra Domina!
Praise be to Libra Domina!
jpnChrName: 《リブラ・ドミナ》に祝福あれ！ 《リブラ・ドミナ》万歳ッ！
jpnSearchText:
《リブラ・ドミナ》に祝福あれ！
《リブラ・ドミナ》万歳ッ！

engChrName: This is utterly beyond the pale...
engSearchText: This is utterly beyond the pale...
jpnChrName: あまりにも異様、ですね……
jpnSearchText: あまりにも異様、ですね……

engChrName: Letting a religious movement like this stand is a threat to everyone.
engSearchText:
Letting a religious movement like this stand is a
threat to everyone.
jpnChrName: こんな新興宗教が存在しているだなんて、 やっぱり危険すぎます……
jpnSearchText:
こんな新興宗教が存在しているだなんて、
やっぱり危険すぎます……

engChrName: I doubt they're just going to walk out of here now that we heard all of that.
engSearchText:
I doubt they're just going to walk out of here now
that we heard all of that.
jpnChrName: それに、こんなヤバい話を聞かせといて オレらをタダで返すとも思えねえ。
jpnSearchText:
それに、こんなヤバい話を聞かせといて
オレらをタダで返すとも思えねえ。

engChrName: Probably going to try to convert us the hard way, if that's what it takes.
engSearchText:
Probably going to try to convert us the hard way, if
that's what it takes.
jpnChrName: なんとしても入信させる魂胆なんじゃねーのか？
jpnSearchText: なんとしても入信させる魂胆なんじゃねーのか？

engChrName: Makes me feel sick. Let's bounce before Carson gets back.
engSearchText:
Makes me feel sick. Let's bounce before Carson
gets back.
jpnChrName: ああ、胸くそ悪い事にな。 カーソンとやらが来る前にトンズラするぞ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、胸くそ悪い事にな。
カーソンとやらが来る前にトンズラするぞ。

engChrName: Let's chase after our client's father and the rest.
engSearchText: Let's chase after our client's father and the rest.
jpnChrName: その足で、依頼主の父親たちを追いかけねえとな。
jpnSearchText: その足で、依頼主の父親たちを追いかけねえとな。

engChrName: Afterwards, Van's team managed to sneak out of the concert hall without being noticed by Carson.
engSearchText:
Afterwards, Van's team managed to sneak out of the
concert hall without being noticed by Carson.
jpnChrName: その後ヴァン達はカーソンに 気付かれないようにライブハウスを抜け出すと……
jpnSearchText:
その後ヴァン達はカーソンに
気付かれないようにライブハウスを抜け出すと……

engChrName: When they got outside, they saw the guru boarding a luxury sedan driven by a Libra Domina follower.
engSearchText:
When they got outside, they saw the guru boarding a
luxury sedan driven by a Libra Domina follower.
jpnChrName: 教祖が信者の運転する 高級セダンに乗り込もうとしている所を目撃した。
jpnSearchText:
教祖が信者の運転する
高級セダンに乗り込もうとしている所を目撃した。

engChrName: They also saw Walton and the two transgressors being forced into a second car.
engSearchText:
They also saw Walton and the two transgressors
being forced into a second car.
jpnChrName: また、ウォルトンと違反者が 後続の車に乗せられる場面を確認。
jpnSearchText:
また、ウォルトンと違反者が
後続の車に乗せられる場面を確認。

engChrName: Van approached the leader as they were climbing into the cars, managing to slip something onto him unseen.
engSearchText:
Van approached the leader as they were climbing into
the cars, managing to slip something onto
him unseen.
jpnChrName: その際、ヴァンは教祖との すれ違いざまにある仕込みを試みたのだった。
jpnSearchText:
その際、ヴァンは教祖との
すれ違いざまにある仕込みを試みたのだった。

engChrName: Did you just attach something to the guru's clothes?
engSearchText: Did you just attach something to the guru's clothes?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、さっき教祖の服に 何かを付けてませんでしたか……？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん、さっき教祖の服に
何かを付けてませんでしたか……？

engChrName: I saw that. Did you plant something on his clothes?
engSearchText: I saw that. Did you plant something on his clothes?
jpnChrName: オイ、さっき教祖の服に何か付けやがったな？
jpnSearchText: オイ、さっき教祖の服に何か付けやがったな？

engChrName: Was it a transmitter? That's the kind of thing you hear about in spy novels and such...
engSearchText:
Was it a transmitter? That's the kind of thing you
hear about in spy novels and such...
jpnChrName: もしかして、発信機でしょうか？ スパイ物の小説ではよく見かけますけど……
jpnSearchText:
もしかして、発信機でしょうか？
スパイ物の小説ではよく見かけますけど……

engChrName: You got it. Bit of an older model, really, but it's the same grade used by foreign intelligence divisions and such.
engSearchText:
You got it. Bit of an older model, really, but it's the
same grade used by foreign intelligence divisions
and such.
jpnChrName: ああ、型落ち品になるが 外国の諜報機関なんかも使ってる優れモンだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、型落ち品になるが
外国の諜報機関なんかも使ってる優れモンだ。

engChrName: Got it through some...let's say less than legal means. Been waitin' for a while to get the chance to use it.
engSearchText:
Got it through some...let's say less than legal means.
Been waitin' for a while to get the chance to use it.
jpnChrName: 裏のルートで買って以来、いざって時の為に 持ち歩いてたんだが役に立ったな。
jpnSearchText:
裏のルートで買って以来、いざって時の為に
持ち歩いてたんだが役に立ったな。

engChrName: It will send its signal straight to a Xipha.
engSearchText: It will send its signal straight to a Xipha.
jpnChrName: ザイファで発信機を追える仕組みだ。
jpnSearchText: ザイファで発信機を追える仕組みだ。

engChrName: But let's report back to our client first. Gotta make sure he's aware that we found his dad.
engSearchText:
But let's report back to our client first. Gotta make
sure he's aware that we found his dad.
jpnChrName: それと一応、依頼主には父親が見つかった事を 報告した方がいいかもしれねえな。
jpnSearchText:
それと一応、依頼主には父親が見つかった事を
報告した方がいいかもしれねえな。

engChrName: Allow me to make the report, then.
engSearchText: Allow me to make the report, then.
jpnChrName: それではわたくしの方で 一報を入れておきましょう。
jpnSearchText:
それではわたくしの方で
一報を入れておきましょう。

engChrName: Go for it. Let's hurry, gang!
engSearchText: Go for it. Let's hurry, gang!
jpnChrName: ああ頼んだ。 それじゃ急いで後を追うぞ！
jpnSearchText:
ああ頼んだ。
それじゃ急いで後を追うぞ！

engChrName: Van and company got into their own car and soon started following the signal shown on the Xipha.
engSearchText:
Van and company got into their own car and soon
started following the signal shown on the Xipha.
jpnChrName: その後ヴァン達は車に乗り込み、 ザイファが示す発信機の後を追うと──
jpnSearchText:
その後ヴァン達は車に乗り込み、
ザイファが示す発信機の後を追うと──

engChrName: Soon after, the transmitter stopped, and they arrived at the last place they could trace its signal.
engSearchText:
Soon after, the transmitter stopped, and they arrived
at the last place they could trace its signal.
jpnChrName: 数分後、ある場所で発信機の動きが 止まったのを確認したのだった。
jpnSearchText:
数分後、ある場所で発信機の動きが
止まったのを確認したのだった。

engChrName: Ready, then?
engSearchText: Ready, then?
jpnChrName: 準備はいいんだな？
jpnSearchText: 準備はいいんだな？

engChrName: Yes. Ready whenever you are.
engSearchText: Yes. Ready whenever you are.
jpnChrName: うん、こちらはいつでも。
jpnSearchText: うん、こちらはいつでも。

engChrName: All right. Sendin' now.
engSearchText: All right. Sendin' now.
jpnChrName: なら送信すんぜ──ぽちっとな。
jpnSearchText: なら送信すんぜ──ぽちっとな。

engChrName: And now we wait.
engSearchText: And now we wait.
jpnChrName: 後は返事を待つだけですね。
jpnSearchText: 後は返事を待つだけですね。

engChrName: Now we wait for them to bite.
engSearchText: Now we wait for them to bite.
jpnChrName: 後は返事を待つだけだな。
jpnSearchText: 後は返事を待つだけだな。

engChrName: All we have to do now is wait.
engSearchText: All we have to do now is wait.
jpnChrName: 後は返事を待つだけですね。
jpnSearchText: 後は返事を待つだけですね。

engChrName: Actually, what did you write in the message?
engSearchText: Actually, what did you write in the message?
jpnChrName: ちなみにどういった内容のメールを 送ったんですか？
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにどういった内容のメールを
送ったんですか？

engChrName: Made a point of being real vague with 'em.
engSearchText: Made a point of being real vague with 'em.
jpnChrName: わざと要領を得ないような文章にしたが、 内容は大体こんなもんだ──
jpnSearchText:
わざと要領を得ないような文章にしたが、
内容は大体こんなもんだ──

engChrName: But I basically said that I didn't have all the money, and asked if they'd settle for a bit less.
engSearchText:
But I basically said that I didn't have all the money,
and asked if they'd settle for a bit less.
jpnChrName: いきなりその額のミラを用意するのは 難しいから、少しまけてくれないかってな。
jpnSearchText:
いきなりその額のミラを用意するのは
難しいから、少しまけてくれないかってな。

engChrName: So you made it look like you're at least willing to pay.
engSearchText: So you made it look like you're at least willing to pay.
jpnChrName: こちらに支払う意思があることが 伝わる文面ですね。
jpnSearchText:
こちらに支払う意思があることが
伝わる文面ですね。

engChrName: That would compel them to reply, at least.
engSearchText: That would compel them to reply, at least.
jpnChrName: 確かにこれなら相手がすぐに食いつきそうです。
jpnSearchText: 確かにこれなら相手がすぐに食いつきそうです。

engChrName: Well, it wouldn't be good for our plan if they didn't.
engSearchText: Well, it wouldn't be good for our plan if they didn't.
jpnChrName: そもそもこっちからの通信に 気付いていなかったら面倒だけどね。
jpnSearchText:
そもそもこっちからの通信に
気付いていなかったら面倒だけどね。

engChrName: Heh. Nothin' to worry about, it looks like.
engSearchText: Heh. Nothin' to worry about, it looks like.
jpnChrName: ハッ、その心配はいらなかったみてぇだな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、その心配はいらなかったみてぇだな。

engChrName: I've got a response on my end, too! Looking at the orbal wave pattern, it's definitely a direct connection.
engSearchText:
I've got a response on my end, too! Looking at the
orbal wave pattern, it's definitely a direct connection.
jpnChrName: ──こっちも捉えた！ この導力波のパターンは直接通信で間違いない。
jpnSearchText:
──こっちも捉えた！
この導力波のパターンは直接通信で間違いない。

engChrName: Lemme read. Their reply is, 'No. Won't budge on the price—not even a single mira.'
engSearchText:
Lemme read. Their reply is, 'No. Won't budge on the
price—not even a single mira.'
jpnChrName: 返事はどれどれ…… 『却下だ、１ミラたりともまけられない』か。
jpnSearchText:
返事はどれどれ……
『却下だ、１ミラたりともまけられない』か。

engChrName: They're so greedy...
engSearchText: They're so greedy...
jpnChrName: 欲張りな人ですね。
jpnSearchText: 欲張りな人ですね。

engChrName: Greedy bastard.
engSearchText: Greedy bastard.
jpnChrName: ハッ、欲深い野郎だ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、欲深い野郎だ。

engChrName: Quite avaricious, they are.
engSearchText: Quite avaricious, they are.
jpnChrName: 貪欲な方ですね。
jpnSearchText: 貪欲な方ですね。

engChrName: Okay! Analysis complete!
engSearchText: Okay! Analysis complete!
jpnChrName: ──よし、これで解析完了だ！
jpnSearchText: ──よし、これで解析完了だ！

engChrName: Did you locate the transmitter?
engSearchText: Did you locate the transmitter?
jpnChrName: 発信元が判明しましたか？
jpnSearchText: 発信元が判明しましたか？

engChrName: I've got an address.
engSearchText: I've got an address.
jpnChrName: うん、方角はね。
jpnSearchText: うん、方角はね。

engChrName: It's west-northwest from our current location. No exact distance, though.
engSearchText:
It's west-northwest from our current location.
No exact distance, though.
jpnChrName: この場所から西北西の位置── 詳細な距離までは分からないけど。
jpnSearchText:
この場所から西北西の位置──
詳細な距離までは分からないけど。

engChrName: No, but we got a line—and a whole lotta places along that line where the source is.
engSearchText:
No, but we got a line—and a whole lotta places along
that line where the source is.
jpnChrName: それでもここから発信元を通る “線”ができた。
jpnSearchText:
それでもここから発信元を通る
“線”ができた。

engChrName: If we get to trace another line, but from a different direction...
engSearchText:
If we get to trace another line, but from a
different direction...
jpnChrName: でもって、線が重ならない位置で もう一回方角を探知すれば──
jpnSearchText:
でもって、線が重ならない位置で
もう一回方角を探知すれば──

engChrName: Then the lines will intersect, pinpointing the exact location of our criminal!
engSearchText:
Then the lines will intersect, pinpointing the exact
location of our criminal!
jpnChrName: 二本の“線”が交わる“点”、 そこに犯人がいるわけですね！
jpnSearchText:
二本の“線”が交わる“点”、
そこに犯人がいるわけですね！

engChrName: Exactly.
engSearchText: Exactly.
jpnChrName: うん、その通りさ。
jpnSearchText: うん、その通りさ。

engChrName: We should try to aim for as perpendicular a point as we possibly can.
engSearchText:
We should try to aim for as perpendicular a point as
we possibly can.
jpnChrName: ちなみに“線”の角度が大きいに 越したことはないからね。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに“線”の角度が大きいに
越したことはないからね。

engChrName: Let's send our next transmission from across the river.
engSearchText: Let's send our next transmission from across the river.
jpnChrName: 今度は川向こうの適当な場所で通信してみよう。
jpnSearchText: 今度は川向こうの適当な場所で通信してみよう。

engChrName: Okay. This looks good.
engSearchText: Okay. This looks good.
jpnChrName: うん、ここが良さそうだね。
jpnSearchText: うん、ここが良さそうだね。

engChrName: I'll shoot 'em another message, then.
engSearchText: I'll shoot 'em another message, then.
jpnChrName: ならさっそく連絡を入れるとすっか。
jpnSearchText: ならさっそく連絡を入れるとすっか。

engChrName: Wrote, 'I got all the money ready. Where should I send it to this time?'
engSearchText:
Wrote, 'I got all the money ready. Where should I
send it to this time?'
jpnChrName: 『ミラの用意が出来ました、   今度はどこに振り込めばいいですか？』
jpnSearchText:
『ミラの用意が出来ました、
今度はどこに振り込めばいいですか？』

engChrName: Aaand sent.
engSearchText: Aaand sent.
jpnChrName: ──送信っと。
jpnSearchText: ──送信っと。

engChrName: Well, aren't you quick.
engSearchText: Well, aren't you quick.
jpnChrName: ハッ、食い付いたか。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、食い付いたか。

engChrName: They replied quite quickly both times.
engSearchText: They replied quite quickly both times.
jpnChrName: 今回も早かったですね。
jpnSearchText: 今回も早かったですね。

engChrName: They really must want to get the mira.
engSearchText: They really must want to get the mira.
jpnChrName: きっとミラが入ってくるのを 待っていたのでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
きっとミラが入ってくるのを
待っていたのでしょう。

engChrName: Again, greedy bastard. Bet they're rubbing their hands already, waiting for the dough.
engSearchText:
Again, greedy bastard. Bet they're rubbing their
hands already, waiting for the dough.
jpnChrName: よっぽどミラが入ってくるのが 待ち遠しいんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
よっぽどミラが入ってくるのが
待ち遠しいんだろ。

engChrName: They must be quite eager to get the money.
engSearchText: They must be quite eager to get the money.
jpnChrName: 余程ミラが入ってくるのが 待ち遠しいのでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
余程ミラが入ってくるのが
待ち遠しいのでしょう。

engChrName: Analysis complete! I pinpointed their location!
engSearchText: Analysis complete! I pinpointed their location!
jpnChrName: 解析完了、特定できたよ！
jpnSearchText: 解析完了、特定できたよ！

engChrName: It's southwest from here, under the bridge across the river!
engSearchText:
It's southwest from here, under the bridge across
the river!
jpnChrName: 方角は南西──川向うの橋の下だね！
jpnSearchText: 方角は南西──川向うの橋の下だね！

engChrName: All right, then. Come on, y'all. Let's close the book on this one!
engSearchText:
All right, then. Come on, y'all. Let's close the book
on this one!
jpnChrName: おしっ、そんじゃあ仕上げと行くか！
jpnSearchText: おしっ、そんじゃあ仕上げと行くか！

engChrName: So is that our criminal?
engSearchText: So is that our criminal?
jpnChrName: あの人が犯人でしょうか？
jpnSearchText: あの人が犯人でしょうか？

engChrName: Most likely, yes.
engSearchText: Most likely, yes.
jpnChrName: 十中八九そうだろうね。
jpnSearchText: 十中八九そうだろうね。

engChrName: Only one way to find out.
engSearchText: Only one way to find out.
jpnChrName: つついてみるとすっか。
jpnSearchText: つついてみるとすっか。

engChrName: Just a liiittle more.
engSearchText: Just a liiittle more.
jpnChrName: へへ、後少しで……
jpnSearchText: へへ、後少しで……

engChrName: Oh? Did they do it? Let's see...
engSearchText: Oh? Did they do it? Let's see...
jpnChrName: お？　もう振り込んだか？ どれどれ……
jpnSearchText:
お？　もう振り込んだか？
どれどれ……

engChrName: 'I changed my mind. I reported this to the police. They're on to you, and should be beating down your door at any second.'
engSearchText:
'I changed my mind. I reported this to the police.
They're on to you, and should be beating down your
door at any second.'
jpnChrName: 『気が変わった、警察に通報する。   すぐにアンタの所に警察が着くだろう。』
jpnSearchText:
『気が変わった、警察に通報する。
すぐにアンタの所に警察が着くだろう。』

engChrName: WHAT?!
engSearchText: WHAT?!
jpnChrName: なんだって──！！？
jpnSearchText: なんだって──！！？

engChrName: No, no. Calm down. There's no way they can find me!
engSearchText:
No, no. Calm down. There's no way they can
find me!
jpnChrName: いやいや落ち着け……そう簡単に 居場所が突き止められるはずがねぇ！
jpnSearchText:
いやいや落ち着け……そう簡単に
居場所が突き止められるはずがねぇ！

engChrName: Gonna book it, though. Just to be safe...
engSearchText: Gonna book it, though. Just to be safe...
jpnChrName: とにかくここを離れねえと……
jpnSearchText: とにかくここを離れねえと……

engChrName: Nope. Sorry. Might've worked if we didn't know exactly where you were already. You can thank my assistant here for that. Pretty talented, eh?
engSearchText:
Nope. Sorry. Might've worked if we didn't know
exactly where you were already. You can thank my
assistant here for that. Pretty talented, eh?
jpnChrName: 残念だがそれが突き止められるんだよな、 うちの優秀な助手によってねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
残念だがそれが突き止められるんだよな、
うちの優秀な助手によってねぇ。

engChrName: Your security can't measure up to the one at the Institute of Science. Not even close.
engSearchText:
Your security can't measure up to the one at the
Institute of Science. Not even close.
jpnChrName: 理科大学のプロジェクトと比べれば、 大した課題じゃなかったかな。
jpnSearchText:
理科大学のプロジェクトと比べれば、
大した課題じゃなかったかな。

engChrName: Wait, who are you?! Don't tell me he really did sic the cops on me!
engSearchText:
Wait, who are you?! Don't tell me he really did sic the
cops on me!
jpnChrName: な、何なんだお前たちは！？ まさか警察……
jpnSearchText:
な、何なんだお前たちは！？
まさか警察……

engChrName: We're not police, nor are we bracers. Van here is a spriggan.
engSearchText:
We're not police, nor are we bracers. Van here is
a spriggan.
jpnChrName: いいえ、警察でも遊撃士でもありません。 裏解決屋です。
jpnSearchText:
いいえ、警察でも遊撃士でもありません。
裏解決屋です。

engChrName: Give up!
engSearchText: Give up!
jpnChrName: さあ、観念してください！
jpnSearchText: さあ、観念してください！

engChrName: Make this easy for us and stay still.
engSearchText: Make this easy for us and stay still.
jpnChrName: さあ、観念しな。
jpnSearchText: さあ、観念しな。

engChrName: If you would, please surrender.
engSearchText: If you would, please surrender.
jpnChrName: 観念していただきましょう。
jpnSearchText: 観念していただきましょう。

engChrName: After realizing there was no way to escape, the criminal gave up on resisting.
engSearchText:
After realizing there was no way to escape, the
criminal gave up on resisting.
jpnChrName: 逃げられないことを悟った犯人は抵抗を諦め──
jpnSearchText: <C1>逃げられないことを悟った犯人は抵抗を諦め──

engChrName: After Oslo arrived, the group began questioning the criminal.
engSearchText:
After Oslo arrived, the group began questioning
the criminal.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは駆けつけてきたオスロと一緒に 彼を問い詰めるのだった。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは駆けつけてきたオスロと一緒に
彼を問い詰めるのだった。

engChrName: You ain't even the big boss there, but some part-timer?
engSearchText:
You ain't even the big boss there, but
some part-timer?
jpnChrName: つまりアンタは軽いバイトの気持ちで 上に指示されたことをやっただけだって？
jpnSearchText:
つまりアンタは軽いバイトの気持ちで
上に指示されたことをやっただけだって？

engChrName: Th-That's right...
engSearchText: Th-That's right...
jpnChrName: そ、そうだよ……
jpnSearchText: そ、そうだよ……

engChrName: After I sent the boss the full amount, all I got was a tiny paycheck.
engSearchText:
After I sent the boss the full amount, all I got was a
tiny paycheck.
jpnChrName: 前に振り込まれたミラも全額上に渡って、 こっちはなけなしのバイト代しかもらえねえ。
jpnSearchText:
前に振り込まれたミラも全額上に渡って、
こっちはなけなしのバイト代しかもらえねえ。

engChrName: Even that already ran out...
engSearchText: Even that already ran out...
jpnChrName: それももう、使い込んじまったし……
jpnSearchText: それももう、使い込んじまったし……

engChrName: I-I promise this was my first time doing this!
engSearchText: I-I promise this was my first time doing this!
jpnChrName: そもそも今回の仕事が初めてだったのに何で……
jpnSearchText: そもそも今回の仕事が初めてだったのに何で……

engChrName: Just because the crime was only committed one time doesn't mean that you're not to blame.
engSearchText:
Just because the crime was only committed one time
doesn't mean that you're not to blame.
jpnChrName: 初めてだったからといって、 許されるわけではないと思いますが……
jpnSearchText:
初めてだったからといって、
許されるわけではないと思いますが……

engChrName: Lady's right, kid. That's just a lame excuse.
engSearchText: Lady's right, kid. That's just a lame excuse.
jpnChrName: ま、言い訳にはなんねえな。
jpnSearchText: ま、言い訳にはなんねえな。

engChrName: I-I'm sorry!
engSearchText: I-I'm sorry!
jpnChrName: す、すみません！！
jpnSearchText: す、すみません！！

engChrName: How much do you know about the organization you were working for?
engSearchText:
How much do you know about the organization you
were working for?
jpnChrName: で、その上の組織の詳しい情報は？
jpnSearchText: で、その上の組織の詳しい情報は？

engChrName: Nothing! Nothing, I promise! I just got the orders on my phone.
engSearchText:
Nothing! Nothing, I promise! I just got the orders on
my phone.
jpnChrName: 何も分からないんですよ！　本当ですぅぅ！！ こっちへの指示も通信越しばかりで……
jpnSearchText:
何も分からないんですよ！　本当ですぅぅ！！
こっちへの指示も通信越しばかりで……

engChrName: They were just using you...
engSearchText: They were just using you...
jpnChrName: いわゆる捨て駒ですか……
jpnSearchText: いわゆる捨て駒ですか……

engChrName: Man, you're just a chump.
engSearchText: Man, you're just a chump.
jpnChrName: 捨て駒かよ……
jpnSearchText: 捨て駒かよ……

engChrName: So he was just a disposable pawn in this game.
engSearchText: So he was just a disposable pawn in this game.
jpnChrName: どうやら捨て駒のようですね……
jpnSearchText: どうやら捨て駒のようですね……

engChrName: Well, our guy here was clearly the one blackmailin' you, but he was just the lowest rung on that ladder.
engSearchText:
Well, our guy here was clearly the one blackmailin'
you, but he was just the lowest rung on that ladder.
jpnChrName: 見ての通りだ、実行犯のこいつは ただの下っ端らしい。
jpnSearchText:
見ての通りだ、実行犯のこいつは
ただの下っ端らしい。

engChrName: Sorry to say, but it doesn't look like you'll be gettin' your money back.
engSearchText:
Sorry to say, but it doesn't look like you'll be gettin'
your money back.
jpnChrName: 残念だがアンタがとられたミラは 返ってこねぇだろ。
jpnSearchText:
残念だがアンタがとられたミラは
返ってこねぇだろ。

engChrName: It's all right. I'd already given up on that.
engSearchText: It's all right. I'd already given up on that.
jpnChrName: それに関してはもう諦めています。
jpnSearchText: それに関してはもう諦めています。

engChrName: My biggest concern is what comes after.
engSearchText: My biggest concern is what comes after.
jpnChrName: それよりも……今後のことが心配です。
jpnSearchText: それよりも……今後のことが心配です。

engChrName: Yeah, that's the ticket.
engSearchText: Yeah, that's the ticket.
jpnChrName: そこなんだよなぁ……
jpnSearchText: そこなんだよなぁ……

engChrName: We caught the blackmailer himself, but the blackmail material's probably still in the hands of whoever hired this kid.
engSearchText:
We caught the blackmailer himself, but the blackmail
material's probably still in the hands of whoever hired
this kid.
jpnChrName: 実行犯はなんとかできたが、アンタの情報は 恐らく上の組織とやらの所に保存されたままだ。
jpnSearchText:
実行犯はなんとかできたが、アンタの情報は
恐らく上の組織とやらの所に保存されたままだ。

engChrName: We didn't get to the root of the problem, so we can't guarantee they ain't gonna keep comin' back for you.
engSearchText:
We didn't get to the root of the problem, so we can't
guarantee they ain't gonna keep comin' back for you.
jpnChrName: 根本的な解決にはなってねえから、 いつまた狙われるとも限らない。
jpnSearchText:
根本的な解決にはなってねえから、
いつまた狙われるとも限らない。

engChrName: But this mook sure ain't gonna get us to the big boss either.
engSearchText:
But this mook sure ain't gonna get us to the big
boss either.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、この下っ端からじゃ 上まで辿り着けねえしな。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、この下っ端からじゃ
上まで辿り着けねえしな。

engChrName: Not sure there's much more we can do at this point.
engSearchText: Not sure there's much more we can do at this point.
jpnChrName: これ以上はどうしようもねぇかもな。
jpnSearchText: これ以上はどうしようもねぇかもな。

engChrName: Oh, no... Wh-What should I do, then?
engSearchText: Oh, no... Wh-What should I do, then?
jpnChrName: そんな……… 私は一体どうすれば……
jpnSearchText:
そんな………
私は一体どうすれば……

engChrName: Well...
engSearchText: Well...
jpnChrName: そうだな……
jpnSearchText: そうだな……

engChrName: At this point, you should hand it over to the cops.
engSearchText: At this point, you should hand it over to the cops.
jpnChrName: こうなったら警察に届けた方がいいかもな。
jpnSearchText: こうなったら警察に届けた方がいいかもな。

engChrName: B-But if I do that—
engSearchText: B-But if I do that—
jpnChrName: で、ですがそれでは──
jpnSearchText: で、ですがそれでは──

engChrName: Yeah, people are gonna find out.
engSearchText: Yeah, people are gonna find out.
jpnChrName: ああ、事件は明るみになる。
jpnSearchText: ああ、事件は明るみになる。

engChrName: We didn't fix the whole issue, so you don't gotta pay the full fee. Half's fine.
engSearchText:
We didn't fix the whole issue, so you don't gotta pay
the full fee. Half's fine.
jpnChrName: アンタの要望を満たせなかったことになるから 依頼料は半分でいいぜ。
jpnSearchText:
アンタの要望を満たせなかったことになるから
依頼料は半分でいいぜ。

engChrName: Just to be clear, though, the cops should respect your privacy.
engSearchText:
Just to be clear, though, the cops should respect
your privacy.
jpnChrName: 一応、警察ならプライバシーは尊重するはずだ。
jpnSearchText: 一応、警察ならプライバシーは尊重するはずだ。

engChrName: Ain't likely your clients will hear about this.
engSearchText: Ain't likely your clients will hear about this.
jpnChrName: このことがアンタのクライアントにまで 知られる可能性は低いだろ。
jpnSearchText:
このことがアンタのクライアントにまで
知られる可能性は低いだろ。

engChrName: How's that for a solution?
engSearchText: How's that for a solution?
jpnChrName: ──それで手を打ったらどうだ？
jpnSearchText: ──それで手を打ったらどうだ？

engChrName: I suppose it might be my best option.
engSearchText: I suppose it might be my best option.
jpnChrName: 確かに落としどころかもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText: 確かに落としどころかもしれませんね。

engChrName: But don't worry about your fee. I'll pay it in full. I'm the one that made this whole mess.
engSearchText:
But don't worry about your fee. I'll pay it in full.
I'm the one that made this whole mess.
jpnChrName: 依頼料は全額支払わせてください。 これも自分の愚かさが招いた結果ですから……
jpnSearchText:
依頼料は全額支払わせてください。
これも自分の愚かさが招いた結果ですから……

engChrName: All right. As for you...
engSearchText: All right. As for you...
jpnChrName: で、アンタのほうは……
jpnSearchText: で、アンタのほうは……

engChrName: Eek...
engSearchText: Eek...
jpnChrName: ひぃぃ……
jpnSearchText: ひぃぃ……

engChrName: Talk to the cops. Tell 'em everything. You said it was your first time, yeah? Should probably get off with nothin' but a slap on the wrist, then.
engSearchText:
Talk to the cops. Tell 'em everything. You said it was
your first time, yeah? Should probably get off with
nothin' but a slap on the wrist, then.
jpnChrName: 警察に洗いざらい吐くんだな。 初犯ならそう重い処罰にはならねえだろ。
jpnSearchText:
警察に洗いざらい吐くんだな。
初犯ならそう重い処罰にはならねえだろ。

engChrName: Let me be real with you, kid. Consider yourself lucky that this'll be the end of it. A road like this can only lead to a very, very dark future.
engSearchText:
Let me be real with you, kid. Consider yourself lucky
that this'll be the end of it. A road like this can only
lead to a very, very dark future.
jpnChrName: むしろこれで抜け出せることを幸運に思っとけ、 でないと重犯罪者への道まっしぐらだ。
jpnSearchText:
むしろこれで抜け出せることを幸運に思っとけ、
でないと重犯罪者への道まっしぐらだ。

engChrName: Got it?
engSearchText: Got it?
jpnChrName: ──分かったな？
jpnSearchText: ──分かったな？

engChrName: Y-Yes sir!
engSearchText: Y-Yes sir!
jpnChrName: は、はい……！
jpnSearchText: は、はい……！

engChrName: Can always pretend none of it ever happened.
engSearchText: Can always pretend none of it ever happened.
jpnChrName: そうだな…… なかったことにするって選択肢もあるかもな。
jpnSearchText:
そうだな……
なかったことにするって選択肢もあるかもな。

engChrName: H-How can we do that?
engSearchText: H-How can we do that?
jpnChrName: なかったこと？
jpnSearchText: なかったこと？

engChrName: You never looked at any weird sites, and never had any problem.
engSearchText:
You never looked at any weird sites, and never had
any problem.
jpnChrName: アンタは怪しいサイトなんて見てねえし、 事件も起きてねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
アンタは怪しいサイトなんて見てねえし、
事件も起きてねぇ。

engChrName: We can make that the case.
engSearchText: We can make that the case.
jpnChrName: そういうことにするんだよ。
jpnSearchText: そういうことにするんだよ。

engChrName: C-Can you really do that?!
engSearchText: C-Can you really do that?!
jpnChrName: そ、そんなことが可能なんですか！！？
jpnSearchText: そ、そんなことが可能なんですか！！？

engChrName: Well, it's up to my assistant here.
engSearchText: Well, it's up to my assistant here.
jpnChrName: ま、うちの助手次第だがな。
jpnSearchText: ま、うちの助手次第だがな。

engChrName: How 'bout it? Think you can manage?
engSearchText: How 'bout it? Think you can manage?
jpnChrName: 何とかできたりしねえか？
jpnSearchText: 何とかできたりしねえか？

engChrName: *sigh* I'm not too happy about it, but if the only people this will affect are criminals, then I suppose I can let it slide.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I'm not too happy about it, but if the only
people this will affect are criminals, then I suppose I
can let it slide.
jpnChrName: ふぅ……気が進まないけど、 被害を被るのは犯罪組織だけだしね。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ……気が進まないけど、
被害を被るのは犯罪組織だけだしね。

engChrName: I'll need Risette's assistance, of course, but it should be doable.
engSearchText:
I'll need Risette's assistance, of course, but it should
be doable.
jpnChrName: リゼットさんに協力してもらう必要はあるけど、 一応出来なくはないはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
リゼットさんに協力してもらう必要はあるけど、
一応出来なくはないはずだ。

engChrName: Knew I could count on ya.
engSearchText: Knew I could count on ya.
jpnChrName: ハッ、流石だな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、流石だな。

engChrName: P-Please! That would be great!
engSearchText: P-Please! That would be great!
jpnChrName: ──ぜ、ぜひお願いします！
jpnSearchText: ──ぜ、ぜひお願いします！

engChrName: Very well, then. Shall we?
engSearchText: Very well, then. Shall we?
jpnChrName: ではカトル様、始めましょうか。
jpnSearchText: ではカトル様、始めましょうか。

engChrName: Of course. Thank you for the help.
engSearchText: Of course. Thank you for the help.
jpnChrName: ええ、協力をお願いします。
jpnSearchText: ええ、協力をお願いします。

engChrName: *sigh* All right.
engSearchText: *sigh* All right.
jpnChrName: ふう……分かりました。
jpnSearchText: ふう……分かりました。

engChrName: Let me contact Risette, then.
engSearchText: Let me contact Risette, then.
jpnChrName: では、リゼットさんに連絡してみます。
jpnSearchText: では、リゼットさんに連絡してみます。

engChrName: By making use of Marduk's servers, Quatre and Risette together erased Oslo's former account.
engSearchText:
By making use of Marduk's servers, Quatre and
Risette together erased Oslo's former account.
jpnChrName: リゼットの協力のもと、マルドゥック社のサーバーを 利用しつつ、カトルはオスロのアカウントを削除──
jpnSearchText:
リゼットの協力のもと、マルドゥック社のサーバーを
利用しつつ、カトルはオスロのアカウントを削除──

engChrName: After thoroughly erasing all traces of it, the two of them then issued Oslo a new account, using a backup to preserve the account data.
engSearchText:
After thoroughly erasing all traces of it, the two of
them then issued Oslo a new account, using a backup
to preserve the account data.
jpnChrName: 注意深くそれと関連する痕跡を消した後、 バックアップを利用してアカウントを再発行した。
jpnSearchText:
注意深くそれと関連する痕跡を消した後、
バックアップを利用してアカウントを再発行した。

engChrName: That should solve matters.
engSearchText: That should solve matters.
jpnChrName: これで問題はないでしょう。
jpnSearchText: これで問題はないでしょう。

engChrName: We can't just erase the data the criminals have on your actions, of course.
engSearchText:
We can't just erase the data the criminals have on
your actions, of course.
jpnChrName: 犯罪組織のどこかに貴方のデータが 残されているかもしれませんが──
jpnSearchText:
犯罪組織のどこかに貴方のデータが
残されているかもしれませんが──

engChrName: But by doing this, they shouldn't be able to link it back to you anymore.
engSearchText:
But by doing this, they shouldn't be able to link it
back to you anymore.
jpnChrName: それを今の貴方と結びつけることは出来ません。
jpnSearchText: それを今の貴方と結びつけることは出来ません。

engChrName: Fortunately, the only person you made explicit contact with was this blackmailer.
engSearchText:
Fortunately, the only person you made explicit
contact with was this blackmailer.
jpnChrName: 実際に接触した実行犯がこの人だけなのが 幸いでしたね。
jpnSearchText:
実際に接触した実行犯がこの人だけなのが
幸いでしたね。

engChrName: Oh, thank goodness...
engSearchText: Oh, thank goodness...
jpnChrName: 良かったぁ………
jpnSearchText: 良かったぁ………

engChrName: Yeah, better be grateful. They did a superb job here.
engSearchText: Yeah, better be grateful. They did a superb job here.
jpnChrName: ハッ、せいぜいウチの優秀な助手たちに 感謝するんだな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、せいぜいウチの優秀な助手たちに
感謝するんだな。

engChrName: Now, as for you...
engSearchText: Now, as for you...
jpnChrName: さて、アンタのほうだが……
jpnSearchText: さて、アンタのほうだが……

engChrName: Eek...
engSearchText: Eek...
jpnChrName: ひぃぃ……
jpnSearchText: ひぃぃ……

engChrName: Seems like this really is your first time, so we're gonna sweep your little fun bit of blackmailin' under the rug.
engSearchText:
Seems like this really is your first time, so we're gonna
sweep your little fun bit of blackmailin' under the rug.
jpnChrName: 初犯みてえだし、アンタの恐喝行為も 今回だけなかったことにしてやる。
jpnSearchText:
初犯みてえだし、アンタの恐喝行為も
今回だけなかったことにしてやる。

engChrName: Assumin' you quit your job, that is. Let me say, kid, that you better jump ship now if you're not willin' to commit to the criminal lifestyle.
engSearchText:
Assumin' you quit your job, that is. Let me say, kid,
that you better jump ship now if you're not willin' to
commit to the criminal lifestyle.
jpnChrName: もちろん、闇バイトから手を引く前提な。 むしろ辞めるなら今だけとも言えんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
もちろん、闇バイトから手を引く前提な。
むしろ辞めるなら今だけとも言えんだろ。

engChrName: If you keep layin' with criminals, you'll eventually reach a point where there's no goin' back.
engSearchText:
If you keep layin' with criminals, you'll eventually
reach a point where there's no goin' back.
jpnChrName: これ以上犯罪組織と深く関わったら 本当に取り返しがつかなくなっちまう。
jpnSearchText:
これ以上犯罪組織と深く関わったら
本当に取り返しがつかなくなっちまう。

engChrName: Either pull out now, or you'll get pulled right in. You lookin' to lose yourself forever in the pitch-black depths of the underworld?
engSearchText:
Either pull out now, or you'll get pulled right in.
You lookin' to lose yourself forever in the pitch-black
depths of the underworld?
jpnChrName: それとも、とことん堕ちてみたいか―― 底なんて見えやしねえ裏世界の闇に。
jpnSearchText:
それとも、とことん堕ちてみたいか――
底なんて見えやしねえ裏世界の闇に。

engChrName: I-I'll quit! I don't want any more part in this!
engSearchText: I-I'll quit! I don't want any more part in this!
jpnChrName: や、やめます！　もう関わりたくありません！
jpnSearchText: や、やめます！　もう関わりたくありません！

engChrName: You sure you're not just sayin' that to get out of this bind?
engSearchText:
You sure you're not just sayin' that to get out of
this bind?
jpnChrName: 本当か？　この場凌ぎの嘘じゃねえだろうな？
jpnSearchText: 本当か？　この場凌ぎの嘘じゃねえだろうな？

engChrName: I-I really mean it!
engSearchText: I-I really mean it!
jpnChrName: ほ、本当ですぅ！！
jpnSearchText: ほ、本当ですぅ！！

engChrName: I don't know about the people above me at all. I got recommended in by some guy.
engSearchText:
I don't know about the people above me at all. I got
recommended in by some guy.
jpnChrName: 上の組織の人間かどうかは分かりませんが、 一応オレにこのバイトを紹介したヤツがいて……
jpnSearchText:
上の組織の人間かどうかは分かりませんが、
一応オレにこのバイトを紹介したヤツがいて……

engChrName: He's kind of a recruiter or sorts. Name's Clément.
engSearchText: He's kind of a recruiter or sorts. Name's Clément.
jpnChrName: 斡旋業者と名乗ってるクレマンってヤツです。
jpnSearchText: 斡旋業者と名乗ってるクレマンってヤツです。

engChrName: But that's all I know! Please believe me!
engSearchText: But that's all I know! Please believe me!
jpnChrName: オレに分かるのはこれで全部です！ どうか信じてください！！
jpnSearchText:
オレに分かるのはこれで全部です！
どうか信じてください！！

engChrName: Fine. But I ain't forgettin' you. If I catch you back on your old haunts, you'll get what's comin' to you. Got it?
engSearchText:
Fine. But I ain't forgettin' you. If I catch you back on
your old haunts, you'll get what's comin' to you.
Got it?
jpnChrName: いいだろう、アンタのことは覚えたからな。 また悪さしたらどうなるか分かってんな？
jpnSearchText:
いいだろう、アンタのことは覚えたからな。
また悪さしたらどうなるか分かってんな？

engChrName: Got it!
engSearchText: Got it!
jpnChrName: は、はい！！
jpnSearchText: は、はい！！

engChrName: (Clément... I should keep that name in mind.)
engSearchText: (Clément... I should keep that name in mind.)
jpnChrName: （クレマンか……一応覚えておくか。）
jpnSearchText: （クレマンか……一応覚えておくか。）

engChrName: Well, that solves this case. It wasn't exactly the most satisfying solution, I'll say...
engSearchText:
Well, that solves this case. It wasn't exactly the most
satisfying solution, I'll say...
jpnChrName: 一応これで依頼は解決したけど、 なんだかスッキリしないな……
jpnSearchText:
一応これで依頼は解決したけど、
なんだかスッキリしないな……

engChrName: You get that a lot when you're workin' as a spriggan.
engSearchText: You get that a lot when you're workin' as a spriggan.
jpnChrName: そういうのも裏解決屋業務の一部だ。
jpnSearchText: そういうのも裏解決屋業務の一部だ。

engChrName: This country's darkness is deep-rooted. It's too deep for anyone. Ain't no way one person or group can just clear it all away.
engSearchText:
This country's darkness is deep-rooted. It's too deep
for anyone. Ain't no way one person or group can just
clear it all away.
jpnChrName: この国に潜む闇は濃すぎる、 全部払うなんざ到底無理な話だ。
jpnSearchText:
この国に潜む闇は濃すぎる、
全部払うなんざ到底無理な話だ。

engChrName: Not the bracers, and, hell, not even the government.
engSearchText: Not the bracers, and, hell, not even the government.
jpnChrName: それこそ遊撃士協会でも、 共和国政府でもな。
jpnSearchText:
それこそ遊撃士協会でも、
共和国政府でもな。

engChrName: A spriggan's job is to take care of those that fall through the cracks.
engSearchText:
A spriggan's job is to take care of those that fall
through the cracks.
jpnChrName: それでも零れ落ちた助けを求める奴らを なんとかしてやるのが裏解決屋だ。
jpnSearchText:
それでも零れ落ちた助けを求める奴らを
なんとかしてやるのが裏解決屋だ。

engChrName: We ain't after fairy-tale endings—can't afford to chase those. Just gotta go for the best ones we can get without compromisin' our values.
engSearchText:
We ain't after fairy-tale endings—can't afford to
chase those. Just gotta go for the best ones we can
get without compromisin' our values.
jpnChrName: 最善の結果を求めるわけじゃねえ、俺たちの流儀に 則った上で出来る限りのことをすればそれでいい。
jpnSearchText:
最善の結果を求めるわけじゃねえ、俺たちの流儀に
則った上で出来る限りのことをすればそれでいい。

engChrName: ...Okay. I think I understand, at least a little.
engSearchText: ...Okay. I think I understand, at least a little.
jpnChrName: ……そうか、なんとなくだけど、 少し分かった気がするよ。
jpnSearchText:
……そうか、なんとなくだけど、
少し分かった気がするよ。

engChrName: It's dawned on me what the purpose of a spriggan's job is, and why you do it, Van.
engSearchText:
It's dawned on me what the purpose of a spriggan's
job is, and why you do it, Van.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんが裏解決屋なんてものをやる意味。
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさんが裏解決屋なんてものをやる意味。

engChrName: Quatre...
engSearchText: Quatre...
jpnChrName: カトル君……
jpnSearchText: カトル君……

engChrName: That's good. If you've figured that much at least, I'd call your trainin' a success.
engSearchText:
That's good. If you've figured that much at least, I'd
call your trainin' a success.
jpnChrName: それが分かれば、研修の成果としては上々だな。
jpnSearchText: それが分かれば、研修の成果としては上々だな。

engChrName: Oh, well. At the end of the day, I need to eat, and that's the real reason I'm workin' at all.
engSearchText:
Oh, well. At the end of the day, I need to eat, and
that's the real reason I'm workin' at all.
jpnChrName: ま、ぶっちゃけ 生活費のためってのが一番の理由だが。
jpnSearchText:
ま、ぶっちゃけ
生活費のためってのが一番の理由だが。

engChrName: And you had to dash the nice conclusion with that sprinkle of cynicism right at the end...
engSearchText:
And you had to dash the nice conclusion with that
sprinkle of cynicism right at the end...
jpnChrName: いい話風にまとまりかけたのに……まったく。
jpnSearchText: いい話風にまとまりかけたのに……まったく。

engChrName: Still, I suppose that's the most spriggan-like way to tie a ribbon on it.
engSearchText:
Still, I suppose that's the most spriggan-like way to
tie a ribbon on it.
jpnChrName: けど、そういうスタイルこそ 裏解決屋みたいだね？
jpnSearchText:
けど、そういうスタイルこそ
裏解決屋みたいだね？

engChrName: Goodness...
engSearchText: Goodness...
jpnChrName: あはは……
jpnSearchText: あはは……

engChrName: Quest Orbal Net Fraud completed!
engSearchText: Quest Orbal Net Fraud completed!
jpnChrName: クエスト【導力ネットの詐欺被害】を達成した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>導力ネットの詐欺被害<C1>】を達成した！

engChrName: Received
engSearchText: Received
jpnChrName: 報酬としてミラの振り込みを確認した。
jpnSearchText: 報酬として<C2><C0>ミラの振り込みを確認した。

engChrName: Hey, is that...?
engSearchText: Hey, is that...?
jpnChrName: あいつは……
jpnSearchText: あいつは……

engChrName: Phew. That should get them off my tail... Wait—YOU?!
engSearchText:
Phew. That should get them off my tail...
Wait—YOU?!
jpnChrName: ふう、なんとか撒けたかしら── ってアンタは……！
jpnSearchText:
ふう、なんとか撒けたかしら──
ってアンタは……！

engChrName: Heya. Heck of a coincidence runnin' into you here. 'Specially at this hour.
engSearchText:
Heya. Heck of a coincidence runnin' into you here.
'Specially at this hour.
jpnChrName: よう、こんな時間に こんな場所で会うとは奇遇だな。
jpnSearchText:
よう、こんな時間に
こんな場所で会うとは奇遇だな。

engChrName: Saw that article of yours on Buzzraider, by the way.
engSearchText: Saw that article of yours on Buzzraider, by the way.
jpnChrName: そういや──見たぜ、バズレイダー。
jpnSearchText: そういや──見たぜ、バズレイダー。

engChrName: Lemme guess: on the run from paparazzi right now?
engSearchText: Lemme guess: on the run from paparazzi right now?
jpnChrName: 察するに、しつこいパパラッチから 逃げおおせて来たってトコか。
jpnSearchText:
察するに、しつこいパパラッチから
逃げおおせて来たってトコか。

engChrName: Wh-What if I am?
engSearchText: Wh-What if I am?
jpnChrName: だ、だったらどうしたって言うのよ。
jpnSearchText: だ、だったらどうしたって言うのよ。

engChrName: Ahem! To be clear, that article is—
engSearchText: Ahem! To be clear, that article is—
jpnChrName: コホン、第一あの記事は──
jpnSearchText: コホン、第一あの記事は──

engChrName: Don't worry. I can make a guess.
engSearchText: Don't worry. I can make a guess.
jpnChrName: わーってるよ。
jpnSearchText: わーってるよ。

engChrName: You checkin' out talents and sports figures who've got ties to the mafia, yeah?
engSearchText:
You checkin' out talents and sports figures who've got
ties to the mafia, yeah?
jpnChrName: 大方マフィアと関係ある芸能人や スポーツ選手を探ってたんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
大方マフィアと関係ある芸能人や
スポーツ選手を探ってたんじゃねえか？

engChrName: Can't say I blame you. The why of things aside, he HAS been goin' all around these shady spots for weird reasons.
engSearchText:
Can't say I blame you. The why of things aside, he
HAS been goin' all around these shady spots for
weird reasons.
jpnChrName: まあ事情はアレだったが…… 確かに一人きりで各地に出向いてたしな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ事情はアレだったが……
確かに一人きりで各地に出向いてたしな。

engChrName: Wait, you've got detailed info on him?!
engSearchText: Wait, you've got detailed info on him?!
jpnChrName: 彼の事情を知ってるの！？
jpnSearchText: 彼の事情を知ってるの！？

engChrName: Look, I can't exactly spill too much, but I can tell you this:
engSearchText:
Look, I can't exactly spill too much, but I can tell you
this:
jpnChrName: 守秘義務だから詳しくは言えねえが……
jpnSearchText: 守秘義務だから詳しくは言えねえが……

engChrName: You can lay off the Red Comet. He's one-hundred percent clean, trust me. Least when it comes to what you're lookin' into.
engSearchText:
You can lay off the Red Comet. He's one-hundred
percent clean, trust me. Least when it comes to what
you're lookin' into.
jpnChrName: 《紅い流星》に限って言えば、 そっち方面は１００パーシロだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
《紅い流星》に限って言えば、
そっち方面は１００パーシロだぜ。

engChrName: You gotta be kidding me... So what was I even doing all this for?!
engSearchText:
You gotta be kidding me... So what was I even
doing all this for?!
jpnChrName: ちょ、ちょっと待って…… それじゃああたしは何のために……！
jpnSearchText:
ちょ、ちょっと待って……
それじゃああたしは何のために……！

engChrName: And I got chewed out by my mom and grammy for it, too...
engSearchText:
And I got chewed out by my mom and grammy for
it, too...
jpnChrName: ママやお祖母ちゃんからも 散々言われちゃったし……
jpnSearchText:
ママやお祖母ちゃんからも
散々言われちゃったし……

engChrName: Oh? Got complaints about how you're handlin' your other job?
engSearchText:
Oh? Got complaints about how you're handlin' your
other job?
jpnChrName: へえ、あの活動についてかよ？
jpnSearchText: へえ、あの活動についてかよ？

engChrName: O-Other job? I have no clue what you could possibly mean!
engSearchText:
O-Other job? I have no clue what you could
possibly mean!
jpnChrName: い、いったい何のこと？ あたしは何も知らないんだから。
jpnSearchText:
い、いったい何のこと？
あたしは何も知らないんだから。

engChrName: Van? What are you doing here? And...who would this woman be?
engSearchText:
Van? What are you doing here? And...who would this
woman be?
jpnChrName: ヴァン、どうしてこんな所に── それにそちらの女性（ひと）は……？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン、どうしてこんな所に──
それにそちらの女性（ひと）は……？

engChrName: (You're kidding! That's Elaine Auclair, the bracer!)
engSearchText: (You're kidding! That's Elaine Auclair, the bracer!)
jpnChrName: （ギ、ギルドの   エレイン・オークレール……？）
jpnSearchText:
（ギ、ギルドの
エレイン・オークレール……？）

engChrName: (Come on! I swear, it's just one thing after another!)
engSearchText: (Come on! I swear, it's just one thing after another!)
jpnChrName: （まったく、次から次へと──）
jpnSearchText: （まったく、次から次へと──）

engChrName: Anyway! I have to go, but don't you dare think you've beaten me!
engSearchText:
Anyway! I have to go, but don't you dare think you've
beaten me!
jpnChrName: とにかくあたしはもう行くから── これで勝ったと思わないでよね！
jpnSearchText:
とにかくあたしはもう行くから──
これで勝ったと思わないでよね！

engChrName: That was Judith Lanster, right? The actress?
engSearchText: That was Judith Lanster, right? The actress?
jpnChrName: 今の…… 女優のジュディス・ランスターよね？
jpnSearchText:
今の……
女優のジュディス・ランスターよね？

engChrName: Yeah. You know her?
engSearchText: Yeah. You know her?
jpnChrName: まあな、知り合いなのか？
jpnSearchText: まあな、知り合いなのか？

engChrName: Sort of. We'd just met at an event before.
engSearchText: Sort of. We'd just met at an event before.
jpnChrName: 一度とある催しで軽く顔を合わせた程度よ。
jpnSearchText: 一度とある催しで軽く顔を合わせた程度よ。

engChrName: I imagine you'd be more familiar with her than I am. Heard you two got acquainted in Tharbad.
engSearchText:
I imagine you'd be more familiar with her than I am.
Heard you two got acquainted in Tharbad.
jpnChrName: あなたこそ、彼女とはサルバッドで 知り合ったみたいだけど……
jpnSearchText:
あなたこそ、彼女とはサルバッドで
知り合ったみたいだけど……

engChrName: Well enough to meet outside of work, too, it looks like.
engSearchText:
Well enough to meet outside of work, too, it
looks like.
jpnChrName: まさかプライベートでも会う仲にまで なっていたなんてね。
jpnSearchText:
まさかプライベートでも会う仲にまで
なっていたなんてね。

engChrName: C'mon, it ain't like that. Have a little faith in me.
engSearchText: C'mon, it ain't like that. Have a little faith in me.
jpnChrName: そんなんじゃねーよ、邪推しすぎだ。
jpnSearchText: そんなんじゃねーよ、邪推しすぎだ。

engChrName: Oh, yeah? All right, then.
engSearchText: Oh, yeah? All right, then.
jpnChrName: ふぅん……まあいいけど。
jpnSearchText: ふぅん……まあいいけど。

engChrName: So? What are you actually doing out here in Riverside at this hour?
engSearchText:
So? What are you actually doing out here in Riverside
at this hour?
jpnChrName: で、こんな時間に リバーサイドで何をしていたの？
jpnSearchText:
で、こんな時間に
リバーサイドで何をしていたの？

engChrName: Searching for someone, actually.
engSearchText: Searching for someone, actually.
jpnChrName: 人探しだよ。
jpnSearchText: 人探しだよ。

engChrName: Someone got dragged into workin' an underworld job without bein' aware of it.
engSearchText:
Someone got dragged into workin' an underworld job
without bein' aware of it.
jpnChrName: どうやら意図せず闇バイトに 関わっちまったっぽい奴がいてな。
jpnSearchText:
どうやら意図せず闇バイトに
関わっちまったっぽい奴がいてな。

engChrName: You're investigating an underworld job, too?
engSearchText: You're investigating an underworld job, too?
jpnChrName: 闇バイト……貴方も？
jpnSearchText: 闇バイト……貴方も？

engChrName: 'Too'? Are you up to the same thing?
engSearchText: 'Too'? Are you up to the same thing?
jpnChrName: なんだ、お前も それ関係の依頼を抱えてんのか。
jpnSearchText:
なんだ、お前も
それ関係の依頼を抱えてんのか。

engChrName: I am, yes. One of their scam victims made a request to the bracers.
engSearchText:
I am, yes. One of their scam victims made a request
to the bracers.
jpnChrName: ええ、こちらは詐欺被害者の依頼でね。
jpnSearchText: ええ、こちらは詐欺被害者の依頼でね。

engChrName: I'm looking for a man named Clément right now. He's likely the go-between that hired the part-timers.
engSearchText:
I'm looking for a man named Clément right now.
He's likely the go-between that hired the part-timers.
jpnChrName: 今は闇バイトの斡旋元と思しき クレマンという人物の行方を追っているわ。
jpnSearchText:
今は闇バイトの斡旋元と思しき
クレマンという人物の行方を追っているわ。

engChrName: Clément sure gets around, huh.
engSearchText: Clément sure gets around, huh.
jpnChrName: ハッ、またクレマンかよ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、またクレマンかよ。

engChrName: We're basically barkin' up the same tree, then.
engSearchText: We're basically barkin' up the same tree, then.
jpnChrName: こうなると、互いに 調査の行き着く先は同じかもな。
jpnSearchText:
こうなると、互いに
調査の行き着く先は同じかもな。

engChrName: That we are.
engSearchText: That we are.
jpnChrName: どうやらそのようね。
jpnSearchText: どうやらそのようね。

engChrName: I came to Riverside because we had a report that Clément had been spotted here.
engSearchText:
I came to Riverside because we had a report that
Clément had been spotted here.
jpnChrName: リバーサイドでクレマンを見たという 情報があったから来たんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
リバーサイドでクレマンを見たという
情報があったから来たんだけど……

engChrName: Do you mind if I tag along with you?
engSearchText: Do you mind if I tag along with you?
jpnChrName: よければ貴方の調査に 同行させてもらえないかしら。
jpnSearchText:
よければ貴方の調査に
同行させてもらえないかしら。

engChrName: Not at all. Might make things easier for us all.
engSearchText: Not at all. Might make things easier for us all.
jpnChrName: ま、構わねえぜ。 その方が効率も良さそうだしな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、構わねえぜ。
その方が効率も良さそうだしな。

engChrName: Van filled Elaine in on the current state of his investigation.
engSearchText:
Van filled Elaine in on the current state of
his investigation.
jpnChrName: ヴァンはここまでの調査の流れを説明した。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ヴァンはここまでの調査の流れを説明した。

engChrName: An idol named Lulua, huh?
engSearchText: An idol named Lulua, huh?
jpnChrName: なるほど、アイドルのルルアさんが……
jpnSearchText: なるほど、アイドルのルルアさんが……

engChrName: Definitely looks like she's an unwitting pawn of this scheme.
engSearchText:
Definitely looks like she's an unwitting pawn of
this scheme.
jpnChrName: 確かに、自覚のないまま 片棒を担がされた可能性が高そうね。
jpnSearchText:
確かに、自覚のないまま
片棒を担がされた可能性が高そうね。

engChrName: Sure does. Which honestly puts her in a whole lotta trouble.
engSearchText:
Sure does. Which honestly puts her in a whole
lotta trouble.
jpnChrName: ああ、おまけに トラブルの真っ最中かもしれねえわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、おまけに
トラブルの真っ最中かもしれねえわけだ。

engChrName: Let's check out the concert hall.
engSearchText: Let's check out the concert hall.
jpnChrName: そんじゃ、ライブハウスで聞き込みすんぞ。
jpnSearchText: そんじゃ、ライブハウスで聞き込みすんぞ。

engChrName: Oh, Lulua? No, she wasn't on stage today.
engSearchText: Oh, Lulua? No, she wasn't on stage today.
jpnChrName: ルルアちゃんか…… 今日はステージはなかったはずだが。
jpnSearchText:
ルルアちゃんか……
今日はステージはなかったはずだが。

engChrName: Hey, Natalie. You got any idea where she is?
engSearchText: Hey, Natalie. You got any idea where she is?
jpnChrName: ナタリーさんは知ってるかい？
jpnSearchText: ナタリーさんは知ってるかい？

engChrName: A little, I guess. I've been thinking about her a lot as of late.
engSearchText:
A little, I guess. I've been thinking about her a lot as
of late.
jpnChrName: まあね……彼女のことは それなりに気にしてはいるから。
jpnSearchText:
まあね……彼女のことは
それなりに気にしてはいるから。

engChrName: I did happen to see her.
engSearchText: I did happen to see her.
jpnChrName: 確かに彼女の姿なら見かけたわ。
jpnSearchText: 確かに彼女の姿なら見かけたわ。

engChrName: It stuck out to me because she was talking with some older woman I'd never seen before.
engSearchText:
It stuck out to me because she was talking with some
older woman I'd never seen before.
jpnChrName: それも見知らぬお婆さんと一緒だったから よく覚えているわよ。
jpnSearchText:
それも見知らぬお婆さんと一緒だったから
よく覚えているわよ。

engChrName: That's a lead.
engSearchText: That's a lead.
jpnChrName: そいつはありがてえ。
jpnSearchText: そいつはありがてえ。

engChrName: Did you happen to overhear what they were talking about?
engSearchText:
Did you happen to overhear what they were
talking about?
jpnChrName: ２人が何か話しているのを 聞いたりしましたか？
jpnSearchText:
２人が何か話しているのを
聞いたりしましたか？

engChrName: Eh, kinda? Something about grabbing tea at the food stalls.
engSearchText:
Eh, kinda? Something about grabbing tea at the
food stalls.
jpnChrName: そうね……ライブハウスを出た後は 屋台でお茶しようって話していた気がするわ。
jpnSearchText:
そうね……ライブハウスを出た後は
屋台でお茶しようって話していた気がするわ。

engChrName: I think I heard something about trying out the tacos.
engSearchText: I think I heard something about trying out the tacos.
jpnChrName: タコスがオススメとも言っていたかしらね。
jpnSearchText: タコスがオススメとも言っていたかしらね。

engChrName: Tacos? Got it.
engSearchText: Tacos? Got it.
jpnChrName: タコスか、了解だ。
jpnSearchText: タコスか、了解だ。

engChrName: Thank you for the information.
engSearchText: Thank you for the information.
jpnChrName: 情報提供ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText: 情報提供ありがとうございます。

engChrName: Right, right. Was just before dark when Lulua and the old lady stopped by my stall.
engSearchText:
Right, right. Was just before dark when Lulua and
the old lady stopped by my stall.
jpnChrName: 夕方前だったか。 ルルアちゃんと婆さんならウチの店に来たぜ。
jpnSearchText:
夕方前だったか。
ルルアちゃんと婆さんならウチの店に来たぜ。

engChrName: Think they were meetin' with some middle-aged man or somethin'. He was waitin' for 'em at the table.
engSearchText:
Think they were meetin' with some middle-aged man
or somethin'. He was waitin' for 'em at the table.
jpnChrName: 先に来てテーブルに座ってた中年の男と 合流していたみたいだが……
jpnSearchText:
先に来てテーブルに座ってた中年の男と
合流していたみたいだが……

engChrName: Kind of an odd group, if you ask me.
engSearchText: Kind of an odd group, if you ask me.
jpnChrName: よく考えたら妙な組み合わせだったな。
jpnSearchText: よく考えたら妙な組み合わせだったな。

engChrName: (A middle-aged man...)
engSearchText: (A middle-aged man...)
jpnChrName: （中年の男……）
jpnSearchText: （中年の男……）

engChrName: (Might be Clément.)
engSearchText: (Might be Clément.)
jpnChrName: （もしかして、クレマンか？）
jpnSearchText: （もしかして、クレマンか？）

engChrName: Notice anything else out of the ordinary?
engSearchText: Notice anything else out of the ordinary?
jpnChrName: 他に何か変わったことはなかったか？ おやっさん。
jpnSearchText:
他に何か変わったことはなかったか？
おやっさん。

engChrName: Can't say I did. Couldn't hear them all the way from here.
engSearchText:
Can't say I did. Couldn't hear them all the way
from here.
jpnChrName: 流石にテーブルで何を話していたかは 分からねえが。
jpnSearchText:
流石にテーブルで何を話していたかは
分からねえが。

engChrName: They were talkin' for a good while before the man got real worked up.
engSearchText:
They were talkin' for a good while before the man got
real worked up.
jpnChrName: しばらくして、男が声を荒げはじめてな。
jpnSearchText: しばらくして、男が声を荒げはじめてな。

engChrName: Looks like things got real heated, so they up an' left. Went right across the river. I was wonderin' what came of them.
engSearchText:
Looks like things got real heated, so they up an' left.
Went right across the river. I was wonderin' what
came of them.
jpnChrName: そのままドタバタと川向うに移動していったから 何事かと思ってはいたんだが……
jpnSearchText:
そのままドタバタと川向うに移動していったから
何事かと思ってはいたんだが……

engChrName: Don't know anything else, sorry.
engSearchText: Don't know anything else, sorry.
jpnChrName: 悪いがその後のことまでは分からねえな。
jpnSearchText: 悪いがその後のことまでは分からねえな。

engChrName: That's plenty to go on.
engSearchText: That's plenty to go on.
jpnChrName: それだけ聞ければ十分だ。
jpnSearchText: それだけ聞ければ十分だ。

engChrName: It is. Thank you for all of the information.
engSearchText: It is. Thank you for all of the information.
jpnChrName: 教えて下さってありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText: 教えて下さってありがとうございます。

engChrName: This sure is startin' to stink.
engSearchText: This sure is startin' to stink.
jpnChrName: ハッ、何やら 一気にキナ臭くなってきやがったな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、何やら
一気にキナ臭くなってきやがったな。

engChrName: Agreed. I wasn't expecting someone likely to be Clément to actually crop up here.
engSearchText:
Agreed. I wasn't expecting someone likely to be
Clément to actually crop up here.
jpnChrName: ええ、まさかここで クレマンらしき人物が現れるなんてね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、まさかここで
クレマンらしき人物が現れるなんてね。

engChrName: We need to follow their trail, and now.
engSearchText: We need to follow their trail, and now.
jpnChrName: とにかく出来るだけ足取りを追ってみるわよ。
jpnSearchText: とにかく出来るだけ足取りを追ってみるわよ。

engChrName: Agreed. Let's see if we got any other witnesses.
engSearchText: Agreed. Let's see if we got any other witnesses.
jpnChrName: ああ、川を渡って目撃情報を探るとすっか。
jpnSearchText: ああ、川を渡って目撃情報を探るとすっか。

engChrName: Oh, what am I going to do now? I can't believe this happened...
engSearchText:
Oh, what am I going to do now? I can't believe
this happened...
jpnChrName: どうしましょう…… まさかこんなことになるなんて……
jpnSearchText:
どうしましょう……
まさかこんなことになるなんて……

engChrName: (Looks like something happened to her.)
engSearchText: (Looks like something happened to her.)
jpnChrName: （何かあったみたいね……）
jpnSearchText: （何かあったみたいね……）

engChrName: (This might be who we're lookin' for.)
engSearchText: (This might be who we're lookin' for.)
jpnChrName: （この身なり……   もしかすると本命の人物かもな。）
jpnSearchText:
（この身なり……
もしかすると本命の人物かもな。）

engChrName: Hey there, granny. Got a sec?
engSearchText: Hey there, granny. Got a sec?
jpnChrName: よう婆さん、ちょっといいか。
jpnSearchText: よう婆さん、ちょっといいか。

engChrName: We'd like to speak to you, if we may have a moment.
engSearchText: We'd like to speak to you, if we may have a moment.
jpnChrName: よければ、お話を聞かせて頂きたいのですが……
jpnSearchText: よければ、お話を聞かせて頂きたいのですが……

engChrName: Van, pretending to be Elaine's assistant, inquired into Daphne and Lulua.
engSearchText:
Van, pretending to be Elaine's assistant, inquired into
Daphne and Lulua.
jpnChrName: ヴァンはエレインの協力者の体裁で ダフネとルルアについて尋ねた。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンはエレインの協力者の体裁で
ダフネとルルアについて尋ねた。

engChrName: Oh, for an A-rank bracer and her assistant to show up just when I need them most... This must be the Goddess' guidance at hand.
engSearchText:
Oh, for an A-rank bracer and her assistant to show up
just when I need them most... This must be the
Goddess' guidance at hand.
jpnChrName: Ａ級遊撃士のエレインさんと協力者の方…… これは女神様の思し召しでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
Ａ級遊撃士のエレインさんと協力者の方……
これは女神様の思し召しでしょうか。

engChrName: But you're right, yes. I'm Daphne.
engSearchText: But you're right, yes. I'm Daphne.
jpnChrName: ええ……ダフネは私です。
jpnSearchText: ええ……ダフネは私です。

engChrName: Thank you for confirming that.
engSearchText: Thank you for confirming that.
jpnChrName: やはりそうでしたか。
jpnSearchText: やはりそうでしたか。

engChrName: Heard Lulua was helpin' you as part of her volunteer work.
engSearchText:
Heard Lulua was helpin' you as part of her
volunteer work.
jpnChrName: ルルアがボランティアであんたに 付き合っていたことは分かっているんだが。
jpnSearchText:
ルルアがボランティアであんたに
付き合っていたことは分かっているんだが。

engChrName: Mind telling us what happened?
engSearchText: Mind telling us what happened?
jpnChrName: 何があったか聞かせて貰えるか？
jpnSearchText: 何があったか聞かせて貰えるか？

engChrName: Not at all. I do have something to share with you.
engSearchText: Not at all. I do have something to share with you.
jpnChrName: はい……その、実は……
jpnSearchText: はい……その、実は……

engChrName: About an hour ago, Lulua was taken away by a man called Clément.
engSearchText:
About an hour ago, Lulua was taken away by a man
called Clément.
jpnChrName: ……一時間ほど前にルルアちゃんが クレマンさんに連れていかれてしまったんです。
jpnSearchText:
……一時間ほど前にルルアちゃんが
クレマンさんに連れていかれてしまったんです。

engChrName: He straight up took her?
engSearchText: He straight up took her?
jpnChrName: クレマンがルルアさんを……
jpnSearchText: クレマンがルルアさんを……

engChrName: Well, shit's getting urgent.
engSearchText: Well, shit's getting urgent.
jpnChrName: こりゃあ、猶予はなさそうだな。
jpnSearchText: こりゃあ、猶予はなさそうだな。

engChrName: To be clear, Clément was the man that introduced you and Lulua, yeah?
engSearchText:
To be clear, Clément was the man that introduced
you and Lulua, yeah?
jpnChrName: ちなみに、クレマンってのは ルルアとあんたを繋いだ仲介業者だったな。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに、クレマンってのは
ルルアとあんたを繋いだ仲介業者だったな。

engChrName: That's right. Until today, I wouldn't have pegged him for anything less than a kind and trustworthy man.
engSearchText:
That's right. Until today, I wouldn't have pegged him
for anything less than a kind and trustworthy man.
jpnChrName: はい……今日の今日まで親切で 信頼できる人物だと思っていたのですが……
jpnSearchText:
はい……今日の今日まで親切で
信頼できる人物だと思っていたのですが……

engChrName: I came tonight because he wanted to discuss something with Lulua and me.
engSearchText:
I came tonight because he wanted to discuss
something with Lulua and me.
jpnChrName: ルルアちゃんと３人で話があるというので お会いすることになりまして。
jpnSearchText:
ルルアちゃんと３人で話があるというので
お会いすることになりまして。

engChrName: That's when he started trying to sell me some kind of medical insurance.
engSearchText:
That's when he started trying to sell me some kind of
medical insurance.
jpnChrName: そこで、彼からとある “医療保険”に入るよう勧められたんです。
jpnSearchText:
そこで、彼からとある
“医療保険”に入るよう勧められたんです。

engChrName: It all sounded splendid, but I'm not naïve. I know when something's too good to be true, it probably is.
engSearchText:
It all sounded splendid, but I'm not naïve. I know
when something's too good to be true, it probably is.
jpnChrName: ですがその内容があまりに割がよくて…… 騙されているかもしれない、そう思ったんです。
jpnSearchText:
ですがその内容があまりに割がよくて……
騙されているかもしれない、そう思ったんです。

engChrName: Good on you for not fallin' for that old trick.
engSearchText: Good on you for not fallin' for that old trick.
jpnChrName: ふむ……だがよく疑いを持ったもんだ。
jpnSearchText: ふむ……だがよく疑いを持ったもんだ。

engChrName: I have some experience, since I do have a different insurance already.
engSearchText:
I have some experience, since I do have a
different insurance already.
jpnChrName: ええ、保険は他にも入っていて それなりに相場なども知っていましたから。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、保険は他にも入っていて
それなりに相場なども知っていましたから。

engChrName: When I started asking for details, Clément couldn't answer me.
engSearchText:
When I started asking for details, Clément couldn't
answer me.
jpnChrName: そのことを問い質したら、 クレマンさんが答えに窮し始めたんです。
jpnSearchText:
そのことを問い質したら、
クレマンさんが答えに窮し始めたんです。

engChrName: Lulua must've caught on to my suspicions, because she also started asking him questions.
engSearchText:
Lulua must've caught on to my suspicions, because
she also started asking him questions.
jpnChrName: そしたらルルアちゃんも疑念を持ってくれて 一緒に問い質してくれる形になったのですが。
jpnSearchText:
そしたらルルアちゃんも疑念を持ってくれて
一緒に問い質してくれる形になったのですが。

engChrName: He didn't like that at all, and started yelling at us. And then...
engSearchText:
He didn't like that at all, and started yelling at us.
And then...
jpnChrName: それが彼の癇に障ったのか、 突然大声を上げてルルアちゃんのことを……
jpnSearchText:
それが彼の癇に障ったのか、
突然大声を上げてルルアちゃんのことを……

engChrName: And then he dragged Lulua away.
engSearchText: And then he dragged Lulua away.
jpnChrName: ……連れて行ったわけですね。
jpnSearchText: ……連れて行ったわけですね。

engChrName: Yes... I tried to chase after, but I lost sight of them right around here.
engSearchText:
Yes... I tried to chase after, but I lost sight of them
right around here.
jpnChrName: はい……すぐに後を追ったんですが この近くで見失ってしまって……
jpnSearchText:
はい……すぐに後を追ったんですが
この近くで見失ってしまって……

engChrName: I was afraid that if I contacted the police or the guild, they might suspect Lulua as well.
engSearchText:
I was afraid that if I contacted the police or the guild,
they might suspect Lulua as well.
jpnChrName: ですが警察やギルドに連絡したら ルルアちゃんにも嫌疑が及んでしまう。
jpnSearchText:
ですが警察やギルドに連絡したら
ルルアちゃんにも嫌疑が及んでしまう。

engChrName: I didn't know what to do...
engSearchText: I didn't know what to do...
jpnChrName: そう思うと身動きが取れなくて……
jpnSearchText: そう思うと身動きが取れなくて……

engChrName: Okay. I think I've got the picture.
engSearchText: Okay. I think I've got the picture.
jpnChrName: なるほどな……事情は分かったぜ。
jpnSearchText: なるほどな……事情は分かったぜ。

engChrName: Don't worry. The guild will do the best we can for Lulua's sake.
engSearchText:
Don't worry. The guild will do the best we can for
Lulua's sake.
jpnChrName: ギルドとしても、ルルアさんのことは 最大限配慮します。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドとしても、ルルアさんのことは
最大限配慮します。

engChrName: Rest easy. You can leave the rest to us.
engSearchText: Rest easy. You can leave the rest to us.
jpnChrName: なのでどうか安心してお任せ下さい。
jpnSearchText: なのでどうか安心してお任せ下さい。

engChrName: Oh... Thank you so much.
engSearchText: Oh... Thank you so much.
jpnChrName: ああ……ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText: ああ……ありがとうございます。

engChrName: Do you know where she might've been taken to?
engSearchText: Do you know where she might've been taken to?
jpnChrName: ですが……ルルアちゃんの 連れていかれた場所は分かるのですか？
jpnSearchText:
ですが……ルルアちゃんの
連れていかれた場所は分かるのですか？

engChrName: Ain't hard to take a guess if around here's where you lost sight of 'em.
engSearchText:
Ain't hard to take a guess if around here's where you
lost sight of 'em.
jpnChrName: ああ、この辺りで見失ったってんなら 大体想像はついてる。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、この辺りで見失ったってんなら
大体想像はついてる。

engChrName: (Must've gone into the Blacklight District.)
engSearchText: (Must've gone into the Blacklight District.)
jpnChrName: （ま、黒芒街しかあり得ねえわな。）
jpnSearchText: （ま、黒芒街しかあり得ねえわな。）

engChrName: (Undoubtedly.)
engSearchText: (Undoubtedly.)
jpnChrName: （ええ、間違いないでしょう。）
jpnSearchText: （ええ、間違いないでしょう。）

engChrName: We need to head after her quick, but we shouldn't be too careless either.
engSearchText:
We need to head after her quick, but we shouldn't be
too careless either.
jpnChrName: ──最低限の準備を整えたら、 すぐにでも助けに向かうわよ。
jpnSearchText:
──最低限の準備を整えたら、
すぐにでも助けに向かうわよ。

engChrName: I'll be waiting by the entrance. Just tell me when you're ready.
engSearchText:
I'll be waiting by the entrance. Just tell me when
you're ready.
jpnChrName: 私は“入口”で待ってるから声をかけて頂戴。
jpnSearchText: 私は“入口”で待ってるから声をかけて頂戴。

engChrName: Got it.
engSearchText: Got it.
jpnChrName: ああ、了解だ。
