jpnSearchText: ああ、了解だ。

engChrName: We need to go save Lulua. Are you ready?
engSearchText: We need to go save Lulua. Are you ready?
jpnChrName: ルルアさんの救出作戦……開始する？
jpnSearchText: ルルアさんの救出作戦……開始する？

engChrName: Choosing this will cause the main story to advance. Your free time tonight will end once you begin the rescue mission.
engSearchText:
Choosing this will cause the main story to advance.
Your free time tonight will end once you begin the
rescue mission.
jpnChrName: 救出作戦を開始すると夜行動が終了し、 メインストーリーが進むので注意してください。
jpnSearchText:
救出作戦を開始すると夜行動が終了し、
メインストーリーが進むので注意してください。

engChrName: Yeah. Let's go put Clément in the trash.
engSearchText: Yeah. Let's go put Clément in the trash.
jpnChrName: ああ、クレマンって野郎を とっちめに行くとしようぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、クレマンって野郎を
とっちめに行くとしようぜ。

engChrName: I'll contact Seyla, my client, to make a progress report.
engSearchText:
I'll contact Seyla, my client, to make a
progress report.
jpnChrName: 一応、経過報告を兼ねて 依頼人のセイラにも一声かけておくか。
jpnSearchText:
一応、経過報告を兼ねて
依頼人のセイラにも一声かけておくか。

engChrName: Okay. Let me know when you're ready.
engSearchText: Okay. Let me know when you're ready.
jpnChrName: そう……準備が整ったら声をかけて。
jpnSearchText: そう……準備が整ったら声をかけて。

engChrName: Van contacted Seyla and filled her in on the situation. After she pleaded to come with them, they set off.
engSearchText:
Van contacted Seyla and filled her in on the situation.
After she pleaded to come with them, they set off.
jpnChrName: セイラに連絡すると、ルルアを助けるために 自分も連れて行って欲しいと懇願され──
jpnSearchText:
セイラに連絡すると、ルルアを助けるために
自分も連れて行って欲しいと懇願され──

engChrName: Together the three of them headed into the Blacklight District in pursuit of Lulua's kidnappers.
engSearchText:
Together the three of them headed into the
Blacklight District in pursuit of Lulua's kidnappers.
jpnChrName: ヴァンとエレインはセイラを伴って 黒芒街へと向かい、ルルアの行方を探すのだった。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンとエレインはセイラを伴って
黒芒街へと向かい、ルルアの行方を探すのだった。

engChrName: And so...
engSearchText: And so...
jpnChrName: そして──
jpnSearchText: <C1>そして──

engChrName: 'Go to the stable along the river upon which the injured iron steeds descend.'
engSearchText:
'Go to the stable along the river upon which the
injured iron steeds descend.'
jpnChrName: 『負傷した鉄の馬が行きつく、   川沿いの厩舎』……
jpnSearchText:
『負傷した鉄の馬が行きつく、
川沿いの厩舎』……

engChrName: That's gotta be the body shop, yeah?
engSearchText: That's gotta be the body shop, yeah?
jpnChrName: 中古車整備屋の事で間違いねえと思うんだが……
jpnSearchText: 中古車整備屋の事で間違いねえと思うんだが……

engChrName: Well, I'm here. Now what?
engSearchText: Well, I'm here. Now what?
jpnChrName: 結局、ここに来て何をどうすりゃいいんだ？
jpnSearchText: 結局、ここに来て何をどうすりゃいいんだ？

engChrName: Hey, Junifer. Van's here.
engSearchText: Hey, Junifer. Van's here.
jpnChrName: ……ユニファ、ヴァンのやつが来たぞ。
jpnSearchText: ……ユニファ、ヴァンのやつが来たぞ。

engChrName: There you are!
engSearchText: There you are!
jpnChrName: あっ、来てくれたんだ～！
jpnSearchText: あっ、来てくれたんだ～！

engChrName: Good on ya for solving that riddle!
engSearchText: Good on ya for solving that riddle!
jpnChrName: その様子だと、 ちゃんと暗号を解いてくれたって事だよね！
jpnSearchText:
その様子だと、
ちゃんと暗号を解いてくれたって事だよね！

engChrName: You put up the request, then?
engSearchText: You put up the request, then?
jpnChrName: つうことは、あの依頼を出したのはお前か？
jpnSearchText: つうことは、あの依頼を出したのはお前か？

engChrName: Oh, nope! Not me. Just heard through the grapevine what was goin' on, and offered to lend a hand.
engSearchText:
Oh, nope! Not me. Just heard through the grapevine
what was goin' on, and offered to lend a hand.
jpnChrName: ううん、違うよ～。 話を聞いて手伝わせてもらってるだけ。
jpnSearchText:
ううん、違うよ～。
話を聞いて手伝わせてもらってるだけ。

engChrName: No way I wasn't gonna pitch in!
engSearchText: No way I wasn't gonna pitch in!
jpnChrName: あたしとしても、喜んで協力させて もらいたい話だったからね～！
jpnSearchText:
あたしとしても、喜んで協力させて
もらいたい話だったからね～！

engChrName: Pitch in to what? Be straight with me here.
engSearchText: Pitch in to what? Be straight with me here.
jpnChrName: なんだそりゃ？　話がフワッとしてやがるな。
jpnSearchText: なんだそりゃ？　話がフワッとしてやがるな。

engChrName: Heh, you can leave all the questions for later!
engSearchText: Heh, you can leave all the questions for later!
jpnChrName: まあまあ、難しい話は後にしようよっ。
jpnSearchText: まあまあ、難しい話は後にしようよっ。

engChrName: You took the subway here, yeah?
engSearchText: You took the subway here, yeah?
jpnChrName: ちなみにさ…… ヴァンは今日、地下鉄で来たの？
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにさ……
ヴァンは今日、地下鉄で来たの？

engChrName: I assume your car's gonna be in its usual garage. Mind if I go get it?
engSearchText:
I assume your car's gonna be in its usual garage.
Mind if I go get it?
jpnChrName: 車が車庫にあるなら、 あたしの方で取りに行かせてもらってもいいかな？
jpnSearchText:
車が車庫にあるなら、
あたしの方で取りに行かせてもらってもいいかな？

engChrName: That came outta nowhere. Y'all should have a key already since this is where I bring my car to get serviced.
engSearchText:
That came outta nowhere. Y'all should have a key
already since this is where I bring my car to
get serviced.
jpnChrName: また唐突だな……まあ整備用に、 この店に車の鍵を預けちゃいるが。
jpnSearchText:
また唐突だな……まあ整備用に、
この店に車の鍵を預けちゃいるが。

engChrName: What're you up to, though?
engSearchText: What're you up to, though?
jpnChrName: とはいえ、何が目的なんだ？
jpnSearchText: とはいえ、何が目的なんだ？

engChrName: Nothing bad! Surprise! You're getting a nice, free car wash on your dear truck!
engSearchText:
Nothing bad! Surprise! You're getting a nice, free car
wash on your dear truck!
jpnChrName: ふふん、なんと──ヴァンの愛車を タダで洗車してあげちゃおうと思いますっ！
jpnSearchText:
ふふん、なんと──ヴァンの愛車を
タダで洗車してあげちゃおうと思いますっ！

engChrName: Uncle here's gonna give it his best shot, too, so we'll get 'er nice and shiny!
engSearchText:
Uncle here's gonna give it his best shot, too, so we'll
get 'er nice and shiny!
jpnChrName: 伯父さんも腕によりをかけてくれるから、 ピッカピカになる事間違いなしだよ～！
jpnSearchText:
伯父さんも腕によりをかけてくれるから、
ピッカピカになる事間違いなしだよ～！

engChrName: Oh. Okay? Thanks for the offer. Little outta nowhere, though...
engSearchText:
Oh. Okay? Thanks for the offer. Little outta
nowhere, though...
jpnChrName: お、おお……？ 気持ちはありがてえが、また急な話だな。
jpnSearchText:
お、おお……？
気持ちはありがてえが、また急な話だな。

engChrName: I'd definitely like that, but lemme pay for it. Nothin' scares me more than free stuff.
engSearchText:
I'd definitely like that, but lemme pay for it.
Nothin' scares me more than free stuff.
jpnChrName: それなら普通に料金は支払うぜ。 タダほど怖いモンはねえしよ。
jpnSearchText:
それなら普通に料金は支払うぜ。
タダほど怖いモンはねえしよ。

engChrName: Hey, hey, absolutely not! It's fine. Don't look a gift car wash in the...water. But seriously, we don't need your money!
engSearchText:
Hey, hey, absolutely not! It's fine. Don't look a gift
car wash in the...water. But seriously, we don't need
your money!
jpnChrName: いやいや、タダでいいんだってば～！ むしろミラはいらないっていうか～！
jpnSearchText:
いやいや、タダでいいんだってば～！
むしろミラはいらないっていうか～！

engChrName: Done a splendid job right there of not lookin' suspicious, you know.
engSearchText:
Done a splendid job right there of not lookin'
suspicious, you know.
jpnChrName: やれやれ…… まどろっこしくて見てられねえよ。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……
まどろっこしくて見てられねえよ。

engChrName: Look, Van. Don't play hard to get here. You won't owe us a thing. Client's already paid in full.
engSearchText:
Look, Van. Don't play hard to get here. You won't
owe us a thing. Client's already paid in full.
jpnChrName: いいかヴァン、これは“借り”だと思わなくていい。 代金は依頼主から貰ってるからな。
jpnSearchText:
いいかヴァン、これは“借り”だと思わなくていい。
代金は依頼主から貰ってるからな。

engChrName: So just shut up and get your car washed!
engSearchText: So just shut up and get your car washed!
jpnChrName: だから黙って車を洗われてりゃいいんだよ。
jpnSearchText: だから黙って車を洗われてりゃいいんだよ。

engChrName: Client? Who the hell puts up an order like this?
engSearchText: Client? Who the hell puts up an order like this?
jpnChrName: なんだそりゃ…… どういう趣旨なんだ、この依頼はよ。
jpnSearchText:
なんだそりゃ……
どういう趣旨なんだ、この依頼はよ。

engChrName: But fine. Since you insist, I'll leave you to it.
engSearchText: But fine. Since you insist, I'll leave you to it.
jpnChrName: だがまあ……そういう事なら ありがたく世話になるとするかね。
jpnSearchText:
だがまあ……そういう事なら
ありがたく世話になるとするかね。

engChrName: Great! Lemme go get her!
engSearchText: Great! Lemme go get her!
jpnChrName: うんうん、任せておいて！ それじゃ車を取って来ちゃうね～！
jpnSearchText:
うんうん、任せておいて！
それじゃ車を取って来ちゃうね～！

engChrName: Uncle, better get your butt in gear while I'm away for the best car wash ever!
engSearchText:
Uncle, better get your butt in gear while I'm away for
the best car wash ever!
jpnChrName: 伯父さんはサボってないで、 ちゃんと洗車の準備しといてよ～？
jpnSearchText:
伯父さんはサボってないで、
ちゃんと洗車の準備しといてよ～？

engChrName: *sigh* If I gotta...
engSearchText: *sigh* If I gotta...
jpnChrName: あいよっと……仕方ねえな……
jpnSearchText: あいよっと……仕方ねえな……

engChrName: Junifer immediately left for Old Town.
engSearchText: Junifer immediately left for Old Town.
jpnChrName: さっそくユニファは旧市街の車庫に向かい……
jpnSearchText: <C1>さっそくユニファは旧市街の車庫に向かい……

engChrName: When she returned, she did so with Van's pickup truck, bringing it into the shop.
engSearchText:
When she returned, she did so with Van's pickup
truck, bringing it into the shop.
jpnChrName: ヴァンのＰＵトラックに乗って 中古車整備屋に戻って来たのだった。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンのＰＵトラックに乗って
中古車整備屋に戻って来たのだった。

engChrName: Okie dokie! Your baby's here!
engSearchText: Okie dokie! Your baby's here!
jpnChrName: さてと、車の移動完了っと！
jpnSearchText: さてと、車の移動完了っと！

engChrName: Leave it to us! She'll shine so bright you won't even need to turn on the headlights!
engSearchText:
Leave it to us! She'll shine so bright you won't even
need to turn on the headlights!
jpnChrName: それじゃ後は、あたしと伯父さんで ピッカピカにしておいてあげるね！
jpnSearchText:
それじゃ後は、あたしと伯父さんで
ピッカピカにしておいてあげるね！

engChrName: She'll get a nice new waterproof wax finish on the outside and a nice and thorough vacuuming on the inside!
engSearchText:
She'll get a nice new waterproof wax finish on the
outside and a nice and thorough vacuuming on
the inside!
jpnChrName: 防水と艶出しのワックスをして～…… 後は車内に掃除機もかけてあげちゃうから！
jpnSearchText:
防水と艶出しのワックスをして～……
後は車内に掃除機もかけてあげちゃうから！

engChrName: And don't you worry about all the small details! Uncle's gonna handle the real delicate parts.
engSearchText:
And don't you worry about all the small details!
Uncle's gonna handle the real delicate parts.
jpnChrName: まあ大変な所は伯父さんにやってもらうけど～。
jpnSearchText: まあ大変な所は伯父さんにやってもらうけど～。

engChrName: 'Scuse you.
engSearchText: 'Scuse you.

engChrName: Thanks for giving it the works.
engSearchText: Thanks for giving it the works.
jpnChrName: 悪いな、至れり尽くせりじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: 悪いな、至れり尽くせりじゃねえか。

engChrName: Might not need to polish her myself in a while with all that.
engSearchText:
Might not need to polish her myself in a while with
all that.
jpnChrName: そこまでしてもらえるんなら 暫くの間は自分で磨かなくて済みそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
そこまでしてもらえるんなら
暫くの間は自分で磨かなくて済みそうだ。

engChrName: You won't regret it! Always nice to work on a car as nice as yours.
engSearchText:
You won't regret it! Always nice to work on a car as
nice as yours.
jpnChrName: そうそう、任せといて！　イカした車が 相手だとこっちもやり甲斐があるしね～！
jpnSearchText:
そうそう、任せといて！　イカした車が
相手だとこっちもやり甲斐があるしね～！

engChrName: Well, I suppose I have to give you this, now.
engSearchText: Well, I suppose I have to give you this, now.
jpnChrName: さてと、それじゃ後は これを渡せばいいんだったか？
jpnSearchText:
さてと、それじゃ後は
これを渡せばいいんだったか？

engChrName: Here. Get goin' to the next place while we clean your car.
engSearchText:
Here. Get goin' to the next place while we clean
your car.
jpnChrName: ……ほらよ、洗車してやってる間 次はこの場所に行ってきやがれ。
jpnSearchText:
……ほらよ、洗車してやってる間
次はこの場所に行ってきやがれ。

engChrName: Next? Wait, there's more?
engSearchText: Next? Wait, there's more?
jpnChrName: 次っつうと、まさか……
jpnSearchText: 次っつうと、まさか……

engChrName: 'Second task: On the gateway to our fair capital lies a merchant whose store carries varieties for every man.'
engSearchText:
'Second task: On the gateway to our fair capital lies a
merchant whose store carries varieties for every man.'
jpnChrName: 『二問目　首都の玄関口に拠点を構え、   百の交易品を抱える商人。』
jpnSearchText:
『二問目　首都の玄関口に拠点を構え、
百の交易品を抱える商人。』

engChrName: 'Reach him to accomplish this task.'
engSearchText: 'Reach him to accomplish this task.'
jpnChrName: 『次は彼の元へ行ってみて下さい──』
jpnSearchText: <C1>『次は彼の元へ行ってみて下さい──』

engChrName: Another riddle? And this one ain't any easier than the last one.
engSearchText:
Another riddle? And this one ain't any easier than the
last one.
jpnChrName: また暗号か。 つうか、簡単なナゾナゾって感じだが……
jpnSearchText:
また暗号か。
つうか、簡単なナゾナゾって感じだが……

engChrName: I'm sure you have questions, and I can't answer any of them.
engSearchText:
I'm sure you have questions, and I can't answer any
of them.
jpnChrName: まあ色々聞きたい事があるだろうが 俺達は答えられねえ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ色々聞きたい事があるだろうが
俺達は答えられねえ。

engChrName: So don't bother asking and go solve the riddle instead.
engSearchText:
So don't bother asking and go solve the
riddle instead.
jpnChrName: せいぜい、謎を解いて進んでみる事だな。
jpnSearchText: せいぜい、謎を解いて進んでみる事だな。

engChrName: *sigh*... Fine. Guess I'll head to the next spot, then.
engSearchText: *sigh*... Fine. Guess I'll head to the next spot, then.
jpnChrName: はぁ……仕方ねえな。 それじゃ次に行かせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
はぁ……仕方ねえな。
それじゃ次に行かせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Thanks a bunch, you two.
engSearchText: Thanks a bunch, you two.
jpnChrName: ２人とも世話になったな。
jpnSearchText: ２人とも世話になったな。

engChrName: Have a good one!
engSearchText: Have a good one!
jpnChrName: うんっ、いってらっしゃ～い！
jpnSearchText: うんっ、いってらっしゃ～い！

engChrName: (I don't get it. What's the point in gettin' my car washed? What's this client of theirs up to?)
engSearchText:
(I don't get it. What's the point in gettin' my
car washed? What's this client of theirs up to?)
jpnChrName: （俺の車を洗車させる意図は何なんだ？   依頼者の意図が全く読めねえ。）
jpnSearchText:
（俺の車を洗車させる意図は何なんだ？
依頼者の意図が全く読めねえ。）

engChrName: (But with Junifer and Bradley in on this, it can't be that bad, right?)
engSearchText:
(But with Junifer and Bradley in on this, it can't be
that bad, right?)
jpnChrName: （だがまあ、ユニファ達が協力をしてる所を見ると   “裏”が絡んだ案件じゃねえ事は確かだが……）
jpnSearchText:
（だがまあ、ユニファ達が協力をしてる所を見ると
“裏”が絡んだ案件じゃねえ事は確かだが……）

engChrName: (Eh. No point in worryin' now. If I want an answer, I'm probably gonna have to find one myself.)
engSearchText:
(Eh. No point in worryin' now. If I want an answer,
I'm probably gonna have to find one myself.)
jpnChrName: （悩んでも仕方ねえ、スッキリさせる為にも   次のナゾナゾを解いてみるか。）
jpnSearchText:
（悩んでも仕方ねえ、スッキリさせる為にも
次のナゾナゾを解いてみるか。）

engChrName: (I should ask the two idols about Jess.)
engSearchText: (I should ask the two idols about Jess.)
jpnChrName: （アイドルの二人にジェスのことを 　聞きたいんだが……）
jpnSearchText:
（アイドルの二人にジェスのことを
　聞きたいんだが……）

engChrName: (Should I wait till their break time?)
engSearchText: (Should I wait till their break time?)
jpnChrName: （休憩時間まで待つとするか？）
jpnSearchText: （休憩時間まで待つとするか？）

engChrName: Hi there!
engSearchText: Hi there!
jpnChrName: あ、裏解決屋さんじゃないですか！
jpnSearchText: あ、裏解決屋さんじゃないですか！

engChrName: Thanks for coming to see us.
engSearchText: Thanks for coming to see us.
jpnChrName: ふふ、見に来てくれていたんですね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、見に来てくれていたんですね。

engChrName: You two did great up there.
engSearchText: You two did great up there.
jpnChrName: ああ、なかなかいいステージだったぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、なかなかいいステージだったぜ。

engChrName: Sorry to bother while you're on your break, but I got a few questions for you.
engSearchText:
Sorry to bother while you're on your break, but I got a
few questions for you.
jpnChrName: 休憩中に悪いな。 少し聞きたいことがあるんだが……
jpnSearchText:
休憩中に悪いな。
少し聞きたいことがあるんだが……

engChrName: Van explained the situation to the two idols and inquired about Jess.
engSearchText:
Van explained the situation to the two idols and
inquired about Jess.
jpnChrName: ２人に事情を説明し、ジェスのことを聞いた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>２人に事情を説明し、ジェスのことを聞いた。

engChrName: Oh, no! Jess, of all people...
engSearchText: Oh, no! Jess, of all people...
jpnChrName: ジェスさんが……そんな……
jpnSearchText: ジェスさんが……そんな……

engChrName: Now that you mention it, I did think he was acting strange this morning.
engSearchText:
Now that you mention it, I did think he was acting
strange this morning.
jpnChrName: でも……言われてみれば、 今朝も元気がなかったような……
jpnSearchText:
でも……言われてみれば、
今朝も元気がなかったような……

engChrName: This morning?
engSearchText: This morning?
jpnChrName: 今朝？
jpnSearchText: 今朝？

engChrName: Did you see Jess somewhere?
engSearchText: Did you see Jess somewhere?
jpnChrName: どこかでジェスさんを お見かけしたんですか？
jpnSearchText:
どこかでジェスさんを
お見かけしたんですか？

engChrName: Did you see Jess?
engSearchText: Did you see Jess?
jpnChrName: ジェスさんを見かけたんですか？
jpnSearchText: ジェスさんを見かけたんですか？

engChrName: You saw him this morning?
engSearchText: You saw him this morning?
jpnChrName: ジェスを見かけたのかよ？
jpnSearchText: ジェスを見かけたのかよ？

engChrName: Did either of you see Jess today?
engSearchText: Did either of you see Jess today?
jpnChrName: お二人は、ジェス様を 見かけられたのですか？
jpnSearchText:
お二人は、ジェス様を
見かけられたのですか？

engChrName: So you saw Jess somewhere?
engSearchText: So you saw Jess somewhere?
jpnChrName: ジェスさんを どこかで見かけたんですか？
jpnSearchText:
ジェスさんを
どこかで見かけたんですか？

engChrName: Where'd you see him?
engSearchText: Where'd you see him?
jpnChrName: どこかで彼を見かけたの？
jpnSearchText: どこかで彼を見かけたの？

engChrName: Huh, you saw Jess?
engSearchText: Huh, you saw Jess?
jpnChrName: ジェスを見かけたのか？
jpnSearchText: ジェスを見かけたのか？

engChrName: We bumped into each other at Brothers Music Shop, over in Tyrell.
engSearchText:
We bumped into each other at Brothers Music
Shop, over in Tyrell.
jpnChrName: はい、実はタイレル地区の ブラザーズ楽器店でお会いしたんです。
jpnSearchText:
はい、実はタイレル地区の
ブラザーズ楽器店でお会いしたんです。

engChrName: We stopped by the store to borrow some musical equipment for our performance today.
engSearchText:
We stopped by the store to borrow some musical
equipment for our performance today.
jpnChrName: あたしたち、今日のライブで使う 機材を借りにお店を訪ねたんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
あたしたち、今日のライブで使う
機材を借りにお店を訪ねたんですよ。

engChrName: Jess was talking to the manager when we got there.
engSearchText: Jess was talking to the manager when we got there.
jpnChrName: そしたら、ジェスさんが 店主さんに挨拶している所でした。
jpnSearchText:
そしたら、ジェスさんが
店主さんに挨拶している所でした。

engChrName: He's a regular there.
engSearchText: He's a regular there.
jpnChrName: ジェスさんは、 楽器店の常連さんだったみたいで。
jpnSearchText:
ジェスさんは、
楽器店の常連さんだったみたいで。

engChrName: He was probably saying goodbye to the manager since Jess was on his way out of the capital.
engSearchText:
He was probably saying goodbye to the manager since
Jess was on his way out of the capital.
jpnChrName: 今思うと……首都を離れるから、 その挨拶だったのかもしれないですね。
jpnSearchText:
今思うと……首都を離れるから、
その挨拶だったのかもしれないですね。

engChrName: Did you and Jess talk about anything?
engSearchText: Did you and Jess talk about anything?
jpnChrName: ジェスとは何か話したのか？
jpnSearchText: ジェスとは何か話したのか？

engChrName: I told him we were gonna have a performance and he wished me the best.
engSearchText:
I told him we were gonna have a performance and he
wished me the best.
jpnChrName: あたしたちはこれからライブですって 伝えたら応援してくれて。
jpnSearchText:
あたしたちはこれからライブですって
伝えたら応援してくれて。

engChrName: I was hoping he'd be there, so I made a point of inviting him.
engSearchText:
I was hoping he'd be there, so I made a point of
inviting him.
jpnChrName: ジェスさんにも観に来てほしかったので 思い切って誘ってみたんですけど……
jpnSearchText:
ジェスさんにも観に来てほしかったので
思い切って誘ってみたんですけど……

engChrName: He said he appreciated the invite, but was busy.
engSearchText: He said he appreciated the invite, but was busy.
jpnChrName: 折角だけど用事があるということで 断られてしまいました。
jpnSearchText:
折角だけど用事があるということで
断られてしまいました。

engChrName: Mentioned leaving the capital to see his favorite flower.
engSearchText:
Mentioned leaving the capital to see his
favorite flower.
jpnChrName: これから郊外に出て、大好きな花を 見に行く所だって仰ってましたね。
jpnSearchText:
これから郊外に出て、大好きな花を
見に行く所だって仰ってましたね。

engChrName: Favorite flower? Wonder what that could be.
engSearchText: Favorite flower? Wonder what that could be.
jpnChrName: 大好きな花、か。
jpnSearchText: 大好きな花、か。

engChrName: Maybe Raymond knows.
engSearchText: Maybe Raymond knows.
jpnChrName: レイモンドに聞けば何か分かるかもな。
jpnSearchText: レイモンドに聞けば何か分かるかもな。

engChrName: He does work as a florist.
engSearchText: He does work as a florist.
jpnChrName: 確かに、花屋さんで 働かれていますしね。
jpnSearchText:
確かに、花屋さんで
働かれていますしね。

engChrName: Oh, yeah! Since he sells flowers and everything.
engSearchText: Oh, yeah! Since he sells flowers and everything.
jpnChrName: はい、何といっても 花屋さんですし。
jpnSearchText:
はい、何といっても
花屋さんですし。

engChrName: If you wanna learn about flowers, might as well ask a florist.
engSearchText:
If you wanna learn about flowers, might as well ask
a florist.
jpnChrName: ま、花屋のバイトだしな。
jpnSearchText: ま、花屋のバイトだしな。

engChrName: A reasonable assumption. Raymond does work as a florist.
engSearchText:
A reasonable assumption. Raymond does work as
a florist.
jpnChrName: そうですね、花屋で 働いておられるわけですし。
jpnSearchText:
そうですね、花屋で
働いておられるわけですし。

engChrName: Certainly. He's got that job with the flower seller.
engSearchText: Certainly. He's got that job with the flower seller.
jpnChrName: 確かに、花屋で バイトしてるわけだしね。
jpnSearchText:
確かに、花屋で
バイトしてるわけだしね。

engChrName: Well, he does work selling flowers, right?
engSearchText: Well, he does work selling flowers, right?
jpnChrName: そうね、花屋で 働いているんだもの。
jpnSearchText:
そうね、花屋で
働いているんだもの。

engChrName: Consult the experts, right? Flowers for a flower seller, and all.
engSearchText:
Consult the experts, right? Flowers for a flower seller,
and all.
jpnChrName: 餅は餅屋、花は花屋か。
jpnSearchText: 餅は餅屋、花は花屋か。

engChrName: Thanks for the help. Much appreciated, you two.
engSearchText: Thanks for the help. Much appreciated, you two.
jpnChrName: 協力してくれてあんがとな。 助かったぜ、二人とも。
jpnSearchText:
協力してくれてあんがとな。
助かったぜ、二人とも。

engChrName: It was nothing.
engSearchText: It was nothing.
jpnChrName: いえ、とんでもないです。
jpnSearchText: いえ、とんでもないです。

engChrName: Hope you can help Jess out!
engSearchText: Hope you can help Jess out!
jpnChrName: ジェスさんのこと、どうか フォローしてあげてください！
jpnSearchText:
ジェスさんのこと、どうか
フォローしてあげてください！

engChrName: Okay, then. Back to Raymond we go.
engSearchText: Okay, then. Back to Raymond we go.
jpnChrName: さて、そんじゃあいったん レイモンドの所に戻るとしますかね。
jpnSearchText:
さて、そんじゃあいったん
レイモンドの所に戻るとしますかね。

engChrName: Okay, back to Raymond for now.
engSearchText: Okay, back to Raymond for now.
jpnChrName: さて、そんじゃあいったん レイモンドの所に戻るとするか。
jpnSearchText:
さて、そんじゃあいったん
レイモンドの所に戻るとするか。

engChrName: Yes, let's. We'll need to give a progress report on our investigation.
engSearchText:
Yes, let's. We'll need to give a progress report on
our investigation.
jpnChrName: はい、ここまでの 調査結果を報告しましょう。
jpnSearchText:
はい、ここまでの
調査結果を報告しましょう。

engChrName: Of course! We should report to him on our progress.
engSearchText: Of course! We should report to him on our progress.
jpnChrName: ですね、ここまでの 調査結果を伝えましょう。
jpnSearchText:
ですね、ここまでの
調査結果を伝えましょう。

engChrName: Yup. Have to fill him in.
engSearchText: Yup. Have to fill him in.
jpnChrName: だな、ここまでの経過を伝えんぞ。
jpnSearchText: だな、ここまでの経過を伝えんぞ。

engChrName: Of course. We ought to report on our progress.
engSearchText: Of course. We ought to report on our progress.
jpnChrName: はい、調査の経過を報告致しましょう。
jpnSearchText: はい、調査の経過を報告致しましょう。

engChrName: Yeah, we should give him a progress report.
engSearchText: Yeah, we should give him a progress report.
jpnChrName: うん、ここまでの 調査結果を報告しよう。
jpnSearchText:
うん、ここまでの
調査結果を報告しよう。

engChrName: Yes, let's fill him in on how things are going.
engSearchText: Yes, let's fill him in on how things are going.
jpnChrName: ええ、ここまでの経過を伝えるわよ。
jpnSearchText: ええ、ここまでの経過を伝えるわよ。

engChrName: Right. Let's get him up to date on everything.
engSearchText: Right. Let's get him up to date on everything.
jpnChrName: ああ、ここまでの経過を伝えるとしよう。
jpnSearchText: ああ、ここまでの経過を伝えるとしよう。

engChrName: Hey there. Heard there was some sort of race thing goin' on?
engSearchText:
Hey there. Heard there was some sort of race thing
goin' on?
jpnChrName: よう、走り屋同士で やってみたい事があるんだってな？
jpnSearchText:
よう、走り屋同士で
やってみたい事があるんだってな？

engChrName: Let's hear it. Might be able to join, depending on the details.
engSearchText:
Let's hear it. Might be able to join, depending on
the details.
jpnChrName: 詳しい話を聞かせてみろよ。 内容次第じゃ俺も協力するぜ。
jpnSearchText:
詳しい話を聞かせてみろよ。
内容次第じゃ俺も協力するぜ。

engChrName: Thanks, Van! Okay, let's get everyone here so I can explain.
engSearchText:
Thanks, Van! Okay, let's get everyone here so I
can explain.
jpnChrName: ありがとうヴァンさん！ それじゃ他の皆も交えて説明するか。
jpnSearchText:
ありがとうヴァンさん！
それじゃ他の皆も交えて説明するか。

engChrName: All right. Looks like everyone's here.
engSearchText: All right. Looks like everyone's here.
jpnChrName: さてと…… これでとりあえず面子は揃ったかな。
jpnSearchText:
さてと……
これでとりあえず面子は揃ったかな。

engChrName: I know everyone's busy, but thanks. You in particular, Van. It's reassurin' having you here.
engSearchText:
I know everyone's busy, but thanks. You in
particular, Van. It's reassurin' having you here.
jpnChrName: 今日は忙しい中ありがとう！ ヴァンに協力してもらえると心強いよ～。
jpnSearchText:
今日は忙しい中ありがとう！
ヴァンに協力してもらえると心強いよ～。

engChrName: No prob. Where's the rest of the crew, though?
engSearchText: No prob. Where's the rest of the crew, though?
jpnChrName: そいつは構わねえが……しかし いつもの走り屋の仲間はどうした？
jpnSearchText:
そいつは構わねえが……しかし
いつもの走り屋の仲間はどうした？

engChrName: Bit of a shock to see you here, kid.
engSearchText: Bit of a shock to see you here, kid.
jpnChrName: それにアンタも一緒とは意外だな、お坊ちゃん。
jpnSearchText: それにアンタも一緒とは意外だな、お坊ちゃん。

engChrName: Lotta shit goin' on with your family lately. You okay?
engSearchText: Lotta shit goin' on with your family lately. You okay?
jpnChrName: 家のことでも色々あったみたいだが…… 大丈夫なのか？
jpnSearchText:
家のことでも色々あったみたいだが……
大丈夫なのか？

engChrName: Hmph. Don't pry.
engSearchText: Hmph. Don't pry.
jpnChrName: フン……詮索はよせ。
jpnSearchText: フン……詮索はよせ。

engChrName: But regardless of that, I appreciate what you did the other day.
engSearchText:
But regardless of that, I appreciate what you did the
other day.
jpnChrName: ……ともあれ、先日は世話になったな。
jpnSearchText: ……ともあれ、先日は世話になったな。

engChrName: Today's the day we come back for the promised rematch with Edith's racers.
engSearchText:
Today's the day we come back for the promised
rematch with Edith's racers.
jpnChrName: 今日は、以前話した通り 首都の走り屋に再戦を申し込みに来た次第だ。
jpnSearchText:
今日は、以前話した通り
首都の走り屋に再戦を申し込みに来た次第だ。

engChrName: Hot damn, is it gonna rain today or somethin'? Can't believe it! Lucio just said thanks! Or...somethin' like that.
engSearchText:
Hot damn, is it gonna rain today or somethin'?
Can't believe it! Lucio just said thanks! Or...somethin'
like that.
jpnChrName: ええっ！　あのルシオがお礼を言うなんて！
jpnSearchText: ええっ！　あのルシオがお礼を言うなんて！

engChrName: You were being way nicer than usual, so I was wonderin' what the heck happened there.
engSearchText:
You were being way nicer than usual, so I was
wonderin' what the heck happened there.
jpnChrName: 妙に殊勝になってるから、 何かあったんだろうとは思ってたけど……
jpnSearchText:
妙に殊勝になってるから、
何かあったんだろうとは思ってたけど……

engChrName: My guess is Van gave you a hand and we weren't aware of it?
engSearchText:
My guess is Van gave you a hand and we weren't
aware of it?
jpnChrName: 俺達の知らない所で ヴァンさん達に何か助けてもらったりしたのか？
jpnSearchText:
俺達の知らない所で
ヴァンさん達に何か助けてもらったりしたのか？

engChrName: And why should that matter to you? Keep your nose out of business that's not yours.
engSearchText:
And why should that matter to you? Keep your nose
out of business that's not yours.
jpnChrName: ハッ、どうしてお前達に教えてやる必要がある？ 身の程を弁えるがいい。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、どうしてお前達に教えてやる必要がある？
身の程を弁えるがいい。

engChrName: Okay? Sure, whatever. Rude as always.
engSearchText: Okay? Sure, whatever. Rude as always.
jpnChrName: それはそうなんだけど～…… こういう所は相変わらずだよね～。
jpnSearchText:
それはそうなんだけど～……
こういう所は相変わらずだよね～。

engChrName: Wasn't expectin' the High Bloods of all people to join in on this.
engSearchText:
Wasn't expectin' the High Bloods of all people to join
in on this.
jpnChrName: それにあの《ハイブラッズ》も一緒とは…… 珍しい事もあるもんだな。
jpnSearchText:
それにあの《ハイブラッズ》も一緒とは……
珍しい事もあるもんだな。

engChrName: Well, as I said already, we're here for our promised rematch.
engSearchText:
Well, as I said already, we're here for our
promised rematch.
jpnChrName: フン、以前話した通り、 今日は再戦を申し込みに来たのだ。
jpnSearchText:
フン、以前話した通り、
今日は再戦を申し込みに来たのだ。

engChrName: Gotta say, we haven't seen you 'round these parts for a while, but you've definitely changed.
engSearchText:
Gotta say, we haven't seen you 'round these parts for
a while, but you've definitely changed.
jpnChrName: それがさ、久しぶりに会ったら 雰囲気が変わってて驚いたんだよね～。
jpnSearchText:
それがさ、久しぶりに会ったら
雰囲気が変わってて驚いたんだよね～。

engChrName: More honest, I guess? Like you had a big helpin' of humbling pie.
engSearchText:
More honest, I guess? Like you had a big helpin' of
humbling pie.
jpnChrName: 前と比べて殊勝になったっていうか、 少し角が取れたっていうか……？
jpnSearchText:
前と比べて殊勝になったっていうか、
少し角が取れたっていうか……？

engChrName: Right. I heard your family's been having a rough go of it.
engSearchText:
Right. I heard your family's been having a rough go
of it.
jpnChrName: そういえば…… 家のことでも色々あったみたいだが……
jpnSearchText:
そういえば……
家のことでも色々あったみたいだが……

engChrName: A commoner like you has no place prying into my life. Know your place.
engSearchText:
A commoner like you has no place prying into
my life. Know your place.
jpnChrName: ……庶民の分際で俺を詮索する気か？ 身の程を弁えるがいい。
jpnSearchText:
……庶民の分際で俺を詮索する気か？
身の程を弁えるがいい。

engChrName: Ahaha. More things change, more they stay the same.
engSearchText: Ahaha. More things change, more they stay the same.
jpnChrName: あはは～…… こういう所は相変わらずだよね～。
jpnSearchText:
あはは～……
こういう所は相変わらずだよね～。

engChrName: I don't think I know everyone here.
engSearchText: I don't think I know everyone here.
jpnChrName: それに、見慣れねえツラも一緒みてえだしよ。
jpnSearchText: それに、見慣れねえツラも一緒みてえだしよ。

engChrName: I suppose I'm yet to introduce myself. I'm Lucio, of the High Bloods.
engSearchText:
I suppose I'm yet to introduce myself. I'm Lucio, of
the High Bloods.
jpnChrName: フン……挨拶が遅れたな。 俺は《ハイブラッズ》のルシオだ。
jpnSearchText:
フン……挨拶が遅れたな。
俺は《ハイブラッズ》のルシオだ。

engChrName: We normally race around Oración, but we've expanded our reach to Edith as of late.
engSearchText:
We normally race around Oración, but we've
expanded our reach to Edith as of late.
jpnChrName: 普段はオラシオンで車を走らせているんだが、 最近首都へと足を伸ばすようになってな。
jpnSearchText:
普段はオラシオンで車を走らせているんだが、
最近首都へと足を伸ばすようになってな。

engChrName: We got into a bit of a conflict at the time, true.
engSearchText: We got into a bit of a conflict at the time, true.
jpnChrName: そこでこの者達と小競り合いになったのだが……
jpnSearchText: そこでこの者達と小競り合いになったのだが……

engChrName: Some biker lady got involved and served us a harsh loss.
engSearchText:
Some biker lady got involved and served us a
harsh loss.
jpnChrName: ある女ライダーが乱入して来た事で 辛酸を舐めさせられてしまってな。
jpnSearchText:
ある女ライダーが乱入して来た事で
辛酸を舐めさせられてしまってな。

engChrName: We're here now because the time's right for a rematch.
engSearchText:
We're here now because the time's right for
a rematch.
jpnChrName: 今日は満を持して再戦を申し込みに来た訳だ。
jpnSearchText: 今日は満を持して再戦を申し込みに来た訳だ。

engChrName: (He talkin' about Hermès?)
engSearchText: (He talkin' about Hermès?)
jpnChrName: （女ライダーっつうと……   もしかしてエルメスのやつか？）
jpnSearchText:
（女ライダーっつうと……
もしかしてエルメスのやつか？）

engChrName: Got'cha. That's why you made the request for us?
engSearchText: Got'cha. That's why you made the request for us?
jpnChrName: 成程な……それじゃ俺達への依頼ってのは その勝負に関係する事か。
jpnSearchText:
成程な……それじゃ俺達への依頼ってのは
その勝負に関係する事か。

engChrName: Yeah. We were gonna head out on the highway for some high-speed unrestricted races.
engSearchText:
Yeah. We were gonna head out on the highway for
some high-speed unrestricted races.
jpnChrName: ああ、今回はアウトバーンでの 速度無制限のレースを行おうと思ってる。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、今回はアウトバーンでの
速度無制限のレースを行おうと思ってる。

engChrName: But it looks like our friends the High Bloods here learned a good lesson about reckless driving.
engSearchText:
But it looks like our friends the High Bloods here
learned a good lesson about reckless driving.
jpnChrName: そこで、《ハイブラッズ》のやつも もう危険走行の件は反省したみたいだし……
jpnSearchText:
そこで、《ハイブラッズ》のやつも
もう危険走行の件は反省したみたいだし……

engChrName: They were hoping for a more...fun kind of race. Something everyone can join in on.
engSearchText:
They were hoping for a more...fun kind of race.
Something everyone can join in on.
jpnChrName: 記念祭だけに、大人数で楽しく 盛り上がれるような勝負にしたくてさ。
jpnSearchText:
記念祭だけに、大人数で楽しく
盛り上がれるような勝負にしたくてさ。

engChrName: But Downey and Hyades wanted to spend the day enjoying the festivities.
engSearchText:
But Downey and Hyades wanted to spend the day
enjoying the festivities.
jpnChrName: でも、ダウニーとヒアデスは 今日は記念祭を楽しみたいみたいでさ。
jpnSearchText:
でも、ダウニーとヒアデスは
今日は記念祭を楽しみたいみたいでさ。

engChrName: Won't be joinin' us today.
engSearchText: Won't be joinin' us today.
jpnChrName: 今回は参加しないつもりみたいなんだよね～。
jpnSearchText: 今回は参加しないつもりみたいなんだよね～。

engChrName: My group consists of two people. Myself, and Damian. A bike rider.
engSearchText:
My group consists of two people. Myself,
and Damian. A bike rider.
jpnChrName: こちらからは、俺ともう一人── バイク乗りのダミアンが参加させてもらう。
jpnSearchText:
こちらからは、俺ともう一人──
バイク乗りのダミアンが参加させてもらう。

engChrName: We're not the only ones that came, of course, but the other two couldn't be bothered to be here, on account of the festivities.
engSearchText:
We're not the only ones that came, of course, but the
other two couldn't be bothered to be here, on account
of the festivities.
jpnChrName: 残りの２人も首都へは来ているが 今は屋台巡りに夢中のようだからな。
jpnSearchText:
残りの２人も首都へは来ているが
今は屋台巡りに夢中のようだからな。

engChrName: You probably figured it out already, but we're a little short on people.
engSearchText:
You probably figured it out already, but we're a little
short on people.
jpnChrName: こんな感じで、現状参加者が 思ってたよりも少ない状況なんだ。
jpnSearchText:
こんな感じで、現状参加者が
思ってたよりも少ない状況なんだ。

engChrName: So, hey. Figured we might as well try to get you to join, Van.
engSearchText:
So, hey. Figured we might as well try to get you to
join, Van.
jpnChrName: だから、まずはヴァンさんにも レースに参加してもらいたいと思ってる。
jpnSearchText:
だから、まずはヴァンさんにも
レースに参加してもらいたいと思ってる。

engChrName: You and...maybe some other people? How about it? Wanna help us track down some more racers?
engSearchText:
You and...maybe some other people? How about it?
Wanna help us track down some more racers?
jpnChrName: その上で、もう少し参加者を 少し集めて来てほしいんだが……どうだ？
jpnSearchText:
その上で、もう少し参加者を
少し集めて来てほしいんだが……どうだ？

engChrName: Well...
engSearchText: Well...
jpnChrName: そうだな……
jpnSearchText: そうだな……

engChrName: We were gonna have a big, fun race with a bunch of people.
engSearchText:
We were gonna have a big, fun race with a bunch
of people.
jpnChrName: 大人数で楽しく盛り上がれるような レースにしたいと思うんだが……
jpnSearchText:
大人数で楽しく盛り上がれるような
レースにしたいと思うんだが……

engChrName: But we, uh, kinda don't have a bunch of people.
engSearchText: But we, uh, kinda don't have a bunch of people.
jpnChrName: 現状は参加者が 思ってたよりも少ない状況でさ。
jpnSearchText:
現状は参加者が
思ってたよりも少ない状況でさ。

engChrName: So, hey. Figured we might as well try to get you to join, Van.
engSearchText:
So, hey. Figured we might as well try to get you to
join, Van.
jpnChrName: だから、まずはヴァンさんにも レースに参加してもらいたいと思ってる。
jpnSearchText:
だから、まずはヴァンさんにも
レースに参加してもらいたいと思ってる。

engChrName: You and...maybe some other people? How about it? Wanna help us track down some more racers?
engSearchText:
You and...maybe some other people? How about it?
Wanna help us track down some more racers?
jpnChrName: その上で、もう少し参加者を 少し集めて来てほしいんだが……どうだ？
jpnSearchText:
その上で、もう少し参加者を
少し集めて来てほしいんだが……どうだ？

engChrName: Sure, I could join, but I was hopin' to hit up a few places first.
engSearchText:
Sure, I could join, but I was hopin' to hit up a few
places first.
jpnChrName: 引き受けてやってもいいんだが、 まだ見回りてえ所が残っててな。
jpnSearchText:
引き受けてやってもいいんだが、
まだ見回りてえ所が残っててな。

engChrName: You guys okay with me comin' back later?
engSearchText: You guys okay with me comin' back later?
jpnChrName: また後で顔を出させてもらってもいいか？
jpnSearchText: また後で顔を出させてもらってもいいか？

engChrName: Of course! We know you're busy.
engSearchText: Of course! We know you're busy.
jpnChrName: ああ、勿論だ。 ヴァンさん達が忙しいってのは承知の上だしな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、勿論だ。
ヴァンさん達が忙しいってのは承知の上だしな。

engChrName: But don't flake on us! Come back when you've got the time!
engSearchText:
But don't flake on us! Come back when you've got
the time!
jpnChrName: 時間に余裕が出来たらゼッタイに来てね！
jpnSearchText: 時間に余裕が出来たらゼッタイに来てね！

engChrName: Hmph...
engSearchText: Hmph...

engChrName: All right. Don't mind joinin'. I'll even ask some other people to join, too.
engSearchText:
All right. Don't mind joinin'. I'll even ask some other
people to join, too.
jpnChrName: ま、俺が参加すんのもやぶさかじゃねえしな。 人数集めも手伝ってやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、俺が参加すんのもやぶさかじゃねえしな。
人数集めも手伝ってやるよ。

engChrName: A lot of people came by today to enjoy the festivities.
engSearchText: A lot of people came by today to enjoy the festivities.
jpnChrName: 今日は各地から人が 集まっているでしょうし……
jpnSearchText:
今日は各地から人が
集まっているでしょうし……

engChrName: I don't imagine it'll be too hard to find people to participate. We just have to look.
engSearchText:
I don't imagine it'll be too hard to find people
to participate. We just have to look.
jpnChrName: 参加者を集めようと思えば すんなり集まるかもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
参加者を集めようと思えば
すんなり集まるかもしれませんね。

engChrName: A lot of people came by for the festival today!
engSearchText: A lot of people came by for the festival today!
jpnChrName: 今日は色々な所から 人が集まってるはずですし……
jpnSearchText:
今日は色々な所から
人が集まってるはずですし……

engChrName: I bet we can get a bunch of people to join if we ask around!
engSearchText:
I bet we can get a bunch of people to join if we
ask around!
jpnChrName: 声をかけて回れば それなりの人数を集められそうですね！
jpnSearchText:
声をかけて回れば
それなりの人数を集められそうですね！

engChrName: You mind if I join in?
engSearchText: You mind if I join in?
jpnChrName: へぇ、それじゃオレも参加してもいいのかよ？
jpnSearchText: へぇ、それじゃオレも参加してもいいのかよ？

engChrName: You got something to drive with?
engSearchText: You got something to drive with?
jpnChrName: お、だが何に乗るつもりなんだ？
jpnSearchText: お、だが何に乗るつもりなんだ？

engChrName: I'm borrowing your old master's motorbike till the end of the festival, so I could use that.
engSearchText:
I'm borrowing your old master's motorbike till the
end of the festival, so I could use that.
jpnChrName: 実は記念祭の間はジジイから バイクを借りるっつう話になっててな。
jpnSearchText:
実は記念祭の間はジジイから
バイクを借りるっつう話になっててな。

engChrName: Though it could get damaged in the race. Maybe I should run this past him first...
engSearchText:
Though it could get damaged in the race. Maybe I
should run this past him first...
jpnChrName: ……だがまあ、レースとなると 傷を付けちまう可能性もある訳か。
jpnSearchText:
……だがまあ、レースとなると
傷を付けちまう可能性もある訳か。

engChrName: Eh, I'm lazy. It should be fine.
engSearchText: Eh, I'm lazy. It should be fine.
jpnChrName: レースに参加してもいいか 一応聞いとくとくべきかもな。
jpnSearchText:
レースに参加してもいいか
一応聞いとくとくべきかもな。

engChrName: Get your ass on the phone, my dude.
engSearchText: Get your ass on the phone, my dude.
jpnChrName: ああ、どうせなら今連絡しちまえ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、どうせなら今連絡しちまえ。

engChrName: Fiiiiiine.
engSearchText: Fiiiiiine.
jpnChrName: へいへいっと……
jpnSearchText: へいへいっと……

engChrName: Done. He said, 'Go wild.'
engSearchText: Done. He said, 'Go wild.'
jpnChrName: 許可が取れたぜ。 若人たちで楽しんでこいだとよ。
jpnSearchText:
許可が取れたぜ。
若人たちで楽しんでこいだとよ。

engChrName: As wild as I can go with you nannying me around, anyway.
engSearchText:
As wild as I can go with you nannying me
around, anyway.
jpnChrName: 既に一人オッサンが紛れ込んでる訳だが。
jpnSearchText: 既に一人オッサンが紛れ込んでる訳だが。

engChrName: Keep runnin' that mouth and I'm gonna have you runnin' soon.
engSearchText:
Keep runnin' that mouth and I'm gonna have you
runnin' soon.
jpnChrName: お前な…… なんべん言わせりゃ気が済むんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
お前な……
なんべん言わせりゃ気が済むんだよ。

engChrName: Haha. Glad to have you join us.
engSearchText: Haha. Glad to have you join us.
jpnChrName: はは、とにかく君も参加してくれるなら嬉しいよ。
jpnSearchText: はは、とにかく君も参加してくれるなら嬉しいよ。

engChrName: Heck yeah! This is gonna be a sick race! A face-off between cars and bikes!
engSearchText:
Heck yeah! This is gonna be a sick race! A face-off
between cars and bikes!
jpnChrName: うんうん、車乗りもバイク乗りも 今日は皆で楽しんじゃお～！
jpnSearchText:
うんうん、車乗りもバイク乗りも
今日は皆で楽しんじゃお～！

engChrName: You're a biker? Hmph. We'll see if you have a hope against Damian.
engSearchText:
You're a biker? Hmph. We'll see if you have a hope
against Damian.
jpnChrName: フン、バイク乗りか……ウチのダミアンと どっちが速いか見物だな。
jpnSearchText:
フン、バイク乗りか……ウチのダミアンと
どっちが速いか見物だな。

engChrName: Just don't come crying to me if you don't like what you see.
engSearchText:
Just don't come crying to me if you don't like what
you see.
jpnChrName: まあ見てろや。 後で驚かせてやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ見てろや。
後で驚かせてやるよ。

engChrName: But whatever. Let's get looking. We need more drivers still.
engSearchText:
But whatever. Let's get looking. We need more
drivers still.
jpnChrName: で……後は他にも面子を 集めてくりゃいいわけだな。
jpnSearchText:
で……後は他にも面子を
集めてくりゃいいわけだな。

engChrName: There's a lot of people gathered from all over today, after all.
engSearchText:
There's a lot of people gathered from all over today,
after all.
jpnChrName: 今日は各地から人が 集まっているようですから……
jpnSearchText:
今日は各地から人が
集まっているようですから……

engChrName: Recruiting participants shouldn't be too difficult a challenge.
engSearchText:
Recruiting participants shouldn't be too difficult
a challenge.
jpnChrName: 参加者を集めるのは そう難しくないかもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
参加者を集めるのは
そう難しくないかもしれませんね。

engChrName: Well, there's a lot of people in the capital, thanks to the festival.
engSearchText:
Well, there's a lot of people in the capital, thanks to
the festival.
jpnChrName: 今日は記念祭だから、 首都に人が集まってるだろうし……
jpnSearchText:
今日は記念祭だから、
首都に人が集まってるだろうし……

engChrName: You have a lot of contacts, don't you, Van? I imagine it'll be easier to find participants.
engSearchText:
You have a lot of contacts, don't you, Van? I imagine
it'll be easier to find participants.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんのツテがあれば すぐに人が集まるんじゃない？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんのツテがあれば
すぐに人が集まるんじゃない？

engChrName: Well, it's the middle of the festival. There should be plenty of people here in the capital. At least SOME of them should be up to it.
engSearchText:
Well, it's the middle of the festival. There should be
plenty of people here in the capital. At least SOME
of them should be up to it.
jpnChrName: 今日は記念祭だし、きっとアンタの 知り合いも何人か来てるでしょ。
jpnSearchText:
今日は記念祭だし、きっとアンタの
知り合いも何人か来てるでしょ。

engChrName: Why don't we try chatting them up, see what they think?
engSearchText:
Why don't we try chatting them up, see what
they think?
jpnChrName: 興味を持ってくれそうな人に 声をかけて回ればすぐに集まるんじゃない？
jpnSearchText:
興味を持ってくれそうな人に
声をかけて回ればすぐに集まるんじゃない？

engChrName: Hmm... If you're going to ask around, why not ask Aaron?
engSearchText:
Hmm... If you're going to ask around, why not
ask Aaron?
jpnChrName: ふむ……そういう事なら アーロンに声をかけてみるのはどうだ。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……そういう事なら
アーロンに声をかけてみるのはどうだ。

engChrName: Huh? Why him? You're the one with the motorbike.
engSearchText: Huh? Why him? You're the one with the motorbike.
jpnChrName: 師父（せんせい）ならともかく、 どうしてアイツなんですか？
jpnSearchText:
師父（せんせい）ならともかく、
どうしてアイツなんですか？

engChrName: Actually, I lent it to him for the duration of the festival.
engSearchText:
Actually, I lent it to him for the duration of
the festival.
jpnChrName: 実は記念祭の間にバイクを貸す約束をしていてな。
jpnSearchText: 実は記念祭の間にバイクを貸す約束をしていてな。

engChrName: He would jump at the chance to join. I'm sure he'd love to put those wheels through their paces.
engSearchText:
He would jump at the chance to join. I'm sure he'd
love to put those wheels through their paces.
jpnChrName: マシンを飛ばすには絶好の機会であろうし、 あやつも参加したがるのではないか？
jpnSearchText:
マシンを飛ばすには絶好の機会であろうし、
あやつも参加したがるのではないか？

engChrName: I guess. I could see him gettin' a kick outta this.
engSearchText: I guess. I could see him gettin' a kick outta this.
jpnChrName: なるほど、そういう事なら確かに……
jpnSearchText: なるほど、そういう事なら確かに……

engChrName: But the same goes for you, Master. I figured you'd enjoy the thrill of the race.
engSearchText:
But the same goes for you, Master. I figured you'd
enjoy the thrill of the race.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、師父こそ参加しなくてもいいんですか？ それこそ飛ばすには絶好の機会でしょうに。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、師父こそ参加しなくてもいいんですか？
それこそ飛ばすには絶好の機会でしょうに。

engChrName: I would rather pass the torch to you young'uns. I'm getting too old for this, I'm afraid.
engSearchText:
I would rather pass the torch to you young'uns.
I'm getting too old for this, I'm afraid.
jpnChrName: ふふ、若者の勝負にこの老骨が しゃしゃり出るのは忍びないのでな。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、若者の勝負にこの老骨が
しゃしゃり出るのは忍びないのでな。

engChrName: Why don't you give him a call? I'm sure he'd say yes in a heartbeat.
engSearchText:
Why don't you give him a call? I'm sure he'd say yes
in a heartbeat.
jpnChrName: お前達で存分に楽しんで来るといい。
jpnSearchText: お前達で存分に楽しんで来るといい。

engChrName: All righty. One minute.
engSearchText: All righty. One minute.
jpnChrName: 分かりましたよ、それじゃ連絡を 入れてみるんで少し待っていてください。
jpnSearchText:
分かりましたよ、それじゃ連絡を
入れてみるんで少し待っていてください。

engChrName: Welp, you were right. Soon as the word 'race' left my mouth, he was right on board.
engSearchText:
Welp, you were right. Soon as the word 'race' left my
mouth, he was right on board.
jpnChrName: 連絡が付きました。 アイツも参加するそうです。
jpnSearchText:
連絡が付きました。
アイツも参加するそうです。

engChrName: Heh. I thought as much.
engSearchText: Heh. I thought as much.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そうか。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、そうか。

engChrName: I'm sure he will have a great time. You all have fun out there.
engSearchText:
I'm sure he will have a great time. You all have fun
out there.
jpnChrName: 私の愛車と共に、 存分に風を感じて来てもらわなければな。
jpnSearchText:
私の愛車と共に、
存分に風を感じて来てもらわなければな。

engChrName: All right, one person down.
engSearchText: All right, one person down.
jpnChrName: 早速１人決まったみたいですね。
jpnSearchText: 早速１人決まったみたいですね。

engChrName: Oooh, can't wait to test my own baby against a biker's mettle!
engSearchText:
Oooh, can't wait to test my own baby against a
biker's mettle!
jpnChrName: バイク乗りかぁ～！ どんな勝負になるのか楽しみだねっ！
jpnSearchText:
バイク乗りかぁ～！
どんな勝負になるのか楽しみだねっ！

engChrName: We'll see how he fares, although I doubt he can compare to Damian.
engSearchText:
We'll see how he fares, although I doubt he can
compare to Damian.
jpnChrName: フン、ウチのダミアンと どっちが速いか見物だな。
jpnSearchText:
フン、ウチのダミアンと
どっちが速いか見物だな。

engChrName: Let's get going, then. I'm sure Aaron's not the only one who'll want to join.
engSearchText:
Let's get going, then. I'm sure Aaron's not the only
one who'll want to join.
jpnChrName: さて、それではアーロンの他にも 何人か見繕わなければならないな。
jpnSearchText:
さて、それではアーロンの他にも
何人か見繕わなければならないな。

engChrName: Yeah. Let's keep this up.
engSearchText: Yeah. Let's keep this up.
jpnChrName: だな、まあ街を回りつつ 知り合いに声でもかけてみるか。
jpnSearchText:
だな、まあ街を回りつつ
知り合いに声でもかけてみるか。

engChrName: Bring everyone you can! The whole town if they want!
engSearchText:
Bring everyone you can! The whole town if
they want!
jpnChrName: そうだねぇ～、 何人誘ってくれても大丈夫だよ！
jpnSearchText:
そうだねぇ～、
何人誘ってくれても大丈夫だよ！

engChrName: If they wanna race, they're welcome here!
engSearchText: If they wanna race, they're welcome here!
jpnChrName: レースに興味がありそうな人が いたらどんどん声をかけちゃって！
jpnSearchText:
レースに興味がありそうな人が
いたらどんどん声をかけちゃって！

engChrName: We'll be here, so come back when you got more people.
engSearchText:
We'll be here, so come back when you got
more people.
jpnChrName: 俺たちはここで待ってるから 人数が集まったら教えてくれよな。
jpnSearchText:
俺たちはここで待ってるから
人数が集まったら教えてくれよな。

engChrName: Sure.
engSearchText: Sure.
jpnChrName: おう。
jpnSearchText: おう。

engChrName: Quest The Autobahn Showdown started!
engSearchText: Quest The Autobahn Showdown started!
jpnChrName: クエスト【決戦・アウトバーン対決】を開始した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>決戦・アウトバーン対決<C1>】を開始した！

engChrName: I'm back. Talked to some folks, saw who wanted to join up.
engSearchText:
I'm back. Talked to some folks, saw who wanted to
join up.
jpnChrName: よう、依頼の件なんだがな。 心当たりのあるヤツに声をかけて来たぜ。
jpnSearchText:
よう、依頼の件なんだがな。
心当たりのあるヤツに声をかけて来たぜ。

engChrName: Dunno how many will actually show up, but it should still be a fair bit.
engSearchText:
Dunno how many will actually show up, but it should
still be a fair bit.
jpnChrName: 何人が現地に駆け付けてくれるかは 分からねえが……
jpnSearchText:
何人が現地に駆け付けてくれるかは
分からねえが……

engChrName: Can't wait. I really appreciate it, Van.
engSearchText: Can't wait. I really appreciate it, Van.
jpnChrName: いいや、それでも十分助かるぜ。 ありがとなヴァンさん！
jpnSearchText:
いいや、それでも十分助かるぜ。
ありがとなヴァンさん！

engChrName: Well, what're we waiting for?! Let's get goin'!
engSearchText: Well, what're we waiting for?! Let's get goin'!
jpnChrName: それじゃ、わたし達も 待ち合わせ場所に向かっちゃおうか！
jpnSearchText:
それじゃ、わたし達も
待ち合わせ場所に向かっちゃおうか！

engChrName: Very well. I will call Damian and tell him to rendezvous with us.
engSearchText:
Very well. I will call Damian and tell him to
rendezvous with us.
jpnChrName: ああ、それなら俺は ダミアンを呼び戻してこよう。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、それなら俺は
ダミアンを呼び戻してこよう。

engChrName: You ready?
engSearchText: You ready?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんの方の準備はいいか？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさんの方の準備はいいか？

engChrName: We'll be leaving the capital for a while, but we can hold on a moment if you still have something to do.
engSearchText:
We'll be leaving the capital for a while, but we can
hold on a moment if you still have something to do.
jpnChrName: 少しの間だが首都を離れる訳だし、 タイミングが悪ければ言ってくれよ。
jpnSearchText:
少しの間だが首都を離れる訳だし、
タイミングが悪ければ言ってくれよ。

engChrName: You ready?
engSearchText: You ready?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんの方の準備はいいか？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさんの方の準備はいいか？

engChrName: We'll be leaving the capital for a while, but we can hold on a moment if you still have something to do.
engSearchText:
We'll be leaving the capital for a while, but we can
hold on a moment if you still have something to do.
jpnChrName: 少しの間だが首都を離れる訳だし、 タイミングが悪ければ言ってくれよ。
jpnSearchText:
少しの間だが首都を離れる訳だし、
タイミングが悪ければ言ってくれよ。

engChrName: Yeah, just give me a sec here. I'll be back soon.
engSearchText: Yeah, just give me a sec here. I'll be back soon.
jpnChrName: 悪いな、それじゃ一旦 出直してきてもいいか？
jpnSearchText:
悪いな、それじゃ一旦
出直してきてもいいか？

engChrName: Bold of you to assume you're worthy of delaying the whole event and keep me waiting. But go on. Hurry up if you must.
engSearchText:
Bold of you to assume you're worthy of delaying the
whole event and keep me waiting. But go on.
Hurry up if you must.
jpnChrName: この俺を待たせるとは感心しないが…… せいぜい急いで戻ってくる事だな。
jpnSearchText:
この俺を待たせるとは感心しないが……
せいぜい急いで戻ってくる事だな。

engChrName: Nah, got nothin'. Let's get goin'.
engSearchText: Nah, got nothin'. Let's get goin'.
jpnChrName: いいや、問題ない。 早速向かうとするか。
jpnSearchText:
いいや、問題ない。
早速向かうとするか。

engChrName: Okay. If everyone else is ready, then we can get going to the starting point.
engSearchText:
Okay. If everyone else is ready, then we can get going
to the starting point.
jpnChrName: よし、それじゃ高速に乗る 手前まで向かうぞ。
jpnSearchText:
よし、それじゃ高速に乗る
手前まで向かうぞ。

engChrName: You vouchin' for these new racers has my mouth watering here!
engSearchText:
You vouchin' for these new racers has my mouth
watering here!
jpnChrName: えへへ～、ヴァンがどんな人に 声をかけてくれたか楽しみだなぁ～！
jpnSearchText:
えへへ～、ヴァンがどんな人に
声をかけてくれたか楽しみだなぁ～！

engChrName: Van and everyone else hopped on their vehicles and headed towards the meeting spot.
engSearchText:
Van and everyone else hopped on their vehicles and
headed towards the meeting spot.
jpnChrName: こうしてヴァン達は自分のマシンに乗り 待ち合わせ場所へと向かった。
jpnSearchText:
こうしてヴァン達は自分のマシンに乗り
待ち合わせ場所へと向かった。

engChrName: 'Bermotti'... Looks like it's closed right now.
engSearchText: 'Bermotti'... Looks like it's closed right now.
jpnChrName: 《ベルモッティ》…… このお店はお休みみたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
《ベルモッティ》……
このお店はお休みみたいですね。

engChrName: Yeah, nighttime's when the mira really rolls in. We can come back another time.
engSearchText:
Yeah, nighttime's when the mira really rolls in.
We can come back another time.
jpnChrName: カフェバーの稼ぎ時は夜だからな。 ……ま、今のところ用はねえさ。
jpnSearchText:
カフェバーの稼ぎ時は夜だからな。
……ま、今のところ用はねえさ。

engChrName: He likes hangin' out in the terrace. Let's find a spot where we can scope things out.
engSearchText:
He likes hangin' out in the terrace. Let's find a spot
where we can scope things out.
jpnChrName: 奴が現れるのは下のテラスエリアだ。 見える位置まで移動するぞ。
jpnSearchText:
奴が現れるのは下のテラスエリアだ。
見える位置まで移動するぞ。

engChrName: He likes hangin' out in the terrace. Let's find a spot where we can scope things out.
engSearchText:
He likes hangin' out in the terrace. Let's find a spot
where we can scope things out.
jpnChrName: 奴が現れるのは下のテラスエリアだ。 見える位置まで移動するぞ。
jpnSearchText:
奴が現れるのは下のテラスエリアだ。
見える位置まで移動するぞ。

engChrName: Well, here's Riverside, the 6th District. Don't imagine you've been by here often.
engSearchText:
Well, here's Riverside, the 6th District.
Don't imagine you've been by here often.
jpnChrName: 六区リバーサイド──お前は あんま来たことはないんだったな？
jpnSearchText:
六区リバーサイド──お前は
あんま来たことはないんだったな？

engChrName: I've rarely had the need to, so no. I haven't.
engSearchText: I've rarely had the need to, so no. I haven't.
jpnChrName: はい、今まであまり用事がなくて。
jpnSearchText: はい、今まであまり用事がなくて。

engChrName: Although I've heard it's a popular after-class spot for students.
engSearchText:
Although I've heard it's a popular after-class spot
for students.
jpnChrName: 放課後に遊びに来る生徒は 結構いるみたいですけど。
jpnSearchText:
放課後に遊びに来る生徒は
結構いるみたいですけど。

engChrName: Oh, yeah. Place is mighty pretty and got a wide variety of shops and stalls. A date here scores a ten outta ten when it comes to the view.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah. Place is mighty pretty and got a wide
variety of shops and stalls. A date here scores a ten
outta ten when it comes to the view.
jpnChrName: 景観はいいし店も多いから デートスポットとして有名だな。
jpnSearchText:
景観はいいし店も多いから
デートスポットとして有名だな。

engChrName: Fun doesn't stop when the sun goes down, either, what with the concert hall and all the bars around.
engSearchText:
Fun doesn't stop when the sun goes down, either,
what with the concert hall and all the bars around.
jpnChrName: ちなみにライブハウスとか飲み屋も 多いから夜も賑やかだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにライブハウスとか飲み屋も
多いから夜も賑やかだぜ。

engChrName: You must frequent this place quite a lot, since you know so much.
engSearchText:
You must frequent this place quite a lot, since you
know so much.
jpnChrName: うーん、ヴァンさんは 結構来られてるみたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、ヴァンさんは
結構来られてるみたいですね。

engChrName: I didn't have much time to look around last time we came here.
engSearchText:
I didn't have much time to look around last time we
came here.
jpnChrName: この間はゆっくり回れませんでしたが……
jpnSearchText: この間はゆっくり回れませんでしたが……

engChrName: Work hard, and we might be able to get to see the sights for a bit.
engSearchText:
Work hard, and we might be able to get to see the
sights for a bit.
jpnChrName: ま、依頼をこなしつつ色々見て回るか。
jpnSearchText: ま、依頼をこなしつつ色々見て回るか。

engChrName: Let's start here.
engSearchText: Let's start here.
jpnChrName: まずはここだな。
jpnSearchText: まずはここだな。

engChrName: I've been wanting to check out the food truck in more detail since we didn't have the chance last time.
engSearchText:
I've been wanting to check out the food truck in
more detail since we didn't have the chance last time.
jpnChrName: キッチンカー、以前見かけた時から 気になっていました。
jpnSearchText:
キッチンカー、以前見かけた時から
気になっていました。

engChrName: Not surprised a prim and proper private school student hasn't eaten at one before. Y'all are too fancy for street food.
engSearchText:
Not surprised a prim and proper private school
student hasn't eaten at one before. Y'all are too
fancy for street food.
jpnChrName: 買い食いをしなさそうな優等生には あまり縁がないだろうからな。
jpnSearchText:
買い食いをしなさそうな優等生には
あまり縁がないだろうからな。

engChrName: I really want to try out their food!
engSearchText: I really want to try out their food!
jpnChrName: はい、どんな味か楽しみです！
jpnSearchText: はい、どんな味か楽しみです！

engChrName: Welcome to Shino's Bar. It's nice to see you, Van.
engSearchText: Welcome to Shino's Bar. It's nice to see you, Van.
jpnChrName: あらヴァンさん、いらっしゃいませ。
jpnSearchText: あらヴァンさん、いらっしゃいませ。

engChrName: Hey, Shino. Takeout for me today. Two sorbets, extra caramel sauce.
engSearchText:
Hey, Shino. Takeout for me today. Two sorbets,
extra caramel sauce.
jpnChrName: ようシノ、今日は持ち帰りだ。 ジェラート２つ、カラメルソース多めで。
jpnSearchText:
ようシノ、今日は持ち帰りだ。
ジェラート２つ、カラメルソース多めで。

engChrName: One moment.
engSearchText: One moment.
jpnChrName: 少々お待ちください。
jpnSearchText: 少々お待ちください。

engChrName: ... (Yup. Just as I thought.)
engSearchText:
...
(Yup. Just as I thought.)

engChrName: Is something the matter?
engSearchText: Is something the matter?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、どうかしましたか？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん、どうかしましたか？

engChrName: Nah. Don't worry about it.
engSearchText: Nah. Don't worry about it.
jpnChrName: いや、なんでもないさ。
jpnSearchText: いや、なんでもないさ。

engChrName: Thanks for waiting. Here are your sorbets.
engSearchText: Thanks for waiting. Here are your sorbets.
jpnChrName: お待たせしました、 ジェラート２つです。
jpnSearchText:
お待たせしました、
ジェラート２つです。

engChrName: Van received his order.
engSearchText: Van received his order.
jpnChrName: 商品を受け取った。
jpnSearchText: <C1>商品を受け取った。

engChrName: I put an ice pack in there in case you don't get to them immediately. It should last around two hours.
engSearchText:
I put an ice pack in there in case you don't get to
them immediately. It should last around two hours.
jpnChrName: 保冷剤を入れてありますので ２時間くらいは持つと思いますよ。
jpnSearchText:
保冷剤を入れてありますので
２時間くらいは持つと思いますよ。

engChrName: Thanks.
engSearchText: Thanks.
jpnChrName: サンクス。
jpnSearchText: サンクス。

engChrName: Next stop's the orbal café over in Station Street. Should be about time to give that new latte of theirs a try.
engSearchText:
Next stop's the orbal café over in Station Street.
Should be about time to give that new latte of theirs
a try.
jpnChrName: 次は駅前の《オーバルカフェ》に行くか。 例の新作ラテも販売再開した頃だろ。
jpnSearchText:
次は駅前の《オーバルカフェ》に行くか。
例の新作ラテも販売再開した頃だろ。

engChrName: Of course! We can make up for this afternoon.
engSearchText: Of course! We can make up for this afternoon.
jpnChrName: あ、そういえば…… ふふ、昼間のリベンジですね。
jpnSearchText:
あ、そういえば……
ふふ、昼間のリベンジですね。

engChrName: Aaaaaagh... My head is STILL spinning. So, what? We've had the wool pulled over our eyes for...going on three years now?
engSearchText:
Aaaaaagh... My head is STILL spinning. So, what?
We've had the wool pulled over our eyes for...going
on three years now?
jpnChrName: はあああっ……マジかよ。 ３年近く誤魔化されてたってのか？
jpnSearchText:
はあああっ……マジかよ。
３年近く誤魔化されてたってのか？

engChrName: So it seems—though this revelation coming from who it does is no surprise.
engSearchText:
So it seems—though this revelation coming from
who it does is no surprise.
jpnChrName: ええ、完全にしてやられましたね。 考えてみればあの人らしいですが……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、完全にしてやられましたね。
考えてみればあの人らしいですが……

engChrName: I have to assume the commander, the second-in-command, and the archbishop were the only people who knew.
engSearchText:
I have to assume the commander, the
second-in-command, and the archbishop were the
only people who knew.
jpnChrName: 恐らく総長と副長、そして猊下だけが ご存じだったんでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
恐らく総長と副長、そして猊下だけが
ご存じだったんでしょう。

engChrName: That damn, bald-faced liar... The commander, too! What are we, total strangers?!
engSearchText:
That damn, bald-faced liar... The commander, too!
What are we, total strangers?!
jpnChrName: クソ、オトボケ先輩め…… 総長も総長で水臭すぎんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
クソ、オトボケ先輩め……
総長も総長で水臭すぎんだろ。

engChrName: You know what? I'm in the mood for a rematch! It's time to kick her ass for good this time!
engSearchText:
You know what? I'm in the mood for a rematch!
It's time to kick her ass for good this time!
jpnChrName: やっぱそのうちリベンジマッチを 申し込むしかなさそうだな……！
jpnSearchText:
やっぱそのうちリベンジマッチを
申し込むしかなさそうだな……！

engChrName: Not to rain on your parade, but the odds aren't quite stacked in your favor here.
engSearchText:
Not to rain on your parade, but the odds aren't quite
stacked in your favor here.
jpnChrName: うーん、あの女性（ひと）相手じゃ 勝ち目は薄いと思いますけど……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、あの女性（ひと）相手じゃ
勝ち目は薄いと思いますけど……

engChrName: Where do the scores stand as of now? Two wins, seven losses?
engSearchText:
Where do the scores stand as of now? Two wins,
seven losses?
jpnChrName: これまでの対戦成績だって たしか２勝７敗くらいでしたよね？
jpnSearchText:
これまでの対戦成績だって
たしか２勝７敗くらいでしたよね？

engChrName: THREE! Three wins, seven losses excuse you! And it's not stayin' that way for long!
engSearchText:
THREE! Three wins, seven losses excuse you!
And it's not stayin' that way for long!
jpnChrName: さ、３勝７敗だ！ 今度こそ届かせてもらうっつーの！
jpnSearchText:
さ、３勝７敗だ！
今度こそ届かせてもらうっつーの！

engChrName: (Th-These two are...)
engSearchText: (Th-These two are...)
jpnChrName: （こ、この方たちって……）
jpnSearchText: （こ、この方たちって……）

engChrName: (These are the two from the Blacklight District.)
engSearchText: (These are the two from the Blacklight District.)
jpnChrName: （黒芒街で見かけた二人組……）
jpnSearchText: （黒芒街で見かけた二人組……）

engChrName: (Hey, if it isn't our friends from the Blacklight District.)
engSearchText:
(Hey, if it isn't our friends from the
Blacklight District.)
jpnChrName: （ハン……   黒芒街で見かけたヤツらか。）
jpnSearchText:
（ハン……
黒芒街で見かけたヤツらか。）

engChrName: (They were present at the Blacklight District.)
engSearchText: (They were present at the Blacklight District.)
jpnChrName: （……黒芒街に   いらしていた方々ですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（……黒芒街に
いらしていた方々ですね。）

engChrName: (They are dressed rather oddly. Are you guys acquainted?)
engSearchText:
(They are dressed rather oddly. Are you
guys acquainted?)
jpnChrName: （……？　不思議な格好だけど   ヴァンさんたちの知り合いなの？）
jpnSearchText:
（……？　不思議な格好だけど
ヴァンさんたちの知り合いなの？）

engChrName: (Barely, if that.)
engSearchText: (Barely, if that.)
jpnChrName: （ま、“顔見知り”にすら   なってねぇ程度の、だがな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、“顔見知り”にすら
なってねぇ程度の、だがな。）

engChrName: Hmph. What're you doin' here, spriggan?
engSearchText: Hmph. What're you doin' here, spriggan?
jpnChrName: おっと、裏解決屋どもか……
jpnSearchText: おっと、裏解決屋どもか……

engChrName: Ah, speak of the devil.
engSearchText: Ah, speak of the devil.
jpnChrName: ふむ……ある意味、 噂をすれば、でしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……ある意味、
噂をすれば、でしょうか。

engChrName: Guess that chance at another meeting wasn't too far off.
engSearchText: Guess that chance at another meeting wasn't too far off.
jpnChrName: “また機会はある”とか言ってたが その通りになったわけか。
jpnSearchText:
“また機会はある”とか言ってたが
その通りになったわけか。

engChrName: Got too hot under those hoods? Had to take a layer off?
engSearchText:
Got too hot under those hoods? Had to take a
layer off?
jpnChrName: 今日はフードを被ってねぇんだな？
jpnSearchText: 今日はフードを被ってねぇんだな？

engChrName: Pfft, you wish. We were just bein' careful. Let's just say that we got a complicated relationship with someone who was also there.
engSearchText:
Pfft, you wish. We were just bein' careful. Let's just
say that we got a complicated relationship with
someone who was also there.
jpnChrName: ハン、ありゃ念のためだ。 訳アリの身内の手前もあったからな。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、ありゃ念のためだ。
訳アリの身内の手前もあったからな。

engChrName: This is how we dress on a daily basis. Appropriate travel attire, regardless of whether it's by train, airship, or otherwise.
engSearchText:
This is how we dress on a daily basis.
Appropriate travel attire, regardless of whether it's by
train, airship, or otherwise.
jpnChrName: いつもはこの格好ですよ。 列車や飛行船を利用する時もね。
jpnSearchText:
いつもはこの格好ですよ。
列車や飛行船を利用する時もね。

engChrName: Oh, right. The needle noggin priest I met way back kinda dressed like that, too.
engSearchText:
Oh, right. The needle noggin priest I met way back
kinda dressed like that, too.
jpnChrName: ああ、前会ったツンツン頭の兄さんも そんなナリだったからな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、前会ったツンツン頭の兄さんも
そんなナリだったからな。

engChrName: You don't look much like your usual travelin' priest or sister, you know.
engSearchText:
You don't look much like your usual travelin' priest or
sister, you know.
jpnChrName: その格好で巡回神父やシスターっつうのも ちょいと無理があるような気もするが。
jpnSearchText:
その格好で巡回神父やシスターっつうのも
ちょいと無理があるような気もするが。

engChrName: Haha. There, I will have to agree with you.
engSearchText: Haha. There, I will have to agree with you.
jpnChrName: あはは、ですよねぇ。
jpnSearchText: あはは、ですよねぇ。

engChrName: Don't see what you're laughin' about. It's just clothes.
engSearchText: Don't see what you're laughin' about. It's just clothes.
jpnChrName: 笑いごとじゃねーだろ。 こっちも慣れちまってるけどよ。
jpnSearchText:
笑いごとじゃねーだろ。
こっちも慣れちまってるけどよ。

engChrName: So...
engSearchText: So...
jpnChrName: えっと……
jpnSearchText: えっと……

engChrName: You don't actually know each other, then?
engSearchText: You don't actually know each other, then?
jpnChrName: やっぱり直接の知り合いじゃ ないみたいですけど……
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり直接の知り合いじゃ
ないみたいですけど……

engChrName: We're here, too, you know. Mind not ignoring us while you guys chat?
engSearchText:
We're here, too, you know. Mind not ignoring us
while you guys chat?
jpnChrName: ハン、なにテメェらだけで 分かったような話をしてやがる。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、なにテメェらだけで
分かったような話をしてやがる。

engChrName: If I were to guess, I would assume you and Van share an acquaintance.
engSearchText:
If I were to guess, I would assume you and Van share
an acquaintance.
jpnChrName: ……察するにヴァンさんと 共通の知り合いがいる関係なのかな？
jpnSearchText:
……察するにヴァンさんと
共通の知り合いがいる関係なのかな？

engChrName: You could say that.
engSearchText: You could say that.
jpnChrName: ああ、たぶん色んな意味でな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、たぶん色んな意味でな。

engChrName: What? You got a problem with us, punk?
engSearchText: What? You got a problem with us, punk?
jpnChrName: ああん……？ アタシらに文句あんのか？
jpnSearchText:
ああん……？
アタシらに文句あんのか？

engChrName: So you're the spriggan of the Republic—but personally, I think of you as the dropout of the Kunlun school.
engSearchText:
So you're the spriggan of the Republic—but
personally, I think of you as the dropout of the
Kunlun school.
jpnChrName: 共和国の裏解決屋（スプリガン）── いや、《崑崙（コンロン）流》の落ちこぼれ伝承者が。
jpnSearchText:
共和国の裏解決屋（スプリガン）──
いや、《崑崙（コンロン）流》の落ちこぼれ伝承者が。

engChrName: Now, now, Celis. It's not good to pick fights with him when you've only just met.
engSearchText:
Now, now, Celis. It's not good to pick fights with
him when you've only just met.
jpnChrName: まあまあ、セリスさん。 すぐにガン付けるのは良くないですよ。
jpnSearchText:
まあまあ、セリスさん。
すぐにガン付けるのは良くないですよ。

engChrName: Even if he is a shady piece of human waste from Aidios-knows-where who can't figure out which half of the moral fence he's standing on.
engSearchText:
Even if he is a shady piece of human waste from
Aidios-knows-where who can't figure out which half
of the moral fence he's standing on.
jpnChrName: いくら表と裏の間でフラフラしている、 どこの馬の骨とも知れない人だからって。
jpnSearchText:
いくら表と裏の間でフラフラしている、
どこの馬の骨とも知れない人だからって。

engChrName: Just met, but you sure got an opinion on me already.
engSearchText: Just met, but you sure got an opinion on me already.
jpnChrName: ──どうやらそっちは俺のことを それなりにご存じのようだ。
jpnSearchText:
──どうやらそっちは俺のことを
それなりにご存じのようだ。

engChrName: Not very fair if you ask me. Don't even know who you two are.
engSearchText:
Not very fair if you ask me. Don't even know who
you two are.
jpnChrName: 少々フェアじゃねえ気がするし 名前くらいは聞かせてもらおうか？
jpnSearchText:
少々フェアじゃねえ気がするし
名前くらいは聞かせてもらおうか？

engChrName: Guess we can tell you that much.
engSearchText: Guess we can tell you that much.
jpnChrName: ああ、別に構わないぜ？
jpnSearchText: ああ、別に構わないぜ？

engChrName: *sigh* I'm not pleased, personally, but very well.
engSearchText: *sigh* I'm not pleased, personally, but very well.
jpnChrName: ふう…… 若干気は進みませんけど。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……
若干気は進みませんけど。

engChrName: I'm Celis. Celis Ortesia.
engSearchText: I'm Celis. Celis Ortesia.
jpnChrName: セリスだ、セリス・オルテシア。
jpnSearchText: セリスだ、セリス・オルテシア。

engChrName: Just think of me as your average wanderin' priest. Pleased to beat ya, spriggan.
engSearchText:
Just think of me as your average wanderin' priest.
Pleased to beat ya, spriggan.
jpnChrName: あくまで“巡回シスター”でな、 夜露死苦頼むぜ、裏解決屋に助手ども。
jpnSearchText:
あくまで“巡回シスター”でな、
夜露死苦頼むぜ、裏解決屋に助手ども。

engChrName: And I'm Leon Balthazar, also a wandering priest. I've been assigned to support Celis.
engSearchText:
And I'm Leon Balthazar, also a wandering priest.
I've been assigned to support Celis.
jpnChrName: “巡回神父”のリオン・バルタザールです。 一応セリスさんのサポートを務めていまして。
jpnSearchText:
“巡回神父”のリオン・バルタザールです。
一応セリスさんのサポートを務めていまして。

engChrName: It is once again a pleasure, fine folks of Arkride Solutions—though quite the heavy displeasure in your boss' case.
engSearchText:
It is once again a pleasure, fine folks of Arkride
Solutions—though quite the heavy displeasure in your
boss' case.
jpnChrName: 改めてよろしく、解決事務所の皆さん。 ──そちらの所長さん以外は、ですが。
jpnSearchText:
改めてよろしく、解決事務所の皆さん。
──そちらの所長さん以外は、ですが。

engChrName: Gimme a break here. We barely even know each other and you're already barin' your teeth at me.
engSearchText:
Gimme a break here. We barely even know each
other and you're already barin' your teeth at me.
jpnChrName: 妙に当たりが強いが…… ま、せいぜいお手柔らかに頼むぜ。
jpnSearchText:
妙に当たりが強いが……
ま、せいぜいお手柔らかに頼むぜ。

engChrName: Whatever. You guys already know me, so it saves me that part of the intro. But the gist is I take jobs from anyone—long as they don't cross the line.
engSearchText:
Whatever. You guys already know me, so it saves me
that part of the intro. But the gist is I take jobs from
anyone—long as they don't cross the line.
jpnChrName: 知ってるかもしれねえが俺は何処からの 依頼も請ける──“筋”さえ通ってれば。
jpnSearchText:
知ってるかもしれねえが俺は何処からの
依頼も請ける──“筋”さえ通ってれば。

engChrName: Even if you two don't like me much, I'll be willin' to take a job or two from you. Might even help clear up that nasty impression of me you got.
engSearchText:
Even if you two don't like me much, I'll be willin' to
take a job or two from you. Might even help clear up
that nasty impression of me you got.
jpnChrName: アンタら方面にも必要なら力を貸すから 例の“認定”だけは勘弁してくれや。
jpnSearchText:
アンタら方面にも必要なら力を貸すから
例の“認定”だけは勘弁してくれや。

engChrName: It'll be up to you to prove us wrong.
engSearchText: It'll be up to you to prove us wrong.
jpnChrName: フフ、それは貴方次第だと思いますが。
jpnSearchText: フフ、それは貴方次第だと思いますが。

engChrName: Do appreciate a man that sticks to his principles.
engSearchText: Do appreciate a man that sticks to his principles.
jpnChrName: ま、筋を通すってのは悪くねぇ。
jpnSearchText: ま、筋を通すってのは悪くねぇ。

engChrName: Hah, unbunch your panties, Arkride. We're not here to pick a fight with you.
engSearchText:
Hah, unbunch your panties, Arkride. We're not here
to pick a fight with you.
jpnChrName: 別に喧嘩を売りに来たわけじゃねえし、 いきなり噛みつかねぇから安心しな。
jpnSearchText:
別に喧嘩を売りに来たわけじゃねえし、
いきなり噛みつかねぇから安心しな。

engChrName: ...I thought my heart was gonna beat right out of my chest. Those two are clearly not your average sister and priest.
engSearchText:
...I thought my heart was gonna beat right out of
my chest. Those two are clearly not your average
sister and priest.
jpnChrName: し、心臓に悪いなぁ…… どう考えても只者じゃなさそうだし。
jpnSearchText:
し、心臓に悪いなぁ……
どう考えても只者じゃなさそうだし。

engChrName: True, but I don't think the part about belonging to the church was a lie. (Reminds me of a book I read once.)
engSearchText:
True, but I don't think the part about belonging to
the church was a lie.
(Reminds me of a book I read once.)
jpnChrName: ええ、教会関係者なのは本当みたいですが…… （……前に何かの本で読んだような……？）
jpnSearchText:
ええ、教会関係者なのは本当みたいですが……
（……前に何かの本で読んだような……？）

engChrName: I didn't spot a single opening throughout that whole conversation, but they weren't being hostile either. I guess they're okay?
engSearchText:
I didn't spot a single opening throughout that whole
conversation, but they weren't being hostile either.
I guess they're okay?
jpnChrName: うーん、二人とも全く隙がありませんけど 戦意は無さそうなので大丈夫そうですね。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、二人とも全く隙がありませんけど
戦意は無さそうなので大丈夫そうですね。

engChrName: Churchfolk armed to the teeth? I might've heard a rumor or two.
engSearchText:
Churchfolk armed to the teeth? I might've heard a
rumor or two.
jpnChrName: クク、手練れの教会関係者ねぇ。 ……風の噂で聞いたことはあるが。
jpnSearchText:
クク、手練れの教会関係者ねぇ。
……風の噂で聞いたことはあるが。

engChrName: (I'll need to update our records. The fourth and eleventh are far stronger than our initial analysis results indicated.)
engSearchText:
(I'll need to update our records. The fourth and
eleventh are far stronger than our initial analysis
results indicated.)
jpnChrName: （第四位と第十一位……   実力は評価分析以上、でしょうか。）
jpnSearchText:
（第四位と第十一位……
実力は評価分析以上、でしょうか。）

engChrName: Shooo what 'm tryin' to get at here is ishn't that... 'S that... Well, y'knooow...
engSearchText:
Shooo what 'm tryin' to get at here is ishn't that...
'S that... Well, y'knooow...
jpnChrName: ですからぁ、わらしが言いたいのは そういうのじゃなくってぇ……
jpnSearchText:
ですからぁ、わらしが言いたいのは
そういうのじゃなくってぇ……

engChrName: Come on. That's enough for one day, isn't it?
engSearchText: Come on. That's enough for one day, isn't it?
jpnChrName: やれやれ、今日はそのくらいにしておいたらどうだ？
jpnSearchText: やれやれ、今日はそのくらいにしておいたらどうだ？

engChrName: Dooon't change the shubjeeect!
engSearchText: Dooon't change the shubjeeect!
jpnChrName: 話を逸らしゃないで……
jpnSearchText: 話を逸らしゃないで……

engChrName: Ah, 's yooou! The shpriggan!
engSearchText: Ah, 's yooou! The shpriggan!
jpnChrName: あっ！　貴方は裏解決屋のぉ……！
jpnSearchText: あっ！　貴方は裏解決屋のぉ……！

engChrName: Van.
engSearchText: Van.
jpnChrName: ヴァンか。
jpnSearchText: ヴァンか。

engChrName: Hey, dude, don't let me keep you. I don't fancy third-wheeling, so how about I leave you two to it—
engSearchText:
Hey, dude, don't let me keep you. I don't fancy
third-wheeling, so how about I leave you two to it—
jpnChrName: 悪い、お取込み中だったか？ 邪魔しねえようにさっさと退散を──
jpnSearchText:
悪い、お取込み中だったか？
邪魔しねえようにさっさと退散を──

engChrName: Nooo! Shtay! *hic* Dingo's a JERK!
engSearchText: Nooo! Shtay! *hic* Dingo's a JERK!
jpnChrName: 待ってッ！　聞いてくだしゃいよぉ！ ディンゴさんったらひどいんですよぉ～……
jpnSearchText:
待ってッ！　聞いてくだしゃいよぉ！
ディンゴさんったらひどいんですよぉ～……

engChrName: He joosht left me behind! An' what did 'e learn? Nothin'! He'sh doing it again!
engSearchText:
He joosht left me behind! An' what did 'e learn?
Nothin'! He'sh doing it again!
jpnChrName: この前もわらしを置いていって…… 今回またそうしようとしてるんれすよぉ？
jpnSearchText:
この前もわらしを置いていって……
今回またそうしようとしてるんれすよぉ？

engChrName: So she's the loud kinda drunk.
engSearchText: So she's the loud kinda drunk.
jpnChrName: 絡み酒かよ……
jpnSearchText: 絡み酒かよ……

engChrName: You know, if Dingo's bein' such a jerk, why not tell him yourself? You're mighty close to him right now.
engSearchText:
You know, if Dingo's bein' such a jerk, why not tell
him yourself? You're mighty close to him right now.
jpnChrName: 文句なら本人に言ってくれ。 ほら、目の前にいるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
文句なら本人に言ってくれ。
ほら、目の前にいるぞ。

engChrName: I shure did! I told him off real good!
engSearchText: I shure did! I told him off real good!
jpnChrName: 言ったんれすよ！ ちゃんと言いまひたぁ！
jpnSearchText:
言ったんれすよ！
ちゃんと言いまひたぁ！

engChrName: An' what did he do? Jusht blew me off! *hic* Didn't listen t' a thing I shaid!
engSearchText:
An' what did he do? Jusht blew me off! *hic* Didn't
listen t' a thing I shaid!
jpnChrName: でもディンゴさん、わらしの話 全然聞いてくれなくて……
jpnSearchText:
でもディンゴさん、わらしの話
全然聞いてくれなくて……

engChrName: An here I just...'m workin' shooo hard...to...to follow in his fooshteps...
engSearchText:
An here I just...'m workin' shooo hard...to...to follow
in his fooshteps...
jpnChrName: せっかく色々と……頑張って…… 追いかけて………いた……のに……
jpnSearchText:
せっかく色々と……頑張って……
追いかけて………いた……のに……

engChrName: I just... Just wanna... Zzz...
engSearchText: I just... Just wanna... Zzz...
jpnChrName: わらしは……ただ……んん゛～……
jpnSearchText: わらしは……ただ……んん゛～……

engChrName: Lasted longer than I expected.
engSearchText: Lasted longer than I expected.
jpnChrName: 堕ちたか。
jpnSearchText: 堕ちたか。

engChrName: Yeah, she did.
engSearchText: Yeah, she did.
jpnChrName: みたいだな。
jpnSearchText: みたいだな。

engChrName: Sorry. That was an embarrassing way for you to find us.
engSearchText:
Sorry. That was an embarrassing way for you to
find us.
jpnChrName: ……悪いな、またみっともない所を 見せてしまったようだ。
jpnSearchText:
……悪いな、またみっともない所を
見せてしまったようだ。

engChrName: Don't sweat it. Not like I don't know you well enough at this point. Girl's sure got some balls, though.
engSearchText:
Don't sweat it. Not like I don't know you well enough
at this point. Girl's sure got some balls, though.
jpnChrName: 気にすんな、俺とお前の付き合いだ。 しかし彼女、思ったより根性あるじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
気にすんな、俺とお前の付き合いだ。
しかし彼女、思ったより根性あるじゃねえか。

engChrName: Follows you all the way to Tharbad, gets kidnapped, and caps it off with a night of drunken complaints. It's like she's not even fazed.
engSearchText:
Follows you all the way to Tharbad, gets kidnapped,
and caps it off with a night of drunken complaints.
It's like she's not even fazed.
jpnChrName: この前もサルバッドについて来た挙句 誘拐までされたってのによく懲りねえもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
この前もサルバッドについて来た挙句
誘拐までされたってのによく懲りねえもんだ。

engChrName: That might be my fault. I probably shouldn't have been so soft on her after the fact.
engSearchText:
That might be my fault. I probably shouldn't have
been so soft on her after the fact.
jpnChrName: ……あの一件についてはもう少し 厳しく言っていればと思わないでもないが。
jpnSearchText:
……あの一件についてはもう少し
厳しく言っていればと思わないでもないが。

engChrName: I did try to get it through to her that she needs to be more careful.
engSearchText:
I did try to get it through to her that she needs to be
more careful.
jpnChrName: またああいうことにならないよう 改めて念を押すつもりだったんだが……
jpnSearchText:
またああいうことにならないよう
改めて念を押すつもりだったんだが……

engChrName: Carefulness doesn't seem to have clocked in tonight, from the look of it.
engSearchText:
Carefulness doesn't seem to have clocked in tonight,
from the look of it.
jpnChrName: この様子じゃあ聞き入れるはずもねぇか。
jpnSearchText: この様子じゃあ聞き入れるはずもねぇか。

engChrName: Not at all. I'll have to try again some other time. And I definitely can't have her knowing where I'm going next time I travel.
engSearchText:
Not at all. I'll have to try again some other time.
And I definitely can't have her knowing where I'm
going next time I travel.
jpnChrName: とにかく、今度は上手くやるさ。 簡単に行き先を掴まれないようにな。
jpnSearchText:
とにかく、今度は上手くやるさ。
簡単に行き先を掴まれないようにな。

engChrName: Losin' a newbie like her shouldn't be THAT hard for you, right?
engSearchText:
Losin' a newbie like her shouldn't be THAT hard for
you, right?
jpnChrName: ま、お前が本気で撒こうと思えば、 新米記者には捕まえようないだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、お前が本気で撒こうと思えば、
新米記者には捕まえようないだろ。

engChrName: But you sure it's worth it? Don't wanna upset the cute little missy by pushing her away. She's got a thing for you.
engSearchText:
But you sure it's worth it? Don't wanna upset the cute
little missy by pushing her away. She's got a thing
for you.
jpnChrName: でも、いいのか？　可愛い後輩だろ。 後でまた拗ねられるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
でも、いいのか？　可愛い後輩だろ。
後でまた拗ねられるぞ。

engChrName: I've said it before, but we're from different publications. Rather than friends, we should be rivals.
engSearchText:
I've said it before, but we're from different
publications. Rather than friends, we should
be rivals.
jpnChrName: 何度も言ったが、彼女は他誌の人間だ。 うちとはある意味ライバル関係と言っていい。
jpnSearchText:
何度も言ったが、彼女は他誌の人間だ。
うちとはある意味ライバル関係と言っていい。

engChrName: Don't think that really matters much. You'd probably be rivals even if you worked in the same place.
engSearchText:
Don't think that really matters much. You'd probably
be rivals even if you worked in the same place.
jpnChrName: 同じ出版社の人間だとしても、 ライバルはライバルだろ。
jpnSearchText:
同じ出版社の人間だとしても、
ライバルはライバルだろ。

engChrName: But rival or not, she looks up to you. That, at least, should mean something to you, yeah?
engSearchText:
But rival or not, she looks up to you. That, at least,
should mean something to you, yeah?
jpnChrName: だったら他誌だろうがなんだろうが、 後輩は後輩なんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
だったら他誌だろうがなんだろうが、
後輩は後輩なんじゃねえか？

engChrName: Hmph...
engSearchText: Hmph...

engChrName: I finally got a lead into one of the topics I've been pursuing.
engSearchText:
I finally got a lead into one of the topics I've
been pursuing.
jpnChrName: 以前から追いかけていたネタの、 尻尾程度をようやく掴めたところでな。
jpnSearchText:
以前から追いかけていたネタの、
尻尾程度をようやく掴めたところでな。

engChrName: You know me. All my investigations are a grey area at best.
engSearchText:
You know me. All my investigations are a grey area
at best.
jpnChrName: 知っての通り俺が追うネタは 大体グレーの領域にあるものだ。
jpnSearchText:
知っての通り俺が追うネタは
大体グレーの領域にあるものだ。

engChrName: The rest? Pitch black. Of the worst kind, and you know that.
engSearchText:
The rest? Pitch black. Of the worst kind, and you
know that.
jpnChrName: 真っ黒で本当にヤバいものも 中には少なくないからな。
jpnSearchText:
真っ黒で本当にヤバいものも
中には少なくないからな。

engChrName: I'd much rather she stay far, far away from that world.
engSearchText: I'd much rather she stay far, far away from that world.
jpnChrName: できれば彼女にはそんな場所に 踏み込んでほしくない。
jpnSearchText:
できれば彼女にはそんな場所に
踏み込んでほしくない。

engChrName: Maybe it's wrong of me to make that decision for her, but I don't want her to follow in my footsteps. She...should walk a brighter, more honest path.
engSearchText:
Maybe it's wrong of me to make that decision for her,
but I don't want her to follow in my footsteps.
She...should walk a brighter, more honest path.
jpnChrName: 勝手な願いだが、俺とは違う…… 正しい道を歩んでほしいと思っている。
jpnSearchText:
勝手な願いだが、俺とは違う……
正しい道を歩んでほしいと思っている。

engChrName: For someone who denies takin' her under your wing, you sure get overprotective when it comes to her.
engSearchText:
For someone who denies takin' her under your wing,
you sure get overprotective when it comes to her.
jpnChrName: ハッ…… まったく過保護な“先輩”なこった。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……
まったく過保護な“先輩”なこった。

engChrName: Look who's talking. You, and your growing office of assistants you'd stick your neck out for.
engSearchText:
Look who's talking. You, and your growing office of
assistants you'd stick your neck out for.
jpnChrName: お前に言われたくはないな、 アークライド所長。
jpnSearchText:
お前に言われたくはないな、
アークライド所長。

engChrName: Hey... Van. If I...
engSearchText: Hey... Van. If I...
jpnChrName: ……ヴァン、もし──
jpnSearchText: ……ヴァン、もし──

engChrName: If you?
engSearchText: If you?
jpnChrName: あん？
jpnSearchText: あん？

engChrName: ...Nothing. You're going out on a trip with your assistants, right?
engSearchText:
...Nothing. You're going out on a trip with your
assistants, right?
jpnChrName: ……いや、確か助手たちとの 旅行があるんだったな。
jpnSearchText:
……いや、確か助手たちとの
旅行があるんだったな。

engChrName: Should be a good time. Take the time to enjoy yourselves.
engSearchText:
Should be a good time. Take the time to
enjoy yourselves.
jpnChrName: せっかくの機会だ、 羽根を伸ばしてくるといい。
jpnSearchText:
せっかくの機会だ、
羽根を伸ばしてくるといい。

engChrName: I...will? That's the plan, at least.
engSearchText: I...will? That's the plan, at least.
jpnChrName: ……？　ああ、そうするつもりだ。
jpnSearchText: ……？　ああ、そうするつもりだ。

engChrName: I swear, just as quick AND creepy as Kitty used to be. How the hell do you know about that?!
engSearchText:
I swear, just as quick AND creepy as Kitty used to be.
How the hell do you know about that?!
jpnChrName: ってさっきの今で何で知ってんだっつの！？ 元仔猫みたいなのはやめてくれや。
jpnSearchText:
ってさっきの今で何で知ってんだっつの！？
元仔猫みたいなのはやめてくれや。

engChrName: That's for me to know.
engSearchText: That's for me to know.
jpnChrName: おっと──フフ。
jpnSearchText: おっと──フフ。

engChrName: Nooo, back oooff! Don't go gettin' too coshy with... with 'im, Dingo! Ish not faiiir! *hic* Not...fair...
engSearchText:
Nooo, back oooff! Don't go gettin' too coshy with...
with 'im, Dingo! Ish not faiiir! *hic* Not...fair...
jpnChrName: ……らめれすよディンゴさん！ 男性同士でそんな……親しくして………
jpnSearchText:
……らめれすよディンゴさん！
男性同士でそんな……親しくして………

engChrName: Whatever. I'll buy you a souvenir. You don't get to complain if you don't like it.
engSearchText:
Whatever. I'll buy you a souvenir. You don't get to
complain if you don't like it.
jpnChrName: ま……土産は買ってきてやるよ。 期待しとけ。
jpnSearchText:
ま……土産は買ってきてやるよ。
期待しとけ。

engChrName: I trust you to pick something good.
engSearchText: I trust you to pick something good.
jpnChrName: ああ、楽しみにしている。
jpnSearchText: ああ、楽しみにしている。

engChrName: Hi, guys!
engSearchText: Hi, guys!
jpnChrName: あ、お兄さんたちだ！
jpnSearchText: あ、お兄さんたちだ！

engChrName: It's Saara and Shaheena!
engSearchText: It's Saara and Shaheena!
jpnChrName: サァラさんとシャヒーナさん！
jpnSearchText: サァラさんとシャヒーナさん！

engChrName: I see Sylphid's with you, too.
engSearchText: I see Sylphid's with you, too.
jpnChrName: 《妖精》もいるな。
jpnSearchText: 《妖精》もいるな。

engChrName: Who are they?
engSearchText: Who are they?
jpnChrName: あの２人は……
jpnSearchText: あの２人は……

engChrName: Hmm? Acquaintances of yours?
engSearchText: Hmm? Acquaintances of yours?
jpnChrName: ふむ、おぬし達の知り合いか？
