jpnSearchText: ふむ、おぬし達の知り合いか？

engChrName: We met each other back in Tharbad.
engSearchText: We met each other back in Tharbad.
jpnChrName: はい、サルバッドで知り合った 踊り子のご姉妹です。
jpnSearchText:
はい、サルバッドで知り合った
踊り子のご姉妹です。

engChrName: Nice to see you. It's been a while.
engSearchText: Nice to see you. It's been a while.
jpnChrName: 皆さん、しばらくぶりです。
jpnSearchText: 皆さん、しばらくぶりです。

engChrName: What brings you guys here?
engSearchText: What brings you guys here?
jpnChrName: なんだ、こっちに来てるのか？
jpnSearchText: なんだ、こっちに来てるのか？

engChrName: We bumped into each other in town, so I'm showing them around now.
engSearchText:
We bumped into each other in town, so I'm showing
them around now.
jpnChrName: ちょうど街中で会ったから、 首都を案内してるところ。
jpnSearchText:
ちょうど街中で会ったから、
首都を案内してるところ。

engChrName: We have a guest role in Director Gotti's new film, so we were invited to come here.
engSearchText:
We have a guest role in Director Gotti's new film, so
we were invited to come here.
jpnChrName: 実はゴッチ監督の新作にゲストとして参加する ことになったので、こちらに招待されたんです。
jpnSearchText:
実はゴッチ監督の新作にゲストとして参加する
ことになったので、こちらに招待されたんです。

engChrName: You'll be in Director Gotti's next film?! Congratulations!
engSearchText:
You'll be in Director Gotti's next film?!
Congratulations!
jpnChrName: ゴッチ監督の新作に出演ですか！？ おめでとうございます。
jpnSearchText:
ゴッチ監督の新作に出演ですか！？
おめでとうございます。

engChrName: Be careful with that perv. Don't let him goad you into doing some skeevy scene or event.
engSearchText:
Be careful with that perv. Don't let him goad you into
doing some skeevy scene or event.
jpnChrName: 気を付けろよ、あのスケベ監督のことだ。 これを機に際どいイベントに出したりしてな。
jpnSearchText:
気を付けろよ、あのスケベ監督のことだ。
これを機に際どいイベントに出したりしてな。

engChrName: Don't worry. Nina and I are keeping an eye on him to make sure he won't try anything funny.
engSearchText:
Don't worry. Nina and I are keeping an eye on him to
make sure he won't try anything funny.
jpnChrName: そういうことにならないよう ニナと色々手を回したから安心して。
jpnSearchText:
そういうことにならないよう
ニナと色々手を回したから安心して。

engChrName: Thank you for doing that.
engSearchText: Thank you for doing that.
jpnChrName: あはは……本当にありがとうございました。
jpnSearchText: あはは……本当にありがとうございました。

engChrName: Two of the actresses are already keeping an eye, making sure they don't get in any trouble.
engSearchText:
Two of the actresses are already keeping an eye,
making sure they don't get in any trouble.
jpnChrName: そういうことにならないよう 女優２人が色々と手を回したみたいだね。
jpnSearchText:
そういうことにならないよう
女優２人が色々と手を回したみたいだね。

engChrName: I'm tremendously grateful to Judith and Nina.
engSearchText: I'm tremendously grateful to Judith and Nina.
jpnChrName: あはは……ジュディスさんとニナさんには 本当に感謝しています。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……ジュディスさんとニナさんには
本当に感謝しています。

engChrName: Actually, we were on our way to your office to say hi, Van.
engSearchText:
Actually, we were on our way to your office to say
hi, Van.
jpnChrName: 本当はこれからお兄さんの事務所に行って 挨拶しようと思ってたんだけど──
jpnSearchText:
本当はこれからお兄さんの事務所に行って
挨拶しようと思ってたんだけど──

engChrName: You got ahead of us there!
engSearchText: You got ahead of us there!
jpnChrName: その必要もなくなったね。
jpnSearchText: その必要もなくなったね。

engChrName: Hah. If you have the time, feel free to stop by for a visit anytime. I'm usually free durin' the day.
engSearchText:
Hah. If you have the time, feel free to stop by for a
visit anytime. I'm usually free durin' the day.
jpnChrName: 暇を見つけて遊びに来るといい。 昼間は留守の場合が多いがな。
jpnSearchText:
暇を見つけて遊びに来るといい。
昼間は留守の場合が多いがな。

engChrName: We'll be staying until the Revolution Festival, so I'm sure we'll have a chance to visit.
engSearchText:
We'll be staying until the Revolution Festival, so I'm
sure we'll have a chance to visit.
jpnChrName: 革命記念祭まで滞在する予定ですから、 そのうち機会があったら伺います。
jpnSearchText:
革命記念祭まで滞在する予定ですから、
そのうち機会があったら伺います。

engChrName: We'll break out our reserve of special snacks for you.
engSearchText: We'll break out our reserve of special snacks for you.
jpnChrName: とっておきのお茶菓子を用意して お待ちしております。
jpnSearchText:
とっておきのお茶菓子を用意して
お待ちしております。

engChrName: We'll get out our reserve of special snacks for you.
engSearchText: We'll get out our reserve of special snacks for you.
jpnChrName: とっておきのお茶菓子を 用意して待っていますね。
jpnSearchText:
とっておきのお茶菓子を
用意して待っていますね。

engChrName: You mean MY reserve? The ones I save for myself?
engSearchText: You mean MY reserve? The ones I save for myself?
jpnChrName: おい、それ、俺がとっておいた ヤツじゃねえだろうな？
jpnSearchText:
おい、それ、俺がとっておいた
ヤツじゃねえだろうな？

engChrName: Oh, you were saving those? Whoops. I ate all of them already.
engSearchText:
Oh, you were saving those? Whoops. I ate all of
them already.
jpnChrName: 違うと思うぜ？ あれならこの前オレが食ったから。
jpnSearchText:
違うと思うぜ？
あれならこの前オレが食ったから。

engChrName: SON OF A—
engSearchText: SON OF A—
jpnChrName: テメー！？
jpnSearchText: テメー！？

engChrName: Hey, Syd. Sorry to keep you waiting.
engSearchText: Hey, Syd. Sorry to keep you waiting.
jpnChrName: ようシド、お前らも 待たせちまって悪いな。
jpnSearchText:
ようシド、お前らも
待たせちまって悪いな。

engChrName: Hey there. You guys enjoying the festival?
engSearchText: Hey there. You guys enjoying the festival?
jpnChrName: よう、お前らも楽しんでるかよ？
jpnSearchText: よう、お前らも楽しんでるかよ？

engChrName: Yes we are. I see you're with your friends from Langport, Aaron?
engSearchText:
Yes we are. I see you're with your friends from
Langport, Aaron?
jpnChrName: ええ、アーロンさんはラングポートの お友達と一緒だったんですね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、アーロンさんはラングポートの
お友達と一緒だったんですね。

engChrName: We are. They're your friends from Langport, right?
engSearchText: We are. They're your friends from Langport, right?
jpnChrName: はい、アーロンさんはラングポートの お友達と一緒だったんですね。
jpnSearchText:
はい、アーロンさんはラングポートの
お友達と一緒だったんですね。

engChrName: Yes, thank you. I see you are with your friends from Langport.
engSearchText:
Yes, thank you. I see you are with your friends
from Langport.
jpnChrName: ええ、アーロン様は煌都の ご友人と一緒でしたか。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、アーロン様は煌都の
ご友人と一緒でしたか。

engChrName: Yep. You're with your Langport friends, I assume?
engSearchText: Yep. You're with your Langport friends, I assume?
jpnChrName: うん、そっちはラングポートの 友達と一緒みたいだね？
jpnSearchText:
うん、そっちはラングポートの
友達と一緒みたいだね？

engChrName: Sure are. I see you're spending the festival with your Langport buddies.
engSearchText:
Sure are. I see you're spending the festival with your
Langport buddies.
jpnChrName: ええ、そっちはラングポートの 友達と一緒って所かしら？
jpnSearchText:
ええ、そっちはラングポートの
友達と一緒って所かしら？

engChrName: Uh-huh. I see you're out with your Langport buds.
engSearchText: Uh-huh. I see you're out with your Langport buds.
jpnChrName: うむ、そなたは煌都の 友人たちと一緒のようだな。
jpnSearchText:
うむ、そなたは煌都の
友人たちと一緒のようだな。

engChrName: Hey, Syd. You feelin' better now? You took quite a beatin' back there.
engSearchText:
Hey, Syd. You feelin' better now? You took quite a
beatin' back there.
jpnChrName: 確かあの時は重傷だったが…… 怪我はもういいみたいだな？
jpnSearchText:
確かあの時は重傷だったが……
怪我はもういいみたいだな？

engChrName: Haha, yeah. Thanks for asking. I'm doing much better now. Doctor Longkai gave me the okay to come.
engSearchText:
Haha, yeah. Thanks for asking. I'm doing much
better now. Doctor Longkai gave me the okay
to come.
jpnChrName: ああ、この通り万全だ。 ロンカイ先生のお墨付きだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、この通り万全だ。
ロンカイ先生のお墨付きだぜ。

engChrName: Things finally settled down in Langport, so we decided to pay Aaron a visit.
engSearchText:
Things finally settled down in Langport, so we
decided to pay Aaron a visit.
jpnChrName: あれから煌都も落ち着いてっからよ、 アーロンの顔を見に来てやったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
あれから煌都も落ち着いてっからよ、
アーロンの顔を見に来てやったんだ。

engChrName: Pay me a visit? You sounded more like you wanted to see the sights more than me.
engSearchText:
Pay me a visit? You sounded more like you wanted to
see the sights more than me.
jpnChrName: ハッ、お前らが観光がてら 来たいつって聞かなかったんだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、お前らが観光がてら
来たいつって聞かなかったんだろうが。

engChrName: Aww, come on! We can do both!
engSearchText: Aww, come on! We can do both!
jpnChrName: あはは、いいじゃない。 そんなのどっちでもさ～！
jpnSearchText:
あはは、いいじゃない。
そんなのどっちでもさ～！

engChrName: Especially with how big the capital is! Gonna need you to show us around, Aaron!
engSearchText:
Especially with how big the capital is! Gonna need
you to show us around, Aaron!
jpnChrName: それより首都ってすっごく広いわね！ ねえアーロン、どこ案内してくれるの！？
jpnSearchText:
それより首都ってすっごく広いわね！
ねえアーロン、どこ案内してくれるの！？

engChrName: Yeah, yeah. I'll take you to some of my favorite spots.
engSearchText: Yeah, yeah. I'll take you to some of my favorite spots.
jpnChrName: そう焦んなって。
jpnSearchText: そう焦んなって。

engChrName: Figure we can go hang out in the Entertainment District, see some of my faves.
engSearchText:
Figure we can go hang out in the Entertainment
District, see some of my faves.
jpnChrName: とりま歓楽街をブラつきつつ オキニの所に顔を出してだな。
jpnSearchText:
とりま歓楽街をブラつきつつ
オキニの所に顔を出してだな。

engChrName: Ohh! Edith's Entertainment District? Hell yeah!
engSearchText: Ohh! Edith's Entertainment District? Hell yeah!
jpnChrName: おお～！　イーディスの色街か！？
jpnSearchText: おお～！　イーディスの色街か！？

engChrName: Let's get going already, then!
engSearchText: Let's get going already, then!
jpnChrName: つーかアーロン、 早くこっちに合流しろよ！
jpnSearchText:
つーかアーロン、
早くこっちに合流しろよ！

engChrName: No can do. Not with the old fart on my ass all day, anyway.
engSearchText:
No can do. Not with the old fart on my ass all
day, anyway.
jpnChrName: 悪ィな、このオッサンが 離してくれなくてよ。
jpnSearchText:
悪ィな、このオッサンが
離してくれなくてよ。

engChrName: Call me old fart again and we'll see who's on their ass by the end of the day.
engSearchText:
Call me old fart again and we'll see who's on their ass
by the end of the day.
jpnChrName: 誰がオッサンだ、誰が！！
jpnSearchText: 誰がオッサンだ、誰が！！

engChrName: Come on! It doesn't matter where, let's just get going, Aaron!
engSearchText:
Come on! It doesn't matter where, let's just get
going, Aaron!
jpnChrName: ハッ、何でもいいが 早く行こうぜ、アーロン！
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、何でもいいが
早く行こうぜ、アーロン！

engChrName: Sure. Later then, old fart.
engSearchText: Sure. Later then, old fart.
jpnChrName: おう、つーわけで悪いなオッサン。
jpnSearchText: おう、つーわけで悪いなオッサン。

engChrName: Watch it, or I'll throw you into the damn river.
engSearchText: Watch it, or I'll throw you into the damn river.
jpnChrName: このガキ……オッサン呼びは いい加減やめろっての。
jpnSearchText:
このガキ……オッサン呼びは
いい加減やめろっての。

engChrName: Hey, you there, with the red hair. You're Aaron, right?
engSearchText:
Hey, you there, with the red hair. You're
Aaron, right?
jpnChrName: オイ、そこの赤毛…… アーロンじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
オイ、そこの赤毛……
アーロンじゃねえか？

engChrName: Found you! With your friends, too, huh?
engSearchText: Found you! With your friends, too, huh?
jpnChrName: ふふっ、み～っけ！ お仲間も一緒みたいね？
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、み～っけ！
お仲間も一緒みたいね？

engChrName: Your luck's run out, Aaron Wei! You had the misfortune of meeting me here today! Now face me!
engSearchText:
Your luck's run out, Aaron Wei! You had the
misfortune of meeting me here today! Now face me!
jpnChrName: アーロン・ウェイ、ここで会ったが百年目だ。 俺らと勝負しろやァ！！
jpnSearchText:
アーロン・ウェイ、ここで会ったが百年目だ。
俺らと勝負しろやァ！！

engChrName: Oh, yeah? You wanna throw down?
engSearchText: Oh, yeah? You wanna throw down?
jpnChrName: ハッ、いいぜ？ 祭りには華がなくちゃなァ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、いいぜ？
祭りには華がなくちゃなァ。

engChrName: Hey, you guys. Don't you dare—
engSearchText: Hey, you guys. Don't you dare—
jpnChrName: おいおい、まさかお前ら──
jpnSearchText: おいおい、まさかお前ら──

engChrName: The loser treats the winner! And not just to one stall. To ALL the stalls!
engSearchText:
The loser treats the winner! And not just to one stall.
To ALL the stalls!
jpnChrName: 負けた方が勝った方に奢りだ！ この辺りにある屋台全部な！！
jpnSearchText:
負けた方が勝った方に奢りだ！
この辺りにある屋台全部な！！

engChrName: As for rules... Okay, let's do best of in three minutes, one point per touch.
engSearchText:
As for rules... Okay, let's do best of in three minutes,
one point per touch.
jpnChrName: 勝負は……そうだな。 ３分以内にタッチできたら１点でどうだ？
jpnSearchText:
勝負は……そうだな。
３分以内にタッチできたら１点でどうだ？

engChrName: I'm game! Let's go, Aaron!
engSearchText: I'm game! Let's go, Aaron!
jpnChrName: 面白え！　やってやろうぜアーロン！！
jpnSearchText: 面白え！　やってやろうぜアーロン！！

engChrName: As long as they don't mind getting their asses handed to them during the festival, I'm down for some fun!
engSearchText:
As long as they don't mind getting their asses handed
to them during the festival, I'm down for some fun!
jpnChrName: チッ、多少しょぼいが仕方ねえ。 ……おいテメエら、盛り上げろや！
jpnSearchText:
チッ、多少しょぼいが仕方ねえ。
……おいテメエら、盛り上げろや！

engChrName: Give it to 'em, Aaron! You, too, Syd!
engSearchText: Give it to 'em, Aaron! You, too, Syd!
jpnChrName: アーロン！　シドも頑張れ～っ！
jpnSearchText: アーロン！　シドも頑張れ～っ！

engChrName: They're...not fightin', then? Looked like they were in good terms, actually.
engSearchText:
They're...not fightin', then? Looked like they were in
good terms, actually.
jpnChrName: なんだ、喧嘩じゃねえのかよ…… しかも仲良さそうじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
なんだ、喧嘩じゃねえのかよ……
しかも仲良さそうじゃねえか。

engChrName: They just met a little while ago. I wouldn't call them friends, but let's just say it's a sort of friendly rivalry they have.
engSearchText:
They just met a little while ago. I wouldn't call them
friends, but let's just say it's a sort of friendly rivalry
they have.
jpnChrName: この前知り合ったんですって。 友達じゃないけどライバルだとか何とか。
jpnSearchText:
この前知り合ったんですって。
友達じゃないけどライバルだとか何とか。

engChrName: Boys will be boys, I guess.
engSearchText: Boys will be boys, I guess.
jpnChrName: 分かんないわよね、男同士の関係って。
jpnSearchText: 分かんないわよね、男同士の関係って。

engChrName: Well, at least he's makin' friends.
engSearchText: Well, at least he's makin' friends.
jpnChrName: ハッ、あいつが案外 人好きするってのは知ってたが──
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、あいつが案外
人好きするってのは知ってたが──

engChrName: Come on, man! Is that all you got? I could fall asleep here before you hit me!
engSearchText:
Come on, man! Is that all you got? I could fall asleep
here before you hit me!
jpnChrName: オイオイ、どこ狙ってんだ？ 欠伸が出ちまうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
オイオイ、どこ狙ってんだ？
欠伸が出ちまうぜ。

engChrName: Shut it, loser! ...Damn, you've got some crazy reflexes!
engSearchText: Shut it, loser! ...Damn, you've got some crazy reflexes!
jpnChrName: ンのヤロー！ なんつー反射神経してやがる！！
jpnSearchText:
ンのヤロー！
なんつー反射神経してやがる！！

engChrName: Here. I'll even make it easy for you.
engSearchText: Here. I'll even make it easy for you.
jpnChrName: 仕方ねえな……大サービスだ。
jpnSearchText: 仕方ねえな……大サービスだ。

engChrName: Think you can hit me now?
engSearchText: Think you can hit me now?
jpnChrName: ──こいつでどうよ？
jpnSearchText: ──こいつでどうよ？

engChrName: You show him, Aaron!
engSearchText: You show him, Aaron!
jpnChrName: いいぞアーロン！！　もっとやれーっ！！
jpnSearchText: いいぞアーロン！！　もっとやれーっ！！

engChrName: One more minute! Keep it steady!
engSearchText: One more minute! Keep it steady!
jpnChrName: 残り１分だ！　完封してやれ──っ！！
jpnSearchText: 残り１分だ！　完封してやれ──っ！！

engChrName: He sure knows how to draw a crowd, wherever he goes.
engSearchText:
He sure knows how to draw a crowd, wherever
he goes.
jpnChrName: チッ…… やっぱあいつ、どこにいても目立つな。
jpnSearchText:
チッ……
やっぱあいつ、どこにいても目立つな。

engChrName: Afterwards, both Aaron and Van—who inadvertently got drawn into to the contest—won, not failing to rouse the crowd that gathered around them.
engSearchText:
Afterwards, both Aaron and Van—who inadvertently
got drawn into to the contest—won, not failing to
rouse the crowd that gathered around them.
jpnChrName: その後、ギャラリーを沸かせつつ アーロンたち（と巻き込まれたヴァン）は勝利し──
jpnSearchText:
その後、ギャラリーを沸かせつつ
アーロンたち（と巻き込まれたヴァン）は勝利し──

engChrName: Their victory secured, they enjoyed their prize by taking a victory lap around all the stalls in Riverside at the losers' expense.
engSearchText:
Their victory secured, they enjoyed their prize by
taking a victory lap around all the stalls in Riverside at
the losers' expense.
jpnChrName: 不良たちに奢らせつつ リバーサイドの屋台を制覇したのだった。
jpnSearchText:
不良たちに奢らせつつ
リバーサイドの屋台を制覇したのだった。

engChrName: (Ah, Van, dear! You've got perfect timing!)
engSearchText: (Ah, Van, dear! You've got perfect timing!)
jpnChrName: （ああ、ヴァンちゃん！   良いところに来てくれたわっ！）
jpnSearchText:
（ああ、ヴァンちゃん！
良いところに来てくれたわっ！）

engChrName: (Huh? Lemme guess: is our problem from last night—)
engSearchText:
(Huh? Lemme guess: is our problem from last
night—)
jpnChrName: （あん……？   昨夜に続いて面倒なヤツでも──）
jpnSearchText:
（あん……？
昨夜に続いて面倒なヤツでも──）

engChrName: (Huh? What's gotten into you? Why do you look like—)
engSearchText:
(Huh? What's gotten into you? Why do you look
like—)
jpnChrName: （あん……？   なに地獄に仏みたいな──）
jpnSearchText:
（あん……？
なに地獄に仏みたいな──）

engChrName: O-Oh, Mr. Kincaid!
engSearchText: O-Oh, Mr. Kincaid!
jpnChrName: キ、キンケイドさんに あなた方は……！？
jpnSearchText:
キ、キンケイドさんに
あなた方は……！？

engChrName: Kasim?!
engSearchText: Kasim?!
jpnChrName: お、お兄ちゃん……！？
jpnSearchText: お、お兄ちゃん……！？

engChrName: What kind of hell did we just walk into?
engSearchText: What kind of hell did we just walk into?
jpnChrName: オイオイオイ…… どんなカオスだっつーの！？
jpnSearchText:
オイオイオイ……
どんなカオスだっつーの！？

engChrName: Mr. Al-Fayed? As well as Mr. Kincaid, and even...
engSearchText: Mr. Al-Fayed? As well as Mr. Kincaid, and even...
jpnChrName: カシム主任……！？ キンケイド様にそちらは……
jpnSearchText:
カシム主任……！？
キンケイド様にそちらは……

engChrName: Oh, it's Kincaid and Feri's brother...and...
engSearchText: Oh, it's Kincaid and Feri's brother...and...
jpnChrName: キンケイドさんに── フェリちゃんのお兄さんに、ええっ！？
jpnSearchText:
キンケイドさんに──
フェリちゃんのお兄さんに、ええっ！？

engChrName: Oh, the CID guy? Wait... Those two are—
engSearchText: Oh, the CID guy? Wait... Those two are—
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤの…… って、そっちの２人は！？
jpnSearchText:
ＣＩＤの……
って、そっちの２人は！？

engChrName: Didn't think I'd see you out in broad daylight.
engSearchText: Didn't think I'd see you out in broad daylight.
jpnChrName: ……よもや昼日中から 堂々と姿を現すとはな。
jpnSearchText:
……よもや昼日中から
堂々と姿を現すとはな。

engChrName: Hey, Arkride. Been a lonely ten days since I last saw you.
engSearchText:
Hey, Arkride. Been a lonely ten days since I last
saw you.
jpnChrName: お～、アークライドたち。 １０日ぶりくらいかよ。
jpnSearchText:
お～、アークライドたち。
１０日ぶりくらいかよ。

engChrName: Thanks a bunch for everything. Including you handling the game.
engSearchText:
Thanks a bunch for everything. Including you
handling the game.
jpnChrName: その節は世話になった。 ゲームを制した意味でもな。
jpnSearchText:
その節は世話になった。
ゲームを制した意味でもな。

engChrName: Took you long enough, Van.
engSearchText: Took you long enough, Van.
jpnChrName: ……遅かったな、ヴァン。
jpnSearchText: ……遅かったな、ヴァン。

engChrName: Long enough, my ass. What are you doing?
engSearchText: Long enough, my ass. What are you doing?
jpnChrName: 遅かったじゃねーよ…… いったい何をやってやがる？
jpnSearchText:
遅かったじゃねーよ……
いったい何をやってやがる？

engChrName: You plannin' on seein' the Revolution Festival off with a bang? 'Cause that's all you'll get with these two here.
engSearchText:
You plannin' on seein' the Revolution Festival off
with a bang? 'Cause that's all you'll get with these
two here.
jpnChrName: よりによってこの２人だぞ…… 革命記念祭をブチ壊させたいのか？
jpnSearchText:
よりによってこの２人だぞ……
革命記念祭をブチ壊させたいのか？

engChrName: I think there's a misunderstanding here.
engSearchText: I think there's a misunderstanding here.
jpnChrName: ん～、 どうも誤解があるようだなァ。
jpnSearchText:
ん～、
どうも誤解があるようだなァ。

engChrName: *sigh* It hurts to hear something like that from a former pupil of mine.
engSearchText:
*sigh* It hurts to hear something like that from a
former pupil of mine.
jpnChrName: ふう、さすがに元教え子から そこまで言われると傷付くんだが……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、さすがに元教え子から
そこまで言われると傷付くんだが……

engChrName: You should already be aware that Marduk's taking part in the weapons reveal.
engSearchText:
You should already be aware that Marduk's taking
part in the weapons reveal.
jpnChrName: 新兵装のお披露目にＭＫ社が 絡んでいるのは知っているだろう。
jpnSearchText:
新兵装のお披露目にＭＫ社が
絡んでいるのは知っているだろう。

engChrName: That's right. I think I saw you at the ceremony, Kasim...
engSearchText:
That's right. I think I saw you at the
ceremony, Kasim...
jpnChrName: そ、そういえば記念式典の実況でも お兄ちゃんを見かけたような……
jpnSearchText:
そ、そういえば記念式典の実況でも
お兄ちゃんを見かけたような……

engChrName: Well...at least you're relatively reasonable.
engSearchText: Well...at least you're relatively reasonable.
jpnChrName: いや……まあアンタが ある程度は常識人なのは知ってるが。
jpnSearchText:
いや……まあアンタが
ある程度は常識人なのは知ってるが。

engChrName: But the bar's pretty damn low when you're drinking with this guy, so maybe don't judge me for gettin' a little jumpy here.
engSearchText:
But the bar's pretty damn low when you're drinking
with this guy, so maybe don't judge me for gettin' a
little jumpy here.
jpnChrName: そこのオッサンと一緒に飲んでる時点で 嫌な予感にしか変換されねぇのも当然だろ？
jpnSearchText:
そこのオッサンと一緒に飲んでる時点で
嫌な予感にしか変換されねぇのも当然だろ？

engChrName: Only relatively?
engSearchText: Only relatively?
jpnChrName: ある程度は……？
jpnSearchText: ある程度は……？

engChrName: You're making it sound like he's some kind of deadly chemical that only turns into a threat when making contact with the wrong catalyst.
engSearchText:
You're making it sound like he's some kind of deadly
chemical that only turns into a threat when making
contact with the wrong catalyst.
jpnChrName: クハハ、単体だと有用でしかない化合物が ヤバイ触媒に触れると危険物になるパターンか。
jpnSearchText:
クハハ、単体だと有用でしかない化合物が
ヤバイ触媒に触れると危険物になるパターンか。

engChrName: But heh. Don't you find that one funny, Arkride?
engSearchText: But heh. Don't you find that one funny, Arkride?
jpnChrName: 言い得て妙じゃねぇか、アークライド。
jpnSearchText: 言い得て妙じゃねぇか、アークライド。

engChrName: Stop being so smug about it when you're the damn catalyst!
engSearchText:
Stop being so smug about it when you're the
damn catalyst!
jpnChrName: その触媒本人が抜かしてんじゃねえよ！！
jpnSearchText: その触媒本人が抜かしてんじゃねえよ！！

engChrName: Calm down, Van.
engSearchText: Calm down, Van.
jpnChrName: 落ち着け、ヴァン。
jpnSearchText: 落ち着け、ヴァン。

engChrName: While Marduk's chief of security is one thing, having one of the organization's highest-ranking members here...
engSearchText:
While Marduk's chief of security is one thing, having
one of the organization's highest-ranking
members here...
jpnChrName: ──ＭＫ社の主任殿はともかく、 “かの組織”の最高幹部殿……
jpnSearchText:
──ＭＫ社の主任殿はともかく、
“かの組織”の最高幹部殿……

engChrName: You appearing publicly is certainly a problem for maintaining order.
engSearchText:
You appearing publicly is certainly a problem for
maintaining order.
jpnChrName: この記念祭当日の昼間に大手を振って 現れているのは確かに治安上の問題だろう。
jpnSearchText:
この記念祭当日の昼間に大手を振って
現れているのは確かに治安上の問題だろう。

engChrName: Or it would be, normally.
engSearchText: Or it would be, normally.
jpnChrName: 普通ならば、な。
jpnSearchText: 普通ならば、な。

engChrName: So then...
engSearchText: So then...
jpnChrName: そいつは……
jpnSearchText: そいつは……

engChrName: I'll be upfront with you. We came to...an agreement of sorts with a certain someone.
engSearchText:
I'll be upfront with you. We came to...an agreement
of sorts with a certain someone.
jpnChrName: ま、タネを明かしちまえば とある御仁と“協定”ってヤツを結んでてな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、タネを明かしちまえば
とある御仁と“協定”ってヤツを結んでてな。

engChrName: It's a short thing, no real meaning in the long run, but I wouldn't dare overstep my bounds. This time.
engSearchText:
It's a short thing, no real meaning in the long run, but
I wouldn't dare overstep my bounds. This time.
jpnChrName: 期間限定の儚いモンにすぎねぇが それでもある程度は実効性があるわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
期間限定の儚いモンにすぎねぇが
それでもある程度は実効性があるわけだ。

engChrName: And that agreement included giving you the hint you needed to destroy A over in Oración.
engSearchText:
And that agreement included giving you the hint you
needed to destroy A over in Oración.
jpnChrName: ──オラシオンで《Ａ》どもを壊滅させた お前らというきっかけを導いた意味でもな。
jpnSearchText:
──オラシオンで《Ａ》どもを壊滅させた
お前らというきっかけを導いた意味でもな。

engChrName: Yeah. Just a hint, right? (An agreement with a 'certain someone'...)
engSearchText:
Yeah. Just a hint, right?
(An agreement with a 'certain someone'...)
jpnChrName: ……あれはただのきっかけ、ですよね？ （それにとある御仁って……）
jpnSearchText:
……あれはただのきっかけ、ですよね？
（それにとある御仁って……）

engChrName: B-But that's all you did!
engSearchText: B-But that's all you did!
jpnChrName: そ、そんなの…… ただのきっかけじゃ……！
jpnSearchText:
そ、そんなの……
ただのきっかけじゃ……！

engChrName: Yeah, hint all right. And barely that.
engSearchText: Yeah, hint all right. And barely that.
jpnChrName: チッ…… ただのきっかけのクセに。
jpnSearchText:
チッ……
ただのきっかけのクセに。

engChrName: I do recall your support extending just as far as that hint went, yes.
engSearchText:
I do recall your support extending just as far as that
hint went, yes.
jpnChrName: ……あくまでただの契機に 過ぎないと記憶していますが。
jpnSearchText:
……あくまでただの契機に
過ぎないと記憶していますが。

engChrName: Th-That barely helped, though!
engSearchText: Th-That barely helped, though!
jpnChrName: そ、そんなの…… ただのきっかけじゃないか……！
jpnSearchText:
そ、そんなの……
ただのきっかけじゃないか……！

engChrName: Yeah, it was just a hint! You don't get to be so smug about that!
engSearchText:
Yeah, it was just a hint! You don't get to be so smug
about that!
jpnChrName: ふぅん、ただのきっかけなのに 随分と偉そうじゃないの？
jpnSearchText:
ふぅん、ただのきっかけなのに
随分と偉そうじゃないの？

engChrName: ...I hope you're not crazy enough to think we owe you for that.
engSearchText:
...I hope you're not crazy enough to think we owe you
for that.
jpnChrName: ……よもやそのような世迷言で 恩に着せるつもりではあるまいな？
jpnSearchText:
……よもやそのような世迷言で
恩に着せるつもりではあるまいな？

engChrName: Hah, not a chance. It was just a matter of who knew more about A at the time.
engSearchText:
Hah, not a chance. It was just a matter of who knew
more about A at the time.
jpnChrName: クク、無論そのつもりはねぇ。 だが《Ａ》どもを一番知ってたのは確かだ。
jpnSearchText:
クク、無論そのつもりはねぇ。
だが《Ａ》どもを一番知ってたのは確かだ。

engChrName: Yeah, it was. You don't owe me for it, by the way. It was just a matter of who knew more about A at the time.
engSearchText:
Yeah, it was. You don't owe me for it, by the way.
It was just a matter of who knew more about A at
the time.
jpnChrName: 無論、恩に着せるつもりはねぇ。 だが《Ａ》どもを一番知ってたのは確かだ。
jpnSearchText:
無論、恩に着せるつもりはねぇ。
だが《Ａ》どもを一番知ってたのは確かだ。

engChrName: What kicked off their mad death game with that incomplete nuclear weapon as a toy...
engSearchText:
What kicked off their mad death game with that
incomplete nuclear weapon as a toy...
jpnChrName: ヤツらが不完全な反応兵器っつう玩具（オモチャ）で デスゲームを始めようとしたのも……
jpnSearchText:
ヤツらが不完全な反応兵器っつう玩具（オモチャ）で
デスゲームを始めようとしたのも……

engChrName: ...and how they managed to assemble the crew they did in just twenty short years. Rounding, of course.
engSearchText:
...and how they managed to assemble the crew they
did in just twenty short years. Rounding, of course.
jpnChrName: 大小合わせて２０近く──あの短期間で あれだけのチームが集まったのも含めてなァ。
jpnSearchText:
大小合わせて２０近く──あの短期間で
あれだけのチームが集まったのも含めてなァ。

engChrName: You're talking about the society's knowledge in the regard. Or, well, yours.
engSearchText:
You're talking about the society's knowledge in
the regard. Or, well, yours.
jpnChrName: それも《結社》──いえ貴方が……
jpnSearchText: それも《結社》──いえ貴方が……

engChrName: So it boils down to what the society knows about them. Or you, rather.
engSearchText:
So it boils down to what the society knows
about them. Or you, rather.
jpnChrName: それも《結社》──いやアンタが……
jpnSearchText: それも《結社》──いやアンタが……

engChrName: Okay, man. Toot your own horn if you want to.
engSearchText: Okay, man. Toot your own horn if you want to.
jpnChrName: それも《結社》──いやテメエが……
jpnSearchText: それも《結社》──いやテメエが……

engChrName: I thought something was off. It was your doing, then?
engSearchText: I thought something was off. It was your doing, then?
jpnChrName: ……怪しげな“流れ”は感じた。 やはりおぬしだったか。
jpnSearchText:
……怪しげな“流れ”は感じた。
やはりおぬしだったか。

engChrName: Oh, man. Is there nothin' you won't try turnin' into poison?
engSearchText:
Oh, man. Is there nothin' you won't try turnin'
into poison?
jpnChrName: ……ハハ……どうやらアンタは 状況すら“毒”に変えちまうらしいな。
jpnSearchText:
……ハハ……どうやらアンタは
状況すら“毒”に変えちまうらしいな。

engChrName: Far as I see it, you're just as bad as the one that brought in the Empire's Great Twilight.
engSearchText:
Far as I see it, you're just as bad as the one that
brought in the Empire's Great Twilight.
jpnChrName: 《帝国の黄昏》──あれを引き起こした “悪意”にすら匹敵しそうじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
《帝国の黄昏》──あれを引き起こした
“悪意”にすら匹敵しそうじゃねえか？

engChrName: Oh, not at all. I don't think I'm as amazing as all that.
engSearchText: Oh, not at all. I don't think I'm as amazing as all that.
jpnChrName: クク、別にオジサンは自分自身が 大層なモンになるつもりはねぇけどな。
jpnSearchText:
クク、別にオジサンは自分自身が
大層なモンになるつもりはねぇけどな。

engChrName: Besides, give or take about half of what I said was just a bluff.
engSearchText:
Besides, give or take about half of what I said was
just a bluff.
jpnChrName: ──それに今のは 半分以上がただのハッタリだ。
jpnSearchText:
──それに今のは
半分以上がただのハッタリだ。

engChrName: WHAT?!
engSearchText: WHAT?!
jpnChrName: はあっ！？
jpnSearchText: <S6>はあっ！？

engChrName: What he's trying to say is they weren't the only people with control of the situation.
engSearchText:
What he's trying to say is they weren't the only people
with control of the situation.
jpnChrName: 状況をコントロールしていたのは 何も“彼ら”だけでは無かったという事だ。
jpnSearchText:
状況をコントロールしていたのは
何も“彼ら”だけでは無かったという事だ。

engChrName: The CID, Heiyue, two of the church's factions, the Bracer Guild, and even Ikaruga and Marduk had influence over that situation.
engSearchText:
The CID, Heiyue, two of the church's factions, the
Bracer Guild, and even Ikaruga and Marduk had
influence over that situation.
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤも、黒月も、教会二派も、遊撃士協会も── 斑鳩やＭＫ社（我々）もあの時の“状況”を操作していた。
jpnSearchText:
ＣＩＤも、黒月も、教会二派も、遊撃士協会も──
斑鳩やＭＫ社（我々）もあの時の“状況”を操作していた。

engChrName: That is the influence these organizations were able to exert outside the scope of the game.
engSearchText:
That is the influence these organizations were able to
exert outside the scope of the game.
jpnChrName: それが組織の力であり、 あのゲームの“盤外戦”であっただろう。
jpnSearchText:
それが組織の力であり、
あのゲームの“盤外戦”であっただろう。

engChrName: The result of their fair judgment is this: a convenient blind eye.
engSearchText:
The result of their fair judgment is this: a convenient
blind eye.
jpnChrName: ──それらをフェアに評価した結果、 こういう形での“目こぼし”となったわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
──それらをフェアに評価した結果、
こういう形での“目こぼし”となったわけだ。

engChrName: With that being said, our agreement will only last until the end of the festival.
engSearchText:
With that being said, our agreement will only last
until the end of the festival.
jpnChrName: 無論、記念祭限定での無礼講ではあるが。
jpnSearchText: 無論、記念祭限定での無礼講ではあるが。

engChrName: Got it...
engSearchText: Got it...
jpnChrName: ………そういう事かよ。
jpnSearchText: ………そういう事かよ。

engChrName: Of course I've been in and out of the Blacklight District for a while, so it's more of a formality than anything.
engSearchText:
Of course I've been in and out of the Blacklight
District for a while, so it's more of a formality
than anything.
jpnChrName: クク、まあ黒芒街にはしょっちゅう来てるし 今さらって気もするがなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
クク、まあ黒芒街にはしょっちゅう来てるし
今さらって気もするがなぁ。

engChrName: So come on, Khamsin, spectacled sadist. Drink up and enjoy!
engSearchText:
So come on, Khamsin, spectacled sadist. Drink up
and enjoy!
jpnChrName: つーわけで《灼飆（カムシン）》君に鬼畜眼鏡君も じゃんっじゃん飲んでくれたまえっ。
jpnSearchText:
つーわけで《灼飆（カムシン）》君に鬼畜眼鏡君も
じゃんっじゃん飲んでくれたまえっ。

engChrName: We've got the winner of the game here, after all! Thanks for picking up the tab Arkride. Now bottoms up!
engSearchText:
We've got the winner of the game here, after all!
Thanks for picking up the tab Arkride. Now
bottoms up!
jpnChrName: ゲーム優勝者のアークライド君が 何杯でも奢ってくれるそうだからネ！
jpnSearchText:
ゲーム優勝者のアークライド君が
何杯でも奢ってくれるそうだからネ！

engChrName: I'm going to WHAT?!
engSearchText: I'm going to WHAT?!
jpnChrName: ってオイ！？
jpnSearchText: <S5>ってオイ！？

engChrName: Well, in that case...
engSearchText: Well, in that case...
jpnChrName: フフ、そういう事なら──
jpnSearchText: フフ、そういう事なら──

engChrName: There's no reason to hold back.
engSearchText: There's no reason to hold back.
jpnChrName: 遠慮なく馳走になろう。
jpnSearchText: 遠慮なく馳走になろう。

engChrName: They already emptied a thirty year old vintage Rabelais. But it's okay, dear. I'll just add it to your tab.
engSearchText:
They already emptied a thirty year old
vintage Rabelais. But it's okay, dear. I'll just add it to
your tab.
jpnChrName: ………ラヴレー３０年物空けられちゃったけど ちゃんとツケにはしてあげるからね？
jpnSearchText:
………ラヴレー３０年物空けられちゃったけど
ちゃんとツケにはしてあげるからね？

engChrName: SCREW THAT NOISE!
engSearchText: SCREW THAT NOISE!
jpnChrName: ってコラアアアアアッ！！？
jpnSearchText: <S6>ってコラアアアアアッ！！？

engChrName: Shoot! They called in demons!
engSearchText: Shoot! They called in demons!
jpnChrName: っ！　悪魔どもを呼んだか！
jpnSearchText: っ！　悪魔どもを呼んだか！

engChrName: They must be trying to protect it!
engSearchText: They must be trying to protect it!
jpnChrName: なるほど、これを守ろうと してるみたいだね！
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、これを守ろうと
してるみたいだね！

engChrName: Break the Demon Stone?
engSearchText: Break the Demon Stone?
jpnChrName: 魔石を破壊しますか？
jpnSearchText: <C1>魔石を破壊しますか？

engChrName: Break the Demon Stone?
engSearchText: Break the Demon Stone?
jpnChrName: 魔石を破壊しますか？
jpnSearchText: <C1>魔石を破壊しますか？

engChrName: Break the Demon Stone?
engSearchText: Break the Demon Stone?
jpnChrName: 魔石を破壊しますか？
jpnSearchText: <C1>魔石を破壊しますか？

engChrName: Van's group decided to take a short break.
engSearchText: Van's group decided to take a short break.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、 しばしの休憩をとることになり──
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは街の巡回の合間に、
しばしの休憩をとることになり──

engChrName: Everyone split up so they could spend their free time as they pleased.
engSearchText:
Everyone split up so they could spend their free time
as they pleased.
jpnChrName: 一時的に解散して、 それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。
jpnSearchText:
一時的に解散して、
それぞれ自由に過ごすのだった。

engChrName: *sigh* I guess I'll keep looking. I can't give up here...
engSearchText: *sigh* I guess I'll keep looking. I can't give up here...
jpnChrName: ふぅ……もう一度探してみようかな…… やっぱり諦められないですし……
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ……もう一度探してみようかな……
やっぱり諦められないですし……

engChrName: Hey there. Funny seein' you here. You look mighty busy for someone who's supposed to be on break.
engSearchText:
Hey there. Funny seein' you here. You look mighty
busy for someone who's supposed to be on break.
jpnChrName: よう、奇遇だな。 休憩中だってのに忙しそうじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
よう、奇遇だな。
休憩中だってのに忙しそうじゃないか。

engChrName: Van!
engSearchText: Van!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……！
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……！

engChrName: Heehee. Thank you for worrying.
engSearchText: Heehee. Thank you for worrying.
jpnChrName: ……あはは、どうやら 気を使わせてしまったみたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
……あはは、どうやら
気を使わせてしまったみたいですね。

engChrName: I was just passin' by. Don't think too hard about it.
engSearchText: I was just passin' by. Don't think too hard about it.
jpnChrName: さて、何の事やら分からないな。
jpnSearchText: さて、何の事やら分からないな。

engChrName: Though since I'm already here, I can always be a good boss, lend you an ear.
engSearchText:
Though since I'm already here, I can always be a good
boss, lend you an ear.
jpnChrName: だがまあ、せっかくだし話くらいなら聞くぜ？ あくまで雇い主としての範疇としてだが。
jpnSearchText:
だがまあ、せっかくだし話くらいなら聞くぜ？
あくまで雇い主としての範疇としてだが。

engChrName: Heehee. Thanks. I appreciate it.
engSearchText: Heehee. Thanks. I appreciate it.
jpnChrName: ふふ…… ……だったら、お言葉に甘えて。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ……
……だったら、お言葉に甘えて。

engChrName: So, as it happens, I lost an important book of mine somewhere around here.
engSearchText:
So, as it happens, I lost an important book of mine
somewhere around here.
jpnChrName: ……実はこの前、大切にしていた本を どこかで失くしてしまったんです。
jpnSearchText:
……実はこの前、大切にしていた本を
どこかで失くしてしまったんです。

engChrName: It's been weighing on me, so I've been coming back to look for it when I have some free time.
engSearchText:
It's been weighing on me, so I've been coming back
to look for it when I have some free time.
jpnChrName: それがずっと気がかりで…… 暇を見つけては探してるんですけど……
jpnSearchText:
それがずっと気がかりで……
暇を見つけては探してるんですけど……

engChrName: What book did you lose?
engSearchText: What book did you lose?
jpnChrName: へえ…… ちなみになんつう本なんだ？
jpnSearchText:
へえ……
ちなみになんつう本なんだ？

engChrName: It's a copy of one of the Sunshine Agnès volumes. You might've heard about them before.
engSearchText:
It's a copy of one of the Sunshine Agnès volumes.
You might've heard about them before.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんも多分ご存知ですよ。 『陽溜（ひだま）りのアニエス』です。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんも多分ご存知ですよ。
『陽溜（ひだま）りのアニエス』です。

engChrName: It's very popular and still in print, so I could technically replace it if I wanted to.
engSearchText:
It's very popular and still in print, so I could
technically replace it if I wanted to.
jpnChrName: 今でも人気で 刊行され続けている小説ですけど……
jpnSearchText:
今でも人気で
刊行され続けている小説ですけど……

engChrName: But the one I lost was a first edition print that I got as a gift from my parents ten years ago.
engSearchText:
But the one I lost was a first edition print that I got as
a gift from my parents ten years ago.
jpnChrName: 私が持っていたのは、１０年前くらいに 両親に買ってもらった初版本なんです。
jpnSearchText:
私が持っていたのは、１０年前くらいに
両親に買ってもらった初版本なんです。

engChrName: It's been with me for a long, long time.
engSearchText: It's been with me for a long, long time.
jpnChrName: それだけに、随分と年季が 入ってしまっているんですけど。
jpnSearchText:
それだけに、随分と年季が
入ってしまっているんですけど。

engChrName: And I don't want to just give up on it. It's a special book to me. I just...
engSearchText:
And I don't want to just give up on it. It's a special
book to me. I just...
jpnChrName: 長年大切にしていた本なので、 簡単には諦められなくって……
jpnSearchText:
長年大切にしていた本なので、
簡単には諦められなくって……

engChrName: Yeah, I get it. A thing stops being just a thing when it starts becomin' special to you. You just can't give it up like that.
engSearchText:
Yeah, I get it. A thing stops being just a thing when it
starts becomin' special to you. You just can't give it up
like that.
jpnChrName: ああ、その気持ちは俺にもわかるぜ…… 大事なモンは簡単に割り切れねえよな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、その気持ちは俺にもわかるぜ……
大事なモンは簡単に割り切れねえよな。

engChrName: Reminds me of when my favorite car's paint got scratched.
engSearchText:
Reminds me of when my favorite car's paint
got scratched.
jpnChrName: 俺も例のスクラップにされた愛車を ふとした時に思い出しちまうからな……
jpnSearchText:
俺も例のスクラップにされた愛車を
ふとした時に思い出しちまうからな……

engChrName: Umm, right...
engSearchText: Umm, right...
jpnChrName: あはは……
jpnSearchText: あはは……

engChrName: Though, maybe you're not too far off. It's funny, though. I hadn't paid that book much mind until now.
engSearchText:
Though, maybe you're not too far off. It's
funny, though. I hadn't paid that book much mind
until now.
jpnChrName: ……でも、そうですね。 今まではそれほど意識していませんでしたけど。
jpnSearchText:
……でも、そうですね。
今まではそれほど意識していませんでしたけど。

engChrName: I only realized it was really important to me once I lost it, I suppose.
engSearchText:
I only realized it was really important to me once I
lost it, I suppose.
jpnChrName: どれだけ私の中で大切な物だったのか、 失くして初めて気付かされたかもしれません……
jpnSearchText:
どれだけ私の中で大切な物だったのか、
失くして初めて気付かされたかもしれません……

engChrName: So? Any ideas on where it might be?
engSearchText: So? Any ideas on where it might be?
jpnChrName: ──それで？ 失くした場所に心当たりはねえのか。
jpnSearchText:
──それで？
失くした場所に心当たりはねえのか。

engChrName: Oh! Were you going to help me search?
engSearchText: Oh! Were you going to help me search?
jpnChrName: ！　もしかして 手伝っていただけるんですか？
jpnSearchText:
！　もしかして
手伝っていただけるんですか？

engChrName: Sure. I know you're keepin' it away from work by searchin' in your free time, but I still don't wanna see my assistant down in the dumps at all.
engSearchText:
Sure. I know you're keepin' it away from work by
searchin' in your free time, but I still don't wanna see
my assistant down in the dumps at all.
jpnChrName: ま、仕事に影響ないようにしてるとはいえ 助手一号がいつまでもその調子じゃ困るしな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、仕事に影響ないようにしてるとはいえ
助手一号がいつまでもその調子じゃ困るしな。

engChrName: I don't work for free, though, but I guess I can give you an employee discount.
engSearchText:
I don't work for free, though, but I guess I can give
you an employee discount.
jpnChrName: 言っとくがタダじゃねえ。 所員割引の出世払いで手伝ってやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
言っとくがタダじゃねえ。
所員割引の出世払いで手伝ってやるよ。

engChrName: Heehee. I appreciate it.
engSearchText: Heehee. I appreciate it.
jpnChrName: ……ふふっ、ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText: ……ふふっ、ありがとうございます。

engChrName: With that said, I have no clue where it might be.
engSearchText: With that said, I have no clue where it might be.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、全く見つからなくて 困っていた所なんです……
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、全く見つからなくて
困っていた所なんです……

engChrName: I lost it the other day when I was out for a stroll. I was reading it at the time.
engSearchText:
I lost it the other day when I was out for a stroll. I was
reading it at the time.
jpnChrName: この前の休日、読書しながら散歩をしていた時に 失くしてしまったはずなんですけど。
jpnSearchText:
この前の休日、読書しながら散歩をしていた時に
失くしてしまったはずなんですけど。

engChrName: I retraced my steps multiple times and asked around all the stores I stopped at, but there's no sign of it.
engSearchText:
I retraced my steps multiple times and asked around
all the stores I stopped at, but there's no sign of it.
jpnChrName: 同じ道を歩いて探してみたり、立ち寄った お店に問い合わせても見つからなくて……
jpnSearchText:
同じ道を歩いて探してみたり、立ち寄った
お店に問い合わせても見つからなくて……

engChrName: Well, that leaves a few possibilities, at least.
engSearchText: Well, that leaves a few possibilities, at least.
jpnChrName: そうなると、色々な可能性が考えられそうだが……
jpnSearchText: そうなると、色々な可能性が考えられそうだが……

engChrName: But let's make sure I have a clear picture of things. Mind if we retrace your steps one more time?
engSearchText:
But let's make sure I have a clear picture of things.
Mind if we retrace your steps one more time?
jpnChrName: まずは俺も状況を把握しておきたい。 改めてそのルートを辿って探してみないか？
jpnSearchText:
まずは俺も状況を把握しておきたい。
改めてそのルートを辿って探してみないか？

engChrName: Not at all. It might help just having another pair of eyes on it.
engSearchText:
Not at all. It might help just having another pair of
eyes on it.
jpnChrName: そうですね、 見落としがあるかもしれませんし。
jpnSearchText:
そうですね、
見落としがあるかもしれませんし。

engChrName: Who knows? Now, where do we start?
engSearchText: Who knows? Now, where do we start?
jpnChrName: おし、それじゃ早速始めるか。
jpnSearchText: おし、それじゃ早速始めるか。

engChrName: Having finished shopping with a little time to spare...
engSearchText: Having finished shopping with a little time to spare...
jpnChrName: こうして無事に買い物を終えたものの、 まだ少し時間が余っており……
jpnSearchText:
こうして無事に買い物を終えたものの、
まだ少し時間が余っており……

engChrName: ...Agnès decided to stop by Riverside to test her new art supplies.
engSearchText:
...Agnès decided to stop by Riverside to test her new
art supplies.
jpnChrName: 買った画材で試し描きをするため、 リバーサイドに立ち寄ることにした。
jpnSearchText:
買った画材で試し描きをするため、
リバーサイドに立ち寄ることにした。

engChrName: Dunno why I'm even surprised an Aramis student would knock it out of the park with art, too.
engSearchText:
Dunno why I'm even surprised an Aramis student
would knock it out of the park with art, too.
jpnChrName: へぇ……さすがはアラミス生、 サマになってるじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
へぇ……さすがはアラミス生、
サマになってるじゃねえか。

engChrName: All I'm really doing is applying what we learned in class.
engSearchText:
All I'm really doing is applying what we learned
in class.
jpnChrName: あはは、授業で習っている程度ですけど。
jpnSearchText: あはは、授業で習っている程度ですけど。

engChrName: But it's nice, spending an occasional off day painting like this.
engSearchText:
But it's nice, spending an occasional off day painting
like this.
jpnChrName: ……ふふ、たまにはいいですね、 こうして休日に絵を描くというのも。
jpnSearchText:
……ふふ、たまにはいいですね、
こうして休日に絵を描くというのも。

engChrName: The light reflecting off the river surface is beautiful, and the breeze feels quite nice. It's fun.
engSearchText:
The light reflecting off the river surface is beautiful,
and the breeze feels quite nice. It's fun.
jpnChrName: 水面に反射した光が綺麗ですし、 風も気持ちよくて……なんだか楽しいです。
jpnSearchText:
水面に反射した光が綺麗ですし、
風も気持ちよくて……なんだか楽しいです。

engChrName: Good to hear. Though painting the cityscape feels a fair bit advanced.
engSearchText:
Good to hear. Though painting the cityscape feels a
fair bit advanced.
jpnChrName: そいつは結構。 街中でってのは中々上級者だろうけどな。
jpnSearchText:
そいつは結構。
街中でってのは中々上級者だろうけどな。

engChrName: Really? I feel like I see painters doing it all the time.
engSearchText: Really? I feel like I see painters doing it all the time.
jpnChrName: そうですか？ たまに見かけますけど。
jpnSearchText:
そうですか？
たまに見かけますけど。

engChrName: Come to think of it, Aramis the artist himself drew a number of Edith's cityscapes, I believe.
engSearchText:
Come to think of it, Aramis the artist himself drew a
number of Edith's cityscapes, I believe.
jpnChrName: そういえば、芸術家アラミスも よくイーディスの絵を描いてたみたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、芸術家アラミスも
よくイーディスの絵を描いてたみたいですね。

engChrName: If I recall correctly, his earlier works depicted immigrants who'd been turned away from their homes.
engSearchText:
If I recall correctly, his earlier works depicted
immigrants who'd been turned away from
their homes.
jpnChrName: それ以外にも住む家を無くした移民を描いた 風刺画的なものから……
jpnSearchText:
それ以外にも住む家を無くした移民を描いた
風刺画的なものから……

engChrName: His later works depicted the streets of Edith after the Calvardian Revolution. The biggest constant is he always paints people, not just landscapes.
engSearchText:
His later works depicted the streets of Edith after
the Calvardian Revolution. The biggest constant
is he always paints people, not just landscapes.
jpnChrName: カルバード革命後に湧き上がる 街の人々の様子を描いたものまで。
jpnSearchText:
カルバード革命後に湧き上がる
街の人々の様子を描いたものまで。

engChrName: That's not a surprise, comin' from one of the main parties behind the revolution, and your school's founder.
engSearchText:
That's not a surprise, comin' from one of the main
parties behind the revolution, and your
school's founder.
jpnChrName: お前の学校を創設した芸術家にして、 カルバード革命の立役者のうちの一人だったか。
jpnSearchText:
お前の学校を創設した芸術家にして、
カルバード革命の立役者のうちの一人だったか。

engChrName: Though I also heard he was a real weirdo. As all artists tend to be.
engSearchText:
Though I also heard he was a real weirdo. As all
artists tend to be.
jpnChrName: 相当な変人だったって話も聞いた事があるが。
jpnSearchText: 相当な変人だったって話も聞いた事があるが。

engChrName: Haha, I don't think you're far off. I've heard of his eccentricities in some of my classes.
engSearchText:
Haha, I don't think you're far off. I've heard of his
eccentricities in some of my classes.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、そうですね。 学校の授業でもそんな風に聞いています。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、そうですね。
学校の授業でもそんな風に聞いています。

engChrName: But sitting here right now, painting the city landscape just as he did, helps me imagine what he might've thought of as he did this, too.
engSearchText:
But sitting here right now, painting the city landscape
just as he did, helps me imagine what he might've
thought of as he did this, too.
jpnChrName: でも、こうして街中で絵を描いていると アラミスの気持ちも分かる気がします。
jpnSearchText:
でも、こうして街中で絵を描いていると
アラミスの気持ちも分かる気がします。

engChrName: I can't help but think that he would've wanted the peaceful joy he painted on his canvas to reflect forever outside of it, too.
engSearchText:
I can't help but think that he would've wanted the
peaceful joy he painted on his canvas to reflect forever
outside of it, too.
jpnChrName: この穏やかな活気がずっと続くといいなと…… 彼も願っていたんじゃないでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
この穏やかな活気がずっと続くといいなと……
彼も願っていたんじゃないでしょうか。

engChrName: You might not be far off there.
engSearchText: You might not be far off there.
jpnChrName: ハッ……どうだかねぇ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ……どうだかねぇ。

engChrName: Oh, no way! So, you know...
engSearchText: Oh, no way! So, you know...
jpnChrName: ……アハハ、それでさー……
jpnSearchText: ……アハハ、それでさー……

engChrName: What? You're kidding!
engSearchText: What? You're kidding!
jpnChrName: ……えー、マジでー？……
jpnSearchText: ……えー、マジでー？……

engChrName: Oh, they're Aramis students. They're probably on their way back home after their club activities.
engSearchText:
Oh, they're Aramis students. They're probably on
their way back home after their club activities.
jpnChrName: あっ、アラミスの生徒ですね。 部活帰りとかでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
あっ、アラミスの生徒ですね。
部活帰りとかでしょうか。

engChrName: Lemme know if I'm being rude or anything, but I kinda think you should've joined a club yourself.
engSearchText:
Lemme know if I'm being rude or anything, but I
kinda think you should've joined a club yourself.
jpnChrName: ……余計な世話かもしれねえが お前はやらねえのか？
jpnSearchText:
……余計な世話かもしれねえが
お前はやらねえのか？

engChrName: I appreciate your concern, but I'm fine. I'm more than happy keeping busy after school and on the weekends with my part-time job.
engSearchText:
I appreciate your concern, but I'm fine. I'm more than
happy keeping busy after school and on the weekends
with my part-time job.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、いいんです。 放課後や休日はバイトって決めていますし。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、いいんです。
放課後や休日はバイトって決めていますし。

engChrName: It's taught me a great deal, just working with you and everyone at the office. And, needless to say, I enjoy it a lot, too.
engSearchText:
It's taught me a great deal, just working with you and
everyone at the office. And, needless to say, I enjoy it
a lot, too.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんや事務所の皆と働けて 勉強になっていますし、何より楽しいですから。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんや事務所の皆と働けて
勉強になっていますし、何より楽しいですから。

engChrName: Of course, I do still make time to contribute to school activities when the time allows for it.
engSearchText:
Of course, I do still make time to contribute to school
activities when the time allows for it.
jpnChrName: それに、学校では合間の時間に 手伝わせてもらってる事もありますしね。
jpnSearchText:
それに、学校では合間の時間に
手伝わせてもらってる事もありますしね。

engChrName: Well, if you're enjoyin' your student life, then there's no reason for me to butt in.
engSearchText:
Well, if you're enjoyin' your student life, then there's
no reason for me to butt in.
jpnChrName: ま、学生生活が充実してんなら 俺から言う事はねえけどな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、学生生活が充実してんなら
俺から言う事はねえけどな。

engChrName: You're not the kind to neglect school and flunk out just 'cause of a part-time job.
engSearchText:
You're not the kind to neglect school and flunk out
just 'cause of a part-time job.
jpnChrName: お前の事だから、バイトにかまけて テストで赤点取るって事もねえんだろうし。
jpnSearchText:
お前の事だから、バイトにかまけて
テストで赤点取るって事もねえんだろうし。

engChrName: I agree there. I have always liked studying, to be frank, so it hardly feels like a burden.
engSearchText:
I agree there. I have always liked studying, to be
frank, so it hardly feels like a burden.
jpnChrName: あはは……そうですね。 元々勉強は好きなので苦ではないですけど。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……そうですね。
元々勉強は好きなので苦ではないですけど。

engChrName: I like organizing study groups in my free time. Studying with friends is surprisingly effective. There's always something new to learn from others.
engSearchText:
I like organizing study groups in my free time.
Studying with friends is surprisingly effective.
There's always something new to learn from others.
jpnChrName: 休み時間にお友達と勉強会を開いて、 教え合ったりして……
jpnSearchText:
休み時間にお友達と勉強会を開いて、
教え合ったりして……

engChrName: You can never truly stop learning. It's hard at times, but it's also very rewarding.
engSearchText:
You can never truly stop learning. It's hard at times,
but it's also very rewarding.
jpnChrName: 覚える事が多くて大変でも、 楽しくやっていますよ。
jpnSearchText:
覚える事が多くて大変でも、
楽しくやっていますよ。

engChrName: Yeah, I trust you. Just don't go missin' out on quality time with your friends just 'cause you're busy with your job, okay?
engSearchText:
Yeah, I trust you. Just don't go missin' out on quality
time with your friends just 'cause you're busy with
your job, okay?
jpnChrName: ハッ、バイトに入るのもいいが、 たまにはダチと遊んどけよ？
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、バイトに入るのもいいが、
たまにはダチと遊んどけよ？

engChrName: The friends you make in school have the potential to be some of the best you'll ever make. And this is basically your only chance to ever do that.
engSearchText:
The friends you make in school have the potential to
be some of the best you'll ever make. And this is
basically your only chance to ever do that.
jpnChrName: 学生時代の縁ってのは貴重だ。 歳喰ってから眩しくなっても遅いからな。
jpnSearchText:
学生時代の縁ってのは貴重だ。
歳喰ってから眩しくなっても遅いからな。

engChrName: Oh. I...will keep that in mind.
engSearchText: Oh. I...will keep that in mind.
jpnChrName: ……？ ふふっ、肝に銘じておきます。
jpnSearchText:
……？
ふふっ、肝に銘じておきます。

engChrName: Ugh... I thought she said she was working a part time job, but they just went shopping and now they're even painting...
engSearchText:
Ugh... I thought she said she was working a part time
job, but they just went shopping and now they're
even painting...
jpnChrName: くっ……アルバイトって話だったんじゃないのか？ 二人で買い物して、絵なんて描いて……
jpnSearchText:
くっ……アルバイトって話だったんじゃないのか？
二人で買い物して、絵なんて描いて……

engChrName: This is so suspicious... I need to look into this more.
engSearchText: This is so suspicious... I need to look into this more.
jpnChrName: やっぱり怪しいぞ…… もう少し、聞き込みをしてみないと。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり怪しいぞ……
もう少し、聞き込みをしてみないと。

engChrName: Van and Agnès returned to their patrols after she was done with her painting.
engSearchText:
Van and Agnès returned to their patrols after she was
done with her painting.
jpnChrName: その後、アニエスが試し描きを終えてから 裏解決業務に戻るのだった。
jpnSearchText:
その後、アニエスが試し描きを終えてから
裏解決業務に戻るのだった。

engChrName: Van left the office after the rain let up, gang member in tow.
engSearchText:
Van left the office after the rain let up, gang member
in tow.
jpnChrName: その後、雨が少し止んだ隙を狙って ヴァンたちは事務所を出発した。
jpnSearchText:
その後、雨が少し止んだ隙を狙って
ヴァンたちは事務所を出発した。

engChrName: As he put it, there would be a major fight between gangs that had each team's very existence on the line.
engSearchText:
As he put it, there would be a major fight between
gangs that had each team's very existence on the line.
jpnChrName: 今夜、チーム同士の存亡を賭けた 大規模な抗争がある──
jpnSearchText:
今夜、チーム同士の存亡を賭けた
大規模な抗争がある──

engChrName: Van headed to the site of the conflict, concerned by the gang member's hopefully overwrought claims.
engSearchText:
Van headed to the site of the conflict, concerned by
the gang member's hopefully overwrought claims.
jpnChrName: そんな不良の大げさな言葉を聞き流しつつ、 現地へと案内させたのだった。
jpnSearchText:
そんな不良の大げさな言葉を聞き流しつつ、
現地へと案内させたのだった。

engChrName: That's him! He's the one! Ahh! He's already kickin' ass!
engSearchText:
That's him! He's the one! Ahh! He's already
kickin' ass!
jpnChrName: ああっ、アイツッス！ ってうわあ、もうやられてる！
jpnSearchText:
ああっ、アイツッス！
ってうわあ、もうやられてる！

engChrName: Damn it. Of freakin' course.
engSearchText: Damn it. Of freakin' course.
jpnChrName: ……やっぱりか。
jpnSearchText: ……やっぱりか。

engChrName: You took your sweet ass time getting here, you know!
engSearchText: You took your sweet ass time getting here, you know!
jpnChrName: よお、遅かったな？ 待ちくたびれちまったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
よお、遅かったな？
待ちくたびれちまったぜ。

engChrName: Aaron, bro, you're amazing!
engSearchText: Aaron, bro, you're amazing!
jpnChrName: さすがアーロンの兄貴だぜ！
jpnSearchText: さすがアーロンの兄貴だぜ！

engChrName: You're damn invincible!
engSearchText: You're damn invincible!
jpnChrName: もう敵なしっス！
jpnSearchText: もう敵なしっス！

engChrName: Nah, these babies are just weak as shit. But that's okay. They're just the appetizer. Looks like the main course finally walked right in.
engSearchText:
Nah, these babies are just weak as shit. But
that's okay. They're just the appetizer. Looks like the
main course finally walked right in.
jpnChrName: あいつらが弱すぎるだけだっつの。 で、ようやく相手側の助っ人登場ってかァ？
jpnSearchText:
あいつらが弱すぎるだけだっつの。
で、ようやく相手側の助っ人登場ってかァ？

engChrName: Had a feelin' it was you. For cryin' out loud...
engSearchText: Had a feelin' it was you. For cryin' out loud...
jpnChrName: やっぱお前だったか……
jpnSearchText: やっぱお前だったか……

engChrName: I knew you were out, messin' around at night, but it didn't even cross my mind to think you'd be running with brats like these.
engSearchText:
I knew you were out, messin' around at night, but it
didn't even cross my mind to think you'd be running
with brats like these.
jpnChrName: 最近毎日夜遊びしてると思ったら、 こんなヤンチャをやってるとはな。
jpnSearchText:
最近毎日夜遊びしてると思ったら、
こんなヤンチャをやってるとはな。

engChrName: Hey, they're the ones that wanted to pick a fight with me when I was just chilling in the Tyrell District.
engSearchText:
Hey, they're the ones that wanted to pick a fight with
me when I was just chilling in the Tyrell District.
jpnChrName: この間、タイレル地区をぶらついてる時に こいつらに絡まれてなァ。
jpnSearchText:
この間、タイレル地区をぶらついてる時に
こいつらに絡まれてなァ。

engChrName: I just taught them not to screw with me, but they practically up and begged me to be their boss.
engSearchText:
I just taught them not to screw with me, but they
practically up and begged me to be their boss.
jpnChrName: ちょっと懲らしめてやったら オレの舎弟になるって言いだした。
jpnSearchText:
ちょっと懲らしめてやったら
オレの舎弟になるって言いだした。

engChrName: Who am I to say no? Especially since they asked so nicely. Thought I might as well keep an eye on them and lend a hand here and there.
engSearchText:
Who am I to say no? Especially since they asked
so nicely. Thought I might as well keep an eye on
them and lend a hand here and there.
jpnChrName: だからこうしてちょいと 舎弟の手助けをしてやってるワケだ。
jpnSearchText:
だからこうしてちょいと
舎弟の手助けをしてやってるワケだ。

engChrName: And don't worry. I'm not stupid enough to get any outsiders wrapped up in this mess.
engSearchText:
And don't worry. I'm not stupid enough to get any
outsiders wrapped up in this mess.
jpnChrName: ま、無関係なヤツは巻き込んでねえから 安心しろ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、無関係なヤツは巻き込んでねえから
安心しろ。

engChrName: Wait... My spriggan, my dude. You know him?!
engSearchText: Wait... My spriggan, my dude. You know him?!
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋のアニキはあの余所もんと 知り合いだったのか！？
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋のアニキはあの余所もんと
知り合いだったのか！？

engChrName: Unfortunately.
engSearchText: Unfortunately.
jpnChrName: まあな。
jpnSearchText: まあな。

engChrName: Whatever, man. You're here to help those chumps out, right?
engSearchText:
Whatever, man. You're here to help those chumps
out, right?
jpnChrName: んなことより、アンタが そいつらの助っ人だな？
jpnSearchText:
んなことより、アンタが
そいつらの助っ人だな？

engChrName: Let's throw down already, then! Getting to hand you your ass will be the perfect cherry on top for the night!
engSearchText:
Let's throw down already, then! Getting to hand you
your ass will be the perfect cherry on top for
the night!
jpnChrName: だったらかかってこいや。 シメとしてはちょうどいい。
jpnSearchText:
だったらかかってこいや。
シメとしてはちょうどいい。

engChrName: We got some unfinished business from back in Langport to settle. We never did get a clear winner out of those fights.
engSearchText:
We got some unfinished business from back in
Langport to settle. We never did get a clear winner
out of those fights.
jpnChrName: ラングポートで何回かやり合ったが ケリつかなかったからなァ？
jpnSearchText:
ラングポートで何回かやり合ったが
ケリつかなかったからなァ？

engChrName: C'mon, bro! Show this red-haired idiot what's what! You got this—
engSearchText:
C'mon, bro! Show this red-haired idiot what's what!
You got this—
jpnChrName: や、やっちゃってくださいッス！ アニキなら──
jpnSearchText:
や、やっちゃってくださいッス！
アニキなら──

engChrName: Nah, I'm good.
engSearchText: Nah, I'm good.
jpnChrName: いいや、やめとくぜ。
jpnSearchText: いいや、やめとくぜ。

engChrName: What?! C'mon, bro! You said you were gonna help us!
engSearchText:
What?! C'mon, bro! You said you were gonna
help us!
jpnChrName: えええええっ！？ 手伝ってくれるんじゃ……！
jpnSearchText:
えええええっ！？
手伝ってくれるんじゃ……！

engChrName: I said I'd take a look. You're the one that jumped to conclusions.
engSearchText:
I said I'd take a look. You're the one that jumped
to conclusions.
jpnChrName: 様子は見てやるとは言ったが そこまでやってやるとは言ってねぇしな。
jpnSearchText:
様子は見てやるとは言ったが
そこまでやってやるとは言ってねぇしな。

engChrName: Man, you chickening out?
engSearchText: Man, you chickening out?
jpnChrName: ハン、逃げんのかよ？
jpnSearchText: ハン、逃げんのかよ？

engChrName: Ain't gettin' paid enough for this. Actually, I'm not gettin' paid at all. This pain in the ass ain't worth it.
engSearchText:
Ain't gettin' paid enough for this. Actually, I'm not
gettin' paid at all. This pain in the ass ain't worth it.
jpnChrName: １ミラの得もしなさそうだしなぁ。 その時点で引き受ける義理はねえだろ。
jpnSearchText:
１ミラの得もしなさそうだしなぁ。
その時点で引き受ける義理はねえだろ。

engChrName: Hell, aren't you twenty already? It's about damn time you stop foolin' around like you're just a kid. It's embarrassing.
engSearchText:
Hell, aren't you twenty already? It's about damn time
you stop foolin' around like you're just a kid.
It's embarrassing.
jpnChrName: お前もこないだ二十歳になったばかりだろ？ こういうのはそろそろ卒業しとけや。
jpnSearchText:
お前もこないだ二十歳になったばかりだろ？
こういうのはそろそろ卒業しとけや。

engChrName: Later.
engSearchText: Later.
jpnChrName: そんじゃあな。
jpnSearchText: そんじゃあな。

engChrName: ...Damn.
engSearchText: ...Damn.
jpnChrName: ……チッ。
jpnSearchText: ……チッ。

engChrName: Oh, no...
engSearchText: Oh, no...
jpnChrName: そんなぁ……
jpnSearchText: そんなぁ……

engChrName: Hell yeah! You're the best, bro!
engSearchText: Hell yeah! You're the best, bro!
jpnChrName: ひゃっほう、やったぜアニキ！
jpnSearchText: ひゃっほう、やったぜアニキ！

engChrName: That means Riverside's our turf now!
engSearchText: That means Riverside's our turf now!
jpnChrName: これでリバーサイドも オレたちの縄張りだぜ！
jpnSearchText:
これでリバーサイドも
オレたちの縄張りだぜ！

engChrName: Now, it's time for the curtain call!
engSearchText: Now, it's time for the curtain call!
jpnChrName: ──そんじゃ、 最後の仕上げといくかァ……！
jpnSearchText:
──そんじゃ、
最後の仕上げといくかァ……！

engChrName: Wha—?!
engSearchText: Wha—?!
jpnChrName: なっ！？
jpnSearchText: なっ！？

engChrName: Y-You blocked it?!
engSearchText: Y-You blocked it?!
jpnChrName: 今のを防いだだと！？
jpnSearchText: 今のを防いだだと！？

engChrName: The hell?! You're on the same team!
engSearchText: The hell?! You're on the same team!
jpnChrName: えええっ！？ ど、どうして仲間を……！？
jpnSearchText:
えええっ！？
ど、どうして仲間を……！？

engChrName: I'm not an idiot, you know. I saw this coming ages ago. You just wanted me to clean house, right from the start.
engSearchText:
I'm not an idiot, you know. I saw this coming
ages ago. You just wanted me to clean house, right
from the start.
jpnChrName: ハッ、バレバレなんだよ。 ずっと狙ってただろ、テメーら。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、バレバレなんだよ。
ずっと狙ってただろ、テメーら。

engChrName: All so you'd get to expand your territory and assimilate the punks from this district before handing them over to some bigger gang.
engSearchText:
All so you'd get to expand your territory and
assimilate the punks from this district before handing
them over to some bigger gang.
jpnChrName: オレを利用してここらの不良どもをシメて 勢力を広げ、やがて半グレどもの手駒にする──
jpnSearchText:
オレを利用してここらの不良どもをシメて
勢力を広げ、やがて半グレどもの手駒にする──

engChrName: Just another job for you, right? But you should know dealing with me is way above your pay grade.
engSearchText:
Just another job for you, right? But you should know
dealing with me is way above your pay grade.
jpnChrName: 持ちかけられたバイトにせよ オレ相手ってのは割が合わねえんじゃねぇか？
jpnSearchText:
持ちかけられたバイトにせよ
オレ相手ってのは割が合わねえんじゃねぇか？

engChrName: Y-You knew the whole plan?!
engSearchText: Y-You knew the whole plan?!
jpnChrName: そ、そこまで見抜いて……！？
jpnSearchText: そ、そこまで見抜いて……！？

engChrName: Come on, don't get scared now! He's the only one remaining—
engSearchText:
Come on, don't get scared now! He's the only one
remaining—
jpnChrName: クッ、怯むんじゃねえ！ あとはヤツさえやっちまえば──
jpnSearchText:
クッ、怯むんじゃねえ！
あとはヤツさえやっちまえば──

engChrName: Yeah... No.
engSearchText: Yeah... No.
jpnChrName: おっと、そこまでだ。
jpnSearchText: おっと、そこまでだ。

engChrName: What?!
engSearchText: What?!
jpnChrName: っ！？　てめえは……！
jpnSearchText: っ！？　てめえは……！

engChrName: Spriggan, my dude!
engSearchText: Spriggan, my dude!
jpnChrName: ああっ、裏解決屋の兄さん！？
jpnSearchText: ああっ、裏解決屋の兄さん！？

engChrName: Thought you'd gone home already.
engSearchText: Thought you'd gone home already.
jpnChrName: あァ、帰ったんじゃなかったのかよ。
jpnSearchText: あァ、帰ったんじゃなかったのかよ。

engChrName: Nah. I'm the adult around here, and that means I gotta keep an eye on y'all and make sure you kids don't do something stupid.
engSearchText:
Nah. I'm the adult around here, and that means I
gotta keep an eye on y'all and make sure you kids
don't do something stupid.
jpnChrName: まあ、ガキどもの喧嘩を見守んのも 大人の役目ってヤツだからな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、ガキどもの喧嘩を見守んのも
大人の役目ってヤツだからな。

engChrName: Don't act so surprised, though. You knew what I was up to already.
engSearchText:
Don't act so surprised, though. You knew what I was
up to already.
jpnChrName: つーか分かってて付き合ってたのかよ？
jpnSearchText: つーか分かってて付き合ってたのかよ？

engChrName: Yeah. What do you think of my distraction game?
engSearchText: Yeah. What do you think of my distraction game?
jpnChrName: いい暇つぶしにはなったぜ？
jpnSearchText: いい暇つぶしにはなったぜ？

engChrName: Cocky as always.
engSearchText: Cocky as always.
jpnChrName: ったく……
jpnSearchText: ったく……

engChrName: Anyway. You kids are in for some real tough shit if you keep this up. It's one thing to get into a smalltime gang or whatever.
engSearchText:
Anyway. You kids are in for some real tough shit if
you keep this up. It's one thing to get into a smalltime
gang or whatever.
jpnChrName: 不良チーム同士のケンカ程度なら ヤンチャのうちで済ませてやるが……
jpnSearchText:
不良チーム同士のケンカ程度なら
ヤンチャのうちで済ませてやるが……

engChrName: But getting involved with real gangsters crosses the line. I can't ignore that anymore.
engSearchText:
But getting involved with real gangsters crosses
the line. I can't ignore that anymore.
jpnChrName: 半グレ共に関わっちまうのはアウトだ、 さすがに見過ごすわけにはいかねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
半グレ共に関わっちまうのはアウトだ、
さすがに見過ごすわけにはいかねぇな。

engChrName: You ain't gettin' your ass out of this one. You screwed yourselves over the second you even looked at 'em.
engSearchText:
You ain't gettin' your ass out of this one. You screwed
yourselves over the second you even looked at 'em.
jpnChrName: ま、後戻りできなくなってから 後悔しても遅いってな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、後戻りできなくなってから
後悔しても遅いってな。

engChrName: I-I don't need a lecture from you, asshole!
engSearchText: I-I don't need a lecture from you, asshole!
jpnChrName: う、うるせえ……！！
jpnSearchText: う、うるせえ……！！

engChrName: You two might be strong, but we win in numbers!
engSearchText: You two might be strong, but we win in numbers!
jpnChrName: いくら強かろうとこの人数を 同時に相手できるわけがねぇ！
jpnSearchText:
いくら強かろうとこの人数を
同時に相手できるわけがねぇ！

engChrName: Come on, show them who's boss!
engSearchText: Come on, show them who's boss!
jpnChrName: やっちまえ、野郎ども！！
jpnSearchText: やっちまえ、野郎ども！！

engChrName: In one ear and out the other. Might as well have some fun, then!
engSearchText:
In one ear and out the other. Might as well have some
fun, then!
jpnChrName: ああ、そうかよ……！ だったら──
jpnSearchText:
ああ、そうかよ……！
だったら──

engChrName: Time to teach you a lesson!
engSearchText: Time to teach you a lesson!
jpnChrName: 少し頭を冷やしてもらおうか！
jpnSearchText: 少し頭を冷やしてもらおうか！

engChrName: Argh...
engSearchText: Argh...
jpnChrName: ぐえっ……
jpnSearchText: ぐえっ……

engChrName: Th-They're so strong...
engSearchText: Th-They're so strong...

engChrName: You two're AMAZING! You fought all of them off without breaking a sweat!
engSearchText:
You two're AMAZING! You fought all of them off
without breaking a sweat!
jpnChrName: すげえ……たった二人で こんな数に勝っちまうなんて……！
jpnSearchText:
すげえ……たった二人で
こんな数に勝っちまうなんて……！

engChrName: Are all of Edith's punks this shitty? 'Cause these guys could barely put up a fight.
engSearchText:
Are all of Edith's punks this shitty? 'Cause these guys
could barely put up a fight.
jpnChrName: ハ、手応えねぇな。 首都の不良なんざこの程度かよ。
jpnSearchText:
ハ、手応えねぇな。
首都の不良なんざこの程度かよ。

engChrName: I'm sure as hell not getting involved with any more of these smalltime gangsters.
engSearchText:
I'm sure as hell not getting involved with any more of
these smalltime gangsters.
jpnChrName: ──ま、これに懲りたら 半グレに関わんのなんざやめとけ。
jpnSearchText:
──ま、これに懲りたら
半グレに関わんのなんざやめとけ。

engChrName: Wanna help me clean up this mess, old fart?
engSearchText: Wanna help me clean up this mess, old fart?
jpnChrName: 手を切る流れでモメるようなら こっちのオッサンに相談するとかな？
jpnSearchText:
手を切る流れでモメるようなら
こっちのオッサンに相談するとかな？

engChrName: Gonna charge you extra just for that.
engSearchText: Gonna charge you extra just for that.
jpnChrName: やれやれ…… まあミラと筋次第だけどな。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……
まあミラと筋次第だけどな。

engChrName: Afterwards, the persistent conflict between the two local gangs came to a close.
engSearchText:
Afterwards, the persistent conflict between the two
local gangs came to a close.
jpnChrName: こうして細々と続いていた 不良グループの抗争はいったん終結し……
jpnSearchText:
こうして細々と続いていた
不良グループの抗争はいったん終結し……

engChrName: Van and Aaron left the scene after sending an anonymous tip to the police, leaving them to handle the rest.
engSearchText:
Van and Aaron left the scene after sending an
anonymous tip to the police, leaving them to handle
the rest.
jpnChrName: 警察へ匿名で連絡して後始末を任せてから ヴァンたちはその場を後にした。
jpnSearchText:
警察へ匿名で連絡して後始末を任せてから
ヴァンたちはその場を後にした。

engChrName: Not gonna lie. Got my suspicions when I heard you were gettin' involved with some local street punks here.
engSearchText:
Not gonna lie. Got my suspicions when I heard you
were gettin' involved with some local street
punks here.
jpnChrName: ……しかし最初にお前が不良たちと絡んでる かもしれねえって聞いた時は──
jpnSearchText:
……しかし最初にお前が不良たちと絡んでる
かもしれねえって聞いた時は──

engChrName: Worried you were tryin' to build a replacement for the crew you lost in Langport.
engSearchText:
Worried you were tryin' to build a replacement for
the crew you lost in Langport.
jpnChrName: ラングポートの仲間たちの代わりを 作ろうとしてんじゃねえかと思ったんだが。
jpnSearchText:
ラングポートの仲間たちの代わりを
作ろうとしてんじゃねえかと思ったんだが。

engChrName: Nah, man, I wouldn't do that. There's no way I could replace them.
engSearchText:
Nah, man, I wouldn't do that. There's no way I could
replace them.
jpnChrName: んなわけねえだろ。 ……あいつらの代わりなんざいるかよ。
jpnSearchText:
んなわけねえだろ。
……あいつらの代わりなんざいるかよ。

engChrName: But, like...yeah, those punks were pretty nasty, but they weren't rotten to their cores. Not yet, anyway.
engSearchText:
But, like...yeah, those punks were pretty nasty, but
they weren't rotten to their cores. Not yet, anyway.
jpnChrName: ただ……あんなガラの悪い連中でも、 根っからの悪人ってわけじゃねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ただ……あんなガラの悪い連中でも、
根っからの悪人ってわけじゃねぇ。

engChrName: They just didn't know any other way to live. And I don't believe not knowing any better's a grave enough crime to damn them forever.
engSearchText:
They just didn't know any other way to live. And I
don't believe not knowing any better's a grave enough
crime to damn them forever.
jpnChrName: ただ生き方を知らねえだけだ── それが罪だとはオレには思えねぇんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
ただ生き方を知らねえだけだ──
それが罪だとはオレには思えねぇんだよ。

engChrName: So you decided to get involved to fix things?
engSearchText: So you decided to get involved to fix things?
jpnChrName: ハッ…… だからとことん付き合ってやったわけか。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……
だからとことん付き合ってやったわけか。

engChrName: All for some group of Edith punks you barely knew... Well, shit could've gone worse, I guess.
engSearchText:
All for some group of Edith punks you barely knew...
Well, shit could've gone worse, I guess.
jpnChrName: よく知りもしねぇ首都の不良のために ……ま、悪くねえ落とし所だろ。
jpnSearchText:
よく知りもしねぇ首都の不良のために
……ま、悪くねえ落とし所だろ。

engChrName: You're thinking too hard about it. I wasn't trying to play nice like that.
engSearchText:
You're thinking too hard about it. I wasn't trying to
play nice like that.
jpnChrName: 今日のは成り行きだ成り行き。
jpnSearchText: 今日のは成り行きだ成り行き。

engChrName: Sure, sure. We'll stick with that if it helps you sleep at night, kid.
engSearchText:
Sure, sure. We'll stick with that if it helps you sleep at
night, kid.
jpnChrName: そういうことにしてやるよ。
jpnSearchText: そういうことにしてやるよ。

engChrName: Tch...
engSearchText: Tch...
jpnChrName: チッ……
jpnSearchText: チッ……

engChrName: Aaron soon left, planning to enjoy the city at night for a while longer before heading back.
engSearchText:
Aaron soon left, planning to enjoy the city at night
for a while longer before heading back.
jpnChrName: その後、夜の街で遊んで帰るという アーロンと別れ……
jpnSearchText:
その後、夜の街で遊んで帰るという
アーロンと別れ……

engChrName: After that, Van returned to his nightly patrol.
engSearchText: After that, Van returned to his nightly patrol.
jpnChrName: ヴァンも夜の巡回を再開するのだった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ヴァンも夜の巡回を再開するのだった。

engChrName: Van received a call from Judith.
engSearchText: Van received a call from Judith.
jpnChrName: ヴァンはジュディスに連絡をとり……
jpnSearchText: <C1>ヴァンはジュディスに連絡をとり……

engChrName: Together they headed to the site of Grimcat's supposed latest heist.
engSearchText:
Together they headed to the site of Grimcat's
supposed latest heist.
jpnChrName: ちょうど今夜も発生したという グリムキャッツの犯行現場で合流した。
jpnSearchText:
ちょうど今夜も発生したという
グリムキャッツの犯行現場で合流した。

engChrName: Thank you for coming, Van.
engSearchText: Thank you for coming, Van.
jpnChrName: 来てくれて感謝するわ、ヴァン。
jpnSearchText: 来てくれて感謝するわ、ヴァン。

engChrName: Don't sweat it. If something's bugging you, better take care of it ASAP.
engSearchText:
Don't sweat it. If something's bugging you, better
take care of it ASAP.
jpnChrName: ま、胡散臭い話は とっとと片付けるに限るだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、胡散臭い話は
とっとと片付けるに限るだろ。

engChrName: So, what are we looking at? Is this where Grimcat hit?
engSearchText:
So, what are we looking at? Is this where
Grimcat hit?
jpnChrName: で、あれか？ グリムキャッツが現れたってのは。
jpnSearchText:
で、あれか？
グリムキャッツが現れたってのは。

engChrName: You mean the FAKE Grimcat!
engSearchText: You mean the FAKE Grimcat!
jpnChrName: あくまでもニ・セ・モ・ノのね！
jpnSearchText: あくまでもニ・セ・モ・ノのね！

engChrName: There was this fake calling card left behind.
engSearchText: There was this fake calling card left behind.
jpnChrName: ──現場にこの犯行メモが 残されていたらしいわ。
jpnSearchText:
──現場にこの犯行メモが
残されていたらしいわ。

engChrName: 'The Phantom Thief Grimcat has stolen your treasure!'
engSearchText:
'The Phantom Thief Grimcat has stolen
your treasure!'
jpnChrName: 『怪盗グリムキャッツ参上！   貴方のお宝、頂戴したわ❤』
jpnSearchText:
『怪盗グリムキャッツ参上！
貴方のお宝、頂戴したわ❤』

engChrName: It's just chicken scratch on a dirty piece of paper.
engSearchText: It's just chicken scratch on a dirty piece of paper.
jpnChrName: ……小汚い紙にペンで手書きか。
jpnSearchText: ……小汚い紙にペンで手書きか。

engChrName: I know, right? RIGHT?! Talk about disrespect!
engSearchText: I know, right? RIGHT?! Talk about disrespect!
jpnChrName: そうなのよ！ マジでナメすぎでしょ！？
jpnSearchText:
そうなのよ！
マジでナメすぎでしょ！？

engChrName: If they're going to go around, posing as me, they could AT LEAST put some effort into it! Like matching the stationery at least!
engSearchText:
If they're going to go around, posing as me, they
could AT LEAST put some effort into it!
Like matching the stationery at least!
jpnChrName: どうせならいつも使ってるカードを 精巧に真似るくらいの気概を見せて欲しいもんだわ！
jpnSearchText:
どうせならいつも使ってるカードを
精巧に真似るくらいの気概を見せて欲しいもんだわ！

engChrName: That really what's botherin' you here? Actually, no. How'd you even get that in the first place?
engSearchText:
That really what's botherin' you here? Actually, no.
How'd you even get that in the first place?
jpnChrName: 怒るところはそこじゃねえだろ…… つうかどうやってんなモン手に入れたんだ？
jpnSearchText:
怒るところはそこじゃねえだろ……
つうかどうやってんなモン手に入れたんだ？

engChrName: After tracing their steps, I was able to predict where they would strike next. Sort of...
engSearchText:
After tracing their steps, I was able to predict where
they would strike next. Sort of...
jpnChrName: これまでの傾向からある程度 犯行の予測は立てていてね。
jpnSearchText:
これまでの傾向からある程度
犯行の予測は立てていてね。

engChrName: I got here after the fact, but I did manage to beat the cops by a bit.
engSearchText:
I got here after the fact, but I did manage to beat the
cops by a bit.
jpnChrName: 到着した時にはもう犯行後だったけど、 警察が来る前にこれだけは回収できたの。
jpnSearchText:
到着した時にはもう犯行後だったけど、
警察が来る前にこれだけは回収できたの。

engChrName: No small fry if they can shake you off, at least.
engSearchText: No small fry if they can shake you off, at least.
jpnChrName: ハン、お前さんの追跡をかわすとは 偽者ってだけはあるワケか。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、お前さんの追跡をかわすとは
偽者ってだけはあるワケか。

engChrName: Yeah... They've got the acrobatics to match, at least.
engSearchText: Yeah... They've got the acrobatics to match, at least.
jpnChrName: ……そうね、それなりの 軽業使いなのは間違いなさそう。
jpnSearchText:
……そうね、それなりの
軽業使いなのは間違いなさそう。

engChrName: But I'm sure it's just a matter of time before I catch up, though! So I figured I'd call in the cavalry, just in case!
engSearchText:
But I'm sure it's just a matter of time before I catch
up, though! So I figured I'd call in the cavalry, just
in case!
jpnChrName: あと一歩のとこまでは来てる── アンタも来たからには手伝ってもらうわよ！
jpnSearchText:
あと一歩のとこまでは来てる──
アンタも来たからには手伝ってもらうわよ！

engChrName: Van and Judith set off in pursuit of the fake Grimcat.
engSearchText: Van and Judith set off in pursuit of the fake Grimcat.
jpnChrName: こうしてヴァンたちは、偽グリムキャッツの 足取りを追いかけることにした。
jpnSearchText:
こうしてヴァンたちは、偽グリムキャッツの
足取りを追いかけることにした。

engChrName: Judith's investigation suggested the fake Grimcat would strike multiple targets in one night.
engSearchText:
Judith's investigation suggested the fake Grimcat
would strike multiple targets in one night.
jpnChrName: ジュディスの調べでは、犯人は一夜に数回 犯行を行う傾向があるらしく……
jpnSearchText:
ジュディスの調べでは、犯人は一夜に数回
犯行を行う傾向があるらしく……

engChrName: Their goal was to catch the fake Grimcat before they struck again.
engSearchText:
Their goal was to catch the fake Grimcat before they
struck again.
jpnChrName: 次の犯行前には必ず捕まえてみせると ジュディスは息まくのだった。
jpnSearchText:
次の犯行前には必ず捕まえてみせると
ジュディスは息まくのだった。

engChrName: Van decided to stop by Bermotti's place during his nightly patrol.
engSearchText:
Van decided to stop by Bermotti's place during his
nightly patrol.
jpnChrName: ヴァンは夜の巡回がてら、 ベルモッティの店を訪れた。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンは夜の巡回がてら、
ベルモッティの店を訪れた。

engChrName: Oh! Van, darling, welcome.
engSearchText: Oh! Van, darling, welcome.
jpnChrName: あら、いらっしゃいヴァンちゃん。
jpnSearchText: あら、いらっしゃいヴァンちゃん。

engChrName: Which Bermotti are you looking for tonight? The informant, or the bartender?
engSearchText:
Which Bermotti are you looking for tonight?
The informant, or the bartender?
jpnChrName: 今日は情報屋のアタシとバーテンダーのアタシ、 どちらに御用かしら？
jpnSearchText:
今日は情報屋のアタシとバーテンダーのアタシ、
どちらに御用かしら？

engChrName: I can pull double duty if you're feeling a little needy, too!
engSearchText:
I can pull double duty if you're feeling a little
needy, too!
jpnChrName: 勿論、どっちもっていう 欲張りコースでも構わないわよ❤
jpnSearchText:
勿論、どっちもっていう
欲張りコースでも構わないわよ❤

engChrName: That's a weird way to ask 'do you want a drink.'
engSearchText: That's a weird way to ask 'do you want a drink.'
jpnChrName: 妙な言い方するんじゃねえっ。
jpnSearchText: 妙な言い方するんじゃねえっ。

engChrName: Which is what I'm here for, by the way. Figured I'd have a quick drink while out and about.
engSearchText:
Which is what I'm here for, by the way. Figured I'd
have a quick drink while out and about.
jpnChrName: だがまあ、一杯だけ軽く 引っかけていこうかと思ってな。
jpnSearchText:
だがまあ、一杯だけ軽く
引っかけていこうかと思ってな。

engChrName: Surprise me.
engSearchText: Surprise me.
jpnChrName: お任せで頼む。
jpnSearchText: お任せで頼む。

engChrName: All righty! I'll get you just the perfect drink for a dark and rainy night.
engSearchText:
All righty! I'll get you just the perfect drink for a dark
and rainy night.
jpnChrName: フフ、それじゃあ雨の夜に 相応しい一杯をご馳走するわね。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、それじゃあ雨の夜に
相応しい一杯をご馳走するわね。

engChrName: By the by, we happen to have an unusual customer today.
engSearchText:
By the by, we happen to have an unusual
customer today.
jpnChrName: そうだ、今日は珍しいお客さんも来てるのよ。
jpnSearchText: そうだ、今日は珍しいお客さんも来てるのよ。

engChrName: An unusual customer? Who—
engSearchText: An unusual customer? Who—
jpnChrName: 珍しい客？　って──
jpnSearchText: 珍しい客？　って──

engChrName: Hey, Van.
engSearchText: Hey, Van.
jpnChrName: こんばんは、裏解決屋さん。
jpnSearchText: こんばんは、裏解決屋さん。

engChrName: Want to sit with me tonight?
engSearchText: Want to sit with me tonight?
jpnChrName: 良かったら相席していかない？
jpnSearchText: 良かったら相席していかない？

engChrName: Here you go. It's called Rainy Blue. Perfect for tonight's weather.
engSearchText:
Here you go. It's called Rainy Blue. Perfect for
tonight's weather.
jpnChrName: こちら、レイニーブルー。 雨の日にぴったりのカクテルよ。
jpnSearchText:
こちら、レイニーブルー。
雨の日にぴったりのカクテルよ。

engChrName: Have fun, you two. ♪
engSearchText: Have fun, you two. ♪
jpnChrName: それじゃあごゆっくり～♪
jpnSearchText: それじゃあごゆっくり～♪

engChrName: It's a nice drink.
engSearchText: It's a nice drink.
jpnChrName: 綺麗なお酒だね。
jpnSearchText: 綺麗なお酒だね。

engChrName: Yeah. You okay to be out drinkin'?
engSearchText: Yeah. You okay to be out drinkin'?
jpnChrName: ああ──ってさすがに 成人はしているんだったか？
jpnSearchText:
ああ──ってさすがに
成人はしているんだったか？

engChrName: I may still look like a teen, but I'm twenty as of this year.
engSearchText:
I may still look like a teen, but I'm twenty as of
this year.
jpnChrName: 今年２０になった。 まだたまに未成年って間違われるけど。
jpnSearchText:
今年２０になった。
まだたまに未成年って間違われるけど。

engChrName: How about you?
engSearchText: How about you?
jpnChrName: そういう裏解決屋さんはいくつ？
jpnSearchText: そういう裏解決屋さんはいくつ？

engChrName: Twenty-four. And I don't wanna hear any comments about it. I'm not that old.
engSearchText:
Twenty-four. And I don't wanna hear any comments
about it. I'm not that old.
jpnChrName: ２４になるが……言っとくが オッサン呼ばわりは止めてくれよ？
jpnSearchText:
２４になるが……言っとくが
オッサン呼ばわりは止めてくれよ？

engChrName: You telling me not to only makes me want to do it even more.
engSearchText:
You telling me not to only makes me want to do it
even more.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そうやって釘を刺されると 余計に呼んでみたくなるかも。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、そうやって釘を刺されると
余計に呼んでみたくなるかも。

engChrName: Anyway. Since we're already here, we might as well. Cheers.
engSearchText:
Anyway. Since we're already here, we might as well.
Cheers.
jpnChrName: ったく…… それじゃ景気づけに乾杯といくか。
jpnSearchText:
ったく……
それじゃ景気づけに乾杯といくか。

engChrName: Sure. Here's to making friends. Cheers.
engSearchText: Sure. Here's to making friends. Cheers.
jpnChrName: ん、それじゃお近づきの印にって事で。
jpnSearchText: ん、それじゃお近づきの印にって事で。

engChrName: Van and Fie shared a few drinks, opening with a bit of pleasant small talk.
engSearchText:
Van and Fie shared a few drinks, opening with a bit
of pleasant small talk.
jpnChrName: こうしてヴァンとフィーはお酒を楽しみつつ── まずは他愛のない会話を楽しむのだった。
jpnSearchText:
こうしてヴァンとフィーはお酒を楽しみつつ──
まずは他愛のない会話を楽しむのだった。

engChrName: After ten minutes of drinks...
engSearchText: After ten minutes of drinks...
jpnChrName: そして飲み交わしてから１０分後──
jpnSearchText: <C1>そして飲み交わしてから１０分後──

engChrName: Come on, you barely had anything. Don't tell me you're blackout drunk already.
engSearchText:
Come on, you barely had anything. Don't tell me
you're blackout drunk already.
jpnChrName: って、飲み始めたばっかりだってのに もう酔い潰れてんのか？
jpnSearchText:
って、飲み始めたばっかりだってのに
もう酔い潰れてんのか？

engChrName: I'm not. Just felt a little sleepy there.
engSearchText: I'm not. Just felt a little sleepy there.
jpnChrName: ……潰れてない、一瞬寝ちゃってただけ。
jpnSearchText: ……潰れてない、一瞬寝ちゃってただけ。

engChrName: You don't gotta force yourself to drink if you can't take it. I ain't gonna look after you if you DO black out.
engSearchText:
You don't gotta force yourself to drink if you can't
take it. I ain't gonna look after you if you DO
black out.
jpnChrName: 酒に弱いんなら無理すんな。 面倒見きれねえからな？
jpnSearchText:
酒に弱いんなら無理すんな。
面倒見きれねえからな？

engChrName: *yawn* I'll be fine. Just need to take a short nap.
engSearchText: *yawn* I'll be fine. Just need to take a short nap.
jpnChrName: ふわぁ……大丈夫、 後で少し眠れば醒めるから。
jpnSearchText:
ふわぁ……大丈夫、
後で少し眠れば醒めるから。

engChrName: And I'm familiar with what a truly embarrassing drunk looks like. I can keep myself from falling into the same rut as Sara.
engSearchText:
And I'm familiar with what a truly embarrassing
drunk looks like. I can keep myself from falling into
the same rut as Sara.
jpnChrName: それに、酔っ払いの醜態は何度も見てるしね。 サラと同じ轍は踏まないつもり。
jpnSearchText:
それに、酔っ払いの醜態は何度も見てるしね。
サラと同じ轍は踏まないつもり。

engChrName: Sara? As in Valestein? The Purple Lightning?
engSearchText: Sara? As in Valestein? The Purple Lightning?
jpnChrName: サラっつうと…… もしかしてあの《紫電》のことか？
jpnSearchText:
サラっつうと……
もしかしてあの《紫電》のことか？

engChrName: A former jaeger turned A-rank bracer. Just like you. She also had somethin' to do with Class VII, if I remember right.
engSearchText:
A former jaeger turned A-rank bracer. Just like you.
She also had somethin' to do with Class VII, if I
remember right.
jpnChrName: お前さんと同じく元猟兵にしてＡ級遊撃士── しかもあの《Ⅶ組》関係者っつう。
jpnSearchText:
お前さんと同じく元猟兵にしてＡ級遊撃士──
しかもあの《Ⅶ組》関係者っつう。

engChrName: I guess it's your job to be well informed.
engSearchText: I guess it's your job to be well informed.
jpnChrName: ふふ、裏解決屋さんなら 当然それくらいは知ってるか。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、裏解決屋さんなら
当然それくらいは知ってるか。

engChrName: She started out as our class teacher. Now, she's both my master and my partner. Of sorts, anyway.
engSearchText:
She started out as our class teacher. Now, she's both
my master and my partner. Of sorts, anyway.
jpnChrName: かつてのわたし達の担任教官で、今じゃ 恩師であり相棒……みたいなものかな。
jpnSearchText:
かつてのわたし達の担任教官で、今じゃ
恩師であり相棒……みたいなものかな。

engChrName: Come to think of it, I had some good drinks with Rean, Laura, and the others on my birthday, too.
engSearchText:
Come to think of it, I had some good drinks with
Rean, Laura, and the others on my birthday, too.
jpnChrName: 成人した時にリィンやラウラたちも含めて飲んだ 初めてのお酒も、美味しかったな……
jpnSearchText:
成人した時にリィンやラウラたちも含めて飲んだ
初めてのお酒も、美味しかったな……

engChrName: Master and partner, huh...
engSearchText: Master and partner, huh...
jpnChrName: 恩師であり相棒、か……
