jpnSearchText: 恩師であり相棒、か……

engChrName: Do you have someone like that?
engSearchText: Do you have someone like that?
jpnChrName: そっちにもそういう人が いるみたいだね？
jpnSearchText:
そっちにもそういう人が
いるみたいだね？

engChrName: Sort of. Master, yes. But not partner.
engSearchText: Sort of. Master, yes. But not partner.
jpnChrName: まあな……相棒のほうじゃねえが。
jpnSearchText: まあな……相棒のほうじゃねえが。

engChrName: Not that different at the end of the day, though. I wouldn't be where I am today without him.
engSearchText:
Not that different at the end of the day, though.
I wouldn't be where I am today without him.
jpnChrName: 縁に恵まれて今があるって意味じゃ お前と似たようなものかもしれねえ。
jpnSearchText:
縁に恵まれて今があるって意味じゃ
お前と似たようなものかもしれねえ。

engChrName: But that tie's been cut now.
engSearchText: But that tie's been cut now.
jpnChrName: ま、結局は途切れちまったんだが。
jpnSearchText: ま、結局は途切れちまったんだが。

engChrName: I see.
engSearchText: I see.
jpnChrName: ……そっか。
jpnSearchText: ……そっか。

engChrName: Anyway, that's enough about me. You got somethin' you wanted to ask, yeah?
engSearchText:
Anyway, that's enough about me. You got somethin'
you wanted to ask, yeah?
jpnChrName: 俺の話はさておき── 聞きたいことは他にあるみたいだな？
jpnSearchText:
俺の話はさておき──
聞きたいことは他にあるみたいだな？

engChrName: Since you went to the trouble of waitin' for me here and all.
engSearchText:
Since you went to the trouble of waitin' for me here
and all.
jpnChrName: 俺がこの店の常連なのを見越して、 わざわざ待ち伏せしていた以上は。
jpnSearchText:
俺がこの店の常連なのを見越して、
わざわざ待ち伏せしていた以上は。

engChrName: Should've guessed you'd figure it out.
engSearchText: Should've guessed you'd figure it out.
jpnChrName: フフ、本当にさすがだね。
jpnSearchText: フフ、本当にさすがだね。

engChrName: Zin told me something right before I arrived at the Republic.
engSearchText:
Zin told me something right before I arrived at
the Republic.
jpnChrName: ──共和国に来る直前くらいかな、 ジンから連絡があったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
──共和国に来る直前くらいかな、
ジンから連絡があったんだ。

engChrName: He filled me in on what happened in Creil.
engSearchText: He filled me in on what happened in Creil.
jpnChrName: クレイユ村であったことについて。
jpnSearchText: クレイユ村であったことについて。

engChrName: You were there for it, right? With the Kruga girl I met at the park.
engSearchText:
You were there for it, right? With the Kruga girl I
met at the park.
jpnChrName: 貴方や、昼に記念公園に来てた…… 《戦士団》の子も居合わせたんだってね？
jpnSearchText:
貴方や、昼に記念公園に来てた……
《戦士団》の子も居合わせたんだってね？

engChrName: We were, yeah. Guess it's not surprising you'd wanna hear about what happened.
engSearchText:
We were, yeah. Guess it's not surprising you'd wanna
hear about what happened.
jpnChrName: ああ──当然、 お前さんには聞く権利があんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──当然、
お前さんには聞く権利があんだろ。

engChrName: We might be here a bit, but I don't mind sharin'.
engSearchText: We might be here a bit, but I don't mind sharin'.
jpnChrName: かいつまんでにはなるが 話させてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
かいつまんでにはなるが
話させてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Van started telling Fie about what happened in Creil Village, making sure to omit the subject of the Genesis.
engSearchText:
Van started telling Fie about what happened in Creil
Village, making sure to omit the subject of
the Genesis.
jpnChrName: ヴァンはクレイユ村であったことや、 アイーダのことについて……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンはクレイユ村であったことや、
アイーダのことについて……

engChrName: He told an intently listening Fie about what occurred in the village and everything relating to Aida.
engSearchText:
He told an intently listening Fie about what occurred
in the village and everything relating to Aida.
jpnChrName: ゲネシスの話などはうまく誤魔化しながら フィーに話した。
jpnSearchText:
ゲネシスの話などはうまく誤魔化しながら
フィーに話した。

engChrName: I see. Aida...
engSearchText: I see. Aida...
jpnChrName: ………そっか、アイーダ…………
jpnSearchText: ………そっか、アイーダ…………

engChrName: She never changed. She always played the role of big sister, even back with our old crew.
engSearchText:
She never changed. She always played the role of big
sister, even back with our old crew.
jpnChrName: 団にいた頃も、面倒見が良くて 姉御肌の“強い”人だった。
jpnSearchText:
団にいた頃も、面倒見が良くて
姉御肌の“強い”人だった。

engChrName: I definitely saw her as one.
engSearchText: I definitely saw her as one.
jpnChrName: わたしにとっても 本当の姉みたいに……
jpnSearchText:
わたしにとっても
本当の姉みたいに……

engChrName: She was probably happy to have her little sister with her for her last moments.
engSearchText:
She was probably happy to have her little sister with
her for her last moments.
jpnChrName: きっと、嬉しかったと思う。 もう一人の妹分に見送ってもらえて。
jpnSearchText:
きっと、嬉しかったと思う。
もう一人の妹分に見送ってもらえて。

engChrName: Thank you for telling me about it. I'll make sure Xeno and Leo hear about it, too.
engSearchText:
Thank you for telling me about it. I'll make sure Xeno
and Leo hear about it, too.
jpnChrName: ──ありがとう、聞けてよかった。 これでゼノやレオにもちゃんと話してあげられる。
jpnSearchText:
──ありがとう、聞けてよかった。
これでゼノやレオにもちゃんと話してあげられる。

engChrName: Yeah, you do that.
engSearchText: Yeah, you do that.
jpnChrName: ああ、そうしてやるといい。
jpnSearchText: ああ、そうしてやるといい。

engChrName: So you still keep in touch with the guys from Zephyr?
engSearchText: So you still keep in touch with the guys from Zephyr?
jpnChrName: にしても《西風の旅団》か…… 今も古巣と連絡をとってるんだな？
jpnSearchText:
にしても《西風の旅団》か……
今も古巣と連絡をとってるんだな？

engChrName: *yawn* A bit, at least...
engSearchText: *yawn* A bit, at least...
jpnChrName: ふわぁ……そうだね……
jpnSearchText: ふわぁ……そうだね……

engChrName: I lost contact with them for a few years after what happened to the boss.
engSearchText:
I lost contact with them for a few years after what
happened to the boss.
jpnChrName: 数年前までは“団長”の件もあって ちゃんと話せないでいたけど。
jpnSearchText:
数年前までは“団長”の件もあって
ちゃんと話せないでいたけど。

engChrName: But they're still family to me. I kept in contact with them this time, after everything settled down.
engSearchText:
But they're still family to me. I kept in contact with
them this time, after everything settled down.
jpnChrName: “見届けて”からはたまに連絡を取り合ってるかな。 ……やっぱり家族であることは変わりないから。
jpnSearchText:
“見届けて”からはたまに連絡を取り合ってるかな。
……やっぱり家族であることは変わりないから。

engChrName: That's good.
engSearchText: That's good.
jpnChrName: ああ……そいつはよかったな。
jpnSearchText: ああ……そいつはよかったな。

engChrName: (Heard here and there that the Jaeger King was somehow involved in the whole war deal with Erebonia.)
engSearchText:
(Heard here and there that the Jaeger King was
somehow involved in the whole war deal
with Erebonia.)
jpnChrName: （《猟兵王》か……あの大戦の裏で   それらしい人物が動いてたって情報もあるが。）
jpnSearchText:
（《猟兵王》か……あの大戦の裏で
それらしい人物が動いてたって情報もあるが。）

engChrName: (Probably shouldn't pry.)
engSearchText: (Probably shouldn't pry.)
jpnChrName: （……ま、俺がツッこむ事じゃねえか。）
jpnSearchText: （……ま、俺がツッこむ事じゃねえか。）

engChrName: But, hmm... Ferida, from the Warriors of Kruga.
engSearchText: But, hmm... Ferida, from the Warriors of Kruga.
jpnChrName: それにしても…… 《クルガ戦士団》のフェリーダか。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても……
《クルガ戦士団》のフェリーダか。

engChrName: I'd like to talk to her about Aida. And in general, too. It'd be nice to chat with her outside of work.
engSearchText:
I'd like to talk to her about Aida. And in general, too.
It'd be nice to chat with her outside of work.
jpnChrName: アイーダの事もあるけど、 個人的にもちゃんと話をしてみたいな。
jpnSearchText:
アイーダの事もあるけど、
個人的にもちゃんと話をしてみたいな。

engChrName: Don't see why not. Feri looked like she wanted to talk to you, too.
engSearchText:
Don't see why not. Feri looked like she wanted to
talk to you, too.
jpnChrName: そうしてやってくれ、フェリの方も 機会を伺ってるみてえだったからな。
jpnSearchText:
そうしてやってくれ、フェリの方も
機会を伺ってるみてえだったからな。

engChrName: That's good to hear. But it'll probably have to wait until things calm down.
engSearchText:
That's good to hear. But it'll probably have to wait
until things calm down.
jpnChrName: ん……もう少し落ち着いてからに なるかもしれないけど。
jpnSearchText:
ん……もう少し落ち着いてからに
なるかもしれないけど。

engChrName: Still, it'll be nice to get to talk to one of Aida's other sisters.
engSearchText:
Still, it'll be nice to get to talk to one of Aida's
other sisters.
jpnChrName: アイーダの“妹分”同士、 積もる話もあるだろうし……
jpnSearchText:
アイーダの“妹分”同士、
積もる話もあるだろうし……

engChrName: Oh. Right. When I meet her... My dad...
engSearchText: Oh. Right. When I meet her... My dad...
jpnChrName: そうだ、その時は わたしの“お父さん”の事も……
jpnSearchText:
そうだ、その時は
わたしの“お父さん”の事も……

engChrName: Uhh... You okay there?
engSearchText: Uhh... You okay there?
jpnChrName: ……おーい、クラウゼル？
jpnSearchText: ……おーい、クラウゼル？

engChrName: Hah. Well, guess that's the end of that conversation.
engSearchText: Hah. Well, guess that's the end of that conversation.
jpnChrName: ハッ…… まあ、話すべきことは話したしな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……
まあ、話すべきことは話したしな。

engChrName: She said she'd only take a short nap, so I guess I'll leave her be.
engSearchText:
She said she'd only take a short nap, so I guess I'll
leave her be.
jpnChrName: すぐ醒めるって言ってたし この辺で退散しておくとするか。
jpnSearchText:
すぐ醒めるって言ってたし
この辺で退散しておくとするか。

engChrName: Van, leaving Fie in Bermotti's care, left the bar.
engSearchText: Van, leaving Fie in Bermotti's care, left the bar.
jpnChrName: その後、ベルモッティに任せて 一足先にバーを後にし……
jpnSearchText:
その後、ベルモッティに任せて
一足先にバーを後にし……

engChrName: He received word shortly after that Fie had woken up and headed off herself.
engSearchText:
He received word shortly after that Fie had woken up
and headed off herself.
jpnChrName: すぐにフィーが目を覚まして 戻っていったという連絡を受けるのだった。
jpnSearchText:
すぐにフィーが目を覚まして
戻っていったという連絡を受けるのだった。

engChrName: Heh, think I managed to lose 'em.
engSearchText: Heh, think I managed to lose 'em.
jpnChrName: へへ、なんとか撒いたみてえだな。
jpnSearchText: へへ、なんとか撒いたみてえだな。

engChrName: Just my luck that the cops just happened to be there. But what's done is—
engSearchText:
Just my luck that the cops just happened to be there.
But what's done is—
jpnChrName: たまたま現場にサツがいるなんざついてねえ。 だがここまでくりゃあ──
jpnSearchText:
たまたま現場にサツがいるなんざついてねえ。
だがここまでくりゃあ──

engChrName: GAH!
engSearchText: GAH!
jpnChrName: ぐえっ！？
jpnSearchText: ぐえっ！？

engChrName: Whoa. You sure went flyin'. You okay there, bud?
engSearchText: Whoa. You sure went flyin'. You okay there, bud?
jpnChrName: おっと。 派手に転んだな、大丈夫か？
jpnSearchText:
おっと。
派手に転んだな、大丈夫か？

engChrName: Oww... Damn it, who the hell are you?! The hell was that all about?
engSearchText:
Oww... Damn it, who the hell are you?! The hell was
that all about?
jpnChrName: いでええ、なんだてめぇ……！？ いきなり何をしやがる！！
jpnSearchText:
いでええ、なんだてめぇ……！？
いきなり何をしやがる！！

engChrName: Whoops. Sorry, man. You looked so easy to trip up, I couldn't help myself.
engSearchText:
Whoops. Sorry, man. You looked so easy to trip up, I
couldn't help myself.
jpnChrName: いや～、ひっかけやすそうな 足があったんでな。
jpnSearchText:
いや～、ひっかけやすそうな
足があったんでな。

engChrName: Anyway, stay quiet. Aaany minute now...
engSearchText: Anyway, stay quiet. Aaany minute now...
jpnChrName: ま、大人しくしてな。 多分そろそろ──
jpnSearchText:
ま、大人しくしてな。
多分そろそろ──

engChrName: Inspector, over there!
engSearchText: Inspector, over there!
jpnChrName: 警部、こっちで声が……！
jpnSearchText: 警部、こっちで声が……！

engChrName: The damn cops!
engSearchText: The damn cops!
jpnChrName: サ、サツども……！！
jpnSearchText: サ、サツども……！！

engChrName: Good work, officers!
engSearchText: Good work, officers!
jpnChrName: どうも、お疲れ様です。
jpnSearchText: どうも、お疲れ様です。

engChrName: *pant* *pant* Wh... Why are you here?!
engSearchText: *pant* *pant* Wh... Why are you here?!
jpnChrName: はあはあ…… な、なんでお前がここにいるんだ！？
jpnSearchText:
はあはあ……
な、なんでお前がここにいるんだ！？

engChrName: You took him down, didn't you?
engSearchText: You took him down, didn't you?
jpnChrName: ……そいつはお前がやったのか。
jpnSearchText: ……そいつはお前がやったのか。

engChrName: Not at all! Let's just call it dumb luck. Glad you could apprehend the culprit, officers.
engSearchText:
Not at all! Let's just call it dumb luck. Glad you could
apprehend the culprit, officers.
jpnChrName: たまたまですよ、たまたま。 ──良かったな、すぐお迎えがきて。
jpnSearchText:
たまたまですよ、たまたま。
──良かったな、すぐお迎えがきて。

engChrName: D-Damn it all!
engSearchText: D-Damn it all!
jpnChrName: く、くそおおおっ……！
jpnSearchText: く、くそおおおっ……！

engChrName: And so we brought the case of the Brothers Music Shop thief to an end.
engSearchText:
And so we brought the case of the Brothers Music
Shop thief to an end.
jpnChrName: 《ブラザーズ楽器店》の売り上げ強盗犯は 無事に逮捕……
jpnSearchText:
《ブラザーズ楽器店》の売り上げ強盗犯は
無事に逮捕……

engChrName: That's another one for the books... NOT! Is this a joke?!
engSearchText:
That's another one for the books... NOT! Is this
a joke?!
jpnChrName: これにて一件落着──って納得できるかあっ！
jpnSearchText: これにて一件落着──<w1000>って納得できるかあっ！

engChrName: What is with you?! How did you even get ahead of us?!
engSearchText:
What is with you?! How did you even get ahead
of us?!
jpnChrName: 何なんだよお前は……！ いったいどうやって先回りを──
jpnSearchText:
何なんだよお前は……！
いったいどうやって先回りを──

engChrName: And if you were going to help, why didn't you do it from the start?!
engSearchText:
And if you were going to help, why didn't you do it
from the start?!
jpnChrName: ていうか初めから素直に 協力すればよかったじゃないか！？
jpnSearchText:
ていうか初めから素直に
協力すればよかったじゃないか！？

engChrName: Because you wouldn't owe me if I'd just up and offered my help.
engSearchText:
Because you wouldn't owe me if I'd just up and
offered my help.
jpnChrName: それじゃ警察に貸しが作れないだろ？
jpnSearchText: それじゃ警察に貸しが作れないだろ？

engChrName: Here's a tip, buddy: You really gotta learn Edith's backstreets if you wanna make it as a cop here.
engSearchText:
Here's a tip, buddy: You really gotta learn Edith's
backstreets if you wanna make it as a cop here.
jpnChrName: 首都で警察やってくならもう少し裏道にも 詳しくなっておくんだな。
jpnSearchText:
首都で警察やってくならもう少し裏道にも
詳しくなっておくんだな。

engChrName: Grr...
engSearchText: Grr...
jpnChrName: ぐううっ……
jpnSearchText: ぐううっ……

engChrName: We were also able to assist the old lady thanks to some 'good-hearted citizen's tip.'
engSearchText:
We were also able to assist the old lady thanks to
some 'good-hearted citizen's tip.'
jpnChrName: ……“善意の通行人からの連絡”で、 怪我をした御婦人も無事保護された。
jpnSearchText:
……“善意の通行人からの連絡”で、
怪我をした御婦人も無事保護された。

engChrName: Her family's on the way to pick her up, so she should be fine from here on.
engSearchText:
Her family's on the way to pick her up, so she should
be fine from here on.
jpnChrName: ご家族も迎えに来たそうだから 心配はいらないだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ご家族も迎えに来たそうだから
心配はいらないだろう。

engChrName: Oh? Dunno what you're talkin' about, but good for you.
engSearchText:
Oh? Dunno what you're talkin' about, but good
for you.
jpnChrName: へえ？　誰だか知らないが そりゃよかったな。
jpnSearchText:
へえ？　誰だか知らないが
そりゃよかったな。

engChrName: Well, then, officers. Don't wanna stand in the way of all your peacekeepin', so I'll leave you be.
engSearchText:
Well, then, officers. Don't wanna stand in the way of
all your peacekeepin', so I'll leave you be.
jpnChrName: そんじゃあな、警部さんたち。 今後とも首都の平和は任せたぜ。
jpnSearchText:
そんじゃあな、警部さんたち。
今後とも首都の平和は任せたぜ。

engChrName: Goddamn it. What's he even trying to get at?
engSearchText: Goddamn it. What's he even trying to get at?
jpnChrName: ああもう、あの男は…… 一体全体何がしたかったんでしょうね！？
jpnSearchText:
ああもう、あの男は……
一体全体何がしたかったんでしょうね！？

engChrName: I suppose that's just how a spriggan does things.
engSearchText: I suppose that's just how a spriggan does things.
jpnChrName: ……それが《裏解決屋》の流儀とやら、 なんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
……それが《裏解決屋》の流儀とやら、
なんだろう。

engChrName: Not to say that he's earned my trust just with this, of course.
engSearchText:
Not to say that he's earned my trust just with this,
of course.
jpnChrName: これで信用したわけじゃないがな。
jpnSearchText: これで信用したわけじゃないがな。

engChrName: Huh?
engSearchText: Huh?

engChrName: Nothing. Let's get back to the station.
engSearchText: Nothing. Let's get back to the station.
jpnChrName: 何でもない──署に戻るぞ。
jpnSearchText: 何でもない──署に戻るぞ。

engChrName: The robber was escorted to the police station.
engSearchText: The robber was escorted to the police station.
jpnChrName: その後、強盗犯は警察署へと連行されていき……
jpnSearchText: <C1>その後、強盗犯は警察署へと連行されていき……

engChrName: Once things calmed down, Van returned to his nightly patrol.
engSearchText:
Once things calmed down, Van returned to his
nightly patrol.
jpnChrName: ヴァンは騒ぎのほとぼりが収まってから 行動を再開するのだった。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンは騒ぎのほとぼりが収まってから
行動を再開するのだった。

engChrName: Well, I got some time to kill. What to do, hmm...
engSearchText: Well, I got some time to kill. What to do, hmm...
jpnChrName: さ～て、ヒマもできたことだし なにすっかねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
さ～て、ヒマもできたことだし
なにすっかねぇ。

engChrName: Maybe I'll stop by for a bit of booze while the sun's still up, and then some cuties for when it goes down—
engSearchText:
Maybe I'll stop by for a bit of booze while the sun's
still up, and then some cuties for when it goes
down—
jpnChrName: 景気づけに昼飲みにナンパでも……
jpnSearchText: 景気づけに昼飲みにナンパでも……

engChrName: So this is where you've been, Aaron.
engSearchText: So this is where you've been, Aaron.
jpnChrName: いたわね、ア ー ロ ン ？
jpnSearchText: いたわね、<W300>ア ー ロ ン ？

engChrName: You look awfully relaxed for someone who just ditched all his responsibilities on me.
engSearchText:
You look awfully relaxed for someone who just
ditched all his responsibilities on me.
jpnChrName: ったく、押しつけといていいご身分だな。
jpnSearchText: ったく、押しつけといていいご身分だな。

engChrName: Why are you here?!
engSearchText: Why are you here?!
jpnChrName: うおっ！？ どうしてここに……！
jpnSearchText:
うおっ！？
どうしてここに……！

engChrName: It's not that hard to guess what you get up to. How come you canceled on me last minute?!
engSearchText:
It's not that hard to guess what you get up to.
How come you canceled on me last minute?!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんと行動パターンを読んだの。 まったく、ドタキャンしてくれちゃって……！
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんと行動パターンを読んだの。
まったく、ドタキャンしてくれちゃって……！

engChrName: You haven't been causing trouble for everyone, right? I so know you messed up your sleeping schedule again, and I bet your diet's not far off.
engSearchText:
You haven't been causing trouble for everyone, right?
I so know you messed up your sleeping schedule
again, and I bet your diet's not far off.
jpnChrName: この調子で周りの人に迷惑かけてないでしょうね？ どうせまた食生活とか睡眠も乱れに乱れて──
jpnSearchText:
この調子で周りの人に迷惑かけてないでしょうね？
どうせまた食生活とか睡眠も乱れに乱れて──

engChrName: (Oh, you did NOT just come all this way to have her nag at me!)
engSearchText:
(Oh, you did NOT just come all this way to have her
nag at me!)
jpnChrName: （てめぇ、面倒なのを連れて来てんじゃねえ！）
jpnSearchText: （てめぇ、面倒なのを連れて来てんじゃねえ！）

engChrName: (You were askin' for it.)
engSearchText: (You were askin' for it.)
jpnChrName: （ま、自業自得だろ。）
jpnSearchText: （ま、自業自得だろ。）

engChrName: Van and Ashen took Aaron around town, having him serve as her tour guide for the day.
engSearchText:
Van and Ashen took Aaron around town, having him
serve as her tour guide for the day.
jpnChrName: こうしてアシェンを案内しながらの 首都巡りを楽しみ……
jpnSearchText:
こうしてアシェンを案内しながらの
首都巡りを楽しみ……

engChrName: After ending their tour at Trion Tower, they returned to the Seiden District.
engSearchText:
After ending their tour at Trion Tower, they returned
to the Seiden District.
jpnChrName: 最後にトリオンタワーを見てから サイデン地区に戻るのだった。
jpnSearchText:
最後にトリオンタワーを見てから
サイデン地区に戻るのだった。

engChrName: Van headed to the meetup location indicated by the mail.
engSearchText:
Van headed to the meetup location indicated by
the mail.
jpnChrName: ヴァンはメールで指示されていた 待ち合わせ場所に向かった。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンはメールで指示されていた
待ち合わせ場所に向かった。

engChrName: Van. Van? Over here.
engSearchText: Van. Van? Over here.
jpnChrName: ヴァン君、ヴァン君。 こっちだ。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン君、ヴァン君。
こっちだ。

engChrName: My thanks for coming out here.
engSearchText: My thanks for coming out here.
jpnChrName: いや～、よく来てくれた。
jpnSearchText: いや～、よく来てくれた。

engChrName: It's been a few hours, yes? Thank you for answering my call.
engSearchText:
It's been a few hours, yes? Thank you for answering
my call.
jpnChrName: 数刻ぶりだね。 応じてくれて礼を言うよ。
jpnSearchText:
数刻ぶりだね。
応じてくれて礼を言うよ。

engChrName: Why...are you hiding there?
engSearchText: Why...are you hiding there?
jpnChrName: シェリド殿下…… まさかそんな所に隠れてるとは。
jpnSearchText:
シェリド殿下……
まさかそんな所に隠れてるとは。

engChrName: I know you're good with arts and everything, but don't you have your right hand with you? Or even just one bodyguard?
engSearchText:
I know you're good with arts and everything, but
don't you have your right hand with you? Or even
just one bodyguard?
jpnChrName: 殿下のアーツの腕前は知ってますが、 マジで懐刀殿どころかＳＰの１人も連れずに？
jpnSearchText:
殿下のアーツの腕前は知ってますが、
マジで懐刀殿どころかＳＰの１人も連れずに？

engChrName: As I wrote to you, I managed to lose them for a moment.
engSearchText:
As I wrote to you, I managed to lose them for
a moment.
jpnChrName: ああ、メールで連絡した通り 何とか撒いてきたよ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、メールで連絡した通り
何とか撒いてきたよ。

engChrName: Shall we be off, then? Let us share the night as men, savoring all the dazzling delights of Edith's nightlife!
engSearchText:
Shall we be off, then? Let us share the night as men,
savoring all the dazzling delights of Edith's nightlife!
jpnChrName: それじゃあ繰り出すとしようじゃないか── 男同士、目くるめく夜の首都探訪へとね！
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ繰り出すとしようじゃないか──
男同士、目くるめく夜の首都探訪へとね！

engChrName: Already kind of regretting this...
engSearchText: Already kind of regretting this...
jpnChrName: 来たのをちょいと後悔してますよ……
jpnSearchText: 来たのをちょいと後悔してますよ……

engChrName: You sure it was okay for you to slip out like that?
engSearchText: You sure it was okay for you to slip out like that?
jpnChrName: マジで大丈夫なんですか？ 勝手に抜け出してきちまって。
jpnSearchText:
マジで大丈夫なんですか？
勝手に抜け出してきちまって。

engChrName: I guess that's up to you, isn't it?
engSearchText: I guess that's up to you, isn't it?
jpnChrName: ハハ、それは君次第かな？
jpnSearchText: ハハ、それは君次第かな？

engChrName: Given the situation, if by some off chance something were to happen to me, I dare say the obvious person to hold responsible would be...
engSearchText:
Given the situation, if by some off chance something
were to happen to me, I dare say the obvious person
to hold responsible would be...
jpnChrName: この状況、万が一私に何かあった場合、 責任を問われるのはおそらくは……
jpnSearchText:
この状況、万が一私に何かあった場合、
責任を問われるのはおそらくは……

engChrName: Scratch that. I don't just kind of regret this. I wanna erase all evidence that this ever happened and then book it outta here.
engSearchText:
Scratch that. I don't just kind of regret this. I wanna
erase all evidence that this ever happened and then
book it outta here.
jpnChrName: ……前言撤回だ、ちょっと後悔どころじゃねえ。 全部見なかったことにして今すぐ帰りたいくらいだ。
jpnSearchText:
……前言撤回だ、ちょっと後悔どころじゃねえ。
全部見なかったことにして今すぐ帰りたいくらいだ。

engChrName: Now, now. Don't be like that. There's no one better to fulfill this role than you.
engSearchText:
Now, now. Don't be like that. There's no one better
to fulfill this role than you.
jpnChrName: まあまあ、そう言わないでくれ。 君ほどの適任は他にいないからね。
jpnSearchText:
まあまあ、そう言わないでくれ。
君ほどの適任は他にいないからね。

engChrName: Think of this as a symbol of my trust.
engSearchText: Think of this as a symbol of my trust.
jpnChrName: 私の信頼と受け取ってほしいかな？
jpnSearchText: 私の信頼と受け取ってほしいかな？

engChrName: Fine. Where do you wanna go, anyway?
engSearchText: Fine. Where do you wanna go, anyway?
jpnChrName: ったく……仕方ねえな。 それで、どこに行きたいんです？
jpnSearchText:
ったく……仕方ねえな。
それで、どこに行きたいんです？

engChrName: Excellent. You're everything I'd hoped for, Van.
engSearchText: Excellent. You're everything I'd hoped for, Van.
jpnChrName: ハッハッハ、それでこそヴァン君だ。
jpnSearchText: ハッハッハ、それでこそヴァン君だ。

engChrName: I've marked a few places I was hoping to visit. The one closest by would be—
engSearchText:
I've marked a few places I was hoping to visit.
The one closest by would be—
jpnChrName: いくつか目星はつけていてね。 まずはこの近くにあるらしいんだが──
jpnSearchText:
いくつか目星はつけていてね。
まずはこの近くにあるらしいんだが──

engChrName: Oh, excellent! Excellent! So this is the 'rock and roll' that's been so popular lately!
engSearchText:
Oh, excellent! Excellent! So this is the 'rock and roll'
that's been so popular lately!
jpnChrName: ほう、素晴らしい熱気じゃないか！ これがロックンロールというものか。
jpnSearchText:
ほう、素晴らしい熱気じゃないか！
これがロックンロールというものか。

engChrName: I dare say the fervor of this music could even sweep me away.
engSearchText:
I dare say the fervor of this music could even sweep
me away.
jpnChrName: 私までこの熱に浮かされてしまいそうだ。
jpnSearchText: 私までこの熱に浮かされてしまいそうだ。

engChrName: We can get closer to the stage.
engSearchText: We can get closer to the stage.
jpnChrName: もうちょい前の方へ行ってみますか。
jpnSearchText: もうちょい前の方へ行ってみますか。

engChrName: Then let us do so.
engSearchText: Then let us do so.
jpnChrName: そうしよう。
jpnSearchText: そうしよう。

engChrName: Hey, man! That's a wild getup! This your first time at a live show?
engSearchText:
Hey, man! That's a wild getup! This your first time at
a live show?
jpnChrName: ヒュー、お兄さん珍しい恰好してんね！ ライブ初心者ー？
jpnSearchText:
ヒュー、お兄さん珍しい恰好してんね！
ライブ初心者ー？

engChrName: C'mon, man, get into the rhythm! Just match the energy and go wild!
engSearchText:
C'mon, man, get into the rhythm! Just match the
energy and go wild!
jpnChrName: もっとテンション上げていこうぜ！ ノリで合わせりゃあいいからさ！
jpnSearchText:
もっとテンション上げていこうぜ！
ノリで合わせりゃあいいからさ！

engChrName: Go...wild?
engSearchText: Go...wild?
jpnChrName: そうか、ノリか。
jpnSearchText: そうか、ノリか。

engChrName: (So, like this?)
engSearchText: (So, like this?)
jpnChrName: （こんな感じだろうか……？）
jpnSearchText: （こんな感じだろうか……？）

engChrName: Hello there, Van, dear. You, too, Agnès!
engSearchText: Hello there, Van, dear. You, too, Agnès!
jpnChrName: ハァイ、ヴァンちゃん。 それにアニエスちゃんだったわね。
jpnSearchText:
ハァイ、ヴァンちゃん。
それにアニエスちゃんだったわね。

engChrName: It's wonderful seeing you two together again.
engSearchText: It's wonderful seeing you two together again.
jpnChrName: また２人で来たのね。
jpnSearchText: また２人で来たのね。

engChrName: Yeah. Long story short, I guess I hired myself a new assistant.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Long story short, I guess I hired myself a
new assistant.
jpnChrName: 色々あってアニエスを バイトで雇うことになってな。
jpnSearchText:
色々あってアニエスを
バイトで雇うことになってな。

engChrName: Figured we'd drop by for a proper greeting.
engSearchText: Figured we'd drop by for a proper greeting.
jpnChrName: 今日はその挨拶に来た。
jpnSearchText: 今日はその挨拶に来た。

engChrName: Once again, it's a pleasure to meet you.
engSearchText: Once again, it's a pleasure to meet you.
jpnChrName: 改めてよろしくお願いします、 ベルモッティさん。
jpnSearchText:
改めてよろしくお願いします、
ベルモッティさん。

engChrName: The pleasure's all mine, darling.
engSearchText: The pleasure's all mine, darling.
jpnChrName: ふふ、こちらこそヨロシクね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、こちらこそヨロシクね。

engChrName: How's your first day on the job treating you? I'm sure it's going to be hard work!
engSearchText:
How's your first day on the job treating you? I'm sure
it's going to be hard work!
jpnChrName: バイト初日の調子はどうかしら？ 色々大変だと思うけど──
jpnSearchText:
バイト初日の調子はどうかしら？
色々大変だと思うけど──

engChrName: But if you need to relax after a hard day of work, you're always welcome here!
engSearchText:
But if you need to relax after a hard day of work,
you're always welcome here!
jpnChrName: あたしはアニエスちゃんの味方よ！
jpnSearchText: あたしはアニエスちゃんの味方よ！

engChrName: Thank you very much!
engSearchText: Thank you very much!
jpnChrName: はい、ありがとうございます！
jpnSearchText: はい、ありがとうございます！

engChrName: Oh, you might've guessed already since you're here, but I'm also open throughout the day, too. Feel free to drop by for lunch, if you'd like.
engSearchText:
Oh, you might've guessed already since you're here,
but I'm also open throughout the day, too. Feel free
to drop by for lunch, if you'd like.
jpnChrName: そうそう、見ての通り昼営業も始めてみたの。 これからはランチでも気軽に使ってね。
jpnSearchText:
そうそう、見ての通り昼営業も始めてみたの。
これからはランチでも気軽に使ってね。

engChrName: Sounds good. We might drop by for that, and some info.
engSearchText:
Sounds good. We might drop by for that, and
some info.
jpnChrName: そいつは何気に助かるな。 ま、情報方面でも今後ともよろしく頼むぜ。
jpnSearchText:
そいつは何気に助かるな。
ま、情報方面でも今後ともよろしく頼むぜ。

engChrName: There's a bulletin board here, too? It looks like it gets a lot of use.
engSearchText:
There's a bulletin board here, too? It looks like it gets
a lot of use.
jpnChrName: こんな所に掲示板が…… 結構使われているんですね。
jpnSearchText:
こんな所に掲示板が……
結構使われているんですね。

engChrName: That it does, yeah.
engSearchText: That it does, yeah.
jpnChrName: まぁ、確かにな。
jpnSearchText: まぁ、確かにな。

engChrName: Let's focus on this case for now.
engSearchText: Let's focus on this case for now.
jpnChrName: ……今はこのヤマに集中するか。
jpnSearchText: ……今はこのヤマに集中するか。

engChrName: It's an old jukebox.
engSearchText: It's an old jukebox.
jpnChrName: 古いジュークボックスが置かれている。
jpnSearchText: 古いジュークボックスが置かれている。

engChrName: Enter the Underground Maintenance Tunnel?
engSearchText: Enter the Underground Maintenance Tunnel?
jpnChrName: 地下鉄整備路に入りますか？
jpnSearchText: <C1>地下鉄整備路に入りますか？

engChrName: I should meet up with everyone first.
engSearchText: I should meet up with everyone first.
jpnChrName: ……今は助手どもとの合流が先だな。
jpnSearchText: ……今は助手どもとの合流が先だな。

engChrName: I shouldn't be goin' in without any business.
engSearchText: I shouldn't be goin' in without any business.
jpnChrName: ……特に用もねえし おいそれと立ち入るのはやめとくか。
jpnSearchText:
……特に用もねえし
おいそれと立ち入るのはやめとくか。

engChrName: I shouldn't be goin' in without any business.
engSearchText: I shouldn't be goin' in without any business.
jpnChrName: ……特に用もねえし おいそれと立ち入るのはやめとくか。
jpnSearchText:
……特に用もねえし
おいそれと立ち入るのはやめとくか。

engChrName: Travel to the Blacklight District via the Subway Service Path?
engSearchText:
Travel to the Blacklight District via the Subway
Service Path?
jpnChrName: 地下道を通って黒芒街に向かいますか？
jpnSearchText: <C1>地下道を通って黒芒街に向かいますか？

engChrName: The concert hall... It usually isn't open during the day.
engSearchText:
The concert hall... It usually isn't open during
the day.
jpnChrName: ライブハウス…… 昼は開店していないはずだな。
jpnSearchText:
ライブハウス……
昼は開店していないはずだな。
